Reviews.Title: BEST MONEY SPENT
Reviews.Author: beachgal_2007
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful product. I have to admit I was a bit skeptical about it because it was so low in price compared to other video monitors but I am so glad I took a chance.  It is the perfect monitor if all you are looking for is a monitor to keep eye on your little one while she sleeps or plays.  The IR night vision is perfect, you can see your baby clear as day.  I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a video monitor whether you are on a budget or not.  It doesnt take a genius to figure out how to work, no bells and whistles, just basics.  Does the job; great price!

Reviews.Title: The Best Monitor Available
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have been through multiple video monitors and never have found one that worked as well as this one does. Whether daytime or nightime, the picture is incredibly clear. The VOX mode - the setting that allows the monitor to go into standby after there is no movement or noise after a preset time - works great.Wish the built quality was a little better, however, that really is my only issue with the monitor.If you are shopping around for a video baby monitor, I can say that this one is the best one out there.

Reviews.Title: Not just for babies...Post-op Pet Monitor Use
Reviews.Author: E. A. Summers "Liz"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to keep a "night eye" on my dog post-op (TPLO).I am VERY happy with this monitor.  I put batteries in the receiver, plugged everything in and voila...an eye on my dog Bear through the night without having to jump up and cross the house to check on him.This was money well spent for my peace of mind and for both Bear and I to get a good night's rest.  I spent the first week sleeping in the same room with him and as we transitioned back to "normal" I have been comfortable which I am sure makes him more comfortable.I mounted the camera high at the end of a small room where Bear sleeps.  I get a good view of the entire room.Absolutely no complaints.  For me, this was money very well spent.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Macs, Motorcycles & Music
Reviews.Content: I don't think you can get a better video/audio monitor for the price. The plastic is cheap and its very light weight. But, we don't care as long as it works. We can see and hear our little guy very clear no matter day or night. I don't know why we waited so long to get a video monitor. It is well worth the extra $20 to upgrade from just the audio to Video and Audio. Our last audio monitor had major issues with cutting out, shutting off and major wifi interference issues. No such issues with the Infant Optics. We are very pleased and we LOVE the ability to have the monitor battery operated so we can bring it downstairs or outside while he sleeps. The more expensive systems had bigger screens, but had to be plugged in which was a deciding factor FOR this one. The only thing is I wish it had is the ability to shut off the video and just use audio. We have a white noise machine in the nursery and that keeps the video and audio on constantly at night which even at the lowest "brightness" setting is still bright at night. So the VOX setting doesn't work for us because of the noise machine.  Overall, we love it and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: hulu1019
Reviews.Content: I bought this to watch my mischievous 22 month old during 'quiet' time or sleep time in her crib. Boy, I only wish I had ordered it months and months ago. The picture is super clear and I was able to set up the monitor without the directions. The night vision on this monitor is spectacular and very clear and the sound is crisp. So far, I have noticed no interference as far as sound goes.Totally worth the $100. I'm due in March with another child and this monitor is set up for several more cameras that you are able to switch to. I will definitely be purchasing another camera to go with this unit for the new baby.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research into what others said, and compared price points.  I've had this now for several months, and I'm very happy with it.  The range seems good, and the picture sound quality are great.  The night vision allows us to see her move, even in complete darkness.  We've been able to go outside by the pool, or in the hot tub, and be able to see and hear her in the room.I was a bit concerned about the possible quality given the price point.  However, the quality and durability of this are just fine.  I would say, that if the handset dropped, I would be concerned about how well it might hold up.Anyhow, one of my better purchases, and certainly worth the $100!

Reviews.Title: Love it! Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Nat
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a replacement of my Summer monitor. The price was attractive and really worth it in terms of quality.1.) Range : I place a camera unit in my bedroom on the 2nd fl. The monitor could be used as far as a few hundred meters away on different floor. There is no interference.2.) Night / Day mode : good quality3.) Sound :  a little low comparing to Summer monitor but works fine.4.) Look and feel : Light weight and good looking design despite a little low on plastic quality.5.) Electricity : The adapter comes in a wide voltage range (110-230v.) so I am able to use it at my home in Thailand which uses different voltage from the US.6.) 4 Channels available : This is perfect for me because I move my baby from rooms to rooms so I can have up to 4 cameras to 1 monitor!So overall, I would recommend this product to any mums!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: jmd
Reviews.Content: You will not find a better video monitor for $100.  But being $100, it's not a 5 star product.  Take into consideration that this is the only monitor I've owned.  We've used it for 6 months now.Pros:- Price.  Seriously great price- Video.  The quality looks great.  There is definitely better quality out there but you don't need better than this.- Night vision.  I've been really impressed with how well it switches to night vision and how good it looks.- Auto sound.  This thing detects what is background noise so well.  So the general hum of the room doesn't cause the monitor to make sound.  It will hum for about 5 seconds and then silent until a noise is made.  It is so nice to not have that hum always going.- Signal lost sound.  If it loses it's signal, it's a loud beep.  This is nice because you want to be aware and wake up when it happens.  Rarely ever happened to us though.- Design - Easy and intuitive to use.  Stands up nice on a desk or clipped to your shorts.  Camera was easy to mount and position.Good enough:-Sound quality - it's got some static, but no more than I've heard from friends monitors.  And you get used to it pretty quick.  The volume levels are nice.-Camera width - You have to place the camera pretty high up the wall to get a full view of the crib.  I don't know what is normal but it seems like they could make a wider lens.  It works for us though.Cons:-Battery Life is short.  You basically have to always keep it plugged in.  I think we get maybe an hour.  This was annoying at first but we got used to it quick-Video won't turn off.  I think some models allow this but we can't turn the video off.  It would help battery life and keep our room from glowing all night.-Signal lost sometimes.  We have a big house and the signal can get lost from 2nd story corner to 1st story corner, but mostly, it's been pretty impressive distance.

Reviews.Title: The best baby product we've got!
Reviews.Author: Walt
Reviews.Content: Owned this for 3 months now and been using it nearly 24-7. This is a great monitor for the price - it's simple, easy to use and built of good quality. Some might not like the abundant plastic parts on this device, but we appreciate this for how light it is to carry around in your pocket.PROS-excellent video and audio quality. Not HD but you really don't need HD to monitor your baby.price - $100 is of great valueno interference with wifi signals around the houseexcellent rangeeasy and simple to useno setups like IP cameras that we considerednight vision sees our baby breathing at night in complete darknessCONS-lack of panning feature on the camerato view from a higher position requires a mount that is included, they should have just designed it so the camera can tilt below the horizonantenna is not retractable

Reviews.Title: Can't beat this at 100 bucks!
Reviews.Author: Ruda "Perfect parents"
Reviews.Content: Thank you infant optics!Ordered this from Amazon and received it on time with free shipping-bonus!So to summarise:-No interference with my wireless internet or other electronics like phone, printers etc-Pretty good signal-gets a bit lost if you go outside but generally I think it is to do with how close the monitor and camera are with each other-EXCELLENT price-No static since it is digital not analog-weightless to carry around-could be better plastic constructionIt doesn't have any fancy features. It's got the basics: exactly what i need - 2.4 digital connection, voice activation logic to save power, good video and audio. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Item as described. Fast shipping!
Reviews.Author: Kristina
Reviews.Content: This is a really good product. I bought it to keep an eye on my new puppy when she's in her pen at night and it works very well!

Reviews.Title: Digital monitor
Reviews.Author: Robert Crowell
Reviews.Content: We owned an older analog video monitor before this, and we are very happy with this digital upgrade. It has zero static being digital and the night vision is much better than our old monitor. This is also nearly a third the price for what we paid 4 years ago when we got our analog monitor.The video is very clear, sound is good enough, and the range is excellent. $100 sets a good price for this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture and easy to use, but initially killed my house WiFi performance.
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: Great clear picture anywhere in the house.  The VOX setting where it turns off the sound and picture after 3 minutes of quiet is unnerving at first, but seems to kick back on when it should.But I noticed my Apple TV was buffering really bad when trying to stream Netflix, and my wife's Laptop had dial-up speeds trying to pull up websites, with the monitor camera on.I have a Cisco E2500 Dual band WiFi router.  Using Speedtest.net app on my phone (and standing by the camera), I had 18mb download speeds with the camera off, and when I turned it on, it dropped to .20 to .50mb speeds.  Upload speeds were not affected and stayed around 3MB.After trying different settings on the 2.4Ghz band, I found that setting to Channel Width to 20mhz (default is auto for 20mhz or 40mhz) and setting on Channel 11 instead of Auto, did the trick to ovoid the conflicts.Channel 1,6,and 11 typically do not overlap and might work better then the others.  A 2.4GHz wireless network can have up to 3 routers working in a small area with no overlapping by using channel numbers 1, 6 and 11. If you have a lot of neighbors with WiFi (and who doesn't these days) this might help as well.EDIT:Well, the next night I still continued to have issues with WiFi in the house with the monitor on.  I was able to move my 2 iPads and Apple TV to 5Ghz N network, as the E2500 is a dual band.  However this leaves my Wife's laptop, Kids Laptop, and our iPhone's still with WiFi issues when this is on.Will see what workarounds I can find....EDIT:Well, it still creates havoc on our 2.4Ghz network when in use, but most everything we have can also run on 5Ghz so really a non-issue.

Reviews.Title: A must have for parents that plan to sleep train
Reviews.Author: Lindsey Carol "Linds"
Reviews.Content: So, I always said that I was not going to need a video monitor.  A sound monitor is perfectly fine...then came the torture but necessary sleep training in our house.  This is HUGE when it comes to piece of mind while feeling unsure about your baby crying.  There is no need for an expensive video monitor, this one works perfect.  I would suggest buying an extra cord (they are not expensive, mabye $6) because if your cord frays like ours did, you won't have to worry about what to do until you can get another one.  A great idea would be to leave a cord in your bedroom as well as another room (living room/kitchen) so you don't have to constantly plug and unplug which is what caused ours to break.There is a con to the device, it definitely interferes with our wireless internet signal.  Since I had a sound monitor to begin with, I just keep that one plugged in and will turn off the video device if I need to.  It's an easy fix so I couldn't take away a star for it.New parents...buy this!

Reviews.Title: video baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Barb
Reviews.Content: I got this for a great deal. It's nearly the price of a GOOD audio baby monitor. Any good 2.4ghz digital one costs more than $150. I've used this for 2 weeks now and have not had any problems with it. It's 2.4ghz so there's no static problems that we've had with our old video monitor. The range is OK - but you have to follow the instructions to tilt the antenna horizontally if you are using it on different floors in your house. The screen size is just ok enough to if my 2 year old son is sleeping or awake. Haven't had a chance to use the VOX feature but it looks very straight forward. Overall, Id say this is the best monitor for the price if you are running on a tight budget.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic monitor at really good price
Reviews.Author: Nelson Alexander
Reviews.Content: Live video really makes a big difference. A video monitor is really a necessity if you baby is out of your sight AT ANY TIME. This product has all I need, and has nothing extra. This is probably why it is at such a good price. There isn't a good baby monitor that is below $100.The signal is 2.4ghz and it works fine with my 2.4ghz phone and internet system. I wished it had the two way communication which some more expensive models have but if you told me to pay an extra $50 for this, I would rather not have it. The product is simple to use and won't take more than 3 minutes to set up. It comes with a stand for the camera but I didn't have to use it.The audio is very clear and does not have any static noises like some of the older summer infant models that my sister had. It will still have a highpitch feedback squeal if you put the camera and the monitor too close but you should need to do that unless you put the monitor 2 feet away from the camera. This product also has a built in battery that can last for quite a while (I've had it on 2 hours and the low batt light never came on) and the monitor shuts off by itself after a few minutes if it is dead quiet in the bedroom to save battery. This can be VOX feature can be switched off if you are running on the adapter.For the money, you can't get a better baby monitor system.

Reviews.Title: Sound cut out and barely worked
Reviews.Author: Hannah
Reviews.Content: We moved our daughter into her own room and crib and the very first night I woke up to her crying, but I couldn't hear her through the baby monitor at all. The sound worked on and off but didn't always pick up her crying. We returned ours.

Reviews.Title: Very good product.
Reviews.Author: Scorpion79
Reviews.Content: Works very well, very useful.Very good price for under a $100.Good reception distance, even in 2 story houses.Good clear picture and sound and has nigh vision.Battery is okay but need to be charged for the hand unit daily.You can have up to four different camers for one handheld unit.Has auto shutoff but is too sensitive that it is always on.Very recommended.

Reviews.Title: Good and bad
Reviews.Author: Pet Mom of 5
Reviews.Content: I don't have a big house, so I don't really need sound but wanted a video monitor for when the baby was upstairs and we are downstairs or I can see if she's really waking up or just squirming.I have no problems with the quality of the video.  I don't love the beep when it goes into sleep mode but I can deal with it.  What I DON'T like about this monitor is that I haven't gotten it to last overnight without dying!  I could leave it charging all night, but what's the point of that??  So, thank goodness my house is small so I can hear her when the monitor dies!

Reviews.Title: Best Video Monitor under $100
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: I wanted to write this review because this monitor is terrific for the price.  I struggled at first only because I did not take the LENS CAP off of the camera!!  The lens cap is small and black, you won't see it unless you look really look at it. The only reason why I found it is because I could not get the camera to work so I went to turn the camera lens in order to focus the camera and whoops..... the camera cap came off in my hand.  Talk about feeling like an idiot. There really should be something written on the end of the cap so you know that it is there.  lol  Aside from that hiccup, the setup was simple.  I live in a 1800 sq. foot house and I can go anywhere with the receiver and still see and hear the baby.  No interference or breaking up.  I have posted a picture of what I see with the handheld monitor while the camera is facing the crib at night.  The resolution is great.  You can brighten or darken the camera resolution as well as increase or decrease the volume on the handheld receiver.  I gave it four stars because the receiver does feel very cheap and I am worried that if I drop it the wrong way it will break apart. Other than that I really like this monitor.  Why spend hundreds when you can spend $99?  : )

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price
Reviews.Author: Susy
Reviews.Content: This product is great for the price it does the job and it wasnt expensive.We shopped around and this was the best selection for us.The only reason i didnt give it 5 stars is because the battery needs to be charged2-3 times through out the day, other than that its great!

Reviews.Title: Covers whole house without dropping signal
Reviews.Author: Andrerx
Reviews.Content: This is the first monitor that has reception that covers every corner of our house. It has clear picture and good audio quality in any lighting condition. Although not the best monitor out of what is out there, it surely is the best for a $100 baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: baby monitor
Reviews.Author: virjox
Reviews.Content: Owned this for a year now and everything is still working great. I thought it would not last more than 6 months... but it has proved to be very reliable and sturdy after many drops and falls!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Lizabeth
Reviews.Content: It may look cheap but so far I'm in love with it. The best part is that it will turn off the sound for the constant noise so I don't have to wonder if I hear my son over the white noise sound in his room.

Reviews.Title: Muy Bueno
Reviews.Author: Ibelly
Reviews.Content: Excelente para bebes, se ve muy bien y nitido, cubre larga distacia con buen sonido, y vino en perfecto estado

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Sammyg1
Reviews.Content: This product meets my expectations as an inexpensive video monitor. Upon receipt we discovered that the battery that came with the unit didn't work. I e-mailed the manufacturer and was pleasently surprised by how quickly they sent me a replacement battery.

Reviews.Title: No beeping problem mentioned in older reviews
Reviews.Author: Mrs Cintron
Reviews.Content: I was really worried about the beeping problem that alot of the reviews mentioned. I'm very glad the comments left below those reviews were true and the beeping problem has been resolved on newer units since then. We've owned two older generation summer infant monitors before this and they are horrible compared to this. This is a much smaller monitor and the range is much further. This unit lacks a two way talk feature which we would have loved but we were so attracted to the price we couldn't decide on a more expensive model just for this feature.

Reviews.Title: Excellent double system setup
Reviews.Author: Clinton Khan
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product at a very reasonable price! I bought two of these and I now run a two-system monitor side by side so I can see both my kids without switching back and forth from different channels. For the same money I could have got one better system with alot more features, but I rather go with this because nothing can replace two full-time video feeds for $200 with shipping.

Reviews.Title: Decent product, competitive price, and good customer service by email
Reviews.Author: K. R.
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor in August. I never turned it off and kept both units plugged in all the time.  Essentially, I was using it as a cheap security camera (CC TV).The video quality is average to slightly above average. If you want to see fine detail, this is not the product for you. However, the video quality for the price point is good value. I have not tried out the night vision yet, so I cannot comment on that. The audio quality is about the same, average to above average.There are nice auto-mute and auto-off features where if no sound or motion is detected the units go into stand-by mode. Upon detecting movement or sound, the units re-activate. I found these features very helpful for the purpose for which I use the units.The unit housings are made of light-weight plastic. Some people dislike this, however, I think it make the units easy to mount and move without the use of tools. The camera unit can be mounted using those 3M adhesive strips and the monitor unit is light enough to carry around with you. The monitoring unit also has a built in stand for hands-free convenience. This characteristic is really a matter of preference and I don't mind light-weight plastic housings.In October, the audio cut out while the video continued to function. I called the customer service line to no results. Then I emailed the company and within 48 hours, the representative emailed me back with instructions on how to ship back my defective unit. Once I provided proof of shipping, they shipped me a replacement unit (brand new, not refurbished). I am quite satisfied with the customer service I received via email.Bottom Line: Considering that it is cheaper than most audio and video monitoring systems, you get good value on your purchase price--especially if you can get it on sale. Both video and audio qualities are average or slightly above average. My experience with customer service was good via email, but poor via telephone. In the end, the company replaced the defective product and all I had to do was pay for shipping the old product back to the company. Despite the additional cost, it was still less expensive than many of its competitors. I would buy this product again and will continue to use it.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Kristina
Reviews.Content: We've only had a chance to try it out on our dog, since we are expecting in December. The audio & video is incredibly clear and precise. The night vision works really well. I'm glad we got it early & got such a good deal on it :) I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Debra Godinez
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and his wife who are expecting another baby shortly. They tried it out on my grandson as he just went from a crib to a bed, they could watch him upstairs to see what he was doing. They love it.

Reviews.Title: Good little monitor, with some caveats
Reviews.Author: Onion Mom
Reviews.Content: I purchased with monitor in March of 2012, I believe, to monitor my daughter as we anticipated the transition to a toddler bed.  I have subsequently purchased all 3 additional cameras.The good:-Crisp picture for the price-Great customer service.  Seriously great.-Works as advertisedThe bad:-Components have stopped working (cords) or broken (antenna) over 2 years of use-Limited function, like having to manually toggle between cameras-Limited battery life (which the manufacturer says that have subsequently corrected in later models)-Voice activated setting has never worked well for usIf you are pretty sure that you are only going to have one child or only one child that you wish to monitor via video, for less than 2 years, and there is a stationery angle in that child's room that would give you a good picture of what it going on, this camera is a decent purchase.  I would look elsewhere if this doesn't describe you, which kills me to say because their customer service really has been top-notch.

Reviews.Title: Why is it rated so highly?
Reviews.Author: Bhavin
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure why this monitor is rated so highly. I am assuming because it is the cheapest video monitor out there. With that being said, you get what you paid for. The battery life on the parent monitor is horrible, the picture quality is not that great and it killed our wifi! I was so frustrated on how it affected our wifi, that I dished out an additional $200 for a better quality monitor. So far this monitor is 100 x better. The picture quality is better and it doesn't seem to interfere with our wifi. It's a shame we wasted $100 on this monitor. It will now be used for traveling purposes.

Reviews.Title: Short range only
Reviews.Author: Stayce
Reviews.Content: Sound quality is okay, if switched to the continuous play mode (otherwise it cuts out and doesn't register baby). Picture is grainy but okay. The serious problem is it's short range. Don't buy this monitor if you have more than one room between baby's room and your bedroom. Monitor beeps loudly and will show an out of range error message. Also the monitor battery has a short life (again beeps loudly to alert you) causing you to need to keep it plugged at all times.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous! Best value ever!
Reviews.Author: Susie Q
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is perfect. It must be the best kept secret around, because when I see friends who have spent $250 on the Summer brand, etc. video monitors I'm amazed because this one works better than those and has the exact same features and it $150 cheaper! A lot of my friends' monitors have already messed up and we have had this for almost 2 years, since our son was born, with 0 trouble. It's colored, you can adjust brightness and volume, it has a VOX setting so if you want to it will only turn on if it detects sound (baby crying). If I had to say something negative, it would be that it's so lightweight that the charging cord sometimes weighs it down and it falls over on our nightstand unless we place it carefully. This doesn't happen often. It's super easy to set up (I did it in under 10 mins by myself) and the lens can be rotated and tilted. This is the perfect item! Don't know why anyone is still spending more money when they could get this and have the same or better quality!

Reviews.Title: Good monitor, but features are not intuitive
Reviews.Author: riamachia
Reviews.Content: Having gone through and read the instructions, I would give this 5*, but the controls are not intuitive.  I have accidentally turned features off and on in the middle of the night, and been stuck trying to figure out what was wrong.I actually thought our monitor was broken but decided to look up the problem.  I understand that fewer buttons probably help keep the cost down, but it has caused me a lot of irritation.Buy the monitor, but do yourself a favor & copy the controls (light & sound "+ & -" combinations) onto an index card to keep handy.

Reviews.Title: Such a great deal and good quality!
Reviews.Author: Meaghin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product to monitor my 18 month old and 5 week old son after seeing all of the good reviews on amazon. Boy oh boy am I glad that I did! The handheld controller is so lightweight and easy to carry. With bulkier models I am always paranoid that I'll drop it and break the electronics inside. The picture quality is very good - especially the night vision. It is very mobile in that once you place it on a surface it can extend from laying flat to all the way leaned forward. The camera also has some mobility to move side to side. The battery life is great but doesn't last all night unless you use one of the automuting features. We just plug ours in at night.This product gave us peace of mind and at a fraction of the cost of other video monitors on the market! I'd recommend this product to anyone :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent baby cam
Reviews.Author: P. Kang
Reviews.Content: Before I got this, I had a Foscam setup in my house.  I thought that being able to view the monitor when I'm away from home and being able to use on my smartphone were the deciding factor, however, it wasn't consistent enough.  There were delay even when I was on the home wifi.  Too much depended on the strength of my network setup.Decided I needed something that was quick and easy but also reliable.  After several months of use I'm glad I got this.  It works perfectly always and the extra features of VOX activation make it a winner.  I learned from my Foscam that having the tilt/pan/zoom, while nice to have, it isn't necessary at all as a dedicated baby cam.  As long as the view contains the crib length, that is more than sufficient to what this product's purpose is.Would recommend to my family, friends and fellow Amazon users.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service is the best.
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I had this product for almost a year and it worked great and the price was the lowest of any of the video monitors I saw on the market. I accidently knocked the monitor on the floor and the plastic antenna cover broke off. Before I could superglue it back on my son pulled the antenna wire out and the monitor no longer worked further than 5 feet from the camera unit. My sister has the same unit and she said the same thing happened to her and she "just sent it back and got a new one." I figured I would give the one year limited warranty phone number a shot and they had me send my camera and monitor in, and with proof of shipping they sent another unit out to me within 4 days. That's customer service! You can't find many companies that will go above and beyond anymore, especially when it was the customers fault that it broke in the first place! Needless to say I am very impressed with this company.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 2nd son. It doesn't have the features like my other camera but I love it! The picture is more clear than my $200 camera.

Reviews.Title: Monitor
Reviews.Author: Jenna
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my second child. I didn't want to spend much and this was pretty affordable.I cancels out white noise. The volume and being able to hear her at night is good. The screen display it pretty clear. You can attach it to the wall but I never have, it sits on her dresser. The only thing that isn't all that great is the signal strength. We live in a ranch style home with her room being at one end. If I am out in the attached garage the signal goes out. The battery life is pretty good and I think it's great that you can buy extra cameras. At the touch of a button I can switch over to my child that's in the basement play room, hit the button again and i'm back to the other child.I'd recommend this monitor if you are just looking for something moderate. I've never used a very expensive monitor so I can't compare. I am happy with the price I paid and the product I use everyday. It is not a year old and I have not had a problem with it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect video Monitor - everyone should buy
Reviews.Author: Eli
Reviews.Content: Love this product!! I have had it for 2 years and I use with 2 cameras.  I needed to buy a new set since the video monitor dropped 1 too many times on the floor and the volume button stopped working, but that is my fault for dropping it too many times.Easily switches between cameras if you are using multiple.Only feature I wished it had would be when on the setting where the monitor goes to sleep after 3 minutes of no noise in the room and then turns back on where there is a noise, it would be great if the monitor would automatically turn on to the room where the noise came from.But other than that perfect!

Reviews.Title: Good Product ~ Great Value ~ Wonderful Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Theresa M Giarratano
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a wonderful product at a great value.  I did some research before buying, and have been using this monitor for the past 20 months.  Though I did have a couple of small issues, they were both resolved easily by Infant Optics which is why it received a 5 star rating.  To me the monitor itself is probably a 4.5 star, but the exceptional customer service easily earned a 5 star. Recently, the power cord to the monitor unit was not working, and Mae in customer service was a pleasure to work with in resolving the problem. She took time to trouble-shoot the issue, quickly replaced the cord, and even followed up multiple times throughout the process. It is clear that customer satisfaction and product quality are a priority to Infant Optics. My only regret is that I did not purchase the extra camera unit to be used in my older son's room, too.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Savaikis
Reviews.Content: A very nice compact nighttime vision baby monitor, that is not too expensive and bought this instead of a night vision video cam.I am using it to monitor what my female African pygmy hedgehog does at night, as they are nocturnal and I can see in a darkened room fairly well.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: So I have never owned a video monitor.  Major upgrade from just a speaker.  The night vision really works.  Absolutely no light in the room and you can see very clearly.  I tested it out on our 4 year old son and it was great.  Haven't got to use it yet with the baby in the crib because she has yet to arrive.  But I see no reason it shouldn't be an awesome picture and do exactly what I intended it to do.  Great price for the quality.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: Our 2nd monitor. Really liked this product: decent picture size & quality for a great price. Picture & sound turns off when no activity is detected so the battery lasts nor does the monitor light up the bedroom at night. Another plus: Monitor turns on silently (without loud beeps). Great range, even outside the house. Only downfall: camera doesn't have great swivel range.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: G. Hoffman
Reviews.Content: I received this monitor as a gift from my baby registry on Amazon. After opening it and setting it up, I noticed a black line running vertically in the center of the monitor. Puzzled by this, I contacted infant optics through their e-mail and asked a few questions. I immediately received a response from Mae (the customer service manager) who guided me into receiving a replacement monitor without any hassle. The service I received was wonderful and prompt as well! I am extremely happy with the company and the baby monitor is amazing quality especially for the price! I highly recommend this product to all the new moms out there. I would definitely buy from infant optics again in the future! Maybe we will upgrade to the DXR-8 in a few years for baby #2!!

Reviews.Title: Buy a different monitor
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: After reading so many good reviews, we chose this monitor and it has been an utter disappointment.-The quality of construction is very poor. It feels very brittle and I am worried that dropping the monitor or camera will shatter it.-It is unreliable: I hear my child cry through the wall well before the monitor alerts me.-The infrared lights wake my child up when I try to check on them through the monitor.Overall, I wish I had done more research and chosen a higher quality monitor.

Reviews.Title: very good video camera
Reviews.Author: Thu Ta
Reviews.Content: this video camera is awesome  , I have to used it everyday to watch my baby for sleeping in bedroom

Reviews.Title: I LIKE THIS MONITOR! GREAT FOR THE PRICE!
Reviews.Author: Grandma
Reviews.Content: I like this monitor. It has a YEAR warrenty with it also (Sign up online). Have had for several months now and works perfectly. I have had no interference with my WIFI always fast always on and never slow no matter how close my device is with wifi on. I can always get a good angle of the room or crib. Love the "night vision". Sure the picture is not the BEST but for $100 you can't beat that! I know all about this monitor. I like to use it also as a play monitor when child is in room playing and need to do something in a different room. The sound works perfectly on mine and I have NEVER had any problem with video cutting out. My VOX and AUTO-MUTE works perfect it catches AND responds the smallest sounds. ******Have ANY questions? I will surely answer them honestly.******

Reviews.Title: Love this product
Reviews.Author: Maria s
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing for the price. I researched a lot of products I am a very protective parent and need to see my baby 24/7. This puts me at ease and works great the only thing I would say is I'm wary about the noise factor for when she moves to alert me , it does when she cries but not every time when she's moves.  Also the battery life isn't that great but you have a charger you can keep plugged in if needed.  Overall for the price love it. Better than the products you would pay $300 for

Reviews.Title: The Company makes this a great buy as well as the product
Reviews.Author: beccam
Reviews.Content: I received this monitor as a shower gift and it worked ok but it didnt last long while unplugged so it was a pain then it stopped working. I called the company and spoke with Mae who was a great help she sent me a new one right away and this one works perfect no issues at all. I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price, great customer service
Reviews.Author: Mama Marie
Reviews.Content: We got this monitor around the time my daughter started sleeping in her own room and it has been great.  We could not afford many of the other video monitors that were priced around $200.  I was surprised to find this one was so much less expensive and was nervous that we would have problems with it, thinking it would be cheaply made.  Because there were many good reviews, I decided to take a chance on it, knowing I could return if necessary.  It worked very well for us.  The only issue we had was some interference with our wireless signal while it was on.  However, we rarely had a problem if the monitor was not too close to the device we were using (usually the computer).  As long as they were a few feet away from each other, both worked fine.We had a problem a little more than a year after the purchase when the antenna broke.  We started getting a weak signal and losing the picture.  I emailed the company asking if I could purchase replacement parts to try to fix the antenna.  Instead they offered to replace the monitor free of charge.  I provided proof that I had mailed the old monitor and they sent the new one immediately.  We were only without a monitor for the 2 days it took to ship.  The customer service representative was very helpful and made sure that I not only received the new monitor, but that it was also working well.  Additionally, she offered to put me on an extended warranty program for the new monitor, meaning it will be covered for the next 2 years.Can't say enough good things -- don't pay double for another monitor when this one works great.

Reviews.Title: Right price, easy and simple to use.
Reviews.Author: KS
Reviews.Content: I actually bought this product over a year and half ago and just reviewing it now. I had looked for video monitors for awhile, but never bought one because they were all expensive. I finally decided on this model after reading numerous reviews and honestly the price was right <$100. It was easy to set up, clear picture, and seemed to have good range (I could go in the backyard or outside and it'd still work).

Reviews.Title: Simple but meets our needs!
Reviews.Author: the lee family
Reviews.Content: Our family wanted a monitor that was not complicated, simple, safe, and affordable. This monitor was recommended to us by a friend and we like it a lot! Here are some reasons why:1.) easy install/set-up2.) can monitor up to 4 different areas (comes with one camera)3.) good signal connection (for us, we've probably been at about a distance of 800 feet and seems to work fine)4.) battery life is good (depends on how long it's on/off. it has auto shut-off when it doesn't sense sound and will turn on if there is sound).5.) you can adjust brightness of screen6.) you can allow the monitor to turn on/off based on sound detected or not-detected. helps with battery life.7.) NIGHT time monitoring! you can see/monitor at night!8.) easy to use!9.) easy to mount!10.) great customer service at infant optics!

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: JoJo
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase.  The picture is very clear, the whole system is easy and simple to use and I love that the volume only turns on when baby is crying...so you don't have a white noise all the time.  And the volume feature is also great because it doesn't kick on for every little noise - like baby turning over in bed. It only kicks volume on for necessary cries etc.  Battery lasts well... we had the Lorex Live Sna before this one, which was a total waste of money, nothing but junk.  This one is a much better replacement.

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool
Reviews.Author: Jessica S
Reviews.Content: It is pretty cool to be able to watch my daughter in her room.  I bought this when we switched her to a bed and she was getting out, in order to make sure she wasn't getting into too much trouble.  My only complaint is that the battery doesn't last very long.

Reviews.Title: Best baby related purchase so far!
Reviews.Author: Sumera Firoz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product even though we lived in a small apartment at the start. It was extremely useful in helping us move our daughter into her own bedroom.Night vision is great, auto shut off and turn on when noise is made is perfect!But the best part is their customer/warranty service.My power adapter stopped working after owning this for just under a year, luckily I have 1 year warranty. They immediately responded to my email, expedited a charger to me free of charge, and even upgraded me to an extended 1 year warranty.If you are thinking about getting any other camera....dont!You cannot go wrong with this product! I'm going to be purchasing even more cameras now that we have moved into a multi level home. Our daughter is now 1 and a half and I see myself using this product for years to come.

Reviews.Title: cheap cheap cheap
Reviews.Author: BostonWillM
Reviews.Content: Bought early in preparation for a new baby.  Didn't set up until she moved to her room, around 3 months old.  Lasted 2 days before the camera unit refused to turn on.  Now that the 3-month window is up we can't even return it.  $110 wasted.  AVOID.

Reviews.Title: Super monitor!
Reviews.Author: Aeshaunua
Reviews.Content: Love this video monitor! It's easy to setup, display is large enough to see my baby at a glance and the signal range is good enough I can go anywhere in my three story home without losing signal. I love the night vision feature and can see the baby clearly even in complete darkness! Perfect when you have a fussy newborn and don't want to turn on the lights to see. Also the price of this video monitor is lower then a lot of others without losing features.

Reviews.Title: Love this monitor!
Reviews.Author: Erika Fradella "lucy lover"
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical at first that this monitor would live up to its reviews, especially since it's over the half the price of most of the other video monitors. However, it has far exceeded my expectations and I am incredibly happy with this monitor. The picture quality is great, the screen is a good size and the sound quality is pretty decent too. I really like that it has the ability to add on more cameras if we have more children. The only thing I wish it had is a talk-back feature so I could talk to my child over the monitor. Other than that, I highly recommend this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: BetAsh Lagunas
Reviews.Content: I've been putting off this review for a year now but it's time now. We hardly got our usage from this device. We probably used this unit 4 months altogether. For the first three months it worked but didn't use it as much since our baby wasn't sleeping in her room. After that we were overseas and when I tried using it again (about 8 months later) the camera would turn off on its own sometimes. Now it looses signal unless it's within 8 ft distance. Its basically useless since we can't take it even to the living room or our room. The unit is in perfect condition. It has never been dropped or used with negligence.The problem is that by the time we were able to use it again and the problem began to happen we were out of the warranty period. O well.

Reviews.Title: After only 1 year it no longer can get a signal!
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: We purchased this monitor when we had our son last year.  It had some great reviews but they must've been short term use type.  The monitor worked "okay" for most of the year but starting about a month ago it stopped being able to acquire a signal.  We really are so disappointed with this monitor.  I can literally put it 2 feet from the camera and it still doesn't find a signal.  I think it's time for us to give up on this and purchase another type of monitor from a different manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Fits the bill for our needs
Reviews.Author: Laurie S
Reviews.Content: As first time parents, we researched what felt like everything. At the store, another brand was recommended to us and when we did not get that as a gift, we opted to look for alternate options (as the other monitor was expensive). My husband opted to purchase the DXR-5 based on the cost, but mainly the reviews. And we've enjoyed having it ever since.Quite possibly the easiest thing to set up: plug in and go.We only use it at night, so the first time utilizing this during the day, I couldn't get over how clear and colorful the picture was!We like that the monitor only sounds when the baby makes noise, not any other outside noises, which is great because we live near a highway and who wants to hear construction and cars all night long.Customer service has been outstanding when I needed it, responding to an email within a few hours, on a weekend, during non-business hours! And following up to make sure my questions were resolved.The only cons I'd say are that there is no way to turn off the screen and no automatic pivoting of the camera. While the screen can darken, there'll always be a light that shines in a dark room. We solved this glowing light issue by hanging the monitor on our drawer nightstand knob which is below the height of our bed, so you don't see it. And now that our baby is rolling, we tend to just depend on the sound since you have to manually adjust the angle of the camera. Not the end of the world by any means though.Overall, good value for the cost and has some bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the money
Reviews.Author: Sean Sasser
Reviews.Content: The picture is much clearer than a previous monitor we had (first years). It's a great monitor for the price!

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: Brenda Luster
Reviews.Content: The range is terrible. Won't reach to bottom of steps from the top of steps. Not happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: BEST
Reviews.Author: alka
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly fine for our 2 storied home.Initially i was doubtful on its performance looking at the prices of the other video monitors...Now, I dono y to invest so much in the expensive ones..This is doing a great job for less that $100.Tips:-(If you dont want it to goto sleep mode, keep it connected to power...if you are watching TV in loud volume, its a good idea to use an audio monitor also.. the sound in this is not too high...)

Reviews.Title: Hope you don't need customer "service"
Reviews.Author: Barry Anderson
Reviews.Content: The product worked great the first time we used it but the next time our kids brought our granddaughter up for a weekend, (about 1 month later), it wouldn't pair.  The camera wouldn't turn off, either so I called the customer service number.  They were absolutely un-willing to offer any sort of help unless I could send them a copy of the purchase receipt.  Most of these are given, (as in this case), as a baby shower gift and even if I bought it, I wouldn't have kept a receipt for it.  I can understand a manufacturer not wanting to warrant a product for an indefinite period of time but they wouldn't even look up a serial number to cross it with a manufacturing date and with the description of my problem, it's pretty evident that it's a small component problem and should be a no-brainer for a warranty repair/replacement.  I need to find another monitor setup to replace this one but it will not be the same manufacturer.  Anyone need a couple of power supplies and the monitor piece.....?

Reviews.Title: Great monitor with one caveat
Reviews.Author: Vegan Billy
Reviews.Content: This is a great baby monitor at an unbeatable price.  However, there's one caveat you should be aware of: this baby monitor, like most others, operates on the 2.4 GHz wireless band.  Your router most likely operates on the same band (unless you've upgraded to a dual band model).  This baby monitor WILL interfere with your wireless internet.  It repeatedly jumps channels in order to find the best channel and hold great video.  Therefore, there's no way to set your router to a certain channel and avoid the interference.  However, you can minimize the interference by 1) selecting a channel on either extreme of the band (channel 1 or 11) and 2) keeping your wireless device as far away from the monitor as possible.  Nevertheless, you will encounter interference.We got this monitor from our baby's godfather as a present off our registry.  I almost returned it.  I couldn't stand the interference.  However, this is the best baby monitor I've used.  I tried a WiFi camera (Dropcam) but discovered it's just not reliable/safe to use as a baby monitor.  The sound sporadically came through, which meant that I missed my little girl screaming until I heard her on my own through the bedroom door.  I promptly returned it.For $99 you can't beat this monitor!  The video quality is great (including night mode) and audio is too.  I feel very comfortable using it as a baby monitor for my beautiful little girl.  Tip: Hit the brightness down & volume up buttons at the same time to turn auto-mute on/off.  I love this option!Here's what I've done to deal with the interference: 1) wired as many devices as possible (my computers and Roku), 2) changed the router's operating channel to 11, and 3) tried to use my iPhone as far away as possible from the monitor (while still being able to keep an eye on my daughter).  When interference is particularly bad I just turn off WiFi and use data for a few minutes, or hop on my wired computer.Even with the WiFi interference I highly recommend this baby monitor.  I'm giving it 5 stars because ALL baby monitors that operate on the 2.4 GHz band will have this problem.  Don't believe anything you read about a 2.4 GHz baby monitor being "interference-free" - says this IT guy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Infant/baby Monitor A++
Reviews.Author: zeina
Reviews.Content: We highly recommend this product to all new parents. Portable Digital screen and the most thing that we like about is that it has motion sensor which enable you to sleep without hearing the white noise back ground. We had a small problem with the antenna and still within year period warranty. so I phoned customer service, very professional respond promptly. They shipped us a new unit before sending the old unit back. Don't hesitate buy this monitor and I promise that you will not regret."  Excellent customer service"

Reviews.Title: Great Simple Monitor
Reviews.Author: neilmv
Reviews.Content: Great monitor for the price. Features are limited but it's really everything you need. The infrared works quite well. Also, their customer service and warranty are awesome! We dropped our monitor and half the screen stopped working but they replaced it with no hassle.

Reviews.Title: I don't recommend
Reviews.Author: Jengajoh "Jen"
Reviews.Content: We have been using this monitor now for 6 months and I need to buy a new one. I don't like it because :1. You can't turn the screen off and even at the dimmest its like a flashlight and lights up our whole bedroom. I taped some paper to the screen to make it dimmer and it's still bright.2. If you turn the monitor on before you turn on the camera it beeps really loudly thus risking waking up baby.3. Some times it beeps for no reason, really loudly. In the middle of the night. Almost causing a heart attack.4. I can't mount the base/ camera to anything so it sits on a stool next to the crib because if its any farther away I can't hear the baby.5. I have to keep the volume at its highest, and thats not even loud enough in the middle of the night, sometimes I don't hear the baby when the thing is right next to me.6. Sometimes it doesn't pick up sound right away until baby is already screaming.I recommend spending a bit more money and getting a better one.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good overall, but there are some flaws
Reviews.Author: Michael K. Moore
Reviews.Content: All in all, I like this baby monitor. I will list some pros and cons below:Pros:1) Picture is pretty clear. We have no real issues in day or night conditions and can make out good detail.2) Sound is clear. Easily able to hear noises on these, but no background noise really comes through.3) Good range. We have a 2 story home and have yet to find anywhere in the home the monitor cannot communicate with the camerasCons:1) Antenna is poorly placed. This fell off our bed onto carpet the second night and broke. I have glued it back on but it seems that whenever this thing falls, it falls right on the antenna, re-breaking it. Might want to consider an internal antenna.2) Power button is extremely annoying. I have turned these cameras off at least 100 times by accident simply by grasping the camera. The power button is right on the side where you place your thumb or fingers.3) Tends to hold onto ghost images and sounds. I can be flipping through the cameras and it will show something that isnt there or actually play a sound that is not there. It will refresh within a second, but can be alarming at times.4) Battery could last a while longer. Cannot make it through an 8 hour night unplugged.All in all, we like these units and would recommend them. The negatives are annoying but nothing that is a deal breaker for us. Some simple improvements in design would make these 5 star all the way.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality, In Expensive
Reviews.Author: M. Peters
Reviews.Content: I'm a first time father living in Germany with a New Born that is attempting to take over my House Hold.- The cost makes it well worth the price,- I can walk across the street and still monitor my kid,- Its durable, I dropped it twice and it still works with no cracked screen- it works on 110V and 220v which is important to me due to my location- you can add an extra camera to it if you wantThis is a pretty good product helps my wife's peace of mind which in turn helps to preserve my sanity

Reviews.Title: Must have for any new parent!
Reviews.Author: Robert Paul Damron
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor two years ago as first time parents and it is still one of the best items we own and we use it on a daily basis. The image quality is outstanding in any light setting and the range is as advertised. We just bought another camera unit for our second child. The customer service for this company is outstanding. We recently had a small glitch with the charging cord for the monitor and the customer service was not only prompt in answering our emails, they had a new charger delivered within a few days even though we were just past the one year warranty period. Could not be happier with the product or the customer service! Would definitely recommend this monitor!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This monitor is an excellent value.  I've been using it for several months and couldn't be happier.  We live in a two story home with a basement.  The monitor works well anywhere in the house, including the basement (with the baby's room on the second floor).  The set up is super easy, which makes it nice when traveling.

Reviews.Title: Very Good product!
Reviews.Author: Antoinette Johnston
Reviews.Content: Got this for my Son and Wife they love it!  It travels well too, so to take it along on a trip where baby can be napping is a bonus!  Loved the price!  Would recommend this to anyone who needs a monitor!

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: muncie
Reviews.Content: I choose this monitor because of the price. I like that it's simple and it does the job of video and audio monitoring at half the price of other models. I don't really need to know the temperature of my child's room or play music for them while they're sleeping so I liked this basic model and it's high reviews. We had an issue with one of the chargers 6 months after purchasing it and the Customer Service rep was super nice, very quick to answer my email and took prompt action to correct it by mailing a new charger. This is a no hassle purchase and I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A decent monitor for one child, but not very good when you start to add multiple cameras.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Franklin
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this monitor after having our second child.  Our older son is not quite ready to be in his room at night without a monitor and our younger son is already sleeping in his own room.What I like:- No frills such as playing music or being able to talk through the monitor.  We've had too many grandparents and babysitters press music and talkback buttons on our older monitor (and wake up a sleeping baby) to want to have to deal with that.- Pairing a second camera was pretty easy.What I don't like:- When using two or more cameras, the audio alert and VOX features only work on the active camera.  So, if you have two children to monitor you would need to manually switch between cameras to see what's going on.- The VOX feature is off by default and, more importantly, there doesn't seem to be a pattern to making it stay on.  Sometimes you can turn the monitor on and it's in VOX mode and sometimes it's not.  There's no way to force it to stay on.  The instructions and Infant Optics customer service give you steps to turn it on, but it doesn't seem to stay on.- The VOX mode lasts for three minutes and the audio alert is 10 seconds.  I'd prefer to see the VOX turn off after a shorter time.I had a nice email conversation with Mae at Infant Optics.  She answered all of my questions and confirmed the information above.  It's hard to beat the price on this one, but it just doesn't function as a monitor for multiple children.The result for me is to return it and keep looking.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Katherine Hanley
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor because it received such excellent reviews. I was very disappointed when the monitor I received did not work. I spent several days troubleshooting in an attempt to get the monitor working. I wish that I had contacted the customer service department immediately instead of messing with the monitor on my own! I received instant feedback with suggestions for getting the monitor to work. When that still did not solve the problem, the people at Genexus LLC accepted my defective unit (without the packaging or a receipt) and shipped a new unit to me overnight! The new unit worked perfectly and the customer service representative followed up a few days later just to make sure that I was happy with the new unit. I have never had such a positive experience with customer service!The monitor itself is great! The picture is crystal clear and the sound is great. It is very easy to set up and easy to use. I would not hesitate to recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: All the bells and whistles, great customer service
Reviews.Author: MICHELLE L WHITE
Reviews.Content: Received this item as a shower gift and it was easy to set up and use.  Liked the color monitor (daytime) infrared (nighttime) and fact that you can add cameras if necessary.  Worked well for us for a year but then the charger malfunctioned.  Notified customer service and they sent replacement immediately.  Liked that they stand by their product, would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Love this monitor
Reviews.Author: Dart "Concerned Mom"
Reviews.Content: This is a great baby monitor. The picture is clear and the range is great. We can be in the basement and still monitor our baby on the third floor. I love the feature that allows the unit to activate with sound and/or movement. That way we don't have to have it light up our whole room all night and listen to the white noise.One issue with the monitor is that the antennae broke with one drop. That is an Unfixable problem. But, one call to Custer service and I had a replacement monitor within days. I was 11 1/2 months into a 1 year warranty!Overall, great product with excellent, fast and friendly customer service.

Reviews.Title: Flaky video monitor
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: Overall, we have been pretty disappointed in this baby video monitor.  After reading all the reviews, we were sure this was going to be a great buy, but overall, we have not been happy with this since day 1.  It says the range is 800 ft.  This was good news to us, as our house is pretty wide and our baby's room is clear on the other side of the house from our bedroom so we need something that has long range.  The range is flaky with anything passed the living room (I have to hook it to my lamp shade to have ANY range in our bedroom).  It has woken us up on MULTIPLE occasions with the out of range beep noise in the middle of the night, and will shut itsself off and keeps making the beeping noise over and over again.  Last night, it just shut itsself off for no reason, plugged in (not because of range), and had to keep waking up to turn it back on.  Needless to say, we are looking for other video monitors today.  I recommend anyone that has a larger house, to NOT buy this video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Really not a quality product
Reviews.Author: Robert Scherzer
Reviews.Content: Our previous baby monitor dropped and broke its powers supply - so we ordered this as a replacement  - this is the newer model.It is AWFUL.Problems I have with it:1) the audio cuts in and out... awful2) When the audio DOES work, it's VERY quiet, even on th ehighest setting.3) The video sometimes doesn't connect - "Signal out of range..." when I'm 10 feet away4) the pairing buttons are HUGE - so it's hard not to accidentally hit them.5) the power cord is about 1/4 the length of the previous ones... come on.

Reviews.Title: great customer service!
Reviews.Author: carli sacks
Reviews.Content: I have had the monitor for over a year and at one point the cord was not charging it.... I emailed the customer service and they were so EXCELLENT in helping me and eventually sending me a new cord... The monitor works really well and it is very reasonably priced!

Reviews.Title: poor battery life!
Reviews.Author: Julie M. Sargent
Reviews.Content: I received this monitor for my baby shower and was quite excited to receive a video monitor. I recently began to use the monitor, and I noticed the battery would lose its charge after only 5 hours of use even though the audio and video were set to go to sleep after short period of time. I was very surprised by this, as I had not read anywhere about poor battery life. Due to my surprise I decided to call the company, and they told me the product was not designed to run wirelessly. It was designed to be plugged in on a regular basis and they recommended I should plug the monitor in overnight and any other time I decide to use it. Knowing this now, I would not consider buying this monitor, and opt for something a little more portable.

Reviews.Title: Good buy!
Reviews.Author: Joye Iles
Reviews.Content: My sister and I bought this for our aged mom.  We want to know when she tries to get up out of bed, so we can go in and help her.  I think this is going to work out perfectly for our purposes.

Reviews.Title: Losses charge too quickly
Reviews.Author: blablabla
Reviews.Content: This monitor works well if it wouldn't lose its charge so quickly.  it seems to only last 20-30 minutes before it needs to be plugged in.  The VOX option helps save energy and therefore prolong the life of the charge, but that is limiting because you can't see or hear anything if the child is not moving or making sounds.

Reviews.Title: I always go for reviews and choose this one based on all the great reviews. I was not impressed at all
Reviews.Author: kmengis
Reviews.Content: Well, I always go for reviews and choose this one based on all the  great reviews.  I was not impressed at all, so I returned it.  What didn't I like about it?  Well I think the picutre is not that great, nightvision is ok as long as the camera is right over your baby's crib, any further and you get a bunch of shadows/interference in the pictures.  So if  you plan on using night vision, plan on installing it right over the crib or very close.  The color video always flickered, like getting brighter then darker and vice versa.  I know what to expect of baby monitors, I had a baby monitor a couple of years ago, and I wish I remembered the brand, because that one had really good picture quality, it was excellent both day and night, had a temperature reading and the unit itself felt sturdier.  The unit feels very cheap, the pseudo stand/clip is flimsy.  The only reason I gave it 2 stars because it's cheap and if you really don't want to spend over $100 then it does the job, poorly, but it does it. I can't believe it has that many 5 star reviews!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: R
Reviews.Content: This monitor is very good but not for a large home or for use while outside in the garden.. I have no have problems with Infant Optics as a brand, but it's important for buyers to be aware that the wireless transmission only  cover distances of up to 800 feet in open areas, way less in enclosed areas

Reviews.Title: Low Cost, Okay Quality - Good Overall Value
Reviews.Author: D. Salotti "DS"
Reviews.Content: On our 2nd baby, we wanted to upgrade from audio to a video monitor, but we didn't want to go overboard on spending.This unit was priced very conservatively, so we gave it a try.  Here is the positives and negatives:Pro's1.  Lower price - its priced really low for a video monitor2.  SMART Packaging - probably both the easiest and most efficient packaging design I've seen.  It was on par with an iPhone box.3.  Good Range - we've used it from opposite side of our ranch-style house.  Appears to have a pretty good range.4. Battery life is pretty good on the monitor; over time we will have to see how many charge cycles it can endure.5.  Image is crisp -- looks a little like Paranormal Activity, but the night vision gives you a good look at your little one.Con's1.  Plastic used to build isn't great - a bit thin and brittle - but for the price I wouldn't expect much, so its a mild Con.2.  The camera has limited vertical range (good horizontal), so it makes it difficult when positioning on a shelf above the height of the crib.  I ended up rigging a weird balanced tilt that gave the right view of most of the crib.3.  It picks up very slight audio and this gets echo'd back into the unit and I find it disturbing at night4.  It doesn't have a dimmer!  Very bright display lights up the room . . . takes a week or two to get used to.Overall, I think its a great product for those looking for a little more than audio.  Unless you're a technophile, I see this as a great value video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Awesome monitor
Reviews.Author: JRogo
Reviews.Content: Great monitor, great quality. I saw the video posted by another purchaser and it was spot on. All the other monitors are overpriced and this one is a steal at about $100.

Reviews.Title: dissappointing
Reviews.Author: Pam McCormick
Reviews.Content: Thought this would have better graphics and the sound it makes drives me crazy it is better than nothing at all but truly difficult to see clearly on the screen and the noise factor ruins it

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: S. Maddox
Reviews.Content: The price is definitely affordable for a video monitor at this quality. The video and sound are both very clear. The range is good on between thick walls and between floors. It's a rather basic monitor but it fits our bill perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Good product overall
Reviews.Author: Brianna
Reviews.Content: We've had this monitor for 2 months now. It works well with both daytime and night time use. VOX mode is useful, have to make sure it's set/ re-set sometimes. It sometimes picks up little noises, but we turn the volume down when that is an issue.Good: Reasonably priced, good picture and volume, easy to set up, has a nice troubleshooting guide.Bad: Range is limited in our house (steel siding), but it does tell you when you are going out of range- I can go downstairs with it, but not outside; the handheld battery has a limited life- we can't make it through a whole night without it plugged in, so we keep it attached to the wall adapter.If you're looking for a simple video monitor, this does the job fine.

Reviews.Title: Nice design, broken component, great services
Reviews.Author: Wei
Reviews.Content: I got this item from my friend as a gift. I did not try it until my baby was born. The first time I ran it for less than one hour and one of the two AC adapters was not working, it just could not charge the camera or the monitor. I contacted the CS right away and their response was prompt. Since it was still in the 1-year warranty, they replaced it with a new one and shipped to my hand only within 5 days. It is a satisfying speed, isn't it? The other components are working good so far, I will keep looking in them.The product design is nice. Easy rotated camera, user friendly monitor, multiple mode for monitoring baby movements, clear in the darkroom. They are all useful features to me.

Reviews.Title: did not work for me...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: would probably work ok in a house as is the intended use, I needed it for the barn 200' away....the screen is kinda small too.... seems a little cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to without expensive bells and whistles
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor about a month so after doing some research online. Although we have not used it much yet (as I am still pregnant), we gave it a few test tries and everything seems to be working well.PROS:-Easy assembly and set up-Large colour screen-Ease of use-Picture clarity is great-Monitor has small attachment to stand on table or convert to belt clip-one way sound is very clear-can add other cameras to make this a monitor useful for several different rooms at once-PRICE!!!Cons:-Monitor and camera shell is plastic (giving it a bit of a cheapy feel)-does not come with the extra bells and whistles other brands offer (room temperature gauge, lullabies, two-way sound)I am a no fuss type person. I like things that are easy to use and work well. I do not need flashy bells and whistles and options I'm not likely to use. For someone who's looking for something simple that works and is cost effective, I would definitely recommend this product. For those of you who want the extra bells and whistles, this doesn't have it. The only reason I gave it four stars and not five is because of the cheaper feel of the product... It is a great buy for someone looking for a good clear monitor without spending two hundred dollars.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Customer Service
Reviews.Author: qmamarama
Reviews.Content: We purchased this monitor about a year ago after running into issues with a Levana monitor for which we received ZERO customer service after numerous requests and despite the fact that the unit was still under warranty. We couldn't be more pleased with our decision to buy Infant Optics. Not only does the monitor work great (it pretty much is what it claims, no fancy bells and whistles but a monitor that works and enables you to keep an eye on your baby at night), we had a short in the power cord at one point and actually had an enjoyable experience with their customer service rep, Mae. She was incredible, personable, AND she followed up about a month after we received the replacement part to make sure it was working properly. We were blown away.We have another baby joining our family shortly, so I was just logging on to purchase another monitor and wanted to share our experience! Best of luck to all the new parents out there laboring over the camera selections. This unit is a solid choice for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor!
Reviews.Author: KA
Reviews.Content: I've used the monitor for 10 months now. It works great, I can see my daughter clearly even at night, keeps a decent charge, and good signal reach. I've been very pleased with my purchase! If you want a video monitor, don't hesitate to buy this because of price. Even though its less expensive than others, it works great!!

Reviews.Title: Great video monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: D Mint
Reviews.Content: We recently moved our 2 year old into a big bed. I wanted a video monitor so I could check on him and make sure he wasn't out of bed, or make sure he wasn't about to roll out of bed in his sleep. This monitor gives a clear image within about 8 feet. Since I want to see the entire full size bed, I mounted the camera on the opposite wall, about 16' from his headboard. It's not very clear but I can see him well enough to make sure he's in bed, but I can't tell if his eyes are open or anything. The sound quality isn't as great as other monitors I'm used to. Even if the speaker is right beside him, you can't hear breathing or quiet whispering. I couldn't hear his noise machine at all. I can definitely hear him talk or cry, though, even with the monitor all the way across the room. If he was an infant that would bother me more, but for our needs this is great. I didn't want to buy an expensive monitor for a toddler, so this was the perfect choice.

Reviews.Title: Best customer service
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: Amazing customer service - replaced bad batteries and replaced entire item when cord snapped. Granted the batteries should not have been bad and the cord should not have snapped, but customer service was immediately responsive and completely fixed the problem, sending a replacement before they had even received the faulty item. No monitor is going to be perfect, things will go wrong with all of them probably, so it is critical to have good customer service.

Reviews.Title: Should have got this earlier
Reviews.Author: D. Disselkoen
Reviews.Content: We have a 2000' appartment with thick walls and this monitor has no problem staying connected every corner here. Our master bedroom is 2 rooms away from our son's room and we had connection problems with our older summer infant monitor so we had to keep our doors open at night. Now this monitor does the job and has no effect on the video frame rate speed or quality even with doors closed. The sound is a little soft, but still very clear. The night vision is way better than our old monitor and it can pick up objects further away. This is a great monitor at a bargain.

Reviews.Title: Great all together
Reviews.Author: TTeresa
Reviews.Content: This video monitor is great and gives us what we need. Clear video and sound under low and bright light conditions. It has an automuting system and it's really nice to have it on when you sleep, versus our old monitor that always gave out a crackling noise and that was really annoying!

Reviews.Title: The Best!
Reviews.Author: S. Magnuson "yep"
Reviews.Content: Not only is the product great, but the customer service is unbelievable.If you have an issue with the unit during the warranty period, they'll even ship out the replacement unit based on the proof of shipping receipt.  They get that you can't wait the usual 4 weeks to replace a baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: peque
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing product. It is very complete and great value for the price. No unnecessary features that you will never use. Just the important ones. Their customer service is awesome.I can't recommend this enough. I bought is for my sister as well and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Video Monitor but Gets the Job Done
Reviews.Author: Sleep Doctor
Reviews.Content: This is as basic of a video monitor as you can get. I've had it for 10 months and it has somehow managed to survive multiple falls...and still work.The range has withered away but the picture is still decent and the audio works flawlessly.I have friends with the Motorola , Samsung, and Summer Infant video monitors.  All have more features and better, crisper images.  With that being said, they all paid more for theirs...and at the end of the day, mine still gets the job done.Pros:The PriceHas survived multiple fallsLightweightEasy to set-upCan have up to 4 other videos linked to same portable monitorCons:Cannot move the monitor to focus on the child or to fix it if the child has scooted out of rangeCannot talk back to the monitor to soothe the baby/childNo zoomImage ok, not greatIf you don't really care about the bells and whistles and just want something to watch your baby, this is it.  If you are looking for something a little more durable and have some disposable income, I would say try something else. Costco also has a video monitor that is $100 and it may be worth a look.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: A Kalt
Reviews.Content: I reviewed this monitor alongside the Motorola MBP36 as well as the Samsung SEW-3037. I knew this monitor wouldn't be the same quality as the others, but it had gotten good reviews so I wanted to give it a try.It couldn't compare visually. The picture on this monitor was much poorer than the others. It also wasn't able to adjust, which I knew from the beginning, but wanted to see how it would work against the others. I couldn't get this monitor in the proper position without using something else to prop it, which I didn't think was safe.My conclusion...I went with the Motorola. However, if,you are looking for a video monitor, with "ok" video, for only a little bit of cash, this could be it. But remember....you get what you pay for. You will have it for a few years.

Reviews.Title: It jams our wifi
Reviews.Author: Liz and Ray
