Reviews.Content: It's a mix of good and bad. The worst of the bad is that it jams our wifi, so I wouldn't recommend it.Good picture, great battery life, night vision is excellent, great range, easy to mount and aim. But! The power light is ridiculously bright (cover with tape); the lens is crooked (aim to the left); the swivel doesn't point down to the right very far (mount somewhere else); can't turn off the screen to use it audio only at night (cover with towel); and the worst sin of all, it jams our 2.4ghz wifi which takes the phones and the wife's laptop offline.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Auser
Reviews.Content: The Monitor is just straight forward, turn on both devices and you are donePros:- The range is good- Easy to use- Auto Mute feature- Night vision- Ability to add more cameras in the futureCons:- The viewing angle of the screen is not so good so if you look at the monitor's screen from the sides, you won't be able to see much

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: StephH "Pretzy"
Reviews.Content: Both my husband and I love this monitor. We did alot of research online and offline in stores to decide which one to get. There's quite a few brands and models out there now and the price can range from $40 to $250+. We wanted to get this right the first time, as would any first-time parent would. This monitor gives us everything we need in a convenient and portable way. It lacks some cool gadgets that more expensive monitors offer but we were happy to settle with this at this price. We set the camera up on a shelf just a feet higher than the crib railing and it gives a clear picture of everything inside. Under night vision, everything shows up clearly without lighting up the room a single bit. We never had any problems with Wifi issues as we knew it was possible for some sort of interference when monitors like this one uses 2.4ghz. It's easy to set up (just plug it in) and there's no tedious setups like an IP camera. We rely in this more than we expected and I can't imagine myself living without this!

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Christine Granner
Reviews.Content: I'm glad I bought this. It wasn't too expensive and the quality is better than what it is priced at. The color on the screen is nice and the video is smooth in day and night conditions. A great baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, great price.
Reviews.Author: Erin1126
Reviews.Content: I had researched for weeks looking for a video monitor because I couldn't stand not being able to see her if I heard her stirring around.  The thought of paying upward to 300$ also made me cringe, so i read a lot of reviews and decided on this one.  It has met my expectations and has been perfect for our family.  The picture is great the sound works great.  And the signal distance is a good amount.  One of the best prices I have seen anywhere around.  The only problem is the battery life off the charger doesn't last a real long time so you have to remember to keep it plugged in.  Great buy, we're very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Well made monitor
Reviews.Author: JME Jaime
Reviews.Content: We constantly move the monitor around our bedroom, kitchen and living while leaving the camera on the upper floor. We've never had any reception issues using this system in our 3 level house. The video quality is excellent for the money. It's easy to use and just works as we expected from an amazon top seller.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price!
Reviews.Author: cocobravo
Reviews.Content: We have had zero issues with this camera and monitor. It doesn't pan but I wasn't willing to pay an additional $100+ for that feature.We have it mounted to the wall and the night vision and sound are both great. It's hilarious to be a fly on the wall...especially at such a great price! Definitely worth the money in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: LOVED this monitor
Reviews.Author: N. Olek "Nicolek"
Reviews.Content: We got this after putting up with an obnoxious audio monitor for a year. I finally had enough of the static and buzzing, so we got this. It's perfect for use with one camera. The video and sound quality are comparable to much more expensive models, but the price is just right. Unfortunately when we had our second we found that while you can ADD more cameras to the parent unit, there's no way to scan between the cameras. It only monitors the camera you're set to. We ended up buying the Motorola mpb36 with two cameras because it can scan back and forth all night, but it doesn't have VOX or the battery life that this unit had. I wish this one would scan between the cameras, and if they were to make an upgraded version it would be nice to pan/zoom, and have a temp readout. The VOX on this is perfect, it would light up whenever my daughter cried but never picked up the music or white noise in her room. I liked that it clicked a little when it lit up, that woke me up but wasn't annoying. The parent unit is a little flimsy feeling but it worked just fine.Overall, if you only need it for one room, this is a wonderful video monitor at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Caroline
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this for our baby and absolutely love the ease of this product.  I have never written a comment/review for anything, good or bad, but for the price, this is an outstanding item.  I had an issue with the battery not charging (my fault) and customer service helped me figure it out and then followed up a couple of weeks afterward to make sure that the battery was still working!  Customer Service means a lot to me and I really appreciated the follow up.

Reviews.Title: Core functions
Reviews.Author: JamesT
Reviews.Content: This is a lower-end model for those parents who are not looking for an expensive baby monitor. This monitor has the core features: good video & audio, good range, no wifi interference and easy to use functionality.... but it lacks remote pan and tilt, two way talk, temperature indications, and a few more high end monitors has to offer.If you are looking for a topend monitor, this isn't going to meet your needs. If you want something that works and gives you a good representation what you baby is doing at a cheap price this is worth a shot.

Reviews.Title: Good value, but has flaws
Reviews.Author: Moxie "Moxie"
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a pretty decent unit.  It mostly gets the job done with a few caveats:- Some folks may have difficulty discerning the image in "night vision" mode.  I can't tell my baby's butt from his face in that mode, but my wife can.- Battery life on the monitor isn't great.  We keep ours connected all the time.- With no way of mounting the camera to anything, it's easy for it to get displaced or the camera skewed.[UPDATE]- This is a 2.4GHz radio device.  If you have a Wi-Fi network, it will spew noise all over your network, reducing your wireless performance and in some cases, hindering it altogether.  This is true of almost all modern standalone monitors, not just this unit.  As a result, we've switched to an IP-based (i.e. wi-fi or wired ethernet) camera with reasonable results.  The home network now performs much better and we can use our mobile devices as monitors.

Reviews.Title: decent product.
Reviews.Author: Mark A Miles
Reviews.Content: Wish I could turn off the monitor and just have sound.  Overall nice for the price but monitor is bright at night

Reviews.Title: Super affordable and just a really great product.
Reviews.Author: C. Yost
Reviews.Content: The infrared auto-detection works splendidly, the VOX works really well, the night vision is great, the reception is great, the product is lightweight.For the price, this thing is awesome. The camera could have some crib-mounting stuff in my opinion and the camera could have a batter, but it's no big deal. The camera probably consumes too much energy for a battery to be realistic anyway.I've been really happy with this product.The review about beeping when going into VOX mode... the beep doesn't happen for me either. It must have been an older model, or defective.

Reviews.Title: Great product with GREAT customer service
Reviews.Author: Lady T
Reviews.Content: I'll echo what others have said about this baby monitor - feels kind of cheap and lightweight, but it gets the job done. Works perfectly and I've never had a problem.Great customer service: I dropped my monitor (not the camera) and the antenna broke clean off, rendering it useless (saying "out of signal coverage") unless I was standing right directly next to the camera unit, which of course defeats the whole purpose of having a baby monitor.I emailed the company, told them what happened (and that the breaking off of the monitor was my fault), they said to send back the entire unit, and they'd send me a replacement. AND THEY DID! Quickly, too. They sent a brand new entire unit, which again, works just as well. I have recommended this to all of my friends who are new parents.

Reviews.Title: Good product with good price
Reviews.Author: Juliana Lanoutomo
Reviews.Content: This Video Baby Monitor with Night Vision is worth the price. Tried other products but we like this one better.

Reviews.Title: So far I am loving it
Reviews.Author: Sage
Reviews.Content: I got this 2 days back and I am loving it. Good night vision and also has a really good motion sensor. So, if the baby moves it immediately beeps to alert me. The voice is also pretty good and captures it really well . The picture quality is OK for me. It's not great but again I don't need best picture quality here.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Moore
Reviews.Content: This product was so beyond easy to set up! I am a single mom and hate nothing more then complicated electronics. It works just as described if not better. I would recommend this to any of my parent friends and the price is an absolute steal! If you're looking for a video monitor that is super easy to set up plus a good price THIS is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: No complaints on 2nd monitor
Reviews.Author: Darin Hagan
Reviews.Content: We just received our second monitor. We were deciding between getting the add-on camera to pair with our old unit, or get a new set. The price isn't too much of a difference and we figured that for an extra $30, we could monitor 2 cameras at the same time. The handheld unit is small so we have them placed side by side to get a view of both rooms. Amazon was quick with the shipping and I have no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: This is an overall nice video monitor that gives clear picture and sound. It comes with a power saving mode that saves battery and only reactivates the monitor when any sound is detected. We have this set up with two walls between the camera and the handset and there's no signal issues at all so far. This all came at a good price and we are happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: After 2 batteries, it still doesn't work
Reviews.Author: jma10
Reviews.Content: I bought this video monitor with an extra camera since we have twins. The monitor worked for a few months without any problems. Then it just completely stopped working. So I ordered another battery for $30 and it worked for about two weeks, then completely stopped again. I am very disappointed in this product.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Rckrd
Reviews.Content: I want to preface this review by stating that I have had this camera for one week.  And I am using it to monitor older children (2.4 and 1).  So I didn't place the camera so close to baby.  We're past SIDS risk so I don't need to use this camera to check breathing.  I want to see what my boys are up to when awake.  We have not tried to add another camera.Pros:  This unit is much more affordable than other video monitors.  It was simple to set up and operate.  The picture is pretty good even with the infrared.  I love how portable the monitor is.  We live in a tri-level home (a basement and 3 half levels split up).  The nursery is on the top level and the camera has perfect reception in the basement.Cons:  We had to get creative on placement.  We wanted the camera to watch the whole room, not just the head of a baby in a crib.  This monitor is not designed to be hung in the corner of a room.  We improvised by installing a small corner shelf and setting it up there.  And that means we had to use an extension cord coming down the wall and we can't easily turn the camera on or off.  It just stays plugged in and on all the time.  We also experienced major wifi interference, like many other reviewers.  We had to buy a new wireless router that was dual band to be able to use the iPad in our bedroom (right next to the nursery).  We still have trouble with the smart TV but that might just be the TV's problem.  Battery life on the monitor isn't that great.  And if the battery is running low, the light just blinks (no audio alarm) so if it starts blinking in the middle of the night you might wake up to the monitor having turned off sometime in the night.  I just plug it in when I go to bed and let it charge all night. Problem solved.Overall I like this camera.  It doesn't have a ton of features but gets the job done.  I didn't need anything fancy and didn't want to pay for features that I wasn't going to use.  I would recommend this system to anyone who wants just a basic video monitor.  If you want extras or fancy features, this one is NOT for you.

Reviews.Title: Our spare monitor
Reviews.Author: Todi
Reviews.Content: We decided to buy a spare monitor to run along side with our summer infant for our 1 year old. We've been very happy with this unit. We always want to be 100% safe and our old summer monitor decides to sometimes go out of range by itself. This has been good for us and now we are planning to move our summer monitor to our playroom instead. This monitor has really good video quality and does not lag like our old monitor. Great buy from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Boriana Yandell
Reviews.Content: I have used this monitor for about a month and it is working really great. Very simple to set up and use. The video is great.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good monitor for the price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this to replace a Motorola one that died on us in just over a year of use. This is a pretty decent camera without all the bells and whistles of the big brands. The picture quality is good enough, though not superb. Same with the sound (kind of tinny). But I'm not watching and movies on it, I'm just using it to keep an eye on my kids and make sure if they're crying, it's not because they're hurt. At a glance from across the room, I can tell whether my daughter is moving around, sitting up, changing positions, etc. I keep it at a low volume, and I can still hear her crying over the volume of my TV, but it's not super distracting.I like the VOX feature that turns off the screen and sound when there is no sound detected for 3 minutes. I wish this was a programmable time (like say turn off after 1 minute), and I wish it could monitor multiple channels for a multi-camera setup. You can add cameras, but it will only kick on if there is sound in the room of whichever camera you have selected at the time. I wish there was a feature where say you have it on camera 1, but the child on camera 2 cries, it would switch to that camera and kick on. This is not a feature of this camera.Otherwise, we've been very happy and would probably buy this again for under a hundred bucks.

Reviews.Title: Good reception even through thick walls
Reviews.Author: Tinch
Reviews.Content: This product has good reception within our house no matter where we take it - upstairs downstairs, corner to corner... there's a very thick wall in between of living room and our kitchen and the signal still goes through.I was initially worried that the audio wasn't loud enough but we found that we are happy with a setting just below max. volume.A good product at fair price.

Reviews.Title: Best one of out the ones we've owned the last 4 years
Reviews.Author: Andrew Chabot
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is the simple and the easiest to use out of the ones we've bought so far. It's the cheapest monitor that we've bought, but it's the best one out of them. It is the only monitor that does not interfere with our wifi. We are planning on getting another whole seperate set given that other users have done this before and they did not report any problems.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what you need
Reviews.Author: MJJM
Reviews.Content: This monitor does exactly what you need. The image is clear and was very easy to set up.  I would recommend to anyone who is looking for a simple yet effective camera monitor.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: brett cameron
Reviews.Content: Considering the price, this is a great unit. It does exactly what it needs to do. I live in a three-story house and the monitor works everywhere. Picture is clear enough to see if my DD is sleeping. VOX and audio work excellently. This gives us great piece of mind.

Reviews.Title: Used it for 2 nights and love it
Reviews.Author: MM bax
Reviews.Content: This is day #3 and we are very happy with buying this. It's not an expensive monitor and it gives us what we want. So far it does not interfere with our cordless phones and internet. Only thing we don't like is there is no way to turn the screen off and leave the audio running.

Reviews.Title: Simple and reliable for good value
Reviews.Author: Andreas Niu
Reviews.Content: I've had this for 4 months now and it has been very reliable. it's quite a simple monitor without the too many features like temperature sensor and talk back function. However, it does have VOX and sound cut off when there is no noise detected for a period of time. It's nice to see our baby girl clearly on the screen while she sleeps in the dark. The night vision is better than the monitors we've tried.I have owned this monitor for 2 years and it is a life saver. I can easily monitor my babies room temperature and listen to make sure she is sleeping fine. I recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Great, cheap monitor...
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera monitor for the price. The video quality is mediocre during the daytime, I notice the colors are not the greatest but whatever, I didnt buy this to watch it in HD I bought it to keep an eye on the little ones and it does that job just fine. The night IR is AMAZING. Works phenomenal, sees very clear in complete darkness and you can't ask for anything better than that. The handheld monitor does feel a bit cheap/light but as long as you're not taking this on your next outback adventure or deployment, you'll be fine. I do NOT like the audio quality. This however, does not affect my rating because we already have a terrific audio only monitor which we use, we just keep the video monitor on silent and use the both of them when in our room. Overall, for the price I dont think you can find anything better and this item is not all that bad. Good buy on my end.

Reviews.Title: We just went for the best seller
Reviews.Author: Jnceew
Reviews.Content: Just like what we usually do, we just pick the best sellers and it usually turns out to be alright. And it's a flawless rule of thumb! We got this last year and it has been an amazing product to use. We can see and listen to our baby at night without worrying like we used to. This unit lacks the pan and tilt option that remotely moves the camera lens, but for the money we paid for, I feel we've got more than enough. We did not have any wifi interference problems that some users talked about.

Reviews.Title: Works just fine
Reviews.Author: Pap Rob
Reviews.Content: This unit works well with two cameras linked to the monitor. We also got 2 spare adapters to setup a few charging spots around the house. Although it doesn't have much features, for the money, this is a good investment for the family. My wife doesn't have any trouble using this... and she is not particularly good with high-tech gadgets!

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: H. Fewkes
Reviews.Content: Just like most of you looking for a baby monitor, there are too many options available, and the prices can vary from $30 to $300. I looked online and in forums and figured this the monitor we want in our price range. We use it overwatching the crib set at 3 feet away from crib to get a good view of our baby sleeping. After using this video monitor for 8 months now, I can not imagine anyone not upgrading to a video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Frank Witkowski
Reviews.Content: I was recommended to get this from a good friend who just had his 3rd child. This isn't one of the upscale models, but it does what I need it to do at a good price. I like how there are no complicated menu options and systems that I need to learn before using this. It's straight forward and simple. It has independent controls for brightness and volume so you do not need to go into the options settings to change this. You can also place the camera miles away (not literally) and it will still work. We've never had it go out of range.It lacks a longer-lasting battery, and a stowable antenna, but for $100 really I do not have much to complain about!

Reviews.Title: Range depends on how much stuff is in between
Reviews.Author: mokes2009
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my brother-in-law to use with my niece. It works within his apartment, but won't go up to another floor. So the range of how far it works, really is only if there's just simple walls between you and the baby. So, no easy running to the laundry room, for example. Otherwise it works great. Exactly as described. He loves it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitor
Reviews.Author: Cat
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent monitor ~ for less only $99. It's has amazing range and video/audio quality. We have a 1600ft home and it picks up reception everywhere. It has not interfere with our wifi signal (we use an apple extreme router) since day 1. We had it for 3 months now and we are glad we bought this. I'm now just considering to either get another complete set of this product, or just buy a stand-alone camera to link it to our existing system.

Reviews.Title: So far - SO happy!
Reviews.Author: RKCM
Reviews.Content: I read so many reviews on so many different video monitors that I was dizzy! Every one of them had different things that people did not like. In the end I felt best going with the Infant Optics DXR-5. I bought it "used" on Amazon for about $70...an AMAZING price! I read the different ones available that were "used" and some had a scratch or were not in the original packaging. Mine came without any defect, damages, and in the original box. I have been using it every day for two weeks and so far - I love it! The picture quality is great in daytime lighting - so clear! The night vision  is also very clear when focused only on the crib. I have the camera set up to where it views almost the entire room... so empty areas of the room are a little pixel(ly) looking, but it is clear on actual objects and people. (hope that makes sense). My son's room is upstairs and this monitor works even when I am all the way down in the basement or in the yard! It was also important to me that the line/camera have 100% privacy..I have read that some monitors have picked up other video from neighbors' monitors! - This uses digital 2.4 Ghz wireless transmission that says it is 100% private in addition to using Frequency Hopping Spread Spectrum for interference free connection. It also has an option that turns off the monitor when there is no noise (to conserve power) and it re-activates or turns back on when any noise is detected -  I should say I have not tried this. I have that feature turned off so that at night mine stays on so I can't say how well that feature works. The volume on the unit seems perfect to me - not too quiet- not too loud. As with any, there is a little bit of white noise when turned up high. That doesn't bother me because we sleep with a noise machine...Will report back if any problems arise in the future. But so far -SO happy!

Reviews.Title: Overall a great video monitor! Awesome for twins!
Reviews.Author: Cornstalk
Reviews.Content: I've had this monitor for about 5 months. I got it shortly after my twins were born so I could see who was making noise. Overall it's been a very good monitor, especially for the price!The sound quality is good. I have mine right next to a noise machine and I can still hear the babies really well. I can hear the noise machine a little bit, but it's helpful to know that the monitor is working!The picture quality is pretty okay. Sometimes if there is sunlight coming from a big window nearby, I think that I can't see the screen quite as well - it kind of gets blank near the sides. But that has been pretty rare.HOWEVER, I have noticed that the screen DOES go blank on the battery power sometimes. I almost always have mine plugged in. But I used to get mad at my husband or older kids for turning off the monitor, until I realized that I didn't plug it in all the way and so it was working off of battery power. And the screen went blank on it's own. It's an easy fix and I suggest keeping an eye on the monitor when you have it on battery power. On that note, I haven't had to replace the battery yet (but then again, like I said, I keep it plugged in most of the time).I also think it is fairly easy to fit the camera in different places. It started in the crib when I had both babies in the crib, then I moved it to a couple different tabletop locations. It's easy to maneuver.Overall a very good quality for the price especially. I would suggest this to others.

Reviews.Title: Works for the Elderly too!!
Reviews.Author: G. Lewis
Reviews.Content: I ordered this to keep an eye on my 90-year-old mother who has Alzheimer's. Despite the good reviews I was iffy about the signal range because we live in an old New York brownstone and I'm sometimes on a different floor from Mom.  I have to say I'm extremely pleased.  I've been two floors above her and still got a nice strong signal.  Now I can move around the house and not worry so much about her safety.  She's prone to falls and this helps a lot.  If anyone's interested I use the "Smart Caregiver Motion Sensor and Pager" along with it.  It works great also.  The two of these together have given me a lot more freedom and a lot less stress!!

Reviews.Title: Nothing wrong with my unit
Reviews.Author: Kris Chris
Reviews.Content: My biggest concern about this monitor was the beeping noise problem mentioned in a few 1 star reviews, but it seems that the they've fixed this problem. I don't get any beeping sound when it goes into power saving mode. However it does give a loud beep when it gets out of range... and that doesn't happen until I take the monitor out to the frontyard. It has excellent reception and range.

Reviews.Title: love the baby monitor
Reviews.Author: shar
Reviews.Content: just set up the monitor for my wonderful Mom who is suffering from dementia, and while she is in her room sleeping I wanted to be able to make sure she didn't fall while trying to get up, the monitor is wonderful.  It surely does the trick and gives me the opportunity to be in the other room working while she is snoozing...

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: chukwuemeka Ifemesia
Reviews.Content: We have used this monitor for the past two months now and I must admit that its the best of its class. Works well no complaints, didn't do much with regards to set up.

Reviews.Title: Nice system
Reviews.Author: POTIS "Surfer"
Reviews.Content: Overall, this is a very good baby monitor for not much money. The screen is a little small (2.4 inches) compared to what is available, but the video quality and price makes up for it. We haven't lost reception yet using this in our 2500ft 2 storey home. I hope that the next generation can have some internet capability so we can see and hear our baby even when we are not at home.

Reviews.Title: After six months, still my favorite baby item!
Reviews.Author: Andria
Reviews.Content: I used a traditional monitor until my baby was nearly five months old. It worked fine when I could walk in his room and check on him without him realizing I was present. But once he was five months, he was aware enough to start crying if he saw me peek in. The video monitor solved this. Now I can see what he is up to without going in his room.My son is now nearly a year old, so the monitor helps me see what he is up to in his crib. If he wakes up at night and fusses, I turn the monitor on to see if he really needs me or just needs to go back to sleep. He's at the stage now where he plays in his crib when he wakes up from a nap. It gives me peace of mind to be able to keep an eye on him.Setting up was a breeze! We hung the camera on the wall next to his crib, turned everything on, and we had video! You can pair the monitor with multiple cameras, but we are only using one at this time.The picture quality is fine, and the night vision works great. The voice activation is a nice feature to save the battery.My only negative comment is that after six months, the battery on the monitor does not keep its charge. It used to last for 4-5 hours. Now it lasts 2-3. This isn't a deal breaker for me, though. I just plug it in when needed.

Reviews.Title: lOvE IT
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Even though its cheaper it gets the job done. Tilted camera, and the sound and video quality is amazing! Love the night vision!

Reviews.Title: Great Product, PHENOMENAL Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Lori A. Sosa
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor to replace a more expensive model destroyed by a power surge.  I wasn't sure what quality to expect due to the price, but I couldn't be happier!  The monitor is great, and I even love the blue color.  However, the item itself has been officially moved to the second thing I like most about my purchase, as Infant Optics has blown me away with their customer service.  I recently contacted them to obtain repair information, prepared to spend whatever I needed to.  I was SHOCKED when I received an email telling me that my monitor was being replaced, free of charge, no questions asked!!!  I will recommend this item to anyone I know looking for a baby monitor.  Thank you, Infant Optics, for a fabulous product and a happy transaction!

Reviews.Title: good at first now i hate it
Reviews.Author: bemyescape637
Reviews.Content: got this almost a year ago. my sons room is down stairs and i NEEDED something that i could see and hear what was going on down stairs. i liked that the video was clear and i could see everything well. it would go off when he moved or make a little sound and i loved that. now if he wakes up and moves it doesnt go off. sometimes he will end up upstairs in our room because it didnt go off..i will be looking for a new one now sad

Reviews.Title: It's a good item,...
Reviews.Author: MONICA
Reviews.Content: Its a good item for monitoring your babies, really helpfull and the price its fair enough. Funtionally could be better, but its ok.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics monitor
Reviews.Author: JQ
Reviews.Content: This thing is great. It's got great reception, good video quality and no complicated menus to navigate through to adjust settings. To control the brightness and volume, there are 2 dedicated buttons. Unlike other monitors where you have to go into a menu and select the on-screen options. This is great when you are half asleep in the middle of the night!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS MONITOR!!
Reviews.Author: Laurel Dreckman
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had purchased a regular baby monitor (sound only) but we were getting frusturated with hearing our son fuss but then not knowing if he could get back to sleep on his own or not. We bought this monitor and LOVE IT! The camera is small enough that it doesn't look ridiculous (we mounted it on the wall by his crib) and has awesome picture quality (even w/ the night vision feature). The handheld portion is lightweight (almost seems cheap..but so far no issues) and again AWESOME picture quality. My only complaint is the battery life of the monitor. THe camera stays plugged in so that obviously does not die, but the monitor portion loses battery life fairly quickly. We keep ours plugged in all night but if we try to keep it on all day it dies. My advice would be to turn it off when your baby is not napping to conserve the battery. We only have this issue on weekends when he is napping at home (otherwise during the week he is at daycare and we only use it at night). All in all an awesome product. For the price--you can't get anything better!

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: DeepUnder
Reviews.Content: We moved onto getting this infant optics monitor after going through 2 other video monitors that had very poor video quality. We are very happy with the video quality on this monitor and we love how great the night IR works when there is zero light.This is a great monitor to get for value.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Just goes to show you don't need to purchase a super expensie video monitor to get a good one. This is better than my last one and about a $100 cheaper

Reviews.Title: Great set!
Reviews.Author: Dianne Hayes
Reviews.Content: Love this monitor system! Yes its plastic and feels cheap but all that matters is it works very well, ive have no problems and ive been using it for about 8 months now. I just paired an additinal camera to it and so far so good. Athough i think its stupid that the whole system is 100 bucks and the one extra camera is 100 bucks alone but it still beats the price of the competition. It does not have a intercom option on it but its not that big of a deal. Thats an added luxury that will only make you more lazy in my opinion. The night mode works great. The camera itself can tell whether or not its dark or light thus automatically switching to night mode when needed. Having a nightlight on does. It impair the video at all on night vision which was a concern of minebefore purchasing but glad to find it not a problem.and the night lights i have are super bright. The rotation on the camera itself is pretty good. Smetimes i wish i could turn it a bit more but my kids rooms are a decent size so i cant be too picky about seeing every square inch of the room.All in all its a great system, would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Video monitor review
Reviews.Author: RBell
Reviews.Content: This is our first ever video monitor and we really like it. It works as advertised and it a very simple monitor to get used to. There's no fancy buttons or confusing features to setup.. just plug it in and it works straight out the box.

Reviews.Title: Better than IP camera!
Reviews.Author: Seweed
Reviews.Content: We really like this monitor. We had an IP camera to monitor our baby but it always had software problems and it burnt the battery out so quickly. It would also disconnect once I need to use my iphone to makes phone calls. I told my sister a month ago and she sweetly got us this for christmas. This monitor is great!The monitor display is nice and clear and the audio is louder than the IP camera by 20%. This monitor also has night vision and it works excellent - turns on when there is light detected and turns back off when there's no light.Just a note; I would suggest you follow the instructions to adjust the antenna to horizontal position if you plan to use this on a floor above or below where the monitor is so you pick up better reception.really good monitor!

Reviews.Title: Happy that I went with this
Reviews.Author: Racoon
Reviews.Content: I was recommended to get this baby monitor by my friend. I wasn't too sure about spending a hundred dollars on a brand I never heard of, but with amazon handles returns quite well so I gave it a shot. I am very glad that I gave this a try. It gives us a view of our baby who sleeps in her room while giving us the confidence of her safety. We do not have to worry about her crying in the middle of the night anymore without us around. The camera part can not be powered by indepedent power source so it always has to be plugged in, while the monitor can run on its built in battery for a couple of hours. It's a very basic monitor and it lacks battery life indication, VOX sensitivity adjustment, two-way talk, HD screen... and a few more features that would be quite useful. However, for the money, I would rather get a few extra cameras paired up and drop out those expensive features. This is a monitor of really good value and it's reflected that it's the top seller on amazon.

Reviews.Title: Would buy again
Reviews.Author: Anne A
Reviews.Content: Great monitor, not expensive yet gives us what we wanted. The video quality is amazing and the frames flow very smooth without lag. The reception is excellent on this monitor and there's no static on the video or the audio. The plastic feels inexpensive but it does have the weight advantage if you are intending to carry this around with you alot. I would not hestitate to buy another set from these folks again.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics monitor
Reviews.Author: greatmom
Reviews.Content: I got this infant optics monitor to replace our summer infant monitor that was having sound issues. This is much better in video quality and had better reception. I'm glad how technology has progressed and made video monitor technology much more affordable than 5 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Works for our father
Reviews.Author: Sujuta
Reviews.Content: This is a great little monitor. Although the color and design looks like it's for babies, I made this into our home surveillance camera for our handicapped father with mobility issues. It might be of a privacy issue for him, but atleast he is safe. When he needs us, he just yells my name and I can attend him immediately.Nice clear night vision gives me a peace of mind when I sleep.

Reviews.Title: Love this portable monitor
Reviews.Author: R.Straw
Reviews.Content: So it only took 2 days for shipping and it came in a nice box. I thought that this wasn't a necessity so we didn't get this until our daughter was 2 years old. I really regret it! It is so useful to have a baby monitor at home to keep a watchful eye on your child. We didn't want to spend a fortune so we decided on the best monitor for value. We have the camera setup upstairs and the reception works all the way in our garage which is 2 floors below it. It doesn't interfere with our wifi and everything works just fine (in contrary to my friend's baby monitor where it kills their wifi). The only complaint I can make about this product is that it lacks a two way talk feature. Otherwise, for the money, this is THE monitor to get.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Manuel Rondon "Angel R"
Reviews.Content: I was a not 100% sure about this product before i acquired due to the low price, but now I have been using it for over 4 months and works great. The monitor is black/white. Its signal range is seems fine. I have used it while I was in the guess bedroom while my baby was in the master bedroom. The distance is approximately 45 -50 feet. I would highly recommended to a friend.

Reviews.Title: No complaints
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I bought this baby monitor so I can peaceful cook while my baby took her naps. This is very reliable and has good video quality. The automute feature irritates me so I do not have this feature switch on. The range is excellent and the night vision gives me a clear view of everything in the crib without any light. Since my hearing isn't very good, I was concerned that this monitor was not loud enough, but it has been fine for me (at max volume). I wished that I could afford a more expensive monitor at first but I'm happy with this budget monitor because it gives me all that I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Excellent reception
Reviews.Author: Shadow00
Reviews.Content: I had a video monitor from summer and it always lost reception when I went to another floor in our house. This product has worked everywhere including in the yard. Everything is as expected for the top selling baby monitor on amazon other than there is no battery indication.This is the best video monitor $100 can buy.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Nicoleon
Reviews.Content: I've bought this monitor back in October and it has not had any problems so far. I originally wanted to get the add-on camera too but it was out of stock at that time.  I had to wait until it was in stock (which took a long 2 weeks). Now with 2 cameras, this camera system let's us watch both rooms while we sleep. A great tool for parents - get one if you don't have a monitor yet!

Reviews.Title: Monitor works great!!!!
Reviews.Author: Cesar Casasola
Reviews.Content: I do not know why some of these people compline my arrived perfectly fine and i have used it for the past 2 months since my purchase. The quality of the video is great and i can take it everyone. The plastic is perfect i have had no problems with it and yes it feels a little fragile but it is not. I think the price is right and the materials used are great. Would definelty buy another if i had another baby.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor if you want good video quality
Reviews.Author: ROSS
Reviews.Content: This video monitor works great and has really good video quality. Night vision is excellent, the color and clarity is good, and the video is very smooth- giving out 30 frames/sec.It's much better than the ones I've tested and tried in toysRus. Range is good given it is fully digital. It's best if you have thin wooden walls, and range is decreased with thick concrete walls. The reception is excellent on the top 2 floors but not the basement since our ground floor platform is filled with concrete reinforcement. My only complaint for now is that the automute function sensitivity can not be adjusted. I just have to live with the preset sound level that removes the static noise.So far for these 3 months it has worked without any giving out any problems. For the money, this is the best video monitor out there.

Reviews.Title: Digital monitor
Reviews.Author: Ang23
Reviews.Content: My husband insisted on getting a baby monitor from a major brand but I was tempted to try this infant optics monitor although I never heard of this brand. It was ranked #1 in the monitor category and had good reviews. It was far within budget and amazon had a 30 day return window so I thought it was worth a try.We absolutely love this monitor system! It doesn't have high-tech features like panning the camera or music or two way talking, but we didn't want to pay double the money just to get these unnecessary options that we were never going to use. The range is excellent without any signal drop in our 2500 sq ft townhouse and there's no wifi interference. This is completly worth the money and I would recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Best Bang for the Buck
Reviews.Author: matt m
Reviews.Content: Great video monitor - especially for the $.  My wife and I couldn't stand the thought of not being able to see our new baby and now we can actually afford to.  Now we just need to move him out of our room so we can use the monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: mandy
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor for the price. The only things I would change is I wish the sound turned down more and the light too. The volume adjusts but it doesn't go very low before turning off the sound. The light the monitor gives off at night is also pretty bright even when on its lowest setting.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics Digital Video Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: John Goodyear
Reviews.Content: Our older unit went out on us so I searched Amazon for a new one. I am happy with it and it works great. It has lost its signal once or twice in the 6 months I have been using it but a few times was because I placed it a little too close to the baby crib and she got a hold of it. Its very adjustable and portable, so we take it with us when we travel. The battery hasn't been an issue, but we keep it plugged in religiously so that shouldn't be a problem. Good unit for the money, clear picture and can see in the dark (infrared). It also has four channels so if you wanted to get a few more cameras, you could use those if needed.

Reviews.Title: Video monitor
Reviews.Author: Megan Cobb
Reviews.Content: This is our second video monitor we purchased and we won't be changing again. This has excellent audio and video and a much better range. The display unit is designed well - it's very light and handy making it less of a burden if you carry this in a pocket or hang it dangling on your neck using a strap. The antenna can't be retracted unlike the motorola, but at half the price, I can live with a protruding antenna! highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Set the right expecations
Reviews.Author: Andee Rust
Reviews.Content: Intially, I was planning to buy a summer infant monitor but I knew there were good deals floating around the web. I did a day's worth of research and came down to choosing a monitor that wasn't going to do too much damage to my credit card bill. This was ranked number one and it was well reviewed. It got to me only 1 day after making the order and it was just what I wanted. Something simple and easy, nothing too lavish. It still lacks the bigger screen, HD video quality, and Bose sound quality, but it has the backbone of what a video monitor should have.What really dazzled me was the smooth frame rate and lagless video display.What didn't impress me too much was the build quality and lack of audio-only mode with screen switched off.Everything else was just as expected.Just remember this IS one the most economical monitor. If you want something that's hardcore downright the best, get the $200+ motorola or the summer infant. If you want something that does the job at minimal cost, this is the best option.

Reviews.Title: 1 week review
Reviews.Author: Heike "Daughter and Mom"
Reviews.Content: I received the Infant Optics monitor last week and so far it's been working well. It performs as advertised. There is no interference to our wifi network and the video in the dark is excellent. We accidentally switched off the night vision (this will happen if you press the + sign on the two sides at the same time) and we thought our unit was defective, until customer service told us how to fix this silly problem.There's no pan and zoom function and I didn't expect a $100 monitor have it... although it would have been wonderful if we could remotely move our camera around. But just like most careful shoppers, I would rather get a two-camera setup on this rather than a pan/zoom monitor at the same price.

Reviews.Title: Video Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: An Avid Christian Reader
Reviews.Content: I got this for my new-born granddaughter!  What a blessing it has been!  Even with the audio monitor, I would run in and out checking.  With this, I see her so clearly!  It not only reassures me of her safety and well-being, it lets me have the pleasure of observing her!  Her parents love it, too!  I HIGHLY recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we were looking for
Reviews.Author: RONTalley
Reviews.Content: I really love this baby monitor! It's affordable, got great video and audio, and has been held reliable for nearly 2 years now. It's quite a basic monitor so do not expect anything fancy. We were deciding between a IP camera and this, but since we didn't want one of our iphones or ipads completely dedicated to monitoring our baby, we wanted a seperate screen that can always be on. This was it and we are glad we got it for a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price, working every night for 5 months now
Reviews.Author: tono-sty
Reviews.Content: This monitor i believe is the cheapest i have seen, works great, night vision, for me i think the mic range is very long enough to capture every sound, probably not the best video resolution, but for the price it does what is meant to do. One of the things that i like is the "Vox On" feature, that after several minutes of quiet and inactivity, the monitor goes off to stand by mode, meaning if either the baby makes a sound or moves, the monitor(and the screen) will turn on automatically (having a delay of 2 seconds white it turns back on) and will able to see and hear whats going on. also it has 4 channels for adding 3 more cameras, totaling in 4 cameras in one monitor, obviously you can only watch one at a time in the screen. Have been using it every night for almost 5 months now, and still working really good, no problems at all, very good product.

Reviews.Title: Use this 24-7
Reviews.Author: An Ant
Reviews.Content: I've been using this 24-7 since I bought it 2 months ago and I now can't live without it. It's really a surveillence camera to watch over him wherever he might be. The battery won't be able to last that long so we keep it plugged into the power cord that hooked to an extension cable. So far with the screen nearly constantly on, this monitor is very reliable and has not let me down. The video quality is excellent and I can see him moving his mouth mumbling or rolling over in the middle of the night. We keep the camera relatively close to our crib just enough to get the whole of the crib in the frame. We also bought a spare battery but realized that it wasn't necessary since we don't use it in portable mode. Too bad we are out of our 30 day return date!

Reviews.Title: We love this monitor!
Reviews.Author: Joan Leiber
Reviews.Content: We've had this monitor for about a month now and we love it! The cost of this type of technology has come down to a very reasonable price so it's much more affordable compared to 4 years ago when we had our first child. Having both visual and audio feed from a far distance is really useful for parents, and since it's digital now, there's no static, feedback or range issues. The monitor is much smaller than the analog monitor we've owned, this one can fit right into a pocket like a mobile phone. For the price, this is the a worthwhile investment!

Reviews.Title: Very good for a low price
Reviews.Author: Olman Vargas B.
Reviews.Content: I has worked perfectly for what we needed and the price we pay. It's easy to use and has a good performance.

Reviews.Title: Give it a chance, it's awesome!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Anderson
Reviews.Content: I've been using this monitor now for 4 months and I love it.  At first I thought there were problems with it because the sound would turn on and off, but it's actually a feature.  You only hear the sound when there's something to be heard.  It works so well, I have no complaints.  It may not be top of the line for whatever reason, but for the price, I feel like I got an awesome deal!  And bonus, it's really cute!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Geehosefat
Reviews.Content: We were recommended to get this buy a good friend who owned this product for a year now and we love this little video camera. We were aware of the short battery life so we bought an extra charger to keep in our living room during the day time. We keep it plugged into a power source as much as possible so it doesn't have to work on batteries. The range and video quality is excellent on this little camera and the only negative thing I can complain is that the waiste strap (that is meant to be a backflip stand) doesn't really work... so make sure you have pants with deep pockets to fit this thing if you plan to carry it around.

Reviews.Title: Works decent for the price, needs improvments
Reviews.Author: XNOR

It supports upto 3 additional cameras so that you can monitor different kids/babies/other kids in different rooms or just as a security camera.What is not so good ? * The Unit is cheaply built * Not good viewing angle - just 20 deg tilt will blur out the image * Does not support WIfi - means if you want to watch your kids/babies being taken care by a baby sitter you cannot do it. Reviews.Title: Low price for great monitor
Reviews.Author: Sizsaw
Reviews.Content: I spent hours looking at the reviews to decide which monitor to get. This was the best selling baby monitor but this is primarily because of the low price, and this doesn't reflect on the quality. I was most worried about the beeping problem that many reviewers pointed out, and I'm glad the unit I received does not have this silly software glitch. Overall I think this unit is the best for 'worth'. If you are planning to spend $200 on a monitor, I would recommend the infant optics monitor with another remote camera (and another $20 to spare) rather than a better monitor with music, bigger screen... but with one less remote camera. The battery is short so plan to keep it plugged into the charger as much as you can to prevent it going out at night. We live in a 3000ft home and we get signal everywhere without interfering our wi fi.

Reviews.Title: It's all you need
Reviews.Author: Thomas Kwong
Reviews.Content: After trying to decide on the $200-300 baby monitors which all had their negative reviews we decided on the Infant Optics and it has been great.  We have used it for our newborn for 2 months now and it does what any monitor will do, watch your child at night time and hear their cries.  The night vision is great, you can be in a pitch black room and still see your baby.  The plastic covering makes it kind of cheap looking but if you don't drop it it should last a while.  Battery life is the only concern.  Save yourself 100 bucks and get this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: Markus Brunnermeier
Reviews.Content: Simple to use for my wife and I. Video is very smooth and barely has any lag (unlike IP cameras). The battery life is a bit on the short side but that's OK if you put it on VOX power saving mode throughout the night.Got 2 extra adapters so we keep a few bases around the house to keep the monitor unit powered without using the battery.Worked really well so far.

Reviews.Title: Fast replacement service
Reviews.Author: Kimberly VU
Reviews.Content: Recently, I have some problems with charging the monitor unit.  I contacted customer service on Friday night and was surprised to hear a live person at the end of the line. The rep took my information down and told me that a technician will be contacting me by Saturday afternoon.  The following afternoon a tech contacted me and tried to solve the battery problem.  The problem was not resolve so the tech advised me to send them an email. I sent the email and received a reply with directions for a replacement monitor.  I sent back my old monitor on Monday and within a few days I received a new replacement monitor.  It took less that one week from the time I reported the problem to the time I received a replacement monitor.  That is the fastest warranty service I have ever received on a product.  Thank you Infant Optic, for a fast replacement monitor.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Johanna
Reviews.Content: I'm a new mom with very little free time but I have to take a few moments to tell how much I love this camera. It's exactly what I wanted. I didn't need a camera that could play lullabies or that I could talk to baby through the monitor. I just wanted to be able to see and hear her from the other room.I had one complaint which was that the stand the camera comes on tilts the camera up and I couldn't figure out why it was built that way. When are you ever going to need the camera to look up to see the baby? The camera can swivel left to right but I was propping the stand up on a rag to tilt it down. Then, yesterday, I realized you can tilt the camera down without moving the stand. (Again, new mom brain or I might have realized this earlier.) So the camera is perfection!I understand what people mean by "cheap plastic feel" but I really don't care. It performs well. That's all that matters to me. I'm not sure what people mean when they talk about the monitor beeping at them. The only time my monitor beeps is if I turn the camera off but the monitor is still on, which makes sense. If the camera goes out, you want the monitor to let you know.The only other thing I would note is that the monitor doesn't really give you a heads up on battery life. It just starts blinking and then within a few minutes it dies so you have to plug it in to turn it back on. I've just made allowances for this and make sure to plug the monitor in whenever I'm not using it so when I do need it I can carry it from room to room with me.So glad to save money AND get exactly what I wanted. Great picture and sound quality. Easy to use and at an affordable price. Highly recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: excellent choice
Reviews.Author: stock
Reviews.Content: Looking for an affordable way to monitor your baby/older kids, look no further.  We have always had traditional baby monitors as we thought video monitors would be out of our price range.  Infant Optics has made a great option for families.  We have had ours since Feb.  The picture quality is great, ability to pan between both kids rooms, turn it on voice activation, and hang from the wall to get a good view.  Since we sleep in a multi level house, I have been saved many jaunts on the stairs while seeing whether the baby is standing in his crib or just tossing/turning.  Helps me feel like I am in the same room! Our experience with customer service was perfect, exceeded expectations.  Have also recommended to friends that have bought-happy customers!

Reviews.Title: Replacement monitor for a static filled traditional monitor
Reviews.Author: EHMommy33
Reviews.Content: We had registered for a traditional monitor that we received at one of our showers.  It started out ok, but after a couple of weeks got terrible static.  It was so bad we couldn't hear the baby over the static.  We had to find something different.  We really didn't want a video monitor simply because of the price. I decided to check Amazon for monitors and stumbled onto this monitor.  It stood out because of the price.Like many of the other reviewers, I questioned the price of this monitor.  I thought "this sounds too good to be true." I read all of the reviews and saw so many postive statements that I thought it was worth the risk.I concur with everything said.  This is a great monitor.  My husband has even said that this is the best thing we've purchased for our son.  The camera is so clear, day or night.  The auto-mute is a great function that turns the sound off when it doesn't detect any noise.  If it detects sound it turns back on.  There is a similar function that turns the camera off, but we haven't used that.  I like to have the video feed up all of the time.  This has every feature I could ever want.

Reviews.Title: great optics
Reviews.Author: Butterfly
Reviews.Content: Good monitor and works without the annoying interference we were having with other monitors. No snow or hissing sound. The only problem is that it looses the signal on a daily basis, sometimes in the middle of the night and the beep it makes when this happens wakes me up. I have to turn off the monitor and turn it back on to restore sound and picture. But it so much better than others that I would definitely buy it again. Good ability to angle camera.

Reviews.Title: Keeper
Reviews.Author: Crogan
Reviews.Content: Very happy about this monitor. I should have gotten one of these sweet devices much earlier and it would have saved our sanity! Being our first video monitor, we are thrilled to have the luxury to actually SEE our baby in her crib. We had an audio monitor but it was always out of range and had too much static. At just $30 more to add the video feature, this is a must-have. We won't be turning back to audio monitors ever again.The VOX mode is really nice. The screen goes into power saving mode and once our baby cries, the monitor pops back on and shows us the visuals of the crib and the image of her crying so we can immediately go check on her. The battery can last a full night if on this mode. If the VOX was off, it will only last around 3 hours.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor but massive amounts of wireless interference.
Reviews.Author: Chris J. Christensen "my review"
Reviews.Content: Monitor works great but it essentially shuts down the wifi in my home when the monitor is in use.  I have tried what it said in the trouble shooting guide and it does not work.  I have manually moved my router to each of the 13 channels available on the 2.4GHZ spectrum and it still hasn't done anything to alleviate the issue.  I read a bunch of reviews where the monitor did not interfere with the wifi and I have a feeling that it's probably because of the design of my house.  If the router and camera were on opposite sides of my house it would probably not be an issue for me but as it stands they are in rooms that sit next to each other.  I have a newer router that I purchased on amazon (medialink 802.11n) so I don't think it has anything to do with the routers age or the firmware that's installed on it (which is up to date).The wifi interference doesn't show up as wifi disconnected or the inability to connect to your wifi network.  When the monitor is on the wifi signal strength remains the same as if it were off.  The interference shows up in the form of packet loss.  Doing a speed test with the monitor on yielded an initial burst of 3Mbps which after about 3 seconds degraded until the test fails to finish.  With the monitor off the speed test comes through at 18-20Mbps and the test completes as it should.  Anything that taxes your connection or attempts to consume a constant amount of bandwidth (downloads, gaming, streaming, speedtests) deteriorates the connection until it is unusable.  Standard web traffic for the most part goes through just fine with some noticeable slowness but it still loads most pages.I have contacted Infant Optics tech support to see if this monitor jumps channels and have yet to hear anything back.  I am guessing that it just has a very sloppy radio.

Reviews.Title: Finally no video lag
Reviews.Author: S.Dan
Reviews.Content: bought a Samsung video monitor last year and returned it due to the poor video lag it had. it always skipped frames and it interfered with our home 2.4ghz wifi. Got this and the video is so much better - no more lagging or slow frame rates. Haven't had any problems with our wifi too. finally!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: MiCrup
Reviews.Content: I was hestitant on diverting away from the major brands and giving smaller companies a try, but overall I'm very pleased with the Infant Optics monitor. The camera was setup already and all we needed to do was plug the power in. All the features are very simple and it doesn't take a genius to work out how it operates. The video is very clean clear although not high-def. Most importantly the night vision is excellent on this device although it goes into black and white once it goes on. We had trouble with gettting the night vision mode to work properly at first but after consulting customer service we switched it from AUTO to ON all the time. I don't think we could have spend $100 on a better product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitor
Reviews.Author: Mommi Liz
Reviews.Content: Got this and fell in love with this. Use it between the 3 cameras that we have been very pleased with this. Initially wifi interference at start but upgraded our router (dlink) software and now it works fine. We can keep our eyes on our two kids nearly every room they sleep and play in!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor!
Reviews.Author: Ekem
Reviews.Content: I registered for this product for my baby registry.  I started using the monitor when my son was 4 months old and I finally moved him into his crib.  I had an issue with the monitor not picking up his cries and turning on. I would wake up by hearing him crying across the house before the monitor woke me up with the nursery sounds. I emailed Infant Optics and they sent me a new one as soon as I mailed in the broken one. Great customer service.  It works great and exactly how it should. I guess I just got a bad one first time around. The picture quality is pretty good. Day time image is in color and night time vision is obviously in black and white. I would highly recommend this monitor to anyone.Update: I wish the antenna was a little more durable. My son is now 10 months old, walking and getting into everything. I keep the monitor on my night stand. Every time he grabs for it, it hits the floor and the antenna breaks off. I have super glued it 3 times now. It still reads the camera ok. I just wish it was a built in antenna or shorter so it wouldn't have broken off the first time.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Harvey Rogerson
Reviews.Content: I really love this monitor: it's worth every penny. I got 1x extra camera and I figured it out how to pair within 5 minutes. I love how I can see my son play and sleep in his room and in the living while I can do other things.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: rlynch
Reviews.Content: I am so impressed with this company and this product. I bought a monitor a little while ago and loved it. Was a reasonable price for a great product. Has a very far range so I can go outside with my oldest boy, very clear picture, great sound, and LOVE the portability. Unfortunetly it broke. When I contacted the company though, they were very quick to respond and shipped a new one out to me! I was not expecting that. So pleased with this.

Reviews.Title: Must have equipment
Reviews.Author: Greakdad
Reviews.Content: I think all parents should own atleast some sort of monitor equipment unless your child is constantly by yourside. This monitor really provided a peace of mind for us. We considered getting an IP camera but the setup was far too involved and the operation took up either the screen for a smartphone meaning you can't really use the monitor if you have a call etc. For $100 we get to see and hear our 7 month daughter wherever we are in the house. It lacks remote internet access but we figured out this suits our needs better.

Reviews.Title: Functions Well, Great Price!!
Reviews.Author: kmv678
Reviews.Content: When my daughter turned 2 months old, we decided to have her start sleeping in her crib in her own room.  I wanted a video monitor so that I could see her at all times without going into the room and disturbing her.  The ones in the store are PRICEY to say the least.  I had settled on one and was planning to purchase it from Amazon because it was cheaper when I came across this one.  I read the reviews and they sounded good so I decided to give it a try.  It works perfectly!!!  I love that the sound only comes on when she makes noise and I like that we can use the AC power supply, the battery or both.  I take it all over the house with me and have even taken it outside a few times.  My daughter will be 6 months old next week and we have not had any issues.  I've suggested this to two other couples that were looking for one.

Reviews.Title: Finally...
Reviews.Author: Marco Benabou
Reviews.Content: Owned a graco monitor and got so frustrated with the signal always dropping I had to find something to replace it. With a tight budget I was looking for something in the 150 range. I bought this together with another add on camera which was at the best value I could find.With the infant optics i finally don't have to deal with signal issues. The video quality is better than the graco and the range is fantastic. The batteries don't last that long so I bought an additional power charger from amazon to keep a power dock in both the kitchen and in my bedroom. Overall an excellent baby monitor for the money.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product & Even Better Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Rika Suave
Reviews.Content: We received this video monitor right before leaving on a trip with our toddler and infant. When I tried charging the battery, it wouldn't charge, but the monitor worked as long as it remained plugged in. This forced us to get a bit creative during our trip, and my husband suggested contacting the maker when we got back to see if they'd send a new battery. I did so, and to be perfectly honest, I doubted I'd get a response. Low and behold, I received an email immediately with an apology for the faulty battery and a request for our mailing address to send new batteries. I provided the address thinking once again we'd never see the new battery, let alone MORE than one battery, then what arrived today? Two new lithium batteries! I am so used to dealing with rather poor customer service when it comes to baby products (don't even get me started on when our son's crib was recalled!), that I just have to thank Infant Optics and specifically, Candice Monique, for their five star customer service. Now to rate the product itself. I WISH we had purchased this for our first born. I can't tell you the peace of mind this video monitor gives me with our 5 month old. Our kids are sharing a bedroom, and with this monitor, I can keep an eye on our infant without waking up the toddler. It's fantastic! And now it'll be even better once it's portable. Every parent with a new born should have this monitor. Thank you again Infant Optics!

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Sheri Leach
Reviews.Content: for the money paid, this is a great buy. it worked straight out the box, no screw drivers or anything. the sound is just as good as our old audio monitor but now we got a nice image of our 2nd child both during the day and in total darkness.

Reviews.Title: Best within price range
Reviews.Author: Russell Poole
Reviews.Content: My daughter is now 7 months old and this monitor has helped us during the day see what she was up to even if we were busy doing something else. She sleeps with us so during the night it wasn't a problem. The range is fantastic on this unit, we never had a connection problem even in our backyard. We also did not have any interference with our home internet network. We usually have the unit plugged in most of the time (we have 2 power cords, one purchased seperately for another 10 dollars) so I could not comment on the battery life. In terms of construction we've dropped it twice from tableheight and the unit still works! We will be more careful noting other users had the antenna snapp off. For us, this has been our best baby product investment since day 1.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with this monitor
Reviews.Author: Myrto
Reviews.Content: This is our first baby monitor and I am very pleased with the purchase. The monitor screen size is on the smaller size (motorola offers a 3.5inch model) but with the smaller screen, the whole unit is small and light enough for better portability. We are planning on 2 add-on cameras already to keep an eye in our garage and living room. The night vision gives off a dim red glow on the IR bulbs (which might scare my daughter when she gets older) will be a good deterrent to intruders!We were cautious on the beeping problem as we read from past reviews and it's true that this problem has been resolved already. We haven't had any beeping problems in automute, low battery or VOX stand by mode.Would have been just perfect if it came in another color than blue.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I have only had this for a few days but it has worked great so far. I agree with other reveiwers that it feels "cheap" but I really don't care since it works! I have not had any issues so far.

Reviews.Title: A nice product with a handful of flaws
Reviews.Author: Corvin
Reviews.Content: We have used this device with our newborn for almost half of a year now. So far it's been a great step forward compared to audio only monitors. Motion detection works fine and the device quickly goes out of standby when it detects a slightest movement or sound - just enough to let you see that your kid is waking up or trying to roll over. We liked the night vision mode as well - the picture is crisp enough to make out everything that is needed.We have encountered two major problems with this device:1. The battery life is not long (which is to be expected with 2.4GHz and a screen like this) - only a few hours, but what's worse is that battery dies without any warning. Once too often we found ourselves thinking that the baby is fast asleep only to discover moments later that the monitor is turned off and the baby is wide awake and seeking attention actively. So, the device is only reliable with wall socket connection.2. The device interferes with WiFi networks when turned on (either both sides or only the transmitter). What's worse, it does this in completely unpredictable fashion - you can work with no problems for hours and then all of a sudden your devices will be able to connect to the network but will not be able to download anything or will download very slowly. It took me a few months and a trip to a country house where I was trying to set up a WiFi network to finally narrow down the problem.Otherwise the device is good and I bought one for present to my sister :)

Reviews.Title: Who knew $100 still bought crap!
Reviews.Author: Dayna E.
Reviews.Content: It started acting up the first day I got it. It freezes, the sound skips in and out (not because of the vox feature), wont turn on, then wont turn off...the list goes on. I kept at it giving it lots of time to work out but I guess Im going to have to return it. I'm very irritated.

Reviews.Title: Finally!!
Reviews.Author: D. Singh "DS"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this unit and took advantage of one day shipping thru discover card. The product arrived in a day and was very simple to install. It took us about 3~5 minutes to unpack and start using it. The overall quality of the product looks and feels plasticky however it gets stuff done. The coverage is excellent. I had no issues with signal while sitting in the basement, while our child was on the second level room. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: So cool!
Reviews.Author: Diana C Eckstein
Reviews.Content: This thing is awesome!  Love the night vision!  And it was very easy to set up, as well.  Now we don't have to turn off fans or other sounds in order to hear every little whimper or cry, because we can tell right away if she is crying or if she gets up (or if she even budges, for that matter).  Would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: No nonsense - it just works
Reviews.Author: gchart
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for features that you'll never use, look elsewhere.  If you want an inexpensive video monitor that gets the job done, this is what you need.  Simple to use.  Good range.  The night vision even works much better than anticipated.  If you're thinking about buying this, stop now and just hit "add to cart".

Reviews.Title: Good, affordable video monitor
Reviews.Author: M. Burningham "gramma on the go"
Reviews.Content: I shopped around for quite a while to find an affordable video monitor. This one is pretty basic but works very well. It is quiet and the picture is quite clear. If you need a color monitor, buy something else. My daughter notices that the baby looks right at the camera because of the little red light (she thinks) that shows the monitor is on. It is easy to mount on the wall, out of the reach of a curious baby. We've only had it a couple of months and so far it works great and suits her needs just fine. Now I wonder how I raised my children without all these gadgets!!

Reviews.Title: awesome baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Jill Oldham
Reviews.Content: This was the 3rd baby monitor I purchased. It is the cheapest, easiest and actually works! I have 4 cats and a dog, my concern was I wouldn't be able to keep an eye on my little Brody in his crib with his door shut. This baby monitor is perfect and I'm very happy with my purchase. I've been using every night for 2 weeks and have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: BEEP! BEEP! BEEP!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I gave this review the title of this review because when the video times out, you hear a LOUD, OBNOXIOUS beep! This feature is EXTREMELY annoying at night because the monitor is hypersensitive (which may seem like a good thing for a baby monitor, trust me it's not), it comes on when the baby moves in the crib without crying/ being awake. This monitor is virtually impossible to use at night for someone wanting a good night's sleep. I am thinking of getting one without the beep to use instead. BTW- If I remember correctly, this is not supposed to interfere with wireless, but my that's not true. My husband had to reconfigure our wireless because we couldn't use it with the baby monitor on :(. If the company got rid of the beep and really made the monitor to not interfere with the wireless then this would be a GREAT product.....BUT because of these issues I would NOT recommend this product :(.

Reviews.Title: Works well with a word of WARNING
Reviews.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Reviews.Content: This thing works well as intended.HERE'S THE WARNING: I used our EMF meter to measure the amount of elector-magnetic field.  It's very strong near the camera, when plugged in, even if the camera is turned OFF. The reading is around 4-5 at my baby's head, which is about 1 foot from the camera.Sure, there are many gadgets in the typical household that emits strong EM or radio waves.  But this is the only one that's near the baby's head. And I could be paranoid. But better err on the safe side when it comes to our babies, right?MY ADVICE: Use it when you have to, but unplug it or move the camera away from the crib when not in use.  Don't leave it plugged in next to your baby's head all the time.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Newparents
Reviews.Content: This gets the job done at a great price. Unless you want to view your baby in HD while he or she is sleeping, this is a good buy for any new parent.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Johnny Colorado
Reviews.Content: We finally got a video camera for our daughter. This one works great!  The picture is very clear .  A friend with a more expensive system made a comment that our picture was more clear.  The screen automatically turns off when there is no movement. The only complaint is that the sound is a little muffled.  But we chose a camera not audio monitor.  This is a great price for a complete video system. We are very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor
Reviews.Author: J. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor because I keep my new granddaughter. It has saved me numerous steps to check on the baby. It is clear enough to see the baby's movement and breathing. Also pops right on with the least little cry. Now she is 5 months old and I can watch her waken and play in her crib before she decides to call for Nana.

Reviews.Title: Everything we need and nothing more
Reviews.Author: K. E. Miller
Reviews.Content: I don't write a lot of reviews, but I'm so impressed with this device that I'm compelled to.  It pretty much does one thing and does it flawlessly.Highlights:* Super crisp, clear video.* Sensitive audio* Very easy to set up* Non unnecessary features cluttering up the interface.  Turn it on, it works.Downsides:* Somewhat flimsy construction.  We've broken off the antenna mast housing twice, though each time it's gone back on with superglue just fine.
