I'm shocked we haven't broken the belt clip/stand.* The IR lamps for the night vision are surprisingly bright in a dim room.  We've taken to covering all but one of them with electrical tape to make it less distracting.* The camera can be challenging to mount properly, especially when travelling.Overall, nothing touches this for the price, but even if cost is no object it's a great device.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Tone More
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife since I am always away from home, and she really loves this. She complains that I'm not part of the team helping out on taking care of our kids so this was a really good investment. It keeps a pair of eyes and ears in our daughter's room. It's a really simple product and I love how we get all this under $100 with free shipping. I was a bit hesitant on the beeping problem that seems to persist amongst a few of the reviews, but as some other reviewers say, the new version has this fixed. We have absolutely no problems with this unit.If you have any children under 3 years old and they don't sleep in the same room as you, this is a must-get.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: K. Berg
Reviews.Content: I guess you get what you pay for. I purchased this monitor because it was the cheapest with a digital screen. There are three main problems with this monitor.1. It beeps every time it "goes to sleep" or the baby makes a peep which is really annoying.2. It is cheaply made out of plasitc and it too light. This makes it hard to put it in a good position to get video of the baby.3. It always said it was out of range even when the monitor and camera were in the same room.We got the Sony Baby Call instead which doesn't have video, but it is a good, basic monitor.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Video Monitor
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: Very nice product. Video quality is good, I cannot say excellent. Sound quality is excellent. Did not observe any interference with other wireless devices. Night vision is working properly. Battery is not lasting long, but I did not expect that it would.Delivery is accurate - as promised by the seller.I would recommend it to other buyers.

Reviews.Title: Great moniter for the price
Reviews.Author: Amy "homesteadblessings"
Reviews.Content: I have been using this moniter for a couple of weeks now and do like it. It is a good moniter for the price and for watching my 3 year old upstairs where I can't hear him. It does the job. I have not missed one time when he needed me or fell out of his little bed :0) that being said there are a few drawbacks but not enough to make me wish I had bought a different moniter.1) the receiver is bright, even at it's lowest setting.2) I keep the camera on it's stand on the bedside table but I wish it had a rubber gasket or something, or some way to hold it in place and prevent it from being moved so I did not need to readjust it every night.3) It DOES interfere with our wifi. We run all our tv's and computers with wifi. It is really not a problem for me bedcause I just turn on the moniter at the end of the night after we all go to bed.As I said I am very happy with the product but you should know the cons before buying :0)

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Carebear
Reviews.Content: I got this because the price was good and the reviews were great, and I am not disappointed.  The image quality is great, and is perfect for keeping an eye on my little one whether it's day or night.  I didn't think the night vision would be so clear, but it really is, and I think my daughter even likes the little red infrared lights on the camera unit.  It's super easy to move around and carry around the monitor.  Also, regarding the beeping sound it makes when it turns off, that's ONLY for a certain mode, which you can disable, so I never have that problem.  If you're planning on leaving it plugged in for long stretches, then no need for that power saving mode anyway.  Haven't had any interference and even use it outside on my deck. Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: I love this monitor
Reviews.Author: Laura Mader
Reviews.Content: I am really happy with this monitor. I was a little worried since at $99 (on sale) it was much cheaper than most of the other video monitors on the market but it is great. The picture is great and the range is excellent. You can go all the way to the back of our fairly big back yard and still see a perfectly clear picture from the second story of our house. I would definitely recommend this one to anyone who needs a good monitor and doesn't want to spend hundreds of bucks.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera/monitor
Reviews.Author: Blair T. Williams
Reviews.Content: This product is a great size and works wonderfully especially for the price.  Alot of the monitors out there are really over-priced and this one is a bargain for what it does.  Very good picture and there is no constant feedback on the monitor when your little one is sleeping & not making any type of noise.I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Andrax "Snowbull"
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor as an upgrade from our black&white; Tv-set type video monitor. This is much more portable, and the color makes a big difference. I've looked at a couple of options from the apple store that syncs to your iphone or ipad, but I've seen from reviews that they aren't mature yet and have alot setup problems.I like the night vision on this camera too. The range is excellent, covering our whole 2000ft appartment. I didn't have any problems with interference with my home internet signal neither after checking with speedtest app.The power consumption is so low on this little device I just leave it on all the time without the VOX.A nice upgrade for so little $$$

Reviews.Title: Great little monitor
Reviews.Author: Valerie Ennis "Christian's Mommy"
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor for our second baby after reading all the great reviews on it.  At first, I was disappointed as it continuously shut on and off but I called customer service and they sent me a new one that works wonderfully!! No interference with our other monitor at all and a very clear picture.  I was really impressed with the service I received, too.  The only reason I didn't give this monitor five stars is because I can't hear my daughter breathing like on my Summer Infant monitor.

Reviews.Title: Strongly recommended!
Reviews.Author: Z. Guo "Z"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product a week ago and have been using it since then. This is really an amazing product and it's much cheaper compared to other similar products. I was considering Summers and Motorola and had second thoughts about this brand as I have never heard of it. From the product pictures, Motorola's night view doesn't seem to be very clear to me. So I decided to try this one. It turns out that this Infant Optics has VERY clear night view and it does an excellent job in picking up baby's sound. The VOX function saves energy and make my sleep uninterrupted if the baby is at sleep. Before I purchased it, I noticed many people mention the product looks "cheap", so I had very low expectation about its appearance originally. After we received it, I was very surprised and I like the baby blue appearance a lot. The light weight design makes it very convenient to carry around or to be put into the pocket. The camera is also very easy to install. We simply tied it up to one corner of the crib and it gives us great view of the baby!I would strongly recommend this monitor to any new moms!

Reviews.Title: Good baby monitor for money
Reviews.Author: JBda12
Reviews.Content: This monitor is excellent! I spent alot of time looking around for the perfect monitor, but since there are so many available now it can be a tough choice to get the right one for our needs. I notice that a video monitor can range from $80 all the way to $250+ but we were looking for a something for good value. This isn't a must-have item if you have children, but once you own one, you really can't go back without one.We also considered IP cameras but we've read from reviews that the setup can be complicated and most of them have video delays. I do not want to know my baby is crying with a delay - 10 seconds after she starts crying!Overall I am very pleased with our purchase. We were worried about wifi interference but we didn't get any. We were also worried about the loud beeping noise that some reviews noted, but we didn't get that neither. The version I got seemed to have everything sorted out.I had some issues with pairing our second camera unit so we called up customer service and they were extremely helpful. It's nice to know what our kids are doing in their room upstairs!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Stacey
Reviews.Content: I received this super quick (less than 24 hours after ordering!) It is very easy to use. Just plug it in. Great image no matter what lighting. I also love that it stays on mute, unless the baby makes noise. I always have a radio on or air filter and it blocks it out. The range is great in our house, sound is clear. The image is good. I can see the baby clearly, even in a dark room. I can watch his breathing, smiling and see when he opens his eyes. The price is wonderful too!

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics 2.4ghz Digital Video Baby Monitor.
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: This Product does everything it says it does, and that's a nice surprise!  However this Product is delicate so my advice is to consider this frailty carefully, and also I would recommend you buy just the 1 Camera before buying another.  At first I thought 2 Cameras would be best, and later I was very glad I held off on a second Camera.  The 1 Camera only needs to be moved around, and this is very easy to do.  Consider that the Camera must remain plugged into wall power at all times to work, and the hand held Display Monitor is portable with a rechargeable Lithium Ion Battery.  Display is very high quality, sound excellent, and IR night vision is superior visualization.  Product shipped new in it's original box inside Amazon box in prompt manner.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value! We love this thing!
Reviews.Author: Jason M. Shaw
Reviews.Content: Being the cheapskate I am, I was intrigued by a $100 video monitor with VOX. After reading other reviews, we pulled the trigger.I must admit that I am not familiar with any other montitors, but I don't know what more we'd want. It's not ugly, it works perfectly, and the VOX is a godsend.Our unit does not do the annoying beep you may have read about when it goes to VOX, but it does brighten up some on the video monitor to announce it is going in to VOX mode. Slightly annoying and slightly jarring, but that's literally my only gripe.We have no WiFi interference, either, and it will broadcast from the top floor (two story home) to our basement with zero signal degredation.I highly recommend you check out this monitor!

Reviews.Title: Great budget video monitor, but annoying WiFi interference
Reviews.Author: JLP
Reviews.Content: I already own an audio monitor (NTM-910YLW - Sony Baby Call Nursery Monitor), which I love, but now that my son is more mobile and sleeping through the night, I wanted the peace of mind of being able to see what he's doing in his crib without having to go in there and potentially wake him.For me, this is almost the perfect baby monitor.  Here's what I like:*Easy set up - Plug it in, turn it on, and you are good to go.  The camera unit also mounts easily to the wall, which is great if you're looking for a "bird's eye" view of your baby in the crib.*Decent image - The image is clear enough and refreshes often enough that I can actually see my son breathing, even in night vision mode.*You can mute the sound while leaving the video on - My kid is old enough now that I don't want to hear every breath, grunt or roll.  I like that I can leave the video on at night without having to listen to every little thing going on in there.  Surprisingly, a lot of the video monitors that I looked at do not have a video on/sound off feature.*Excellent value - Seriously.  For $99, I'm really impressed.Here's what I don't like:*The monitor totally interferes with my WiFi signal - I generally find that if I want to use wireless, I have to turn the monitor off. This isn't a big issue for me; I generally just turn the monitor on as my son is falling asleep, if I start to hear him fussing, or before I go to bed to see that he's doing okay.  But if I wanted to leave the monitor on continuously while he slept, especially for naps during the day, the WiFi interference would drive me crazy.*The parent unit doesn't stand well - For $99, I didn't expect super high quality plastic or design, but it bugs me that the parent unit does not stand well at all.  I'm constantly knocking it over (especially at night, when I'm bleary eyed and reaching for the monitor), and it's fallen over spontaneously a few times.  Not a deal breaker, but annoying nonetheless.*The VOX feature comes on automatically each time you turn the monitor on - This is really just a small nit (and likely individual to my preferences), but I wish I could just change the default to leave the VOX feature off.  Every time I turn the monitor on (which, because of the WiFi interference, is often), I have to toggle the VOX feature off.On the whole, I'd recommend this monitor to someone who is looking for a budget video monitor, but beware of the WiFi issues.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor especially for the price!
Reviews.Author: Always Star-wishing
Reviews.Content: I was surprised how clear the black and white monitor was in complete darkness!! To keep the monitor on (but the sound off until there is sound), push the buttons at the top on each side together twice (shows VOX on, and then VOX off at the bottom of the screen). The monitor will stay on, which I wanted so I could just glance over. The sound won't turn on with small noises like rolling over, but will if she cries or talks. Very happy with purchase since I can't hear her without it before I go to bed. Really put me at ease. Great price for a video monitor!!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, but wrecks my WiFi network!
Reviews.Author: oddhead
Reviews.Content: The Infant Optics DXR-5 system could not be easier to setup: literally plug it in and turn it on!  The range works great (all the way through and around our 2-story home, in all rooms and outside), the video is clear, the audio is loud and clear, and the infrared makes even a pitch black room easy to see.  My only (and MAJOR) complaint is the system's interference on my home wireless network!  While this Amazon page says "use with other 2.4gh devices without worry," the instructions with the unit clearly state "may cause interference with home networks using 2.4gh signals."  Alas, this is the case with ours, and it's no little "bump" in our network:  with the unit on, we drop from 20mb to less than 2mbs (sometimes a complete disconnect).  While we'll keep the unit for nighttime use, this issue renders it useless during the days when I work from home...perhaps having an option to change the channel for the signal would help with the problem?

Reviews.Title: Little handy camera
Reviews.Author: Kat Paw
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera system. Bought it after being recommended by a friend.It's got everything I needed and the video quality is better than most of the monitors I've seen. Audio quality is average. It doesn't clamp to a crib so I had to move my table near the crib to get a clear view.The VOX system is nice because once my daughter wakes up I can finish off whatever I am doing to look after her.I'm not technical oriented but I didn't have to turn to my husband once to set this up, and I'm proud of that!

Reviews.Title: not that great!
Reviews.Author: Bens mom "firsttimemomtoben"
Reviews.Content: I purchases this monitor bases on all the positive reviews. I will say the video quality is great, nice screen size and liked this part of it very much. however the audio was horrible. the monitor would make a loud humming sound while it was on and I could hardly hear my baby when he was making noise. also when the monitor went on VOX mode, it would not activate unless my baby was crying loud. For this reason I had to return it, I wanted to be able to hear my baby if he was waking up and making noises, etc. I will also add the monitor would not hold a charge very long, I had to have it plugged in most of the time and that was a pain.

Reviews.Title: Core basics needs
Reviews.Author: JCSlyn
Reviews.Content: Video baby monitors used to cost a fortune, and was monopolized by big brands meaning the prices were never competitive. Now it great to see you can get a good one for less than 100 dollars. I've never heard of this brand, but their monitor is decent. Not top of the line, but it works as advertised. It's digital, it's got good range, and gives me video and audio presentation of where I want to see and hear. I keep it in my daughter's room at night, and move it down to the living room during the day. It really is a plug-and-play system. It's a good monitor if you are after for value.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING QUALITY & PRICE!
Reviews.Author: Kelcie
Reviews.Content: For the price of this monitor, it has amazing quality! This is one of the cheapest video monitors I found, and the only one I found with good reviews. I cant believe it's so cheap for how well it works. The quality of the video is perfect, even in pitch black it looks like theres a light on in the room. I was very surprised at how well the night vision worked. Slight downfall is the sound doesnt work very well, its automatically voice activated so the only time the sound will come on is if the baby actually cries or makes a somewhat loud noise unlike audio monitors which you can here the covers moving or baby breathing or something. But considering this is a video monitor it doesnt really make a big deal that the sound isnt great..not to say you shouldnt get this monitor if your worried about the sound! It does work fine! I'm just not particularly fond of the voice activation setup, i prefer the sound be constantly on. But the video is so amazingly clear, i guess you dont really need sound anyways since you can always see your little ones every move! I would highly recommend buying this monitor over any others because I'm guessing any other monitor around this price range will not be as great of quality and you really dont need to buy anything more expensive than this one because this one has everything you need in a video monitor..including multiple camera function if you wanted to buy the extra cameras for it which I definitley will! HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Ginger
Reviews.Content: Overall, this is a good product. The picture quality is very good and it is very light. It also has the ability to handle at least 3 cameras (each cam. sold separately). Also, the device is very quiet and doesn't omit static noise-at all! Things that I did not like about the camera was that the quality of the camera seems very cheap. In addition to the cheap quality feel, I didn't like how it constantly put itself into sleep mode to save battery power. It states that it will turn back on when the baby starts crying, which is true. However, the microphone doesn't pick up the baby's sounds unless they are really loud. Unfortunately, if the baby is awake and talking quietly, the microphone will not pick this up. In conclusion, this camera is very good for the price; however, I would never pay more than $100 for it (the price that I paid).

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love this camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Schlabach "AmazonObsessed!"
Reviews.Content: After having a normal, sound-only Graco monitor for my daughter, we thought it would great to keep using. And it would...had my son not been the type to get mad if you check on him while awake and leave, or wake up the second you turn the knob to check on him! As a terrible sleeper to begin with, I couldn't deal with him waking up all the time since he knew when I came in the room. This camera is amazing! It took 5 minutes to hook it up and has the most amazing picture and sound quality. I LOVE that it turns off automatically if there is no sound going on in his room -- since we are tired of listening to the white sound machine noise after 2.5 years with our daughter. :)It's a great price, perfect size of monitor and has phenomenal picture quality. I would highly recommend it. I'm even considering getting the additional camera to put in my daughter's room too.

Reviews.Title: Not so impressed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this b/c the reviews seemed OK and the price was pretty good. I was quite disappointed. The range that the detail indicates for the monitor is not true to word, in my opinion. I am continually having issues with this monitor going out of range. I think it should indicate that in multiple floor homes (meaning one upper floor) the monitor basically won't work unless the video monitor is by a window and the receiver is also by a window. If your wearing this around the house it basically goes out of range, 80% of the time. I also think if you live in a home made of anything other than wood, say concrete, it seriously limits where this works.Overall I am quite disappointed with this BUT for now it will do.

Reviews.Title: Very good for us... !
Reviews.Author: Miami-mamma
Reviews.Content: We have a 9 month old and have used this for the past few weeks. It is very good for us. We can see what he's up to and has made monitoring him during the night much easier (knowing when to go in or when to wait to see if he will settle down). I wish we had gotten this earlier. if we'd seen it early on at such an excellent price, the first 8.5 months would have been a lot easier on mama (and daddy)!Infantoptics customer service is very helpful also. A problem we had with the power-saving mode was resolved immediately. It's customer service on par with Nordstrom for sure.I would give it 5 stars if the resolution were a bit better (we have it mounted on the wall above the crib - about 4 feet away from baby usually?) - but for the price difference, we are very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: OK value for the price
Reviews.Author: Krystal "Krystal"
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews, I was expecting so much more from this product.  Based on the cost compared to similar brands, I would probably still by this one, though.  My main issue is that the night vision is not very clear if the room is really dark.  It looks very grainy/pixelated. The picture quality is actually a step down from my older balck and white sunshine video monitor.  Also, the voice activation is not very sensitive.  If my baby is awake and talking quietly, the monitor doesn't activate.  She has to be close to screaming before it comes on.

Reviews.Title: Reliable signal and doesn't cut out
Reviews.Author: Corine
Reviews.Content: We got a $250 summer infant monitor prior getting this. The summer infant was OK while it decided to 'stay in range' so we couldn't stand it being that unreliable. We returned it and got this infant optics monitor. I only had this for 4 days and already I really like it because it didn't have the range problem that the summer infant did. This doesn't have the camera panning function (which is a big con) and isn't as high tech as the summer but atleast it works. I'm glad I can own a reliable device where I can see my daughter without having black spots in the house. The picture and audio is similar to the summer. The VOX mode is too complicated so we leave it on all the time with the adapter plugged in. If you do not intend to keep it running long term on batteries then the VOX mode is really useless.

Reviews.Title: Can not live without this!
Reviews.Author: Vlad Z.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this last week and it got to my doorstep in 2 days. I've been researching baby monitors for a while and I was looking for one that wasn't too expensive. I eneded up choosing from 3 lowcost monitors and this Infant Optics video monitor seemed like the best bet so I thought to give it a try.Once it got this it was pretty easy to set up. We conntect the two power cables and placed the camera next to the crib and I was so surprised with the audio and video quality for a $99 monitor. As other reviewers said, the viewing angle was limited and you don't get pan or zoom so we ended up placing the camera further away so we got the whole crib in the frame. The IR night vision works as it is suppose to but it ends up being black and white.I was most concerned with the interference issue with my wifi but it didn't affect it at all. I use an Apple airport extreme and I've read from forums that older models of routers can be a problem but this applies to any 2.4ghz monitors.The unit looks a bit like a toy rather than a surveillence system, but for $99 I don't expect much!This is the one to get if you are buying with a budget.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR5
Reviews.Author: Connie Rouse "Voodoo"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic baby monitor. The is the best at it's price range. It's got 2.4ghz (NOT DECT), good video, good audio, user friendly interface... what more can I say? One thing I ought to mention is that the camera unit with the lens is not portable, but the monitor unit (with the screen) is. Do not expect to move the camera around to places without a AC outlet.I got the add on camera with it to so I've got 2 camera units. You switch cameras by pressing on a button. I was hoping that there was a feature to show a split screen display of both cameras at the same time but this isn't available on this monitor.Overall, you can't get a better deal than this at this price range.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this monitor
Reviews.Author: D. Dale
Reviews.Content: This is the best video baby monitor I've owned so far. The unit provides a crystal clear video at night and during the day. I have 2 cameras and they work by switching channel to channel with the button on the monitor. I can watch my baby in his crib or in his playroom without any trouble now! I encouraged 2 of my friends to get this as well to grab one while the sale lasts. At $100 you really could not go wrong (and even if it does you can return it for free). I've never heard of this brand but everything looks quite promising - packaging, quality of their stuff, and a simple operation so I don't need to google technical terms that I don't understand (like I had to when I set up my IP camera I bought). The VOX mode is defaulted to ON everytime after you switch the unit off and back on which can be a hassle at times because before you know it, the unit cuts out to save power until it detects noise again.

Reviews.Title: work but not so good
Reviews.Author: nma
Reviews.Content: It's an excellent option for the price but you can't hear the baby all the time, the sound activation/desactivation is automatic, for the money paid is good we can see our babies on video.Good but not so good. I can't complain in the minute we installed it, worked fine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Sheila Lewison "Always Ready"
Reviews.Content: I have had this baby monitor for about 6 months now and it has been working great. I am a working mum so it is nice to be able to do my work whilst having the baby monitor next to me to know my little one is okay as well. One of the major concern I had was interference because I've heard from friends that these 2.4ghz systems may have problems with the internet. Luckily, this never interfered with my home network.The picture is extremely clear, and I had doubts about whether the night vision would be too but it has proved to be very clear as well. This baby monitor provides you with everything you would really need for a monitor, and the price range is very suitable in deed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Janny B "Perfect mom"
Reviews.Content: Excellent monitor. Zero interference or static which is wonderful for the price. Picture is clear and audio is good. I spent enough time buying and returning baby monitors. I've owned a summer infant monitor from toys r us and there is a constant buzzing sound and it absolutely drive me nuts. I returned it after a week. There wasn't any buzzing sound on this baby monitor luckily. Only wished that I their add-on camera units were in stock earlier.I'm glad I finally got one that is nice and afforable - AND WORKS!

Reviews.Title: Good so far
Reviews.Author: Jackie Stormberg
Reviews.Content: Bought a pretty expensive monitor when we had our first child and it definitely let us down, so after seeing good reviews on this one we decided we would try this one. An obvious PLUS for being at lower end of the pricing scale on the market. My son is four months old and we have finally placed him out of the crib and into his own room. It is great to be able to have this next to us so that we can see him safe and sound next door. Really easy to set up and the battery seems to be OK but I keep it pluggeed in most of the time. My part of this monitor is that it is so silent after a while without any noise. It works well all around our house. We use it mostly at night which is great with good infrared night vision. It looks a bit like a toy but it definitely has been working great.

Reviews.Title: A basic monitor that is half the price of video mons out there
Reviews.Author: Mommy Dawn
Reviews.Content: This monitor is very cute-it's very light and small yet has a screen that is definitely a sufficient size. I've seen baby monitors with a screen so small it's nearly pointless to have a video monitor instead of an audio monitor. My husband is a tech geek so we have a lot of gadgets and gizmos lying around our house, however this has created no interference with the monitor. Video imagery is very clean and crisp but night vision is only in black and white. Audio is so so. I would like to see how the pan+tilt+zoom feature works for those more expensive monitors but I do not think it is worth a extra $80+. This Infant Optics monitor is a basic solution for parents. We have friends who have monitors that play music and nursery songs but we really didn't see the point of investing more money for petty ad-ons like that...we are very happy!

Reviews.Title: The best in this budget
Reviews.Author: TWEEDY
Reviews.Content: If you don't have unlimited cash to spend on a baby monitor, then you want something that is affordable and WORTH the money. This is a great option! I've bought a summer infant monitor from toys r us and returned it after the screen cracked on the first week I used it. It was $200 and absolutely NOT worth the money. I came online in hope to find a cheaper altenative and I came across this infant optics monitor. This monitor surely has made life with my baby a lot easier and I am very grateful for this. Not only it was cheap, it came quickly and had everything I wanted. It is very portable with a nice, soft looking design (a lot of other baby monitors we found just looked so mechanical and cold) and I love that the volume is adjustable which sounds like a simple feature, but can make a world of a difference when you have a baby screaming for no reason next door. There is nothing to complain about with the image quality or reception. If you are looking for a baby monitor that is in the $80-130 range, this is it. You don't really need to spend a few hundred dollars on something you won't be using for life.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: I am so thankful that I found this monitor and saved ~$100!  I have no regrets and it does and has everything that I was expecting.  After reviewing so many other monitors and waiting for them to go on sale, finding this monitor has been a great relief!

Reviews.Title: Love it! Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lou Leblanc
Reviews.Content: We LOVE this! A definitely worthwhile investment for the peace of mind you get from a video monitor. We used to own 2 sound monitor systems, and decided to step up to a video one for our upcoming 3rd one. Since I'm currently unemployed thanks to the economy, we were not ready to spend a fortune on the baby monitor. We settled on this after seeing an advertisement on the Parents%babies mag and are extremely happy with our purchase. For $100, you get a a static free, intereference free, sercure video baby monitor. You can't get much more with $100.

Reviews.Title: WiFi Interference
Reviews.Author: B. Reeves
Reviews.Content: I will say this product feels cheap; the plastic, the corners, the antenna, everything about feels cheap. That being said, the picture and sound quality is surprisingly good. I do not like the "stand" the monitor has. All it is is the belt clip hanging loosely until it hits a hard surface then it acts like a stand. My BIG problem with this is WiFi interference. We hooked up the monitor, put our baby to sleep, and had the monitor sitting next to us. My wife and I got on our iPads/iPhones and we had SUPER slow internet. I did some research (using 3G) and found that the 2.4GHz frequency which is constantly changing channels to be secure, can interfere with wireless routers. I am sending this product back and probably getting a new Levana monitor because our old one did not mess with our WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Interferes with WiFi Network
Reviews.Author: R. Sandridge
Reviews.Content: This monitor is ok, but it totally disrupts my wifi network. I can't surf the internet at all from my phone when I'm near the monitor. Also, there should be an audible warning before the monitor's battery dies. It just shuts off when the battery is dead without any warning.

Reviews.Title: only worked for one week
Reviews.Author: jenchung
Reviews.Content: This camera barely worked for one week. Kept getting out of range signal when I was only 10 feet away. Think this also interfers with our Summer camera we have in our son's room as we were getting out of signal notice on the Summer. But once the Infant Optics video stopped working after one week, I haven't had any problems with the Summer camera. It's cheaply made as a lot of reviews point out. It's also poorly designed so can only mount in one position to get a full view of the crib. I am surprised it got the good reviews as it really didn't work for us.

Reviews.Title: Not that good actually
Reviews.Author: Lana
Reviews.Content: I got this camera only over a year ago and at first was very happy with it.  The picture is clear, worked great.  A few month ago started to notice that only after 2-3 hours my parent unit is dying and red charge light doesn't go on.  After talking to rep via email, have to admit very fast response and very informing, got a suggestion to get new power cord.  Got it from Amazon as well for $15.99.  It made red light light up and charge the battery I guess, but didn't help much with parent unit working wireless for longer than 2 hours. Today, the unit turned of after 45 min and it was charging for over 27 hours.  New battery is $25 here on amazon. So, now only using the unit from May 2012, I already invested extra $40 for unit that cost $99... Don't think this should be happening only a year later. Would recommend to buy another video monitor, that works for longer than 1 year.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Brian P Midtbo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor for my newborn daughter after reading the reviews and liked it at first even though it feels a little cheap but the price was right. I did not like that at night the receiver was so bright and there is no way to turn the screen off. After a month of use it stopped getting reception from her bedroom to ours so we had to move the monitor and after another week the volume button broke and would automatically just turn all the way down so there was no sound and at 2 months of use the camera completely stopped working. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Not as Good as I Thought
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: I was very happy when I first opened this camera. It seemed to work great for about 3 days. All of a sudden it would not keep a charge. It keeps turning itself off and on. I thought maybe it was because I need the other cameras so I ordered 2 more. They would not pare with the unit. I tried everything.Since the company offers no contact information other than an email address I assume they must have issues with these units. Personally if your going to trust your child with a monitor, better make sure it works. This one is not reliable.I have returned the extra 2 cameras and would return the first monitor and camera too if I could.

Reviews.Title: No good!
Reviews.Author: Barb
Reviews.Content: This monitor is such a disappointment.  We needed a new one after our Summer Infant Day & Night handheld night vision stopped working.  We did some searching and since this one had a great price and great reviews, we went for it.  The video quality is very grainy and the sound is so horrible.  How others can give it such a good review is beyond me.  We kept it in our sons room for all of 30 minutes and went back in and hooked our "broken" one back up.  Basically, we'd rather have good sound quality over both poor sound AND video.  The sound was just so garbled.  Also, you can't toggle the video on or off.  It stays on until there is no sound for 3 minutes and then turns off.  Then it flashes right back on when there is a sound made.  Overall, this is a REALLY poor product.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS INCREDIBLY DANGEROUS!
Reviews.Author: Mimi
Reviews.Content: I bought this about 2 and half months ago, and it worked really well. Imagine my horror and disgust when this item EXPLODED in a cloud of burning metal and smoke just 2 feet away from my baby five minutes ago! My child could have been killed, blinded or worse, never mind anyone else in the house. TERRIFYING. I called amazon and immediately got a refund, but would urge anyone NOT TO BUY THIS PRODUCT. Obviously the battery has a serious fault (this is what blew up), but there is NO excuse for providing a dangerous item to the public. I now have a large black burn in our polished wood floor and will be calling this company for compensation. PLEASE don't put this product ANYWHERE near a child. DO NOT BUY.

Reviews.Title: Good video quality but missing some key features
Reviews.Author: Evan
Reviews.Content: First off, the video quality is great.  You also have a lot of flexibility with the camera positioning which makes it easy to find a good location.  However, there were 2 key issues we had which made us send it back.  First, there's no way to manually turn the screen on or off.  You have to wait for the monitor to turn off the video itself after 2 minutes of inactivity.  That doesn't work if you have a noise source in the room like an air conditioner, in which case the monitor would never turn off.  In addition, there are no lights on the monitor to indicate sound level if the video is off...although I suppose that's a moot point since you can't turn the video off manually.  We returned this and got a motorolla instead.

Reviews.Title: Extremely disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: This product is a piece of junk. It only worked for five minutes.  As soon as I plugged it in it claimed it was out of range and it was only about fifty feet away.  It would work for a minute or two and then completely stop working or start buzzing and saying it was out of range.  Turning it off and on sometimes got it to work but again, only for a few minutes.  It's going back as soon as I can package it back up!

Reviews.Title: Bad investment
Reviews.Author: wuggie_norple
Reviews.Content: I had given this product a 5-star review when I first got it after just trying it out and playing with it a little.I take it back.  After finally using it when the baby moved to her crib a few months later, I realized what a piece of junk this is.It did indeed interfere with my wifi - always.  We couldn't use the computer or watch Netflix after the baby went to bed.  I tried adjusting my router settings and ended up crashing my entire network. I had to get a new router. After that, we just dealt with that problem.  But, the biggest problems were yet to come:The "sleep" mode stopped working.  When the unit is on and all is quiet and the baby is sleeping, it's supposed to go black and quiet and into sleep mode, and when the baby makes a sound, the screen comes awake and you can hear sounds and see again.  That way, when you are sleeping, you don't have to have a mini TV screen glowing in your bedroom all night.  Well, it stopped going into sleep mode, so we had just that:  a buzzing sound and a glowing screen in our face ALL NIGHT LONG. So, we compensated by putting the monitor face down and would have the volume turned up so that if we heard anything, we'd just look at the monitor.Well, that worked alright, UNTIL, the sound died, too just a few weeks later. So, all we had was a (quiet) picture that showed all the time.  How will that wake us up at night?  This was all after a total of about 3 months of use.So, we went back to good old fashioned sound-only monitors.

Reviews.Title: Lasted 13 months
Reviews.Author: MERIDETH
Reviews.Content: Up until three days ago I would have given the Infant Optics DXR-5 baby monitor four stars. We have been using it every nap and during the night for the past 13 months since our baby was born. About a month ago, it started showing the "out of signal coverage" screen on the monitor randomly when it had been connected just fine, but then three days ago we were no longer able to connect. The camera and monitor turn on, but no longer pair. Obviously this is a huge problem and we have been resorting to terrible free phone apps that just relay sound until our new non-Infant Optics baby monitor arrives.I expect products to last more than 13 months.

Reviews.Title: Don't believe the hype
Reviews.Author: hozay09
Reviews.Content: Like many things I purchase I do extensive research. While looking up baby monitors I decided on this model due to high ratings, price and features. Very disappointed with this purchase.Problems:1. Battery is awful. Now device will NOT stay on unless plugged. This thing isn't even a month old!2. Camera resolution is awful. Don't let the stock photos fool you.3. Feels extremely cheap. Slightest tough and it moves.4. I live in a small house with the room barely a hundred feet away and camera constantly goes "out of range"Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: L J Henderson
Reviews.Content: We got this monitor in August 2012 and have been happy with it.  A few weeks ago I dropped it the monitor and the antenna broke off.  It still worked but the range was only about 10-20 feet.  I called their tech support and was just looking to find out if it could be repaired or if we could purchase a replacement of just the monitor.  To my surprise they said they would warranty the damage.  I just had to mail back the broken unit and they would send a replacement.  They even send the replacement right away once you email them proof that you have shipped the old unit back.  I called them on a Monday and had the replacement unit by Friday.  The replacement appears to be brand new (not re-furbished).Very happy with their service!

Reviews.Title: Great price for reliable monitor
Reviews.Author: Fran Goulb.
Reviews.Content: It's been very reliable for the last few months since I bought this here. The video quality is great and there is no delay between what is shown in the picture and what is really happening. No problems with our home wifi. The sound is clear and loud enough to heard even when this is placed in the corner of our bedroom. For the money we spent this is a great deal.We are planning to get a new seperate set so that we can keep an eye our of dogs where they sleep. Hopefully the two monitors will not interfere with each other!

Reviews.Title: Not that good
Reviews.Author: H. Wang "J"
Reviews.Content: I really don't know how this gets almost 5 star rating.Lots of flaws with this model and IMO not very well designed and thought of.The VOX beep thing is annoying for one thing and does not work very well. White noise is another useless feature. I had both turned off. But both can be turn off so no big deal. The main problem I have with this monitor is sound level. Even with level on 9(the hightest) it's not enough. I had to constantly held it to my ear to hear something. If you are doing dishes forget it, laundry forget it, watch tv - don't even think about it. Also most newer monitor has a visual sound level indicator (green low noise - red loud noise). This one doesn't have it. So this is basically a video monitor with low sound. ** beware **I'll be adding another baby manitor (Just Sound) and this will be usefull again.Some pros are-affortable-light-good screen-range is not bad

Reviews.Title: Major Flaw Recently Discovered
Reviews.Author: Dani
Reviews.Content: The portion of the monitor that goes in baby's room will not turn back on by itself after power outage. Unfortunately, we have frequent power glitches due to weather and power will go out for a few seconds. I expected the video monitor to automatically turn back on when the power does, but this is not the case and of course it just happened while my kid is sick and taking a nap on the second floor :(

Reviews.Title: Worked okay for the first 2 months...
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: I thought this unit was okay considering the price, until we owned it for a couple months. The fact it is no longer is working is partially my fault because it fell from the couch to the floor and the atenna broke off, but I feel this wouldn't have happened if t wasn't made out of such flimsy materials. It now just beeps and goes out of signal constantly. Another complaint is that the screen is way too bright even on the lowest setting and keeps me up at night if I keep it on. I do like the VOX feature but that doesn't always work, especially if you keep a fan in the baby's room. Lastly, our battery stopped working after just a couple weeks of use. I did contact the company about this and they shipped me a new battery at no cost so that is a plus for customer service. Overall, I think we would have beenuch better off spending a bit more for a more durable monitor that doesn't break on such a short fall a has fewer connectivity issues.

Reviews.Title: A few Minor Flaws, but Great for the Money!
Reviews.Author: usmcpatience
Reviews.Content: So far this Monitor has been pretty good to us. We have a three year old and a new one due in October. I bought a second camera and paired it with the unit (very easy to do), and both cameras seem to be working fine. Yes, the "feel" of the product isn't as heavy and feels a bit "cheap", but who cares! For a product that is about $150 cheaper, what does it matter that the plastic is lighter weight?So far, the one issue I'm not liking is the fact that the sound level of the monitor is much quieter than our old (Summer Infant... an ancient model) video monitor unit. Even with the volume at full blast, the sound is fairly quiet. For the three-year old, that's not such a big deal. However, i am a tad bit worried that I won't wake up with the baby unless she is screaming her lungs off. During the day, the sound level is no issue. I'm just worried that it's too quiet to wake me up at night. I suppose time will tell.All in all, this monitor is great for the money, easy to use, doesn't have a million extra bells and whistles that you're paying for, and the picture quality is great. I'd definitely recommend this video monitor for someone on a budget who wants something with a great picture. Not a bad product for the price!

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the price
Reviews.Author: mcv
Reviews.Content: We had a Summers Infant day/night video monitor that we (ab)used for almost 2 years before our kid decided to toss it in a bucket of water. It was a great product, thoughtfully designed and with the exact set of features needed. Unfortunately that product has been taken out of the market and the  Infant Optics DXR-5 seemed to be a good replacement. We have had this for about 2 months now and it seems to be adequate for our needs. Having said that, I'm not comfortable giving it more than 3 stars for a few reasons1. Price: Definitely the #1 reason for purchasing this product, There are hardly any sub-100 day/night video monitors out there2. Design: Pretty nice looking, but does definitely feel flimsy and rather lightly constructed. One annoying quality is that the camera has a pretty limited degree of motion because of a rather strange hinge-like contraption that holds the lens. It is a little annoying to position it right and get adequate coverage of whatever you are trying to cover (the crib in our case).3. Picture/Sound: Again, these are pretty adequate and the night time is definitely a lot grainier than our old monitor. My wife sometimes calls it the ultrasound picture (to be fair, it is not that bad :-) ). The sound (very) occasionally cuts off and then comes back. I'm guessing this is more to do with connectivity between the camera and the monitor4. There have been some comments in this thread about how bright the camera is on account of the night-vision. Frankly we have not seen that nor has out kid been distracted/disturbed by this. We have a relatively bright night-light in the room, so he may be used to some light5. We turned off the other features like Vox, power-save shutoff etc. The manual has clear instructions on how to do so. I have seen quite a few negative ratings on account of this. I cannot comment on the features themselves since I turned them off, but they are easy to turn off and (atleast IMO) should not be the deciding factor against this

Reviews.Title: Check your router before buying
Reviews.Author: JB "JB"
Reviews.Content: I'm sure this is a great baby monitor but it wouldn't turn on for us at all because our router interfered with it. "Out of Signal Coverage" is all we saw so we have to sell it since we are outside of the return range. Before you buy, confirm your router is not performing at the same ghz level. Customer service called  us back within 24 hours and was very helpful in letting us know the problem though.

Reviews.Title: Great little monitor
Reviews.Author: jruss1018
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I have heard there were problems with the Summer brands and being able to see into others signals and with a lot of kids in our neighborhood I didn't want to deal with that so I got this monitor.  It has been great.  It is the perfect BASIC video monitor, and I think people forget that it is a BASIC video monitor. Heck, it's only $99!There are other reviews on here that complain about screen size and when the monitor turns on due noise or lack of motion.  The screen size is fine for what it does.  I don't need some HD top of the line screen.  Just something that I can see if my child is awake on.All I can say is that with as much noise as a baby makes and as much as a baby moves in the middle of the night I would not want it to go on every single time, no one would ever sleep because the monitor would be turning on every 5 minutes!  Now our bed room is close to our child's room so I can hear when he makes small noises and I am fine with it not turning on, but if he crys, coughs, sneezes, it turns on.  But that is good enough for me.The only con would be the beep the monitor makes when you have the sound turned on when it goes into VOX power saving mode.  It is a bit annoying, but at night we sleep with the sound off because like I said we can usually hear everything from his room, and I am such a light sleeper that the light turning on is enough to wake me up.Overall I love our little monitor.  We haven't had any problems with it interfering with our wireless and it works all over our 3600sqft house.  Oh and the camera can be mounted on the wall if need be...I only wish it could zoom in.  Thats it.

Reviews.Title: UPDATED- Terrible and customer service recommendation not workable
Reviews.Author: One upset mom
Reviews.Content: UPDATE-  Since I wrote my review below, I was contacted by Infant Optics and they have fixed the situation in a satisfactory manner.  We are going to continue to use the monitor for now (once we receive the new battery).  Once the review was written the company was very fast acting to rectify the situation which was great and showed their customer service as a high priority which is nice to see.I ordered this after reading the reviews and thought we would be happy.  Well, our son is only 6 weeks old, and has only slept in his room 8 days, and the monitor is dead already!!!  I'm soooooooooooo upset about this.  It keeps turning off, and not going to VOX, but actually turning off.  Then it won't turn on when he's crying. If not plugged in, it only stays on, maybe 20 minutes.  And last night it was turning off even when it was plugge din. Might I add that his bedroom is on the 2nd floor and ours is on the first, so between him being fussy and colicky we're already run upstairs enough.  Don't need this added issue.So I emailedInfant Optics.  There first response was that "as with all electronics, batteries will die if kept below 50 degrees."  What!?!?  Where the heck do you think i'm keeping this monitor, outside?!?!?  So I wrote back and said that wasn't it.  So then I was told I had two options.  1- order a new one from amazon and return this one. 2- send this one to infant optics and they will send another.My big concern to them was that I'm then without a monitor at all, for probably at least a week if not more.  That is not an option with a baby!I will never use this brand for anything again.

Reviews.Title: Works well, but interferes with Wi-Fi
Reviews.Author: G. Parks "FuelScience"
Reviews.Content: The product was easy to set up and worked as advertised.  However it wiped out my 2.4 GHz WiFi network whenever it was working.  Don't get this product unless you have a dual band router.

Reviews.Title: EH, it broke
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: Worked great when needed, however the baby has to cry loud and for some time until the unit powers on for viewing.The quality of the video however is amazing.  Even in low light.The antenna did fall/break off.  The item does feel like cheap plastic.  Feels almost fragile to use.Great performance, but build quality is a bit lacking.  3 stars since I had to return it due to antenna connection snapping off.  Odd....

Reviews.Title: Worked for a while...
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: This monitor worked well for us for about a month and then the sound stopped working.  The video screen would pop up because the baby was crying, but no sound would come out of the monitor.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Jean Owens
Reviews.Content: simple but works great. The only thing it is interferes with my wifi some how when we are watching something that's streaming it makes it go slow.

Reviews.Title: great for price
Reviews.Author: Jessica Huber
Reviews.Content: After months of researching monitors I eventually came to the conclusion that they all have their ups and downs so I just went with this one because of the reviews and price. The picture is clear at nice and during the day. I have no issues at all with the sound or battery. I just charge it in the morning and when I go to bed I put it back on the charger. I can hear baby just fine even with a loud window ac running in his room. The price and quality of this monitor match up and I would recommend it for anyone on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: It is priced well and it works great. The colour is a bit off, but it's not a big concern. No lags or other complains.

Reviews.Title: horrible- buy something nicer and dont waste your $ on this
Reviews.Author: SuJun Cheng
Reviews.Content: I dont write a lot of reviews on amazon but i was deeply frustrated with this. but i blame myself. its a cheap monitor and  you get what you pay for. i have another Motorola one that i have at the grandparents house, its nicer, better picture and sound quality, has a thermometer. it was of course $250. i didnt think i needed something so nice so i got this one and i hate it. my peace of mind is worth getting a nicer system.

Reviews.Title: good product for price
Reviews.Author: CECILE
Reviews.Content: really good price for the function. the image is clear and sound is loud. you can adjust brightness and volume too.

Reviews.Title: great monitor
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: we like this monitor a lot. i had to get used to the fact that i could stand there next to the camera and get it placed just right since i was used to a crt-style monitor. having the color is nice as well, really clear when the lights have been turned on! :)only downside is i think the red lights on the camera give her the willies. and she's never seen a cylon, so i don't know how she'd know that's creepy.

Reviews.Title: Nice purchase
Reviews.Author: tallgirl
Reviews.Content: I like this product. I can see my baby clearly. It has a feature that allows the video to go into an energy storing mode that turns back on when the baby makes noise. This is nice so that you don't have a glaring video on the entire night! I only wish that it was able to be angled better to look down into the crib without having to mount it on a wall. Right now we just have it perched on some objects next to the crib angled down so that we can see him.Overall, I recommend this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Overall good monitor
Reviews.Author: Shelby LaVane "Shelby L."
Reviews.Content: I really like this monitor. May not be as fancy as some other models out there, but it's great for the price. The battery will last you all day, as long as you turn it off when not in use, and when baby is sleeping, turn it on sleep mode (it will go dark when there is no nose coming from baby's room).I live in a two bedroom, one story house, and the signal reaches from end to end. However, we took it with us out of state to visit my inlaws, they have a two story house, and it would lose the signal when the camera was upstairs and the monitor was downstairs. So I wouldn't recommend it for very large, or two story homes. Occasionally it will loose signal in the middle of the night, but it makes a loud beep that will wake you up when it happens. You can just turn the monitor off and back on and it will work fine again. But I've had this monitor for almost a year and a half, and that has only happened a handful of times.The picture quality is great, the night vision is really good, and the sound is nice and clear. As long as you don't live in a very large house, like I said.. I would definitely recommend this video monitor. We plan on buying another camera for it when we have another baby, so we can still keep one in our toddlers room too.

Reviews.Title: Best Product and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about this product.  Not only does it give me peace of mind by having the ability to see my baby at all times(no matter where I am in the house or yard), but it also allows me to not burst into his/her room for every little sound when I can see they are okay.  The picture is wonderful, as I can even see if he/she has their pacifier.  Yes, I found this product so helpful that I purchased a second one for the birth of our second child. The customer service is incredible.  Whenever I've had a question, I have been contacted in a very timely manner, and the matter has been resolved without any hassle on my end.  What a blessing!  I recommend this product in every way.

Reviews.Title: not just for babies
Reviews.Author: katie
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use with my elderly father. It keeps him in view when he's sleeping and I  am in another room, so I don't worry nearly as much about him getting up and falling. The sound and picture are both clear. It has saved me many steps since I no longer need to go to his room each time I hear a sound. It has definitely brought peace of mind. I would recommend this for any situation where you need to monitor a room, whether it's a baby, an ill child, or an elderly patient. It is portable so you can carry it with you, or you can plug it in to save power if you are staying in one place for a while.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: daniel lopez
Reviews.Content: It's just what i needed. Picture is good, sound is good and night vision is excelent. 100% satisfied. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great video monitor and great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Nichole J. Perna
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor it has been wonderful. Customer service there is also extremely helpful when I had an issue which they resolved very quickly!

Reviews.Title: Poor Audio
Reviews.Author: Corey Chapman
Reviews.Content: I bought this because of the price and the good reviews.However it has not become a door stop since it does not pick up audio.  I turned the volume to the max level and you can not hear adult voice.  The video is good, but the purpose of the monitor is audio, first.  This monitor clearly missed on the most important part of a baby monitor.I have read other complaints about the same issue. And the moderator for Infant Optics claims they have fixed the problem.  But they have not.  I just purchased mine a month ago.  I wish I could return it, but I already opened the box.  I will look in to returning it even if I opened the box.I only used it for one night since it was so bad.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor and great customer service
Reviews.Author: Jo W.
Reviews.Content: We picked this monitor because we really wanted a video monitor, and it was more reasonably priced than other options. At first, we were a bit disappointed with the video quality -- screen resolution was low, but we figured it was just because it wasn't a very expensive monitor.  HOWEVER, when we saw that a friend with the same product had MUCH better screen resolution, we contacted Infant Optics to see if we could get a new monitor.  They were very responsive and put an entire new unit in the mail before even receiving our returned product -- at no charge.  Now we love the great screen resolution and spying on our cute baby while he sleeps.  Great customer service!We've also ordered a couple of extra power cords so we can have them strategically placed in different locations in our house.

Reviews.Title: Good value but power outages.....
Reviews.Author: JRP
Reviews.Content: Got this as a gift and it works great so far.  I would say it's a good value for a video monitor with basic features and works pretty well.  I added a few extra cameras so far.The only design flaw I see so far is that the cameras have on/off switches.  These are not-battery powered so a power cord is required.  So WHY would you need any sort of power switch?  If your paranoid that big brother is watching then unplug the cord.  The only reason I can see that they designed this with a momentary power switch is to annoy you when the power goes during the night, power comes back on but the cameras will not turn on until you go into your sleeping kids' rooms and press the dumb buttons.  Whomever field tested this idea needs an early retirement.

Reviews.Title: Making mommy's life easier...
Reviews.Author: Tammy Moore
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter. This is a major upgrade to the one this product replaced. She loves it. It is so convenient/portable and the video quality is awesome!

Reviews.Title: A little hard to position
Reviews.Author: Alicia Coll
Reviews.Content: The picture is good for the price. The range is small and the plastic is pretty cheap. My biggest problem is positioning the camera with the cords out of reach but close enough that I can see chest rise and fall. I am pleased with the price and would recommend this for someone searching for a less expensive, no nonsense baby video monitor. But you are probably going to have to mount it on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Blis
Reviews.Content: I loved this product, has a good quality in video and sound. I recommend it. It's everything that i wanted it for my nephew

Reviews.Title: Great product and excellent customer service!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We are very satisfied with this monitor. It was our second baby monitor- our Motorola had died and we didn't want to spend a lot for a replacement but still wanted a decent video monitor. The Infant Optics was the perfect option for us. It doesn't have a lot of frills that the Motorola that we had did (such as two way communication or room temperature on display) but it has a good quality picture- both night vision and during the day- and we love how the sound shuts off when its just white noise and how the display goes to sleep so it's not on bright all night.We did have an issue with our power adapter not working after a few months and we contacted the customer service and they were extremely helpful and within a few short days we had a new adapter- free of charge! We'd recommend this monitor to others.

Reviews.Title: It actually broke after 9 months!
Reviews.Author: Alison J. Prindiville
Reviews.Content: I am so disappointed in the monitor because there is something wrong with the battery charger and the sound.  We have to constantly turn the cord in the monitor to keep it charging and half the time the sound doesn't work.  This happened after about 9 months of use.  So disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for the job.
Reviews.Author: deuist "deuist"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. Setting it up takes only a minute. The range is good enough that I can see my baby when standing outside of my house. The infrared makes night viewing a snap. My only qualm is that the battery life on the video screen last for only a few hours before requiring a recharge. Make sure you plug this in before going to bed.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Laima Lekaviciene
Reviews.Content: It did not last long , only a couple months . Now there is no view on the monitor , for $ 100 , I think , it should have lasted longer .

Reviews.Title: Nice and cheap.
Reviews.Author: Sal
Reviews.Content: Needed a new monitor for our second child, wanted to pay less any have it be mobile. This fit the bill and had the best reviews.In the end, it's cheaper... in all ways. I got exactly what I bought. However, I should have bought one with a charging dock instead of a flimsy kickstand (I imagine our 3 year old will snap it off soon).The picture is more digital than I had hoped. And I would like to have a manual "image-off" button. But I paid $82 for a portable baby monitor!Love it.Thanks, Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Terrific!
Reviews.Author: Deborah Katz
Reviews.Content: This saved my sanity.  It works beautifully.  Very responsive company.  (It does have to be recharged more often than I expected.)

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera for the price but does interfere with Wi-Fi
Reviews.Author: T. Lewis
Reviews.Content: The camera works amazing! This has a great distance. I can be outside and the video works wonderful. Main reason for the 3 start rating is because it took me a little while to realize what it was doing to my WiFi. The frequency hopping destroys any kind of streaming that I try to do. The babies room is between my bedroom and my man cave where the router is at. I've sat in my bedroom with a WiFi analyzer and watched the wifi channels get pounded. I've read responses online where infant optics say this is working as designed. Seems very poorly designed. Unfortunately my wdtv streaming box isn't capable of 5ghz so I'm stuck. Looks like I'll have to crawl under the house and run a cat5e cable. The camera really does work great. Don't believe the poor reviews about video quality or noise cancelation. It works perfectly for that. We typical only use it at night and of course that's when I wasn't too lay down and watch a movie so that is my only reason for 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for a great price
Reviews.Author: sls373
Reviews.Content: Initially we had the standard voice only monitor for our 1st child and it worked well, but we were always lacking the understanding if our child was crying b/c he was stuck/hurt or just wants Mommy and Daddy.  We then had another child and decided to purchase the Infant Optics DXR-5 and what a great product.  It worked exactly as expected, the batter life is great and it works just like the voice monitor but now we have the peace of mind our child is safe.  When we had our third child we went back and purchased another so now we have a total of 3 monitors.  The two issues I have although not big issues are you cannot to my knowledge skip one of the 4 monitors when switching in between and second we have two handheld devices and we can only sync one up at a time.  But these were just minor issues other than that we love them.I recently had an issue with one of my devices and send an email to customer support.  I received a quick response and fix from them and they emailed me a new one even before receiving the package on their end.  Thanks Mae for the great service.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Hagerwaite
Reviews.Content: This video monitor works really well. We have had it for a year and still works great.I have even dropped it SEVERAL times and it still works. The plastic casing feels really cheap so I have been happily surprised by how well it as held up. On the camera piece the attenae is really loose after a big fall but it still works great.

Reviews.Title: Great picture.  Great price
Reviews.Author: twinmom33
Reviews.Content: This monitor has a great picture. When placed in the right spot, you can really see your baby's face.  I also like it because i have twins and I can toggle between the 2 cameras (I have one add-on camera) and I only have to use one monitor.  Its much less expensive than most models.  I had a small issue and customer service was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Happy mom
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: I love how it is silent until picks up noise in the room. the picture is amazing and sound quality is great

Reviews.Title: Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Jessica L Bearden
Reviews.Content: This is a great company. First, I really like the monitor itself--especially the feature that silences it unless my son is making noise--no annoying white noise! The picture is clear as well. Second, the customer service of the company is exceptional. While traveling, the camera malfunctioned and wouldn't turn on. I contacted the customer service rep, Mae, and within two days I had a replacement. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: No longer holds a charge
Reviews.Author: Teresa Wang
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for 2 years now and it has worked as advertised most of the time.The biggest problem we had usually was that the camera angle is so limited. If you put it on a table, it will only point up. As you know, if you have a crib, it would be easier for it to point down at your child. We mounted it to the wall with velcro stickers which fixed the problem, but if we traveled with it, we always had a hard time figureing out where to put it.Next the range isn't great.Then it started to break down. The antenna fell off and the stand is flimsy. Now it won't charge unless I wiggle the cord in just the right way. If we unplug it, it will shut off in about 10 minutes. I'm buying a replacement today from a different brand hoping it holds up better.

Reviews.Title: Amazing monitor for a fair price
Reviews.Author: Whitney Collins
Reviews.Content: My husband and I got this monitor for our first baby after a recommendation from a friend. We loved that it was so easy to set up and use from the first day we got it, plus you can't beat the price!We did end up having a few issues with our first monitor (it froze a couple of times and seemed to have trouble charging) so we contacted the customer service center to see about getting it replaced under warranty. The woman who helped me was SO wonderful and made the process incredibly easy! All we had to do was mail the defective monitor off and they processed and shipped a replacement the same day. Even better, our new monitor was delivered the very next day, on a Sunday none the less!We have had absolutely no issues with our new unit and really love the product. It has simple (yet awesome) features that I have recently found as well, like a built in clip/stand on the monitor unit so that it can be placed within view on the nightstand. The night vision is also great as our son is extremely light sensitive and won't asleep unless it's dark. Another plus is that it doesn't use WiFi to send the video feed so there is no worries of anyone hacking into the connection.The only reason this doesn't get 5 stars is that the monitor's auto stand by and auto mute functions don't work with the sound machine we use (the sound keeps it on and we can always hear the machine through the monitor).Overall, we would definitely recommend this to friends and family! Great product and snacking customer service!

Reviews.Title: Love the product and the company
Reviews.Author: Carpe Diem
Reviews.Content: 1. I really love this product.  I bought this as soon as my twins were born, 22 months ago and have used it ever since.  Instead of buying an audio monitor and then a video one later for sleep training, we just bought this cause what can be better at $99!- There is nothing on the market that beats this price.- The set up is super easy - you really just plug it in and the camera and monitor find each other and you're good to go.- The sound and picture clarity is very good.- We took it when we traveled.  We even took it to India and it worked in a duplex house.  We could keep an eye on the kids - it really is a life-saver.2.  I love the company too cause their customer service was impeccable:- Not only did they respond quickly, they were polite, helpful and understanding.- It's great to see small companies making quality products and doing good work.  They really should be rewarded with more 'happy' customers, like me.I hardly ever write reviews unless I am totally thrilled or completely disappointed in the product.  In this case, I am thrilled to.  Feel free to ask me any question re Infant Optics if you want to.

Reviews.Title: Audio is iffy
Reviews.Author: Jade
Reviews.Content: This device is durable, portable and does the job nicely, however I have found that the audio doesn't work sometimes and it's only because I am watching the display I realize my baby is crying. It works sometimes for a few seconds and has nothing to do with the range because I experimented with that too.The port for the ac adapter is in a position that could cause the wire of the adapter to break and start shorting. It hasn't happened yet in the 2 months I have been using it but I expect it to at some point especially since you always have to remove the adapter to charge the display unit which loses charge too quickly in my opinion.It should also come with a clip for easier mounting.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product!
Reviews.Author: Lizett Sanchez
Reviews.Content: I've had this monitor for a little over a month now and it has worked beautifully.  I have already dropped it 3 times to the point where the screen pops out, the back opens up and the battery falls out and it still works in perfect condition.  I have had NO problems with it.  What I like about this product is the price.  It's around the $100 range which is a lot cheaper than most night monitors.  Yes I would prefer one with a bigger screen but I am willing to overlook that for the price.  A lot of the other brands are well over $150 and with a new baby in the house, we have to watch our budget so this worked out perfectly.  I also like that you can plug it into the wall and don't have to spend tons of money on batteries!When I did my research on the internet on the top rated baby monitors, this came up at the top of the list and I completely agree!  Some people complain that the plastic seems cheap but again I am willing to overlook that for the price.  Besides, even with the "cheap" plastic IT STILL WORKS!!!!  A lot of the other monitors which cost TONS more had a lot of negative reviews so for the money, you can't go wrong with this product.  I highly recommend it even if you are not on a budget because again this product is made with superior quality than some of those expensive brands.

Reviews.Title: Simple to set up and great picture quality
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Murphy
Reviews.Content: This monitor is so much better than I thought it would be. I purchased it without doing as much research as I normally do before I buy a baby product because our old monitor died on us. With our Prime subscription, it arrived the next day! We are very pleased with this purchase. Setting this up was so simple. Just place the camera where you want it and turn on the receiver. The picture quality is fantastic, even at night. It also gives you a warning when the battery life is running low, which is a very nice feature. Also, I like that there is no static and the audio turns on only when it is needed (when there is movement or sounds from the nursery). Overall, this is a very simple, dependable video baby monitor. Just what you need!

Reviews.Title: great price, great camera!
Reviews.Author: live4heels
Reviews.Content: Im very happy with our monitor! For the price, if your looking for just a standard camera and dont care for all of the crazy bells and whistles, this camera is great! Battery doesnt last for as long as id like but does still last for a good amount of time.

Reviews.Title: Good, but...
Reviews.Author: Shawn J
Reviews.Content: This severely hampered all wifi to my computer. To the point I had to disconnect and reconnect the wifi every 1-2 minutes.I was going nuts for weeks because I thought it was my brand new computer or the adapter causing the problems.Besides that this Monitor is really amazing. It has been a huge help being able to watch our child.

Reviews.Title: Sound was sporadic
Reviews.Author: Ex-Spook "Ex-Spook"
Reviews.Content: We ended up returning this because the microphone simply was cutting out every other use. The reviews all gave this thing so much praise but honestly it's not a very good investment if you actually want to HEAR your baby rather then just SEE your baby. We went to Toys R Us and just bought a Motorola unit for $180 instead which is clearly far better video and audio.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: toro
Reviews.Content: Do not buy! Very disappointed with the night vision and sound. You will not hear your baby unless he is screaming.  Many times I wake up to my baby screaming only because I can hear him through the walls. Also,  the night vision is horrible. It is very difficult to see my baby at night even when I leave the closet light on. When checking on my baby at night, I have to go into his bedroom.  This defeats the purpose of having the monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor
Reviews.Author: EBATX
Reviews.Content: For the price, you can't beat this monitor.  The video works flawlessly, but the mic could be a bit more sensitive to picking up sound.  Also, the monitor's base station could use a bit more volume, I have a hard time hearing what is going on...I am a bit deaf though.
