Reviews.Title: Audio is not loud enough
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I love the options on this monitor that the sound and camera turn off after no sound is detected for some time. We use a fan and our last monitor had so much white noise. The 16 dollar monitor we bought at target had to be cranked up max volume for us to hear her, but at that level when she did make noise it was loud. This monitor is turned up to max volume and we can barely hear her. Our 2 year old does not cry loudly in the morning though. She babbles and bounces, but for some reason it is so much quieter on this monitor than the last. I would recommend for an infant but not a quiet child like ours. We have the camera as close as possible without her touching it and pointing right at where she talks. For the amount of money I don't think this one is worth it. It doesn't take much noise to flip it out of power saving/white noise eliminator mode but the speaker on the other end just isn't loud enough. I contacted the company and they were not very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Great investment, excellent image quality
Reviews.Author: M. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Beautiful image quality, even in the dark, I can clearly see my little one breathing. The vox on function and screen kick on the second he gets loud, but doesn't pick up the white noise machine or rustling of sheets.You get what you pay for in the sense that it doesn't have fancier features like remote camera zoom/tilting and you can't talk to the baby, but I highly recommend it.No interference issues but our home is only one level.

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor for the money
Reviews.Author: Spencer Thompson
Reviews.Content: This is a nice monitor for the money. Good battery life and long cords. Clear picture even in dark. The noise on and off is a little to delayed but is nice so you don't hear content buzzing. Over all I'm happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Works well enough
Reviews.Author: Kestra Kuretich
Reviews.Content: It works pretty good as far as the video portion, but it's doesn't seem to pick up sound great, and we literally have the camera in the crib since our baby can't rollover yet. I wish the range went further. It works in our garage, but not when I step into our driveway, with the garage door open. We really only use it for naps since he sleeps in our room, but I would get a nicer one if we were using it all night.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly in normal operation - small issue with configuration
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This monitor works great in our relatively small house.  Night vision feature works great too - the monitor flips to black & white when night vision is enabled, but you can still see clearly.My one problem with it is that sometimes my older son messes around with the buttons on the monitor and it loses its pairing with the camera.  In order to re-pair the two you have to power cycle the camera and press the pairing button on the camera base.  Not a big deal, but it's kind of a pain to have to sneak into the baby's room to do it.  It would be nice if there was some kind of lockout or something for the pairing mode to prevent this from happening.  Not a big problem, but it's something to be aware of for families with multiple children (especially toddlers who like to press buttons!)

Reviews.Title: Felt cheap
Reviews.Author: JLaughlin
Reviews.Content: I did not like this baby monitor. It felt like cheap plastic. Returned it and bought a different monitor that we love for $60 more.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: We purchased this monitor per the "Baby Bargains" book review that this is an "excellent, yet affordable fixed baby monitor."  We have been pleased with the product.  When the A/C adapter to the monitor unit stopped working after 5 months of use, I emailed customer service and they replied within hours and said that they would happily send an adapter replacement immediately. The customer service was prompt, personal, and courteous. They even followed up to make sure that the replacement adapter had arrived and was working properly.  We were very pleased with this experience and recommend the Infant Optics DXR-5 if you are looking for a fixed baby monitor from a company with excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: GLAD I WENT WITH THESE
Reviews.Author: Trip
Reviews.Content: I AM THE TYPE OF PERSON WHO BUYS STUFF OFF OF OTHERS REVIEWS.  I DO A LOT OF RESEARCH BEFORE BUYING MOST ITEMS AS WELL...THESE WERE NO DIFFERENT.  I MUST HAVE WENT BACK AND FORTH WITH OVER 5-6 DIFFERENT BABY MONITORS IN THIS PRICE RANGE AND COMPARED REVIEWS AND FEATURES ETC BEFORE I DECIDED ON THESE.  BOY AM I GLAD I DID, I HAVE NO ISSUES AT ALL WITH THESE.  THEY WORK GREAT, SOUND GREAT, AND NO INTERFERENCE AT ALL.  ALSO, NO INTERNET ISSUES WITH MY WI-FI AS OTHERS HAVE STATED AS WELL.  DEFINETELY WORTH THE $99.  JUST WISH THEY CAME IN PINK AS I BOUGHT THE BLUE ONES WHEN I HAVE A GIRL.  NO BIGGIE THOUGH

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the Price.
Reviews.Author: Krystal Davis
Reviews.Content: Lightweight and very portable. Material seems cheap, but it works well. Good battery life and I really like the night vision option.

Reviews.Title: Very clear image and great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Ciotta
Reviews.Content: I was surprised how incredibly clear the image was, even in the complete dark.  Also, nice options for turning on screen/audio only when noise over a certain level is picked up.  Also, nice to have multiple channels.  I was enjoying the product when I had a fluke malfunction.  I called up the company and was stunned at their incredible customer service.  The phone was answered immediately by a live person, no questions asked and they replaced the unit immediately, even though I wasn't able to ship the old unit back since I live overseas.  They also followed up with emails to make sure the new unit was received and working well and offered a free extended warrantee.  It's not every day you get such great service.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Sharadin
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor based on it's great reviews not on it's "cheap" appearance.  However, from the moment we started using the monitor it didn't work properly.  We literally were 10 feet away from the babies room and it still beeped that we were "out of range".  We ended up plugging it in and leaving it connected to the charger (although it was fully charged) and it would stay in range.  Then about halfway through the night the monitor would start beeping at us.  We reset it and it would tell us it was out of range again. This happened many times.  I finally called and they are taking the product back, they being Infant Optics, not Amazon.  This product is JUNK!  DO NOT BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: Great product, sometimes messes with WIFI
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Reviews.Content: This product has a tendency to mess up your wifi signal from time to time depending on position in the house. Outside of that it's a great deal, love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor-WONDERFUL Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: (This is my very first product review!)We purchased the Infant Optics DXR-5 in October when my son was only 1 month old. Our unit worked wonderfully. We were pleasantly surprised at how clear the picture was-especially the night vision! (Way better than some higher-end models!) and impressed with the signal range as we have a very large home. With the baby's room in the basement, my husband is still able to use the monitor in the garage, front and back yards without the signal giving out. It has great features such as the "VOX" function, which turns the screen and sound off until noise occurs- love this at night! My only suggestions for future models would be to have an inner-antenna, rather than an exposed antenna. Also, I wish the screen displayed the time; this would be helpful during motn feedings. However, I still tell all my mommy friends in need of a video monitor about the DXR-5! It is fairly inexpensive for a great product.I accidentally dropped our monitor on a very hard cement floor and broke the antenna cover. The monitor continued to work extremely well, and even endured some travel! Eventually, the exposed antenna snapped and the signal was tough to keep. I contacted customer service via email and received a response immediately. The woman I spoke with, Mae, was very helpful in sending us a brand new unit before Infant Optics recieved our defective one. She went above and beyond making sure our family was completely satisfied! I HIGHLY reccomend buying from Infant Optics! I will definitely purchase from them again.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for....
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Generally, I think this camera/monitor set is a pretty good deal.  Cheaper than most and works pretty well.  It covers our entire house without any problem, although the reception sometimes cuts out at my parents' larger home.  Also, when we had a second child I bought another set, excited to have the cameras and monitors coordinate.  I'm sure it says this somewhere, but I didn't see--you can put multiple cameras on one monitor, but not the other way around.  We were excited to have a monitor that stays upstairs and a second that stays on the main floor of the house.  Alas, that is not to be.

Reviews.Title: Mostly Works Well
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this baby monitor. It has a clear video and the sound reception.  The monitor was very easy to set up and is very easy to operate.  Even those babysitting have had an easy operating the camera.  The only drawback we've seen so far is that the security mechanism on the monitor scrambles every few seconds and it makes using our wireless internet difficult.  There is a "fix" for this, but it doesn't seem to have helped too much.  Overall, we are very satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed despite reviews
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty disappointed with this monitor and feel like it's quite faulty. Although the image quality is really great, I feel like this monitor fails to do what it's supposed to - alert you to when your baby is crying.  Overnight, we use the power save mode, but it NEVER turns back on.  Our room is next door to our baby's and I ALWAYS here her crying before the monitor shuts back on to alert us - sometimes the monitor never even turns back on... Given this, it's very hard for me to trust this monitor when I'm downstairs or further away.  The product advertises that "when the camera detects any sound in this 'standby mode', the unit automatically turns back on" but that's simply not true if my daughter is fully crying and STILL the monitor will not turn on.The battery life on the handheld monitor is quite weak, as well.  So while the standby mode seems helpful to conserve energy, it simply does  not work on my device. I end up having to charge the monitor for several hours each day.  Really disappointed in this product and wish I would have opted for something else.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I already had the Angelcare monitor for my twins and wanted an inexpensive monitor to use once they outgrew the Angelcare. This monitor did the trick and continues to work great a year later. It is nice because we have one camera on each crib and can go back and forth between the two. It will hold up to four cameras but we just use one each. I wish the camera was able to zoom and scan the room but for the price, I can't complain. We also use it when we travel as it's easy to move and sets up quickly.

Reviews.Title: Broke fast
Reviews.Author: Enijavetta
Reviews.Content: It broke in 2 weeks after I started to use it. The monitor is out of order. Sad purchase and waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Never worked
Reviews.Author: alic
Reviews.Content: This product never worked. I would like to think it was a faulty one however we paid our money and it is in a drawer upstairs :(

Reviews.Title: Everything great except sound
Reviews.Author: Rosana Evangelina Donadio
Reviews.Content: Everything is great except sound. I find it to be, not loud enough.  I've exchange  it for a new one because I though that maybe was defective. I realized the sound level is the same. If the baby is in her room and I'm in the kitchen, cooking, the hood on, tv on, toddler running around, etc. I'm not able to hear her unless she is screaming crying. I'll be returning the new one as soon as I find another one. Giving it two stars because I consider that sound volume is very important on this device.

Reviews.Title: not for me
Reviews.Author: Elisha Harris
Reviews.Content: This monitor is cute, but not efficient.  It isn't loud enough and works like a cheap product. There aren't many features. There is only 2 buttons on the whole thing. I returned the monitor easily thanks to amazon and bought a different one.

Reviews.Title: Started out ok  but......
Reviews.Author: Anthony Fraiola III
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed this monitor when we got it as a baby registry gift.  However last month it started turning off frequently, every hour sometimes.  I need to contact the manufacturer for a possible replacement.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price
Reviews.Author: Mary Hunt
Reviews.Content: I love having this monitor so I can keep an eye on my son while he napping or sleeping at night in his room on the second story of our house while I'm downstairs. The only things I have issue with is when the set is in VOX mode, the video screen doesn't turn on until my son is pretty upset. I think it takes a fairly loud cry to activate it. There have been times my son was screaming at the gate in his room before the monitor kicked on. The only thing I could think that is causing it to not be very sensitive is that my son has the Marpac sound conditioner in his room (a white noise machine). Maybe this masks the sound of his cry when he's just whimpering.

Reviews.Title: Mostly happy!
Reviews.Author: Erica Pardy
Reviews.Content: Bought this product to replace my 2.5 yr old Summer Infant video monitor (which I loved but it started to be unreliable). This is a good product for the price I paid. I really wish that instead of the unit having an auto-mute function that it had a button to turn the video on & off. I like to hear every little peep my child makes - it takes a lot of noise to get the unit to pick up sound once it goes on mute. So if my daughter wakes up and is quietly mumbling, I wouldn't know until she actually started screaming. Fortunately you can turn the auto mute feature off. Also the volume seems really low even when turned up all the way. Wish it were louder. Otherwise I am happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: It works pretty good, but I can't go too far.
Reviews.Author: Jodi
Reviews.Content: I can't walk out and get the mail to the end of my driveway or go to the garage with this, but it still works great and I love to be able to watch her sleep.

Reviews.Title: Awful Picture, Features Didn't Work
Reviews.Author: Mark R. Rouleau
Reviews.Content: Let me preface my review, I think I received a lemon or perhaps a used/refurbished unit.  However, the monitor was terrible for me.  The clip didn't attach to clothes, the audio would turn on for about 5-10 seconds but then cut out completely.  Range was good at least.  Seems like this product definitely fits the cliche that you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: good enough.
Reviews.Author: rayman 850
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty decent quality video monitor for those on a budget. I really like the fact it goes silent until a noice goes above a certain decible. Something about a toddlers voice hits it every time but his sound machine won't activate it. Its a thing of beauty compared to the cheaper audio only ones.Cons:1. The thing it needs the most that they omited is 2 way talk feature. I miss this quite a bit from his old audio only one.2. Battery life is pretty sub par. It lasts about 4 hrs.I made the mistake of searching and then picking the best seller(this one) when I later realized I should have browsed more. There are some models available on Amazon with more key features for at or near the same price, including camera pan feature ! I wouldn't buy this one again but I cant fault it too much so it gets a 4 star

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR
Reviews.Author: Julie Senn
Reviews.Content: Best customer service I have ever received! Our 1st infant Optics DXR had broken after a fall from the night stand. The company immediately replaced it & offered extended warranty as well. They were friendly, prompt, & understanding. We really appreciated their service. The product is durable, easy to use, can control the lighting & sound. The video is clear & can be switched to color during the day. Also has good range, able to go outside or anywhere within the home. Would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Should be recalled: BEWARE!!!!
Reviews.Author: lucky13
Reviews.Content: This product is unreliable and should be recalled.  Our first one would just stop charging, ok fine a small issue and they sent us a new one.  This next one freezes. If you look at the screen it could seem as though your child is soundly sleeping, but when you go upstairs you hear her crying.  Toggle through the 4 different camera settings and it resets itself and shows what is really going on.  I like to see my baby and make sure she is safe.  Now that my baby is two she is going to start to try to get out of her crib, well if the monitor was frozen on a moment when she was sleeping she could be hurt and I wouldn't know.  This make me EXTREMELY uncomfortable.  We contacted the company and they are sending us a new one.. YAY!! I dont want another one of these unreliable waste of money monitors!!! Give me my money back!

Reviews.Title: Downside is seemingly short battery life in monitor
Reviews.Author: Wagon
Reviews.Content: This is a fine baby monitor. It does night vision, and it's extremely easy to use. There aren't too many features that you really want or need from a baby monitor. So, there's not much to mess up. We didn't want one that connects to our phone via wifi, after reading a news story about someone hacking one and waking a baby.The only downsides to this monitor are:- The battery life in the monitor seems somewhat short, and the sound it makes when the battery is low is godawful.- It's difficult to find good places to set the camera, especially to see down in the crib. We've got it set up on a chair looking through the slats in the crib, but I would prefer it be looking down from above. We just don't have any place to put it where we could get a good view of the baby. A zoom function would obviate this, but so would something much similar, like a means of clipping the camera onto something or mounting it some way other than sitting it on a flat surface or screwing holes in our wall.

Reviews.Title: Upset
Reviews.Author: kros
Reviews.Content: Camera doesn't work after 2 days , very upset :-/ want my money back , would not recommend this product , save your money

Reviews.Title: great product, great price, FANTASTIC customer service
Reviews.Author: JLE
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor because of the great reviews and the reasonable price relative to all the other video monitors on the market. Best purchase ever. It works flawlessly, on any level of our house, and is very easy to set up and use. Best of all though, when it fell and broke (which was not likely a fault of the company but of our clumsiness), they replaced it free of charge right away and provided unparalleled customer service. If you're looking for a simple, reasonable video monitor, look no further.

Reviews.Title: built like a tank!
Reviews.Author: mkemom13
Reviews.Content: The video monitor works well and is very sturdy. My toddler has dropped it many times, gotten it damp, and it still works great 18 months later!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Luiz Eduardo Mendonça Simões
Reviews.Content: I love it! It has a good quality. I recommend it. Excellent purchase and I would buy it again. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: excellent product, wish it had a voice feedback channel
Reviews.Author: Rochey
Reviews.Content: We've had this for well over a year now. It's a well made product, compared to the terrible Motorola product we had before.This one doesn't hammer our wifi too badly. That was a major concern after our experience with the previous baby monitor. Batteries in the display also last 2 or 3 hours without being connected. that's been a nice surprise.My only want in a product like this is a USB connector for charging, and a microphone feedback system. the Motorola unit we had previously could "talk back" from the display to the camera.

Reviews.Title: Died, replaced, died again
Reviews.Author: Nathan Perry
Reviews.Content: We ordered one at the end of the year. It suddenly stopped working after almost exactly a month. Fortunately, it was just within the window to get a replacement. Four months later, the new one died. No picture and then won't pair. Don't waste your money, buy a more expensive one that's going to last more than a few months!

Reviews.Title: Register for the warranty!!
Reviews.Author: KB
Reviews.Content: Bought this unit when our little one was first born, and it worked well until.......after having it less than a year the picture just went out one day. Contacted Infant Optics, and after going through a few fix-it steps that didn't work, they said to send the unit back and they would replace it for free. Well, free wasn't free. Had to pay to have it shipped back to them, clearly marked with our info and what was wrong with it, and to send them an email with our Amazon order info, along with a scanned copy of the shipping receipt to prove we shipped it back. After not getting any response for a very long time, we double-checked and re-sent the receipt copy and got a new unit right away after that. It's a decent, basic unit for the price, and Amazon was great with such fast shipping. Infant Optics did work with us when the unit went down, but be forewarned to keep track of all of your purchase info - good thing Amazon keeps all of your purchase history.....And make sure you register your unit soon after purchasing so that you can even get the one-year replacement warranty.  And keep any receipts if you do need to send it back, because that's all on you to take care of yourself.....

Reviews.Title: Love it!! Great item for the price
Reviews.Author: Shannon Nash
Reviews.Content: I did lots of research when picking a digital video baby monitor, I love this one, for the price it's the best out there in my opinion.  The vision is clear, I can see if he is breathing right on the screen, night vision works great.  Only kind of complaint is the monitor doesn't stay charged for too long so you have to bring it back and plug it in, but it's fine for us, we leave it plugged in the living room and check on him from in there.  When you have two toddlers already it's vital not to open the door to check on baby and fear waking him.  I would recommend it to anyone on a budget who wants a video monitor!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good basic monitor
Reviews.Author: jshe
Reviews.Content: The day and night vision through the monitor is acceptable.  I don't particularly need a color picture and this one certainly doesn't give one.  Everything has a green tint to it.  That's OK because being able to see my grand-baby is what I was wanting anyway.  The night vision is like a basic black and white TV picture or greyscale and that is also acceptable.  You need to carefully pick where you mount the camera as you are not going to zoom with it and the camera lens doesn't turn horizontal very much at all.The sound activation feature works well.For the price I paid, it is a good value, gives a little piece of mind and I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Stopped Working
Reviews.Author: Michelle Valiani
Reviews.Content: This monitor would have got 4 stars but it stopped working.  I have only had it for 3 months.  It now beeps obnoxiously and never connects with the base.  Worked perfectly for the first 3 months.  If I had bought this at Nordstroms or Babies R Us I could return it, now I am out of luck for a defective product.  That is unfortunate.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Nicholas LaBella
Reviews.Content: There can't be many companies that can rival the customer service associated with this device. I purchased and used one in my household and have since purchased two as shower gifts.  The battery eventually wore down with the constant charging and such.  The company walked me through replacing the battery.  When that didn't remedy the problem, I returned the device.  When I sent a picture of the packaging that I was returning the device in, the company immediately processed a new order free of charge. It arrived promptly two days later.  Again I can't oversell the quality of the customer service.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor - love the Voice activation
Reviews.Author: Alex Stevenson
Reviews.Content: This monitor doesn't have a lot of fancy features but it has a good quality picture and it's very reliable. My favorite features that it does have are that you can turn on the voice activation, which helps save the battery. Our previous monitor had such a short battery life because it was active all the time. Also, it has noise cancellation. We have a white noise machine and the monitor is calibrated to be able to cancel that noise out, which helps us distinguish our baby's cries from the background noise.Overall, I would highly recommend this monitor because it's reliable and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics Digital Vido Monitor - Awesome product!
Reviews.Author: cathy a stella
Reviews.Content: Bought this monitor for my son and daughter-in-law.  They are very pleased with the monitor and the night vision is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Worked only for a few hours and then I got 'Out of Signal Coverage error. Trouble shooting dint help. No response from support.
Reviews.Author: prof
Reviews.Content: I unboxed my new DXR-5 and was using it at my home. Everything was working fine (I was about to see the video feed from the camera) until all of a sudden my receiver unit said 'out of signal coverage'. I did everything mentioned in the trouble shooting section of the user manual - like turning off WiFi, repairing. But nothing helps. I can see that the camera unit is pairing mode (flashing green light). And I keep the receiver unit in one feet range. Yet I could not get the repairing done. What is strange is that I did not do any physical  movement of both the units when this problem started to show up. I wrote an email to Infant Optics Support (info@infantoptics.com). But I didnt hear from them for about 10 days now.I brought this device via Amazon when I visited US and I am using it in Norway.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: Elaina
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor because it was cheap yet had great reviews. However, I do believe that some of these reviews were paid associates or people.  The quality of the picture is not great....it's okay....it's kind of clumpy at times.  It's a very simple monitor that only lets you see and hear your baby.  I had my monitor for a month exactly and to my surprise (speaking sarcastically) the inferred just stopped working one night!  I was pissed because I NEED to monitor my baby since he moves around so much at night and tends to wake up frequently.  Not only did the inferred stop working, starting two weeks before that the monitor kept showing white/colored noise (like turning your tv on a channel that you don't have, the white static that shows up).I am so upset I am returning it. That same day I ordered a FOSCAM baby monitor which does so much for only $19 dollars more!  It pans and tilts, zooms, two way communication, room temperature (and an alarm that goes off if it gets to hot or cold in the room; off/on option), baby feeding reminder (off/on option), vox sensitivity levels, and did I mention the screen is 3.5 inch! I love this new monitor, as for the infant optics.....well, never again.I can understand if I just randomly received one that had issues, I don't expect all technology to be on point, but for BOTH the camera and monitor having issues..... That's a no no. I am giving it two starts because when the inferred stopped working the radio still worked at least so I was still able to hear my baby cry.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Ridi222
Reviews.Content: Before this purchase, I had a Motorola baby monitor. This Infant Optics baby monitor short circuited the moment it arrived. I've had it for two months and I absolutely hate it!The video is poor, you have to manually adjust the camera to where you want it and the sound cuts in and out. What garbage!

Reviews.Title: From one star to five star
Reviews.Author: Gabor Nagy
Reviews.Content: UPDATE TO THE BELOW REVIEW:As it turns out, I had a malfunctioning unit, that's why the coverage was only 20-25 ft. Also, as it turns out, this company has a very good Customer Service, they just prefer email (hence no one answered my call). Mae emailed me back right away, then she called me when I asked for it and she shipped me a new unit immediately. The very next day I received it (it was expedited) and it was working well. I did not even have to change the cables, since they were the same 0 just swiped the old unit to the new one and voila, it now works well. The coverage is good, it works outside our home.So my suggestion is, if you have COVERAGE problems, contact CS via email (I think they cover this w/in a year - mine was only 3 wks old) and let them send you a functioning one.Besides coverage problem, I love the unit. Simple and clear image.MY OLD REVIEW FOLLOWS:If you live in a studio in Manhattan, this product might be for you. However, if your baby sleeps upstairs or if there are more than one rooms in between nursery and where you are, this product is useless. Here is a description from Infant Optics' official website (note the 150 ft indoor coverage - absolutely NOT true, it is max 20 or 25 ft!):"2.4 TFT screen with super sensitive built in microphone2.4 GHz static free digital wireless transmission covering distances of up to 800 feet in open areas - or 150ft in enclosed areasUses FHSS (Automatic Frequency Hoping System) - jumps between different channels in the 2.4 GHz."Also, here is a message from Infant Optics' CEO (copied from online):"We are passionate about customer service which is why we have a seven-days-a-week customer service hotline with live representatives answering your call within seconds. "I tried to call their CS toll free number 2-3 times. After ringing 8-10 times, it goes to voicemail. The above statement from the CEO is only lip service, it is not true.I am ready to return the product and will buy a BRAND name product, like Sony, Motorola, etc. Something I can trust!

Reviews.Title: Not just a monitor but great customer service
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Cutright
Reviews.Content: It is a quality monitor with the ability to connect four cameras to the monitor.  I would definitely buy it again because of that and the very prompt, attentive customer service.  I will not provide details, but we had an issue with our monitor, and after a very quick series of e-mails, we received a brand new unit in the mail two days later.Nothing is better than having a reliable piece like this for peace of mind except the customer service to back it up.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL
Reviews.Author: Allesia
Reviews.Content: This is the second monitor Infant Optics has sent me and it too is a piece of crap. The first monitor did not display colors well, it was very disappointing and the speaker made a horrible hissing noise when the audio was turned up loud enough to hear our baby. It has an auto-mute feature that it defaults to, but it did not pick up our SREAMING baby's cries when the camera was only 3 feet from his crib. I returned the first one thinking it was just faulty. They sent us another one and this one is even worse. Not only is the audio still awful, the monitor keeps freezing on us. I have had to take the battery out 5 times in the last 3 or 4 days just to get the frozen image off the screen and get the poor audio hiss to turn back on. I am so disappointed in this, and unfortunately my return window expired 2 weeks ago so I am stuck with it. I will never recommend this brand to anyone! At this point I'd rather have a simple audio only monitor that at least picked up our little one's cries. That would work 100% better and be more efficient! Ugh.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor for the price and good customer service.
Reviews.Author: James C. Scott
Reviews.Content: For the price, this monitor cannot be beat.  It works well, it's easy to use, and the customer service is good for dealing with any problems.  It's not perfect and doesn't have as many features as others, but it does the job for the few years that you need a monitor.

Reviews.Title: No signal
Reviews.Author: Cami Washington
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your money! We received this as a gift 6 months ago. I used it a couple of times as our daughter still sleeps in our room. 6 months later it is not able to pick up a signal; keeps beeping and says "out of range" even when in the same room as the camera. Worthless product !

Reviews.Title: Great monitor--for exactly a year
Reviews.Author: ssprings13
Reviews.Content: This monitor worked perfectly for just over a year--which is conveniently the length of the warranty. After 13 months, after working everywhere in our house with no signal problems, it suddenly could not get signal anywhere. I had to constantly move it around to catch signal, and it would lose it again. I emailed their customer service, who told me it was likely interference with my wireless network (which had not changed or moved). I tried turning off my wireless router altogether, and the monitor continued to have problems. I ended up having to drop another $100 on a (different) monitor. A year is really not a sufficient life for a baby monitor, seeing as you need it longer than this for even just one kid.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase for the price
Reviews.Author: MARIA B.
Reviews.Content: It has worked for us just fine. It does all we need it to do. It has hit the floor a few times and it still works.

Reviews.Title: Great system with a great price
Reviews.Author: K. Braccia "moonpaste"
Reviews.Content: We registered for this camera system based on the reviews and price.  It was easy to set up, the picture is clear and the sound is great.  This company has wonderful customer service if you find you need assistance.  I recommend this product over the other ones out there that are so much more $$$.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Darlene Georgiades
Reviews.Content: This is a very good monitor works well and was exactly what we wanted and expected. very happy with product

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR-5 2.4 GHz Digital Video Baby Monitor with Night Vision
Reviews.Author: PHYLLIS MOORE
Reviews.Content: Gift item for expectant mother.  She loved this particular baby monitor for the digital video, night vision, portability, and ability to purchase additional monitoring transmitters for installation in more rooms.  This was her first choice on her registry after researching many.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't buy again.
Reviews.Author: Deandra Carroll
Reviews.Content: I never believed in spending a million dollars on a monitor - my first was just audio and a cheap one which worked fine as for me, if the baby can't walk out of bed, video wasn't needed. Then my daughter started walking and in her own toddler bed therefore "mobile". We wanted a middle of the road video monitor in regards to price and this was it for us after reading many reveiws. I have been using it for 2 months now and below are the things that worked and didn't work for us.Pros:-simple and super easy to use-night vision works great WITH nightlight in room (see con list)-great price considering others are well into 200+ and sometimes waaaaay more complicated devices to operate-easy to add extra cameras if needed though we opted out on that as one is enough for usCons:-audio worked for about a month then started to cut in and out... And now does not work at all, you hear it when you first put the monitor on but then it cuts out and doesn't come back.-plastic covering the screen scratches big time and super easy and now we have to really try to see her sometimes at night because the scratches have taken over the entire screen. (And no, we didn't play frisbee with it - it just scratched that easy with us.)-it's very light and has a cheap feel to it, which is fine for me BUT I fear it's going to break most of the time so I'm very gentle with it and though we liked the price, it's still $100, it should be better quality.-battery is crap and seems like it lasts for a couple minutes. (Obviously longer but still, it sucks.) we just keep ours plugged in most of the time.Overall I loved it for the first month and now wish I spent mor e time researching a better one - with no audio we have to use our old audio monitor with this one for video. Basically we wasted our money. :(

Reviews.Title: Sound didn't work
Reviews.Author: Melissa Bain
Reviews.Content: I loved the idea of this monitor... not too spendy, with all the features I was looking for. It worked perfectly for 2 days. Then the sound went out part time. I thought it was the voice activation feature at first, as my baby is not very noisy when she wakes. But I had my husband stand in the nursery and talk and nothing came through the monitor. He tapped on the camera, and there was a pop in the monitor, but no vocal recognition. Amazon was great with the return process. 5 stars for them, 1 for the monitor!

Reviews.Title: Less expensive, less functional option - better for big kids
Reviews.Author: ChicagoKate
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't purchase this monitor for for two reasons. (1) it only relays fairly loud noises like cries, not initial whining or other baby sounds and (2) the monitor is on all the time; it doesn't fade out after awhile so I have a bright constant nightlight. I have to keep the monitor on me at all times and am constantly checking to see if my son is moving. Not ideal, especially at night. We have a more expensive Summer monitor that we've used for 3 yrs with my daughter and it's completely worth the extra money. I never have mommy guilt for not hearing her cries for 5+ minutes until they escalate to a scream. I also get to experience the cool stuff like hearing her sing herself to sleep. This monitor will never allow for that. I would not purchase again.

Reviews.Title: All the features you need, none you don't
Reviews.Author: Michael C. Abernethy
Reviews.Content: It's a great monitor. Infrared night vision, VOX setting, easy to use, and multi-channel so you can set one up in the nursery and one over the bassinet if you want. I especially like that it automatically kicks out background noise (like our sound machine) until the baby starts to fuss or cry.

Reviews.Title: Works great, great customer service
Reviews.Author: Justin O.
Reviews.Content: Works very well, solid range.  Had an antenna break off just before the year warranty was up and customer service was extremely helpful and responsive in getting us a replacement free of charge. I'd recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Picture is very blurry
Reviews.Author: Chelsea Alva
Reviews.Content: Not happy with this purchase. Wish I could return and get some money back. Big waste and cheap quality. :(

Reviews.Title: Broke down over time.
Reviews.Author: autumnrose
Reviews.Content: I've had this for 2 to 2 1/2 years now and officially had to decommission it recently. First to go was the battery, the monitor had to be plugged in for it to work which was an inconvenience. Next, the screen would turn off even if the baby was moving or making noise which made it pointless. Eventually it wouldn't even turn on (like it's suppose to) when the baby woke up and started moving or talking. The night vision stopped working, then the monitor antenna just snapped off. Eventually it just stopped working altogether.This is with little to no abuse of the product. It might have fallen once or twice but nothing bad enough to damage it like this. It's just a throw away baby monitor, not something that you can keep using for future children.I really liked it at first, for the first 6-8 months but then, it just gave up. I wouldn't buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great product; even better customer service!
Reviews.Author: Jen McDonald
Reviews.Content: The Baby Bargains book recommended this monitor, and sure enough it is the perfect combo of easy-to-use with the necessary bells and whistles.  It's cute, lightweight, and and both the screen and audio are very clear.After several months of use, my monitor screen began to fail, unfortunately.  From the moment I contacted Infant Optics' customer service department (on a Sunday, no less), they were profusely apologetic and acted swiftly to provide a replacement unit.  Through every step of the process, their team was attentive and helpful... I only wish they had more products for me to purchase!

Reviews.Title: It's eh at best.
Reviews.Author: Dareian
Reviews.Content: I am a little dissapointed with this monitor. The sound on it is horrible. When I saw my daughter wake up, I went back to get her and she was crying and I didn't even know it. So I now have to use my old regular sound monitor and this one...which is irritating. Also, it has started going white for a few seconds on the screen every now and again.The one good thing about it is that it does have good image quality.

Reviews.Title: Best customer service!
Reviews.Author: Hillary
Reviews.Content: I was given the DXR-5 as a baby shower gift, and it turned out to be the best one, long term. We had one problem with it after almost a year of daily use, and they replaced the entire unit very quickly! A great product that is only made better by the first rate customer service. Thank you Mae!

Reviews.Title: Not What We Expected
Reviews.Author: Marcus "Me"
Reviews.Content: ProsPricePicture quality during the day is pretty good.ConsOur battery failed 6 months after purchase so we have to leave it plugged in at all times.The low battery or low signal beep is ridiculously loud. Scares me to death every time it goes off.The clip on the back isn't very well designed. You have to give it a wiggle it every time you want to open or close it.It takes quite a bit of noise for the audio to turn on. It just doesn't seem to pick up noise very well. Our son has gotten up many times without us knowing it because the audio on the handheld unit didn't turn on.Picture quality at night is so-so.Large antenna doesn't fit in pocket so well and pokes me in the side when clipped to pants.ConclusionBaby monitors give you junk quality for the price you pay. We'll be looking into getting a wireless IP camera to get out of the "baby monitor" market.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor, great customer service
Reviews.Author: Jessamine Lopez
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a fairly good video monitor.  At first I wasn't sure about the auto mute feature, but I have grown to love not hearing crackling static constantly and baby's every squeak and squawk.  It kicks on only when baby make noise above a certain decibel, so we always hear every cry.  I learned the hard way that the camera MUST be anchored down to something, not just perched.  Although I have dropped it several times (on carpeted floor) while re positioning and being generally clumsy, it finally broke at the plastic hinge when baby must have made a swipe at it and knocked it off the crib rail one night.  It was still functional for a while after I jerry-rigged it into position with twist ties.  It eventually fell apart completely and became useless.  Since my baby is just six months old and we still needed a monitor, I thought I would try contacting Infant Optics about a new camera.  Low and behold, they sent me a brand new camera just a few days later! I totally didn't expect that, especially since the damage was no fault of theirs. That's great customer service. Now we are smarter and wired the camera into the desired position on the crib rail, so no more falls.  So in summary, good camera and great customer service, but minus one star for the cheap plastic hinge which can break easily.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Angelo
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is exactly what we need.  The sound only comes on if she makes a noise(there's no static when she's quiet). I love having video so I don't have to get up with every little sound she makes. Couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: Looking for the Best
Reviews.Content: I love that you can increase or decrease the brightness of the screen.  This is awesome at night.  I wish it came with an extra charging unite for the monitor though.

Reviews.Title: great monitor, outstanding customer service
Reviews.Author: christine de baca
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor and loved it until one day the antenna broke off of the handheld piece. I contacted the manufacturer, and they immediately sent me a replacement. I was very impressed with their quick response, helpfulness, and understanding. They certainly bent over backwards to help me out. The monitor itself is fantastic - it works great, provides a clear picture and has good range. I can even get reception outside while I'm doing yard work while my little one is napping. I recommend this product to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics-love this monitor
Reviews.Author: NikkiR
Reviews.Content: This monitor is a great little thing!!  I have had the monitor almost a year now. I did have to have the unit replaced because the antennae broke and the volume button wouldn't allow me to turn down the sound. BUT, I contacted Infant Optics and they replaced the unit instantly!!  They were wonderful with customer service and dedicated to their customers! Mae was my rep and she was awesome! Thanks Infant Optics for a great product!

Reviews.Title: Good Monitor. Clear night vision
Reviews.Author: matt taylor
Reviews.Content: Purchased this monitor and am pleased with it. Had a small problem with antenna, but the seller took care of it right away when reported. Easy to use and set up.The customer service from Seller is great. They were on top of my problem right away and were able to get me a replacement immediately.Monitor has served its purpose well. Only thing is wish the camera had different ways of setting it up, ie being able to hang it or something. We carefully balance it on the crib, but many times it falls off. Would be helpful if it had a Velcro or another way of attaching that provided more stability.

Reviews.Title: inexpensive, helpful, and great customer service
Reviews.Author: Julie Alvarez
Reviews.Content: i love my monitor.  i have two actually - one for each kid!  make sure you know how to use it properly and that the range suits your home.  but assuming those things are good the picture is clear, the sound is crisp and the convenience is amazing!  i have had questions and customer service has been super fast and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Best monitor
Reviews.Author: ekelly
Reviews.Content: We tried several others and nothing worked as good as this one.  All of the others would cut out in our house and this even works if I am outside in the front or back yard.

Reviews.Title: Affordable and Efficient
Reviews.Author: Bookworm562
Reviews.Content: After shopping around for baby monitors, I found this one on Amazon.  Many of the monitors sold at Target or Babies R Us are super pricey and after reading the reviews on Amazon for the Infant Optics, I decided to make the purchase.  This monitor works well and for the price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: I can see; I can hear
Reviews.Author: Josh Armendariz
Reviews.Content: Clear picture, Clear sound.Even when outside in the garden and the child is napping on the opposite side of the house!

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR-5 2.4 GHz Digital Video Baby Monitor with Night Vision
Reviews.Author: Gregory Mendez
Reviews.Content: The product meets my expectations and needI like it because it is novel and special quality materialsI recommend to all Latin American people that sometimes do not have access to rich product varidad already excellent prices

Reviews.Title: Good item to use
Reviews.Author: Marco Iriarte
Reviews.Content: This monitor works as expected, it's simple, just works as monitor, but the signal is clear, image works good in darkness and light situations and the battery works for a long time.I'm satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Sauce!
Reviews.Author: Brian Flores
Reviews.Content: Stop looking for other monitors, and just get this one.  Works amazing for the price!  Supports up to 4 cameras. Can only view one at a time.  Battery last a long time, with video on constant.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: KB
Reviews.Content: We bought this because it was on the lower price range.  It works just fine, the picture blips out for a second every once in a while but it does the job.  The plastic does feel very cheap.  My main complaint is that the lights on the camera are quite bright and when my baby wakes up at night she is instantly distracted by the lights, which makes her wake up even more.  Also the battery life on the hand held monitor is not very long at all.  I feel like I am always having to plug it in.  It works fine for now, I probably would have bought a different one though.

Reviews.Title: Great baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Cartpauj "cartpauj"
Reviews.Content: This monitor is wayyyy better than the old, buzzy Summer Infant monitor we had before. I love that it has color, and it's portable. The settings are easy to manage. I do wish the power cords were longer though, but that's the only complaint so far.

Reviews.Title: Love this monitor
Reviews.Author: Katie Munch
Reviews.Content: I love having this video monitor! It gives me a peace of mind to see my baby sleeping and know that everything is ok. I'm able to see if baby loses her paci and get it in her mouth again before she wakes up. The picture is great day and night and there is no white noise either. If you are leaving it on all night I suggest to leave it plugged in. The monitor died in the middle of the night and made a loud beeping noise. I'm not sure if the battery should have lasted thru the night but leaving it plugged in isn't an issue for me either.

Reviews.Title: Affordable and works GREAT!
Reviews.Author: J. Baldwin "plaque_fighter"
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for my birthday.  I wouldn't have considered needing a video baby monitor but I LOVE it!  I have 3 other children and only used a Sony monitor for them, but this is great!  I can watch in my room and see if he is just making noises or if he is making noises and kicking his legs or turning his head (signs that I can go and give him a pacifier).  If he is just making noises and I get up and go in the room to give a pacifier and he is actually asleep--well, that's just annoying.  I mounted it up on the ceiling looking down into his crib.  At night the picture is black and white, but color in the daylight.  The resolution is not good enough (at the distance I have it from the crib---about 9 feet) to be able to watch him breathe, but I can see well enough to make sure there isn't a blanket over his face or if the paci is in his mouth.  The audio is sound activated only so it isn't on all the time---only if he makes enough noise.  I like sound on all the time when they are little (mine is 8 weeks right now) so I have a Sony baby monitor in there also and the two do not interfere with each other.I have my wifi Kindle fire within 2 feet of the monitor without a problem.  There are a lot of options for angling the camera that I didn't know about until I opened the instruction booklet.  :o)  Also, if you buy an extra camera they are super easy to set up, but do NOT come with the camera stand like this one does.  Also, this camera comes paired with the unit out of the box so no set up required.  It is super easy to pair additional cameras to the monitor though.  I got another camera for the 22 month old's room.  It's just fantastic!  Great purchase---been using for 4 days now.

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: Teri Gogola
Reviews.Content: I have has this monitor several months and it works great. Very affordable. Made of cheap plastic though, the antenna snapped when I close a drawer n it, but I just glued it back together.

Reviews.Title: dropped SO MANY TIMES and still going strong!
Reviews.Author: H.G.
Reviews.Content: We have been using this monitor since November of 2012 and it works great. Best price for a video monitor that we have found and its value has proved itself over and over. The monitor has been dropped, knocked over, toddler-handled and dropped again - the battery and back cover pop off, we put them back on and things work just fine. A side note - there was a brief time we though it was broken, but it turns out the unit had just gone into sleep mode :/-  but that's what we get for not reading the instructions thoroughly :)…all in all highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: The replacement unit is working fine so far.
Reviews.Author: James V.
Reviews.Content: The original unit I rec'd worked for 6 weeks and then the video monitor quit working.  I contacted the mfg and they were very helpful in getting a replacement to me.  I have only had the new one for a week so the review is limited, but seems to be working fine.  I like the unit and it is perfect for what I use it for.

Reviews.Title: This is a great monitor!
Reviews.Author: Oink
Reviews.Content: I saw this at my friends house and thought it was really awesome!  Clear picture and sound.  No funny static or noises from the gadget itself.  It tones out the white noise machine.  It also notifies you when the battery is low (but with a VERY loud beeping noise, so we always remember to plug it in!). We bought this and an extra camera for the playroom and it has been a great purchase.  I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Difficulties with interference, then it broke
Reviews.Author: S. Hale "SHale"
Reviews.Content: We loved this monitor... at first. That night, as my husband and I were soundly sleeping, suddenly the monitor beeped loudly and reported that it was out of range, and wouldn't connect even when I was on the other side of the door from the camera unit.  I finally got it to connect and dropped sleepily into bed, until later that night when it happened again! We ended up shutting it off.  The second day was better, though I experienced some interference with my phone, and had to separate them by 6 feet or more.  Which made it a pain tp walk around the house.  On the third day, the receiver suddenly reported it was out of range again (I was only on the other side of a thin wall from the camera) and wouldn't connect no matter what I tried. After several hours of beeping and frustration, I gave up and got another brand of video monitor, which worked perfectly and still is, 30 days later. I'm not sure if my experience is a fluke, but it sure was frustrating!I was also struck by how "cheap" the receiver felt in my hand, and I was afraid to handle it too roughly in case it might break. There are also bright red lights on the camera unit that lit up my son's room, which isn't too concerning, but the second unit we got (Motorola) doesn't have those lights.  I also did not like how "tinny" the sounds were coming from the monitor - it didn't sound anything like my son's voice and was kind of creepy.  The auto-on feature was cool, but it doesn't have a way to only have audio, so in the middle of the night when he coughed, our room lit up with the bright screen for a while (waking me up every time).  Also, the "out of range" beep was SUPER loud and obnoxious, and would continue to beep every few seconds until it re-connected.  It seemed to take a really long time to reconnect, so I wasn't ever sure if I was within range again, or just needed to wait longer.All those problems are not present with our new video monitor (Motorola), so I am very happy to have paid $50 more for our new one to avoid those frustrations.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat for price and quality
Reviews.Author: Rayna Rhode
Reviews.Content: This has been an awesome investment. Very clear picture and gives my husband and I peace of mind knowing we can see and hear our munchkin when we are in another room. Other monitors are more pricey and too complicated. We've been very happy with this especially for the price. Definitely keep instructions because the volume and brightness buttons have other functionalities too but of you don't know how to undo or adjust settings you can get frustrated.

Reviews.Title: Before I return it...I want to clear up a few misconceptions.
Reviews.Author: HB
Reviews.Content: I am returning this product, but before I get to why I am returning it...I want to clear up a few misconceptions.  It is very clear that many users did NOT read the directions.There are three ways to use this monitor.1. With video and sound on at all times (Yes, It will drain the battery quickly).2. With video turning off after 3 minutes of no sound above 60 dB (Therefore, conserving battery by not continually showing the video).  *It will turn back on if it senses loud sounds (baby crying, yelling).3. With video AND sound off - only turning on when there are loud sounds heard. (This is what other monitors call "sleep mode"...so that the parents aren't hearing the baby moving around in the crib...only the sounds that need to be heard at night).If you're having problems with no sound, or not video, or it cutting in and out.  READ THE DIRECTIONS.Now.....why am I returning it?1. There is a constant "hum" and "crackling" sound coming from the parent unit.  It didn't matter that I turned off my wifi.  It continued to happen.  I know a lot of users complained that this messed up their wifi...well I don't know if mine did or not. I even followed the directions in the manual to fix the problem. I can tell you that it continued to happen despite my router being turned off.  And it didn't matter how close or far away I was from the camera with the parent unit, so it wasn't a reception problem either.2.  The video quality wasn't as good as I expected.  There was a lot of "noise"....you photographer people will understand.3.  Even on the highest volume setting - it was hard to hear my daughter.  The high setting on this monitor compared to low-medium volume setting of my old monitor.4.  The manual states to point the antennae down if you have this monitor on a higher floor.  That way it's always pointed down toward the below floors where you most likely will be with the parent unit.  Well now you can't turn the camera on and off.  The antennae blocks it.5.  It's light weight and cheap feeling.  I have a feeling that if my toddler accidentally got a hold of it once...it'd be toast.  My other monitor parent unit has been abused by my toddler and it's still going fine.I REALLY wanted to love this monitor.  You get what you pay for I guess.  I'm bummed.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this monitor!
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: My husband spent months doing research on which monitor to buy. We finally ended up deciding on this one because it had most all the features we thought we wanted and was reasonably priced. We are very happy with our choice! The video and sound quality are excellent. The only weird thing is that the signal interferes with our wi-fi so we have to turn the camera off when our son isn't in his crib.

Reviews.Title: Good product, great price
Reviews.Author: Sarah M.
Reviews.Content: A video monitor was one of my most important purchases. This is a good video monitor that gets the job done. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars:1) I would like it to have an option to clip it to the side of the crib2) You can't really see/hear baby's breathingIn retrospect, I might invest in a fancier monitor, but if you're on a budget this definitely meets the need.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: LovestoBuy
Reviews.Content: It's not the fanciest but you get what you pay for and it does most of the job. The sound on our cuts in and out, so it's safest to look at the camera often incase the sound is not coming through but at least you can see if your baby needs you or not

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Happy Natural Mom
Reviews.Content: I like this monitor. It's easy to use and the picture is fairly clear. It's a very basic model that gets the job done. Our Wifi is in our room where the baby sleeps. When the camera is on it does interfere with the Wifi and I can't get the IPad connected to the internet. The night vision rocks! I can keep a night light or bathroom light on and the picture is perfectly clear. All-in-all, a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after 1 month
Reviews.Author: Harper Lee "Scout"
Reviews.Content: The video worked well for a month and stopped.  Haven't been able to get it to work again.  The sound never worked well.  Just before it stopped working all together, I could power it off and on and could get the picture back.  Now, nothing.  Tried "pairing" protocol.  Still nothing.  Very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: J. Chan
Reviews.Content: I dropped my monitor and the antenna broke completely off. Infant Optics' customer service was nice and replaced the monitor for me. Fantastic customer service.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: Robert and Marlane
Reviews.Content: The image is not very clear and the sound quality is very poor. I was disappointed. Do not buy this.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor for the Price
Reviews.Author: apatel
Reviews.Content: I've been using this monitor for 2 months and so far so good. It provides a clear picture that I can see in the middle of the night. The only issues are: the sound cuts on a lot since we use a white noise machine (this used to wake me up a lot at first), sometimes the monitor says it loses signal and just shuts off - this is really random since I won't be moving and/or will be very close to the nursery.  However, this has only happened a handful of times and after turning it off & on it goes back to working fine.

Reviews.Title: Baby monitor is pretty good - customer service is amazing
Reviews.Author: Bill Burket
Reviews.Content: Monitor was simple to set up. Be sure to read the instruction manual - there are some cool functions with this monitor but they're toggled via whacky button combinations of brightness-up+volume-up, brightness-down+volume-up, etc.Also, if you have a 2.4 ghz wireless router, this thing will blow up your internet connection of the receiver device is near your laptop/tablet/phone.I initially had a bad unit (display was freezing), but customer service did an amazing job of replacing the device for me. Service was prompt and I received a replacement device within 3 days.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: It looses it's signal quite often despite only being one floor apart, it also does not play continuous noise..which might be okay, but I'd like to use it to monitor my older kids also when on another floor, the only problem is, I'd have to set & watch it constantly.  I'd rather have constant noise monitoring & be able to pop the screen on & off when I want to take a look.  When the baby fusses, if I don't hop immediately it goes back to quiet (as long as she stays at same decibel) like it's choosing to block out her noise - so I cant' tell right off if she settled or if the monitor stopped sending her noise through.  AND heaven forbid you are asleep when the battery gets low - there is no warning (like an indicator light that tells you it is getting low) that thing goes off like an alarm clocks, LOUD & in rapid succession...so that you are scrambling to shut it up.  While I appreciate being alerted, I don't want to be woken out of a dead sleep thinking there is a fire in the house either....there has to be an in between there.  I wanted to send it back about 4 days after we got it & we never got around to it, so now I am stuck with it.  I would have gladly returned it & could tell right off it was a bad fit.

Reviews.Title: One year in and still works great
Reviews.Author: Kerry Schaffner
Reviews.Content: Good monitor screen. Had loud volume if you are far away from it, good distance range. One year in almost and it still works great.

Reviews.Title: Wifi network breaks
Reviews.Author: Srinivas
Reviews.Content: It interferes with wifi signal, if i switch on this camera , my wifi network breaks. so can't watch my netflix/ip-tv while we have this camera on. Strongly suggest don't buy it.

Reviews.Title: Camera doesn't tilt
Reviews.Author: Caley
Reviews.Content: It's a good monitor but the camera will not tilt so the angle is too high but other than that a good buy

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, no need to spend more
Reviews.Author: Mark "durrsak"
Reviews.Content: Great buy, good picture and sound. White noise not as loud as on other cheap monitors. Could use a little more swivel on the camera and it'd definitely be useful if you could turn camera further down to see further below the level the camera is installed. Can't put it high up on a shelf because it doesn't go down far enough. Great buy for the price though. Image quality is good at daylight, GREAT at night with the infrared on

Reviews.Title: No good way to mount camera
Reviews.Author: Jonman
Reviews.Content: The only camera mount option is to screw it into the wall.  We figured there would be some way to clamp it onto the co-sleeper or her crib but the only things you can do with it are set it down on something flat or screw it into the wall. It's also very flimsy and cheap feeling.

Reviews.Title: Great video, Fair audio
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Surprisingly good picture for being so tiny.  I am very pleased with the night-vision image.  My only complaint is that the unit is rather quiet.  I purchased it to hear alarms on my son's apnea monitor, and even that loud "honk" is barely audible at the loudest setting.  I can hear a few louder sounds - such as crying - but I can't hear if he gets out of the bed or is playing in his room.  Great picture, but only fair audio.  Also, the product is very, very light... it feels "cheap" - I wouldn't be rough with it.  It seems to be a good buy for the money, but it is by no means heavy-duty.

Reviews.Title: go for it it's amazing
Reviews.Author: Ohood
Reviews.Content: Its amazing and very helpful to watch your baby and the most thing that  I was in love with is the night mode its clear ... I advise you to go for it

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Denise Adkins
Reviews.Content: Sometimes the sound just stops receiving like there is no connection.  I can still see the receiver picture.  I use this in a chlds room not for an infant.

Reviews.Title: Had to return because it was interfering with our wifi speed.
Reviews.Author: iPhoneuser
Reviews.Content: Had to return because it was interfering with our wifi speed. If you want just a basic camera for not a lot of money then this one would be fine. After going through one other cheaper model we just splurged for the Motorola camera and it's awesome.

Reviews.Title: What you see if what you get...
Reviews.Author: Manuel Zarate Sinfonte "Manu"
Reviews.Content: Good. Easy setup, crips image. As compared to others and their function, seems a bit overpriced, but it's definitely a good investment.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this product
Reviews.Author: Elena
Reviews.Content: So far this is the best product for me in the market. It has only functions you need, nothing confusing or complicated.Just would be nice to have it in some other colors, at least white.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Kim Edinger
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great monitor, especially for the price!  I have owned it for about 8 months and haven't had any issues.

Reviews.Title: Worked great for three weeks, then flaked out
Reviews.Author: Lin Zhang
Reviews.Content: Had to return it (return is pending). Worked great for a few weeks - then the image became permanently reversed, distorted, cropped in half. Reset, took the battery out, reset the camera and monitor - didn't help.

Reviews.Title: Beware of not lasting!!!
Reviews.Author: NewMommietoBe "newmommietobe"
Reviews.Content: We have had this since the beginning of December of 2013.  It will not keep a charge and also loses signal but never leaves the nightstand.  If you want a dependable working monitor this is not the one you need.  Our son has asthma, we can not rely on this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: LauraNav
Reviews.Content: The quality of this monitor its incredible, night vision works great. The battery does not last a long time but I'm okay with it. I'm getting ready to buy a second camera. I recommend this product to parents to save a few bucks.

Reviews.Title: Buy this video monitor! You won't be sorry!
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this video monitor.  It has worked incredible for the past 8 months and I've been recommending it to all of my friends.  The VOX feature is my favorite part! Additionally we had a minor issue with the charging after 8 months of use. Their customer service department was incredible and replaced the charger for free within a few days. They also sent a follow up email and when I originally called a live person answered the phone right away...I never had to deal with an automated system. Buy this video monitor! You'll be glad you did!!!!

Reviews.Title: Digital Baby Monitor well worth the price paid
Reviews.Author: Wayne R. Laporte
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to use for my father, who is 89.  He had two instances of falling in a one week period of time.  I was very concerned as I have a hearing problem and did not now how to keep an "eye" on him when he went to bed.  Thought about a baby monitor and this one was recommended on the web.  I checked it out and am very pleased.  I wish the volume would go a little louder, but otherwise I am pleased.I do think it is a little misleading as the ad shows it with a baby resting, in full color,  It actual is B&W; (and the description tells you that), but seeing the picture of the color display makes you think otherwise.Would highly recommend for use for any mother for watching their "children/babies" and to watch over and elderly person if you are a care give.Good value for price paid!

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor!
Reviews.Author: Justin Fugitt
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this monitor.  Good picture even at night.  If you look close enough you can even see them breath.  Good performance and options for the money.

Reviews.Title: Lasted a few months
Reviews.Author: VeronicaMD
Reviews.Content: I was pretty excited to get a video monitor was good ratings for such a good price, and it worked pretty well, but a few months in, the monitor went blank and after extensive investigation, I found a wire on the camera was split open like someone had sliced it with a knife. It was the weirdest thing, and very disappointing, and a waste of money. I guess I should have spent a couple hundred dollars and I would still have a monitor.

Reviews.Title: it's okay..it works
Reviews.Author: T. G.
Reviews.Content: I downgraded from summer infant monitors after the new color boosts are defective and the monitor starts snowing or out range. You cannot control the camera with the monitor with this one but it works....

Reviews.Title: Buy it - for the monitor and the customer service
Reviews.Author: JBro "JBro"
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor - I don't have any experience with any other kind.  It delivers on what I needed it for - monitoring my baby and it works at a good distance.  The night vision is great.  I have had it since July or August, but I recently had the monitor (not the camera) quit working.  I called the company and a representative called Mae assisted me - she gave me troubleshooting advice and shipped the defective component free of charge and it arrived in a couple days.  So not only is the product good, the service the company provides is also good - well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Works great, flimsy plastic housing
Reviews.Author: Liz Hardin-Strnad
Reviews.Content: We've had ours for a year and it's worked fine, but the plastic it's made out of is really flimsy. We've just been really careful not to drop it. We only use it in the bedrooms though so we haven't tried taking it around the house and setting it up in other places. Used nightly and it's never dropped the signal for us. Pretty good price for a video monitor. The night vision is nice so we can look and see when he's crying to see if he's wedged himself in a corner of the crib or whatnot.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Cheap Cheap
Reviews.Author: R. Voboril
Reviews.Content: Even if you are on the tightest budget, I wouldn't bother buying this monitor. Sure the picture and sound quality are great, but the unit feels like it will crumble at any moment—both monitor AND camera. Don't plan on dropping it, EVER, it will crack. And if you don't want to mount the camera to a wall, it's nearly impossible to get a good view of a crib/bed/room with this camera since it doesn't point down at all. We want to place the camera on a book shelf so we can easily move it if needed, but if what you want to see isn't above you or straight ahead, good luck doing this. For almost $100, I'm shocked at the poor over-all quality. Sending it back immediately.

Reviews.Title: I always feel like somebody's watching me
Reviews.Author: Jason Mack
Reviews.Content: We use two fo these camera's to keep an eye on our baby and toddler son.  I like how up to 4 camera can be paired to the monitor.  We have had no issues with these and find they work equally as well at night when in infrared mode.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Simon D Willis
Reviews.Content: A little flimsy and the buttons are impossible to read, other than that it works great and happy with the purchase for the money

Reviews.Title: LOVE this monitor!
Reviews.Author: Leslie Mooney
Reviews.Content: We've had this monitor for about two months now and we absolutely LOVE it! The image is so clear, I can see my baby breathing. There is no interference with our wi-fi and no background noise or anything. The VOX feature (that saves battery) is also awesome.This monitor is such a great buy. It doesn't have all the bells and whistles that some other monitors (temperature reading or the ability to talk to your baby) but we didn't need those features. I just needed a monitor that shows a clear picture of my baby and clear sound and this is what this monitor provides. I recommend this monitor for anyone looking to buy a video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Daniel L. Workman Jr. "Dan"
Reviews.Content: I would have given this product 5 stars as the video is great and it does have a great distance. The only thing I do not like about it is it is not very loud at all. You can only hear it if you are in a very quiet place. Other than that it is a great product.

Reviews.Title: wish it was louder
Reviews.Author: JA
Reviews.Content: My husband and I love this monitor. We only wish it was louder. But so far so good! the picture is great!

Reviews.Title: There's a better option I'll tell you about...
Reviews.Author: Jason Dittberner
Reviews.Content: Had this camera for over a year now. It was a baby shower gift. I really don't understand why it is so popular when there are MUCH better options out there for the same price.First off, this camera interferes with our wifi. That may not be the case for you, as every configuration is different, but very frustrating nevertheless.Design flaw #1 is the antenna sticking out. It will break. If you ever drop it, that thing will be the first to go.Next, we have battery. My goal isn't to talk anyone out of buying this monitor, because it works OK...I just want to give you a few warnings and tips. Buy an extra battery when you purchase this. I tried buying a replacement locally, and couldn't get one anywhere including battery only stores and Radio Shack.Cords. Buy half a dozen to start with. This monitor has the worst connection jack on the receiver.  Just from the normal charging, it will wear out every couple of months. I think I purchased 4-6 of these cables. They are cheap, and Amazon has them...so do yourself a favor and get a few to have on hand.The biggest feature lacking is the static placement of it, meaning you can't remote control to change angles. So, when you go in to move it so you can see...at 3am, you wake the baby (feedback in the receiver).For nearly the same price you can buy the Foscam FBM3501. No antenna to break off. The charging jacks aren't cheap so you're not buying cords all the time. You can remote control the angle, zoom in when you can't quite see something, set a reminder for feedings, see the temperature of the room on the display...not to mention the LCD is bigger and has better night vision. VOX mode also has three sensitivity settings, unlike the one on the Infant Optics.The angle stand on the Infant Optics is also complete garbage and it falls all the time (so that's when you break the antenna).Bottom line? We're talking about two totally different classes of monitors here. There's no comparison.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Outstanding Customer Service
Reviews.Author: James Scott Fuller
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a video baby monitor that fit our price range but also provided the features that we wanted.  The initial monitor we received had an issue with the speaker on the monitor.  A quick email to the customer service provided quick and easy exchange with a new monitor sent out while the other was in transit back to the company.  I worked with the customer service rep exclusively through email, they were the most responsive I have ever dealt with.Now that we have the replacement monitor we are extremely satisfied with the product.  It is sturdy and provides great video and sound.  The auto mute and VOX features are great and the night vision is outstanding.  I would highly recommend this product based on the quality of the monitor and camera as well as the companies outstanding customer service.  I would not hesitate to but another monitor from Infant Optics.

Reviews.Title: So bummed! Camera didn't work.
Reviews.Author: Aaron Thierry
Reviews.Content: I ordered this based on it's reviews in Baby Bargains and on Amazon. It arrived it good shape. I attempted to charge/turn it on today and no matter what I did the camera would not power on. I attempted to call their customer service number and got a recording asking me to leave a message, disappointing.
