I am returning it and going to Babies R Us right now to purchase another Summer Infant video monitor, we have one for our 19 month old and I've been very happy with it, they even replaced it for me when it stopped working.If it had worked properly I would have kept it but honestly in comparison to my Summer Infant I don't like how cheap this Infant Optics monitor feels and I'm not crazy about the blue color for my girls room. The camera feels very junky.

Reviews.Title: Steer Clear of this Cheap, Defective Monitor!
Reviews.Author: Alexis Phillips
Reviews.Content: It was between Infant Optics or Dropcam but based on all the good reviews, we went with the Infant Optics for our baby registry. Unfortunatly it was a defective product that broke the second time we turned it on.  It feels like a cheaply made product and customer service was extremely difficult to work with to get the issue resolve.  Stay Away!We were excited to recieve it as a gift in the mail one day and immediately opened it up and tried the set up.  We're we sorely disappointed.  First of all it's very cheap quality feel and I just had a bad feeling from the get go. Each piece has a cord adapter to plug in and I found the set up to be a little difficult especially with the camera. Once we got it plugged in you have to synch the camera to the monitor and it was difficlut to get it to synch.  Lots of annoying, loud beeping as we tried and tried and finally got it to synch.  Then it would un-synch for no reason so we tried again.  The camera itself is difficult to place so that you can actually see your baby.  It points upward but we wanted to place it on an adjacent dresser and point it down into the crib.  Well that required using an extra stand/adapter that they provide, but it's extremely flimsy and tips easily.  Also the placement of the on/off button of right where you want to hold it so just picking up the camera means you're probably going to turn the camera off or on by accident, AND have to go through the whole synch process all over again.  BUT unfortunately when I turned it on again the camera didn't turn on at all.  I couldn't get to work.So the next day I called customer service and they had me test to see if it was the adapter cord or the actual camera.  I determined that it was the adapter and called them back at which point they asked me for the details of the order.  Well, I knew this was going to be complicated becasue it's a gift.  She refused to send me a new adapter until I was able to provide this order information. Why, when a company has a defective product, do I feel like I have to do all the recovery work for them and explain myself.So now I have to call the kind, generous person who purchased the product for us and explain that their gift was defective and ask them to find the order information in their email and send it to me, so Infant Optics can enter it into their system and send me an adapter that probably costs them 50 cents.  Even when I finally get the adapter probably well after our baby is born, I'm not going to be happy with this product.I really wish I had gone with the Dropcam and probably will just end up buying it anyway.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: KYgirl5
Reviews.Content: Previously we had a summer infant video monitor.  It pooped out, so we chose this one as a replacement.  This is not as nice as Summer Infant.  You can either have video always "ON" or on voice activated operation (VOX) to save power.  I have found that voice activated operation (VOX) is NOT always activated when baby makes noise.  Therefore, I have to keep the monitor "ON" at all times...running out battery quickly.  Sound quality is just OK.  Quality of picture is just OK.  Saw a friend's Motorola monitor which is MUCH clearer, plus has zoom.  So, this is the cheapest video monitor for a reason.  It will likely do the job...just not as clear (video and audio) as higher price options.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it
Reviews.Author: Patrick R Gentry
Reviews.Content: Amazing value haven't seen anything nearly as cheap and it works great. I wouldn't get any other product ever unless the quality turns out to be poor we will have to see as time passes.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: julian barboza
Reviews.Content: feels cheap but does its job. battery never lasts to long unfortunately but the price is nice. i wanted a inexpensive video monitor and thats what i got.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: Amy1848
Reviews.Content: Hand set is a bit big and awkward.  Static feedback is bad without the option on that turns all sound off (except loud noises).  Standby is finicky, but clarity is good.

Reviews.Title: Great Baby Monitor!  Fantastic Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Rae326
Reviews.Content: I bought this baby monitor and walked my entire yard to make sure the range was good enough.  I want to be able to work in the yard and let the baby nap inside.  The range is awesome!  My yard is huge and I was able to go to every corner and still see and hear the baby.  I had a few issues with the nighttime mode going in and out in my baby's bedroom during day naps because of the window.  I finally realized that you can set that to on, off or automatic.  I now have it set on so it doesn't change back and forth so much. My camera unit starting having trouble tilting. The screw seemed stripped and the camera could only be flat or tilted all the way down. I called Customer Service and Mae was amazing!  There was no "press 5 for this or 0 for that"  Mae answered the phone, took my order # and had me a new camera ordered in less than 3 minutes.  It was seriously the best Customer Service experience I have ever had.  Mae then emailed me after my new camera came to make sure it worked okay.  Talk about a class act company.  I am so glad I bought this baby monitor.  The price is right, range and picture are great, and the customer service is beyond amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor/Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Dorion A. Hoffmeister
Reviews.Content: So, I love this monitor.  It works great and is a great price.  The real beauty of the product is the great customer service.  I had a question and got back a lovely response in about 3 hours.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: The camera is remarkable. So worth a 100 bucks. The plastic feels cheap, but the camera is crystal clear. I can actual see my child breathing.

Reviews.Title: Only used it twice, and sound doesn't work anymore.
Reviews.Author: Adam Petersen
Reviews.Content: I have to say that it looks great in the picture, but the camera doesn't aim lower than the horizontal.  You need to have it mounted on the wall pointing down.  If you look at the picture you can see that the camera can stand up strait, but wont lean forward much more than what you see in the picture.  Pointless to put it on a dresser since it cannot aim down to see into the crib.Like I said in the subject line, I have used the camera twice and now the microphone on the camera picks up no sound and I hear nothing at all.  Sometimes it comes on for a moment but with a lot of static and I hear nothing but static.  I am not happy at all with this product.  Not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: lasted about 4 months
Reviews.Author: Inna K.
Reviews.Content: It never worked that great to begin with: patchy signal even inside our 1800 sqft house, turns off randomly sometimes etcNow it doesn't work at all. The power and signal lights light up, but there is no picture.This was a waste of money

Reviews.Title: did not work fo us
Reviews.Author: blewso
Reviews.Content: We view the baby room with only 10 feet between the camera and the monitor#1 we could hardly see the bassinet#2 we could not hear any noise from the room even when  one of us stayed in the room and made a noise

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Crystal D. Tischner
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor. I can see and hear my baby while he sleeps. It's great! I love the sound detector turns off when it is quite. I use this every night!

Reviews.Title: Great Product, even better customer service!
Reviews.Author: alaskanseminole "alaskanseminole"
Reviews.Content: Unit worked flawlessly from day one (great range!) for about 9 months until the mic starting going bad.  I contacted customer support and had a response within 24 hours.  After explaining my situation, Mae shipped a replacement camera out immediately.  We had our new unit up and running in no time.  Mae even conducted a follow-up check to see if everything was going well.  GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!My ONLY complaint about this camera is the WiFi interference.  After having AT&T; Uverse replace my wireless router twice, I finally figured out it was the monitor, NOT the router.  LOL  These days whenever we want to stream Netflix we simply turn off the Monitor and all it good.  Maybe in the future, Infant Optics can release a 5ghz model.

Reviews.Title: Very nice video monitor
Reviews.Author: Sylvia C. Kvacik
Reviews.Content: I looked and looked at video monitors in this price range until I could barely decide which would be the lesser of the evils.  I decided on this monitor since it had many reviews.  I made the right choice.  The video feed is very smooth on the parent receiver.  There is no delay.  The picture is very clear, both day and night.  The sound quality is also very clear.  The monitor goes silent after just a few seconds of low or no sound.  It immediately kicks back in whenever your baby makes a sound.  I wish that the monitor had a room temperature option on it, but it seems like monitors that had that feature in this price range had lower quality of video.  I would recommend this monitor over any other in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Some Good Some Bad
Reviews.Author: Sesame Mommy
Reviews.Content: The first one I received the monitor didn't work at all. I emailed the company & they got back to me the next day telling me to ship back my order & once I emailed them pictures/proof of the product being returned they would ship out a replacement. I had to pay for the return shipping & had to send them a picture of the receipt so they could reimburse me thru Paypal which is the only way they will refund you. I didn't have a Paypal account so I had to create one in order to get my refund. I received the new order very quickly but when I set it up I could barely hear my daughter even when it was at the max volume. I contacted the company again & they mailed me a replacement camera & I didn't need to mail back the defective camera. Overall the customer service was prompt & helpful. However, I didn't like that I had to create a Paypal account in order to get the refund for my postage (I also had to follow up with them on the refund because they hadn't put it in my Paypal account in the time they said I should receive it). The picture is very clear & the sound level is okay, not great. The baby monitor I had before had a standard black & white screen but the volume level was very good. I guess it's a bit of a trade off.

Reviews.Title: Thumbs down
Reviews.Author: Emili Z.
Reviews.Content: Horrible, looking back id spend the extra 100$ for the summer infant which was amazing but we lost the camera and were too cheap to pay 200$ again...  In this case u don't get your money's worth, it really should cost 50$ Or even less, and then maybe id say it was worth the price...

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: megw
Reviews.Content: I received this monitor as a baby shower gift. Once we started using it, my husband and I were addicted. Its a huge piece of mind to be able to see our baby as he sleeps. With this being our first, I can't compare to any other monitors however I researched them a lot before purchasing this one and its lived up to my expectations. The best part of the monitor besides the functionality is the customer service from the company. We actually had a glitch with our first monitor (which can happen with any electronic device) so I contacted the company and they emailed be back within an hour! The customer service rep was a REAL person, gave quick answers, and we ultimately needed a new monitor and it was shipped to us within several days! I would take awesome customer service over a large big box company any day. I truly felt like they were concerned with their product and making it right. Its hard to find a company that takes the time to do that these days! I highly recommend them and this product!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Kim Fowler
Reviews.Content: This monitor serves its purpose, but mainly when plugged in. I can't get much more than 4 hours out of the battery when unplugged. From experience I don't like to recharge or plug in a monitor until the battery is fully exhausted.  Doing so with this monitor is inconvenient as I'm up every 2-4 hours with baby & focusing on recharging a monitor is the last thing on my mind.  There is also no zoom or ability to move the camera if baby moves.  I only saved about $50-75 with this monitor & wish I had spring for the monitor with better features, albeit more expensive, it would have been worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great product, excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Patrick Sullivan
Reviews.Content: We've had a DX-5 unit for a couple of years, it has been an excellent product for us.  It helped us keep an eye on our son while he was sleeping or napping from infant to toddler stage.  When our original camera unit started to malfunction I contacted Infant Optics customer support and they worked very quickly with me to get a replacement product to us.  Great value and great customer support.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: George PDX
Reviews.Content: Gave it to my sister and she loved it. Says it works great and the picture and sound is clear. She uses it throughout the house. My stance is for the money you can't do better

Reviews.Title: infant optik camera
Reviews.Author: nicoleta comoara
Reviews.Content: It looks ok , but you can not hear nothing until the noise is very loudI was used wirh the one i had before that i coul hear the girl breathing

Reviews.Title: Faulty charger issues
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: Monitor itself works great.  Except I have already had to replace the charger after 6 months and now the replacement has stopped working.  Perhaps it is my electrical, but each one has showed wires exposing with normal wear and tear.  I do keep mine plugged in for all use but now have to resort to disconnecting camera to charge monitor and then plug back in.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice for the money!
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Hall
Reviews.Content: While others may have a nicer design and resolution, this one is definitely the best quality for the money! We are very pleased with this purchase and use it every single night. I like the features, it's easy to use and works for us!

Reviews.Title: Great product; wish battery lasted longer!
Reviews.Author: AdmiralSchiff
Reviews.Content: If this thing would hold more than a few hours charge, it would be perfect.  The very loud beep to indicate that the battery is running low has woken the baby a few times- not ideal.  Camera and handheld monitor are portable enough to bring on trips.  Overall, I'd buy this again- the night vision is great, and the fact that the sound only comes on if the baby is crying is great.

Reviews.Title: Good product .... terrible battery
Reviews.Author: SanClementeJedi
Reviews.Content: Not the sturdiest looking product in the world but the sound and picture our super clear.  I don't think this would survive any rough treatment so keep that in mind when purchasing.  Major flaw I see is that I had to order a replacement battery after 5 months.  Might as well just order that $10 replacement battery when you make your initial purchase.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: A. Jaramillo "ALJAR"
Reviews.Content: after having problems with previous similar baby monitor products this one works perfect ! It works on low light conditions. I do recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, and superb customer service!
Reviews.Author: G. Santos
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor.  I bought this after spending a lot of time researching video monitors, and it received the best reviews on Amazon.  The battery life is not as long as I would like, but its only a slight inconvience.I recently contacted customer service regarding an issue, and I received a reply from Mae, the customer service manager, within an hour.  She answered my question and provided additional information which was very helpful.  I was very impressed with Mae, and appreciate a company that values their customers.  I would highly recommend Infant Optics products!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Product, Wonderful Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: AbigailM
Reviews.Content: My husband and I put the Infant Optics DXR-5 on our registry when we found out about our daughter last year!We had been using this monitor pretty much non stop, as we put her in a crib in a separate room fairly early on.Not only is the quality of this monitor excellent - great visual, great audio, and very sturdy - but I must relay my excellentcustomer service experience.  At one point, the power cord stopped connecting with the monitor (We must have wrapped it around itself one too many times), and I just figured we had worn it out and after the 8 months of serious daily use, that we should get another.  But something made me just email the company in case there was an 'fix' for the power cord situation.  I received a reply that very day, and the customer service representative (I had the same wonderful lady through my whole series of interactions) couldn't be more helpful.  First, she suggested some troubleshooting things, which ended up not working, and then when we identified exactly what was wrong, she sent me a replacement cord that very day.  I got it two days later and she even followed up with me to make sure everything was up and running again.  There are lots of monitors out there, it can be so confusing!  I am so glad we chose this one!!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: We used to have a Motorola monitor, but it burned out after a couple months.  This one is much easier to use, has better picture and sound quality and is overall a better monitor.  We could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: love em
Reviews.Author: LAC
Reviews.Content: Like them very much. Gives me sense of security. Love being able to watch the child sleep.  Would recommend to every one.

Reviews.Title: Great product and nice customer service
Reviews.Author: J Keeley
Reviews.Content: Baby monitor is a nice size, nice resolution on the camera, and the camera is very flexible in terms of the angle at which you set it.  When i received the monitor, the rechargeable battery in the monitor did not work.  I contacted customer service and they were very responsive...sent a new battery very quickly, and now it works well. I would recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This video monitor is a really great product. The price is even better! We use a white noise machine in our daughter's room all night and the monitor does a great job at only allowing us to hear our daughter not any other noises.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Support
Reviews.Author: J Sharp "Jeff Sharp"
Reviews.Content: We received the monitor as a gift and it worked great for about 6 months then the power button stopped working.  We contacted the company directly and they said they would send out a replacement as soon as we put the broken one in the mail.  They were also very generous when USPS had issues delivering the replacement unit.  It was tough being without the monitor for a few weeks, but they really stand behind their product.

Reviews.Title: Really good product for the price
Reviews.Author: Romina Bin
Reviews.Content: I can close my baby's room door and still able to listen to him. Great reach and quality for the price!The only thing that was a bit disapointing was the fact that the product is advertized as "color LCD" and I only see the screen in black and White... (not only at nights, that is supposed to be in those colors because of the night vision, but also during the day... that means the screen is black and white... ). This is not a big issue anyway...

Reviews.Title: ok for the price
Reviews.Author: MegStage
Reviews.Content: I've been using this daily for 7 months.  The picture is pretty clear and I like that I can turn the volume and brightness up or down.The first two months I kept getting woken up by a clicking sound the monitor was making every time it turned on due to the baby making noise.  I learned to keep it on the "VOX off" setting and it no longer clicks, the image just stays on.  Even on the lowest brightness setting it's still bright for me so I wear an eye mask.The biggest flaw in my opinion is that there are 8 red lights on the camera component which stay on all night.  My baby stares at these lights, transfixed, and cannot get to sleep.  There is also a bright green "night light" on the top of the camera which is also too bright.  We ended up putting a few pieces of blue painters tape over the green light and that has helped.  Babies love to look at lights and when you are desperate for them to sleep it's unbelievably annoying for them to be lying there, staring at the lights.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor
Reviews.Author: Momof2WynMax
Reviews.Content: I've had this monitor for a year now. Yes, as I read the other reviews and saw the concern for the plasticy feel if it I was a little hesitant but I am glad that I bought this monitor. I previously had just an audio monitor but it started giving back bad signals and high pitches as it was 5 years old and we had bought for our daughter. I wasnt sure about a video monitor as I was worried I would just stare at the screen at our son (worried mama like I am). But I LOVE that you can set the monitor to "sleep" when there is no noise in the babies room and then if there is sound the screen pops right back on so you can see whats going on. Also the 5 levels of brightness on the screen when it is on and the 9 sounds levels. I turn both up on the highest level when I leave in the morning so daddy wakes up when our son does. :)  I did notice how light in weight it was but I like that its not heavy. The plastic grey part that incases the antenna on the monitor broke off on mine but with a little super glue I popped that sucker right back on and have had no other issues. I will be purchasing an additional camera as our family grows as I do think this Video Monitor is great for a decent price.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Armenak
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my nephew. Great price good material still holding up good audio and screen for night time as well

Reviews.Title: Range issues
Reviews.Author: miak
Reviews.Content: We live in an 1800 square foot, two floor condo. This monitor doesn't reach from the baby's room to our kitchen, bedroom or bathroom. I mean, what kind of house is this monitor made for? Unless we are in the hallway outside the baby's room, we have no reception and can't see the baby. That close, we don't need a monitor, we can hear him! The only reason I gave a couple stars is because when it gets service, the image is clear and it works great.

Reviews.Title: It's never too late
Reviews.Author: Viviana Fechner "SilvivLeaf"
Reviews.Content: I chose five stars because it is by far one of my best purchases and because it is so easy to use. Has really good quality in sound and visual. I only wish we bought it sooner. Our little guy is 18 months and we've had this for about a month now. It's a really great tool to have piece of mind. I read a lot of reviews, surveys, etc. before we made this purchase and I gotta say that our internet does not have any delays at all when the monitor is on. It's a great produce, great price, and we received it in three days!! Thanks :)

Reviews.Title: Great little monitor
Reviews.Author: Emily in Colorado
Reviews.Content: We've had this monitor for two and a half years and it is great! We have used it for two kids and it's holding up perfectly. True it doesn't have some of the "fancy" features that some video monitors have, but for the price, it's great.The video quality is good, but not great. Night vision works really well. Audio quality is crystal clear. Never had any problems with static. You can mount the camera on the wall or use the included stand.There is no audio warning if the battery is going to die on the parent unit. Just a flashing light. Which doesn't help you if you forget to plug in the unit and it dies while you are asleep. The monitor does however make a very annoying beep noise on the parent unit before going into sleep mode. There is no way to turn this off. Those would be my complaints.The camera does not turn unless you do it manually. And while you can buy additional cameras, the parent unit does not "scan" automatically between those camera. This means you only see or hear one camera at a time, even in the night.As with all baby monitors, we do have some issues with it slowing down our wifi. But that is the case for all monitors we have used.To those who have complained on battery life, I recommend trying a replacement battery. Contact Infant Optics customer service. They are amazing! We had a problem with one of our charger cords and they replaced it, no questions asked.So really, while not "perfect" this unit does the job and is a fraction of the cost.

Reviews.Title: Infant optics has great customer service
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: This monitor is great for the price. I thought we had an issue the screen so I contacted the customer service dept. and I received a response right away. They were also able to help me with the issue.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Customer Service
Reviews.Author: John Wilson
Reviews.Content: For the price of this camera it I think it is a good unit.  It is relatively easy to use since there is nothing too fancy about it.  The picture quality and night vision are both good and the unit has an auto mute and auto power save mode, both which are convenient and work well.The customer service I experienced with this company was excellent.  I had this unit for a little over a year and it began to not operate properly.  This is likely due to the wear and tear of usage and being dropped too many times by my son.  The monitor stopped working so I attempted to fix it (because I didn't realize there may be a warranty).  After fixing it the sound worked, but we had no video.  I searched Amazon to buy a replacement monitor, but they don't sell them.  I emailed the company and inquired how to buy just the monitor.  I emailed with Mae, from the company and she told me that they do not sell just the monitor.  However, she advised me of the 1 year warranty.  By this point it point I had unit for about 14 months.  Mae told me that although my warranty was expired they would still honor it.I explained all my issues, including the attempted repair work I did.  They still took back my broken unit and sent me an entire brand new one.  The entire process went very easy and smooth.  My new unit arrived with in 2 days of mailing out the broken one.The customer service was unexpected and hard to find.  I was very pleased with my experience.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised!
Reviews.Author: Gracie Soetekouw
Reviews.Content: We bought this unit so we could monitor our grandson from upstairs while we were dining but it would not even transmit 75 feet in our house. We live in the Caribbean and our houses are solidly constructed of cement block which evidently was the problem. It might work better in a normal house but was of no use to us.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: The only negative I could say is the display could be larger, but it is totally fine for the price. I have been using this monitor for six months now and it works great. I don't know what I would do without it! We mounted the camera on the wall above our daughter's crib and leave it on 24/7, because otherwise I forget to turn it on and then have to sneak in while the baby is sleeping and risk waking her ahhhhh! The volume is good, the night vision is great, the signal has been great for us with a few blips here and there for a second or two. I would totally recommend this monitor to anyone with a young child.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS - and they have great customer service!
Reviews.Author: FlippyHippy
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our third child. It was our first video monitor. We love it. It works well, has great features, and good distance. My 3 1/2 year old son lost the battery the first week we had it, but we contacted the manufacturer and they replaced it immediately. Definitely happy with this item.

Reviews.Title: Works great and good value!
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor 2 years ago. I looked for a video monitor and was shocked at price. Came upon this monitor and thought it had a lot to offer. Two years later I do not regret this purchase!  Great monitor:Pros: good picture quality. I can clearly see my son in night vision or regular vision mode. The camera can easily be positioned to see a large area. The camera is small. The handheld monitor has good range. I've used it in my backyard with great success. The energy saving mode works great (although we rarely use it since our son's noise machine prevents it from working).Cons: the antenna on the monitor is fragile and broke when it fell. We superglued the antenna case back on. The base also isn't designed well to sit on surfaces (the monitor base isn't totally flat) and the only thing to keep it standing is a flip up piece of plastic.Great monitor worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: great! and great price!
Reviews.Author: Alexa Denise Andersen
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that wasn't too expensive, but this one is so much better than expected! The night vistion is great, the sound is perfect and range is also great. My house is 4 stories and i have no problem with the connection from the 1st and 4th floor. The battery could by slightly longer (only because you have to have it plugged in all night), but that's not a big deal, you can have it not plugged in for a few hours actually. I definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Good product (has some minor flaws) but EXCEPTIONAL customer service by Infant Optics
Reviews.Author: Heather LaMont
Reviews.Content: I have never written an amazon review in my life, but rely on reading reviews for everything I buy. I felt compelled to write a review for this product. There are other better monitors out there, but for more than twice the price, and this product does everything you need it to at an appropriate price point.After owning the monitor for about 10 months, it fell off of our coffee table and the antenna cover broke, exposing the actual antenna wire. Needless to say, it stopped working/getting a signal almost immediately. Even though it was MY FAULT that the monitor fell, I thought it would be worth a shot in calling the manufacturer for assistance. I spoke with Mae at Infant Optics, who didn't ask me 20 questions or give me a hard time about my issue, and she immediately offered me a replacement unit at no cost. It came in 2 days and has been great. She followed up and made sure everything was working OK. It truly means a lot when a company has great service to back them up and they actually seem to care about customer satisfaction and their reputation. If you aren't 100% satisfied with the unit or you have any issues, do not hesitate to call Infant Optics. They will do everything they can to make you happy! :)

Reviews.Title: Great price! Works great!
Reviews.Author: Michael J Wenner
Reviews.Content: Love this monitor!  I have a bit of hearing loss and so I was nervous just to get an audio monitor. I love to be able to see my baby! I can tell by her face if she's upset or if she's just twitching or yawning or whatever. I don't have to interpret the noises I hear like you would in an audio monitor. The price is great too!  Recommended in Baby Bargains book.  I can't speak to longevity yet because I just started using it earlier this month with my newborn.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds Expectations for the Price
Reviews.Author: Michael Jackson
Reviews.Content: Love this monitor, I have two of them, Grandma has one, and I tell all my mom friends they need this monitor. It's less than half the price of other monitors but does the same thing. I love the voice activation feature which save battery life and turns off the screen so it's not bright in your face at night. Zero feedback noise (which is awesome for a $99 monitor!) The range is great for anywhere around the house. Customer service is extremely helpful and nice if you ever need to ask them a question or have a problem. I recommend this to EVERYONE!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Cheryne Ellis
Reviews.Content: My sister used this model, so we thought we'd try it for our twins nursery. They were easy to install and set up. They are simple cameras, that do what we need.

Reviews.Title: Like the night vision option
Reviews.Author: Benita Jackson
Reviews.Content: Works good so far. Will know more after I have used it longer. I was confused about removing the lens cover because it did not have one when unpacked.

Reviews.Title: very easy to use
Reviews.Author: Kellie X "Kellilie"
Reviews.Content: camera quality is high, clear enough to watch your baby's move. easy to use and set up. i'm glad i've bought it.

Reviews.Title: decent for the money
Reviews.Author: new mom
Reviews.Content: I love the picture quality volume seems decent the bad things are battery life is awful, if you have another base it doesn't automatically change views to show which child is crying, also wish there was a dim feature or sleep feature as it is really bright in our room.

Reviews.Title: It works fine, but interferes with our wifi
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: we only use it at night, during the day we just rely on being able to hear her cry - but that's pretty easy for us in our 2 bedroom - 800 square foot apartment.

Reviews.Title: Very difficult to see the picture
Reviews.Author: CampIng Professional
Reviews.Content: I installed two of these. One in each of my children's rooms. The picture was very difficult to see. Was also very difficult to make out the sounds. I had to return the product since it did not meet the quality of a similar device that I had from 1999.

Reviews.Title: DXR-5
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I purchased the DXR-5 because I was on a tight budget but still wanted to have the benefits of a video monitor.  I could not be happier in terms of the cost/functionality ratio.  It is very user friendly as there are only a few buttons.  The monitor's sound turns off until the baby makes a sound so you do not hear it all night.  I did have an issue with the monitor about 8 months into having it.  I e-mailed their customer service department and they were AMAZING.  They sent me out a replacement without any issues.  I would definitely recommend this monitor to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great Product for Price
Reviews.Author: Maryn
Reviews.Content: Overall I really enjoy this product. It is very lightweight like others say, but I have found that never to be an issue. It allows me to see my baby clearly. I have taken it with us on multiple trips. At home the camera sits on a shelf in our baby's room. When we travel I usually find another shelf to put it on next to the pac n play, or I use clear packing tape to tape it somewhere.At night, the monitor would come on when there was any noise (even a dog barking outside) and it would wake me up thinking our baby was awake. The only way for us to remedy this to a way that allowed us to sleep without thinking our baby woke up was to keep it on the setting where it is on all night long. I leave it plugged in during the nighttime and keep it on all night. That way I don't hear it turning on and off and it waking me up. I keep it at a volume that I can hear if our baby wakes up, but also that allows me to sleep. Our baby has a white noise maker so I hear that noise from the monitor, but it is masked by the white noise maker we have in our own room. Interesting setup but it works well for us!After about 9 months of use, the cord that plugged into the monitor got a small tear in it, exposing some wires. I contacted Infant Optics and immediately they responded to me, and shipped me a new cord at no cost. Their customer service is exceptional.I am pleased with this monitor. It allows for me to have peace of mind to check in and see how my baby is doing, and the cost is a great value!

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: michael grund
Reviews.Content: Product works as advertised, would have left a better rating but the battery only lasts about 4 hours.  The video quality was better than expected for a baby monitor in this price range.

Reviews.Title: best buy
Reviews.Author: Tekada
Reviews.Content: this is the best gadget we purchase to date for our baby. Love the fact that you can view and it alerts you to sounds when he awakes. Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: dlighthousemom
Reviews.Content: it was perfect and had great video.  i only wish it had another monitor or a way to charge another battery,  battery only lasts 6 hours or so. otherwise performed great.

Reviews.Title: Have used this monitor for 2 years
Reviews.Author: emily bates
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to leave a review early on because I feel like you can't get a realistic idea on the way a product works within the first couple weeks.That said, I have been using this same monitor since my daughter was born almost 2 years ago. I'm reading a few reviews that said they couldn't hear their child crying with their TV ON...  They couldn't see the outline of their baby in their crib, the picture is too grainy etc. while I agree the picture is somewhat grainy, I wish Amazon would let me post a picture of my child on the monitor screen. We are visiting family out of town, and the camera is about 6+ feet away, and up on a cabinet.  I can see her CLEARLY in her pack n play. At home her monitor is 6+ feet away fixed to the wall! and I can get pictures of her asleep with her legs sticking out of her crib. To those saying they can't see their kid... How far away is your camera?! Good grief! And if you can't hear your kid with the tv on... Try turning down the volume. The monitor goes from silent to #9 in volume. I keep it around 4, and even at my grandparents house who keep their TV volume up to SIXTY, I can still hear my daughter crying.I have had no issues in the 2 years I've had this monitor. Except the battery is just now starting to need to be replaced. Which in my book is pretty freaking good.  Now that I am responsible for my grandparents too, I will be getting another camera for while I am not physically around them.LOVE this monitor!! So worth your money!

Reviews.Title: Works great and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Kelsey W
Reviews.Content: Simple to use. Just plug it in. Works great in the dark and light automatically. Sound is great on it too. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Not good!
Reviews.Author: shalim
Reviews.Content: The image is not clear at all, at least not as clear as the one showed on the picture. It always says that it doesnt have signal, when it does and makes a beep sound which can be really anoying if you are trying to do multiple things at the same time or are just tired!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful customer service, happy with monitor
Reviews.Author: Katie Leigh Miller
Reviews.Content: We wanted something that was economical and functional and this monitor is just that.  It works well and the power saving mode is great once your baby is sleeping well.  The noise and brightness will not keep you up and the monitor will only turn on if your baby is fussing.  You won't wake up with every movement your baby makes.  Very pleased with this monitor!

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Pedro Galante
Reviews.Content: It works very well. Easy to install, good signal reception, good night view and screen size. If you want a baby monitor for a good price, it is the best one.

Reviews.Title: The best cost X benefit !!!
Reviews.Author: Bruno S.
Reviews.Content: !The best cost X benefit!!! Recomended ! Friendly and easy to use. Long range and  good sensitivity microphone. Good price

Reviews.Title: Great product & a FANTASTIC company to deal with
Reviews.Author: Nick Gent
Reviews.Content: Firstly, the product does exactly what it says on the tin.We are extremely impressed with the clarity of video in a pitch black room and the peace of mind that comes with being able to check on our little man at a moments glance.There was a slight issue with the microphone on the initial order, but this company is a real pleasure to deal with service-wise.Through email this company got a new unit sent out to us within a couple of days.  Their replies were usually within the hour via email.  This has been the most pleasurable experience I have had in terms of service level for many years with any company.Keep up the good work folks!  Thanks Again!

Reviews.Title: Recently purchased for grand baby expected in March.
Reviews.Author: J. Wood
Reviews.Content: For our fifth grand baby I decided to splurge and purchase a video monitor to help me keep an eye on her while I am busy with her big brothers.  After reading info and reviews on numerous models, I settled on the Infant Optics DXR-5.  The price was right and it had good reviews.  It helped to read thru the manual first so that I could possibly avoid some of the problems others ran into as mentioned in some of the reviews, i.e. internet interference, sound, voice control, delays, etc.  Following that step, I plugged it in to charge the battery in the monitor for the suggested three hours, positioned the camera for a good view of the crib, and turned it on for nap time to watch the 2 1/2 year old Worked like a charm right out of the box.  No internet problems, no sound issues or picture delays.  I am very pleased with this model so far and would not hesitate to recommend it for a friend or family member.  Check back later as I will update after it has been in use for a while.  I am anxious to test out the projected range and the battery life on the rechargeable l-ii battery.

Reviews.Title: A year later I'm purchasing another monitor
Reviews.Author: LiamsMama
Reviews.Content: We registered for this monitor on our Amazon registry.  We felt considering the reviews and the price this would be a good fit for us. It has served it's purpose for the last year, but considering you can buy nicer monitors with more features for the same amount of money, I regret getting this one.  First I can't tell you how many times I wish I could communicate remotely. Second, there are times I wish I could zoom in to get a better view of DS.  Both are made out of not very durable plastic. The camera fell off the shelf and broke.  We had to rig it with some rubber bands and hang it upside down from the base.  Then the antenna broke, so the signal cuts in and out all the time, which is especially annoying with all the beeping at night.

Reviews.Title: Battery no longer charged
Reviews.Author: Nancy Le
Reviews.Content: At first when I bought it, I love it, Even recommended to my friends. But after a year of barely using it, the battery no longer can be charged. You have to play around with the cord, then it is charged for like 1 second.

Reviews.Title: Got what we paid for
Reviews.Author: John McNeal
Reviews.Content: Yes this works. Thats about it. We wanted a video monitor that we could see our infant in her crib and also set up another to see our toddler in his new big boy bed. We went with this one, plus the extra camera, because it was a cheaper alternative to most we had seen. It does the trick we can see and hear them but it is the bare minimum in terms of monitors. You can not automatically cycle between cameras. You have to manually switch to the other camera which is a little impossible at night when you are sleeping. The sound is not great, sometimes I hear the smallest thing and other times my son is talking and I cant hear him over the noise machine. We've had all sorts of problems with it interfering with our wi-fi. And it doesn't have a talk function allowing us to talk to our children through it, which would be helpful. We still use it all the time and it works fine, but if I were to do it again, I wouldnt buy this one.

Reviews.Title: Lasted only a year. Wifi killer.
Reviews.Author: Matt Conner
Reviews.Content: Does what it is supposed to but kills any wifi signal in your home which is incredibly frustrating. Also, made very cheap. Go with the samsung which is slightly more but a much better option.

Reviews.Title: It worked great for a month
Reviews.Author: Amy Wallace
Reviews.Content: Product worked great for a month, but will no longer do audio.  Gonna try and send it back.  Also it has a very cheap feel to it, plastic that is just waiting to break.  Really sorry i went for the bargain monitor.

Reviews.Title: A Gift For Our Granddaughter & Husband
Reviews.Author: Bonnie E.
Reviews.Content: My husband and I will be giving this to our granddaughter and her husband, so they can not only hear their precious baby, but can also see him, even at night, and it's wireless, and we think it's great. I know they will love it, and will make them feel more safe when they're not with the baby. They put it on their wish list with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Product + Great Customer Service = you want to buy this!
Reviews.Author: ajs8705
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor and company are overall great! It has great picture quality, range, sound, night vision, easy set-up, and it is portable, everything you want in a video monitor. I have 2 different cameras link to one monitor for both of my daughters and I love them. The customer service of Infant Optics is also awesome! After owning the monitor for nearly a year it suddenly quit working correctly, (the camera still worked fine though) I contacted the customer service by email, and they were very quick at responding and sent me a BRAND NEW monitor and camera within 2 DAYS with no charge! I simply had to send my old one back. The customer service manager was very quick to respond with any questions I had, and even checked to see if I received my new monitor. I was very pleased with how they handled my situation and would highly recommend both the product and company!!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT SERVICE
Reviews.Author: C. Stanford
Reviews.Content: We received this monitor as a gift from our kids to use when our grandchildren spent the night at our house.  We have had a few issues with the unit, but the issues have been QUICKLY resolved by the company.  We have emailed the company when we had a problem and Mae has ALWAYS emailed us back almost immediately.  She is amazing and has resolved each of the two issues we had.  I would highly recommend this company based on their customer service.. It is rare today that a company actually cares about their customers satisfaction.  Mae is amazing and makes sure that you are totally satisfied with your product.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Janell Dirksen
Reviews.Content: No nonsense monitor- it gets the job done.Pros:Clear video pictureGreat priceSmall designCons:Monitor sound is terrible- very fuzzyThe monitor does not have a turn off function- you can set it to be on VOX mode so it will turn off after 3 minutes but the minute there is any noise in the room it turns back on for 3 minutes. I wish it had a button that you could quickly turn on sleep mode.Messes with WIFI- other reviewers have said this- it totally messes with our WIFI and we have a tiny house.Overall- it provides us with the ability to check in on our little one- if our house was any larger- I would go with another, better monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Luciana Becker
Reviews.Content: Good product!Small, light and easy to use.I recommend this product.I am very satisfied and happy about the product

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Carrie
Reviews.Content: i wanted a video monitor for over two years but just couldn't bring myself to spend a few hundred dollars on one.  in december of 2012, i was browsing amazon and thankfully happened to find this one.  i won't spend the time repeating what most other reviewers have said about the short battery life (just don't plan on using it unplugged for longer than 30 minutes), cheap plastic (who cares?  it's lightweight), etc.  mostly i just want to comment on two random things not really mentioned by others.first, my favorite feature has to be that you can set it so the sound only turns on when it needs to.  another reviewer mentioned that she liked that hers wasn't very sensitive but i actually love that mine IS really sensitive.  if i have it by me, i can just hear the white noise turn on, and see that my kid is moving in his crib... even when he's not making any noise.  it is so sensitive that the white noise comes on when our garage door opens or even when my 28 lb three year old jumps up and down in a different part of the house.  i don't need to really know about those things, but it is wonderfully convenient sometimes to get that little clue that my kid is stirring in his sleep.  this was actually my main motivation for a video monitor... because if your kid wakes up happy and isn't crying or fussing, you'll really have no clue that they're not still sleeping.second, after using the monitor for just under a year, the sound button broke and i couldn't turn the sound up... only down.  i contacted the company about it and received the most excellent customer service from mae.  my initial email was answered within an hour or so, as was most every email sent between us.  i mailed the unit back (i did pay return shipping myself although i never directly asked to be compensated for that) and was immediately sent a new unit.  i actually emailed a picture of my shipping receipt and they sent me a new monitor right then, not even waiting until they received mine.for $100, you seriously can't beat this.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Solari
Reviews.Content: This video monitor works great. The range on it is pretty dang good. It even uses night vision so you can see the baby when it's completely dark in the room where the monitor is. We always joke that all of a sudden our baby is going to start floating, like in Paranormal Activity, haha. Hasn't happened yet, though.

Reviews.Title: Great video monitor so happy we got one!
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: Used it last night for the first time. My son is 3 months old and we just tarted crib training. He was sleeping through the night in our room in a rock n play so we thought now would be a good time before he's too used to our bedroom. He woke up a couple times kicking his legs and making some movement but I watched to see if he could self soothe, and he did! He basically slept from 10pm to 9am this morning and I owe not rushing in to check on him to this handy video monitor. Babies need to learn some self soothing so they won''t begin to know we are their only source of calming. Miss my lil guy but he was all smiles this morning, so I don't think he minded :)The night vision worked amazing and I was clearly about to see his lil face :) my lil alien baby haha!

Reviews.Title: it will get the job done
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We previously bought another video monitor from another company. It was a terrible, overly complicated piece of junk.This is a very basic video monitor and it's really all you need. We don't miss all the bells and whistles from the other monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor and great customer service
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor last year and would fully recommend it. The unit works well throughout the house and the camera provides a good view whether it is light or dark in the baby's room. I agree with another reviewer that the battery life is somewhat short, but I don't use the monitor all night so for me it's not a problem. In particular I would like to mention the excellent customer service I received from Infant Optics when I had a problem. The plastic antenna cover broke off when I sat down wearing the monitor clipped on my belt, and with continued use, the antenna itself broke and no longer worked unless within 10 feet of the camera unit (rendering the whole thing useless). This was within one year of purchase, and I contacted customer service by email and almost immediately got a reply. All I had to do was provide my Amazon order number (which serves as proof of purchase) which I found by logging onto Amazon, and ship the broken unit back. By taking a picture of the box right before I shipped it and emailing that picture, they sent out the new unit immediately, before receiving the broken one. The service was prompt, accommodating and friendly.

Reviews.Title: Used it to monitor a cat post-surgery
Reviews.Author: puddleunicorn
Reviews.Content: I had to put my cat in a room at night post ACL surgery. She had to be confined in a small pen so she wouldn't aggravate her injury and her leg could heal. I was worried at night that she would be pacing, trying to get out of her pen, or otherwise distressed. I got this baby monitor (the cheapest one I could find) to watch her. The pen she's in was made of mesh and this would only focus on the mesh if I put it outside so I had to jury-rig it inside her pen. I had many nights of trying not to laugh too hard when she would put her face right up to it to smell it and I'd see her face huge in the monitor!The screen is crisp and the light wasn't too bright to bother her. She noticed it, but it didn't bug her and I was able to watch what she was doing. It was annoying that I couldn't follow her movements (like you can with other, more expensive monitors) but it worked wonderfully for what I needed it for. I highly recommend this monitor!

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it; and can't beat their customer service!
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Thank goodness for this monitor.  One would never realize just how useful it is to be able to hear AND SEE a baby!  Really comes in handy when our baby is fussing, and we're unsure whether or not to go into the room (is she on the very of sleep or stuck in the crib slats?!?!).  Total peace of mind.  Plus, there have been some "Kodak" moments we'd have never captured without it!  In addition to being the only monitor we'll ever need or use, Infant Optics provides superior customer service.  They went out of their way to solve an adapter issue quickly, and even sent a follow-up email (unprompted) to make sure the issue was resolved. Thanks to them!

Reviews.Title: Grainy picture but company replaced
Reviews.Author: HD123
Reviews.Content: We bought two of these cameras and monitors to use with our twins. One worked great but the other was pretty grainy in picture quality. After contacting customer service, they very quickly and pleasantly replaced the monitor free of charge. I just has to provide a picture of the poor quality image and the date of purchase. I give this 5 stars mainly for customer service of the company, otherwise I would give it a four.

Reviews.Title: I like, but...
Reviews.Author: Alex Figueiredo
Reviews.Content: I agree with all comments with good things abou this product, but for me there's a problem with interference in my wi-fi network. The performance dropped significantly and sometimes the network is totally lost! I think this device works on the same frequency of my wifi network causing going down

Reviews.Title: Terrific.
Reviews.Author: Leigh Fellner "hcquilts"
Reviews.Content: Easy setup, great reception - I mean incredible, even the night vision.  Minimal static.  For the life of me, though, I cannot get the camera to open so it can stand on its base as shown in the photo. I'm awful with stuff like this, so it's probably me.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Rafael Calsavara "Calsavara"
Reviews.Content: This is the second one I bought. This time to leave at my mother-in-law's house. Wouldn't buy any other brand but this.

Reviews.Title: Great Product. Even Better Customer Service
Reviews.Author: John A Mooney
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love this monitor. It's simple, easy to use, and provides great value at a very affordable price. We used a different brand monitor for our daughter during the first year of her life, but had to switch to a video monitor when she started jumping out of her crib :-/. We're in a two story condo and have never had trouble with range. As I type, I'm sitting on our patio at the opposite end of her room and the monitor is working just fine.We had a great experience this past month with the customer service team at Infant Optics. The antenna broke on the parent unit, which affected the range. Everything still worked, but we couldn't go more than 20 feet or so from the camera unit without losing the signal. I contacted Infant Optics and explained what had happened. I shipped the broken unit back to them and provided them with the USPS tracking number. That same day, a new one was on its way to our house even before they had actually received the damaged unit, all at no cost to us! What a great example of a company that puts its customers first.Highly, highly recommended.Cheers!

Reviews.Title: Works great but it kills Wifi connection
Reviews.Author: KARI ARNOLD
Reviews.Content: Great quality and sound. I love it. The biggest negative is the fact that it kills your wifi connection. Besides that.... I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Cant endorse and recommend this enough!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "mikeklement.com"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our first child (1.5yrs ago) after seeing how much every other video monitor was ($200+). This has been dropped, spilled water on and more and it is still working, video is still great and works perfect. Definitely worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Wilson
Reviews.Content: Though looks cheap, it did help my wife and I taking care of my baby. It saved us lots of time and we are able to take action ahead before anything goes wrong.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, bad sound
Reviews.Author: Ignacio Escobar "nacho"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because of the price and the reviews. I installed it and the video quality is great, but the sound is awfull. I practically had to put the camera 10 inches from my baby so I could actually hear him cry or make noises. I don't like this monitor because its the sound that's supposed to wake you up at night, not the video, and if you can not rely on the quality of the sound, then this monitor really doesn't do it's job.My recommendation, spend a few more bucks and get a better one.

Reviews.Title: Bad Battery life
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Caballero
Reviews.Content: This monitor only works for a few hours. It takes a lot to charge and looses it's functionality of monitoring your baby.Please DON'T BUY this item!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product / with rechargable bateries
Reviews.Author: Steele Waters
Reviews.Content: The camera base and mobile handheld unit is a good monitor. It has a great viewable screen and resolution is good. We use it at night, mostly, so the night vision is of great value. The camera base could be a bit more heavier, when plugged in it wants to move toward the direction the cord is. Not a deal breaker, it is still of quality and would recommend it to anyone. We have not had any issues with the Wi-Fi, it seems to be self sustaining and no interruptions. The handheld has a nice brightness feature, so it can be dimmed when viewing in the middle of the night, so not to wake anyone. There are not a lot of features on this, just the basic, volume, brightness on/off. I know there are other monitors out there that have more features and of better quality, but for the money this one works for us the best.

Reviews.Title: Range is not good!
Reviews.Author: Stephen A. Horton
Reviews.Content: We chose this monitor because it was one of the less expensive video monitors. Our child's room is only about 50 feet away, so we can hear him without a monitor but we wanted to be able to see him. Our monitor goes out of signal about 2 times a day (many times in the middle of the night) and it will continue to make beeping noises until we turn it off and back on again.  If we had known it was going to be this much trouble, we would have paid a little more money for something a little more high quality.

Reviews.Title: Great baby monitor....but baby can't fall asleep
Reviews.Author: CJJN
Reviews.Content: Baby is too curious about the red light (I understand these are night vision lenses). Also it interferes with wifi (as stated in the users manual). so we had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Overall a good video Monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: VJ
Reviews.Content: Pros,Excellent Customer Service/SupportCostworks well without any interferenceclear picture (especially at night compared to our Moto)Decent rangeCons,build qualityMore details,Cost - the main reason we picked this onePicture - We moved from a Motorola Baby monitor which stopped working after 13months to the Infant Optics DXR-5. It defenitely has a better picture quality especially at night compared to our old Moto/unidenInterference - we briefly also used a Uniden which had interference issue causing clicking sounds on & off waking my daughter in her sleepReading reviews and using a few we found out that all Video Monitors have some issue or the other. So we got the infant optics because of the Price and now we would buy another one of their products(if needed) because of their support. Since I know if there are issues they are willing to work with you to fix them. So Overall this is great video monitor for the price since it works well without much interference(except for close range microwave), has good sound & picture(day/night) and most of all the Excellent Customer Support we got.We contacted them because our screen would go off at times and at times we had loss of signal(both issues didnt happen often) and they were happy to replace our 6 month old monitor shipping it right after I sent my tracking info for the old one. They followed up to check if everything was working well with the replacement and answered all our questions.Only drawback I had was the build quality since its all plastic, but for the price I paid I cannot complain especially considering we got a replacement for issues we had. So I would probably buy a product from them just for the support I received ofcourse if the price was right & the item works as good as this. Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: not compatible with WIFI
Reviews.Author: Lili
Reviews.Content: It's a great baby monitor (audio video, vox system) but basically kills your wifi.Return it and bought another one (samsung one)

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Tami J. Martin "Tami Jo Martin"
Reviews.Content: This unit feels cheaply made and operates that way as well. The sound on our device hardly worked. My husband could be in the baby's room yelling and it was barely audible on the parent unit. The screen could not be shut off while it was plugged in. The night vision was terrible and the red LED lights stayed lit, kind of freaky looking. The cords for the unit are way to short, so you cannot mount it up high on a wall to face down into the crib. I returned mine and spent a bit more to get a more quality unit (Motorola).

Reviews.Title: Perfect monitor.
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: It works just the way we wanted it too. The video is clear; the sound is easy to hear and it's durable. It's very safe (no wifi or passwords) and easy to use. Worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised, with unintended consequences...
Reviews.Author: Davis
Reviews.Content: Monitor is great.  It works both day and night and does what it's advertised to do.  However, it interferes big time with the 2.4 GHz signal on my wireless router.  This monitor uses frequency hopping in the 2.4 GHz band to make it more "secure", and it seems to work well at that.  Because of the frequency hopping, it essentially interferes with every channel a 2.4 GHz wireless router uses.  When I have the camera off, my router and wireless devices work great.  When the camera is turned on and broadcasting, it renders that part of my router almost unusable.  It does not interfere with the 5 GHz channels, but unfortunately not all of my wireless devices are capable of 5 GHz.Bottom line, take into consideration the fact that this thing and your 2.4 GHz wireless router will interfere with each other.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal customer service!
Reviews.Author: Amie
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor. I've had it for a year now. It's simple and easy to use with great night vision video. The battery also lasts for such a long time. I was so surprised that I only have to charge it once a week usually, for the amount I use it. It's also really durable since it does get tossed around sometimes by my boys. I have to say, this company has AMAZING customer service. I will recommend this monitor and company to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor. Great customer service.
Reviews.Author: Melissa A. Eberts "- Melissa"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this about a year ago for our first child. I wanted a video monitor but really didn't feel like paying hundreds of dollars, and this was the only one that was in a reasonable price range. I was concerned that the quality might be a little cheap because of that, but for a year it has worked just fine.A couple of months ago, the antenna cover snapped off of the receiver. It still kept working for a while, but eventually the antenna just didn't pick up any signal at all. I was pretty disappointed because this meant I was going to have to buy a whole new receiver/camera unit, or try a different brand (which would most likely be more expensive). So, I emailed Infant Optics customer service to see if they just sold the receivers separately (since my camera was still working fine).They told me that they didn't sell the receivers, but that they would go ahead and send me out a replacement unit, free of charge. This was pretty surprising, since by the time I had gotten around to emailing them, it had been over a year since my purchase. But I just shipped the old one back and they're already ordered me a new one. Problem solved!

Reviews.Title: Great ...but one thing to consider
Reviews.Author: Hyunho C.
Reviews.Content: It is working well. Signal range is very wide to cover big house.It is also working in dark room. And if there is crying or bigger sound, it can response.But there is some interference with wifi signal.I think this signal is stronger than internet wifi. Sometimes, internet wifi is not working well when baby monitor's signal become stronger due to some sound.

Reviews.Title: Range is so limited
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I bought 2 of these as gifts for my two sisters as they recently both gave birth, I chose this model because it looked good, its the number #1 baby monitor sold in Amazon and the high rating it has.Everything is good as expected except the range, if you go 2 rooms away the signal is lost, which made it piratically useless, this was not a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor based on the reviews it got. After having it for 3 weeks, I am returning it. The battery does not charge. It wont stay on longer than a minute or two. How am I going to be able to sleep at night knowing I will not know if my son is ok in his crib? Do yourself a favor and don't waste the time or money.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I give this 4 stars instead of 5 for three reasons:1) You can't adjust how sensitive the auto mute is. I love the auto mute and VOX function, but sometimes I wish it was a little more sensitive.2) Multiple cameras - you have to manually switch back and forth between cameras. I'm not sure how other monitors work but it would seem that if you had two little ones in separate rooms at night you would want it to automatically switch cameras every 10 seconds or show both views on the screen at the same time (not sure how the latter would work for sound.)3) the camera monitor (not the parent monitor) has no battery backup option. If the power is out, I have to stay within earshot of the nursery or if the power flashes, I have to potentially risk waking my baby up to turn it back on.Overall - I am very happy with this product; despite the downfalls I mentioned, it's definitely worth it for the reduced price compared to the name brand monitors.

Reviews.Title: Good enough video, poor audio
Reviews.Author: TZ
Reviews.Content: I already have an audio monitor but I wanted to buy a video monitor to see what my son was doing during his naps. He's 2.5 years old and starting to skip his naps, so I wanted to see if he was standing up or trying to climb out of his crib or anything like that. I wanted something relatively inexpensive (mid-range) that works without interference, nothing fussy or difficult to use with a zillion buttons and controls.Well, I got what I wanted! This little monitor feels light and cheap, but it works just fine. The plastic casing and everything feels cheap and I'm worried that if I dropped it everything would crack, but so far, so good. I really like how the video camera can be mounted in different ways and a little stand comes with it if you need to set it up high and look down. Because the camera is so light, it tends to tip forward, so I had to secure it with some masking tape to make sure it doesn't fall off the shelf, startling my son in the middle of the night. The monitor itself is easy to use and the picture is fine. I can see what he's doing and that's enough for me. Also we do have WIFI in the house and a medley of other electronics, and I've never encountered interference.The audio though, is REALLY bad. I like that the audio kicks off unless my son makes a noise, so you don't hear the constant buzz of the older style of monitors. We have a white noise machine going in his room and I don't hear that at all. Even so, the audio sounds tinny and buzzy, really poor quality. We have an Angelcare monitor which we only use for audio now (the sensor pad was nice for the first 6 months but useless now....and it is under a recall....), and the Angelcare monitor's audio quality is by far better.Some features that would have been nice to have:1) A real on-off button with a physical "click" when the camera turns on and some clear indication whether the machine is on or off. Right now the on-off switch is a button which you depress to turn on and you press the same button once to turn off. A tiny tiny light turns on in the base of the camera to show that it is on, but in a rush, sometimes I don't notice it. Then I leave the room and find that the camera wasn't on, and it's too late to go back in to turn it back on because I would wake my son up. I need a real switch with color coding or something obvious so I KNOW the camera is on.2) Pan and tilt. For the price, I understand that this is beyond the little camera's pay-scale.3) A heavier, no-tip base for the camera.All in all, for the price, it's good enough. It does what I need it to do, no complaints. I haven't used it for long enough yet to know how durable it is. If you need a video monitor that can pick up enough noise to know if your child is crying, good. But if you are the type who wants to sit there and listen carefully to what your child is saying in the next room, this is not the device for you because of the poor audio quality.

Reviews.Title: Great value and works well
Reviews.Author: Janell
Reviews.Content: I purchased this video monitor after a bad experience with a different brand that had a similar price point.  I was leery as the other monitor had almost no warranty and was barely usable as an audio monitor let alone video monitor.  I was worried that another budget friendly monitor would have the same results but after reading so many positive reviews I tried it anyway.........and I am SO GLAD I did.  This monitor is super user friendly and simple (may not be the best choice if you want fancy bells and whistles), has a great picture quality, and is very reliable with decent battery life.  The warranty is easy to sign up for too and lasts a full year.  My only complaint is that it doesn't have a super loud volume but it has been loud enough to wake me ( and I am a sound sleeper).  I would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Gorton
Reviews.Content: I have been using this monitor for about a year now, and have recommended it to everyone I know who is having a baby.  The product is very nicely priced compared to other camera systems.  I have a two story house and my daughter lives on the top floor in the back and am able to go out well into my front yard without any issues.  The camera is very clear and I LOVE the night vision. I'm actually able to take pictures of the video monitor on my cell phone and they are still clear in both day and night.  I have not used any other camera system so I can not compare quality, but for less that $100 this camera is amazing.  The best feature is the auto screen off (VOX on/off) that after a certain amount of quiet time the screen blacks out until noise is detected.  This makes my room stay dark at night and is a good indication if you can't be right by the camera all the time.  I recently took it camping and was able to set it up inside and see the screen flicker on if my daughter woke up.  You are able to set up four camera but I do wish the cameras were a little cheaper (one camera is as much as the whole system) so I haven't tried this feature. This unit does cause interference if you are an Xbox gamer using Turtle Beach headphones (which probably doesn't apply to many of you but for those it does the interference is annoying but manageable if you move the two systems around), but I don't even know its on with other WiFi using electronics.  This also has a one year hassle free warranty (my unit recently stopped working and they sent a new one out very quickly even before receiving my old one) which is pretty good and the customer service representatives are so very nice and friendly.  If you are looking for a good quality camera for not a lot of money, this is definitely the one to buy!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Sound was unusably low
Reviews.Author: Kon Peki
Reviews.Content: Picture quality was fine, but the sound was too low.  Even just outside the baby's room, sound was low.  After walking down the stairs, sound was too low to hear.  It may have to do with interference from our other wireless devices, but the monitor we bought as a replacement performs much better in this regard, albeit at twice the price (Samsung SEW-3037W).

Reviews.Title: Get your moneys worth
Reviews.Author: Bethany Murray
Reviews.Content: This is an affordable monitor if you are looking for video.I love the option of being able to see my kids when they are sleeping, I swear it is the reason my second is such a good sleeper. I can tell when she needs me, and when she doesn't.This particular monitor has some flaws.1. It is made cheap. If it ever falls, it comes apart. Thankfully we have been able to put it back together every time.2. When the battery is low, it does not notify you. The small red light blinks, but no notification. Of course, this went without notice and after a few night of the monitor dying, the battery was toast. Now we have to use it plugged in only. Not very practical!3. The picture is not great, and the sound stays on.It certainly is doable, but the battery notification was enough for me to want to spend a little bit more for a better product.

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Diana B.
Reviews.Content: I changed my review to one star after 3 months of usage and it breaking down. Battery does not last, if I unplug it it will immediately die. And loses the signal ALL THE TIME, even if I'm 2 feet from the camera. Yes it is cheaper than other monitors but it's for a reason. I am buying another one since it's probably too late for me to return it

Reviews.Title: Worked for less than 3 months
Reviews.Author: CatherineDalton Bedell
Reviews.Content: Not impressed.  This monitor worked well for about 2 months, then the picture started cutting in and out, changing from color to black and white then back to color, then bright, then really dim, etc. As you can imagine, the changing colors and flashing makes it impossible for me to sleep with it next to my bed, so it defeats the purpose of having it!  It also interferes with our wireless signal to the point that we can't even use an iphone on the WiFi network when the monitor is on.I'm planning to check the return/refund policy and try to send it back as it definitely has not worked as advertised.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Beight
Reviews.Content: It works great. No issues at all. I love this little monitor! Do NOT listen to the bad reviews. I would buy this again!

Reviews.Title: Must have for new parents
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: As a first time parent, this thing was exactly what I needed to feel comfortable that my baby was safe.  Night vision works great, I can even see my baby's chest move up and down with each breath.  I love the options to have audio and/or the screen automatically turn off when quiet and reactivate with noise.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the monitor, ecstatic about their customer service
Reviews.Author: Alethea
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this monitor for us while we were living abroad, for our first child.  We were able to use it in an apartment with cement walls, between floors, which was exactly what we needed.  It turned out our monitor unit had something loose in the battery compartment though which affected its ability to hold a charge, so we contacted Infant Optics.  Their customer service rep, Mae, worked with me to get a replacement unit nearly a year after purchase, and I was only without a monitor for 48 hours.  Our replacement works great.  We use our monitor every day so that our son doesn't have to scream in order to get our attention when he wakes from naps.  We also use it every night.  I have been very happy with this unit, but I am absolutely impressed by their customer service.  I would buy from Infant Optics again in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Marcia Parker
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Mom because she is a Fall Risk. She can be heard and seen anywhere in the House. We Love this because it helps keep an eye on her at all times!Sincerely, Marcia Parker

Reviews.Title: Look and listen to baby without disturbing infant!
Reviews.Author: Mollie C.
Reviews.Content: Coolest. Invention. Ever.  It makes it so fun to check on the baby without disturbing him or her and hear without worry!

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Valerie Karpa
