Reviews.Content: Pros:-Good, clear picture quality including night vision-I like the voice activated feature so that the camera only turns on when there is noise-GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE: the antenna fell off on both the monitor and the camera when i dropped it; I contacted customer service and because it was still within the 1 year warranty, they sent me a whole new camera and monitor for free (I had to pay return shipping for the broken model).Cons:-I wish the antenna would fold down on the monitor when not in use because it would make it less susceptible to falling off if you are traveling with the monitor.-Also, I think it would be nice if this did come with a travel case.

Reviews.Title: Great video monitor!
Reviews.Author: Alyssa "Alyssa"
Reviews.Content: I needed a video monitor that was at a reasonable price and this has worked great for the first 9 months of our little girls life.  The video image is clear during the day and at night.  The volume lets me know when she is up!  I would definitely recommend this monitor.  I plug it in at night by my bed.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price!
Reviews.Author: Sarah K
Reviews.Content: We purchased this when my daughter was about 6m. We've been using it in conjunction with our Angel Care monitor. I did a LOT of research on many different brands and types of video monitors out there, but when it came down to it, this one seemed to have everything we were looking for and I'm so glad it's the one we chose!We already have a fantastic baby monitor with the Angel Care unit so we didn't need all the "bells and whistles" of some of the more expensive video units out there. Just wanted to be able to see her and have a unit that was easy to travel with. The Angel Care is not a very portable system. The Infant Optics DXR-5 sets up super easily and transmits a very clear image of our child whether her room is full of light or completely dark. The resolution was much better than I expected for a unit of this price and though there's a bit of lag within the video feedback, it's so little that you don't really notice it. It's certainly not a problem. We've used it in our apartment and various family members' homes including my in-law's very large house and it continued to receive a signal without a problem, on a completely different floor. One complaint I've seen on these reviews was the "plasticy" feel of the unit. It's true that it's all a light weight plastic but in my opinion it doesn't feel flimsy to me. I'm not sure what people expect for $99. I've handled units twice this much and they don't feel that different. The "flimsiest" part of the unit to me is the plastic flip-out prop on the back of the monitor. It folds and clicks in to lay the monitor flat and then pulls out with a click to prop the monitor up. I'm gentle with that. Otherwise, it doesn't seem fragile. This monitor has accompanied us on multiple flights and road trips, tucked into our suitcases, and hasn't sustained any damage.If you're looking for an affordable baby video monitor which simply does what it's supposed to do -- offer a good, clear, reliable, video feed for a great price, look no further. Also, customer service is fantastic with this company and setting up your warranty is super easy.

Reviews.Title: love this monitor except keep having sound issues
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: I purchased this and I loved it! But, after about 6 months the sound stopped working. I contacted the company and they sent a replacement right away...but again after about 6 months the sound has stopped working again :(

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price.
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Alvarez
Reviews.Content: It does what it is supposed to do. I wish it would have the talking option through the camera and monitor.

Reviews.Title: It's going back for one reason
Reviews.Author: Customer555
Reviews.Content: The set-up is fairly easy; the video picture is ok, although it has a wide view range, when one would want to focus more on one spot.  However, it's primary purpose should be to hear sounds that you can then check out by the video.  You can't hear, unless the unit is one foot away and the voice is very strong.  That's not ideal, because you would not want the child to grab it, or have microwaves that close to her.  So, this unit is going back, and I'll find one that has excellent sound capabilities.

Reviews.Title: great for price
Reviews.Author: kw
Reviews.Content: Works great. Easy set-up. The screen monitor is a little bright but you get used to it. The white no ice shut off is great only turns the speakers on when there is a noise in the baby's room.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Matthew Zawacki
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture quality even in the dark. Mute and camera sleep settings are very useful. Very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: short battery life and wifi killer
Reviews.Author: Rob Plank
Reviews.Content: Seems like the battery only last 4 or 5 hours at most. And don't attempt to set the monitor down next to your laptop or tablet and work on the computer and watch your child, you will be able to watch the monitor without any problems but your computers wifi will just barely work if at all.The night vision works great and allows us to see if out babies eyes are open or not before going into the room.I think this product could be a 5 star product if the two items above were fixed.  If they are going to use direct wifi they should move to the 5ghz, 2.4GHz is already over used. And yes I knew it was 2.4 before buying but never seen a 2.4 GHz wall created like list before from interferance. And yes I have adjusted the channel on my wifi access point

Reviews.Title: not useful in large area
Reviews.Author: Suzanne "Suzanne"
Reviews.Content: The monitor was purchased to hear an elderly person on the opposite side of the house,Audio would not transmit  making it necessary to return.A monitor made by Panasonic was purchased, clearly transmitting audioacross the house through the five walls.For a smaller environment, this audio/video monitor would be great.This unit did not meet my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Good but stopped working
Reviews.Author: Juliette
Reviews.Content: This was our very first baby monitor. It worked fine for a month. The image was pretty clear but the range was not that great. I could only use it in one half of the house before it would beep, telling me I was out of range. But after just a month, it completely stopped charge and would only work if it was plugged into the wall; making the mobility part of the monitor totally useless. For this and a few other reasons, we decided to return it and get the DropCam instead.

Reviews.Title: Could not use with wi-fi
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann
Reviews.Content: I wanted to like this but it felt cheap and even worse, it interfered with our Wi-fi. Had to return it. Found a much better monitor for the same price at Target.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product with great value
Reviews.Author: Kenny
Reviews.Content: The only reason I did not give 5 stars to this product is because when switched on most of the times this product interferes with our Wi-Fi signal in the house. If that is something not of concern for you, then this is pretty much the product you are looking for. Awesome reception, clear picture and very easy to use. Highly Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Frozen screen
Reviews.Author: Carolyne Fallows Phan
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor did not work for us at all. We bought it a few weeks ago and after just two uses, the screen was frozen with a picture of my son sleeping facing away from the camera. He seemed fine and as though he was having a great sleep. Little did I know he was crying and in need of attention! - The screen was frozen and no sound was picked up either. I'm really annoyed by this as it's still a pretty expensive device and I put my trust in it. I'll be returning it ASAP.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Meridith Christensen
Reviews.Content: This monitor and camera work awesome. Good price for a good value. Only downside is the monitor will beep and then shut off when it isn't charged without any warning that it is getting low. Mine is plugged in, next to my bed all night so it doesn't matter for me but if you are carrying it around all day and some of the night- it will die without warning.

Reviews.Title: Not bad, not bad
Reviews.Author: Mckevin Williams
Reviews.Content: Simple easy to use camera, works for what I need it for.  My only time prob is that I wish the mic was abit  more sensitive

Reviews.Title: great baby cam, great price
Reviews.Author: doughboy
Reviews.Content: this camera has worked flawlessly for us (going on 11 months).  It is simple and easy to use.  picture is very good and noise sensitivity is just right.  also has a decent range - we can go outside up to about 100' away.  only "complaint" (not really a big complaint) is the monitor doesn't stay charged very long when not plugged in.  also wished it came with 2 monitors.

Reviews.Title: Solid product - Great Value - Great Cust Svc
Reviews.Author: Darren Bischoff
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up and gives all the comfort needed for a first time parent.  No unnecessary background noise or interference.  After nearly a year, my battery life went down pretty significantly and so I contacted Infant Optics and they replaced it without any problem.  Great customer service.  The new unit with the latest firmware works even better.  Especially the low battery alert now.  Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great piece of mind
Reviews.Author: Laurie LeRette
Reviews.Content: This camera has been great for us to watch our lil one at night. The sound pick up is very good. The only downside I have found is sometimes it interferes with the Wifi in the house.

Reviews.Title: good pic but broke after about 5 months
Reviews.Author: t
Reviews.Content: Bought this about 5months ago.  Picture quality was OK.  The lights around the camera for night vision suddenly went off and won't come on.  I guess Ill have to sleep in baby room until I find another monitor.  I don't think I will buy the same monitor.  Even its picture quality is good and the price is not too high, the 5-month-life is too short.

Reviews.Title: Great product, versatile, and best customer service
Reviews.Author: Tanya M.
Reviews.Content: We bought this baby monitor a little under 1 year ago, and we have it installed on the wall in the baby room. It can also easily be removed from the wall (without worrying about messing with nails or holes in the wall), so we've also taken it with us on domestic and international trips. When we travel with it, we don't worry about trying to install it on a wall--we just hang it over the corner of the crib or pack n'play, adjust the angle of the camera, and it gets the job done. We can't live with out it. The picture is sharp, the sound can be as soft or as loud as you need it to be, and there are nifty auto-mute and auto-LED settings that you can activate with the touch of a button. It also starts beeping to let you know if the battery is low. The monitor worked perfectly until one day the sound stopped working. We contacted the manufacturer asking if we could be sent a replacement unit, and they responded back to us the next day. They first walked us through how to test the unit to see if it was the camera that malfunctioned or the monitor. Once we figured out the issue, the customer service representative said she would be happy to send us a brand new unit. All we had to do was provide our original Amazon order number, and proof that we had shipped the unit back to the manufacturer. We sent her a scanned copy of the UPS receipt, and that very same day she put in a request for a replacement unit, and expedited the shipping. We received the replacement unit less than 2 days later, which means we were only without a baby monitor for a total of 2 days. That was so important to us since we use the monitor everyday. We were terrified that we would have to wait weeks for a replacement unit, but Infant Optics was so helpful and responsive. We were also thankful that we received a brand new unit, rather than a refurbished unit, which many other companies tend to do. We were amazed at the high level of customer service. To top everything off, the customer service representative reached out to us about 1 week later just to check in and make sure the replacement unit was functioning correctly and that we were satisfied. Another great plus: InfantOptics makes it very easy to register your product for their one-year warranty--you just have to go to their website and put in your information and the Amazon order number. No need to dig up receipts or try to locate a serial number. We are so glad we decided to purchase this monitor over some of the other monitors that you typically see at the larger retail stores. Thank you!!

Reviews.Title: Image Freezes and Loose Signal While in the Same Room
Reviews.Author: gort31
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to get this with the amazing reviews, but camera would not find signal with in the first 30 minutes. My husband and I took it out of the box made sure it worked and were so excited to put it on the wall. Once we installed the camera, which was very easy, we turned on the the video. It worked for about 10 seconds and than the image kept freezing. We tried many ways to correct this and nothing worked. The only thing that would stop the image from freezing would be to take it off the wall and set it on the dresser. Issue with this is I can not see my 5 month old in the crib. I can just see his room. Which ruins the point of having a camera to me. Very disappointed. Will be returning this.

Reviews.Title: It's a good system for the price.
Reviews.Author: Armando J. Taveras
Reviews.Content: Range is not excellent, but OK. A little tricky to pair up the camera with the display if you don't turn them ON in an order. Camera first, then wait a few seconds and then turn ON the display. Once you know this and get the hang of it it's OK for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Best monitor for the price.
Reviews.Author: Charge
Reviews.Content: This is/was the cheapest video monitor on the market when I purchased it. It doesnt have the smoothest framerate when it comes to the picture on the monitor but it's fluid enough to show you real-time movement. I would avoid dropping the monitor as the plastic outside isn't the most durable. We have gone through one monitor already due to the kids always knocking it off of a ledge. However as mentioned I already went through one and purchased this monitor AGAIN because my wife and I liked it so much. You can add up to 4 cameras on the same monitor and just press a single button to cycle through them. The battery life is good and even better when you use the "VOX" feature which turns off the screen after 3 minutes of inactivity from the selected camera.Definitely a safe purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: PSO
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our grandbaby who was coming for a visit.  This monitor exceeds our expectations.  The quality of the visual image is very good!  Our children had spent much more on their monitor purchase and were surprised at what a great value this product is.  Highly recommend this!

Reviews.Title: Spend a little more for a better unit.
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Nice concept and style, but poor execution.  The camera with the night vision works fine. I like the way the camera swivels on its base.  But there are several issues that I could not ignore.  1.  We purchased this camera to be able to check in without waking the baby.  But the parent unit would not "sleep".  It would stay on all night and the battery would be dead in the morning.  I was leaving it plugged in to the charger all night  2.  the advanced functions (like turning on when the baby would make noise) were difficult to use.  Would be better if each advanced function had its own on/off buton  3.  the units felt cheap.  The buttons make a click every time you press them.

Reviews.Title: Great product and consumer service - Best Choice Out There
Reviews.Author: Renata01
Reviews.Content: Product Review:GOOD:1) Image is clear and sound is good2) Works good at night with the IR light3) Good signal range, I live in a 2 story large home, baby room is on second floor, I can go out in my driveway and pick-up mail and this still works fine4) Easy to position camera (with or without base, several angles up and down and sideways with hinge system)5) I like that you can turn-off the camera IR remotetly with the monitor (sometimes my baby stay in the crib looking for the IR light in the camera and I turn in off from the monitor because I don;t really like that he looks at the IR light too much)COULD BE IMPROVED:1) Batery life could be bigger2) Sound could be higher (if it is exteremwlly noise at home and the monitor is a little far cometimes it is hard to hear, you can overcome this by placing the monitor next to you)SERVICE:This company has GREAT consumer service. If you have any problems they will help you out in a very expedited manner and will replace product if needed and if under warranty. They really stand for their product and I really like supporting companies like that.OVERALL: 5-stars - there is not a better product for the price and if you ever have a problem they will help you out. I always recommend this product to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Works well but the battery won't charge
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Battery won't charge anymore after a year.  You have to plug it in. I guess I need to see if we can send it in for a new one but we need this every night... we don't have a back up one.

Reviews.Title: Love this thing but.....
Reviews.Author: Ismael Rivera
Reviews.Content: Love this thing but.....Well nothing is perfect, The device cycles between frequencies as a configuration free way to secure the device.This will pretty much kills all your wireless G signals close to the device in your home. I hardly use the internetwhen I am laying in bed or watching TV when the baby is asleep so it doesn't affect me much.  \My wife and I love this thing. It is affordable, easy to setup and pretty strong. And has a killer range too.The night time picture is awesome. There is an LED alerts when the battery is getting low on the handset,you can keep it plugged in all the time too. I am glad I read all the reviews. I think mine sums it up. Good and cheap!

Reviews.Title: Works great for the price
Reviews.Author: Shelly
Reviews.Content: You can't ask for a better video camera with sound for the price.  Very good quality and not expensive at all compared to others I looked at.  I'm only having one kid so I really didn't want to invest a ton of $ into a camera to use only a short while!  Perfect option.

Reviews.Title: at first glance
Reviews.Author: Rocco F.
Reviews.Content: When I opened the package on this item I thought "Wow, is thing cheap. Everyones reviews on build quality was right." But the performance is great. I have a shed 60 feet from where the camera is and its dry walled and heated with a lot of electronics. My home is also wired and wireless to the max. This unit does fine with receiving the signal and staying connected without any problems. I wish the audio would kick in when there is a little less noise from my grandson but hey it is what it is. If not for the build quality I would give this setup 5 stars. And this month I will be adding a second camera for the second grandbaby coming soon!

Reviews.Title: works well, but with some issues
Reviews.Author: gk
Reviews.Content: sometimes it loses the signal even if it's close enough to the basethere is no way to know how much battery is still left, nor does it emit any signal to warn you that the battery is dying. In other words, if you are sleeping and your baby is too, the battery may die, your baby would cry, and there is no way for you to know he's crying.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: BeezyHeezy
Reviews.Content: After researching a ton of other baby monitors we decided on this one, We had a regular baby monitor for our first two babies that ultimately stopped working after two years.  This monitor has been great!  Not only does it have  a crystal clear picture and sound but you can also add other cameras so I can put them throughout the house to keep an eye on the kids as they play in the basement and their room.  At one point, I thought the infrared camera had gone out, I contacted infant optics that immediately responded to help me trouble shoot, turns out, it was fixed with the push of two buttons.  I highly recommended this product!

Reviews.Title: A little fragile. WiFi killer.
Reviews.Author: J. LaFleur
Reviews.Content: The camera mount broke within minutes of being handled and I had to glue it together. The camera cannot be mounted upside down (ceiling beams, rafters, etc) so it took a little jimmying to get it into the right position. It can be a little difficult to see the screen in the dark. It also runs on the exact same frequency as my streaming devices (2.4gHz) and despite changing the channel on my router this thing absolutely kills the signal from my router. I only turn it on at night, so that solves that problem.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Affordable
Reviews.Author: KDavis
Reviews.Content: Anyone can install this little gem with the help of easy to read instructions.  Looks good and has very good video quality.  If you are wanting a simple video camera to keep tabs on your little ones this is definately a good buy.

Reviews.Title: can't imagine spending more on another
Reviews.Author: R. Trump
Reviews.Content: Works great.  Does everything I need it to.The one problem I have with it is that when the battery dies there's not audible warning.  So, if the cord came out in the middle of the night, I'd never know it had turned off.

Reviews.Title: Very good for price
Reviews.Author: pdxreviewer
Reviews.Content: This is a basic video monitor that works very well for the price. We have a three story house and this works when we're in the basement and our son is on the top floor. The picture and the audio are very clear. I had a more expensive video monitor with my first child that didn't have this range. I've recommended this to several friends.

Reviews.Title: great monitor
Reviews.Author: Katherine Stevenson
Reviews.Content: We registered for this monitor before our daughter was born and so far it has worked wonderfully. If you're looking for an easy to use baby monitor without a lot of bells and whistles this is it.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last long
Reviews.Author: Kyle Keane
Reviews.Content: I bought this product because of the price and the reviews are pretty good. It worked well, for about 3 weeks. I'm fine with the look and ease of use, no issues there for the price. We didn't have any problem with the range and our house is three levels. The picture is OK and again that's what you'd expect for the price. After about 3 weeks, from out of the blue, it just started turning off randomly every 3 or 4 minutes (not battery related)...it went off in the middle of the night. We also noticed the sound went crazy at the same time going on and off (not because of room noise, we tested it). So we got 3 weeks out of it. I was going to give 2 stars but it was good for the short time it worked and maybe this one was just a dud. If you get one that doesn't crap out for this price it's a pretty good deal. I am sending it back (first product I've sent back on Amazon ever actually).

Reviews.Title: Complete disappointment
Reviews.Author: Kevin T.
Reviews.Content: Video feed locked up within 8 hours of general use.  While standing in the doorway of our sons nursery the display showed our son sound asleep even though he was actually standing in his bed.  Screen never turned off during VOX mode.  Returned after 10 hours of use.

Reviews.Title: Works just great
Reviews.Author: Dawn Z
Reviews.Content: This is a great priced monitor, and does what it says. Its simple, easy to use, and pairs easily!I only wish that it would pan and zoom, but for the price, I am not complaining!I definitely recommend this monitor.

Reviews.Title: a life saver
Reviews.Author: vincent ramacca
Reviews.Content: Im using it to monitor a family member who recently had a stroke and lives up stairs from me. Its a great life line

Reviews.Title: Ok Product
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL J. NUNEZ
Reviews.Content: My wife got this for our infant's room. The construction is ok, reminds me of a baby camera from the 1990's with the antennas. I recommend spending $50-60 more and getting one of the monitor's that I've seen with internal antenna, remote camera control and the ability to plug into a monitor or TV.

Reviews.Title: Best monitor for money
Reviews.Author: Othni Stein
Reviews.Content: Got this monitor when we had our baby 3 months ago. It works well. The video quality is just like what other users say and the we've never had a reception issue yet. It lacks a few features that more expensive models have but this is good enough for us.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Terri Goodsell
Reviews.Content: This set was reviewed highly on Amazon.  Bought for my daughter and she immediately got addicted to watching her daughter sleep.  It has good sound and the picture seems to work in most types of light.  The one drawback is that there is no 'talk' button so you cannot converse both ways, but that is a minor problem.

Reviews.Title: stopped working after 3 months
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Russell
Reviews.Content: At first I liked the product, although the audio quality has always been poor…but after 3 months the camera stopped working and it is useless.

Reviews.Title: It Works....
Reviews.Author: n3ssa5pink31
Reviews.Content: This monitor interfers with our wireless internet ad the image in not as clear as we thought it would be. The vox setting is not very sensitive but overall the monitor does the job.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound quality and takes a long time for image to 'load'
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: After reading all the high ratings for this product we bought one for ourselves and one as a gift. We had become very dependent on our Summer Infant monitor with our first child and thought this one would be great for our second, based on the other reviews. Compared to the Summer Infant product, this had terrible sound quality, grainy image and it takes a long time for the image to appear when you turn the monitor on and off. The range is also much lower than Summer Infant.

Reviews.Title: Does what we need
Reviews.Author: Roderic J. Campbell
Reviews.Content: There were some initial issues with wifi interference but that was resolved with a chat with customer service and changing the channel. Since then, no problems, just a sleeping baby.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: TheDude62
Reviews.Content: The camera's field of view is pretty miniscule, and the night vision is not as great as you might expect. I could overlook these things if the monitor itself had a higher quality display. You have to hold it at certain angles to see properly, and even in full day light the resolution is pretty low.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Franzi
Reviews.Content: I've been using the product for 10 months now and am very pleased with it. It's been very reliable and a good value. Other systems cost so much more without  doing more.The only little downfall I see is the battery life. It's not extremely long but still pretty sufficient.Would buy the product again!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Work
Reviews.Author: Dana
Reviews.Content: One of the A/C adapters do not work!!  We charged the monitor and then used the working cord on camera unit.  The sound was really low on this unit.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor and excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Bryanne Horn
Reviews.Content: We have had our monitor for nearly 1.5 years. It is very dependable - doesn't have all the bells and whistles of a more expensive monitors but it has everything we need - works in the light or dark, has a motion and sound sensor and the picture is clear. You can also pair the monitor up with multiple cameras, should you choose to put more around the house. We had an issue with the monitor cord, prohibiting our monitor from charging. We informed the company and within one day we had someone email us back to help troubleshoot the problem. When we realized the camera would need a new cord, the company mailed me one the next day. I was very impressed with their prompt and helpful service.In short, we are very happy we picked this model instead of investing in a more expensive brand. It has served us well and the company's customer service is superb. I definitely recommend this monitor and camera.

Reviews.Title: GREAT MONITOR!
Reviews.Author: julie
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews before purchasing this monitor and it is great - sound, picture, durability, quality, and price!  Would definately recommend and- or purchase another one if needed!

Reviews.Title: A bad choice.
Reviews.Author: Julie C. Moffa
Reviews.Content: I started using this monitor when my son was born. I have had several issues with it in the past seven months.1) It isn't well-made. The plastic antenna cover has already come off, and the power supply wire has started to come exposed. In fact, this caused the monitor to stop charging overnight last night, and it died while I was asleep. I woke up at 2:30 in the morning to the sound of my son screaming in his nursery across the hall - who knows how long he had been fussing before it got to that point?2) It interrupts our home's WiFi signal because of the 2.4 ghz frequency it uses.3) It does not have a low battery warning (see #1).4) It has a circle of red lights on the camera that shine in the dark and distract my baby when we're trying to get him to sleep!I'm not going to be cheap the second time around and will get a monitor that is sturdy and functional.

Reviews.Title: Will not hold charge and works on occasion.
Reviews.Author: Jaimie Ames
Reviews.Content: I bought this product back in May of 2013. I delivered my son October 1 and have actually used the monitor 2 times. The monitor lost it's charge within an hour and it can not detect the camera half the time. I do not feel safe with this monitor. Invest a couple extra dollars for a real video monitor not this piece of junk. You honestly don't even get what you pay for with this one. Since I bought it so early, I cannot even return it. What a waste of $100.00.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR-5 - Great Camera & Great Price
Reviews.Author: Natasha G.
Reviews.Content: The camera has been great.  It was very simple to set up and mount.The monitor beeps when the battery is low and needs to be charged.  The monitor also cuts off ambient noise in the room so you don't get the constant humming but only hear when the baby makes noise.  The range on the camera is pretty good also, I have a two story house and there are never problems with reception.  The monitor can support up to 3 additional cameras (a total of 4 cameras can be monitored from a single monitor).The lens could be a bit better quality but it is more the sufficient for what it needs to do (and for the price), which is to show me the sleeping child in her crib.  One other thing that I wish would be better is the swivel range of the lens.  It will work just fine if you have to setup the camera directly opposite of what it will be monitoring but if you have odd placement for it (mine is set up on the same wall as the crib) it may not have enough swivel or angling room to monitor everything that you might want.Overall the camera is great and I would definitely recommend purchasing it over the other more expensive brands that have all sorts of bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: Pink_Princess
Reviews.Content: This monitor is horrible. It's CHEAP. My baby's room is just down the hallway & I often get the annoying "no signal" beep! I hate it. I wish I could return this & get my money back to purchase a different one. Not only that but the picture quality isn't good either. I like that it's color during the day but you can't really see anything. I mean, you can tell the baby is there but you can't see any movement.What I do like about this is the silencer feature. It only makes noise when it picks up noise in your baby's room so you don't have to listen to the annoying noises monitors make 24/7.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: theScoop
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera. Works well and has a decent range. I'm only giving this 4 stars instead of 5 because after just a month of use the "P" button that allows you to switch from camera to camera is sticking and we have to monkey with a little to use it. Otherwise it seems to be a good monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good price, for good product
Reviews.Author: Jennifer "Jenabe"
Reviews.Content: As far as signal is concerned it works great! Picture is clear and good! It has taken a spill on our tile floor and survived. The only thing I don't like is the sound sensor on it is not activated all the time... My son sleeps just down the hall and sometimes I hear him before the monitor does. Other than that I LOVE IT! We have this monitor pair with the Angle Care which gives me peace of mind!!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Tamara Venit
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor for our toddler when she transitioned to her big girl bed. Being able to see her seemed important to know whether she was staying in the bed or had crawled or fallen out. She also sometimes cries out in the night but very quickly puts herself back to sleep so seeing her on the video allows us to judge whether we need to go into her room or whether she is fine on her own.I did not want to pay $250+ for a video monitor so I opted for this version after reading many reviews online. You get what you pay for, and this is one of the more inexpensive options in video baby monitors. The reviews that say that this monitor has a cheap, plastic feel are absolutely correct. I worry a little about the stand on the receiver snapping off. This version has a VOX mode, which allows the monitor to go to sleep when there has been no sound above a certain decibel for 3 minutes. I really appreciate that feature because it means that we don't have to contend with the light from the screen in our bedroom at night. HOWEVER, we have found that the monitor does not always wake up from VOX mode when our toddler cries. The battery life is also very short. We absolutely have to keep the monitor plugged in overnight.The night vision is blurry but adequate for our toddler. We can tell if she's lying down in bed, sitting up, or out of the bed, and that's about all we care about at this point. If you really feel like you need to see more detail than that, buy a better monitor.Overall, I don't regret buying this model. If our daughter were younger, I would have bought something more reliable, with clearer night vision, and a sturdier build with a couple of receivers (one for upstairs and one for downstairs), but at this point, she is mostly beyond needing to be monitored.When our daughter was an infant, we used the Sony Baby Call (no video), and that worked fine for us. Great battery life and long range.

Reviews.Title: Not sure about all the high reviews
Reviews.Author: Phillip Olexa
Reviews.Content: I'm not really sure why this monitor has so many great reviews.  I bought one of these off Amazon in very good condition and it looked great and seemed to work okay at first.  It worked for about a day, then the screen flipped upside down and started displaying rainbow colors.The reason why I say I'm not sure why this monitor has so many great reviews is because when it was working, it doesn't seem all that great.  I'm a tech guy and buy stuff like this.  The handheld and camera feel cheap and light weight.  The screen is way too small to see anything, and the video quality is really low probably 160x128 resolution.  It gets worse at night too, it becomes all blocky and more difficult to make out the image.I sent this one back, and I'm gonna try either a newer model or something more pricy.

Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: CSS
Reviews.Content: very lightweight and cheaply made. granted the video isn't so bad,however the audio is so low it defeats the point of having a monitor. I've since returned this. I bought the Graco True Focus Digital Video Monitor  instead. it's not perfect but definitely better.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor
Reviews.Author: Matthew J. Smith
Reviews.Content: Not sure why people give this monitor a poor review.It really does what it advertises.Great monitor, clear IR nighttime view, good battery life (even though we keep it plugged in most of the time), white noise mute is really nice to have.I'm upgrading from a Summer Day and Night Slim and Secure which didnt last more than a year.This was definitely a good buy!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Terrible sound
Reviews.Author: maf
Reviews.Content: You can hardly hear the kids through this thing.  If you are a light sleeper or don't have any media on then it might work for you- it is a nice price point.  But if you're a heavy sleeper or you keep the tv or music on while the kids nap, then don't bother.

Reviews.Title: It's a very good monitor
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: It's a very good monitor- I like that I can have more than one input on it. The only problem we've had so far is that the antenna seems to break fairly easily with impact.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Kaede
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor after finding my 3 month old on his stomach while swaddled and screaming because he was stuck.  Prior to that, we only had a sound monitor, and I could not go another night without video after he rolled over and wedged himself.That said, I wish I'd bought this first.  The ability to check on him without doing the "crawl of shame" is wonderful, and I don't risk waking him.  The range on the unit is good - I can work in the yard and still get a strong signal.I also had a problem with the monitor and contacted Infant Optics because it was still covered under warranty, and their service was quick, responsive, and very helpful!  They even sent follow up emails to make sure I felt the problem was resolved.  I was very impressed, and would definitely buy from them again.  If only this had wifi, it would be the PERFECT monitor!

Reviews.Title: Priceless View
Reviews.Author: naturalmel
Reviews.Content: When I created my baby registry I thought I would only need a radio/speaker baby monitor but luckily my best friend decided the DXR-5 with the digital video was the way for us to go. She bought and sent it to me as a surprise so when it arrived I was a bit skeptical about it. I thought, "I live in a one bedroom apartment, why would I need to see my little Munchkin when I will never be more than one room away?" and then I had my baby. The picture is clear (day and night), the sound is clear and the battery life on the monitor is more than sufficient.  I can't explain how helpful it was to have this gadget while sleep training my little one.  That whole ordeal is hard enough as it is so being able to peek in was very comforting. Now that our Munchkin now has her own room, it has become even more useful -- and she's not really a "baby" now at 14 months.  The Customer Service team at Infant Optics is very helpful and responsive.  I would absolutely recommend purchasing this for yourself or for a friend with a new baby.Pros:Auto-Mute FunctionClear Picture and SoundPeace of MindGood PriceCons:Color

Reviews.Title: Very good value/performance with one major flaw
Reviews.Author: Jorge Lopez
Reviews.Content: This monitor provides an excellent value - the quality of the camera is very good in daylight or nighttime - and the audio works as expected.  I do notice some static noise in our condo but not in my mother-in-laws so I think it is something in my condo.The major flaw, is that you can't turn off the screen while leaving the audio feature working.  This is not ideal as it means at night time, when you want to be woken up when the baby starts crying, the screen needs to remain on the entire time - either draining the battery (has not been an issue for us), but creating light in an otherwise dark room when you are trying to sleep.  We are going to keep it, ke simply put if face down, but it is a shame infant optics does not provide an on/off button for the screen.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor!
Reviews.Author: Casex3
Reviews.Content: This monitor is great! It cuts out all the ambient noise so at first I thought it was broken, but it picks up the teeny tiniest sound from my daughter and the picture is crystal clear

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: RR "RR"
Reviews.Content: My only regret with this product is that I didn't buy it sooner.  I've been using it about 2 months now and have no problems with it.  I do not have another video monitor to compare it too but if I had to buy it all over again, I would.  I don't need all the bells and whistles of other monitors….just need to know when my little one stands up in her crib….it world well and I'd never pay for a more expensive monitor.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jake decker
Reviews.Content: Bought before I had my daughter used it to keep a eye on my father when he had cancer now I had it for two years does not keep greatest charge but still comes in handy all the time .I tell new parents to get this all the time keeps ur mind at ease being able to see them.

Reviews.Title: works very good
Reviews.Author: Bun
Reviews.Content: This is a very good product and is a must once the baby is 6-7 months old. very good quality and we like the image quality

Reviews.Title: Enough functionality without extra frills
Reviews.Author: D. Feng
Reviews.Content: Pros:- Video: It's nice to have this to know what's going on before we rush into our baby's room. Sometimes our baby (currently 11 months) randomly gets upset and cries for a minute or two and then goes back to sleep. If we couldn't see, then we'd rush in immediately and probably wake her up. We tried cry-it-out for a little bit and it was nice to be able to see if she was on the verge of falling asleep or really upset and we should go in.- Night vision: Same comments as video- Durable: It looks pretty flimsy, but it's not. We're dropped our monitor tons of times. The battery cover, battery, and even the screen cover have popped off. But we've been able to put it all back on and it's operated fine.- Background noise muting feature: It's nice to have it be able to mute any background noise from our baby's room. She's got an air cleaner in there. So it's nice to be able to not have that noise with us wherever the monitor is.Cons:- Short battery life: It would definitely not last a day or night without charging. To deal with this, we have two power adaptors, one in the bedroom for the night time and one in our living room.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor: nice video quality and clear audio for $99
Reviews.Author: E. Villagran M
Reviews.Content: It's a great monitor, it allows me to be away from your baby's room and continue with an eye and ear on him. It is the best for the price.PROS:+ Good video quality, color on day / grayscale on night (IR)+ Clear audio, no static noise. Auto mute after 10 seconds of silence (< 60db). Reactivate on sound detected (>65db).+ Power saving mode (VOX): Power off screen and audio after 3 minutes of silence (<60db). Reactivate on sound detected (>65db).CONS:- Camera unit have few install options. I wish something like clip or like. But wallmount work fine.- VOX function is disabled by default after startup.SUMMARY:if I had to buy a new monitor, would buy the same.As we say in Chile, it's triple B: Bueno, Bonito y Barato (good, nice and cheap)

Reviews.Title: Awesome monitor!! Buy it!
Reviews.Author: Amanda Moran "cocoadinky"
Reviews.Content: This monitor is awesome!  As a mom of 3, I have tried all the necessary & unnecessary gadgets out there.  This video monitor is a must & for the money, this is a no-brainer purchase!! You will love it.  The battery is great, the quality is great. Honestly, I've had no problems at all.  I've never written a review for anything & I felt inclined to with this.  When I was searching for a monitor, I was hesitant to purchase such an inexpensive one, but, honestly, it is great!!!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Customer Service, Pretty Decent Product For the Price
Reviews.Author: Annie Dalton
Reviews.Content: For the price, this unit is pretty decent.  It's not quite as good as the Summer video monitor we bought for our first baby, but this was half the price and works fine enough for a toddler room.  It interfered with our 2.4 GhZ wi-fi network, but if you have a dual band wi-fi, you can use the 5 GhZ wi-fi connection and get around this issue.  We also had a problem where the charger for the receiver stopped working - it had literally just gone out of warranty but I emailed customer service, and they were extremely responsive.  I emailed on a Saturday, they responded on a Sunday, and sent us a new charger charger for free on a Monday.  I would not have expected this from them, so I was highly impressed.  If you want an inexpensive product that does the job, without too many bells and whistles, this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Get this!
Reviews.Author: Annette Carden
Reviews.Content: You can see the baby very clearly on this monitor without any time delay or lag. My baby is starting to move around the room during the day time so we move it further away to capture her playing area. I haven't really got used to the VOX mode so I usually just leave it running on plug power without the need to conserve battery power. The monitor unit is very light so it's quite easy to strap this on your shirt or pants when moving around. Overall I have no complaints and I recommend this to any parent looking for an affordable buy.

Reviews.Title: decent video monitor
Reviews.Author: meej
Reviews.Content: We bought this to replace our non-video monitor. The video image is decent and overall the product does the job. My only complaint is that there is a delay in the sound (sometimes I hear the baby crying in the other room before the sound is picked up on the monitor). I think this is due to the fact that the sound turns off when things are quiet and takes some time to turn back on when sound is detected (which is actually a huge plus so you don't hear static, etc.). Occasionally the base loses the signal from the camera, but that usually only lasts for a few seconds (and is a problem for all wireless devices in our home so likely not specific to the product).

Reviews.Title: Love this baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Tom Barge
Reviews.Content: The monitor came within 2 days ordering it and arrived in mint condition. We just had our first child and our audio monitor wasn't giving us the information we needed, especially when we can't see him. This unit had everything we needed and came at a good price too. We have the camera mounted on a wall and we can have our eyes on him even in darkness now! Has great video and audio.

Reviews.Title: Bad build quality and design
Reviews.Content: I can't believe my eyes when I received this monitor, the whole thing from the packaging material to the AC adapter and the camera wall mount to the monitor and camera itself says cheap and wtf. This thing is worth $20 to manufacture in China. Pay your factory a little bit more and make a better product.

Reviews.Title: The LOUDEST sleep monitor on the market
Reviews.Author: Vivek Chaturvedi
Reviews.Content: The 'notification' sound it makes is about as ridiculous as it gets. You cannot be anywhere near the baby as you set up the video monitor because of this sound.Otherwise the camera works great.Oh, and when the battery is low and needs to recharge - it makes the same ridiculous sound.  Nice.

Reviews.Title: poor audio quality
Reviews.Author: SM&A;
Reviews.Content: We have purchased and tested over 13 different video monitors, and the only one that doesn't hiss so loud I can't hear my baby is the Levana Stella.

Reviews.Title: Worked great, but cheap and need a new one.
Reviews.Author: Kelly Fuller
Reviews.Content: My daughter is now almost 11 months old and we've been using this since day 1.  It has done everything we have wanted it to do, with good audio and video.  However, my most immediate response when taking it out of the packaging was that it felt cheap and I wondered how long it would last.  The answer is about 10 and a half months.  I drop things...things like baby monitor receivers...all the time.  I dropped the monitor receiver a few times and the screen became askew, but it still worked, so no biggie.  But recently I dropped it again and it started making a very high-pitched noise, which makes it impossible to be in the same room when I'm trying to go to sleep.  It's a vital tool and I'm bummed this is so cheap.  I'm now on the hunt for somethings a bit more hardy.

Reviews.Title: A great monitor.
Reviews.Author: Jenna Bee
Reviews.Content: I wanted a video monitor and this does the job well. I can see my baby clearly in the screen, and I can go from room to room without losing signal. In fact, I very rarely, if ever, have signal problems.The only reason I rated this 4 stars instead of 5 is because the screen is so incredibly bright. If there's some option to dim it at night while I'm sleeping but still have it on, I'd love to know. I end up covering the screen with a rag (folded), to dim it down some. Otherwise my entire bedroom would be lit up.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: We use this every day and love it.  The night vision is really good.The only 'problem' I have with it is that I think its a bit top heavy.I would buy another Infant Optics again.Great Monitor.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: robert craig
Reviews.Content: Love the night vision.  It has great picture.  Like all monitors, short of placing in crib or pacK & play, hard to find good location to see insinde clearly.  Great if it leaned forward more.  Only solution to keep out of reach is the wall mount, which I don't necessarily want to use.  Can toggle to hear all noise (white noise included) or only if over a certain decible.  Can also toggle to shut off if again the decible volume is low.  Maybe use this more when the child is older.  So far no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Works really great
Reviews.Author: Celia
Reviews.Content: I'm using it days and nights when my baby's asleep. I can do my things without worrying him waking up without my notice. I can adjust volume and contrast, which are really nice.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money. Excellent customer service resolution when i had a problem with the product.
Reviews.Author: buyer
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is great value for the money. Excellent customer service resolution when i had a problem with the product.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: David Hill
Reviews.Content: For the low price it is a decent monitor. Picture quality is good , but the sound is just ok.

Reviews.Title: Good product not exactly durable
Reviews.Author: jon gebarowski
Reviews.Content: I bought this about 18 month ago. Over all I like the camera. The antenna is made out of a plastic tip with rubber around it. Ours broke about one month after buying it. I'd be careful not to carry the monitor by the antenna. Last month the monitor started making weird noises and then stopped getting a signal from the camera based.I bought another one because its is great quality when working and the automatic audio shut off means no buzzing all night long while on. Also now I have a camera in the kids play area to watch them there as well since you can add on up to 4 cameras.Good camera wish the quality of the product itself was better.

Reviews.Title: getting stuck frquently (updated rating)
Reviews.Author: JJose
Reviews.Content: Initial 2 weeks- This is the second monitor I am buying for my baby and I love this one. I used it only for 2 weeks now, and it got stuck once and had to take out the battery to turn it off.But otherwise I am happy with the quality of the pictures - even low light picture is pretty clear.Updated after 2 more weeks - the monitor gets stuck frequently.It showed the picture of my baby sleeping even few hours after she woke up. I tried to turn off the monitor, but I couldnt and finally i had to remove the battery. this happened couple of times already.. removing few stars from my original rating.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend!
Reviews.Author: ErinS
Reviews.Content: So I bought this baby monitor about a year ago, and used it for the first 6 months of my little one's life.  I was really unsure of what monitors to go with - there are so many options on the market and i really didn't want to spend a ton of money.  This was perfect.  The sound is adjustable, so if you're a light sleeper like me, you can turn the volume down.  The system will beep at you if for some reason the video screen monitor (which is kept in the parent's room) is turned ON but the camera (for your baby's room) was accidentally left OFF...that way you are notified if your child not being monitored.  I thought it had great reception and I could roll over in bed and check out what my baby was up to at all times.  It emits very little light in my baby's room so she could get good sleep.  For the monitor in bedroom, it was a little too bright for me (like I said, i'm a light sleeper and I wake easily from noise or light), so I would also place a t-shirt or towel over the screen so my bedroom was dark, but I could still hear everything.  I highly recommend it...it's super easy to use, I set it up myself and i am NOT tech-savvy, and I never had a problem with it.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mary Gamble
Reviews.Content: I've owned this infant optics monitor for just over a year now. Everything else is flawless for a $100 monitor other than the short(ish) battery life. I've bought 2 extra power cords which don't cost alot and I highly recommend them so you keep several charging spots around the house if you plan on moving the monitor around. The night time visuals are great on this camera compared to the video monitors I've owned. I like the product and would buy this one again if we need another set of monitor.

Reviews.Title: Thumbs down
Reviews.Author: Amr
Reviews.Content: There are a number of reasons I hate this monitor. Here are a few...1- The picture quality is complete crap. Unless the baby is sitting in direct sunlight (which happens never when you want them to sleep...), I can't make out any details. I can't see if her eyes are open, I can't really see if her sleep sack is riding up...the picture is super grainy like a bad black and white movie.2- The battery is always dying. It never gives you any warning that the battery will die...it just shuts off. So you are sitting there thinking all is well because you hear nothing...and then you glance at the monitor again and realize it turned itself off and the baby is wiggling her arms and waking up.3- It doesn't even have a charging station. It just has a crappy plug in adapter. It would be great to have a stand to sit it in so you could have it standing up in front of you, but I find myself having to hold it to view the image.4- The cord that came with the camera attachment was ridiculously short. We had to buy a longer cord just to mount the camera up on the wall to get a good view of the whole crib.5- The device just feels cheap and shoddy.I wish we had picked out a different monitor.

Reviews.Title: You just need to know how to use it
Reviews.Author: jlundin
Reviews.Content: At first we did not like this monitor too much. Our major complaint was that it did not pick up our babies noises until he started to cry and then it would pick up the noise. Well turns out this is a battery saving feature that this monitor has. If turned on the baby monitor is completely silent until it picks up a loud noise or crying. If you push the resolution button and the volume button at the same time you can turn off this feature and the baby monitor will pick up all noises. We ended up taking this feature off as our son got older and no longer cried when he woke up. It has some good features, the picture quality is very good and it has a long range too. It is very easy to see the baby in a completely dark room and there are only a few red led lights visible on the monitor as to keep the babies room dark. There is no annoying white noise sound when the monitor is on either. The only problem we have with this monitor is that it interferes with our wifi signal (it informs you on the box that it can). Usually when we are upstairs we have to turn off the monitor to use the wifi and then turn it back on when done using. Wifi only works if you are within about 10-15 feet of the router when the monitor is on. For our needs this monitor is great.

Reviews.Title: Could be good, but lacks some important features
Reviews.Author: JenJen
Reviews.Content: My son is 15 months old and, until now, we survived just fine without a video monitor.  We decided to get a video monitor and this one looked like a great value.  We have used it for 2 weeks and here are my observations:PROS:-Easy to use.  I love how easy it is to toggle VOX on/off.-Auto-mute feature is great.  After 5 seconds of no noise, the auto-mute kicks in (you can turn this feature off) so there is no white noise.-Decent picture.  I was able to see my son well during naps and at night.CONS:-You cannot pan or zoom the camera. I understand that most baby video monitors don't pan or zoom MUCH, but there is something about staring at the screen of your baby that makes you WANT to move the camera.  Maybe a side effect of having a smartphone..-When on VOX mode, after 5 minutes of "quiet", the monitor goes to sleep and will come back on automatically when noise is detected.  When the monitor goes to sleep, it switches from the black & white picture (mostly grey) to the white start-up/shut-down screen before going black.  This flash of white woke me up several times.  I eventually turned the parent unit face-down on my nightstand so I couldn't see this "flash".-When the volume is turned all the way down, there is no "beep" to alert you of a lost connection with the camera.  For example, if you have the volume turned all the way down, there is a power outage, power comes back on (camera stays off until you turn it back on manually), there is no beep to indicate that you have lost connection w/ the camera.-Similarly, when the volume is turned all the way down, the parent unit doesn't beep to alert you that the battery is dying.  That is a major design flaw, in my opinion.All in all, I wasn't thrilled with the monitor, but was willing to live with it because this is a great price.  However, after four days of use, my video display completely malfunctioned.  When displaying black/white at night, it now either displays black/hot pink or neon green/white.  I am sure I just got a lemon and could easily exchange this for another, but I plan to exchange this for a different brand instead.  After much research, I traded this in for a Samsung SEW-3037W and I am so glad I did.

Reviews.Title: Its alright
Reviews.Author: H. Hampson-Gross "H2"
Reviews.Content: Its a great cheap monitor.  I love the small size.  But the screen doesnt get bright enough unless the camera is on top of the crib.  I do like that it will turn itself to power save mode and wake up when there is baby noise.  BUT it ruins our wireless internet.  The phones wont connect when the monitor is on.  Our wireless all goes to the monitor.

Reviews.Title: Doesnt WORK
Reviews.Author: Mauro Sanchez
Reviews.Content: As soon as I got it, I set it up even before my baby's birth for test, and got pretty upset because of the malfunctionality, after tried all suggetions mentioned on the manual. I got the message "Out of signal coverage" and even when I have both units close enough up to one foot.I'm dissapointed most of it, because my sister in law brought it all the way here from LA, to Mexico, and now return it from here gets more difficult since it seems that I will have to pay for custom fees. A replacement won't solve the issue at all, because I won't get it overseas, now that no one of my relatives in the US are coming soon.Very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Awful Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: S. Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: This monitor is a complete waste of money if you are trying to monitor your baby without staring at the video screen the entire time. The image was fine with good picture quality in well-lit and low-light situations. However, the audio is virtually nonexistent even with the volume turned all the way up and even with the monitor less then 2 feet away from our baby. The only reason we knew that the baby was crying was because we saw it on the screen and when we got to the room she was screaming in distress. We could not hear her crying on the monitor, which defeats the purpose of having the monitor on at night. As an experiment, we had an adult talking at a normal volume in the room and again it was barely audible on the monitor. We troubleshot through the various settings on the monitor, but nothing helped. We are returning it immediately and looking for a different company. I would recommend against buying this if you intend to hear the baby crying, not just watching it cry like a silent movie.

Reviews.Title: Still works great after 10 months
Reviews.Author: B. Pleunik
Reviews.Content: For the price we couldn't have asked for a better monitor.  We have used it every night for over 10 months now and it is still going strong.Pros:  Good reception, good picture for both day and night cam, easy set up and use.Cons: Short battery life (have to charge every day), antenna broke off easily when dropped, camera head doesn't have a wide range of movement.

Reviews.Title: i don't like it
Reviews.Author: Mhammed
Reviews.Content: it have some defects with image and it is not what i imagined before i get and it have little distance for wireless connection

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: LI Steph
Reviews.Content: This is a great product!  I get a clear view and good sound.  I feel very secure about being able to keep a watchful eye on my little one while she sleeps.  The range is great (as long as you don't hold onto the receiving antenna... such as when you put it down).  I have it on a "battery-draining" mode where there constantly is a picture on screen and the battery still lasts a long time!When I first received the product, one of the adapters didn't work (it comes with 2 adapters... one for the camera and one for the monitor).  I called the company and they immediately sent out a new one which works fine.  I would highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Great and good value
Reviews.Author: THRIFTY LAWYER
Reviews.Content: We use this all the time even in our small apartment.  It is reliable and works well and a good value for the money.  My only complaint is that the signal can be a bit finicky.

Reviews.Title: Turned Out To Be Really Useful
Reviews.Author: The Rock
Reviews.Content: I started out with an audio device that had no visual and was satisfied with it. But once we got this device and hooked it up, the combination of audio and video simply blew us away. It allowed us to put baby to bed at 7:30pm and go about our personal business as usual without worrying about anything, including watching a movie together turning up the volume a little. Couple this with reasonable price and easy set-up, this is one of those products with great value proposition at perfect pricing point.Even my dad, who is conservative on modern high-tech was impressed with this product enough that I ended up buying one as a present for my grandmother. Talking about a product with functionality, ease of use, and reasonably priced!

Reviews.Title: Great Product and a great customer service!!!!
Reviews.Author: dikla cohen
Reviews.Content: if you are thinking on buying a baby monitor, this is top pick. this product work great day and night, and worth every Penney. i have it for 2 years already and its still working great. highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: Teresa Baggett
Reviews.Content: The monitor works well and is well worth the money. Only 2 negatives: 1. The monitor does not hold a charge for very long  2. The audio monitor comes on only when there is noise and that feature tends to wake the listener up each time it comes on rather than just hearing a low frequency constant static.

Reviews.Title: Fits the bill perfectly
Reviews.Author: toothfairyjenny
Reviews.Content: I love this video monitor, especially after seeing the expense and reviews of other monitors! It is inexpensive, easy to use, and gives us peace of mind when my daughter is sleeping. It is still going strong after 1 1/2 years of heavy usage. This will also be perfect when we have more children since more cameras can be added.

Reviews.Title: We like this one the best
Reviews.Author: Reed Glauser
Reviews.Content: We were given this monitor as a gift from our friends about 8 months ago.  In that period of time we have tried 3 other video baby monitors to ensure that this one was the best.  The video quality and the VOX (battery saver) and the Auto Mute was exactly what we needed.The other units that we tried out were lacking video quality or didn't have the auto mute feature that kept us up all night as we heard our daughter breath.I do have to say though that we started looking at other units because the construction of this one is plastic and feels cheap.  The is the only issue that we have found with it.  I do appreciate though that they have put the money and time into the optics and features for sound.Also our DXR-5 Camera's IR feature stopped working after 7 months.  I emailed the company with the original proof of purchase and they sent us a new one out in no time and I didn't have any problems with it.  The technical support manager handled our case and even gave us an extra year warranty from the original purchase date.Overall,  I am very satisfied with the company and the product.  I would suggest this to any new or current parent that is looking for something that is quality and a economical price.

Reviews.Title: works great!!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: the battery doesn't last more than one day but other than that it is a great product and easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Nichole
Reviews.Content: This monitor is great!  The video stays up but the sound cycles off if there's nothing going on.  I can even have my sound machine running and the monitor ignores it.  I guess it's part of the 'eliminating white noise' feature.  I keep the monitor at my bedside.  Since the video stays up, I can check on my baby anytime that I wake up in the night, and since the sound cycles on and off, I am woken up by the sound kicking on anytime my baby starts fussing.  It's also worth noting that the night vision on this this is awesome!  I can clearly see if my baby is simply moving around or if his eyes are open.  His eyes even show a reflection as an animal's eyes would when it's in night vision mode.  The day time view is great as well, but I was just blown back by the quality of the night vision.  This was $99 when I got it and I would consider that a steal.  Definitely a lot of bang for your buck!

Reviews.Title: Good, simple monitor
Reviews.Author: Meridith Silver
Reviews.Content: I really like this monitor.  It is super easy to use, the picture and sound are clear.  I had my first unit for 4 months when the antenna on the monitor broke.  I contacted Infant Optics and they replaced my unit.  The customer service was excellent.  My one complaint is there is no indication when there is a low battery (other than the annoying beeping!).  The range is good and overall this is an excellent monitor.  I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good budget video monitor with some limitations
Reviews.Author: Windy City Family
Reviews.Content: This is a good budget video monitor with poor battery life.  The sound and video quality are good, but I wish the monitor had a video on/off button or switch.Pros:PricePicture quality (including night vision)Sound qualityLightweight monitorCons:Battery lifeLack of a video on/off switchCamera on/off switchDurabilityWe have owned three different models of Summer Infant video baby monitors, so these comments are made based on our experience with those monitors.  This is by no means a full featured monitor that will meet everyone's needs; however, if you can live with its shortcomings it is a good video monitor for the price.We use a sound machine in our baby's room, so the VOX and auto mute features of the monitor are not useful for us.  We tested these features with the sound machine off and they worked as described.  Since VOX does not work, the battery only lasts for 3 to 5 hours because the video is always on.  We usually have the monitor plugged in by late afternoon and it is always plugged in overnight.  If the battery gets low, then the monitor beeps very loudly.There is no on/off switch or button for the video.  Our workaround for that is to turn the night vision camera off by pushing the volume down and contrast down buttons at the same time.  The video is still on, but at least the screen is dark enough for us to sleep at night.  Signal strength is good within the house and we get a signal within 15 feet of the house outside.  Good enough for taking the monitor out into the yard.  We have not had problems with wifi interference.  When put in close proximity with our Summer Infant monitor, the summer infant monitor loses signal.  We cannot keep the two monitors together on the same nightstand.There is an on/off button on the camera.  If the camera loses power for any reason, you have to push the button to turn the camera back on.  With our summer infant monitors, the cameras are always on when plugged in.  After mounting this camera high up on the wall, I can only hope that we won't need to access the camera very often to turn it back on.  My guess is that this will be a rare inconvenience.The video quality is surprisingly good for the price of this monitor.  The night vision quality is also very good (we have the contrast set at the highest level 5).  Not as good as our first Summer Infant monitor purchased in 2010, but still very good.  The sound quality is also very good.  The monitor itself is lightweight.  The construction quality is ok.  I have concerns about whether it could withstand being dropped.  The belt clip that doubles as a stand is made of very thin plastic and seems like it could break very easily.  We don't plan to ever use the belt clip; the monitor is small enough to fit in a coat pocket.We have been using this monitor for less than a month and reliability has been good so far.  Once I woke up in the middle of the night to find the screen covered with green pixels and the sound was not working.  Powering the unit off and back on cleared that up.  A couple of times during the day the monitor has restarted on its own.For the price, this monitor is a good value if the available features meet your needs.

Reviews.Title: Bought two
Reviews.Author: dmcginn2
Reviews.Content: We have been using this monitor for a couple years.  It still works well but has been dropped too many times and the antenna broke off.  So I just bought another one for my wife for Christmas.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: One of the best investments for parents
Reviews.Author: Melissa Benner
Reviews.Content: I sleep much easier knowing I can see what my little guy is up to behind closed doors! I don't risk waking him up at night checking up on him either. This may not be the very best monitor but it works well and has taken a few falls since we've had it and is still going strong. For the money and ease I recommend it. It might not work well in a large house though.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: P. Evans "PG"
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera because of the price and quality.  Both have lived up to my expectations.  I definitely did not want to spend $200+ on a baby monitor and this was a good fit for us.  However, what really ended up selling me on this camera was the customer service I received from Infant Optics.  Recently we needed to replace the camera unit and it was outside of our warranty so I emailed Infant Optics to see what the price of the new unit would be.  Instead of charging me they sent us a new one immediately for free.  I couldn't believe it and with it being so close to the holiday season it was much appreciated.  They really stand behind their product and it's really refreshing to deal with a company that provides both a quality product and quality customer care.  I would definitely recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Good unit from a company with excellent customer service.
Reviews.Author: AmazonRay
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gift for my new granddaughter - she loves it and is considering purchasing another camera as this unit has the capability of up to 3 camera.  We did run into a snag where the camera and monitor would not "pair" correctly after she took it on a trip.  I called their customer service department and they were extremely helpful in getting the situation squared away. I'd grade them A for their product and A for their customer service.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed with unit and seller
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I don't write reviews for products often - but I should since I use reviews all the time while making purchases. I am so impressed with this unit I have been recommending it to all my friends who are having babies!We are new parents, and if you are in the same boat you know there are a ton of products out there. We initially bought the Angelcare monitor because I was so afraid of the unknowns, the what ifs. I am glad we returned it ([...]Then a pediatrician told us that a lot of the parents at her practice were buying the Snuza so we got one. We returned that as well because it didn’t make sense to button it down to a baby! They barely sleep and I didn’t want anything beeping or bumping into the baby during naptime.So we decided to look into video monitors and we found that the Infant Optics monitor system had great Amazon reviews. Our baby is turning one soon and I am so glad we bought this unit and stayed with it! We put it on 'Vox On' and the monitor comes on only when baby makes any noise or if there is a noise in the room. Sometimes it even picks up a noisy motor vehicle on the road! It gives me a lot of freedom and I am not constantly monitoring etc. I get great signal reception all around my house including the basement and also outside in the yard which works great for me!Recently I was beginning to have issues with the monitor’s adapter and would not have bothered to contact the seller if I had an adapter I could use, but I couldn't so I reached out to them and they were great! They respond very quickly and are very efficient!  They replaced the adapter since I was within my year’s warranty. It was quick easy and simple not the usual experience I have had with other customer service. I recommend both the unit and the seller very highly.

Reviews.Title: Efficient and price worthy.
Reviews.Author: Shrivyshnavi
Reviews.Content: For the priced paid, I would definitely recommend this product.  I gifted this item and haven't heard any complaints so far.

Reviews.Title: Monitor is great but check your Wifi Router operating band 2.4 GHz before buying!
Reviews.Author: HappiJaki
Reviews.Content: We love this monitor and all the features mentioned by other reviews.  However, we noticed our internet wifi was much slower when the monitor was on and transmitting.  A little bit of research and we discovered both our wifi router and this monitor operate in the 2.4 GHz band!  Thus, while monitor video/sound is not effected, the wifi speed significantly slows down to jammed out completely.  So make sure you check your wifi operating band before buying this product or you may run into the same issue.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: ShellyD
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with our Infant Optics baby monitor. The set up was SUPER easy and the picture is VERY clear in daylight and in pitch black. It hiccuped once when I was on my laptop next to it, but in all fairness I had about 3 different wifi gadgets going as well as the monitor. The "glitch" really was just the screen flickering a few times. Also, we've noticed that once every 2 weeks or so the camera will need to be turned on and off again because it loses signal. It just beeps as though you've taken it out of range. It was annoying when it lost signal in the middle of the night, but I'd much rather the monitor beep to tell me it doesn't have a signal than freeze on an image making me think everything was fine. Glad I didn't spend a ton of money for a product that does the same thing.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an affordable monitor to use for my son. I had a more expensive monitor 5 years ago for my daughter that long had broke down. But I wanted one that was not as bulky and wouldn't cause me to go broke.This monitor was sooo easy to set up and picture very clear. I like that the monitor is light and easy to carry. I wanted something simple that I can see my son on the screen and hear him when he cries which this monitor does the job.I did have a problem with the monitor after one month of use when the picture went blurry and didn't get fixed after I followed all the trouble shooting instructions in the manual. So I emailed the Infant Optics company. They responded to me within a day. After a couple of emails of the issue I was able to recieve a replacement camera within a couple of weeks. Also they followed up to make sure that everything is working good. Im very happy with this product and the manufacturer customer service.

Reviews.Title: Wifi killer.
Reviews.Author: J. Couch
Reviews.Content: Look out for your Wifi!! This runs on a 2.4ghz frequency as does most wifi. Anyway don't plan on surfing the web on your iPhone while monitoring your little one on the monitor next to you.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Monitor for the Price!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Wirwille
Reviews.Content: I've had this monitor for over a year now and I think it's great! My sister paid $160 for her Motorola and our picture quality is much better. It's a basic sound activated monitor that has brought us great relief through our first year with out son. For $100 I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service at Infant Optics
Reviews.Author: ElizabethBBB
Reviews.Content: We've really enjoyed our monitor, and the customer service staff at Infant Optics is wonderful! I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Top notch baby monitor & excellent customer service!
Reviews.Author: AmazonBuyer
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor.  The picture is clear, it was so easy to set up, and its very user friendly.  The range is great, too.
