I appreciate that you can adjust the camera to pretty much any angle and the Auto Mute and Voice Activation features are really helpful.I had a customer service issue with the antennae cap.  It fell off after several months.  But they were wonderful to deal with.  They sent me out a whole new unit right away at no charge to me and could not have been more responsive.  No problems with the replacement at all!I could not imagine parenting our munchkin without this!  It allows me to go get a little exercise in the basement while she naps and still keep an eye out for her.  It lets me peek in at her when she stirs in the middle of the night and know whether I need to go in or can just let her go back to sleep.  It provides peace of mind.I love Infant Optix!

Reviews.Title: this is the bomb
Reviews.Author: joseph falcon
Reviews.Content: works great better than expected had it for 5 months and i leave it on for no reason when not in use and its still kicking.

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality, very easy setup!
Reviews.Author: Mimi
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor for our first baby--we are neurotic first-time parents so we wanted something that would allow us to see her without entering her room and waking her up. First of all, it took 5 minutes (if even that many) to set up. It was super easy and the instructions were clear. As soon as I pressed the "on" button, the video monitor picked up the signal and showed a crystal clear image of our baby's crib. I placed our baby in the crib to test it out, and I could see her perfectly, almost as if I was in the room myself. I HIGHLY recommend this product!!

Reviews.Title: Best video monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Shepard
Reviews.Content: For the money, it cannot be beat.  The picture is very clear and we never lose connection.  We have seen other video monitors with more 'bells and whistles' but most of them lack the picture quality of this camera, especially nightvision.  Our receiver did break after 2 years, but that was more likely from our toddler messing with the antenna on it.  If I had a gripe, it would be about the antenna as I wish it were internal.

Reviews.Title: Bought two neither worked, don't waste your money on this product.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Martinez J "kafito"
Reviews.Content: Bought the first and the camera only lasted a few days, stopped working not even turned on, Amazon inmediatly send me another one and this time the camera did not turned on from the begining. I really do not recomend this product, if you want to waste your money go ahead and buy it.

Reviews.Title: Well worth $100
Reviews.Author: Vino and Formaggi
Reviews.Content: A real steal for $100. Works well for us. There are no frills, and it's definitely on the cheaper quality side, but the picture is clear and the range is good enough for our small place. We even took the monitor downstairs to our neighbor's apartment and it worked great. The battery needs recharge daily and that's ok. the directions are clear and easy to use if you want to change some of the preset settings.

Reviews.Title: Great camera to ease the mind!!
Reviews.Author: Jason Blohm
Reviews.Content: Love the camera!  It has been a mind ease since we can see our little one sleep and make sure he is doing good, screen is a tad bright even with the contrast dimmed, we just put a small piece of tint on it!!!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor and incredable costumer service!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Sebens
Reviews.Content: My husband and I wanted a simple video monitor that had only video and sound (with night vision of course) and we found exactly that for a great price.  We had some issues with the the other day, I emailed the company, that day I got a reply and they were able to help me fix the monitor (we hit the wrong buttons some how).  Not only is the monitor a great monitor and a deal but the costumer service is incredible!To sum it up, if you are looking for a simple video monitor for a great price, this is the best one of you!

Reviews.Title: Good little camera!
Reviews.Author: brandy1110
Reviews.Content: Great price. I can see the baby pretty clearly (I can see the eyes and mouth, but not much more detail). Happy to find this quality in a camera for this price.

Reviews.Title: nice monitor
Reviews.Author: HPD202 "L. Natelborg"
Reviews.Content: seems to be a good quality monitor.  has a great picture.  the plastic seems cheap though.  time will tell how long it lasts

Reviews.Title: connection between webcam and monitor drops all the time
Reviews.Author: Sumeet Wadhwa
Reviews.Content: the performance of monitor died within one month of use. the connection between monitor and webcam drops all the time that we cannot use it. waste of money.will not recommend this product at all.

Reviews.Title: 1 1/2 years later and still going strong
Reviews.Author: Rumplemenz
Reviews.Content: I feel many of the 1 star reviews are unjustified.  Appears many are not aware of the volume settings as the limited buttons on this monitor can be very confusing.  Overall, for me at least, I'm very satisfied with this video baby monitor.  I do need to mention the screen no longer works unless it's plugged in.  This issue began about the 1 year mark after we dropped the monitor so it wouldn't be right for me to downgrade this monitors reliability.  It still works so that's all that matters :)

Reviews.Title: great customer service! BUT this cannot be used for two or more kids fyi
Reviews.Author: Amanda Scoggins
Reviews.Content: Works great for one child. I would give it 5 stars but I bought the add on camera so I could monitor my two children. Sadly this is impossible. Not sure why this isn't clear or why they would even design it this way, but you van only manually toggle between cameras on this model, making the second camera useless to look after sleeping babies in the night. Get the dxr8 if you have or plan on having more kids.Hoever, AWESOME customer service. I sent an email asking about this and they just let me return the whole thing and gave me amazon credit, which ibused to upgrade to the dxr8 problem solved :)

Reviews.Title: It works, it's affordable, best of all - SUPERB customer service.
Reviews.Author: Mom of 2
Reviews.Content: We've had the monitor for a year (since our son was born last year) and so far it has been working so good and up to the expectation. I especially love the night vision ability because at one point we were sleep training him and wanted to monitor him without going into the room too many times. It worked, now he would still be awake when we put him down and he would entertain himself until he falls asleep by himself. This camera saved our lives (and our good night sleep)! With our daughter, we only got the audio monitor type of some other brand and we failed to sleep train her (and still paying the price, she still sleeps together with us in the same bedroom, but different bed). Wish we had gotten this sooner!There was an issue with the adapter cord, this was right before the 1 year warranty was up. It broke so we contacted the customer service department. Mae from the department replied to my email promptly and sent me a replacement adapter ASAP. And a few weeks later, she emailed back to check and see if everything was fixed. It was. I am blown away by the level of service she provided. To add, she was very courteous and friendly (which is rare these days).There was another occasion where I thought the night vision was broken so I emailed her back. She asked if I might have turned the Infra Red option off (something I wasn't aware I could do at the time), otherwise if the camera was broken, they would gladly send a replacement camera. Turns out I did accidentally turned the Infra Red option off (If you press the "-" on both volume and brightness button simultaneously, it toggles the IR on and off - the screen would show "IR ON" or "IR OFF" or "IR AUTO.") so a replacement was not necessary!Bottom line, it works, it's very affordable, but the most important aspect of all, superb customer service. If there is something wrong with your monitor, send them an email and they will take care of you!

Reviews.Title: Reliable, effective, quality savings!
Reviews.Author: L. Lee Boswell "LovinMom"
Reviews.Content: Still working after a year!  Love this cost effective useful monitor.  I'm very glad I chose this over the super-expensive versions available.  The colors aren't crisp, it isn't plasma HDTV sharp, but it's normal video and has excellent night-vision.  We get no interference at all, and it has been very reliable.  I held off reviewing this for a year so that I might provide valuable feedback.  We got ours in December of 2012 when we moved our child out of our room and into her own.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality monitor!
Reviews.Author: G. Iacobone
Reviews.Content: I just love it when I find a good buy. I was so resistant to buy a video monitor because typically they range between $200-$300 or more, and to me that is just too much. When I found this monitor and read all the positive reviews, I was floored. And let me tell you, they are right. The video quality is crystal sharp, even in a dark room. Ditto the sound quality. It was super easy to set up and use which is a must when you're a sleep-deprived new parent. I would buy this again in a heartbeat!

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Customer Service--Highly Recommend!
Reviews.Author: Kerry Roberts
Reviews.Content: PROS:I love this monitor!  The screen is very clear, and it works great.  Being a paranoid new mom, I am easily able to see that baby is still breathing.  You can adjust the brightness and volume easily.  There is a setting that allows you to keep the sound muted and it automatically un-mutes when baby cries or there is an unusual noise in the room.  This is a great feature, it saves you from listening to static all night long when baby is sleeping soundly.  There is a similar feature for the screen, but I personally prefer to keep the screen on.  I have never had a problem with the unit malfunctioning.  You can even use multiple cameras with the one monitor unit.  It is very portable; I can charge it and clip it right to my belt loop or set in on a table or nightstand near by.  There is no dragging cords around the house or having to keep it plugged in.  I have even dropped it a few times and it never broke!  It is surprisingly durable for being made of plastic.  However, my clumsy bulldog knocked it over 2 nights ago and the screen got pushed in on one side and it no longer holds a charge.  I have to have it plugged into an outlet or it shuts off.  (I am surprised it even worked at all after that, but it did!)  Since we live in a 2 story home, it is very inconvenient to unplug it and plug it back in every time I go up or down the stairs.  I contacted the Infant optics company via email and received a prompt response.  The representative that replied to my email, Mae, was very helpful and addressed all my concerns.  I was able to exchange the broken unit for a brand new one.  They didn't give me the run around or make me jump through hoops.  It was prompt and simple, and they even ship the new one before they receive the defective one!  Best customer service experience I have had in a long time.  They seem to be a great company and I have recommended this product to friends.CONS:The only cons with this monitor is that the lowest brightness setting could stand to be a bit lower and the buttons are all very loud.  The brightness/volume buttons range from 0 (the lowest setting) to 9 (the highest setting).  The buttons don't allow you to push and hold to turn it all the way up or down.  For example, if you had the volume all the way up to 9 and wanted to mute it, you would have to click the down button 9 times and its really loud.  It actually wakes my husband up sometimes if I change these settings in the night.  A mute button would be nice, as would quieter buttons, but it isn't that big of a deal considering how well the product works!  Definitely not enough of a con to keep me from buying this brand in the future.

Reviews.Title: Functional and useful monitor
Reviews.Author: Thomas Gregorio
Reviews.Content: This is a very functional and useful monitor. The picture quality is incredibly clear. One of our chargers was broken when the product arrived, but Infant Optics was very helpful in sending out a new one right away. The one thing that would be helpful would be if the camera was more flexible and easier to attach to things.

Reviews.Title: Good product, great service!
Reviews.Author: Xing Wang
Reviews.Content: Given the functions and quality, this monitor is very affordable. I have been using it for 10 months. Very solid product. Clear view day and night. My only complaint is the monitor adapter failed after 8 months, but the manufacturer replied to my request (email and phone call) very quickly and sent a replacement at the next day.Great service! I would recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: N. Bair
Reviews.Content: The item is everything that we needed.  So far we have no complaints and we look forward to exploring the different features.

Reviews.Title: YES!
Reviews.Author: Diana S. "D."
Reviews.Content: I really love this Monitor! It has a really clear picture, the night vision is great. The sound on this this is very clear as well. I like the fact that when your baby makes a noise the screen turns on. Great value, great quality for a great price!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Bmark2810
Reviews.Content: Great camera- monitor. Night vision system works great and is very helpfull. Internet wi fi lose conection when camera is on but not a big problem. ighly recomended.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but decent quality video camera, with some neat features
Reviews.Author: Just Some Guy
Reviews.Content: I bought this baby monitor about a month ago, but wanted to give it some time and usage before I wrote a thorough review. So far so good. We've been using it every night for a month and it's been working great.PROS:* Very affordable compared to many other baby video monitors! Literally half the price of other cameras and from what I gather really no significant reduction in quality or features.* Pairing the monitor to the camera is straightforward and simple.* The audio sensor is smart in what it picks up and what it ignores. We have a ticking wall clock in my son's room, but that never sets the audio sensor off. Also, if my wife or I go in there and whisper it rarely sets it off. But my son moving, fussing or crying seems to set it off about 99% of the time, which is pretty much perfect.* Video quality is excellent! And the night vision works great (I was skeptical it would work well, but honestly it's pretty awesome!). Initially positioning the camera takes some trial and error, but once set up it's fine. Just don't bump that camera once it's set up!* The monitor unit itself can be mounted to a wall or just sat on its own little stand. And when mounted on the wall there is still decent (but not excellent) directional flexibility.* Instructions/manual were okay. A bit on the light side, but well written and easy to follow.* Quality and reliability both seem okay. The monitor feels a bit "cheap and pasticy" but not too bad. Our monitor and camera worked right out the box with no problems. But I don't doubt some other buyers ran into problems. But I think that's the same with any product - there are always the occasional duds.CONS:* Battery life on the monitor is pretty terrible. But you can run it while the charger is plugged in. So as long as you have a power socket near by it's not a real problem.* The audio sensor is a bit unreliable. If our son hasn't made a noise in a long time the monitor kicks on 100%, so that's good. But then after about 10 seconds it switches off, and doesn't come on again for another 45 seconds or so, even if he makes noise in the meantime. But overall this isn't a big problem, but a minor annoyance.* Despite what it says, this device doesn't play nicely with some wifi devices. The wifi connection on my smart phone often (but not always) dies as soon as both the baby monitor and camera are switched on - even when just downloading very small data footprints like small text/HTML pages. And my Roku 2 box consistently loses its connection within about 20 seconds of both the monitor and camera being on and connected. I tried changing the channel for my wireless router (as recommended by the manufacturer) and it didn't help at all. They say in the manual that there are known problems with the unit sharing a wifi connection, but they wrongly blame the wireless router, saying some nonsense like "it's being too greedy". Simple fact is, when I run into connectivity problems it is NEVER with the Infant Optics monitor or camera. It is always with other devices. So it's fair to say the Infant Optics units are the ones being greedy. The wifi hogging is annoying, but we really just use it at night, so it's manageable. But the lame customer service responses were frustrating. Oh, and the wifi hogging is only a problem when BOTH the camera and monitor are on and connected (this should be pretty obvious, but I thought I'd clarify just in case).* The kick-stand for the monitor unit doesn't lock open. So any little nudge to it and the kick-stand will close, sending the monitor falling backwards. Again, not a show-stopper, but an annoyance.* It would be nice to have a setting where you could turn off the audio sensor so you always hear audio via the camera. But that's not a huge deal.Overall I would definitely recommend this product. But just know its limitations and take those into account when deciding on a purchase. Most of the "cons" above really weren't a big deal for us, although the wifi hogging can be an inconvenience. I would give it 5 stars, but the wifi hogging of this product and incorrect finger-pointing by Infant Optics diminish my impression a bit.

Reviews.Title: Great for the $$$$$
Reviews.Author: DWI
Reviews.Content: Works as promised, I bought this to have when my grandson has his sleepovers this way his Mom & Dad don't have to bring theirs. Just follow the instructions and you won't have a problem setting it up.

Reviews.Title: Save you money
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Aldrich
Reviews.Content: When it loses connection it has a VERY loud beep and it didn't work more than an hour.  I really don't like this product.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Dana
Reviews.Content: Great product, meets all our expectations and more.  Thought it was broken after the first month but after contacting a helpful customer service it turned out to be in just power saving mode.  They were great, they followed up quickly!!! I would definitely recommend this product, it is reasonably  priced and worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Decent monitor, but creates issues with wifi
Reviews.Author: tierneymarie
Reviews.Content: This monitor works pretty well. The night vision is a great feature and I don't have issues with the volume like some reviewers have stated. My only real issue is that it interferes with our wifi signal if the handset is too far from the camera. In the living room (right next to the nursery, where the wifi itself is) there are no problems, but 20 feet further in our bedroom devices can't connect if the monitor handset is on. It took us 2 1/2 weeks to figure this out. Rather than get a new baby monitor we're going to move our wifi or replace our single-band N router with a dual band. Supposedly this will fix the problem.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend!
Reviews.Author: AmazonBuyer
Reviews.Content: Very happy I purchased this. I've had this for over a month & it has worked very well. One very important thing I worry about monitors is if they are dependable & this one certainly is. I love the VOX feature which means the monitor will go into sleep mode with a blank screen when it doesn't detect any sound, like a whine or cry. As a first time parent I could watch that monitor for a while, but the vox mode sort of makes me shut my eyes & go to sleep. It has been reliable coming back on when she makes a sound, & I can push the other button whenever I want to check up on her otherwise. I also use a sound machine & it blocks out that extraneous noise for the most part. Must have purchase & great price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Monitor and GREAT customer service!
Reviews.Author: Paige
Reviews.Content: I was a little worried about spend a lot of money on this monitor since I had only used sound monitors before, but I am happy to say that I LOVE IT!  It has a great picture and is easy to use.  I love the VOX setting on it.  We use a white noise machine and I was worried that the noise would keep the monitor on all night, but the VOX setting has it only turn on when my little one is crying.We did have a few issues with the camera.  I contacted the company and they sent me a new one right away.  I was VERY pleased with their customer service.I highly recommend this video monitor!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, great price, even better customer service
Reviews.Author: Amy Catherine
Reviews.Content: My husband and I love this monitor. The picture and sound are very clear, and the night vision works incredibly well in completely dark rooms. Our son even loves the camera as the subtle red and green lights seem to be a comforting focal point as he drifts off to sleep. We were initially concerned about whether the cost indicated a cheaply made product (since others on the market were so much more expensive), but were quickly convinced otherwise when we began using it. We have continued using this monitor for nearly a year now and it has certainly demonstrated great value for the price.Recently the antenna broke off of the receiver device (accident involving our son's handling; not a defect in the product), but our customer service representative was responsive, helpful, and expeditious in sending a replacement since we were still within the 1-year warranty.Overall, we have been very happy with our purchase and would buy this again if necessary.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: Lucia Servellon
Reviews.Content: This was a total disappointment. I was very excited about it after reading the reviews but I'm sending it back because it does not work. It worked great for one day. I was able to hear and see my daughter's room with no problem.The  next day, in the middle of the night, the screen began to make the loudest noise, waking my infant son that sleeps in the room with me. Even then I decided to give it another day but the third day it had no sound and it still has no sound. A total piece of junk.On top of that if messes up the WIfi in my house.

Reviews.Title: awesome monitor and can't beat the price!
Reviews.Author: Casey McGraw
Reviews.Content: I have nothing but good things to say about this baby monitor. The picture quality is perfect. I haven't experienced any interference with other devices. Plus, when I contacted customer service about a question with the camera they responded promptly and solved the problem.

Reviews.Title: No interference with wi-fi , great monitor!!
Reviews.Author: Natalia Castro
Reviews.Content: Great monitor! The view is really clear, day and night. The sound is also  good. The monitor is really easy to use. I was worried about the interference with the wi-fi at home because I read some bad reviews about it, but we don't have any problems with that. I'm really happy with my purchase!!

Reviews.Title: No video on this video monitor
Reviews.Author: E. D.
Reviews.Content: Based on the reviews I thought this would be a good option, for our small home. Not so. Despite following the instructions, the monitor never worked. I got a "no signal" error on the video screen no matter where I put it in the house or how close it was to the camera. Either I got a defective product, or possibly the wifi in my home was interfering with the signal. The trouble-shooting instructions say that if you have other wifi devices you should turn them off, which is not practical in any way shape or form for a modern household. Returned it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT monitor, excellent value, and great customer service!
Reviews.Author: M. taylor
Reviews.Content: Got this for baby #2 and have been VERY pleased (didn't have a monitor for baby #1). We got it nearly a year ago and have been using it regularly for the past 10 months or so. It works great and IO has great customer service. Did lots of research on video baby monitors before asking for this one because of the high price tag and many poor reviews I'd seen on Summer Infant monitors breaking just after the replacement period, all with the same problem, and SI seemed to be unhelpful.PROS- Image quality is great.- Clear night vision image.- Voice-activated feature and auto-mute were a must for us. These features work great, though we have encountered a few quirks, explained below.- There is a stand for the camera, and it is wall-mountable.- EXCELLENT customer service, super-responsive. This is truly the selling point that makes me wholeheartedly recommend this with 5 stars, and strongly recommend to all my friends. If you are going to drop a lot of money on a video monitor, at least make sure the company will do something about delivering a product that will perform. I read so many reviews about terrible customer service responses to apparently wide-spread experiences.CONS:- This isn't a $300 model with room temperature sensor, talk-back feature, remote camera adjustment, etc. As far as we were concerned, we didn't need those bells and whistles, we just wanted to see what the baby was doing if he was crying (did we need to go in to help him back to sleep or not, was he safe) so I didn't want to have to pay for all those features anyway. If you need them you are probably looking at a Motorola purchase. Summer Infant seems to break down too often.- red ring of lights around the camera for night vision, but I don't know how you get around this for night vision feature.- cant use vox with wave sound mahine but works fine with static white noise- It interferes with our wifi signal sometimes. Not all the time, but sometimes. So if we know we need to do something on the internet after the baby goes to sleep, we just don't turn on the camera until after we are finished with it. I have found that it is generally fine when we don't have the receiver turned on.- we have experienced some quirks with the voice-activated function (VOX). sometimes when we turn on the receiver, it automatically goes into VOX mode where it is essentially sleeping until it detects noise or movement. I have found that most times when this happens it doesn't properly activate when the baby starts crying. I would hear the baby crying on the other side of the house and the receiver is still in VOX mode. This is obviously a problem, and unfortunately, sometimes it isn't a problem and works fine even if it flashes "VOX entering stand-by mode" when turned on. However, so as to avoid the problem, every time it flashes this when turned on, I still adjust the volume or brightness to engage the camera image, then let it drop into VOX standby mode. If I do this, I don't experience the aforementioned problem.A note on our customer service experience and possible troubleshooting if you experience some similar problems:- charger stopped working 6mo in: easy peasy. Emailed Infant Optics and they immediately sent me a new charger. I live in NC and it took 2 days to arrive from CA. Could not have imagined better service.- VOX/Auto mute issues 6mo+ into use: For some reason, VOX and Auto mute stopped working sometimes. And sometimes the standby feature would engage but not reactivate. I encountered this problem right after getting the replacement charger cord mentioned above. It was so bizarre. We stopped turning on the receiver if it didn't go to VOX or auto mute because my husband couldn't stand the noise it made, then we contacted infant optics who offered to send us a replacement if we shipped it back. They even offered to ship out the replacement as soon as we sent shipping confirmation that our faulty unit was in the mail! BEFORE they would even have received our faulty unit! I was impressed with their going out of their way to ensure we had a properly functioning unit. However, the camera still worked, so we actually found that it was more useful to have camera access for the two days it would take to receive a replacement, because we just left the camera on and if I heard him crying down the hall, I could still "look in" on him by turning on the camera momentarily. Anyway, I kept going back and forth about taking IO up on the offer to replace the unit, then I'd try turning on the receiver again and sometimes it would work. It was really bizarre.  I'm still not sure exactly what was going on there, but it seems to be working fine now. VOX works again and so does Auto mute. Here are a couple of my guesses as to what may have caused the quirks with VOX and Auto mute being testy (except if the receiver automatically goes to standby when turned on... we still sometimes have problems with it activating when noise is made, as mentioned above):*we have an air filter in the room. The placement of camera and air filter may have played into it. I noticed when I didn't turn the camera so far over (toward the air filter) we didn't have the problem. we also played around with the placement of the air filter in the room for several days. perhaps the blowing air was picked up by the microphone sensor. not sure on this, but if you have the same problem, I would try to play around with it if you have an air filter.*maybe our outlet was struck by lightning which caused the charger cord to stop working (not sure, but there were storms around that time and only the monitor was plugged into that outlet) which may have affected the receiver, but I don't know much about electronics. if it was affected, then after a few days rest, could it have bounced back like that?

Reviews.Title: Excellent Monitor
Reviews.Author: M. Nauman
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our first child and we could not imagine living without it.  It is one of the few baby products that is indispensible in our house.  Now we could not imagine living without it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Johnson
Reviews.Content: I have done a lot research on baby monitors before I purchased this one! It is wonderful! The picture is very clear and the sound controls work great! I really love how small the monitor is. I have seen some that take of half of a shelf and this one is perfect! We take it with us when we travel and we have never had an issue with noise interference.I would highly recommend this monitor to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Few flaws, excellent quality for the price!
Reviews.Author: V. Glassman
Reviews.Content: This is really a fantastic monitor for the money (even though it was given as a gift). People have commented on the "cheapness" of the feeling of the plastic in the monitor. I do agree with this, although the quality of the image more than makes up for it. I mainly watch the baby at night and the "night vision" clarity on the screen is so superb, we actually rely on it when putting baby to sleep *while we're in his room* to make sure his eyes are closed and he's not moving. I like the range of motion on the camera; we have it sitting on the corner of the crib right now and will be moving it to atop his dresser soon. The camera covers quite a bit of the width and depth of the crib. I also like that it takes a charge very well and the charging cord is long. I leave it plugged it overnight with the monitor next to my pillow.Two things I don't love: The red lights surrounding the lens and the green light emitting from the camera attract baby's attention when he awakes in the dark. He will look right into the lens which creates the "light in the eyes" effect that you sometimes get when you take a picture of your dog. It distracts him somewhat from trying to go back to sleep. Also, it somewhat interferes with the WiFi signal in my house. When the monitor is on (not the camera; we leave it on all the time) my phone and computer take a while to load web pages.Still, this is an amazing camera for the money. I don't believe one needs a zoom or moveable camera; you should really be close to baby at all times anyway! For what you need to see that would draw your attention, this camera is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Pretty awesome
Reviews.Author: Noribelle Rivera
Reviews.Content: This was the easiest install I've ever done with any electronic equipment! It only needs to be plugged in and is ready for action. Having a newborn, time is of the essence, so I really loved not having to worry about reading multiple instruction pages and figuring out connections. I just ordered an extra camera so we can have one in our room as well.

Reviews.Title: Affordable, compact, great display, easy to use.
Reviews.Author: MicahFraley
Reviews.Content: My wife and I purchased the DXR-5 for our first child and it has been wonderful. As a new father, of course every noise and movement had me jumping and running into her room to make sure she was ok; this unit made my "ocd" checking on her a breeze. The infrared is perfect and the screen detail is surprisingly good. I could even see my daughter breathing under the blankets, which is very good quality compared to some of the other monitors we looked at.Not only that, but the customer service is amazing. I emailed with a small problem with the charging cable after almost a years use, and they quickly sent me a new one, no questions asked (the one-year warranty is great).If this unit ever breaks, we will quickly buy a new one. Infant Optics is a great small company that cares about its products and customers.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Dayna Vargas
Reviews.Content: I got this today and love it, works great during the day and at night perfect product for the price if I could add one thing I wish it zoomed but I like it anyway! Would definitely recommend to a friend

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Amy L. Christensen
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is great, especially for the price!  The customer service for Infant Optics is excellent as well.  We had a problem with our monitor where it wasn't going into the stand-by mode, so I contacted the company and they sent us a brand new one before they had even received the defective one.  They also checked in with me to ensure that the new one was working properly.  Now that the stand-by mode works, I love it!  The only con I have for the monitor is that the battery doesn't last a super long time, but it's not much of an issue because I can leave it plugged in at night.  I had this monitor recommended to me by a mom friend and I would definitely recommend it to anyone else!

Reviews.Title: Great product, best customer service
Reviews.Author: Happy mom
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit for my kids after a lot of research and was mainly looking for a long range. This product is excellent. The range is great. Auto shut off with inactivity. Auto mute for background noise. The plastic feels a little cheap but so far the best product for the money.The customer service is amazing. I broke the antenna off the camera by accident and the monitor stopped working. I contacted customer service and they replaced it free of charge. I couldn't believe it since it was my fault it was broken. The replacement system arrived within two days. Amazing company and product.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Jaspinder Singh
Reviews.Content: very good customer service. I recommend to buy this product. This product is working very nice. my family like this monitor very much.

Reviews.Title: Eh, there are better
Reviews.Author: Mommy of two
Reviews.Content: Does the job, you can spend more and get by far better quality, but for the cost it was what I expected.  No problems yet.  The plastic is flimsy

Reviews.Title: Everything we wanted
Reviews.Author: Heather McNeil "Great Mom"
Reviews.Content: This has everything that we need a video monitor. We were considering a monitor with pan/tilt but we didn't want to pay double the money for this feature. The rest of the monitor works just as good as a $200 monitor with great video and sound playback and good range without wifi issues. We are just about to have our second child now so we are planning on a 2-set monitor system instead of getting the add-on camera based on the fact it's only $35 difference.

Reviews.Title: GREAT MONITOR
Reviews.Author: Erol Atkins "EROL"
Reviews.Content: PURCHASED 2 OF THESE.....THIS IS A GREAT MONITOR. YOU WILL BE HAPPY U PURCHASED....U SHOULD KNOW THAT U CANNOT BUY 2 AND TRY TO LINK 2 CAMERAS WITH 2 MONITORS...IT WILL NOT WORK.

Reviews.Title: Just Right!
Reviews.Author: ESacre
Reviews.Content: The perfect baby monitor for you home! I love the night vision too! Just don't get spooked out if you "see" something. This camera picks up EVERYTHING! It also interferes with wifi so keep it away from electronics and such if you have wifi in your home. It's easy to set up anywhere too. Great deal!

Reviews.Title: Chargers are defective
Reviews.Author: River Maiden
Reviews.Content: Our first unit lasted about 18 months before it started having trouble charging. I give this monitor a lot of points for how durable it is. My toddler was obsessed with the monitor and it took quite a beating. I assumed that the charging issue was the result of heavy abuse and after it stopped charging entirely, purchased a new unit. When the new unit came. I plugged in the old monitor to the new charger and it worked like new. I kept the new unit anyway since the old one had been damaged and even purchasing two at $100, I hadn't spent what I would on one of the other monitor systems plus I could use a second camera now and we plan to have another child. After 5 uses, the new monitor stopped charging. I didn't let my son near the monitor, so I know it hasn't been damaged, but it will not charge at all. This has lead me to conclude it's the charger that is defective and not the monitor unit. I'm ordering a replacement unit now and will give it another shot and will update with my experience.As for the quality of the monitor, it's basic video and sound. I never found myself wanting more from it or extra features. The on/off feature where the monitor turns off unless there is sound didn't work for us because we use white noise machines when my son sleeps, so they always triggered the noise level and the monitor never turned off, not a big deal. The picture quality was good, night vision works well and sound is good an can go quite loud. The first unit we had interfered more with our wifi than the second unit, but we found that the situation improved when we changed the channel on our router.I still recommend this monitor. If you're having charging issues, it's probably best to get a 6v charger and see if that fixes the issue. Much cheaper than getting a new monitor.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic monitor with awsome range!
Reviews.Author: mwmom
Reviews.Content: We've had our monitor for almost a year now and love it! We live and a 100+yr old home with thick brick and plaster walls and were concerned that the reception might be limited for this reason. On the contrary, we get great reception on all 3 stories of our home as well as the yards and even down most of our large city block. We've had friends (who happened to own more expensive monitors with all the bells and whistles) that have been extremely impressed with the monitor and it's extensive reception range. The infant optics customer service was also fantastic when we broke the antenna off the monitor. They replaced it for us without any hassle whatsoever!I'd recommend this baby monitor to anyone without hesitation!

Reviews.Title: Life saver!
Reviews.Author: C. Doer
Reviews.Content: Received this as a gift and it is a life saver.  My daughter does not sleep in her crib no matter what! So we are forced to have her sleep on a regular bed or sofa.  She does not cry when she wakes up.  Having this monitor is great!  I am able to do other things around the house while she is asleep.  I was even able to do some gardening outside and it worked great!  So glad I didn't buy a $200 monitor when this works perfect!

Reviews.Title: Performs as advertised with impressive video and range
Reviews.Author: Terry Kalt
Reviews.Content: We've had this baby monitor for 2 years already and it's been running the same as new, but with the scratches and chip marks after dropping it a couple of times. This monitor has satisfied all we wanted from a baby monitor at this price. You get good video and range on a raw monitor with fewer features than most of the other models. We use the automute and I'm glad you still get this function for monitor under $100.

Reviews.Title: HUGE DESIGN FLAW
Reviews.Author: CBock "KMan"
Reviews.Content: Like a gambler who gets deeper and deeper in debt, I kept buying a new monitor after each one broke, thinking, this one will be better. Now, after the third monitor broke, the same way, I'm done. The major problem with these, and the reason you should look elsewhere for baby monitors, is the plastic antenna on top. With a simple drop or bump, it breaks. And if you have small kids, trust me, you or someone else in the family will drop or bump the monitor and the plastic piece that protects the antenna wire below will snap off. Why not super glue it back on, you ask? I tried that. All three times. But inevitably that breaks and what ultimately happens is the wire gets twisted or crumpled, which leads to so much static that it's unusable. These things are so cheaply made (both camera and monitor are super lightweight pieces of plastic) that it doesn't take much to damage them. They are also extremely basic in terms of functions. It's incredible they're asking close to a hundred dollars for something this cheaply made. We had the previous version of the Summer Infant video cam and monitor and it worked great. It was solidly built had a remote control rotating camera that really came in handy and was only about 50 or 60 bucks more than this piece of junk. Unfortunately, we lost it in the move to our new house.My humble advice, do not believe the four and five star reviews, invest a little extra money and get one that's more solidly built. Otherwise, you might end up ultimately paying more in replacement monitors once your original one breaks and you're too stubborn (or is it stupid?) to admit you should just cut your losses and buy one that's not so fragile.

Reviews.Title: Great buy backed by outstanding customer service
Reviews.Author: Angela H.
Reviews.Content: The video quality is wonderful and customer service is outstanding. My camera stopped working about a month after purchase and when I emailed customer service they emailed back immediately....like 5 minutes later and then continued to email back immediately after I responded. We were unable to come up with a solution that corrected the problem with the camera so they shipped me a new camera the same day with no more questions asked. The only reason I gave this monitor 4 stars is because the camera and monitor are cheap looking/feeling. However, this package is well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Amazing customer service
Reviews.Author: JAX
Reviews.Content: I have been using this product since February with no problems and last week it would not turn on. I emailed customer service and they responded in 15 minutes and asked me in a very diplomatic way if I had tried to take the battery out and put it back in (which I had not). Once I did that, it returned  to it's full functionality. (suprise). Customer service continued to respond to me within minutes via email, and then emailed me again a week later to check up on my monitors functions. Pretty amazing. They were very nice and thoughtful and extended my warranty for a year just cause!We love this monitor, it is a basic model and does not have all the options of a more pricey option, but for the price, it cannot be beat. And do you really NEED to see your baby in HD? Probably not. I love the volume options and the option to "see not hear" your baby.All in all, two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: One of the best monitors for this price
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: It is significantly cheaper than most of the video monitors out there. I did a lot of research on monitors coz I was not planning on spending $200 for our kid. We got one of those wi-fi monitors before. That was a terrible idea and we returned it pretty much the same day. Picture on that one kept freezing and blanking out.It has extremely good nigh vision and a solid range. We have a ranch home that is really long. Video is perfect no matter where in the house you are. No frozen frames so far. Audio goes quiet if there is no motion, which is really nice at night. Screen is super bright, but can be adjusted.Two points to know-1) The construction is not the sturdiest, but it is meant for us, not a toy that my kid can play with. So it works really well!!2) Battery life of the receiver is not the greatest. But it gives you enough to go through about two hours.

Reviews.Title: 240v/50Hz OK
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: This video baby monitor was recommended to me since it works using 240v/50Hz with just a plug adapter.  I have not yet tried to take this monitor to the USA and have no idea if it will work perfectly on 110v/60Hz.  I am so very happy that this unit is available and really enjoy using it.  The range for our home is perfect.  The baby started in a co-sleeper in our room and is now in a crib in her own room.  The monitor made the move with her and I am happy to report that it worked perfectly while she was in the co-sleeper and now in her crib.  The receiver unit even works when we want to sit outside on our patio and the baby is sleeping.  There may be better monitors available, but I am very happy with the functions that this provides.

Reviews.Title: Great product with the best customer service
Reviews.Author: Rukayat
Reviews.Content: A great product with a fantastic customer service. We have had our camera for about 6 months now. It has been good and handy for us living in a town home, i was a bit skeptical about the camera signal not reaching the kitchen (my fav place in the house) but oh boy did this product proof me wrong. I have got no complain so far, the antenna broke and infant optics sent us a new one right away through the amazon fulfillment center with no issue. Good antenna range, and i love the night vision feature!Outstanding customer service.

Reviews.Title: Great for night time
Reviews.Author: PCHoy
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this product. My daughter is two months old and just started sleeping in her nursery. i can see and hear her clearly when she is sleeping in her nursery and I feel better know I can see her. You do not need to purchase the more expensive monitors  because this one does the trick. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great unit
Reviews.Author: peanut
Reviews.Content: Great buy for the price. Worked better than expected. Great picture in light and darkness. Very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: cheaply made
Reviews.Author: jc
Reviews.Content: this baby monitor is very flimsy and cheaply made.  the video portion of the monitor stopped working after one night of use.  don't even waste your time trying this.  there are many other better options on amazon.

Reviews.Title: wifi killer
Reviews.Author: jgp123456
Reviews.Content: the webcam itself is great but half my house has no wifi signal now.  easy to setup and easy to mount.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Gillian
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty good monitor. It is basic and easy to use. There are two things I don't like about it. The first and most annoying is that there is very little warning before the battery dies. No beep, just a flashing green light...which I've never seen because the monitor died while I was sleeping. The second is that the signal occasional gets spotty if you have other devices. The upside is that if the signal is lost the monitor beeps very loudly at you. If only it would do that when the battery was dying...

Reviews.Title: Not loud enough when the baby cries
Reviews.Author: Rajiv Nandivada
Reviews.Content: It works well when you are awake but its not loud enough even for a light sleeper like me. There were at at least a couple of times my kid was crying for long periods of time before I could wake up.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Baby Monitor!!
Reviews.Author: Uday Madireddy
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent device which works wonderfully well during day or night and it is so easy to setup and contingently mounts on the wall.We had issues with the monitor because our daughter used to play with it and so once the monitor stopped working I mailed the customer service their response was nothing short of phenomenal.They got everything fixed for me with the replacement order in less than a week and even did a follow up to check to see everything was OK.With the price and durability and customer service of this product there is no match for this.Maybe in future if they can add a new feature to monitor it via phone using internet then this would be the best baby monitor ever(But I understand that it would increase cost by atleast 50$) but with current prices I would pay 150$ to get those additional features for this excellent product!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent! Love it! Highly recommend!
Reviews.Author: mpowers20
Reviews.Content: I have been using the Infant Optics Digital Video Monitor for months now and could not be more happy with it. Yes, it's so light weight that it almost seems cheap, but it doesn't matter, this monitor is amazing. I love how the VOX makes it so the screen isn't keeping us awake because it shuts off if there's no sound. The monitor does pop on when there is a hard vibration (like if someone slams the front door) but other than that, this monitor it perfect. I've even dropped it a couple times and still nothing is wrong with it.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use, Simple, Gets the Job Done
Reviews.Author: neboo11
Reviews.Content: This product isn't going to blow you away when you look at it. Yes, it is plastic. Yes it doesn't "feel" expensive. BUT, it gets the job done. It is super easy to use and works very well. I would recommend the DXR-5 to anyone looking for a monitor.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: StuffSairaBuys "S."
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews on a lot of baby monitors before I picked this one. I love this thing! We live in a fairly big house, almost 3k square feet. So when baby is in her room, I bring this to the kitchen, living room, where ever and it works great! We also have a very big yard, and I've been outside of the house and still get reception. The one thing that I've noticed lately is that the screen flips from black and white to color. I'm not sure what's up with that, but it works. It does the job, and I recommend it to any parents out there.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Jerrod Poe
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this baby monitor. The picture is crystal clear during daylight hours and the night vision optics work like a charm. The only thing to note is the Vox ON option is not the default setting so the monitor screen will stay on continually and drain the battery rather quickly. Once you activate the Vox option the battery life is significantly improved. Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Not good.
Reviews.Author: J. Heald
Reviews.Content: I'm giving this 2 stars because it does actually does work.  In fact it works fine.  The problem is the quality of the product is is so low that in my opinion is almost unusable.  The monitor won't shut itself off to save battery power, the sound quality is bad, etc.Do yourself a favor and buy a higher end model.  I just replaced this one with the Samsung model.  Works great and its only a little bit more money.

Reviews.Title: Great but! But 1 con..
Reviews.Author: Shanty
Reviews.Content: Great system all around. However, it's a pain getting it connected pretty much every time we use it. We plug them up, and start the "pairing" process, but they just simply won't pair. They won't connect. So I have to disconnect the actual plug from the monitor/camera, not just from the wall lol, and after doing that once or twice, I turn them back on & pair, and they work. My husband & I are young & tech savvy and have had this for about..5 mo's now. This con isn't a deal breaker for us, but still a con. Still a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Good product, exceptional customer service
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: I have been using this monitor since December 2012 when my son was born.  We are very happy with our purchase and for the price, you get a very practical and useful baby monitor.  A couple features my husband and I find particularly useful are the auto mute so that you don't hear every little sound the baby makes, and the VOX standby mode.  Another perk to purchasing this product is the exceptional customer service you receive with this company.  Our monitor got wet and I wanted to purchase a new screen, so when I contacted customer service, they offered to replace the unit at no charge because we had purchased it within the year.  All we had to do to receive our new monitor was send it back and scan and email the shipping receipt.  The new monitor arrived promptly and the customer service representative was in constant contact with me via email until she was sure I had received the product and I was happy with it.I gave the product four out of five stars for two (relatively minor) reasons: first, even with the VOX standby mode enabled, the monitor has to be plugged in or the power does not last throughout the night.  Second, the inner part of one side of the screen on our first monitor sank in after a few months of use.  Other than that, we are very happy with our purchase and I would purchase it again!

Reviews.Title: Great video monitor for the price, excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Rita Novella
Reviews.Content: We've had this monitor for over one year now and have been extremely happy with it.  We live in an apartment building in a densely populated city, so we needed a secure video monitor that wouldn't have interference problems - this does the trick.  Occasionally we experience interference with our wifi network, but only if the monitor unit is turned on and held less than 2 ft away from a wifi device (such as a smartphone or laptop) - this will cause the wifi on the smartphone or laptop to slow down, but it won't cause any problems for the monitor/camera nor does it completely cut off our wifi.  The only feature I occasionally wish the monitor had was the ability to talk to the child through the monitor (ie talk to the camera via the monitor).  I don't use most of the other features such as auto-mute, so I can't speak to their utility.  We recently ordered an additional add-on camera from Amazon Infant Optics Add-On Camera for DXR-5 2.4 Ghz Video Monitor (DXR-871) before our second child was born and the camera that we received didn't work very well - the image was out of focus no matter how we adjusted it.  I contacted the customer service at Infant Optics via their website and they shipped me a new camera right away, no questions asked.  They then emailed me a week later to ask if the camera was working or if they could further assist us.  The new camera works perfectly and I was most pleased with their customer service.  Now that I have the monitor linked to two cameras, I can say that it may not be a good choice  if you plan to link it to more than one camera because it doesn't automatically alternate between the camera views - you have to press the pairing button to switch views.  This means that you can't just go to sleep with the monitor on and rely on it to transmit audio/video from both cameras - it will only do so from one camera until you actively switch it to another.  This is fine for my purposes because I only rely on it for video - our home is small enough that I can hear both my kids from anywhere, so we sleep with the monitor off and only turn it on to see what's going on in if we hear crying.  So from my perspective, I have zero regrets about buying this monitor and the add-on camera.

Reviews.Title: Its okay. Has its pros and its cons.
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: We have used this for 3 months now. No issues really with reception or anything. I have noticed that the screen is starting to look a little glitchy at times but it is hanging in there. Will update this if it goes out on us or anything. Picks up if she farts...which is hilarious..TMI, sorry. I very much like that the sound will turn off if she is silent.I am giving this a 4 star because I wish we could turn the SCREEN off at night and keep the sound on low. That screen is still so so bright when we sleep, even after we turn it down as low as it will go. I have to put a towel over it to cover the light up.Warning. if the battery starts to die on you it will make an incredibly LOUD beep noise and if you are around the sleeping baby it will surely wake that kid up. It's done it to us and we were in the room next door to her. So annoying.UPDATE: been using this for 9 months now. The monitors screen tends to glitch every once in a while. It's rare though and doesn't really bothers us. The little one likes to use it as a toy a lot of the time and it has held up very well! The screen is all scratched to hell from her sliding it around in the wooden floors but we can still see! Still think this is a great Product for what we put it through.

Reviews.Title: Would buy again. Works really well
Reviews.Author: Emilia C. Antezana-Grove
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mother who needed to use this for my aging father and it worked really well.  The sensor turns on when there is movement and the night vision is a little grainy but works well for the price. Would buy again

Reviews.Title: Great quality, great price
Reviews.Author: amatz
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor system, it is easy to use, great range and great price! I used this when my child was a baby, I still use it with my toddler. It is easy to travel with, works anywhere and is surprisingly durable. I would always buy this brand moving forward.

Reviews.Title: Interferes with WiFi
Reviews.Author: Gretchen B.
Reviews.Content: Our WiFi would not work at all when this monitor was in use. The video quality was good, but I didn't like how the sound cut in and out. We have a noise machine in our baby's room so the audio would just go in and out constantly, even if there was no crying. If you don't use WiFi, this might be a good option for you, but if you like to get some things done online or if you stream TV after your baby goes to sleep, I wouldn't recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money!
Reviews.Author: Tami Cummings
Reviews.Content: Super monitor. Yes, it's cheap plastic, but for that price, it does what I want: I can watch my baby with a clear picture. I like all the features, too. The first one we ordered wouldn't charge so sent back for a replacement. The second worked, no problems.That was over a year ago & we feel we have definitely got our money's worth already!

Reviews.Title: I LIKE IT
Reviews.Author: DeeRockLove
Reviews.Content: ITS PROBABLY NOT THE BEST OF THE BEST BUT I HAVE HAD NO PROBLEMS W IT. IT MIGHT OF LOST SIGNAL A COUPLE OF TIME WITHIN 4 MONTHS OF USE. NO BIGGIE. I HEAR PERFECTLY AND LOVE THE NIGHT VISION AND DAY SETTING. ITS SO WORTH THE 100 BUCKS! IT DOES THE JOB WELL. ITS LIGHT WIGHT, EASY TO USE. MAKES MY LIFE EASIER PERIOD.

Reviews.Title: This monitor is the best
Reviews.Author: K. Delgado
Reviews.Content: Wow!  We have loved this monitor for the past year.  It's fantastic.  The price is right.We love the rechargeable battery.Picture quality and sound are great.Range is okay.  Not amazing, but works for our small house.Easy to set up and install.Highly highly recommended.  Nothing but a positive experience.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up & amazingly clear screen
Reviews.Author: baloo
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this baby monitor.  The price is great for what you get.  The camera unit & monitor are both very easy to set up.  There are so many angles & options to set up the camera unit so you'll see exactly what you want.  You can even mount the camera unit up high on a wall to get away from the crib and the picture is very clear still.  The screen on the monitor is very large & clear.  The options of auto-mute for times of silence & inactivity are easy to set up.  The infrared works great.  Great baby monitor!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: mac
Reviews.Content: Read the great reviews on this product and jumped at the chance to get this. Works great and reception is excellent.

Reviews.Title: It does the job.
Reviews.Author: Dana
Reviews.Content: I was reluctant to buy a non well known brand but after we tried it we liked it. It does what it is supposed to do and you don't have to pay a lot of money for it. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Product
Reviews.Author: Mpb
Reviews.Content: I really like this product. It was cheaper then most video monitors but still had great quality. The customer service is awesome too!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Constance Johnson
Reviews.Content: Love this product.  The infant optics monitor has worked really well for our use at home with our newborn.  I like that there is an option of adding more cameras on the same monitor once we have more children.Our monitor broke about a month ago - the antenna snapped off because it was dropped on granite.  I called the infant optics customer service center and they shipped a new one to me with no charge!  They were wonderfully helpful and have continued to check up on me since.  Would definitely recommend this product based on their customer service alone.

Reviews.Title: Okay for a starter monitor....
Reviews.Author: cmcd2011
Reviews.Content: This monitor works for me for the time being. My biggest complaint is the limited battery life, it only seems to last about an hour off the charger. When the battery runs out on the monitor is beeps very loudly, and is quite annoying. Recently it has started having signal issues for what seems like no reason. I will be buying a different monitor very shortly.Update- I decreased my rating to one star.... this monitor is constantly dying now, the battery life has become worse. The signal issues are now worse as well. I also failed to mention in my intial review that this monitor has a very cheap "plasticky" feel to it.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Melissa Routh
Reviews.Content: I am glad I ordered this video monitor.  We have an audible one, however, when our baby got sick and then started rolling over, being able to "look in on him" without having to go into his room is wonderful.  The picture is great and I love that it has power-saving mode.  I am a light sleeper, so I was excited about the monitor "sleeping" when there was no noise coming from my child.  There is a slight popping sound when the monitor kicks back on, which is enough to wake me to make sure he soothes himself back to sleep or to check on him and make sure he hasn't rolled into a corner and gotten stuck.  The only negative comment I have is that when the camera and monitor are both on, it interferes with the wi-fi in our house.  Other than that, it is a great product for an extremely reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: bbopsarah
Reviews.Content: Very simple & easy to use.  I really like how the sound kicks in when the baby moves or makes a noise. Only had it about s month or so but we are very happy so far.  Definitely worth the price

Reviews.Title: Video quality so-so
Reviews.Author: review4u
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a second monitor for a room our daughters share.  Video quality is not nearly as good as the other one we have (since discontinued of course), but it's passable for the price.

Reviews.Title: Turns off without warning
Reviews.Author: L. Miller
Reviews.Content: Like many others who reviewed this monitor, I had a summer infant monitor.  I was going to get a second camera for that monitor, but the reviews on it were bad and just a camera cost as much as this whole system.  So I got this as a second so we'd have a back up if our old one (2 years old) died.As previous reviewers commented, it is not the most sturdy plastic.  But that isn't a big deal.  It also has a clear picture compared to our old one, which I like.  However, it does interfere with our wifi, which is older, so I can't check email on my phone when it is near-by.There are a few features our old one has that I really miss:1. the volume lights: the old one has lights (green through red) to show the volume in the room.  this is really nice when your spouse is sleeping but you want to keep an eye on the baby crying since you don't always want to run in there.2. turning off the image: with our old one, you can turn the image off or on but the sound stays on.  This saves the battery life and also the light can be very bright in a dark bedroom but you'll wake up if they cry and need you.  Then you can turn the picture on to check on them.  The infant optics one instead has something called "VOX".  with the vox feature turned on, the monitor goes into a "sleep" mode when there is no sound in the room for a certain period of time. It then "wakes up" when there is sound above a certain level. However, this is why I'm giving it a 1 star.  If you don't have it plugged in to the wall and it is in vox mode, then it won't just go to sleep, it will turn itself off completely (battery dies???) without ANY warning.  So, you think the monitor is on, but it isn't and then you don't hear the kid crying (and crying and crying).  BAD!  This thing should beep like crazy if the battery is dying (again, assuming this is the cause) but instead you just think it's asleep.  We haven't had this problem if the monitor is plugged in. If it wasn't for this, I think this would be a darn good monitor for the money but because of this, I wish I'd looked at other options. If you still are interested in this one for the cost, then just make sure it is ALWAYS plugged in.

Reviews.Title: Shower gift
Reviews.Author: Kay Lynn Sumner
Reviews.Content: Great shower gift!!! Price was good and the new mother loves it! Hostess gift at. Great price...would buy this item again!

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Catherine Mckay
Reviews.Content: I've had some problems with this unit but do have to say their customer service / follow up was EXCELLENT, so I've been very happy as a result of that. Further, I no longer have any issues with the product. It's a good, inexpensive option which has serves its purpose for us.

Reviews.Title: Love It.
Reviews.Author: Granny "K"
Reviews.Content: My daughter and son-in-law bought a home with a split floor plan.  They had never been far away from their child during the evening hours.  I gifted them with this monitor and they just love it.  Now they wonder why they didn't get one sooner.

Reviews.Title: Worked for 3 months
Reviews.Author: Anonymous girl
Reviews.Content: I used this monitor for 3 months and I am not impressed.  The audio quality is not sensitive enough to hear the baby moving around in the crib making noises unless she is crying loudly.  Sometimes the images would appear in color and other times everything seemed too have a blueish hue.  The monitor gray tip antenna broke off after 2 months and then stopped charging at 3 months.  I would not recommend this because of its poor quality and lack of longevity.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Clark
Reviews.Content: Simple exactly what I needed for my friends baby monitor needs. It was exactly what I wanted it was great.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Shelly Landis Penney
Reviews.Content: This works perfect in my daughters room.  You can see her sleeping in her crib very clear.  The battery lasts quite a while as well.

Reviews.Title: does not have zoom
Reviews.Author: natasha
Reviews.Content: this monitor is pretty good , but the picture is not even close to one on amazon , it works well with no interruption with our wifi. the monitor screen lights up every time baby moves when it on vox setting the sound is good. My only wish it had zoom so i could see how my baby breathing ,may be if we had it closer to the crib....our monitor is mounted on the wall approx. 5 feet away from the crib ,instruction says it should not be any closer than 3 feet...when i purchased it my son was 6 months old .Bottom line if you planning to use it for a new born and you want to see him/her breathing you need one with zoom option.

Reviews.Title: Worked ok for a few months
Reviews.Author: Jessica Wheeler
Reviews.Content: We bought this product because of the price and we needed a 2.4 monitor for use in Japan.  This product worked ok for a few months (3 at most).  Currently the image is pixelated and we cannot actually get a good view of our child.  We have the screen on all the time while she is sleeping however the voice is only activated with noise.  We wanted something that would project sound all the time not just when the baby screamed.  Our kids are very quiet at first and if not responded to they start screaming, a child shouldn't have to scream to make the monitor work.  For $100 it should have worked for more than 3 months.Also shortly after receiving it the plastic antenna broke on the parent unit.  very cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: jamieva
Reviews.Content: This is a great video monitor but it is very fragile.  It does the job but it didn't seem as sensitive to sound or motion as other monitors we've used.

Reviews.Title: As a monitor to observe my wife.
Reviews.Author: john dixon "Great Grandpa"
Reviews.Content: The unit preforms perfectly. I use it to monitor my wife in our upstairs bedroom. She has Alzheimer's and can not walk well and an alone trip down the stairs alone is impossible. So I am able to watch if she wakes up and gets out of bed. I am very satisfied unit. John

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Uli
Reviews.Content: Using it now for 2 month and for me works great. Sometimes my baby fusses at night but isn't awake so it's nice to see what's going on before it run out of bed to check on her. Picture is perfect of me I see what I need to see at day or night. Can adjust the brightness and volume makes it easy to use on different day times. No problem with our wifi and the monitor. Just wish the battery of the monitor last longer just need to remember to plug it in when I got to bed after 4 hours I get warning signal that the battery goes out. Also makes noise when the connection is not up . Love it and would never go without camera

Reviews.Title: WIFI interference 2.4ghz
Reviews.Author: Arman Tanzarian
Reviews.Content: Search reviews for this product and you'll see a clear problem that it has with WIFI interference. No surprise when WIFI and this are both using 2.4ghz. I could tell instantly that my WIFI improved the second I turned the monitor off. Not a huge problem, but still annoying. Otherwise great product. Plus if you have wifi on 5ghz, it shouldn't be a prob.

Reviews.Title: It does the job
Reviews.Author: Jessica Whittaker
Reviews.Content: This is fine for the price. I had a problem with one camera when it was dark in the room. The company quickly replaced it and the new one works great. My two big complaints are that when it is unplugged, it doesn't seem to last very long with the battery before it dies and needs to be plugged back in. My other complaint is that I can hear the kids but can't talk back to them. I knew this when I bought it but didn't think it would really matter. I wish I would have spent a little more to get one that they could hear me.

Reviews.Title: I love this monitor!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor its not the best it is cheap but duded It does its job!! Am glad I got it . And ppl said the have drop it and it doesn't work anymore I have drop this monitor a lot and it still works. So I say hey stop thinking about buy it!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price... BUT
Reviews.Author: DWS "Keep it secret. Keep it safe."
Reviews.Content: This video monitor does the job for how reasonably priced it is. However, I've only had it for about 4 weeks and the sound has already gone out. It's ok (sort of) most of the time since we already had a sound monitor, but now I have to use both and that's annoying. I'll probably have to ship it back soon, but I don't want to be without a monitor in the meantime. Video quality is pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor
Reviews.Author: Nathan Kochenower
Reviews.Content: For the money, you get a nice digital video monitor that isn't much more expensive than an audio monitor: but you get the day/night vision of the nursery which is really useful. This is a rather simple monitor with the basic stuff you'd expect from a video monitor and nothing much more than that. However, the stuff it does have: night vision, video etc. is done really well. It's got great video quality in day/night and the range is really good without giving static at a distance. We also never experienced any problems with our wifi too.The battery life is a bit short (3-4hours) so I would recommend getting an extra charger to keep in your living room so the monitor can always be powered.

Reviews.Title: Works, but...
Reviews.Author: matt "musmma"
Reviews.Content: It works well enough, decent range, fair price etc.  I learned the hard way that this thing ruins my wifi reception.  I get about 10% of the speed I normally get when running the camera and receiver, if that. Frequently I am unable to use a wireless device.  I tried changing channels on my router and turning on the router after the camera, but the degradation of the wifi signal was the same.  If you are not using a table or laptop in the same area as the monitor then go for it, otherwise you may want to look at one that uses a different frequency.

Reviews.Title: no issues
Reviews.Author: Sunile Manjee
Reviews.Content: honestly, this is a great product.  very clear and extremely easy setup.  if anyone complains about this product, they probably don't like any product.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Sinu Sekhar
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item a week back and it didnt work as promised.Installing it and getting the video on the monitor was a breeze.Night Vision didnt work at all. I tested it with extremely low light and no light conditions and IR never turned on.I even tried setting the IR mode to ON and AUTO and it never worked in the night vision mode.Under normal lighting conditions, it worked fine...but thats not why we needed this monitor in the first place.We wanted to see the baby when there is little or no light in the room.So the primary need was not met.The other issue we ran into was wifi slowness and hickups right after we installed this.I believe this issue is reported by some other reviewers too.We are going to return ours and get some other brand.Maybe ours was a lemon considering other positive reviews. But needless to say, it was a waste of time for us.

Reviews.Title: Peace of Mind: Keeping an Eye on Your Child
Reviews.Author: A. Baird "busy mom"
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor. I am able to see my baby when it is dark in the room to see if she is sleeping soundly or moving around. It turns on when she starts making noise. Also, it came in handy when her older sister went into the room to "check on her." This has been a lifesaver. I can be in the basement and get a perfect signal from the second floor of our home. The image quality isn't perfect but I can see what she is doing. The "night vision" feature is pretty amazing. I couldn't be happier with this monitor. Plus, it is pretty sturdy. I put it on the edge of the changing table and have knocked it over multiple times. It still works perfectly. Only negative is that sometimes it is tricky to find a place to put the camera, it tilts up but not really down. Sometimes you have to be creative to get the angle right.

Reviews.Title: good enough, but room for improvement
Reviews.Author: T. Lee
Reviews.Content: I've had this for over a year now, my daughter is 14 months now.  So far, I like all the features that it came with, color, night vision, auto mute, VOX, spread spectrum, price point, etc.now, the 2 problems i have is that this will interfere your 2.4ghz wifi network, I really didn't want to believe it, but the evidence is clear.  It affects my friend's wifi when I visit them and uses the monitor, and depends on where I place mine, it affects my own home's wifi on the 2.4ghz band.the 2nd problem is that the AC adapater cable eventually broke from stress (moving it around too much i guess) on the camera unit closer towards the base.  You can see where they fortified the cable into the plug, but it broke exactly where it wasn't fortified.  I had to cut open the plug to jimmy rig it.  So just be careful on how you use this.I am not going to comment on the good points, I give the product 4 stars and that should speak for itself.  -1 star for the above 2 problems, otherwise it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: won't work well for far away nursery
Reviews.Author: K. Wallace
Reviews.Content: Although this video monitor would work just fine if the parents' bedroom is fairly close to the baby's room, it is not a good choice for houses where the bedrooms are far apart. We have a two story house. The master bedroom is on a separate floor and a completely different side of the house from our kids' rooms. Mind you, it's not a huge house (2500 sq. ft.), but the room where we put the video camera was on the opposite side from our room where we had the monitor. And unfortunately, we just weren't able to get a strong enough signal. We got picture/sound most of the time, but when the signal would fade, the monitor would make this awful, loud beeping noise and display a warning that it was out of range. This happened several times a night, and woke us up over and over. It was super annoying. I followed all the instructions in the manual to try to fix this problem to no avail. So, we are returning this monitor to Amazon. Bottom line: If your room is far from your nursery / kid's room, I would choose a different monitor.

Reviews.Title: Very nice product for the price
Reviews.Author: SeriousReviewer
Reviews.Content: got this for our 1 1/2 year old daughter and this has been peace of mind for us sitting downstairs while she sleeping upstairs. Night vision makes it clear to supervise kid during dark too. Can be extended to include upto 4 cameras though didn't try to add any additional (we just have one). Battery life also seem good - upto cpl of hours without plug hooked in while video is on. Range also is good - sometime take this in our patio and backyard and still can track our little one. All in all a nice product under 100$

Reviews.Title: audio too soft
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: We have the Summer Infant baby monitor and this one. This monitor is a great value and much better than no monitor.
