The difference that you get if you pay more a Summer Infant baby monitor is in the audio. The microphone doesn't pick up the sound as well and the speaker is much much softer. There is not much difference in video but the audio is a night and day difference. On this monitor, if you have the TV on loud or there is a party going on, you'll easily miss the sound of your baby.Another minor complaint is that I wish they'd thought more about was how the screen goes off after a while. This feature makes sense in the Summer Infant baby monitor... the screen goes off after a few minutes if you don't have it plugged in to save battery. If you have it plugged in, the screen stays on. On this Infant Optics monitor, the screen goes off after a few minutes, plugged in or not. You have to press something to reactivate the screen.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Pamela Skiles
Reviews.Content: It's good for the money. I guess? We've had several problems with ours and if it wasn't a gift (no receipt) I probably would have returned it by now. The first problem happened when we mounted the camera to the wall and then decided to take it down and move it. When we tried to plug it back in, the cord no longer worked. Annoying. I called customer service and they sent a new one pretty quick, but still. Now we've started using it pretty regularly and the mute feature and the "vox" feature no longer work. So the monitor unit no longer shuts off when it's quiet and it on all the time. I'm not sure the battery will last all night (that's another thing, you get like 30 seconds warning before the battery dies), so I turn it on and off all night which is also annoying. Plus, if we didn't live in a small house and could hear our daughter wake up, it would be useless. Right now it's kind of useless because it's more of a spying mechanism than an alert mechanism. Anyway, we're still using it. It kind of works. Meh.

Reviews.Title: Works just fine but knocked out our internet
Reviews.Author: LA Stone
Reviews.Content: It worked as it should have, but knocked out our wireless internet when it was on and for hours after it was turned off. Had to return it...bummer.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera and monitor; defective A/C adapter
Reviews.Author: Cindy Kibat
Reviews.Content: The instructions to setup were easy to follow, however, I could not get the monitor and camera to synch up. There are 4 camera channels and they synched on the 4th channel which was unexpected.  It worked fine for the first evening but when I woke up in the middle of the night, I had a "lost signal" error going off.  Also, when I went to bed the adapter was charging the monitor, when I woke up it would not charge anymore.  I tried switching the adapters and the camera adapter worked ok on the monitor but the other one clearly did not work.  Exchanging the item, hopefuly the next one will work properly.

Reviews.Title: great monitor
Reviews.Author: Lynn Nachtrieb
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor, great quality for a lower price. Picture quality is in color & great. Very good sound quality.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Karen Ueland
Reviews.Content: It seems to work fine, even when I am out in the garage and want to keep track of sleeping child.

Reviews.Title: Small, simple, exactly what we needed.
Reviews.Author: Kevin Krutsch
Reviews.Content: After reading all the positive reviews for this product we figured we would give it a shot. It's compact and works great. For just a little more than the cost of a higher end audio only device, you can step up to video.The only negative is that it does interfere with the home internet wireless from time to time. (almost all video monitors will) We've followed the manufacturer tips on how to reduce the interference but it's still noticeable at times. It's a small trade off to be able to check in on our baby without having to pop in the nursery.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME BABY MONITOR!!
Reviews.Author: AmandaKayley
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this baby monitor! It has a clear picture and sound. Can easily adjust the camera to any angle you would like. I have had this monitor for over a year and use it everyday and it still works great, I would highly recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Veatriz
Reviews.Content: So I bought this monitor not too long ago and so far I have had no problems with it whatsoever.The video quality is great and the noise sensor is very sensitive which is a plus.the night vision is a great feature and works perfectly.I understand some people have had an issue with the monitor interfering with their wifi or something, but mine hasn't interfered one bit. I love this monitor and would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Love it! Great for the price. Automatically switches between light and dark. Auto mutes and auto hibernates. I've been very happy with it. We bring it with us whenever we go! It's portable and convenient. I'd highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality & Price
Reviews.Author: Sherry A. Jorgensen
Reviews.Content: We bought this to help us take care of an elderly family member after he fell.  We needed something to assist us in knowing when he was getting out of bed - so we could be there to assist him.  The quality is good.  The infrared capability helped us view his room in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Great product for a great price
Reviews.Author: JulienYoko
Reviews.Content: We bought this with the thought that if it didn't work well we wouldn't be losing out on money as it's relatively cheap. But it worked perfectly and is so easy to set up. Just literally plug in and it's ready to go. Our friends and neighbors took our recommendation and bought one of these too.Through accidental damage we broke the antenna and therefore the capabilities were compromised but I contacted Infant Optics and they sent me out a brand new one at no charge. I was really impressed.

Reviews.Title: This product does not last
Reviews.Author: Nickel
Reviews.Content: We loved this product, but it only last a few months! The wiring seems to go out on it and it won't charge anymore. It won't even turn on when it is plugged in. I think for the price I would expect it to last longer than a few months.

Reviews.Title: very not happy with this baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Henny Reichman "shelly"
Reviews.Content: doesn't work more then a few feet. keeps on coming up out of range very not happy with this baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: excellent price. product AND Service!
Reviews.Author: Macy
Reviews.Content: When I purchased this item I was a bit leery because I did not recognize the name brand and it was quite inexpensive which I worried would compromise the quality. Now after receiving it and using it for the past 5 months I am happy to say that there are no issues with the quality at all. The monitor has excellent sound and picture quality, the night vision is excellent , I have not had any issues with signal and the on light is not so bright that it will affect your sleep. I had one instance where I did think that the night vision was broken and I emailed their customer service and within one hour I received a reply where they gave me step by step instructions regarding how to reboot the camera. They had also given me the the option if the camera was broken to gladly fix it for me but that was not necessary. Also two weeks later the customer service department emailed me again to ensure that I was still satisfied with the product. I have been blown away by the excellent customer service especially from their representative Mae, she has been incredible. I recommend purchasing this camera because it encompasses all of your needs from a camera without breaking the bank and if you have any issues they have incredible customer service.

Reviews.Title: Solid product
Reviews.Author: Beth14850
Reviews.Content: We've been using this monitor for a year now. It works great. Absolutely no complaints. I finally had the impetus to write a review after receiving some really great customer service this past week. My daughter loves to play with the monitor's receiver, and must have pushed a combo of buttons that turned the night vision off. Since there aren't a lot of buttons on the monitor and camera, all of the functions (like turning night vision on and off) are done by, for instance, pressing the volume and camera button at the same time. I never bothered learning these functions. When the camera stopped working, I assumed the night vision was broken and emailed their customer service. I got a very kind and patient email 24 hours later suggesting that I try turning it back on by pushing the appropriate buttons, and then offering to fix it if that was not the issue. Prompt, kind and patient with a problem that was really of my own making (for not knowing how to properly use the thing in the first place and failing to look up instructions online or in the manual).

Reviews.Title: Nice Features!
Reviews.Author: SHANNON BERTELS
Reviews.Content: This monitor has some nice features, the only thing I wish I could change would be for the screen brightness to be a little more bright, other than that I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Amazing baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Radhika
Reviews.Content: I am so glad, I bought this digital baby video. Now I can do my household work w/o tension since i can always see my baby through the monitor. Earlier, I had to go every 15 minutes to check if he is sleeping or has he woke up, but now..its so easy!!

Reviews.Title: Great video, flimsy packaging.
Reviews.Author: edw00rd
Reviews.Content: The video and sound work great on this monitor. The night vision is great and I have no complaints on the quality of the picture or sound. My only problem is that the plastic feels very flimsy and the battery does not last very long. Overall I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great picture/sound and who doesn't want to spend mega dollars on other brands.

Reviews.Title: No Power Cord for Display, Li-ion Battery Dead
Reviews.Author: Ezeilo Uchenna
Reviews.Content: This is annoying. I only used it once to test it before I really needed it. Now when I plug it in to charge the display monitor, which I can carry with me around the house when it is fully charged, it does not charge except I plug in the power cable. I would still not have minded since I wanted to use it in the sitting room while watching TV and the baby is sleeping in the room. I could just use another power cord to power the display as well while in use.Problem is it came with only one power cord for the camera and display. I searched around in the house for any matching power cord (I actually have many). No luck.Useless for now.

Reviews.Title: I really wanted to like this!
Reviews.Author: Volbeth
Reviews.Content: I bought this product based on decent reviews and a great price. I really wanted it to work! Unfortunately, there was no signal in our house. We have a two story house (with an open, two story living room) and the receiver would say we were out of range even standing in our living room. We only had a signal standing right outside our son's room...not too great when you need to see him in the middle of the night! It also made an annoying BEEP evert time it woul go out of range.We returned this product and ended up buying a Summer video monitor, which we have been extremely happy with.

Reviews.Title: Awesome value
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Sublett
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on monitors. This is the one I decided to purchase and Very glad I did. Had it a month now and it works awesome!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera but flimsy construction
Reviews.Author: LizashUK
Reviews.Content: I ordered this monitor back in January from another site and started using it at the end of May when my baby was born. At first it seemed to work great and the picture is very clear. I noticed that the size/shape/material was quite flimsy and awkward to hold and keep steady even on a flat surface like a table. I constantly knocked it off my night stand just by reaching something near it, it just was not sturdy at all. Then after about 2 months of use it got knocked off our couch and the plastic antenna piece broke off, exposing the wiring. Because of the way it broke it did not seem fixable. We kept using it but within two weeks the monitor had completely stopped working, the power button would light up but nothing came on. I contacted Infant Optics customer service and they informed me that because I didn't buy it on Amazon that they would not repair or replace the monitor. Since it had been over the specified return period from the site I bought it from they will not accept a return or replace it. So now I am out a monitor and my money. I would not recommend this product because of the flimsy design and poor customer service from the company in this instance.

Reviews.Title: good but
Reviews.Author: karina
Reviews.Content: this was a good monitor for a smaller house, i am about 40 feet from my son and this monitor could not handle the range, i returned it for the more expensive motorola mbp33 which works great

Reviews.Title: Awesome and reasonably priced!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: Fantastic product! This item is very affordable compared to others on the market. I am pleased with the long battery life and durability of the product. My daughter has thrown the receiver many times and there's not one crack in the screen. I recommend this product and if I had to would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the money!
Reviews.Author: Hollie
Reviews.Content: I had a much older and bigger video monitor that was given to me before this one. Comparing the two this is amazing! Like other reviews said it does 'feel' cheap but the picture is great! Sound is not as good as my graco sound monitors but I didn't buy this monitor for the sound. I bought it so I could see my 7 month old in her crib. We mounted it right above her crib which is perfect other than being an eye sore in her perfect room. It is a sacrifice that needed to be made. It beeps when the battery is going dead warning you that it needs to be plugged in. It beeped loud and long enough to wake me from a dead sleep. I'm not as happy with the sound but the graco monitors I have are top of the line so that is what I am accustomed to. I may just not have my settings right. But when she would roll it would not come back on it took a good whimper to make it come on.

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor for us
Reviews.Author: CLine
Reviews.Content: I was recommended to buy this monitor from a friend. We have never used a baby monitor before, but this has a reputation for good value for the money. At this price, I'm very happy with the unit. The picture quality is better than what we thought would come from a budget baby monitor, and the night vision is amazing. I can see the details of his toys in his crib and see if he sleeping or awake. We will be keeping this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product!!
Reviews.Author: K. Romano "Krazy K"
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful!! It allows me to see the baby during the day and at night and gives me piece of mind that he's ok.  Love the feature that allows me to hook up additional cameras as well!!  The clarity is great and I love the portability of the monitor so that I can do things around the house and "take him" whereever I go.  The only thing that I can say needs improving is the sound volume..  But this certainly isn't an issue where I wouldn't recommend this to anyone who is having or has a baby.  A wonderful monitor at a really reasonable price!  A must have!

Reviews.Title: Audio stopped working
Reviews.Author: Holly Allen
Reviews.Content: Basic low price video baby monitor, not the best quality picture but serviceable. The "vox" mode where "monitor unit shuts down automatically if no noise is sensed for 3 minutes" but turns back on automatically if there is a noise, was very handy.About six months after buying it, however, the audio stopped working. We never figured out if it was the speaker on the monitor, or the microphone on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!!
Reviews.Author: andrefq83
Reviews.Content: i bought this because even though i wanted a video monitor i didn't want to spend a fortune on it, and this turns to be affordable and it has a great image, good sound.. Just keep in mind that you only charge the monitor, the camera has to remain plugged to the energy at all times...

Reviews.Title: Best Gift!!
Reviews.Author: Xander
Reviews.Content: This was a great gift for my Aunt baby shower. Its a great product and it works amazing. The thing that I like about it is the night vision, you can se clearly. Its a great camera that you can use it any where in the house. I would recommend it to Anyone.

Reviews.Title: Better video quality than my $200 monitor
Reviews.Author: Ginnie Matthews
Reviews.Content: the video quality is better than my philips monitor I bought 3 years ago for $200. For the money you pay this is a great deal. only used it for a month and it's been reliable so far.

Reviews.Title: best customer service
Reviews.Author: Son Nguyen
Reviews.Content: i received this as a gift and have been using it from day one.  it works very well.  I accidentally knocked it off the table once too many times and the antenna broke off.  Since it was only 9 months old, I contacted the manufacturer asking for help to see if I can replace the antenna or patch it up somehow.  They got back to me right away and  offered to replace the whole set for free.  Now I have a new set and they have a loyal customer !  Love them!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture and Sound Quality, Overall Great Monitor, No Regrets
Reviews.Author: Cassie
Reviews.Content: As a parent or soon to be it is important to have the best monitor so when your little one is sleeping you are sure to pick up on every  movement and noise. I searched for days trying to find the best monitor for the buck. I stumbled upon this one and loved all the features it had. The picture is extremely clear and the sound is sharp. I like the volume control option, during nap time when my little one is fighting it I can have the volume on zero and still watch him without hearing all the screaming. it also blocks out white noise. So if you have something that plays to help put your baby to sleep the monitor will go quiet after a period of time and only make noise if a new one is made. I also like the dimming of the screen. At night when it is completely dark you don't want a bright screen keeping you up so this feature is most appreciated. This absolutely puts me at ease as allows me to get a good nights rest because I know if my little one needs something the monitor will wake me. I'm defiantly glad I went with this monitor over the others on the market. I haven't had any regrets so far and I've used it for 6 months now.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: ART
Reviews.Content: This is a very useful tool that is totally worth the money. It provides a live representation visually of what happens in a room - day and night in a great way. I love the video and sound quality from this monitor. Every parent should have one of these!

Reviews.Title: Will need to reset during baby's naps!
Reviews.Author: M.D.
Reviews.Content: The view on the screen is crystal clear! I am amazed at how clear it is, even with the lights out and infrared turned on. However, we would have to reset this monitor every hour or so while our LO sleeps, because it loses signal every hour or so while it is in use for naps! We do indeed have a 2.5 GHz modem that runs continuously, and we believe this is what is causing the loss of signal of the monitor. If I have to turn off the modem and go without a computer while my baby is napping, I won't get anything done!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: 3Sail
Reviews.Content: We've had no problems with using this monitor. It was the best 'cheaper' monitor I could find and I got this based on a 1st runner-up sales ranking on amazon. We had a summer infant monitor after our first son and the screen broke just before our second child. This monitor is has better video quality (smoother video and more clear pictures being displayed) and better night vision. Both the summer infant and infant optics is digital, so we the reception was around the same. I like how this monitor is much lighter in weight, so you won't feeling if you put this in your pocket and carrying it around when you move around. We are planning to expand to 2 cameras on this unit.

Reviews.Title: Low volume
Reviews.Author: E.S.
Reviews.Content: Good general functionality but the plastic elements seem to have loose tolerances. The volume isn't very loud. Does the job but doesn't overwhelm.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Adrianne "Adrianne K."
Reviews.Content: The product does as promised - it's a video & audio monitor for baby. But I was really impressed with the customer service. I had dropped the monitor and broken the antenna. Infant Optics immediately replaced it since it was within a year of purchase. And talking to customer service was easy, which seems rare these days.

Reviews.Title: Greast price-easy to use
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: No complaints on this monitor.  I bought it to keep at grandma's house so it doesnt get much use.  It is very easy to setup and use.  The screen on the monitor itself is good, it could be clearer at night but really I see what I need to see, it just doesnt have the same clarity as a $150+ monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good deal, good monitor
Reviews.Author: Sensei
Reviews.Content: I bought this based on reviews, and I'm happy with it.  It's not the most clear picture, or adjustable monitor, but for the price, I think it's a good solid deal.  The night vision is good.  The audio is so-so, not sure how well it picks up little tiny noises when it's in sleep mode or whatever, but it seems to do the job.The power cables are kind of a pain for the camera, but I guess you typically mount it and don't move it much. Wish the camera had a little bit more adjustability, but it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Good Price, Very Good Customer Support
Reviews.Author: Pal
Reviews.Content: We received this monitor as a gift from our Amazon baby registry.  I chose it because it had such great reviews here on Amazon and it was priced much better than a lot of other video monitors I saw.  We have been using this monitor for 7 months now and it is working great.  We live in a three story town-home and I am able to use this monitor everywhere in the house.  Our daughters bedroom is on the top level but it works great on all levels.  I can even use it outside in our front yard when I take our dog out in the afternoons.  It also works in our garage!  We had an issue recently and the customer support was great.  I sent an email to them about our issue.  They responded promptly and they were able to solve my problem very quickly.  One of our cats had knocked the monitor over and it would no longer charge when we plugged it in.  This was inconvenient because it meant that we needed to have the monitor plugged in at all times.  At first I was a little annoyed because I thought it meant that it had broken from falling one time but that was not the case. They instructed me to re-insert the battery dragging it from left to right instead of placing it on flat.. they even attached images to show me how to do it!  Best of all it worked!  My monitor is able to charge again and I can remove it from the power cord and carry it around the house.  I think it is a very good video monitor for the price and I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera!
Reviews.Author: Happymom
Reviews.Content: Can't beat the price! The picture is clear and I love the audio and video options it has. We've even bought this as gifts for our friends' children. They love it too!!!

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Heather R
Reviews.Content: We had our monitor and 2 cameras about a year when the monitor antenna fell off and stopped working. I contacted them and they told me how to send it back and sent a replacement quickly. We are very happy with the new monitor and the price can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Giorgi Beridze
Reviews.Content: Very useful product when you have baby. Even necessary! Also it works very well and one more + is that it takes from 110-240v as input.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Pete Hoskins
Reviews.Content: The product is exactly as expected. We can see our little boy play in his crib very clearly no matter if it is lights on or lights off. The VOX mode is pretty useless if you plan on keeping the monitor on the charger, we prefer to keep the monitor on continuously just incase anything happens. We never had our signal drop off.

Reviews.Title: Good for a $99 monitor
Reviews.Author: Thomas F
Reviews.Content: This monitor is a good choice for something that is affordable and that meets 80% of the specifications of $250 monitor. The video is very smooth and the functions are easy to use. We've used it for 2 months and it has been reliable so far.

Reviews.Title: Great Baby Monitor at this Price
Reviews.Author: Yuksel AVCI
Reviews.Content: This camera is Great. Definitely raises  your life quality.Now Me and My wife can spend some time without paying attention to indistinct voices. Before we had this camera, a dinner was never completed without going to our daughter's room and listening through the door. Now we can enjoy our drinks at the balcony and watch our daughter sleeping. The Night vision is great as well as the day view. The material looks cheap but indeed its very durable. The setup was very easy, Planning to order extra cameras.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Patsy Boutte
Reviews.Content: I really love this monitor! I can rest much better while my son sleeps in his crib at night and be able to do the household work during the day. I have the cameras set relatively close to the crib, but not within his reach as the label warns. It shows the picture very clearly on the screen and I never experienced any drop in signal, or the image quality being affect when you move it too far away. We can't use the VOX mode because we have a white noise machine in his room. For this price this monitor is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: The antennae is VERY vulnerable!
Reviews.Author: TRP
Reviews.Content: We packed this in a back to go out of town and the antennae on the video monitor snapped off.  Problem now is that we can't use it with the camera!  Hate to spend money buying another unit!  If you are traveling with this one, be careful how you pack it!

Reviews.Title: very helpful tool to monitor baby and good services
Reviews.Author: Jintao
Reviews.Content: We are using this monitor every night and baby napping time. It is very useful tool for us to monitor our baby without disturbing his sleeping pattern. It is especially useful when we did sleep training for our baby.The screen is big enough and video are clear. Since we don't want to pay extra money to some other fancy functionalities, this monitor is perfect for us.I've also contacted customer services, they replied me promptly and very helpful too.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: DJ Aly V "Aly"
Reviews.Content: I really like this monitor a lot.Pros: 1. good picture, even the night vision is decent. The picture is good enough to see when baby's eyes are open.2. The range seems to be pretty good, though I don't usually take it very far.Cons: 1. battery life after charging the video monitor handheld unit could be better, it seems to go dead after a short evening (less than 4 hours of use)2. Sometimes the picture on the monitor flashes dark and light, and that can get annoying.

Reviews.Title: good !
Reviews.Author: xw82
Reviews.Content: We all love it ! It's lovely and quite convenient. Very good! If you have a baby, you need it.

Reviews.Title: Nice but ...... wifi issues with other devices
Reviews.Author: Robert Voigt
Reviews.Content: This model is good for the price, but has a major flaw.If you have a streaming device like Roku or Plex media server on your Roku/PC you might get frequent buffering issues.I check multiple routers and settings still the problem didn't go away. After searching it seems that the camera creates some kind of interferance.After turning off the camara and the unit .......... the problem went away.So designers please look into this and buyers, if you don't have streaming devices (Roku for netflix or Plex), then you can try this, otherwise be aware of the issue you might get.That's why my rating is 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: Video quality is great
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Excellent video quality from this monitor. I've had 2 video monitors (black & white only) before and it's nothing compared to this. The screen isn't very big, nor is the picture in HD, but you can define the objects in the room very clearly and you don't have to stare at it to recognize what is in the picture. The viewing angle is not that wide so we move the camera further away to the corner of the room to catch our son moving around his room during the day. At night we put it closer to the crib which helps the night vision too.The price of $99.99 is just right for this monitor. It fits my bill and I recommend this monitior.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Customer Service
Reviews.Author: OZ
Reviews.Content: I got this monitor as a baby shower gift in Novemeber 2012 and installed it 6 months later. There were some issues with the signal and I contacted Infant Optics. They were extremely pleasant and helpful. They've sent me a new monitor before they've actually received the damaged one. Also, I didn't have a purchase receipt and it wasn't a problem. I am extremely satisfied with the product and the customer service!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor
Reviews.Author: Alyson
Reviews.Content: I love the ability to see and/or hear my son in his crib while I'm in another part of the house. The night vision works well.  This monitor provides a comfort in being able to quickly look over and "check" on my son, without having to get out of bed and physically check on him.

Reviews.Title: Functional but not without it's annoyances
Reviews.Author: Angela C. "Angela C."
Reviews.Content: We have been having problems with our Internet for a couple of months and finally narrowed it down to this monitor. You can literally turn it on and the wireless internet signal drops. Turn the monitor off and the internet comes right back. It is definitely interfering with our Linksys Wireless G router.Another negative is that the battery will just die without any indication that the power is running low. It would be nice to have a low battery signal. The battery life is very short as well.My wife is not thrilled with the voice activation either. She'd prefer the sound stay on all the time.I'm not sure that the signal REALLY reaches 800 feet either. We can't go more than a couple steps into the yard before losing the signal.All of this being said, it was relatively inexpensive. It is quite functional. The negatives are really mostly annoyances.

Reviews.Title: Great little monitor, great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Vera Hartman
Reviews.Content: I got this in late 2011 for my soon to be born son.  It worked great from the start.  Screen is in color when the light in the camera room is on.  At night it has night vision so it's grays/black/white.  You can adjust the contrast to lighten or darken.  The volume is good, i have it all the way up on my night stand and I can hear it over my Honeywell turbo on medium.  Since purchase, I have dropped it several times.  There is a plastic cover over the screen that pops right back in.  There is a mode that will turn of after so long without noise from baby, but it has an annoying beeping that will wake you up so I just leave the monitor on all the time.  After one of the drops I was unable to turn the monitor on full time.  I contacted infant optics and they shipped me a replacement- after I emailed a picture of the shipping label/box of the return..  Used a cheap audio only monitor for the few days I didn't have it.  Now, after having it for over a year the monitor wouldn't charge.  Again I contacted the company and after troubleshooting they sent me replacement power cords at no cost.  I have a half acre back yard and the monitor worked all the way to the back of the yard.  Awesome product!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Ryan lee
Reviews.Content: It works better than we expected.  Great quality and very simple to use.  We recommend this monitor highly to anyone looking for a great experience.

Reviews.Title: Clear reception and excelent for the price
Reviews.Author: YANI HUSNAYANI
Reviews.Content: At the beginning I thought there was something wrong with this monitor (it interfered with our other baby monitor).  My son in law fixed the channel on the other monitor.  It works properly now.  I placed the monitor in the baby's room facing the crib - you can see everything on the sheet.  I am going to buy an extra camera for the blind spot in the kitchen.  I have the system for less than a month.  I am hoping it will not break too soon.

Reviews.Title: Poor signal
Reviews.Author: Allan Ciobotariu
Reviews.Content: The image is good, but the signal is not strong. If you need in small spaces it will do fine.

Reviews.Title: I Love This Item
Reviews.Author: Perry
Reviews.Content: I have been searching for a baby monitor ever since my girly was born (she is 15 months now). I'm delighted with the clarity and clear signals this monitor features; after so much shopping I regret I haven't ordered this a year ago.

Reviews.Title: Love! Love! Love!
Reviews.Author: Mama Moni
Reviews.Content: We love this Monitor. Practical, and worth every penny. We even bought a second one for our new baby. We use both cameras but only one monitor. (it made better sence to buy the the combo verses just the camera) love the fact that our girls could both be sleeping and all it takes is the push of a button to see weather theyre awake or not.

Reviews.Title: Baby monitor
Reviews.Author: KinsNmom
Reviews.Content: It works really well. This is our second monitor and I love this one so much more than our first. One thing I REALLY like is it's quiet, it doesn't make any white noise. My old one was so load all the time. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is the screen is a little small. I have a toddler and it works great and it's awesome for the price. If I had a newborn or baby I would want a larger screen to see better.

Reviews.Title: Must have!
Reviews.Author: MLR
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for the price.  I love the auto mute feature and the feature which allows the screen to time out until sounds are made.  Our previous monitor didn't have theses features and made it really hard to get a good night's rest.  I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Bernadette Anstee
Reviews.Content: We finally decided to upgrade our sound monitor to a video monitor after our second baby. We should have done it ages ago.Pros:no interference and staticautomute function is nice to have when sleeping.Night vision quality is excellentlong rangethe side buttons makes it easy to control the brightness and volume when you are half asleepCons:the night vision in AUTO mode sometimes goes on automatically when it isn't suppose, and this triggers the screen into black and white mode. We sometimes have to toggle it to ON/OFF by ourselves especially when it's not too bright/darkFor $100, this is great value!

Reviews.Title: Double monitor setup
Reviews.Author: Julipoi
Reviews.Content: I really love this video monitor! I have two DXR5s in my house that runs at the same time. I don't need to switch cameras or scan the channels, I have both screens right in front of me. For two of these, it would cost a better monitor but I really think I made the right decision. Yes it doesn't have pan/tilt but you don't really need it if you have both cameras set at a different angle! I'm very happy with the price and quality of this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Low cost, high value
Reviews.Author: Dsanders
Reviews.Content: Great price for a great product. Very satisfied with this purchase. Highly recommend it. Great picture and screen, good reception as well.

Reviews.Title: Affordable and functional
Reviews.Author: emmie
Reviews.Content: Despite the bare bones packaging, product is easy to use and extremely value for money. The monitor is sensitive enough to pick up small sounds - this is useful for monitoring whether baby is able to self-soothe and allows for me to intervene before she wakes herself fully from her sleep. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera. Great company customer service.
Reviews.Author: AnnH
Reviews.Content: We have been using this camera daily for the past 7 months. It is WONDERFUL. Worth every penny. I am so glad that I got this camera instead of others which were much more expensive. It does everything that you would want. The night vision is very clear. I can easily see if my son's pacifier is out of his mouth/ out of reach. The day time camera is also very clear and in color. THe VOX setting is super nice. It "turns off" the receiver when no noise is detected, yet the moment my son stirs it turns the monitor on. We have a white noise machine in his nursery and the VOX still works great even with the white noise machine. We just moved him to the nursery recently and I was afraid that I wouldn't be awoken at night when he cried. I keep the monitor by the bed and easily hear him the moment he makes any noise- before he starts crying. The level of sound that the monitor picks up on is perfect. I also love that I can clip the monitor to me and carry it around the house or even outside.I recently emailed Infant Optics directly with a question. They were very prompt to get back to me and even sent a new camera to me. The company is great to work with. I have recommended this product to every new mom that I know. It really is the best camera for the price in my opinion. I can't wait to add another camera so that I can have one in the nursery and one near his pack-n-play (nap time). Again, great company to work with and great camera. My only trouble is that my wireless doesn't work well when the camera is on---- but I believe that is because we have a really old wireless router. I'm sure that once we fix our router, it will be a non-issue. I would buy this camera again any day.

Reviews.Title: takes my worries away
Reviews.Author: Gina Pelter
Reviews.Content: This monitor has really helped take my fear of being away from my baby. It keeps a good eye on her and the alert functions have been very reliable so far. It's very simple and easy to use and I think all moms wouldn't have a problem getting used to this machine!

Reviews.Title: Beeping question
Reviews.Author: Kathy Van Mullekom
Reviews.Content: So far, I like the monitor that I have for my granddaughter. But, how do you stop the beeping noise it makes for the "out of range" message that I don't want to hear, especially at night. So far, it's got great image for my granddaughter's room upstairs and our master bedroom downstairs.A week later, I'm liking the monitor very much!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Beware. $90 is clearly not enough to spend for this technology. Ours routinely looses signal. Quality poor.  The camera must be 50 or 60 feed away (thorough a wood door), and it often looses signal with an annoying loud beep.

Reviews.Title: Good video & audio
Reviews.Author: MD Sheena
Reviews.Content: We bought this based on this monitor being the best seller in the monitor category on amazon and we didn't make a wrong choice! For the money the video and audio is very good. The screen isn't very big but the resolution makes the images quite clear. I don't exactly appreciate the battery life but if you carry a good discipline using the power cord when not moving around, this wouldn't be a problem.

Reviews.Title: Very durable for the price
Reviews.Author: Eleanor M. Sbardelli
Reviews.Content: I am writing this as my 17 month old son just destroyed the picture capability of the monitor. The monitor took many falls and drops over the year and few months I have had it. I am thinking about buying this again, but I think we can do without(the sound still works). I will certainly buy it again for baby #2.  I bought this monitor because we moved my son into his nursery after about a month after we brought him home. He was/is a very noisy sleeper and no one was getting any sleep. This monitor eased my nerves because I could always see him, even better than if he was at the side of my bed. The night vision is awesome! The price is right and it has all the bells and whistles you need. If we were watching video on my computer, we would have to turn it off to get a better signal. It does seem to slow my internet down, but our internet service is not the best. Love this product and will buy again!

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I've had this for 3 months and so far I really like this monitor. It's not the most expensive and yet it serves the purpose well enough. I use it all the time and it has never had any problems. It would be nice if it had a built in clock on the screen.

Reviews.Title: This monitor won't last long - you might as well pony up for a better monitor
Reviews.Author: Amanda K. Wingfield
Reviews.Content: Pros:The picture is pretty good on this monitor and it is easy to use.  You can also mute it.  I was surprised to learn that you can't mute other monitors, which sucks when you're going through the various phases of having to let your baby cry it out and trying not feel like a horrible mother.Cons:It's not well made.  The cover on the antenna fell off nine months after we had it.  I tried to glue it back on and it came off.The picture would spontaneously shut off.  Emails to the company about this went unanswered.This monitor would also spontaneously lose its signal in the same spot- usually in the middle of the night, which would wake me up.  Because of this (and the fact that the nursery is on a different floor in our house) we purchased a backup sound monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good choice for budget monitor with video
Reviews.Author: Glenelg
Reviews.Content: This product is the best in this range. Without a doubt the video is the really good for what you pay for. The construction doesn't feel very sturdy but it has sustained several drops from a table height. The sound isn't bad - I could hear my son mumbling even when the camera is positioned 4 ft away from the crib. The signal uses the same 2.4ghz frequency as our wifi but it hasn't affected our internet speed or connectivity. A good video monitor overall.

Reviews.Title: Display is nothing like photo
Reviews.Author: kevinr432
Reviews.Content: I ordered this device to assist with the care of my elderly grandmother.  While the product is ok for the price, the display is nothing like the photo shown in the advertisement.  The display is grainy and the color quality is poor.  I am pleased with the battery life of the monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive video monitor and great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Larsen
Reviews.Content: We purchased this monitor 6 months ago when we moved our toddler out of her crib into a toddler bed. We also purchased a second camera as I was expecting another baby. I loved that this one was less expensive, did not have all the unnecessary bells and whistles, and had good reviews. It has completely lived up to my expectations. We can easily switch back and forth between the two cameras and the picture is always good. The only problem we experienced: several weeks ago, I couldn't get the battery to charge. I emailed Infant Optics customer service and they responded promptly (within 12 hours I think). They explained that sometimes the battery just needed to be placed in at an angle rather than straight in, and if that didn't fix the problem offered to replace the unit. Luckily, that did the trick, and I haven't had another issue with it. The representative followed up with me several days later to make sure the monitor was still working. Great customer service and a great product!!

Reviews.Title: I wish I bought another model
Reviews.Author: Mahesh Nagarajan
Reviews.Content: We had a motorola baby monitor that died, and instead of trying to fix that one we bought this one. Although the video resolution is better on this one, overall this monitor is definitely worse than the motorola monitor. First off, the range is not good. Even through only 2 walls sometimes it beeps that it is out of range. That is crazily short! Also, when it is not plugged in, when it runs out of battery life it does not beep to let you know, it just silently shuts off -- so unless you are constantly visually checking the monitor you have no idea it has just turned itself off. These things make it more user unfriendly than our last monitor. Other than that everything is the same.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Danielle Santacroce
Reviews.Content: I had my eye on this product for a while. I really liked the price and the fact that it does basically the same thing as the higher priced monitors. When we got it we got everything all hooked up. It might feel a little cheap, but it works great and you can totally walk outside and still see the baby.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor!
Reviews.Author: M. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor to try when I had my son, after having tried a few other video monitors through nannying jobs, and have found it to be the best as far as functionality as well as price!  Great monitor, not sure why it isn't more well-know!  Summer Infant monitors seem to be the most popular, but I've tried three or four different models and they all lack in either picture clarity, distance connectivity, or just are limited in their positioning.

Reviews.Title: Great product and price
Reviews.Author: K. Thompson "macieo"
Reviews.Content: We have been using this product for 8 weeks now and I have nothing but great things to say. It gives me the peace of mind I need to make sure my baby is safely sleeping. My only issue is that the monitor is SO bright. It took about a week for us to get used to the light. It does occasionally tell me I am out of range when I have not moved the monitor at all, but I just turn it off and back on and we are good to go. Overall I would recommend this, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Works great!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Solano
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister in law's  babyshower, but I tested it first and was very pleased to realized that the image is crystal clear.  My brother and his wife loved it!!!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, but!
Reviews.Author: JK
Reviews.Content: This is really good monitor. It has great picture quality and its night vision feature works really well. You can properly see the baby when its absolute dark in the room. I only have 2 complaints about this product-1. audio quality is not that great. It might be a plus when you want to reduce noise but sometimes it doesnt alarm you until the baby starts crying too loudly2. the monitor goes off in power saving mode when its not fully charged. There might be a setting somewhere to revert this behavior but i havent found any so far.But overall its a great product at relatively low price.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Scott S.
Reviews.Content: works well and it is easy to set up. Piture isnt the best but again it is great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Value
Reviews.Author: Marty McFly
Reviews.Content: This camera does what its touted to do, and the price is excellent.  Could it be fancier; sure, but then it would cost between $200-$300.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: the best so far
Reviews.Author: LTwin
Reviews.Content: This monitor is best! We finally have a monitor that would still work all the way in our yard. It's got nice video picture,. The battery life is OK but this is really designed to be plugged into the charger as much as possible. We have a white noise machine in the baby room so we had to adjust the distance from the camera to make sure it doesn't screw up the logic on the automute mode (cuts sound out under a certain sound volume).

Reviews.Title: A solid option for less money, but poor battery life
Reviews.Author: Eliza
Reviews.Content: Pros:-good picture for almost half the price of other monitors on the market-display only turns on when it detects noise or can be turned on manually-good night vision-camera is easy to use and the light from the camera is not obtrusiveCons:-flimsy materials - after about 2 months of use, the plastic antenna casing broke off. We've had to glue it on several times now.-you can manually turn the display on, but cannot manually turn it off. Sometimes when there is a fan on in the room, it triggers the monitor to come on and we can't turn the display back off-poor battery life - after about 11 months of use, the battery life dropped significantly. Now, after using it for 15 months, the power only stays on for about 2 minutes without being plugged in. This is by far my biggest complaint.

Reviews.Title: Not just a baby monitor.
Reviews.Author: L. Savastano
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Infant Optics DXR-5 monitor to help with care for my mother in law who has Alzheimer's disease. She has some behaviors that require me to sometimes sit in her doorway and keep an eye on her. Great amounts of time spent doing basically nothing was making me very anxious each day. Now with my little monitor I can do laundry, take the dog outside, cook dinner without wondering what she is doing in her room. The monitor is clear, reliable and small enough to be portable. The daytime picture is clear as is the night time one. It switches by itself. I don't use the audible monitor as that isn't an issue. But it does give me the eyes I need to be able to relax and get things done. I had a small issue with getting the monitor to charge, I think I was putting the battery in incorrectly, the customer service was EXCELLENT, I emailed them and they were so quick to get back to me, even double checked to make sure everything was working well.  I recommend this monitor for anyone not needing fancy features, it doesn't play lullubyes but it does the job for me and the price was excellent.

Reviews.Title: It's does everything I need it to do
Reviews.Author: Marksw
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty simple video monitor that is priced on the lower end amongst the other options. I'm still quite impressed by the good video quality and clarity for what I paid for. The range is really good and the sound is clear. It does have some flaws here and there and it's limited in the additional features (temp, battery indicator... the list goes on) but it does what I need it to do and for that I give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Night light on camera
Reviews.Author: Cherie
Reviews.Content: The night light on the camera went out after only 1 week of use.Works ok during the day but cant see anything at night.

Reviews.Title: Pros and Cons... but I'm glad I have it
Reviews.Author: angela m gagne
Reviews.Content: Pros:Inexpensive (compared to competition)Great picture offered (day and night)Light weightSound works well and I like that shuts off and on automatically as neededCons:Battery does not last long (if you charge it each night, you should be fine... I will start to do this)The night and day picture can switch over and over again at twilight (this might be due to our fan and skylight confusing the light sensors)It does interfere with Wifi (a pain when you're trying to get work done while the wee one sleeps)The camera is also light weight and can move easily which disrupts the picture (this seldom happens)So it's not a perfect monitor, which is why I likely paid less for it.  Despite the imperfections, I'm happy I bought it as it does what I wanted: it lets me check on my baby without walking into the room he's sleeping in several times an hour.  I would buy it again.  We've had it for about a month now and overall I'm pleased.

Reviews.Title: Bought this based on #1 ranking and it's a good buy!
Reviews.Author: Lin
Reviews.Content: I bought this on amazon after using our angelcare monitor died. I went through the reviews and saw that it was ranked #1 in the baby monitor category so I thought this was worth a try. I'm very happy with the purchase and will recommend this to my friends who are planning to have kids. I had some problems with turning off the VOX and called customer service and someone picked up the phone within seconds and helped walk me through.

Reviews.Title: What an amazing little product
Reviews.Author: A. Walters
Reviews.Content: After our son was born, my husband kept insisting that we should get a video monitor, and each time I said no until he ordered one for me and installed it. Oh boy, was I wrong! It helped me so much, especially in those first few months when my brain was really turned into much from all the baby cries and diapers, it was nice to put him in his crib, and still keep an eye on him while I was getting lunch or reading a book in a different room. He's almost 10 months old now and we use it every single night when he sleeps, since he's in his own room. I don't know how I'd be able to live without one now, it's by far one of the best baby-related purchases we've made, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Does the trick but not great
Reviews.Author: mwinn7
Reviews.Content: I was excited because I saw it was the most ordered baby monitor on amazon and I didn't really need all the bells and whistles the other monitors have. So it does what I need it to I can see my baby in her crib, I'm just not sure that Pro outweighs most of the cons.Pros:Night vision works wellI can see the babyI know if she is awake or not which is really all i care about if I am outside or not in earshot of her roomEasy to set upCons:The battery doesn't even last her whole nap!The sound goes in and out so if i try and sleep with it on (connected to the power) the sound will wake me up!UPDATE: Literally the day after I wrote this review the unit died and would no longer charge even when plugged in. I am hoping the replacement amazon is sending me works better. Infant Optics you get one more chance!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor overall
Reviews.Author: Jeff Butler
Reviews.Content: We just had our second child and we wanted a monitor that had good video quality that didn't cost too much. We got this monitor with an additional camera for under $170 with shipping and it's a great deal. It switches between the cameras without any lag or delay and the range is very far. Our older boy has a lot of plush toys in his crib and the night vision has no problem in seeing everything clearly although it goes into a black and white mode. The monitor does not warn you before it goes out of battery but this isn't a problem because we have the power cord plugged in unless we are moving it from room to room. Overall this is a great monitor at a great price.

Reviews.Title: I wish that the  monitor stays on all the time
Reviews.Author: Atc
Reviews.Content: Nice product for the price. My monitor couldn't keep on. I needed to keep eye on my baby and the product turned off by themself.

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor with excellent range
Reviews.Author: EJ Eric
Reviews.Content: This monitor has really worked out for my family. I had a analog sound monitor and that always cut out - and I wanted to try a digital monitor knowing that it had better range. Since I'm upgrading, I thought I should give the video feature a try although it was more money. This Infant Optics monitor is a good all-round monitor if you want good video quality and good range. The sound isn't terrific, but it's not too bad. There's a few extra features like the automute sound mode that shuts off the sound when it's 'very' quiet and it's a nice feature to have turned on while you sleep. There is a slight delay before the sound jumps back in, but I rather that and get a good nights sleep.Nice monitor for the price!

Reviews.Title: This monitor is okay
Reviews.Author: Alissa C.
Reviews.Content: this monitor works really good, it picks up the slightest noise, but after 8months it does not keep the charge. I have to keep it plugged in while using it.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Malfunction
Reviews.Content: The price was awesome for the product. Hard to figure out and lights flash for no reason. But overall it's a good product.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Roberto Cavallaro
Reviews.Content: works great I am very happy and its got great rangeit was easy to set up and its as clear at night as day

Reviews.Title: Better what we wanted
Reviews.Author: carole
Reviews.Content: We have been using traditional audio monitors since we had our first child so we wanted to upgrade to a video monitor. This seemed the best choice between cost and performance. We've had this unit for a month now and we will be keeping this monitor. We have 3 floors and the monitor maintains reception everywhere. It works really well in the dark by going into night mode itself and the video is very clear. The battery life isn't too long so we keep it plugged in most of the time. Overall this is a great budget video monitor.

Reviews.Title: we love it so much, we bought another monitor.
Reviews.Author: ZhanT
Reviews.Content: simple to use and we have it set up in our room, and our daughters room, so we dont have to move camera all over the house, simple to use and the night vision works great

Reviews.Title: Best video monitor for the price!
Reviews.Author: Mel W
Reviews.Content: We used a regular higher end baby monitor for our other kids.  It was so loud with static, no matter what channel we put it on.  For our third baby, we wanted to get a video monitor and found this one on Amazon.  I couldn't believe the great reviews and reasonable price.  We have been using it for a month and absolutely love it!  The display is so clear and the white noise eliminator feature is my favorite part.  It is completely quiet except if it detects a noise.  It's nice because when it has static/noise, I know the baby is stirring.  On day 2, this feature wasn't working right and kept switching from quiet to static the whole night.  I turned the setting off and back on and since then, have not had any issues.  I cannot imagine not having a video monitor now that we have this one.  It is so nice to be able to shut the door to our baby's room so she sleeps better, but to still see what she's doing.  My only complaint is that it's not very loud and I don't always hear the baby right away when she cries.

Reviews.Title: Great for sleep training
Reviews.Author: Cris
Reviews.Content: This helped train baby AND mommy during the night. Mom would get up at any little sound with just the baby (audio) monitor. This gave mommy the peace of mind that baby was ok and no need to go to room. LIFESAVER!!

Reviews.Title: Spy
Reviews.Author: Poe
Reviews.Content: I bought this to monitor my mother who had Alzeimers when she was bed ridden.I only used it for 16 days so I cant state how long it would last,But it really helped me when I needed it.

Reviews.Title: works well and great price
Reviews.Author: EH86
Reviews.Content: My only complaint would be that we don't use it very much because our son's crib is still in our room for multiple reasons. If I could do it over again, I'd probably save the money. But, that is obviously no fault of the product or seller. This is a great monitor and the best price we could find for one like this. Maybe we will use it more in the future when we have more kiddos!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: slosson02
Reviews.Content: I cannot say how much I love, love, love this baby monitor! It gives you the option to add more cameras. It is in color, except for night vision mode where it is in black and white. The sound comes on when my baby makes a noise. When he does I can take a peak at the monitor to see what his issue is and if I should come with bottle in hand. Super handy! I love it! My husband wants to purchase more cameras and put them in all his play areas.

Reviews.Title: Possible interference with your wifi router
Reviews.Author: MATTHEW C WONG
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor uses a 2.4GHz frequency, which shares the channel with the older wifi technology. If you have a dual brand wireless router, your newer device like an iPad may not be affected. For us, it paralyzed our laptop to almost non-usable state. We had to plug in a Ethernet cable to make it work. Besides the interference issue, it is really a great baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Very useful for keeping an eye on sick adults as well as babies
Reviews.Author: Marjorie Leonard
Reviews.Content: I use this item to keep an eye on my sick husband while he is sleeping in another room.  I no longer have to go into the room every few minutes to make sure everything is okay.  I move it from room to room with me using it on battery and plug it in when I am stationary.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor
Reviews.Author: Kaye H Rogers
Reviews.Content: I bought this to montor my spouse just before we started hospice care.  He was sleeping a lot and preferred that the bedroom door remain closed to minimize noise.  After getting his approval, I ordered this and set it up so I could hear if he called out to me, or if he needed assistance in getting out of or back into bed.  I highly recommend this as not only a baby monitor, but as an aide for monitoring the elderly.

Reviews.Title: broken
Reviews.Author: KaraokeVikki "Vic"
Reviews.Content: mine worked for like a month, and is now broken. i still gave it three stars because I got mine used through Amazon Warehouse Deals, and possibly a new one would work just fine.

Reviews.Title: Good quality with this price
Reviews.Author: Donald Lu
Reviews.Content: With 100 dollar I can see my baby day and night. The infra-red works well as expected, and the voice activating mechanism also works fine.One minor complain is the angle of the lens is not very flexible to adjust.I'm living in apartment so didn't got a chance to test signal strength though.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Gma1 "Gma1"
Reviews.Content: We use it in a 4,000 sq foot home and so far only found one room it would not transmit signal to, but setting it near the door of that room works! It's great for people who actually check on their baby a lot, I wouldn't recommend any monitor for people who think it's a substitute babysitter during the day! At night, the sound volume is fine, because everything is quiet. I think people who have a problem with the volume are talking about daytime.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor - Does the job!
Reviews.Author: jessmerc
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor for my 2nd baby thats on the way. I started using it immediatley when i received it on my 1st son to test it out and see how well it works before the new baby arrives.  I really like the monitor, the screen is clear and the night vision works great as well.  The sound is not so clear but you can definitley hear enough for its purpose.  I very satisfied with the quality and performance especially for the price! I gave it 5 stars because i feel it does everything i need it to for a video monitor and met my expectations

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price.
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: We've had it for several weeks and works well.  Picture is clear enough in light and infrared to see baby moving.  Overall, worth the price.

Reviews.Title: A few things I would have liked to know
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: I ordered this monitor when we were expecting our second kid, looking for something cheaper than the Summer monitor we have for our older daughter.  I was persuaded by everyone's enthusiasm that it was a high-quality product at a reasonable price.  The picture was pretty good, and though the handset was cheap and plastic, that didn't bother us at the price.  But we're returning it in favor of another Summer for the following reasons:-the VOX function doesn't work when you have white noise in the room.  We use the Marpac white noise machine (love it) for our daughter, and it's apparently loud enough (from the other side of a 12' room) that the monitor never goes into standby mode.  This means that the picture is illuminated all night long, which is pretty irritating when it's on  your bedside table and you're trying to sleep.-there's no way to turn the image off (at least not as far as we could tell).  Our Summer monitor has a "video on/off" button that allows you to darken the monitor at night, while still listening to the noise from the room.Wish I'd known those two things before I bought.

Reviews.Title: Does what we bought it for!
Reviews.Author: R. Juran
Reviews.Content: We have been SO HAPPY with this monitor!  I was a nanny and have experienced many other monitors.  This one is the simplest to operate and provides a great quality image for the money. The sound is a bit distorted, but I can clearly tell if my son is chatting, crying, has hit his head, thrown his paci on the floor, etc.  The video is great!  I'm not expecting HD or retina display, but whether my son's room is pitch black or the lights are on, I'm able to see him clearly.  Tonight he fell asleep on his tummy, which he rarely does, and I can clearly see that his head is turned and that nothing is obstructing his face.  I read some of the negative reviews and I am confused... we have WiFi internet and we have zero issues.  Also the monitor is simple to use and settings are simple to adjust.  We don't use the sleep mode; we just keep the brightness on the lowest setting and keep it facing the wall.  The low level of white noise we hear from keeping the monitor on is negligible.  We have had the monitor for 8 months now and it has worked perfectly for us, even though I've knocked it off my tiny night stand in my sleepy clumsiness many times.  I'm so glad we didn't spend more money on a fancy monitor with loads of features we didn't need.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: E. Binns
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately this monitor didn't come on when. Our baby cried. Luckily we discovered when I just happened to turn the screen on and our baby had just started crying. Not safe as didn't work as expected.

Reviews.Title: Better than what we expected from this brand
Reviews.Author: Vera Brickley
Reviews.Content: We wanted to stick with a wellknown brand like a summer infant or a motorola but the infant optics had good reviews and was ranked well. We wanted to try this out having the thought if we didnt like it we could send it back without losing a dime. It turns out this monitor fit our purpose and the quality is better than expected. No beeping problems or wifi issues. The night vision is amazing although the lights does give off a dim red glow.Excellent product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good Monitor
Reviews.Author: MistyH45811
Reviews.Content: It does exactly what I need it to! Great purchase! Great price too....I've had it a month with no complaints yet!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Grandma & Grandpa's House
Reviews.Author: Mrs. C
Reviews.Content: I wanted a video monitor at our house so we could check on our 15 month old granddaughter while she was asleep in her crib, but didn't want to spend a small fortune since we only need it for her weekly visits.  This monitor has been perfect for us.  It's true that the monitor is not made from heavy plastic, but don't let that discourage you.  The stand on the hand-held unit works great -- I usually set it on an end table and read while she is asleep.  I haven't noticed any WiFi interference and the sound on the unit has been fine.  One thing to note is that it doesn't have the ability to scroll up/down - right/left like the Motorola MBP36 3.5" monitor my daughter and son-in-law have at their house (the Motorola would definitely be my first choice if I were a parent).  I simply position the camera before her nap so I have a good view of her while she is sleeping.  I would recommend this monitor without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: flawless video
Reviews.Author: Anzl
Reviews.Content: This was ranked as the best seller and had alot of great reviews so we didn't have too much doubt deciding on this monitor. It has flawless video quality and everything else works just as expected. We didn't have any wifi issues with this unit.It works just fine outside in the backyard and front yard. The range is phenomenal on this unit. A great buy for the money!

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitor for parents
Reviews.Author: D.Tri
Reviews.Content: Excellent product for families that put their kids in their own room. The video is ultra clear and smooth. Sound works just as well as my audio monitor that we are planning on giving away now that we have this video monitor. We mount it from a shelf 4 feet higher than crib and it gets a good picture of our baby sleep. This would be perfect if it had a clock on the screen... but for the money this is really good already.

Reviews.Title: Fine as a grandparent's monitor
Reviews.Author: Cassandra
Reviews.Content: The Infant Optics DXR-5.2 Baby Monitor is just fine for occasional use. Setup is simple, operation is simple, both grandmother-tested. Unlike other reviewers, we have no interference with our wireless network. Battery life isn't much of an issue because we can simply plug it in.The units have a cheap, hollow plastic feel. I do wish it weren't such a cheesy color, which only adds to the overall impression that the unit is not a high-quality product. It's functional.

Reviews.Title: Great to be able to quickly check on your little one/s
Reviews.Author: Mommy Dana
Reviews.Content: I bought this to be able to keep an eye on our 2.5 yr. old twins as they transitioned from cribs to "big boy beds".  I find it very useful when I put them down for naps or nighttime sleep because if I see one of them getting out of bed, I can just say back in bed and there they go right back in bed!  The sound on this is less than stellar.  If you are looking for good sound quality this is not going to work for you.  If you are looking for something to be able to have eyes on your little one without spending too much money, I think you would be happy with this.

Reviews.Title: Great video baby monitor
Reviews.Author: KATHERINE
Reviews.Content: I wanted to wait to write a review about this video monitor and that's what I did.  I bought this product 2 years ago and after so many falls, trips and my baby playing with it, still alive!!!  This is not a fancy video monitor it is a basic one, does what suppose to do, I can see my baby (she is 21 months now) while she is napping or sleeping through the night, the monitor would turn on if she moves or make any noise.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor for 2 Story house
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: Great Monitor for 2 Story house... Works really well! The video looks with high quality and the sound is clear. No noise! the range is excellent

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Tracy Jones
Reviews.Content: This product is cheaply made. Only worked correctly three times. The sound goes in and out- extremely undependable. I would send back but do not have packaging anymore.I recently purchased a Motorola mbp33 monitor. It is awesome! Better quality. Sound is great! Picture is more clear. I can't say enough good things about the new monitor!

Reviews.Title: It does affect the internet.
Reviews.Author: Samuel Huckaby
Reviews.Content: The quality of the item is good and the image is also acceptable, but it does affect the WIFI internet.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Julie Baker
Reviews.Content: This is a very simple yet affective baby monitor. No setup required. Just place the camera in a spot you want and turn on the monitor. The picture is very good. The plastic belt hook feels a bit cheap, but I usually have it just sitting on the counter or nightstand so that doesn't bother me.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product.
Reviews.Author: Nelma Souza
Reviews.Content: We loved it. Very functional, the night vision works very well. We recommend. You will be able to monitor your baby all the time.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: nadja
Reviews.Content: We really like this product. My husband found it on amazon because of the many positive reviews. It has sound and infrared camera for a good price. It is very sensitive and light weight. One negative thing is that the charge on the monitor runs out pretty quickly, so you have to constantly charge it. Our monitor started to loose the sound at some point and the company is sending us a new one free of charge, which is a great service. Their customer service is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: DD4daddy
Reviews.Content: We've owned the motorola mbp36 model with pan tilt and a huge screen. The screen cracked after my little boy threw it off a kitchen counter and we were back in search for another monitor. Our warranty expired and we didn't want to pay another $200 for a monitor and we decided on the dxr5. First off, the monitor itself isn't as sophisticated as the motorola but at half the price this unit does nearly everything we need it to do. It doesn't pan or tilt but we don't really use that. The screen is smaller but it is sufficient to see our boy sleeping in his crib. It's also easier to adjust the brightness and volume without working your way through the menu. I have no regrets getting this cheaper monitor and it gets the job done so well. This is a great monitor if you are shopping for a bang-for-buck monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Haner
Reviews.Content: It is a perfect monitor to keep babies in control during night. Night vision is good. The range of communication between cam a monitor is aceptable.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Clydechris
Reviews.Content: This monitor is great for the price and very straight forward easy to use. I use it in my toddlers room for now and the screen shows most of her room.  I have used much more expensive monitorsAnd they always seem to have an issue.

Reviews.Title: Good Monitor / WiFi Intereference
Reviews.Author: Brian Foster
Reviews.Content: The monitor works great and it has given my wife and I some peace of mind as we transition our little guy into his own room. Only issue is that it is creating some interference on the 2.4GHz band that our WiFi uses. Unless you are using the 5GHz band you might want to consider a different monitor.

Reviews.Title: good quality and reliable
Reviews.Author: Michelle Burnside
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor when our baby reached 9 months old, and this was just a month ago. So far, we feel that we should have bought this early. Amazing quality in terms of video and sound... and been reliable with normal family-with-kids- usage. At this price, this is a value video monitor. Recommended for anyone expecting a baby soon!We got this monitor for the birth of our daughter in late September 2011 and we are still using it. In fact, we just bought a second identical monitor to use in another room with our new baby boy. Excellent quality and reliability at any price. and the reasonable cost just adds to the value. I recommended this monitor to my best friend who is currently pregnant.

Reviews.Title: A good gift choice
Reviews.Author: Gigagre
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift to my sister who just had her first child, and both mom and dad loves this monitor. I was quite worried they didn't like the color (for a baby girl) when this unit only comes in blue. They've had it for a month and it sounds like it's been very helpful for them especially sleeping at night. As with any parent would agree, safety is the important issue when it comes to children and this is a good investment.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a great price!
Reviews.Author: elizabeth
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Using it to spy on dogs and cats until the new baby arrives in July 2013!  Wonderful product, easy to use, great value!

Reviews.Title: Horrible Item
Reviews.Author: its me
Reviews.Content: My mother in law bought this item for us as a baby gift. I had to return the first through the systems horrible customers service center. Just to get another that did not work. Ok. so here goes the spill. The first one the battery went out with in two months. and the second one you can not unplug from the charger. So you get what you pay for.Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Debra
Reviews.Content: We bought this to replace the audio monitor that we bought when our daughter was born, she is now 2. It has great picture for day and night. I like the feature that mutes the sound after so long because our daughter sleeps with a sound machine. It turns sound back on if she makes noise. The same thing for the picture, it goes off to save power if no noise is detected after so long. This is nice if you like to sleep in the dark because the monitor gives off a lot of light. The only reason I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 is because we do miss the ability to talk through the monitor and to see the temperature in her room from our old set. Aside from that we love our new Video Baby monitor with night vision.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: shari
Reviews.Content: This monitor exceeded my expecation from a budget baby monitor. It doesn't have the biggest screen, prettiest design, or most features in one unit. but at half the price of other monitors out there, this is the best deal. the video clarity is amazing at night!

Reviews.Title: Video viewer broke within 2 weeks!
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: I bought this and was super excited! The screen was great. Two weeks after purchase I woke up one morning and the screen was split and I couldn't view anything anymore! I didn't drop it, nothing. One minute it worked and the next it didn't. I am super disappointed!!

Reviews.Title: Bad problem
Reviews.Author: Ralph Frank Henn
Reviews.Content: We have used 5 or so different monitors over the years and all have been fine variations.  This one is not.  It would intermittently lose signal in the middle of the night and start alarming!  It did this regardless of position or distance.  Sleep deprived parents can not afford to be awoken by faulty monitor.

Reviews.Title: Reliable, low cost video monitor. Works great.
Reviews.Author: Heidi Rice
Reviews.Content: This video baby monitor works great. The moment I took it out of the box I thought it felt too cheap for it to work well. The plastic is light weight but the monitor works perfectly at night and helps transition the baby from our room to her own room/crib. I would highly recommend for the price and functionality.

Reviews.Title: Low budget but worth a look
Reviews.Author: artayd2
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for our newborn daughter's room.
