The price is one of the lowest I've seen for such a capable product and while there are some shortcomings -- it performs well within acceptable ranges.A few things I wish the monitor had:1) A talk button2) A sturdier kickstand mechanic3) The ability to recover from a power outage without manually turning it on4) A video feed that didn't appear always washed out no matter the lightning conditionsDespite the above features I'd like, the monitor was significantly cheaper than most video monitoring systems, worked within the range we required in our home and has thus far been reliable.

Reviews.Title: power supply is low quality
Reviews.Author: Denis Chvanov
Reviews.Content: the quality of camera and monitor are according to the price. Good picture, but too noisy microphone (not very clean voice). Working area (distance from camera to monitor meets indicated in product description. Problem -- one of AC/DC power supplies does not  work. it was short circuit inside the power block (in my country we use 220V, 50Hz). Possibly in 110V/60Hz it would be work without any problems.

Reviews.Title: Best from the 3 we've owned
Reviews.Author: mommaKathy
Reviews.Content: We are on our 3rd child now and we've had 2 summer infant monitors before we bought the infant optics. This one is the best in terms of: video, sound, range, interference-free, and size. The plastic they use is not at all great but I can manage with this having to pay only $100 with shipping.This monitor is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Patty Fehr
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor! It is so superior to our last monitor. It goes completely silent after about a minute of no noise so that you can't even hear static. That is a great feature since I use this mostly at night for my infant. The picture is always clear - even on the night vision setting. I haven't tested the battery life off the charger too much yet to comment on that but everything else has been awesome! Definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: It's like its purpose is to interfere with your internet connection
Reviews.Author: Desiree'
Reviews.Content: We got this monitor because it was on mega sale and we thought the idea of being able to see the baby was fantastic.  Be warned, you cannot use the internet while this monitor is on.  It's like you get two hours of free time while the baby sleeps, but can't quietly surf the net for entertainment.  I'm actually writing this while my baby is asleep and had to turn the monitor off to post.

Reviews.Title: Audio NOT ACCEPTABLE! DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Loves SNOW
Reviews.Content: The price was good but the audio was SO weak that it would NOT wake a parent in deep sleep. It was breaking up each time he cried & became mute. That defeats the purpose of a monitor! The wires were very cheap & thin. Please this is important for your baby's safety.  After much research, we went to Babys R Us & bought their private label monitor (559FDE96UPC/EAN/ISBN:717851270055). It was $209 in store price going on sale for $199. but we needed it right away.  It is made by Summer Infant Privacy. SO much better in quality, video, sound and performance. We decided our baby is definitely worth the sacrifice of the extra $100.00 for his safety!! And it has MUCH better quality of sound & picture & privacy. So worth it. LOVE the Babys R Us monitor.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Karen Wilding
Reviews.Content: This is baby number 4 for us and I was sick of our old loud crackly monitor. My husband talked me into spending a little more to get a video monitor. So glad we did. It's so nice to be able to see and hear the baby. So far works great.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Leavitt "tal27"
Reviews.Content: Glad we found this little device.it works just as we had hoped. The setup was easy and it's fun to peak in on our little baby from time to time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: Shelly
Reviews.Content: This monitor has excellent picture quality and really good night vision. We should have got this sooner. We were hesitant on getting a video monitor since it quite expensive. But this is worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Love this monitor
Reviews.Author: Jane Austen "Jane A."
Reviews.Content: I had a audio monitor only before and this is SO much better.  I does exactly what I need it to do, let me check on my baby with out waking her up.  I also love the reasonable price.  Very easy to set up and us, it does not make extra static noise like my other monitor.

Reviews.Title: Wi-fi interference and Low battery life
Reviews.Author: Syna Kuriakose
Reviews.Content: It interferes with the wi-fi in the house so we can't use the internet and the monitor at the same time.  It is the receiver that emmits some signal.  The battery life is also not great so it needs to be plugged in all the time.  Besides that, it is a nice product and very handy.

Reviews.Title: Does the job well
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Likes:Image and sound. It is great quality!Multiple cameras optionDislikes:Mount. I want the flexibility to take it to different rooms so the wall mount is useless to me. I can't just put it next to her bed because of the cable, and also, the stand moves if not screwed. It would be nice if it could run on batteries and if it could be clipped to the bed. I have had to get creative.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase on amazon again
Reviews.Author: profL
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor for what it is. The image is clear and it's always within reception around our 2100ft 2-level apartment. The charges holds around 3-4 hours so we bought an extra power adapter along with our purchase and that became very useful.- excellent audio and video- does not slow down our wifi- simple to use with big buttons for you press- night vision gives a clear picture of the room, but with the objects in the center brighter than the sides (center focused IR lights)- very portable and convenient to carry around. not bulky or heavy.CONS:- the antenna sticks out all the time and there's no way in sliding it away like the other monitors- when you turn the unit on, it makes a loud 'welcome' tone- battery performance isn't exactly great!

Reviews.Title: Bab monitor
Reviews.Author: Rosana
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor it is good but sometimes it is not capture all sounds from the baby.It should capture the minimum noises.

Reviews.Title: best video monitor for money
Reviews.Author: AmyR
Reviews.Content: We don't have much to complain about when it comes to this monitor after living with it for 3 months. The image is very clear and smooth, no picture 'freezing' that we experienced with our summer infant monitor we bought 4 years ago. It has independent controls for the volume and brightness so it's nice and easy to turn the brightness down when you stumbling for the monitor in the middle of your sleep. The audio is loud and clear as well, range is excellent, and no WIFI interference... and that basically ticks all my boxes! The best monitor for the money as everyone says.

Reviews.Title: The battery doesn't lart an hour
Reviews.Author: Julio Sá
Reviews.Content: With one week o use the battery doesn't last an hour.Com uma semana de uso a bateria do monitor não está durando nem uma hora.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Robert Beeman
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor works very well and requires almost zero set up. It is also one of the least expensive baby monitors out there. We have been using it for the past couple of months, and it has met all of my expectations for it. It is very portable and we always bring it along when we are visiting friends and family in case its time for baby to rest.I did run into two issues with it:* My camera came out of the box completely out of focus. I thought it was broken, but after some online research I realized that the little black lens can be rotated to manually focus the camera. Once I did that, it has continued to have a nice sharp picture.* This camera, like other 2.4GHz devices, cripples my home wifi network. Luckily, most of my wifi devices run at 5GHz now so it isn't an issue on them, but I still have two 2.4GHz only devices that perform very poorly while the camera is operating.

Reviews.Title: Lost signal frequently felt cheap
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: First it doesn't feel sturdy. I took a chance because of the good reviews. It lost signal frequently. I tried adjusting the WiFi as required but it just didn't work for me.

Reviews.Title: Does as advertised
Reviews.Author: L. Pierce
Reviews.Content: This product gives us what we want= a peace of mind. We were both too worried to put our kids in their own rooms to sleep, thinking we wouldn't get to them in time if an accident happened. With this unit, we get to constantly see our kids (I have 2 camera units) without them ever noticing... or until when they grow older. It's extremely easy to setup compared to the IP camera we had before. This however does not let you watch the video if you are away from home.

Reviews.Title: Monitor works pretty well, but horrible battery
Reviews.Author: KR "Tall Guy"
Reviews.Content: The image quality is impressive when there is very low lighting, which is a plus.  The microphone isn't very long range so you will want to place the camera fairly close to the baby.  The only thing I wish it came with is a clip to put it on the side of whatever the baby sleeps in. I am pretty happy with this product.I am updating this to mention that the battery life on the monitor is TERRIBLE, and the company confirmed that the battery is "not designed for long probability use".  After fully charging the battery, you'll get two or three uses of a couple of hours before it needs to be charged again.

Reviews.Title: 12 month review
Reviews.Author: darkbat
Reviews.Content: We bought this a year ago based as the best selling baby monitor and no surprise it still is. Affordable and works well. We've dropped it too many times to count and it still works perfectly fine.Despite worrying about internet interference from this machine, we did not experience any problems.

Reviews.Title: Horrible audio
Reviews.Author: Sean B.
Reviews.Content: I saw the price for this monitor and decided to give it a try. After trying out the monitor for a week, I had to send it back. The video of the monitor is very good as other reviewers mentioned. However, the audio is horrible. With the volume turned all the way up, you could barely hear baby. If you had another audio monitor in the room like Angel Care, then this monitor would be fine. But then you're spending $100 for video and $60 for audio. It is better to spend the money on a good monitor from BuyBuy baby or Babies-R-Us with a 20% off coupon. I tried a Motorola monitor from Babies-R-Us and am very happy with it. By the way, Babies-R-Us accepts competitors coupons and I had to use one as theirs excludes Motorola but BuyBuy Baby doesn't. If you don't care about audio, then this monitor is for you. But, if you want to hear your baby, then I suggest you look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Simple & reliable
Reviews.Author: Josiestar
Reviews.Content: What a nice equipment to have at home! It's much easier now checking on our two baby girls without needing to having someone looking out for them all the time. This really makes life easy to do my own stuff while keeping an eye on them. This is a great deal for a unit that has everything you really need as a parent. We researched quite a bit before deciding on this and we concluded that we wanted something that just worked - minus the extra features and functions that you pay more for.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: George E. Geders "ggrrman"
Reviews.Content: Useful in many places to keep an eye on the little one, or even as a security watch if needed.  Clear picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price
Reviews.Author: cbosley
Reviews.Content: I read the product reviews on a lot of different video monitors and some of the more expensive ones didn't have reviews as good as this one! The price was perfect so I decided to take a chance and I was not disappointed! It was incredibly easy to set up, literally you just plug it in. The camera is very easy to adjust and easy to see with the lights on or off. The plastic feels cheap but that does not take away from its performance. Very happy with this monitor and I would recommend it to anyone**UPDATE** 3 months after purchasing this product, my 3 year old dropped the monitor and broke the antennae. The signal became really weak and the sound no longer worked. I was really upset because my baby was brand new, I really needed it!! I emailed the company (thinking, like most companies, it would go into some unknown folder somewhere and never get a response) I was very surprised to get an answer right away! From an actual person! She gave me the info to send back the broken until and my new one will be here with less than a week since I mailed the broken one. Very happy with this monitor and the wonderful company that sells it!

Reviews.Title: Best monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: Mama2two
Reviews.Content: We have two little ones and have had three monitors between them over the past couple years. This one is hands down the best product for the price. Zero white noise, relays sound and picture well, affordable price. When we received the product one of the cables did not work. I emailed customer service of the manufacturer. I received a response within a hour or two. They were super helpful and sent a new cable pronto. Excellent customer service, really stood by their product and ensured my happiness. I highly recommend the product and the company. Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: ElyShi
Reviews.Content: We have had this camera and monitor for 6 months and are very pleased with this product. They are both incredibly easy to use. The picture and sound quality are great. Also, it has useful features, like white noise elimination. The sound turns off until the baby makes an audible noise. This is wonderful because it means that you don't have to listen to the constant hum of the monitor. (If the volume is turned up all the way and your baby is peacefully sleeping there is a slight hum of background noise without this feature enabled.)The set is very portable. We have packed them up and used them while staying with family.Additionally, we are beyond satifisfied with the customer service. We recently had the antenna break and the company has promised to replace the unit in 4-5 business days, no questions asked. (We are within the one year warranty.)Thank you very much for a simple, quality product.

Reviews.Title: Bought this as a gift, they love it.
Reviews.Author: twd
Reviews.Content: For a great price I bought this item as a gift for my brother. They love it. Thanks for the great product.

Reviews.Title: Good budget baby monitor
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: Pro:It was easy to setup and pair the monitor with the camera.Clear image for both day & night vision.Con:It interferes with my wifi at home.One of the power adaptor was faulty after a few days.

Reviews.Title: She loves it!
Reviews.Author: msdependable
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my sister in law. Though there are much more sophisticated baby camera's and monitors out there, this one does the job and for a very reasonable price. The image is black and white, and clear. She situated the camera on the corner of the crib so it looks over the baby. The sound quality is good. However, the best feature about this camera would be the night sensor. The monitor offers the option to turn be turned off, and then automatically turned on upon movement from the baby. This way, you are not kept up all night by the glow of the monitor as you sleep. Overall, she is happy with the camera and I am happy that she is happy.

Reviews.Title: good product and was reasonable
Reviews.Author: cin
Reviews.Content: I bought this baby monitor for my son and his wife and their new son.  They use it all the time. the first one quit but Amazon backed up their products and exchanged it right away. very happy!

Reviews.Title: Buy this one!
Reviews.Author: Angela Tito
Reviews.Content: New moms... Take it from me! This is the nicest and most used thing that I bought!  Don't waste your money on these overpriced models. This is all you need! Trust me!

Reviews.Title: Love it but....
Reviews.Author: amanda kiefer
Reviews.Content: I have used this for a few months now. I love that it doesn't make noise until it picks up sound. It was easy to set up and the camera can adjust up and down and side to side to be able to face it to the crib. The brightness is a con but it goes with having a video monitor. So I put it face down in my bedroom and only look at it at night when it makes sound. The only real con is that it interferes with my wifi. I can't use my iPhone on wifi in bed with it on the nightstand next to me. I finish what I am doing on wifi and turn it back on for the night.

Reviews.Title: Does the job!
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: We needed a monitor to see our son and hear him- this is perfect and we have no complaints.. Worth it.. Our Summer one SUCKED!

Reviews.Title: <3 this
Reviews.Author: Jarrod Lee Elliott
Reviews.Content: very nice, works great, no problems at all! the camera gets hot if left on but that all i noticed

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: T.K. "ella's mom"
Reviews.Content: I read several reviews before I purchased this and saw that others had trouble with the monitor dying, but the price was right so I decided to take a chance. I've noticed that on occasion the monitor wouldn't charge, and I had to reset the battery. Once it was in properly, no more charging problems. Last week the camera stopped working (have used it for 6 months), just called the company directly since the return period is over. They are sending a replacement, initially quoted me a week to receive it but once I asked they agreed to send it out via 2 day express delivery. Hopefully this solves my problem, otherwise no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor, Great Service
Reviews.Author: Daddy
Reviews.Content: I've never taken the time to write a review on Amazon until my recent experience with Infant Optics.First lets talk about the monitor.  It works, and works well.  It is easy to set up, is in color during the day and has night vision for night.  It's not exactly HD but who cares. It's easy enough for us to see if our little one is standing or lying, the difference between if she will fall back asleep or if we need to go comfort her.  It is also very durable as it has been dropped and dragged around and keeps on ticking. As a negative it does affect our wireless speed, but if we really need the speed then we just turn the monitor off until we go to bed and everything is fine.  Overall, 5/5Nor for the customer service review.  We bought this in July, 2012.  Last week the monitor quit charging so I checked and it has a 1 year warranty.  I emailed them about the problem and they quickly responded with some helpful tips to determine if it was the monitor or the charger.  After it was determined it was the charger, I informed them via email again.  They again responded very quickly (within 30 minutes) and sent me a new one with simply the order info from Amazon and no fuss or need to send back the old one.  Now thats customer service.  5/5I looked at other monitors and I simply don't think there is a better value than this.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: aler
Reviews.Content: used this only 5 days so give a indepth review but so far it's been working great. The sound is loud and clear and the video is better than what we expected. the night vision is by far the best i've seen so far and we do not have a problem viewing our baby at night with the camera position around 8 feet away from the crib mounted on a shelf

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, but interferes with wifi
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I've had the monitor for almost a year now, and it works great!  I even bought a 2nd add on camera to see my girls entire room, not just her crib.  That being said, I want to warn you that this may interfer with your wifi.  We have Verizon FIOS and couldn't figure out for the longest time why our phones and ipad would not get a good wifi connection all the time.  We now know its this monitor.  It's very frustrating because I'm not going to quite using the monitor.  Just thought buyers should be aware.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit
Reviews.Author: Paul G Robinson
Reviews.Content: We purchased this baby monitor after doing some research and so far have been very pleased with it.  It took some playing with it to get the right settings but after that it works as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: A.J.
Reviews.Content: No idea why anyone would need anything pricier than this, it works so well! Great picture, great sound, easy to use...so happy to have this! Also, I swear the little red lights on the camera are hypnotic for baby...I'll see him staring right at it, eyelids wide, and then slowly fluttering shut. Awesome.

Reviews.Title: Great price for video monitor
Reviews.Author: Holger Mertens
Reviews.Content: This is one of the most affordable video monitors out there that has good reviews, and that's pretty much the reason why I bought this. This is a great monitor, but it does not have remote pan & tilt control. The video and sound quality is superb plus the range is really good. I never found a spot where I didn't get reception in our house. No wifi intereference as complained by some users. The auto mute function (can be switched on & off) is a good idea where it cuts out all the sound when it drops below a certain threshold. the best $100 spent on our baby so far.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE!
Reviews.Author: Mom3
Reviews.Content: This monitor is def not worth the $100 I paid for it! I bought it to be able to watch my daughter to make sure shes not having seizers as she has focialized seizers (only in her right arm) due to having 2 strokes.Theres no way to zoom in or move the camera with the part you take with youThe picture isnt good (its so pixilated)...you cant tell if the baby is moving or if its the pixles moving which happens all the timeThe battery doesnt last more than a day and then it doesnt charge when plugged in so once you unplug it, it turns offThe volume goes in and out. There have been numerous times that shes crying but the monitor doesnt make a soundIt looses signal constantly which I dont understand because shes in the next room! Im so tired of it beeping at me because it has no signal and then trying to get it to work again.Once I have the money, Im throwing this one away and buying a better one! I bought this so I could go to bed and still be able to see her without having her in bed with me. Well I get no sleep because Im constantly up looking at her as this stupid thing doesnt work very well.Dont waste your money.

Reviews.Title: stress reliever
Reviews.Author: Aileen Armbruster
Reviews.Content: It's so nice to be able to see my mother, not baby, when she's in bed.  She suffers from Dementia and it's nice to be able to bring the monitor with me wherever I go in the house.

Reviews.Title: a MUST for your nursery!
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: This monitor is great, especially its ability to give such a clear picture when the room is pitch black! It gives me such peace of mind...definitely recommended to other parents to be!

Reviews.Title: BEEP!!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen "kmw"
Reviews.Content: The only problem I had is it frequently loses connection during the night and then it beeps loudly so you can be alerted to his. I use it to monitor my mother who lives with us. Husband it not happy to hear that beep go off loudly when he's trying to sleep. It's fine for daytime use when the noise wouldn't be an issues.

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: Sean Kent
Reviews.Content: Feels cheap but it works quite well. battery charge for handheld monitor only good for about 3 or 3.5 hrs.but it does the job.

Reviews.Title: peaceful assurance
Reviews.Author: S. Roemer
Reviews.Content: i got this for my niece, who is a new Mother. she had a monitor that was supposed to be high quality, it wasnt... she loves this monitor

Reviews.Title: The best in town!
Reviews.Author: Chinekwu Jideani
Reviews.Content: Cost effective!!! easy to use and one of the best quality i have seen in a while.  When any item has 3 of these listed feature, its worth the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Completely worth it.
Reviews.Author: Garret Stembridge
Reviews.Content: If you are the stressing type like me, this monitor is worth every penny. It has great sound and picture--both day and night. It took me a little while to figure out the camera can be moved forward of the back so you can adjust it to the best angle, but we love it. The reason I only gave 4 stars is because the monitor is pretty bright, even when turned all the way down and it does occasionally lose signal and beep. Every time that has happened though (and it has only been a few times) I just turn it off and turn it back on and that always fixes it. It has been great and really put my mind at ease!

Reviews.Title: Durable/Easy to use Baby Monitor!  Great Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Kristin
Reviews.Content: I rarely write reviews for products, but had to write one for this baby monitor.  I use this monitor every day/night and I am able to see a clear picture of my baby day or night!  It is also a extremely durable monitor!  Mine has been dropped on the floor countless times and it is still working as good as new!  It is also very easy to transport and setup if I am travelling with my child.  In addition, the customer service is great for Infant Optics.  I had an issue with my power cord and i was immediately sent a replacement under the 1 year warranty.  I would highly recommend this monitor and you cannot beat the price!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Joao Grassi
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend who is having a baby this month. When I first saw it working, I was very impressed. The image quality is close to perfect, the sound everything and even works VERY WELL at night! I totally recommend this for parents who like to take a look on their babies and keep doing other things. You won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: Ears where I cant be
Reviews.Author: Michael Gunzel
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my daughter for my second Grandson and she is extremely pleased with the low level of noise it can pick up and the distance the monitors can be from each other.SHE LOVES IT!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Carmen Zavarce
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT COVERAGE, GOOD IMAGE, NO INTERFERENCE, GOOD CHOICE  THE ONLY PROBLEM IS THAT THE SOUND IS NOT VERY LOUD... BYE

Reviews.Title: Can't turn back to audio monitors
Reviews.Author: CarbBurn
Reviews.Content: We've been using an audio monitor for 3 years and the day the power cord fried, we went hunting for a replacement. We were looking at the budget of $70 for another audio monitor and we came across this Infant Optics video monitor that wasn't much more expensive. Now using this for a few weeks, I could not imagine myself going back. The video gives lets us see our baby rather than just hear her. The video and audio is great on this monitor and we keep it turned on literally 24hours non-stop throughout the night. I would also advise those who do buy this to switch the night vision off during the day so that it doesn't go into black and white mode forcing into color (day) mode. I think the auto night vision is a bit too sensitive for where we position the camera in the room.

Reviews.Title: Broke after 2 days
Reviews.Author: Peashy
Reviews.Content: When this first arrived it seemed great for the price.  Easy to get going, an the picture quality wasn't bad.  After trying to use it for the second time the next day, the picture quality was terrible to where I couldn't make out anything on the screen.  Returned it the following day for a refund.  I wouldn't recommend this product...you get what you pay for and this isn't worth $99, maybe more like $20...

Reviews.Title: Best value hands down!
Reviews.Author: npace19
Reviews.Content: Great product for price!No regrets.Love how clear the screen is during night vision mode!SUCH a great value.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: CC
Reviews.Content: We're very happy with these cameras.  They no longer make the beeping noise I read about in the reviews.  We ordered another camera for downstairs.

Reviews.Title: Great looking
Reviews.Author: Sanbama
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my grand daughter. to keep an eye on her new baby.  She says it works great.

Reviews.Title: Works good for the price!
Reviews.Author: Molly H
Reviews.Content: We have a movement monitor as well, but wanted a video monitor so we could see our son, so we opted for this because of the low price. It works good!Cons: Every so often we have to reset it because it says it is "out of range" (when we haven't taken it anywhere different in our house than usual). The camera part is not wireless, so you do have to mount it somewhere where the cord is safely away from baby. The cord is black, which isn't attractive running across the wall of the nursery. Also, you do need to charge it daily if you use it a few times for naps and then overnight. We use the VOX mode, but it still doesn't last more than a day. No problem - I keep the charging cord next to my bed at night so we can leave it charging when we're asleep and it will work throughout the day and evening until then.Pros: The price. Also, the picture is good. The night camera works just fine, and the picture in light during the day is fine too! The sound is good. I like having all of the volume options. Sometimes we leave the volume off, but the VOX still works and the screen lights when there is noise coming from his room. We haven't had any trouble with using our white noise machine - it doesn't seem to effect VOX mode or keep it on.

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitor
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: The reciever has  a great picture, the camera works really well and can be placed virtually on anything.  The mic works well but the volume could be louder.  Otherwise an excellent system for the price.

Reviews.Title: Probably the best value for money
Reviews.Author: Tsubaki Sanjuro
Reviews.Content: Using it for more than a year already. Easy to operate. Well adjusted noise alarm sensor level. Very good night vision image quality. Just ordered another one.

Reviews.Title: great range and video quality
Reviews.Author: Jeanne  R
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my niece for a baby gift and she said it has the longest range than any other she has had. She clips it on her belt and has quick access to it.  She loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: maggie pafford
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor for the price.  It has a nice color screen with night vision.  The sound quality is good and the range is even further than I thought.

Reviews.Title: Customer service
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were unhappy with the monitor in certain areas and after contacting customer service we were able to have our concerns addressed appropriately.  Because of their prompt and appropriate service, I am satisfied although the product was not exactly what I had wanted.

Reviews.Title: Works fine, but feels real cheap
Reviews.Author: s_marr
Reviews.Content: This monitor works just fine, but feels real cheap. It's really light weight and has a cheap plastic feel. The battery on the monitor runs out quickly and the camera is not easily mounted. You can either lay it near the baby or you have to screw it into the wall. I would not recommend this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Greaty product
Reviews.Author: ulysses Augusto Magalhaes Dantas Itapicuru
Reviews.Content: I recomend the purchase because the item is like shown in website and its a great quality item, but the camera dont have any grip that allow to fix it in some places around the berth. You allways need a flat surface to set it.The entire equipment is so great, the image is sweet and i recomend this item.

Reviews.Title: Great monitors!
Reviews.Author: Bruce A. Halverson "loves the bass"
Reviews.Content: These monitors are so good that after purchasing one set, we immediately bought another. The screen on the parental unit is large enough to see clearly yet small enough to carry around. I highly recommend these.

Reviews.Title: Bought this based on #1 ranking in baby monitor category
Reviews.Author: Ingo and Jacky
Reviews.Content: I felt brave and went ahead with a brand that I haven't heard of. But based on the good reviews and the #1 ranking I thought it was a safe buy. I must say this is a great monitor that has no interference problems or range issues in our 2000sqft appartment. We have a thick wall that shields the line of communication between the monitor and camera but it works fine. The battery life is a bit on the short side but if you leave the power cord plugged in you don't have to worry about battery life. no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Leonard Sundaram
Reviews.Content: An affordable monitor that does what a parents needs it to do. It gives a live situation feed of what is happening, works day and night without disturbing the baby, and does not cost a fortune. This cuts the deal and I'm very happy I bought this camera.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Odiseas Papadimitriou
Reviews.Content: Not only it interferes with my wifi and I followed all the troubleshooting steps but the battery stopped recharging after 5 months! Stay away!

Reviews.Title: Baby monitor
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: This is a great product with just some features missing that you would expect from a pricier monitor. It has the basic functions of IR night vision, VOX and white noise removal, but it does not have a temp gauge or remote controlled camera direction. It's just a hundred buvks so I can't complain much when the everything else is so good. The resolution can give you defined images of what the camera sees without squinting your eyes to identify objects in the screen as I've done in the past with older black/white monitors. I'm hoping that they could come up with a newer model that comes in a different color so it'll fit better in my daughter's room

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: David N. Yeager "Limeade97"
Reviews.Content: I wish it had a sleep button on so I could still hear but the display would sleep. Like it.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with monitor
Reviews.Author: ilan
Reviews.Content: We are a parent of two and we really needed a monitor to help us keep a watch on our kids. We had limited budget so we decided to give this DXR a try with the option of 30-day return. So far we are very pleased with this baby monitor. This isn't a high quality item but the performance is better than more expensive models I've seen and played around with in stores. We have two seperate cameras that link to this monitor and both camera give very clear indication of how my kids are doing day & night. It was a nice budget monitor $160 for 2 cameras and free shipping.... This one is a keeper!

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Kassi Carroll
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for this for a while and everywhere. I looked it was too pricey .... Very good price for the quality!,

Reviews.Title: Wifi interference has rendered this thing useless, VOX doesn't work properly
Reviews.Author: bopeep
Reviews.Content: I will say upfront that the picture on the monitor is fine for the money we spent on the monitor. It doesn't pan or zoom but I knew that going in to buying it. My problems thus far:1) VOX and Auto Mute don't really work. It comes on and off when the "sound" in the room hasn't changed. We run low-decibel white noise that other monitors do not pick up. This monitor picks it up off and on, causing the monitor to turn on (and me to wake up!) when nothing is happening in the room.2) Wifi interference. This is a major problem. My phone cannot connect to Wifi when the monitor is on and it causes my computer to drop the Wifi signal over and over again. It hogs the 2.4 ghz bandwidth. We've had to resort to putting an audio monitor in the room for "daytime" so we can actually use our electronics before we go to bed (you know, the only time we have time to do this since we have a baby...). We then turn the monitor on after we get in bed and we have no need for Wifi. It's such a problem that I'm considering just donating the thing to Goodwill.I would not purchase this item again and I would not recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Grainy image, night vision default
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty frustrated with this monitor. I can appreciate the value of it - you DO see and hear your baby. The range seems good - my son was in our living room and we were out in our driveway and it worked just fine. My main issues are the grainy picture and the automatic night vision adjustments. My camera, unless it is super bright in the room (or we're outside but who puts their baby to bed outside), thinks it's night time and I get a black and white grainy picture of him with scary night vision eyes. Lol. Like I said, I CAN see him so that's nice but I was expecting the clarity in the pictures in the description and in neither day nor night mode do I get anything close! The sound is also a bit fuzzy - the monitor emits (or the camera picks up) a static like white noise. I could hear him fussing/crying but when he's silent the monitor is not.For those skimming reviews:1) Camera thinks it's night time unless the room is very bright so you get IR image a lot of the time2) Day and night images are grainy at best, nothing like the advertisement pics3) Static noise comes out of monitor even when room is silent4) NO ZOOM so to get a close up of your baby's face like in the advertisement image your camera would have to be IN the crib with him!I think I will be returning this one. While it's a steal at $100 (the amazon sale price) that's still 100 bucks that could perhaps be put toward a better monitor for maybe just a little bit more money.Hope this helps!UPDATE 07/09/13 -- From 3 stars to 2! I held on to the monitor thinking it was working well enough for my needs and not wanting to spend more money. Bad idea! Turns out on a full charge, I can watch my son with the monitor only for up to two naps (about 2 hours total) before I have to charge it again! It just doesn't hold a charge and it's a real pain in the butt!Also, I have realized the importance of the zoom feature that the higher quality monitors have. The company's image in their ad showing the baby's face isnt attainable unless your camera is right next to the crib, in the perfect spot (there's no pan/tilt either) which is tough with a short power cord. I don't know about you, but I'm trying to keep cords and electronics AWAY from his crib. So ultimately, the best I ever get is a black and white (night vision) image of a baby in his crib - I can see whether he is stirring or not but I can't really see his face clearly.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Marnie
Reviews.Content: I found a better option at TJ Maxx, so I ended up returning this.  Ours now can rotate, and still only cost $99.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR5
Reviews.Author: W Burstein
Reviews.Content: If you set your expectations right for this monitor, you will love it. It's not the best video monitor you can get, but it is the best in it's price range. We were looking for a sound monitor and realized that the price difference wasn't too big. We spent an extra $40 to get the video option as well and I can say it was really worth it. It gives you alot more information than just hearing your baby. The video and audio is stunning on this camera and the range is excellent. We never had a problem with wifi interference although it seemed that all 2.4ghz video monitors had this potential problem. Overall I love this thing and I've already recommended this to my sister who is delivering next month.

Reviews.Title: In the top tier
Reviews.Author: BabyDaddy
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't consider this model in the ultimate category, but it is close. The picture can get a tad fuzzy at night, but still offers a good quality line of sight to your child.One feature that I like is the ability to put the camera into a "sleep" state without shutting it off. When the camera detects noise, it alerts you and the screen comes back on. Very convienent for nighttime.

Reviews.Title: Great Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Antonietta McGoey
Reviews.Content: Got this on sale & it works great! I keep it next to me at night so I feel like baby is still in the room.

Reviews.Title: Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: I. Sutter
Reviews.Content: Works good the only complaint I have is the screen is so small but I knew that when I purchased it. It works good in the dark I was surprised how good it is in the dark. I would reccomend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Let's me sleep in peace
Reviews.Author: Rosa
Reviews.Content: This monitor was easy to setup and easy to use. It's extremely straight forward without the complex buttons and menus that you have to navigate to get things done.It's simple quick and convenient... perfect for lazy moms!

Reviews.Title: Not dependable; not user friendly
Reviews.Author: veronajuliet "veronajuliet"
Reviews.Content: We have two of these monitors for our twins. The first one lost video functionality within the first three months (while they were in the same crib) and we essentially used it as a sound monitor. Once we started sleep training, we really needed a video monitor. Luckily the second one worked so we could watch one child on the monitor.In addition to that, the user interface is poorly designed and not intuitive. You need to keep the user manual handy so you know which two buttons to press at the same time to change functionality. I wish I had gotten the higher end motorola monitors.

Reviews.Title: Great video monitor
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an affordable baby monitor with video, I found this and couldn't be happier. Device works as expected, I have not a single complaint about it. Video adds that extra piece of mind and this monitor does it with ease

Reviews.Title: Decent Option for the Price
Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: I think a video monitor is the new baby necessity, especially if you live in a big old house like we do and you can't hear a thing (they used to insulate houses well!!).  This, is our second.  The first was only replaced because the cat chewed the antennae on the monitor and it stopped working.  The antennae on this is the same so....keep it away from kitty if they like to chew.Our first was a more expensive monitor, and when I bought this, I just assumed the prices had adjusted as more vidoe monitors hit the market (our last one was over 2 years old).  Unfortunately, my assumption was not correct, there are a few things that I really miss about the old monitor.  First, this monitor is not loud enough.  My husband is reading to my son in his room right now, and I can barely tell what book they're reading.  The volume is all the way up.  What I REALLY miss though, is being able to control the video camera with the monitor.  My son must have bumped his dresser when he was playing earlier, and now I need to go upstairs and adjust the camera.  Not a big deal right now, but it would be if I didn't notice it until he was asleep.I do like that it seems easy to add an additional monitor, as we are expecting and we will be needing to add another soon.The picture is clear enough, it was easy to set up without even needing the directions.  Its not the fanciest monitor out there, but for the price, I would recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: sometimes it loses reception, not sure why. Have used it for several months now and no improvement as far as the reception goes.

Reviews.Title: Best $100 spent on our son so far
Reviews.Author: LazyPP
Reviews.Content: This monitor has been useful for us to watch our 1 yr old in the day and while he sleeps. He would wake up and cry for us and we would attend to him within seconds. The camera is clear and video is smooth. The audio is also very good. I was looking for something that had two way talk so we could talk back to him when he grows a little older but we were convinced that this was the best monitor in our budget although it didn't have the talk back feature.The quality isn't the best, but we've dropped it several times and it has been working fine!

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the price, BUT it disabled my household wireless network.
Reviews.Author: Rean Al Happiness
Reviews.Content: For the price, it's not a bad product. The screen quality is decent, but the plastic build quality is definitely a bit cheap feeling. The audio quality is very bad, but most people buy this for the video feature. If it didn't kill my wifi I'd give it 3.5 stars.Household wifi:I use an Apple Airport Express. Whenever I would turn the baby monitors on, my household wifi would stop working, and I would need to restart the router/modem after turning off the baby monitors to get them working again. There apparently are a lot of other people who have had a similar experience. Sent it back.I just bought a Dropcam (arrived today) and it is a very nice product and joins the existing wifi network without causing interference.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor!
Reviews.Author: Brad92
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor has served us well for the last 4 months. The video is not HD but it is very clear in both day and night. The automute function has been useful for us since my wife is a light sleeper and the monitor automatically cuts out all the static noises once the sound level goes below a certain threshold.I had problems with wifi interference but I followed the steps to change my router to channel 1 (from auto) and now everything works perfectly fine.The camera unit is very light and we got it mounted on our wall with a 3M sticker. It was a easy set-up for us!

Reviews.Title: It helps with a minimum
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor for my 7 months baby and i used it for about only ten times cause: 1- the antenna of the screen has broken from an easy use, i was very surprised. 2- i couldn't find any spare part for it. 3- the voice was very unclear even before the break of the antenna . 4- the distance is about 1 meter also before the break( can you imagine how bad it is after the break!!)

Reviews.Title: Decent but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Stacey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor for my three year old who just underwent a major surgery. Monitoring his sleep position is essential so we went for this simple, lower cost option. It works fine. The picture is grainy in the dark but I figured it would be. I have to sneak in his room occasionally to check his position if the picture is not super clear but it's better than the alternative which would be sleeping in his room. The sound is sporadic which doesn't matter much to me since we already have a talk-back audio monitor but I could see how this would be frustrating for some. The positioning arm is just ok. It doesn't move very far so you have to do a lot of positioning to get the angle right. It does have hooks so that the unit can be hung on the wall- this is convenient. The construction of both camera and monitor is fairly flimsy plastic- I can't see this lasting for the long haul. We only need it for six months so it's not a huge concern for us. For the price, I think it will be fine. We've been using it for a week and it seems ok. I give this product a hearty "meh".

Reviews.Title: this monitor children exceeded all our expectations, we use daily, day and night, and is perfect as the quality and design.
Reviews.Author: Sandro
Reviews.Content: this monitor children exceeded all our expectations, we use daily, day and night, and is perfect as the quality and design.

Reviews.Title: Like this monitor
Reviews.Author: Ayello
Reviews.Content: It is a small and portable monitor that works as advertised. 5 stars goes to excellent video quality - no pixelated grains or jerky video. Price is attractive being 30% cheaper than similar spec models.Never experienced it going out of signal, even when we take the monitor to our basement.Worked perfectly for the last 3 months. A good buy

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: PotTL
Reviews.Content: This is surely worth the money you pay for. There's no interference to our home internet, and there's no static in the audio or video. There's independant controls for the contrast and and volume on the side so you don't have to fumble trying to turn the volume up in the middle of the night. The VOX mode is a too sensitive for us so we the VOX off to keep the screen always on. Batteries is not an issue since it can be plugged in the whole night. I think that for $100, you can't ask for anything more.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: lilyandlogansmom
Reviews.Content: We love this monitor! It has  helped me feel so much better about moving our 8 week old son to his bedroom upstairs! He was such a noisy sleeper I was having trouble sleeping and I was worried I would still hear him move and make noises through the monitor. However, the auto mute mode has been a blessing! The monitor automatically shuts off the sound after 10 seconds of no sound so there is no static. Then it only turns the sound back on if it gets up to 65 decibels or louder. The video is great as well! It is nice to be able to look at the screen and see if the baby is sleeping or not b/c sometimes he just lays there awake without crying. I would highly recommend this product! FYI when you put the battery in make sure to put it in at an angle. We couldn't get the battery to charge until I contacted customer service (who responded the same day). They said that putting the battery in at an angle should fix the problem and it did! We love it!

Reviews.Title: I love it.Thanks
Reviews.Author: Marilyn
Reviews.Content: It's very easy to use. I feel that I can see my baby while she is slepping and dont have to worry about it.Thanks

Reviews.Title: A good baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Shaun Snyder
Reviews.Content: We bought this to replace our vtech audio monitor that kept losing power in the middle of the night. This had good reviews and was priced within our budget. I'm very impressed by how the DXR5 is only $100 yet the quality is very good. The video is smooth and clear, no interference to our wifi, has a decent battery life... and the list goes on. It lacks the pan and tilt feature and a whole bunch of other features you would get from a $200 monitor, but for the money you are paying for this, this is a steal.

Reviews.Title: Great while it lasted..
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: I really liked this product when I first got it. I've had it for 5 months now. Last night, it just stopped holding a charge. It still works while plugged it, but it's annoying none the less.Also, the voice activation feature has been really finicky from the beginning. I was able to work around it and figure it out, but it's annoying to have to deal with that as well. I am bummed that it stopped working, because I really liked it until this point.

Reviews.Title: Basic, affordable and simple
Reviews.Author: Mallory
Reviews.Content: Excellent video resolution in all lighting conditions. The basic and simple operation makes it easy for grandma and pa to use the monitor too. There is a seperate volume button and it's alot easier to use than our motorola that broke down where you had to go into the menus just to turn the volume up/down (although the motorola has a bigger screen). It would be nice if this unit had a battery indicator but that's ok since we have 2 power cords and keep the handset plugged in most of the time unless we are moving it from one location to another.A excellent monitor for just $100.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price, not good for multiple cameras
Reviews.Author: Amber Goelz
Reviews.Content: Cheap plastic material, grainy video.If you have 2 cameras it will not scan between cameras, making it useless if you use the camera at night, since you can only hear one child at a time. You have to push a button to view different rooms.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price and ratings
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I went strictly by ratings and reviews.  I like it, but I just wished they put another led on the monitor showing current battery level.  I was sleeping in a different room and the charge in the hand held powered the monitor off once the battery was low.  No low battery warning.

Reviews.Title: Great product and fantastic customer service
Reviews.Author: Jessica Wang
Reviews.Content: This is a great product that operates as advertised.  We have used it every night for months and it has held up well.  At one point, the camera arm broke and the company was responsive to email and replaced the product without charge.  I definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: kelly
Reviews.Content: The picture is good. The color during daytime is egh. The night vision is decent. Sound is so so. One problem is the battery drains quickly.

Reviews.Title: Interference with home wireless network
Reviews.Author: Sarah K Marek
Reviews.Content: Our wireless network was severely impaired when the monitor receiver was turned on. Turned off (with cameras still on), the network functioned normally. It was annoying to have to turn the monitor on to use it every time so as not to interrupt our PC or AppleTV devices, and rendered the voice activation useless.When the monitor was on it functioned pretty well. I had two cameras connected to the system but had to cycle through four cameras (2 empty spots) to see the first camera again. Slightly annoying.The rest of the features, voice activation, toggling infrared on and off, and the basic design of the system, were good.I will be returning this item as it is not functioning with our home wireless.

Reviews.Title: Okay, but missing some necessities
Reviews.Author: Matt Morrison
Reviews.Content: The price and reviews of this camera hooked me.  I've had it for about a year now, and I'm probably going to get a different brand soon.  This one just isn't up to snuff.Pros:  Price, obviously.  Good picture and night vision.  Easy setup.  Small and fairly inconspicuous.  Decent battery life.Cons:  Very cheaply constructed.  I've had to superglue parts (particularly the antenna) back on several times.  The screen cover pops off at the slightest bump.  The first time I ordered this monitor, the antenna and screen cover came off, so I returned it, thinking it was defective or damaged.  When the new one arrived, the antenna snapped off AGAIN, so apparently that's just the way it is.There aren't any lights on the monitor to indicate when your children are making noise.  So the only way to know if they're making noise is to keep the volume on.  But even the lowest volume setting is too loud.  I find myself constantly turning the volume off, then back on a few minutes later to see if my child has fallen asleep.  Once my child is asleep, I need to remember to have the volume turned on, otherwise I won't know when she wakes up.There isn't a warning beep when the batteries get low.  The monitor just goes dead.  Several times I've realized that I can hear one of my children crying upstairs, and glance at the monitor, only to see that it's turned itself off.  AARGH -- how long has the child been up?!I need to purchase more cameras now that we've had twins.  But instead of further committing myself to the Infant Optics monitor, I think I'll cut  my losses and go with a different brand.

Reviews.Title: it's a winner
Reviews.Author: Patricia V. Goetz "IRON4FOOT"
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my daughter as a gift, and she loves it. She was worried about having her baby in another room, but now she and the baby can get the rest they need without waking each other up. It's good for outings, too. You can be a few yards away and still keep an eye on your baby, and it does work in the dark! :)

Reviews.Title: Great for the price, some concerns
Reviews.Author: S. Hampel
Reviews.Content: I read reviews and new this was not the perfect monitor, but we have really thought it works great.  Yes, it is a little quiet if you are working in the back yard or in another room, but overall, the sound level is not a huge problem.  We get great reception all over our multi-level house and in the yards.  Only concern is that sometime when in VOX mode (goes to sleep until noise is detected at significant level) it does not turn on.  This is not good when you wake up to your baby screaming in the middle of the night because it did not kick in.  Has only happened a few times and am trying to contact company about it, so will repost if anything changes.  Otherwise picture is great, love that it goes to sleep when there is no noise, don't get a beep when it does that like others have reported, and I actually like that she will wake up and stare at the lights because sometimes that helps her get back to sleep when she is really not quite ready to get up.

Reviews.Title: Great Video Monitor
Reviews.Author: Darren Hibbs
Reviews.Content: It works as advertised. The audio feature that mutes the sound (fuzz) when the noise is below a certain threshold is wonderful. No listening to fuzzy white noise all night long when baby is not crying. That way, when baby is crying, you can't miss it. The video works great, too. And for the price, I'm pretty impressed with the battery life (2-4 hours between charge).

Reviews.Title: Love, love it.
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Its really a great monitor. I have no complaints about it. I've used it for one baby already, I'm putting it away for the next. I am one satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Super!
Reviews.Author: Celso Giannini
Reviews.Content: As I need!Perfect! I do recommend. Just in time. Works perfectly. Well packed. Good price. Met my expectations. BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price... a tad fragile... but good customer service
Reviews.Author: JMC
Reviews.Content: We have had this monitor for 7 months and have really enjoyed it. For the price it is legit and does what it needs to. We could have purchased a $200-$300 monitor, but we live in a small house and can hear our baby even without the monitor (once she gets really worked up)and we aren't made of cash (thus we shop on Amazon). The monitor is great for peace of mind and does everything we would want. We have the same complaints as many people 1) The monitor interferes with our wireless internet router (supposedly we can update the firmware on our modem) 2) The fan in the room with the baby (creating white noise) keeps the monitor from going into hibernate and thus keeps the monitor on all night (I just cover it up with a sock :)) 3) The clip is not super strong etc.However with all the "downsides" mentioned above the monitor is GREAT and I would definitely recommend to friends on a budget. If you are rolling in the dough and are upset that you "wasted" $100 bucks on a monitor that was not up to your standard then go ahead and spend double, but quit complaining and leaving poor reviews for buying a budget monitor and expecting a deluxe machine. I read reviews about the battery life being terrible and that it won't last through the night, but I have not had a problem with the monitor lasting through the night due to the monitor actually coming with an AC PLUG!!! Sadly my nights are pretty unadventurous and I usually do not find myself wandering from room to room at night so plugging in my monitor when I got to bed seems pretty uhhhh easy. The battery life throughout the day is usually perfect. It almost always makes it through the day during her naps. Oh did I mention I turn the monitor off when I am not using it and just leave the cameras plugged in... another great battery saving technique.One thing I was a little bummed about was that after much much use/abuse over a 7 month span our receiving unit started acting finicky so we contacted Infant Optics about a replacement. They ask you to just pack up the monitor and ship it back (seven buckeroos at the post office). Upon providing proof of shipping (a picture of the box with their address on it) they ship a monitor to you. They say it takes 2-3 days for the replacement to arrive, but just know that it takes more like a week to get to you. Maybe if your monitor is finicky just send in a picture of the monitor, wait a few days, and then drop it off at the post office to minimize time without a partially working unit. All in all their customer service was AMAZING. They handled our return with much professionalism and we have a brand new working monitor set up in her room again.I would buy this unit again (even though it was a gift from our registry). As usual on all Amazon items, avoid reading the 5 stars reviews and avoid reading the 1 star reviews and focus on the middle to make your decision. We are still super happy with out budget monitor.

Reviews.Title: Just bought our second cam
Reviews.Author: Gerda Rosen
Reviews.Content: I've bought the extra camera last month and now have a 2 camera system running in our house. We really love this monitor. It's been working without any problems since July last year, and it's been through some appalling abuse from our two kids! The range is excellent and there's no interference with our internet/wifi which shares the same 2.4ghz bandwidth. This is a highly recommended camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great for 6 months, then...
Reviews.Author: Bree Holz
Reviews.Content: This monitor worked great for the first 6 months. Then it slowly started deteriorating. The signal lights would beep all the time (baby in the next room), it would lock up, and now the end all be all, it only works when plugged in. As soon as you unplug it, it powers off and won't power back on until plugged in again. And that's fully charged. Spend a little more for something nicer-not this product!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor!  I tried a couple other monitors and they all had loud static noise ALL night long.  This one has an auto-mute feature that works after 3 seconds of no noise (this saved my sanity at night!).  The others have a delay of minutes or not at all.  This one isn't as fancy...no zoom and pan, made of plastic, etc., but its wonderful for the price and I even like it better than the $200-$300 dollar monitors that we tried.  A lot of reviews said the material seems cheap and while I agree, it's held up to numerous falls and I haven't had a single problem with it in the 6 months we've been using it.  Would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: A baby monitor at good price
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: Great monitor! I have this placed 5 feet away from the crib and the video quality is amazing both in bright and in dark environments. A good buy for the price.Pros:- video quality - no blur or lag- portable - the handset is very light and convenient to strap on your waistbelt- range - picks up even a few hundred feet away in our backyard- VOX mode - shuts itself off to save battery and reactivates automatically when it picks up sound- priceCons:- No temperature sensor- the camera set needs to plugged in - there is no portable power option

Reviews.Title: Does exactly what it was meant to.
Reviews.Author: Kristie Ray
Reviews.Content: Plastic feels like a child's toy but other than that its great! Love waking up in the middle of the night and being able to see my baby without disturbing him.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy, made in china junk
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: This monitor sucks. Sound is tinnie. Feels cheaply made. You can't turn the video on and off at will. Junk

Reviews.Title: Very useful~
Reviews.Author: TRACY L
Reviews.Content: I have been using this for almost one month, i like it very much.The package is very simple but it works really well!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Shelley
Reviews.Content: For the price it is awesome! My grandson was coming to visit and it is easy to use and work great.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Dallin
Reviews.Content: We used to wake our daughter up by going into her room when we heard strange sounds or just to check on her. Not anymore! This is awesome- we can sit on the couch and see exactly what's happening. Infrared works great. Very clear. We all sleep better.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service Call: Fast and Big Help!
Reviews.Author: Marti Jones
Reviews.Content: We had no experience with a video monitor prior to this but I'm really happy with the product.I can see my baby clearly and i'm able to distinguish sounds.We have used this everyday for 40 days.I was going to wait longer before I wrote my review but I have something mentionable alreadyI was upstairs baking today when a warning message came up on the screen and then turned everything black.I turned the monitor off, then on, and happened again a few minutes later. This went on maybe five times. The warning text went so fast I couldn't read what it was saying.So I went to the website.The customer service number was big and bold on the website and someone picked up within the minute :)The person helping me, did! Whoa.There is a sneaky setting I accidentally had hit that turns the video blank and silent if there is no movement within 3 minutes :)Yeah, I'm a new parent I don't have time to read manuals.

Reviews.Title: Easy and simple
Reviews.Author: Liss
Reviews.Content: This is a easy to operate monitor that seems to made for mothers that are technically-challenged! It's got a few buttons that control volume, power, contrast, etc. and I learnt all the functions in a few minutes of using this monitor. I think this is worth 5 stars for the video and audio quality for a monitor in this price range. I could not have asked anything more in a video monitor for only $100!

Reviews.Title: Dont waste the money!!!!
Reviews.Author: Janssen R. Eilenberger "rayssen05"
Reviews.Content: I was super excited to find a video monitior for this price but now i know the reason!!!! it started out great although the other reviews are true no matter how much light u have the video usually goes to black and white! however thats not the bad part after using it less than a month the things monitor has already broken!!! even only paying a hundred bucks it lasting jsut a month is a complete rip off!! spend the extra money and get one that will work

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!
Reviews.Author: Sabrina "teacher_musician"
Reviews.Content: Product was a worthwhile and reasonable investment.  I love the night vision!  This monitor is a great tool to reassure any parent/guardian of their little one's well-being.  I'm a new mom and we are so glad we have Infant Optics for our little one!

Reviews.Title: looking for something a little better
Reviews.Author: K. Hepworth "Family fun pack"
Reviews.Content: after reading great reviews for this camera, we purchased it to "spy" on our 3 yr old twins and see which one was the instigator in their bed time antics.  The instructions clearly state not to place the camera cord anywhere within 3 feet of the baby's bed.  Well when the camera HAS to be plugged into the wall, this is not the easiest task.  Most wall plugs are found near ground level, not ceiling level.  This is my main complaint about this camera.  I like that you can completely turn off the sound, but on our next camera I plan to find a bit bigger screen and one that has the communication feature.  I have found that if I sit in the hallway and speak loudly my twins listen to me since I know when they're out of bed, so being able to not "yell" for them to hear me will be nice.Another slight con is the screen size.  I have to pick up the monitor and get a close look to actually see what's going on in the room (and i'm not old!).I have not heard any beeping noise that others mention, but I did notice that the battery on the parent unit doesn't last very long and there's no "low battery" warning.  The screen just turns off, which alarmed me at first because I thought one of my twins had unplugged their unit from the wall.

Reviews.Title: VERY NICE
Reviews.Author: Lacey
Reviews.Content: Although our daughter will not be here until September 2013 , my hubby and I played with this when we got it in the mail yesterday.  IT WAS VERY CLEAR , night vision works great and the sound is good to.  This product was shipped in a timely manner and WE LOVE IT !

Reviews.Title: Great purchase, though problems with power cord
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Brandon
Reviews.Content: I have been using this monitor for about a week and am pleased with it. It was easy to set up and gives a clear picture. I have had no signal problems in our smallish house, and it worked even in our backyard. The power-saving mode (where the video turns off if there is no noise for a few minutes) is nice because the light from the screen doesn't keep me up if the baby is just sleeping, but it turns on if he wakes up and I can push a button to check on him any time as well. I read a review that said there was a beep when the monitor went into power-saving mode, but mine doesn't beep. The video just turns off after a few minutes of quiet.My only issue is that the battery (even fully charged) does not last all night (9 pm to 6 am), even in the power-saving mode. We don't have an outlet near enough to our bed to have the monitor plugged in and in view all night. And if you are asleep, you can't see the light that is supposed to flash when the battery gets low. But this is a minor complaint since I can still hear when baby wakes up if the monitor is plugged in across the room. You just have to know that it needs to be plugged in after several hours.I purchased it in an open box from the Amazon Warehouse, so it was a great price and I am pleased with the quality as well.UPDATE Nov. 2013: I am still happy with this monitor overall, but I have noticed the power-saving (VOX) mode is kind of inconsistent. Sometimes the noise of a car driving by the other side of the house turns it back on, but my child crying does not. So I would advise NOT using the VOX mode if you are not within earshot of your child. Your child's cries may not wake the monitor up from power-saving mode.UPDATE April 2014: The charger for the parent unit has failed, the insulation on the cord separated and exposed the copper right where it meets the end you plug into the wall. I am not sure exactly when it happened. In the last couple of weeks, I had trouble getting it to charge, but I rarely unplug the charger from the wall, so I didn't notice until yesterday that there was damage to the cord. I emailed Infant Optics, and even though I was a week past the 1 year warranty period, they are replacing the power cord for free. So while I am disappointed that the cord only lasted a year, I am very impressed with their customer service.

Reviews.Title: battery is dead after 2 month of use...
Reviews.Author: Qiaolin Huang
Reviews.Content: battery is dead after 2 month of use...now it is not portable. It will cost me 25 dollarstoget a newbattery

Reviews.Title: Very pleased so far
Reviews.Author: Natalie Rendon
Reviews.Content: I bought the Motorola first. It fell off the wall and never worked again. Not wanting to spend another $200+ - I took a chance on this one. It's as good, if not better for half the price. The camera adjusts easily to get the right angle and doesn't require mounting on a wall to do it (Motorola did, unless you had a HUGE room and could set it way back), the white noise cancelling is fantastic and the picture is good quality. The plastic is a bit cheap, but that's not my primary concern and it doesn't seem to impact the performance. Definitely recommend this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Worked fine for a year now
Reviews.Author: Cat Attia
Reviews.Content: I've had this for a year now and it has been working fine. It's a simple monitor, easy to set up, and works as advertised. It comes at a great price off amazon and you get a full video monitor with good video resolution and clarity, just what you need from a baby monitor. Very clear night vision that turns on and off automatically too!

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: This was my original post-----> "I really like this monitor, but the only complaint I have is that it interferes with my wireless internet. We can not use the internet and this monitor at the same time. It does feel somewhat cheap because of the plastic, but with this price- it is unbeatable."After using this monitor for one month, it fell off the table. The antenna instantly snapped off, and there was no way of putting it back on. We can no longer use the monitor, and we cannot send it back. The monitor is extremely cheaply made, and I thought it would be fine, that was until it dropped three feet. I would just bite the bullet, and buy a monitor worth using that is not so cheaply made. You get what you pay for, and you aren't paying for much with this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Titepants
Reviews.Content: This thing works great so far my only complaints are that battery life is not the greatest and for some reason the monitor never shuts off. It's supposed to turn off after 3 minutes of silence and turn back on when it hears a noise. (Maybe it's because my wife is a chatterbox) LOL!! It never shuts off for me and it'super annoying in a dark room at night. I've had this 9 months now. The first 5 months we lived in South America and this system never interfered with our internet connection speed. We are now back in the states and when the monitor and camera are on the internet connection speed slows to a crawl. If I shut the monitor off the internet speed gets faster and when I turn the camera off it returns to normal 20 mbps. Not sure if this is happening to anyone else. It also interferes with cel phone calls occasionally.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Pros: Durability, priceCons: the cord to plug in the monitor needs to be much longer, there's no way to "turn off" the video on the monitor for a sleep mode.  If there were the same feature for the video as for the sound (auto-off unless there is a noise) then it would be 5-star. Because the video is so bright, even on the lowest brightness setting, we have to lay the monitor on its face on a washcloth when we go to bed so the light doesn't keep us up.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera in Price Range, Cute Looking & More Than Excellent Customer Service
Reviews.Author: amit rawat
Reviews.Content: I ordered it in Yr 2012 & really loving it. I was bit skeptical as didn't want to spend more on Baby Camera & also wanted a quality one. This one fits perfect on cost & expectation. The build & picture quality is really good. I have been using it for more than an yr. Due to handling, one of the charged stopped working & camera was working only on charger (battery exhausted).I was planning to buy spare battery & charger on Amazon but they were out of stock.I contacted Manufacturer with an intention to purchase battery & charger. To my surprise, though, I was willing to pay for Charger & Battery, I was sent the replacement free of cost.Not only that but a spare battery & charger was also sent along with it.I really appreciate the excellent customer service & definitely recommend it to all. this is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: paquicofernandez
Reviews.Content: Good quality video day and night, long range reception, easy to use and affordable price, can use more than one camera

Reviews.Title: Awful- don't buy
Reviews.Author: JAFN
Reviews.Content: I've had this monitor for 3 months, with 2 cameras. It CONSTANTLY loses the signal. Last night it lost the signal in the middle of the night. I bought it because it was the most affordable option for a system with two cameras. I had a Motorola video monitor that I loved. Should've just bought another, instead of investing in this junk.

Reviews.Title: fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Nikki C.
Reviews.Content: Quality is EXCELLENT. The monitor actually is in color and the infrared night vision is PERFECT. This is the first video monitor i've seen but i really can't imagine anything better. VERY pleased so far.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: Purpleangel577
Reviews.Content: We have had this monitor for over a year, constantly on and it is wonderful! We have seen other monitors that had horrible feedback problems and this has none of that. One of the great things about it is, it sleeps when the baby is not fussing so there is not noise from it. It traveled with us on a week long road trip, and my baby plays with the reciever all the time and it has held up great. I love that I can see if she is covered up without going upstairs. At 14 months she will wake up from a nap and just look up at the camera instead of crying to be picked up.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Sandra M Bickel
Reviews.Content: As a full-time care-giver for my mother who has dementia, I needed something to check on her at night without disturbing her. This device works great for this.  I can hear if she is stirring or having a nightmare.  Also I can just roll over in bed, check the monitor and see that she is in her bed, covered up etc. Great for peace of mind, we both get a better nights rest.

Reviews.Title: No substitute for our summer infant...
Reviews.Author: Anna B
Reviews.Content: We purchased this to replace our Summer Infant monitor after its night vision stopped working. Infant optics works OK, but there are just too many little things that make it pretty annoying.- the most important of all is that the sound quality is barely ok. I have clearly seem my baby babble through the video, yet the auto mute remained on. Last night I heard her coughing through the door about 5 seconds before the monitor woke up and the sound turned on. I know 5 seconds isn't much, but it is a mild annoyance. I guess more importantly, with our old SI we could hear the baby breathing if listening hard enough. No way is that happening with the IO- the alarm noise. Wrong channel and some other inexplicable things cause the monitor to emit a loud alarm like noise. This is by no means necessary, the message on the screen is plenty to realize you're on the wrong channel. And very disruptive when it goes off at night for no reason- endless toggling of buttons. To do anything... Change channel, volume, brightness, mute, sleep mode, infrared.. You must press one or combination of several buttons. These are also not super quiet. Toggling through these, especially when your significant other is still asleep in the quiet of the night is like nails on a chalkboard. The fact that the monitor doesn't always respond on the first try just adds to the problem. Our old SI had scroll wheels for these purposes that was much easier to deal with- Cord for camera is too short.
