If you're trying to hang this on the wall, say 7 feet off the floor and your outlets are about a foot off the floor the power cord for the camera unit is too short.I'm sure I'm forgetting many other things that are making me regrets buying this monitor, but above is plenty.All in all, does the monitor work for it's intended purpose? Yes, but all the little annoyances are making both of us wish we would have gotten the same monitor as we had before.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend.
Reviews.Author: Clint Andersen
Reviews.Content: Very useful and very reliable.  We have had zero issues at this point and it works great.  Night vision is a great feature.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR-5 2.4 GHz Digital Video Baby Monitor with Night Vision
Reviews.Author: Mike Platel
Reviews.Content: it is an excellent product It really met what  I was hoping to get, I really love  it  thankyou did not get disappointed

Reviews.Title: Get What You Pay For
Reviews.Author: K. Cobb
Reviews.Content: Wow, I am amazed by all the good reviews. This monitor well, you get what you pay for. The original price of $300 is a joke. For real. It feels very cheap. It lasted maybe 6 months? The camera stopped working. Even my super tech hubby can't figure it out. This thing is going in the garbage.If you still decide to get this, the monitor is very bright at night. I had to sleep with it turned upside down on the nightstand. Invest in a better quality one. Lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Chipmakertech
Reviews.Content: Bought this baby monitor on ebay brand new and it is really nice. A lot of ppl saying negative about multiple cameras but I only use one so it is perfect, clear picture. I love the feature where if there is no sound the baby room the sound on the monitor is turned off and activated again if baby makes noise. Overall I'd recommend it for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor!!!!
Reviews.Author: Christie
Reviews.Content: I really like this monitor. It works great, and I hook it on my pants pocket when I'm running around the house doing things. The ONLY issue I have with this monitor is that the battery life is not that long. It will last a couple of hours off of the charger. So if I want it to last all night, it has to be on the charger or it will die in the middle of the night. Other than that, it's great and SOOOO worth the money!!!

Reviews.Title: Works great, but, Interferes with the house wireless
Reviews.Author: Yaron
Reviews.Content: It works great.We can monitor the baby night and day. In light or darkness.It is just too bad that once we start the monitor we cannot use any of the wireless connections in the house (computers, webcams, etc') - This is a major issue!!!

Reviews.Title: power cord issue
Reviews.Author: Flora L. Wang
Reviews.Content: I really liked this product until the power cord stopped working recently. I called the number listed on the company website 3 times, left a message with the people who answered and it was only after I emailed the company did I finally get a response. The woman who did email me was very helpful. She troubleshooted with me over email which is how I figured out it was the power cord that was broken. They ended up mailing me a replacement power cord and now my monitor works again.For issues-don't call, just email the company and you will save yourself some aggravation.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Marcie "Bluez"
Reviews.Content: This is our first baby monitor and we were excited to see if it was really that useful.... and it is! I can't imagine us living without this monitor. The DXR5 is one of the budget video monitors we could find, but we are glad to say the quality is still very good. We were also worried about getting a monitor that might potentially slow our home internet down, but this didn't. We have a 2.4g belkin router that we got from best buy last year. I particularly like the VOX mode and the battery can last all night if you have this switched on. This is a really good monitor if you are looking for something not too expensive.

Reviews.Title: Decent product.
Reviews.Author: Haylee McAllister
Reviews.Content: The monitor is okay.  It does it's job for the most part but looses signal a lot.  It also fell off of our small dresser and broke the antenna off.  It is not a durable product.  None the less it still works and we enjoy being able to see our baby when we are not in his room.

Reviews.Title: Really good
Reviews.Author: Kendog
Reviews.Content: Great baby monitor works great no problem with it good sound and pic overall great baby monitor I can watch the kids and still get thing done too

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Juan Martinez
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed it. Good video and sound. If you have a big room you might need or like another camera. I liked it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect if you want good video
Reviews.Author: Theo-man
Reviews.Content: I'm very glad with this monitor. Initially, I was worried at this price, it will be inferior to the other models. It turned out it had better video quality than most of the monitors I've tried and seen ( although the construction quality isn't top notch.)The viewing distance of the camera isn't very far, so we placed it near the crib whilst keeping it 3 feet away from her reaching distance. The unit also comes with a mount if you plan to view downwards, but we figured placing just above table height works fine.The range is excellent on this monitor and it does not mess up wifi signals. Overall a great monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good but bad sound
Reviews.Author: zrbuilt
Reviews.Content: Product video is good and battery is good but bad sound quality. I would not recomend if sound is important

Reviews.Title: so-so
Reviews.Author: Huckleberry
Reviews.Content: We have cameras on our house and monitor them on our phones, so we understand the concept of how these work.  Unfortunately the quality and range was a bit lacking.We bought them for when we travel, so in that environment they work fine, but I would not recommend them as your primary camera system at home.

Reviews.Title: Good choice as gift
Reviews.Author: Diane Day
Reviews.Content: I saw this monitor ranked as #1 so I purchased this for a friend's baby shower. Although it wasn't a top of the line monitor, she said this was more than enough. I saw it at her house last night and it gave a clear view of her baby sleeping even when the room had no lights. I'm glad I got something she liked at a bargain.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Timothy Zenchenko
Reviews.Content: Have been using it for a few weeks now, and nothing to complain about. Works exactly as advertised and gives us a piece of mind while the little one is sleeping in the crib.

Reviews.Title: Fragile, but very good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Vishal
Reviews.Content: For the price, this set is really good. The sound and video are excellent. The only problem with the unit is that the plastic is not high impact. I have the monitor and camera for a few months and the monitor has fallen three times. The third time it fell, the antenna housing snapped off. I glued it back together. On the plus side, the monitor kept on working. For the price, its not bad, just don't drop it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Monitor!
Reviews.Author: GoMommyGo!
Reviews.Content: I used to own an Angel Care monitor and was worried that this was not going to be as good as the Angel Care. I was amazed at the clarity. Works great in Night Vision mode and I like that it filters out background noise. I play classical music for my baby and I cannot hear it on the monitor. The sound will come on if he makes a noise though.(My only negative comment has to do with any monitor that is 2.4GHz. This monitor will interfere with Wifi. I know some of the reviews said that it did not, but it does. I was having problems with my Wifi and finally did some tests and there is a HUGE difference when the monitor is on/off. For example: If my Wifi runs at 13mbps, it will run at about 1-3mbps when the monitor is on. Just a heads up for anyone looking at monitors in general. Look it up, there are plenty of articles out there.)

Reviews.Title: Easy to take care baby
Reviews.Author: milly_lu
Reviews.Content: It's quite easy to use. No need to worry any more while my baby is sleeping... The resolution of the screen is just so so... But enough for monitoring purpose. While if any improvement could be made on this would be fantastic.

Reviews.Title: DXR-5 used for twins
Reviews.Author: vasurfn
Reviews.Content: I only have one complaint which is why this is a 4 out of 5.  The buttons used to power on the device and switch cameras (we have twins) makes a loud/sharp noise that constantly wakes up our kids if we're near them.  The buttons are plastic instead of a soft rubber or something that wouldn't be as loud upon use.  Besides the button, the product works great.

Reviews.Title: Absolute BEST DEAL out there
Reviews.Author: hpatty
Reviews.Content: This is the monitor for you if you just want the basics.  It lets you see and hear baby, even at night, and has wonderful mute and battery saving functions.  My daughter is now 14 months old and the monitor has been dropped several times and still works wonderfully.  I would say that the optics are not as good as some of the more expensive monitors, but it gets the job done.  You can clearly see and hear your baby and it has the option to add more cameras.  We are planing on buying an additional camera when our on is born in May.

Reviews.Title: Good, not great, but nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Pros:-Great night vision-Price-Easy to use-Used nightly for 7 months now, have dropped in on the tile more times than I can count and its still holding up great-Range includes most of the houseCons:-Only real problem: Does not alert you when the battery is about to die-Being picky: not enough downward tilt on camera unit  - Volume control works well, but no sensitivity control  - Video screen is very bright, even with contrast turned all the way down  - does sometimes interfere with wireless internet (but i've heard they all do)Overall: I'm sure there are fancier video monitors, but this one does the job and the price is great if you don't need all of the bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this product! I've had mine for a few months now and have had no problems with it. There isn't any spot in the house or even my yard, front or back, where it doesn't work.  I have never had a monitor like this one before. It is worth the extra money to have the video along with audio. I have it in my infants room and it picks up the sounds from my toddler in the next bedroom. I've never had a monitor be able to pick up sound from the next room when both bedroom doors are shut.

Reviews.Title: Light and portable
Reviews.Author: Key
Reviews.Content: I love how the monitor set is very light and portable. I've had a bigger unit from graco before and I'm very happy to see how technology has downsized baby monitors now. It's versatile and convenient to use. The resolution is clear and and I can see my baby turn and make little gestures at night.The connection runs through a thick concrete wall between the rooms and we've have full coverage everywhere in our flat. Never experienced any static noise or interference on our wifi.My complaint: doesn't come in any other color... maybe atleast a neutral color for both boys and girls?

Reviews.Title: Terrible Monitor
Reviews.Author: Morgan Rissel
Reviews.Content: I was impressed by the high stars and number of reviews for this monitor but it has failed us completely. The battery life is a good 30 minutes after being charged all night. Even if the battery life was good, you wouldn't be able to tell as there is no battery life indicator. The monitor range is a good 20 feet. After that it beeps loudly that its out of range. I propped the monitor up next to the door at door knob height so it would get a signal and we could get the video and no audio. We got this to use at my in-laws home after not being able to find the one we purchased and we are promptly returning it. Yuck is what I say!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price, could be better
Reviews.Author: Gregethor
Reviews.Content: We've had this for about six months and its worked great for the most part. Picture day and night is great and the automute works well. I can't say much about the feature (VOX) that turns off the video automatically as it makes my wife nervous to have the video off, so we keep it on.Functionally my only criticism is that it should beep when the battery gets low. As it is the power light just blinks and it will just shut off when it's dead and it's almost impossible to notice when automute is on and the monitor is just in your peripheral vision. It does beep when it loses a signal I just wish it did the same for when it loses battery. The battery does last a lot longer than I thought it would though.I've also been having trouble with interference with my Wi-Fi and have been trying different channels and other settings but haven't had much luck so far.

Reviews.Title: The best baby purchase to date
Reviews.Author: Yvonne
Reviews.Content: We spent thousands of dollars baby already, and this is the best $100 spent. It's a simple system that works really well. We tried a foscam internet camera (that had PTZ) but it always took a while for it to load up. You really need a dedicated device (like a spare ipad) if you are planning on the IP route. The conventional video monitor route is cheap and easy and it turned out to be what we wanted.

Reviews.Title: priced right & good video quality
Reviews.Author: Rob Bin
Reviews.Content: I got this last week and ordered another power cord as a charging point in the living room. The whole set works beautifully. The product does not have pan and tilt, but that was OK for the cheaper price of this monitor. I've had the older generation samsung and it died on us last month, so we went hunting for a new monitor. The infant optics has better video quality than the samsung although the construction quality is not as refined. For now, it has worked as promised and it'll be a keeper.Pros: video quality, range, no wifi interference, basic interface: easy on grandmom!Cons: build quality, battery life

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Hilary Morse
Reviews.Content: With bringing our first baby into the house, it was hard to not have her near. We love that this system streams clear picture and sound. There have been no problems with interference. The only issue we have had has been the occasional "network unavailable" message, but that is a router issue not a monitor issue.

Reviews.Title: Feels safer with this
Reviews.Author: C.Cassy
Reviews.Content: I believe all parents need to get a video monitor for their kids. This is an affordable monitor in the market and there's no excuse not to spend $100 for the safety of your children. The screen isn't too big, nor is it in HD, but it gives you all the cues you need to check on your baby at night. It does not intefere with our router and it has worked well for these 3 weeks. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: It was all good until I needed customer service- Don't count on the 1 year warranty
Reviews.Author: Robert B.
Reviews.Content: This is a fairly less expensive product and it worked fine. We had few incidents non-responsive monitor within last 8 months and finally few days ago the monitor completely stopped working. We have been trying to get a hold of customer service for last 3 days and so far no luck.  This means that we have no monitor to check on the baby for so far 3 days! and it is not convenient at all!

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Chad J. Goldsmith "Edgetho"
Reviews.Content: No issues.  I'm not using it at long distances but I've never lost the signal.  The rotation could be a bit better if you have a baby that moves around to different areas of the crib.  I've hit some angles I can't match.  Picture is clear, sound is good and battery life hasn't been an issue.

Reviews.Title: Great price, works great
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: This is so much cheaper than other options. I love that I can buy up to 3 other cameras to hook up to it if I want to. The picture is very clear.

Reviews.Title: I really wanted to like it...
Reviews.Author: B. C. Leclerc
Reviews.Content: I really did - it got decent reviews.  But I am returning it.  I need a camera with a pan option.  Several times during the night I had to get up and move the camera because my baby moved out of the spot the camera could watch - at which point he woke up.  Also, the audio wasn't sensitive enough to hear what I wanted it to hear.  I bought the summer infant touch instead - it only costs twice as much to go first class.

Reviews.Title: awesome video quality
Reviews.Author: Lilia Sin Srikanth
Reviews.Content: I had a couple of other video monitors I had in mind, but was best bang for buck, so we went for this. We needed 2 cameras, and we can not afford a higher grade model. We got everything for below $200 and it was good money spent. The video is awesome, very clear images and good night vision in the dark. The automute function is great too and I keep it on throughout the night to let me sleep (I can not sleep with ANY noise). I really like how I can look at my two sons the moment I open my eyes in the morning without stepping out of bed!

Reviews.Title: Not what I thought
Reviews.Author: Amy Mccarter
Reviews.Content: I ordered this monitor after our Summer monitor was accidentally broken. The model we had was discontinued and after purchasing a different Summer model and returning (did not filter out white noise) I purchased this Infant Optics monitor. Reading that it filters out white noise was the reason I purchased it, as well as the affordable price. Unfortunately it does not filter out our white noise even though we only have it turned up about half way. Because the camera picks up the white noise the monitor remains on the entire time. There is no manual standby mode. In order to keep the monitor in our room at night while we sleep I have to put a cover over the screen since it will not shut off on it's own. The camera is also very light weight and easily knocked over. I would not purchase this camera again.

Reviews.Title: Better than originally felt.
Reviews.Author: Midwest grandma (finally)
Reviews.Content: I bought a Motorola MPB 36 definitely much more expensive but it worked well although not as well as one would expect for the price.  However, keep in mind the Motorola does have lots of features/bells and whistles.  Being the new grandma I sent the Motorola home with the new parents and kept the less expensive Infants Optics.  I originally wrote a bad review of the Infant Optics but as I worked with the products placement (little difficult) I find it works better than originally thought.  I'm happy with the Infant Optics monitor especially considering the price difference.  So pleased that I could update my experience with the product.

Reviews.Title: Should have got this earlier
Reviews.Author: Gewoo
Reviews.Content: I regret that I didn't get this sooner! We waited till we had our second kid before buying a video monitor. We only had an audio monitor before and this is a big difference. The video quality is really good in day and night settings. It's got a good price. We were worried on video monitors because nearly all of the 2.4ghz monitors have customers report wifi interference. For us, our internet works perfectly when this is right next to our router.

Reviews.Title: Functions make no sense
Reviews.Author: Flora
Reviews.Content: I returned this product after one night.  I am use to Summer Infant products, so maybe that's why I hated this so much.  You can't manually turn the video off.  If there is a slight sound the video turns on.  That night there was a thunderstorm, so the entire night the video stayed on.  The audio quality is terrible.  When my daughter and husband were in there talking they sounded like the Peanuts teacher even though the camera was 2 feet away from them.  I do not recommend this product at all.

Reviews.Title: Very smooth video!
Reviews.Author: Ivan Ponimareva
Reviews.Content: Great baby monitor with very clear video that isn't jerky. Lacks a temperature gauge and two way talk which we hoped for, but we this had good reviews and was ranked #1 so we gave this a try. There's no static inteference like the summer infant monitor we had before. The range is also very good, staying in reception even when we take it to our shed in our backyard that is 200feet away. A nice monitor priced right.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Cavalcante
Reviews.Content: I am quite pleased with this camera and very happy that I decided to purchase it. One thing I don't like about it though is that on one side of the screen, the picture is more pixelated and fuzzy. I'm not sure why, but it doesn't effect the picture too much, so I can easily deal with it. The camera was also kind of hard to find a place to mount it, have it plugged in, and still see well. We figured something out and it works, but isn't ideal. Overall though, we are very happy with the camera and would recommend it to people looking for a nice video baby monitor but who don't want to pay a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: B Law
Reviews.Content: We had this monitor maybe 2 months and the sound has stopped working. After many hours playing with both the monitor and camera, I got the sound to work intermittently. Since then it has just been thrown in a box and we went and bought a better model and brand.Like many have said the plastic feels cheap, but it really held up amazingly well and the picture was decent.

Reviews.Title: everything worked all
Reviews.Author: Tinna
Reviews.Content: everything worked out fine with our order. The shipping was fast and the product is better than we thought. We haven't had any problems or complaints about it yet. This is a good one hundred dollars spent on our 6 month old baby.

Reviews.Title: great monitor, for a great price
Reviews.Author: gootypie
Reviews.Content: Monitor works great and the price is very reasonable. It has a very clear picture and the sound quality is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics Monitor
Reviews.Author: Myoop
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor does not all those features you can get from a more expensive monitor, but it has everything that I want. Most important criteria for any baby monitor that we get is range, video and audio. This does well in all these areas. It did not interefere with our wifi and 2.4ghz wireless phones.It lacks a sound bar to show visually if there is sound, but the auto-mute function helps alot on this. We set it to a pretty high volume setting and once the room goes quiet, it shuts off all the white noise and static noise making it completely quiet. Once any little noise is picked up by the camera, it makes an obvious statement that it came out of the mute mode and plays the sound is picking up.Out of all the monitors out there, I highly recommend one with full video. If you are looking for something within the $100 price range, this is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Did not work for us...research carefully
Reviews.Author: Charmina
Reviews.Content: My sister purchased this baby monitor for us about 9 months ago. I picked this one because of the price. I really don't care for the product so I don't use it as much as I thought I would.Pros+ The black & white visual is clear when it is on.+ Light weight+ Not very expensiveCons- There is only one power cord. So if you need to charge the monitor you cannot use it at the same time because the camera needs the power.  Some reviews have mentioned more than one battery source. I have not seen another one.- I have the hardest time getting the camera to come on. I have not been able to figure out what I am doing wrong.  I am a gadget person but this device is not my friend.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: carol a. venanzi
Reviews.Content: Chosen for a grandparent's house  to be used occasionally.  Perfect choice without spending a fortune.  Very satisfied  with the quality of the picture.  Would like a larger screen  but  definitely  adequate.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Patty
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor and have had nothing but trouble with it. Within the first month the first charger went out. Then a couple months later the 2nd charger went out. Still feeling happy with the video monitor we kept it and bought new chargers. Then a month later the video quality completely changed and became blurry. Now the antenna broke off and we have no reception. Attempting to return the item has been anything but easy. It is suppose to come with a 1 year warranty, but there is no where to exchange it or return it. DO NOT BUY!!!

Reviews.Title: WORKS WELL AND NOT EXPENSIVE !
Reviews.Author: QMore
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT!!!!!!!!! I  WATCH MY DAUGHTER THROUGH THIS AND IT WILL AUTOMATICALLY TURN OFF IF THERE IS NO SOUND--IT WOULD BE A DOWNSIDE FOR SOME PARENTS IF WORRIED ABOUT THE SIDS. YOU CAN CHOOSE THE VOICE ACTIVATE ON OR OFF

Reviews.Title: A great, no frills video monitor. DOES NOT BEEP WHEN GOING TO VOX
Reviews.Author: TGodkin
Reviews.Content: First of all, I want to say that the major concern of other reviewers, that the monitor beeps when going to VOX, has clearly been corrected in newer models (I bought mine in Jan 2013).  It beeps if the signal fades or if the camera is turned off when the monitor is on.As I stated in the title, this is a great no frills monitor.  It doesn't have any bells and whistles, just a video and sound monitor.  In VOX mode, the screen will turn off after a few minutes of no/low, background sound, which saves battery life and doesn't light up your bedroom at night!  Additionally, it will auto mute after about 30 sec of background sound.  The picture quality is great and the infrared lights give a nice, clear picture.  I used mine at a friends house in which the guest room was downstairs and we hung out upstairs on the other side of their average sized house and there was no interference.Overall, I am obviously very happy with this monitor.  I feel like you get a great product for only $100.  The only option/feature that I wish it had was some sort of battery indicator.  There is nothing.  So far it hasn't died on me, but it only gets used for a max of 5 hours on battery.

Reviews.Title: Works if on a budget, but wish I had bought a nicer one!!
Reviews.Author: Korttany
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to spend $225 on a video monitor with zoom, high resolution, etc. All I cared about was being able to see my kid, and for $100 I thought this monitor was worth it. My husband and I have frequently stated, "I wish we had spend that extra $125 to get a decent monitor!"Pros:-You can see your baby, and it is a totally decent view. Never had a problem.-It does have the auto voice and screen turn on, but this turns out to be a con for most people.-Works totally well. No glitching, blackness, etc.If you are on a SUPER tight budget, I would say you should get this for the video monitor. Keep in mind that you will probably have to modify in order to not be driven INSANE! We currently have cotton balls and tape over the speaker, and keep a sock over the screen for the light.Cons:-The volume control is TERRIBLE!! The lowest volume you can put it on is way too loud! I can hear my fridge humming, birds chirping outside, etc. on the lowest volume. Hence the cotton balls muffling the speakers.-There is no way to have the screen off and audio on. That's right. All night long you get to have the screen lighting up your room. Unless you turn it onto the VOX auto shut off setting, but that becomes a problem addressed below. This is why we keep a sock over the screen.-There is a way to keep the screen on, and the audio off unless a noise is made over a certain decibel. There will be silence, then lets say the heater turns on, or your baby makes a coo in their sleep, the audio turns on and due to the loud volume, you hear loud static for however many seconds until it turns back off. This happens day and night, and can sometimes disrupt your sleep with it turning on and off making the auto function almost useless. I'd rather just have the constant static as to not be disrupted.-There is also a setting that mutes the audio and shuts off the screen until sound is made. This would work too, if you couldn't HEAR the screen powering on and off. Kind of like the sound some tv's would make powering up. This woke me up CONSTANTLY. Especially with the screen turning on and off at any little noise.-It interferes with my wifi on the ipad. I can't watch netflix in bed (where we keep the monitor) without it constantly freezing up or not loading. Once I turn monitor off, then netflix plays.-It will randomly beep and say "out of signal coverage!!!" Your monitor wont work, and will continue to beep until you turn it off and on again. This happens at 4am sometimes, when the monitor hasn't been moved all night! Totally random.-Battery life is bad off the charger. It can last a few hours and that's it.As I have said, if you are on a budget, this will work. But you will find yourself annoyed by it constantly. However, if you apply a little tape and a sock it is livable... =]  We are definitely buying a better monitor for the extra money!

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor!
Reviews.Author: B. Jensen
Reviews.Content: Love this little monitor!  It has a great picture, and picks up any noises my baby makes even with the sound machine I have running in her room.  It gives me great peace of mind to be able to watch her as she sleeps.  It is very easy to use, the camera positions well, and the different modes are great options.  The sound is a bit tinny, but honestly I sort of like it.  I think that tinniness helps to wake me up even if the volume is on the lowest setting.  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: no annoying beeps but interferes with wifi
Reviews.Author: B "Bu808"
Reviews.Content: For the price, works great.  There are no zoom or rotating functions but the view is wide enough to see an infant in a crib.  Have heard comments that it makes an annoying beep when it goes to sleep in its energy saving mode, I have only experienced this when it is not plugged into AC adaptor (when running on batteries), no issues when on AC adaptor.  Only beep I get is if it loses its signal (which has only happened 2 times in 3 months).  When put on energy saving mode, it is still quite sensitive because when my baby moves making ruffling sounds it will turn on.  Not 5 stars because it interferes with my cisco-linksys WRT54GL signal.  So if I want to read my ipad in bed, I turn the camera on (so I don't have to walk back to baby's bedroom) but do not turn on the portable monitor until ready to sleep (just turning on camera did not interfere with my wifi).

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor, especially for the price.
Reviews.Author: ap
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound are clear.  I do wish I could make the screen darker.  It stays on all the time, which I like, but in the middle of the night the screen is very bright even turned down to the darkest setting.The volume turns off until sound is detected.  I like that it doesn't pick up the sheets rustling and my baby moving around, but comes on immediately if she is crying or talking to herself.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: MDG
Reviews.Content: We only had a sound monitor for our first child, but video monitors have gotten a lot cheaper so we decided to give this a try.  Picked this model based on the strong reviews and great price relative to other options and we haven't been disappointed.  The picture quality is fantastic with the lights on or off and the signal is really strong (stronger than our WiF signal).  My only critique is that I wished the camera could bend forward.  It can bend side-to-side and tip backwards with no issue, but can't tip forward beyond a right angle.  We have it on a dresser that's above our crib, so I've had to prop up the back side of it to get it to angle down.

Reviews.Title: we love it.
Reviews.Author: BTC
Reviews.Content: It's good product and good price. we satisfied 90%.but sometimes signal is not good. We live 970sf apartment so it's not that far though.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy With Monitor and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Christopher DuCasse
Reviews.Content: Everything with the monitor works great. I don't think we get a lot of interference with wi-fi, but sometimes the network is a bit slow when the monitor is on.  It's not a huge deal because we don't rely on internet access for heavy downloads.  We get occasional screen flickers when it's on during the night, but that seems to be normal for most baby monitors.Recently the monitor would not power on, which has never happened before.  we took out the battery and unplugged the unit.  We inspected the battery and it had exploded.  Thankfully it has a good seal around the battery and none of the chemicals leaked into the unit.  We immediately ordered a replacement battery from Amazon.com but also emailed Infant Optics.  We provided them with the information we had about the purchase of the unit and the roundabout time of purchase (since it was a gift).  Their response was very timely, which was received the next morning.A few days later, we received 2 replacement batteries.  Both of these batteries seem to work great.  Thank you Infant Optics.  We will be buying another camera to go with our monitor soon!

Reviews.Title: great monitor for the price!
Reviews.Author: ashley hall
Reviews.Content: looked at reviews forever trying to decide which monitor to buy. I wanted a basic video monitor, didn't need it to sing to my baby or make ocean noises, I just wanted to see what my baby was doing. This  monitor does just that. if u are looking for just a basic video monitor this is great for the price. No need to spend more money then what u need to. This is a great product, happy I bought it and didn't spend the extra money on a more expensive one that does just the same thing.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised, other problems that has been reported is because instructions are not being read or followed.
Reviews.Author: Pedro Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Works like a charm. Someone reported that it stopped turning off, well, if you press "+" on the brightness side and volume side at the same time you deactivate the VOX function which makes the device turn off when there is no sound. You can easily toggle this by just "grabbibg" the monitor unit. But if you pay enough attention you should have no problem at all!  Range is REALLY good, and I live on a fairly big home. Will give it 4 stars because the product feels cheap in your hand, it feels that it will break very easily. But other than that, excelent product, just treat it VERY carefully.

Reviews.Title: We LOVE this monitor!
Reviews.Author: Angela Zurba
Reviews.Content: This monitor does exactly what we needed it to do and is MUCH cheaper than others on the market. We have it near our son's bed so we can check on him during the night (or nap times) without disturbing his sleep. Other than the screen being really bright during the night, we have no complaints. I keep it turned on all night, though, so I can take a look in on him any time I need to. And, if he cries, we can easily hear him with the adjustable volume. We are very pleased with this monitor. :)

Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: Michele K.
Reviews.Content: Cheap plastic and a fair picture quality but I shouldn't expect much for $99. I am thrilled to have an inexpensive video monitor but am not impressed with the quality. I do love the feature that blocks the static and white noise coming from the baby's room and the sound only turns on when my baby makes a noise.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal, Great Monitor
Reviews.Author: jhon
Reviews.Content: I had two concerns when purchasing this baby monitor. I was worried that the rather bright night light in my daughter's room would obscure the ability of the night vision monitor, and I was also worried that the price was lowered because they had found this to be an inferior product. Neither of these has been a problem. I did notice the "cheap plastic feeling"

Reviews.Title: Not very impressed
Reviews.Author: Rubens Mulla
Reviews.Content: I expected more from this product. All you get is basic video and audio. Video quality is not great, low resolution. Audio is OK. I also don't find the buttons for brightness and volume conveniently located, you can easily press them by mistake when grabbing the monitor. The plastic material doesn't feel like great quality either. It is OK for basic use but not worth $100.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Alec J. Diaz Rojas MUN304259
Reviews.Content: is a good product, gives a good picture and sound quality, but the viewing angle is a bit poor, it is necessary to place the camera in a strategic site To reach an good video footage.

Reviews.Title: Okay while it lasted....
Reviews.Author: Parent
Reviews.Content: We have had our monitor for about a year. It worked for what we wanted - affordable monitor, able to support 2 cameras.  However, one camera has developed a short in its wiring of some sorts and keeps blacking out on us and not transmitting audio.  Then, the monitor's plug is shorting out - if you oh so delicately jiggle the cord so that it will come on and then try not to touch it, then it will work -- and the battery will not hold any charge whatsoever so it is leashed to the counter.  Very disappointing and I think not worth what we paid for it for how long it lasted us.  Conclusion- cheaply produced.  Now trying to decide if we want to shell out the money for yet another monitor!  Shop around a little more would be my rec.

Reviews.Title: Would buy this again a heartbeat.
Reviews.Author: FuzzyBuddy'sDad
Reviews.Content: We were hesitant about this monitor, given how inexpensive it was, but we couldn't be happier with it.  It's true that it feels somewhat toy-like and a bit flimsy, but the picture quality and maneuverability of the camera more than make up for that.  Don't drop it down a flight of stairs and you should be good.  The clip / stand on the back of the monitor is not particularly sturdy, but it will stay in place as you long you're not sliding it around a table or try and give it a push.  We bought this monitor for our son's room after having a Levana Babyview for our daughter's room, and the difference in image quality is AMAZING.  It's like comparing an old tube TV to a new LCD, it's that distinct.  If we were to ever need another monitor, I'd definitely buy this again.

Reviews.Title: cheaply made, audio cuts out, has to be wall mounted
Reviews.Author: Bart
Reviews.Content: To the point of the poor review: The audio doesn't work.  Volume is way too low even on the highest setting and it only picks up about 1 out of every 10 sounds even when it is less than 3 feet from the baby. Most sounds don't register at all.We have several children and have gone through several monitors.  Enough experience to know you don't need all the bells and whistles many monitors have today.  There are only 3 things a monitor needs to do and the Infant Optics DXR-5 fails on 2 of the 3:1.  Good audio: Good enough to actually hear the sounds the baby is making AND be able turn up the volume on the receiver to a fairly high level without ridiculous amounts of background noise. (As I said above, the DXR-5 audio does not work.  Only 1 out of every 10 sounds is picked up and the volume on the reciever is so low you can't even hear those unless you are 2 feet from the receiver.)2.  Basic video: Video's sole purpose is to help you decide if you need to go into the baby's room or not. You might think you are going to use it for more than that but you aren't. You need to be able to see the whole crib, and be able to tell what is actually happening in it - that's it. (The DXR-5 meets this criteria.)3. Easy set up:  I should be able to put the monitor on a shelf, mount it to a wall and easily be able to point it at the crib. (The DXR-5 fails here as well.  The only way to set up the camera is to mount it to a vertical wall.  Because of the way it is made you can not set it on a shelf and point it down at a crib. Not possible.)The Infant Optics DXR-5 is not worth buying.

Reviews.Title: Save yourself!
Reviews.Author: Gillybird
Reviews.Content: As I said in the topic, save yourself. I rated it 1 star because it was difficult to use. I bought this baby monitor for my 5 month old daughter because my first one broke and saw that this one was a really good price!  When I got it I saw that you had to move the camera back and forth manually. It also could not go up and down at all.When you try to set the camera up it is hard because the bottom is rounded and will slip very easily! Once I was just done trying to keep it balanced and had to tape it to my crib to keep it in place. I don't really understand why people say that the pictures on the monitor are great because on the one I had it would keep still every know and then. It would also make the baby white because it thought it was bright when it was really dark!  It had a really cheap feeling to it too. It is a big waste of money and if you just listen it will keep you the trouble. Trust me I had it for 2 months and it didn't work for me. You can try but it will not work! I am positive!

Reviews.Title: Spy momma!
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I call this my spy camera and love it! Sometimes the audio doesn't work on it but overall I'm impressed with the night time vision and range. Def recommend especially for the price!

Reviews.Title: Is the grief worth the good price?
Reviews.Author: yummy_mantou
Reviews.Content: I wanted to like this product. I have a 2010 Summer Infant monitor I used with my first child and never had any issues with it but was hoping to get a comparable product for half the price. With all the strong reviews, I thought this would be it but it has caused more headaches than my Summer Infant monitor every did.Pro: Nice large screen; adjustable camera angles when mountedCons:1) Interference issues with wi-fi - we had to buy a newer router that used another frequency just to decrease the interference enough for the signal to "hold". Our house is less than 1200 sq ft on the main floor and the signal was not strong enough to transmit across the distance of the house. It would frequently flash "out of range" but the worst part is that the monitor spontaneously shut off not once but THREE times because of persistant out of range warnings.2) Volume shutting off - yes, this has an auto-mute feature that is nice. But sometimes if the monitor and camera don't sync just right, the volume defaults to mute and will not activate when the baby cries. This has happened a few times and causing my 2 month old infant to "cry it out" unintentionally.3) As mentioned in a few reviews, the product feels cheap in hand. To be fair, it is half the cost of other video monitors but I'm not sure if it would survive a hard toss onto the hardwood floor by my toddler.I am on the fence about returning it but if I had to do it over, I would have spent the extra money on the SI monitor to avoid all the signal and volume challenges we had especially when our child is still so young.

Reviews.Title: Broke after a week
Reviews.Author: Dustin Bruening
Reviews.Content: It's on its way back in the box to head back to Amazon.  We'll try it one more time since the price is so great and there are so many good reviews of the product, but after one week, the screen flickers in and out and and as of today, I can't even get signal coverage at all, even if the units are right next to each other.April 13th:Results of second monitor attempt:The volume is so quiet, I can hear the baby cry across the house louder than I can hear the monitor right in the room I'm in.  It also has a tin sounding buzz to it.  It also interferes with our wifi.We're not going to try this one again!

Reviews.Title: Good quality at good price
Reviews.Author: JessJess
Reviews.Content: this is an economical monitor for those who don't just want a audio-only monitor, but can't afford a $200 monitor. At just a hundred dollars, this monitor has good video and audio clarity, good range, and is interference free. The hand held unit is light and portable, but the screen is only 2.4inch vs the more expensive ones that have 3.5inch screens. The night vision works well giving clear images of our crib even 10 feet away from the camera.We noticed the cheap plastic construction but the product has been dropped many times and it is still working without any faults.

Reviews.Title: WiFi Interference
Reviews.Author: MLMacdonald
Reviews.Content: I read not to install too close to a TV or computer (it works on top of the TV), but be warned that it might interferewith iPad functioning closeby on home network.

Reviews.Title: why spend hundreds more
Reviews.Author: V. Hertel "beach lover"
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor for a great price. There is no need to spend hundreds more if you want a video monitor. I could not bring myself to spend 200 to 300 so I was ecstatic when I found this. The video quality is good enough to see what your baby is doing. You don't need an hd plasma to see your baby needs you. The sound quality is very good.another great feature is the night vision. You can see your baby if the lights are low in the room. Easy to install. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Meagan Bell
Reviews.Content: I purchased this moniter for my newborn daughter recently.  I am extremely satisfied with this product.  The price was right and the quality of the moniter is exceptional.  I would HIGHLY reccomend this product to anyone looking to purchase video moniter for their baby.

Reviews.Title: Really nice with good video and sound
Reviews.Author: J.C. Fontaneda
Reviews.Content: A monitor in our budget range with good sound and video. Never had any problems with our wifi and 2.4ghz cordless phones. The picture quality is really good! I didn't expect a $100 monitor to be at this level. We've had it for 3 months and it has been an excellent item giving us a peace of mind 24 hours a day.

Reviews.Title: Not a good option
Reviews.Author: RRuhlen
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were looking for something simple.  We are actually testing the monitors before our baby arrives and I'm glad we didn't wait!  I didn't really feel like HD quality was necessary.  I just wanted to be able to view the baby and hear any noises in the nursery.  The picture quality comes in is okay, not the greatest but you can see everything.  The sound was the major factor.  The sound would cut off for periods of time even though the baby's sound machine was on.  You also had to hold it to your ear to actually hear anything and that was at the highest volume setting!  The worst part was the fact that at 3am I a woke to a lost signal!  This monitor is currently boxed up and on its way to being returned.  Not worth the $$ at all.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Mama2.3
Reviews.Content: Works great. Good picture day and night. There is a fairly quiet fuzz sound in background. Doesn't bother me really. Battery only lasts around three hours with picture on at all times. I'm sure it's longer if VOX is on. I only use for naps, but still stinks to charge so much. I often leave it plugged in so it doesn't die and I not notice.

Reviews.Title: No sweat
Reviews.Author: Jenta
Reviews.Content: At the time of purchase, this was the best selling video monitor on amazon and the price was good. When the product came, it was nicely packaged up in a color gift box and everything seemed high quality. It was easy to install and didn't take much effort to set everything much.The unit works well in day and night conditions. Just like all video night vision cameras, it goes into B&W; when in IR mode. The range is excellent on this thing too.We did not experience any problems with our wifi signal that runs around our 2 story house.Overall a good baby monitor at a very good price.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor
Reviews.Author: Michael Golden
Reviews.Content: This monitor works great for us.  It works in every room of the house.  My wife is addicted to it.  I really wish we would have gotten one a year earlier.I got this due to the price, and it was a good decision.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, plasticy, weird sound and weird video
Reviews.Author: CC
Reviews.Content: Complete price game. Write the price was $300, but it's on sale for $99 and people will think they are getting a $300 video monitor for a great price. You are getting a cheap monitor. It sounds tinny, there is a constant hum, the camera is poor quality. Sent mine back.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Marina "Marina"
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews I decided to go ahead and purchase this. So glad I did. It's great for the price, I am able to see in a large enough area, the monitor itself tilts up and down so you can maneuver  it easily. It has a long enough cord so you can plug it in easy with today's homes having outlets everywhere. It is pretty light so you need to take care with that, but you can also mount it on the wall. As far as the beeping noise mine has only done that once in 2 weeks and I think that's because it accidentally came unplugged. The light is kinda bright but you do want to see your object so just know that, I keep mine about a foot away from my head, while sleeping. Mine has snow therefore the 4 stars but it can also be because I have a very old house, and have problems with regular wifi. For the money this is a great investment to watch your little ones.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: A. Copulos "Coranne"
Reviews.Content: UPDATE 6/13:I have now had this monitor for 5 months.  I am still having problems- the monitor keeps freezing in the middle of the night and overheating.  It doesn't pick up my child screaming and turns itself completely off (not into energy saving mode).  I wrote the company and I will be buying a different monitor- this one is junk!This is my second video monitor (my first was a summer infant color monitor that is no longer produced).  I have had it for over 3 months now.Pros:Easy to assembleLightweightMultiple Cameras possibleNight vision is clearEasy to use- not a lot of buttons or settingsCons:No way to tilt camera up or down (not useful if the camera is up high- who wants to see an image of a wall?- I ended up putting a towel under that back half, but I am constantly having to readjust as it slips)The loudest volume setting- not loud at all.  I can't hear my baby screaming when the monitor is on the loudest setting if I have some sort of noise in the room I am in (water running etc)- not helpful because I use naptime to clean.My biggest beef with this camera?  It shuts off constantly.  I get that it is a power and sanity saving feature for parents- but I dont like that it turns itself off.  Yes, I know it turns back on when it detects noise, however on more than one occasion I have noticed that it shuts off WHILE my baby is crying (not whimpering).  If I don't catch the crying in the monitor immediately- I may not know that my child is crying.  It is a little unnerving- the Summer infant models had a visual cue (color bar to show how loud the noise in the nursery was) and louder volume.If I had the opportunity, knowing what I know now- I probably wouldn't buy this one again.  Yes, other monitors are VERY expensive.  However, my first monitor was on 16 hours a day for almost 3 years and worked very well- it was worth the money.  I am disappointed in this model.  It is ok, but not one I would choose again.

Reviews.Title: sencillamente muy bueno.
Reviews.Author: edgar
Reviews.Content: muy practico, util y a la vez por el uso de recargable es excelente lo recomiendo al maximo lo compre desde colombia perfecto.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: JCM
Reviews.Content: It wasn't as loud as what I have seen previously, but otherwise it's a pretty good product.  It goes off appropriately and seems to be made well.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: YD
Reviews.Content: We've had this monitor for about 7 months and have been happy so far. The picture is good, the sound is good (a little feedback, but not much), and has been durable so far. It's great for the price, especially considering many other video baby monitors are quite a bit more.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for us!
Reviews.Author: N. Valenti "eNVy"
Reviews.Content: I just wish it came with 2 cameras so I could set one up in the playroom and on the crib without having to move it constantly. We got ours on Amazon for a fantastic price.  I recommend it to all parents who want peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: My first video monitor
Reviews.Author: Wende
Reviews.Content: This is the first video monitor I've ever had and I bought it to use with the last of my 5 children. It works great & I love that I can expand it with more cameras. We haven't done this yet but we will definantly do so when we get a bigger apartment. Currently we are in a 2 bedroom so we only need 1.

Reviews.Title: Awesome monitor
Reviews.Author: DBlake
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be more pleased with a monitor that costs less than 100 dollars. My friends came over and saw the quality of the product and were very impressed. The night vision is perfect. It's not too bright nor too dim to see the defined images of my son sleeping. We have 2 cameras and they were just as advertised. The unit looks flimsy but I've dropped it a couple of times and it's still working ok.

Reviews.Title: Buy this one and save money
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were really hesitant to buy this one because it was so much cheaper than the others but wow it's great. We have been so pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: J. T. Willis
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor has worked fine for us, and is obviously a much better deal than most video monitors out there.We had a GREAT experience with their customer service. A year after we bought this product, a part of the monitor broke after being dropped too many times (as in, totally our fault).  I wrote to the company, and Infant Optics replaced the entire thing for free, even though it had been a year! They were helpful, timely, and responsive to our request. I was really impressed!The excellent customer service helped us get even more value out of a monitor that is already a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitor
Reviews.Author: amyjoy85
Reviews.Content: This monitor far surpassed our expectations. The picture is very clear, night vision and daytime color. It seems to have a shorter battery life than I expected, but it's not short by any means. Just plug it in and recharge it when it's not being used. It doesn't pick up every single little sound our daughter makes, but it picks up 99% of them. It even picks up doors closing, loud cars on the road outside, and the furnace kicking on and off. I love being able to see what my daughter is doing in real time, not pixelated, and also hear her.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Soout
Reviews.Content: We are addicted to sniffing out the best value for money and we bought this. It's doesn't have too many features - like two way talk, temperature... but it delivers what it's advertised to do, all at very good quality. It's been very reliable for the last 7 months owning this monitor.Bottom line: good picture and video, good range, night vision and does not interfere with wifi.If you want something with more features and you dont mind paying more, go for the samsung.

Reviews.Title: Good basic video monitor
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Schneider
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a monitor to use when visiting family and I was very happy with it, especially for the price (as compared to other video monitors).  This was nice to have when away from home, but it would also be good just for an everyday monitor as well.

Reviews.Title: Great video at good price
Reviews.Author: M. Kianka
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this monitor is the video quality. The screen isn't all that big, but the pixels are very clear in day and night. I would recommend this monitor. There's no problems with our internet signal which we were worried about. I have tried other monitors and they aren't as good as this. It is also nearly half the price of the ones I've purchased before!

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: jollyka
Reviews.Content: Not the best purchase ever made but works good enough. I only use it at night to see when she wakes. The sound activation is good although every time the dog goes in the room it triggers it and I wake up. Picture isn't that great, grainy but you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Messes with our Internet
Reviews.Author: saz920
Reviews.Content: We picked out this monitor for the fantastic price. The monitor is great for watching our little one when we aren't in hearing distance of the nursery. The only problem we have with it is that somehow it interferes with our Internet connection when it is turned on. We can't figure out why this is or how to fix it. I'd give this monitor 5 stars for the price if we could figure out this one setback.

Reviews.Title: A baby monitor that works for us
Reviews.Author: NeilF
Reviews.Content: I've research most of the best sellers here on amazon and it was a hard choice. My wife and I do not make much money so are not ready to spend more than $150 on a monitor. This one seemed like the best bang for buck and it is. It's portable, has night vision, and has been reported to have the smoothest video. We saw a friend's baby monitor and the video was very jerky. It's not the case on this product and I'm glad it all came with free shipping for under $100. We also never had problems with our wifi.

Reviews.Title: works well despite flimsy feel
Reviews.Author: D. Alig
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor to replace a much more expensive one that broke.  The picture is actually surprisingly clear and it's not overloaded with features that get in the way (seemed like I was always accidentally turning on the lullaby music on the old one).  The casing does feel cheep and flimsy, but given the price that's not horrible.The biggest con is that when set to turn on when it senses noise, there's a VERY bright logo screen that comes on when the video turns on and off, so even if our daughter isn't making enough noise to wake me up the bright flash often does.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: BobbyJo
Reviews.Content: Performs great has great sound and video qualities.  East to set up and operate, with very good instructions and illustrations

Reviews.Title: ok for price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: the only bad thing is it interferes with our wireless internet and the display is extremely bright! other than those, happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Can't imagine raising a baby with out this!
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: My wife and I (and everyone that comes over) is blown away by this product.  The image quality is great, the audio is great, the night vision is AMAZING!  The first couple of months, we were glued to the monitor as our baby slept.  Thats a mix of paranoia and love!  This monitor has exceeded all of our expectations.PLUS the support for the product is STELLAR!  We had one small issue, and Infant Optics got back to me the next day with a solution to our problem.  I was very happy with their support.This camera is a MUST HAVE!- Kevin

Reviews.Title: so excited to have a video monitor!
Reviews.Author: Maria Scully
Reviews.Content: Was worried about some of the reviews, but went ahead and purchased.  This monitor just WORKS.  You plug it in, point it where you want to (the movement range is pretty good on the camera, with or without base) and turn it on and bam, it works.  I had an audio only monitor that would cut out all the time and drove me crazy.  This one made me nervous the other day (I've had it about a month) when it wouldn't turn on, so I went to the troubleshooting guide and followed the instructions.  Unplug the cord, take out the battery, wait 10 min.  Put it all back together, and it was fine.  This happens all the time with my phone, so it doesn't bother me to have to do this once a month. So far, I love it! And, it travels well.  Was worried I'd have to install it and never be able to move it again, but nope, that part's easy as well.

Reviews.Title: Very good quality
Reviews.Author: Andre L. A. Lemos "Andre Lemos"
Reviews.Content: It's very simple to use and have a great quality of video and sound.The signal range is amazing!I really recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Suz
Reviews.Content: This is a great product to keep watch on your kids at night. My kid is not exactly a baby but it's nice to have a peace of mind at night while I sleep to know he is OK. The price is very reasonable for what you get.

Reviews.Title: Will eventually stop working.
Reviews.Author: MntnDewMan
Reviews.Content: So, had I written this review 3 months after I started using the monitor, I would have definitely given it 5 stars.  At the time, this monitor was great.  Yes, WAS.  After about 6 months, we noticed that the battery life had dramatically shortened.  After about another month, 9 months in, the monitor stopped working unless it was plugged in.  As soon as you unplugged it, it wouldn't work.  And finally, 2 weeks ago, it completely stopped working all together.  So I now have a cheap piece of plastic that is good for using as a hockey puck, and that's about it.Now, let me say this...the monitor itself was pretty good when it worked.  No static, very sensitive to sound, and of course, night vision, however, it did come with some kinks.  The whole, auto-off unless there is a noise really sucks.  You can't have a sound machine on or you can just forget the whole auto-off feature.  Also, it doesn't really work anyway, when there is no sound machine.  Many times, it would randomly come on even when our little peanut was dead silent.  Also, when keeping it on, sometimes in the middle of the night, it would randomly beep really loudly and say out of range.  This would wake my wife up multiple times a night, and it got really annoying really fast.  We put up with it, but only because it gave her the opportunity to check on our sweet pea anyway.All the previous reviews are right in saying that the actual video part seems really cheap, but works none-the-less...until it gets a few months old.  Then it dies.  End of story.My reco - save your money and buy something that one die.  Or spend a little more and get a better one.

Reviews.Title: Would rather spend a little more on a monitor
Reviews.Author: mb
Reviews.Content: Purchased this monitor based on reviews and instantly regretted it when I turned it on for the night. Some people complained about the cheap plastic casing - I didn't mind that. The picture quality is TERRIBLE - very blurry. Sound quality is TERRIBLE - all I hear is static and when my baby does make a noise it's faint - as if the camera was in another room. These are the most important features in a video monitor. Decided to return immediately and ordered the Motorola monitor.

Reviews.Title: good monitor
Reviews.Author: Shelley R Olson
Reviews.Content: This monitor works great and is affordable ! The sensitivity is good,  i can sleep and not worry ! The only thing I wish it had was a room temp on it!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: N. Selvarajah "NMS"
Reviews.Content: I tried it out last night.  The night vision view is excellent.  Picture clarity is excellent.  Sound quality of the transmission is excellent.Price is excellent.  Hence, 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: great!!!!
Reviews.Author: Danilo
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it and I fell good now that my baby 5 month went to his room , we can hear him and the video is very clear too. the sound volume is good. the price is also amazing against others.... this camera does not move remotely , only manual , don't have some others extra features as the expensive ones, but for me its great..... 100% recommend it

Reviews.Title: nice handy system
Reviews.Author: LAmom "laura"
Reviews.Content: we've got this for nearly a year now and it's been reliable. quite a surprise for a 99 dollar monitor. the best thing about this monitor is that it has a voice activation mode that shuts off to save battery to last through the night. it reactivates when it detects any noise our baby makes. a nice handy system that has helped us get better sleep!

Reviews.Title: Seems great so far
Reviews.Author: nauman shahid
Reviews.Content: Just bought this digital video camera. Screen is kind of small but picks up A/V well. For the price its a GOOD buy so far. will have to use it more and more to know more about how well it works.

Reviews.Title: peace of mind for the parents
Reviews.Author: Liston
Reviews.Content: We were worried about having wifi interference as some reviewers have mentioned - but we had no problems at all with our wifi. We use a linksys 2.4ghz G band router and it works fine with it.Using this monitor is very easy. The design is simple and basic, and the buttons tell you what each of it control. It also has a seperate toggle for volume and that's very useful in the middle of the night without going through complicated menus and options to reduce the volume. It's right there on the side of the unit.This monitor really gave us to peace of mind to sleep at night and I recommend this to parents who are looking for a $100 monitor.

Reviews.Title: Decent deal
Reviews.Author: Smilest18
Reviews.Content: This is a decent video monitor and much cheaper than others. I originally wanted a video monitor with all the "bells and whistles" however our budget just wouldn't allow that, so Infant Optics we bought. I actually love it although I wish the battery would last a bit longer. I just keep the monitor plugged in unless I'm moving around. The monitor is very loud, which suprised me because when I tested with my ipad before baby I thought it was really low. However, I can keep the level on 2 while I sleep and still here my daughter. I must say that the picture quality is amazing. The colors are pretty vivid and the night vision is awesome. I would definitely recommend this.**update**The interference is crazy. I absolutely can't use my computer or iPad if it is turned on. It has resulted in me either periodically turning it on and off until I go to bed or not using my computer/iPad at all. This majorly sucks and I am currently looking for a new monitor.

Reviews.Title: It is okay!
Reviews.Author: Sabrine D. Santos
Reviews.Content: I like the video and sound quality but the thing that bothers me is that the screen does not shuts off when baby is quite, so you always have a light in your room, I always put a piece of paper on the top of the screen and it works. I think it is good for the money I paid but I would not buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR-5 2.4
Reviews.Author: Barney J. Rosen Jr.
Reviews.Content: A quality device, the only draw back is that it doesn't show room temperature on the monitor.  Otherwise it is excellent and at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Very clear video
Reviews.Author: Daniel D.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this because of the high ranking and good reviews. Although I would agree that the audio isn't the best, the video is. It has smooth and clear video without any time delay at all. The range is perfect for our house. The night vision is flawless.For $100 this is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: double setup
Reviews.Author: Jeff Ryan
Reviews.Content: This is our second set of Infant Optics monitor we bought from amazon. We have both running parellel with each set and there is no interference with each other, or with the 2.4ghz internet at our home. We bought we first one in early 2012 and we loved this. It has never failed on us. After the delivery of our second child, we wanted another camera to hook up to our existing unit but we figured out it wasn't much of a price difference to get a complete new set so we can have both screens viewed at the same time. This is a great setup recommended to parents with two kids.

Reviews.Title: Average
Reviews.Author: Tallahassee
Reviews.Content: This was the first video monitor we choose because of the low price. It is easy to set up and use and the features are good. There is no talk to baby feature or remote panning of the camera but that wasnt a deal breaker for us. After using it for a couple weeks a yellow line on the display showed up out of nowhere. We didn't drop it or anything but it still worked nicely. The picture was decent and the infrared was as well. This is made of lightweigh plastic that feels cheap but it did the job. The buttons on the display unit also felt cheap too but again, everything worked properly. We ended up returning this because of the yellow line on the display and bought a different brand (VTech) but that monitor only lasted a few hours. This is a good monitor if you don't want to spend alot or expect an expensive feel. I'm sure if we contacted the manufacturer we could have gotten a new one but we wanted to see what other monitors were like.

Reviews.Title: Came as described.
Reviews.Author: Heidel Kropp
Reviews.Content: We haven't been able to use it yet since our baby hasn't arrived.  But it looks great and we are excited to have it.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointing
Reviews.Author: Carolyn
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I was not happy with this monitor.  After having a Summer Infant monitor that worked very well but my children managed to break, i decided I didn't feel like buying another expensive monitor.  As it turns out, I probably should have.  If you live in a house, this monitor probably works pretty well, but I live in an apartment where there is some interference and the signal would stop working regularly at night.  This meant that the monitor would give off a loud beep to tell me I couldn't see my baby anymore and I would jiggle it around until the signal worked again.  This was a huge problem because not only did it wake me constantly during the course of the night, but the screen was always shutting off.

Reviews.Title: I wish I could give this monitor and the customer service 6 stars!!!!!
Reviews.Author: A. Kamat "Prime Shopper"
Reviews.Content: Reviews about the Product- Excellent clarity both in voice and image quality- Image is visible clearly even when there is little to no light- Monitor turns off automatically when baby is sound asleep- Baby's movement or cry triggers off the monitor to turn on- For under $100, this is a no brainer!Reviews about the Service- Fabulous service!- I had a wire issue during the warranty period and they sent me a replacement in 3 days!- My monitor sound system stopped working after my warranty ended and they still sent me a replacement! No questions asked. No hassles!- The customer service was prompt, courteous and simply superb!GO FOR THIS MONITOR. YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Genevieve
Reviews.Content: We received this 2 days after ordering this. From opening the box, the unit is very cute and compact in size. It does not weigh much more than my iphone. We had it setup in 5 minutes, went through the manual and figured you can work this monitor simply by referring to the quick start. I prefer to keep the VOX off and have the handheld unit plugged into a wall cable to keep it running continously.Very satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor with a much lower price then most
Reviews.Author: Adrienne Nelson
Reviews.Content: This monitor gets the job done.  I like the night vision because we pull the blackout shades down even in the day when my son sleeps.  I have much more peace of mind with this monitor the the audio one that I have.

Reviews.Title: Useful
Reviews.Author: Nancy dePerio
Reviews.Content: We like the quality in night vision. We've used a summer monitor before this (until it died last month) and it is no match against this product, although it was nearly double the price. The video is smoother and more defined, and the audio is pretty much the same. The range is better and monitor itself is less bulky and heavy.We also looked at HD IP cameras but I've seen one in action at my friend's home and there was too much lag and bootup time. This works just fine, although the screen isn't as big as our ipad (if we had an IP camera), it works instantaneous on activation.

Reviews.Title: Great !
Reviews.Author: D. Matheson "ID208"
Reviews.Content: this order arrived in a very timely fashion the price was nice as well much better than through any local stores

Reviews.Title: Love the shotgun mic
Reviews.Author: JSL
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor for the price. We got it on sale for $99. Easy to set up, easy to use. I love that it has a shotgun mic so that when the monitor is on the sound only comes on when it detects louder decibels - so I don't have to hear white noise, static, or my son's sleep sheep when he's already sleeping. My only complaint is that when the battery is low it doesn't beep. It only flashes a light so if you aren't looking directly at the monitor you may miss it.

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE Battery Life!
Reviews.Author: Mary4
Reviews.Content: We've had the monitor less than 1 month, and the battery doesn't last longer than 2-3 hours when fully charged. There isn't a button to turn the video off, which would probably help remedy the battery issue to an extent. Additionally, the fact that the screen stays on all of the time is really annoying when you want to have it in your room in case, I don't know, your baby cries in the middle of the night... it lights up an entire room! If you try to cover it, the sound gets muffled. We're sending this monitor back-Bottom line, I would NOT recommend it.I gave it 2 stars because it did have a couple of qualities that I liked, which I will share.1) It has a white noise filter, which means that after 10 seconds of a repetitive noise (fan, noise machine, heater, etc.) the sound will shut off until it hears a noise from baby.2) The parent unit has the capacity to switch between up to 4 cameras, though I did notice that the additional cameras are almost as much as the entire monitor set.3) Both the camera and the parent unit are compact.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!
Reviews.Author: Asia
Reviews.Content: Love this! I couldn't believe that I waited so long to purchase it. The receiver even worked when we were outside.

Reviews.Title: Smooth video
Reviews.Author: Curt Steinzor
Reviews.Content: This product is one of the more basic monitors out there. It's still very user friendly and comes at a very good price. We were recommended by a friend who just gave birth to her 3rd child 2 months ago. What I really love about this monitor is how smooth the video is. There is no lag or frame-freezing that I've seen happen with other units. This unit runs on 2.4ghz which is the same as our wifi system but there has not been any interference issues so far.

Reviews.Title: Love this monitor
Reviews.Author: Tilp S.C.
Reviews.Content: This monitor serves our purpose well, gives an excellent video output quality and has range that doubles our old summer monitor. We've mounted the camera on a wall in our daughter's room and I wouldn't recommend placing it further than 6 feet away from the crib if you want to get a clear picture at night. We can hear and see every little movement our daughter makes at night when the room is completely dark. We love this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Mehhhhh
Reviews.Author: Jodi M.
Reviews.Content: It's an alright product for the price.  It works good but would lose the signal if I went into my basement....our house is only 1200 Sq. ft. Also the antennae broke off right away since these are prone to get knocked down easily.  It still worked but then a couple month later the actual metal piece that was inside the plastic antennae broke completely off and so we were no longer able to get a signal.For the price it's a decent product.  I ended up spending just a little more and got the Samsung SEW-3036WN.  I like that much better!

Reviews.Title: Great bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Rog
Reviews.Content: I like the versatility of the camera angle.  Works well in the dark.  No issues with the signal strength that others mentioned, camera is upstairs and monitor is downstairs.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Lauren Lake
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this purchase. It is a simple video monitor that has a clear picture and clean sound. It is not possible to move the camera using the monitor, you have to move it manually. After the initial set-up of getting the view that you want it isn't really necessary to move the camera. I used 3M velcro strips to attach the camera to the wall rather screwing in the base that comes with the monitor. You can put the monitor into power saving mode by pressing the + buttons on both sides at the same time. This causes the monitor to go to "sleep" after 3 minutes of inactivity and comes back on when activated by sound. The monitor is perfectly adequate for the price. Don't get it expecting it to have the same features as more expensive models and then complain that it's not a good product!

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift
Reviews.Author: bda3145
Reviews.Content: The price on this was right and the baby blue for my first grandson was too hard to pass up.

Reviews.Title: Decent product
Reviews.Author: Keith H. Bryant
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the camera quality. Bought it for my daughter and she was impressed with how clear the image was. Even the night vision was very sharp. She said there were no cons to speak of yet. Durability is to be seen due to only having it a couple of weeks.

Reviews.Title: It works just fine
Reviews.Author: santiago
Reviews.Content: All this product needs to be a kick ass one is that you could talk back to your baby through the monitor and that the cam had a battery of its own so you don't have to pulg it in every time you wanna use it. The night vision is great, the sound it's very well and loud too; easy to use and light. I'm happy, for the price i paid, i'm very happy!

Reviews.Title: everything i hoped ut would be
Reviews.Author: cassidyrenee
Reviews.Content: Worth the money for the peace of mind. My daughter is 8 months & is now able to sleep in her room because I can look over & see exactly what's she's doing at anytime. It does everything it advertised. A quality product that I would highley recommend. (It took me a bit to figure how to toggle the night vision on/off but it's a button combination on the monitor & can be done. Just read the manual :) it came on time as well)

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: nathan
Reviews.Content: We went with this camera because it was a little less expensive but we've been quite happy with it.  The camera itself is mountable, but also allows for a wide adjustment range making it easy to keep baby in view.  The mic picks up even very quiet sounds.
