The monitor screen is bright and shows a pretty clear picture.Cons:There is no visual sound meter so if you have the volume turned up, its hard to tell how loud a sound really is.The user interface is cumbersome - you have to hold 2 buttons at the same time to put it into the power save mode and its easy to turn off or switch the camera channel if you're not careful.The monitor screen is bright - while a plus in a bright room during the day, its like a spotlight in your darkened room at night.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after using one time
Reviews.Author: Travis Busman
Reviews.Content: We purchased this monitor in used, but like new condition. I was eager to set it up, so I ended up plugging in the monitor in a room other than our bedroom. It worked at first, but later that night when we were getting ready for bed, I turned off the monitor and unplugged it, then re-plugged it into a spot by my nightstand. I hit the power button and I got nothing. The device did read that it was charging (as indicated by the red light), but it would not turn on. I tried everything to revive the picture, but to no avail. I'm disappointed and am now looking into purchasing a product from a different company.

Reviews.Title: Basic and easy
Reviews.Author: angela green
Reviews.Content: Yes, it's a little cheaper plastic than the Summerinfant brands, but the cost is exactly there.  I wish it had an intercom to talk to baby.  Quality of picture is good.

Reviews.Title: Viewing angle is my only complaint
Reviews.Author: R. Paek "pekosROB"
Reviews.Content: The monitor has pretty good range. I have a 2000 sq ft house with thick walls (at least my wi-fi says I do) and it works on one side of the house to the other. Easy to pair, good nightvision, but the viewing angle on the monitor kind of sucks. It's worse than an old school big screen TV. You literally have to be viewing right above the screen to see a clear picture. Anything outside of 50 degrees or so will have part of the picture "disappear."

Reviews.Title: Arrived not working.
Reviews.Author: American Express
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product for a Mother to be, after the birth of her child she tried to turn the monitor with no results, the unit was completely dead , and since it was a baby shower gift it was outside of amazons return policy. So she is pretty much S.O.L.

Reviews.Title: Great video quality, but sound quality could be better.
Reviews.Author: Lukas
Reviews.Content: I purchased this after seeing the reviews. I didn't want to spend a lot so I wasn't expecting to look at an HDTV when using this product. I am very satisfied with the video quality of this monitor and the different functions of the VOX, Auto Mute and IR. They work great and my wife and I have not had any problems with them. The battery on the monitor is also good as well, although I don't have a very good estimate of how long it will last and the sort because we mostly leave it plugged in. The audio could be better. With our unit every time our baby cries there is a very high pitched whine as well. I thought it might be the volume level but it does it no matter what. We can still hear our son well, it is just annoying if we are waiting for them to sleep after crying for a while. Luckily our bedrooms are right next to each other so we can just shut off the volume and still here them. We mainly got it for the video because the like to push themselves into the railings. I am impressed with this unit although my expectations were low. I would definitely recommend this is you are concerned more about video quality than sound, but it still works great it isn't like the audio doesn't work it just has some extra whine to it.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Pinky
Reviews.Content: The Infant Optics DXR-5 Met my expectations. I use it to monitor my bed ridden wife.I can see clearly when she is restless or hear her when she calls my name.I would like more range to reach my next door neighbor so she can monitor whileI go for food or medicine. Still, I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: pK
Reviews.Content: We have used this monitor for almost a year.  It takes a beating and keeps on working.  So very please with this item for monitoring our baby.  Would purchase this item again for gifts.  This monitor gives you peace of mind!

Reviews.Title: D- as a monitor, C- for video only
Reviews.Author: 99eph
Reviews.Content: We've used an old Sony audio monitor for years. It was acting up recently so we decided to give video a try. We were deciding between this and the Levana Jena monitor but went with the DXR because of its longer track record and poor reviews of earlier Levana monitors.As a monitor this is pretty terrible. Our basic requirement is that we hear the baby crying when the monitor is 6 feet away while we are watching TV. This is way too quiet for that, even on its loudest setting. The other huge problem is that it seems to turn itself completely off (not just a "sleep" mode) with no warning or predictability.It's slightly better as a video camera to keep watch the baby during nap time. I can only comment on the night vision mode since our child naps in a dark room. To actually get a color picture you basically need direct sunlight beaming into the room. In our experience even with the ceiling light on in the room it is pretty grayscale. As others have mentioned the "infrared" lights that circle the camera are visible to the naked eye but fortunately it doesn't bother our baby. The bigger issue is the green power light on top of the unit which basically lights up the whole room (we put black electrical tape over ours).I don't know how anyone could give this high marks for video quality. To call it pixelly would be putting things mildly. You can basically tell what's going on but it's almost like an impressionist painting. The viewing angle is extremely limited; you almost have to look at it dead on. Glare is also a big issue. It's OK at night in a room with incandescent lights but right now I'm experiencing significant glare just with natural light on a cloudy day. I suspect it would be completely unusable outside.We also don't like the limited options for mounting the camera. I'm not sure what other models use but I wish there was some kind of clip option. This would be fine if you have a decent ledge where you want to mount it or are willing to drill holes in your wall, but we were stuck taping it in place.Having said all of this, we decided it wasn't worth returning. Our old Sony is working again as a monitor but this is mildly amusing to watch the baby move around in the crib.  It has also proved useful in that our baby doesn't reliably cry or make noise when he wakes up. Being able to see him moving on the monitor has saved us from waiting until he makes noise to go in and get him.

Reviews.Title: Great, if you only care about the picture and don't need sound.
Reviews.Author: Erin N. Nickless "J's Panda"
Reviews.Content: Even at maximum volume, the sound on the monitor is so low that I have to be sitting right next to it to hear it, and it doesn't always pick up the sound all the way.  I would not purchase this again or recommend it.  The picture quality is good, and the night vision setting is decent, but I need to hear my daughter as much, if not more so, than I need to see her.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: shza525
Reviews.Content: If you arent interested in a super fancy audio monitor this is the one for you.  It isnt very expensive and it is a very plain and simple monitor that gets the job done.  It has three modes.  I like to use the auto mute, which shuts off the sound after 3 minutes of silence (I think) and comes back on if there is a sound detected. The screen stays on in this mode.  There is also a voice activated mode, which workes very similarly, but the video monitor turns off and not just the sound.  I find that when the monitor is on this mode it dies rather quickly if it doesnt stay plugged in.  I would recommend keeping it plugged in if you plan to use this mode.  The monitor itself is quite simplistic with very few buttons.  So aside, from the battery dying quickly on the voice activated mode, the only complaint I really have is that I wish that there was an option to get this with two minitors or atleast have a second monitor available for purchase ( I havent been able to find that).

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: Carolina Castro Madrid
Reviews.Content: I started using it last saturday and stop working on wednesday... it was just 5 days that the divice work. I would like to have support from the manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Infant Optics DXR-5 2.4 GHz Digital Video Baby Monitior with Night Vision
Reviews.Author: jim henderson
Reviews.Content: This product was absolutely outstanding and was a gift to our grand-daughter who just had a baby.  She is so happy that we got her this, she was almost speechless.

Reviews.Title: Short Life Time!!
Reviews.Author: Spiderman
Reviews.Content: we enjoyed this product when we first got it. However, we have only been using it one month and the video screen is shot.  We can only see a slight grainy image untill it goes black. its probably just a defect  that could be limitied to just this item  but i think I'm going to start checking with produsts from another company.

Reviews.Title: GREAT monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: Jp
Reviews.Content: This monitor is really great for its price point.1. Took about 2 minutes to setup and get started2. I love that it plugs into the wall so I don't have to keep buying batteries3. The picture is okay - a little grainy but I can still see and make out exactly what I need4. I like that the sound powers off after a few minutes of nothing going on and instantly powers back on once a sound is made.  The sound being on does have some background interference so its good not great.5. I like that the color switches from day to nightOverall, you really cant go wrong!  Why pay 300+ for a different brand?  Doesn't make sense when this one exists for much less.  Plus, if it does break, you can buy 3 of these for the price of one of the more expensive brands that could break just as easily!

Reviews.Title: great monitor
Reviews.Author: SHS
Reviews.Content: Prior to this monitor I had a Summer Infant and then a Motorola video monitor... the Summer product died after 3 months & the Motorola battery life was virtually non existent. This Infant Optics monitor is great! No complaints. In fact the monitor picture is larger than the other 2 monitors I tried and the price of the Infant Optics was less!!

Reviews.Title: Best Video Monitor
Reviews.Author: albert peterson
Reviews.Content: Amazing video quality, not so crazy about the sound quality but the video compensates for it. i can see baby sleeping perfectly from a couple of feet away since we mounted it on the wall in her room. The battery life on the monitor is amazing it lasts getting turned on and off all day and i plug it in at night. Just know that there is no alert when the battery dies, the light blinks and turns off without a sound. The light on the camera is not bright at all so it doesnt bother my little one sleeping or distracts her. I would recommend this to everyone. you cant beat being able to see your baby perfectly.

Reviews.Title: very nice but i think battery is not good
Reviews.Author: M.abdelhamid
Reviews.Content: very nice voice and monitor and video in dark but i think battery get low after 3 hours onlyso if company fix battery problem will become the very nice baby cam

Reviews.Title: Cordless last only a couple of hours
Reviews.Author: YeahYeah
Reviews.Content: We followed the instruction on charging but the hand held pretty much has to stay on the charger. Kinda defeats the purpose of us getting it.The camera is great. The nighttime vision is wonderful but the handheld is awful. At least ours it. We would return it but our little one didn't arrive until this month and our return option expired in January.

Reviews.Title: for price it's ok, but won't hold charge.
Reviews.Author: J. Prasad
Reviews.Content: The quality is ok, video is fairly clear especially at night viewing. The only problem is that it doesn't hold a charge, so the viewer has to be plugged in at all times, I can't carry it around with me. This happened right out of the box, brand new. So that is very annoying, it just stays plugged in by my bedside. Put it's a pain to re plug it in around the house.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my purchase.
Reviews.Author: Kseniia Diakiv
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my brother and his newborn.I was worried at first, they have a really big house andproperty, I was hoping that the range would notbe a problem. It works great.

Reviews.Title: Great... except for battery life
Reviews.Author: E. McArthur
Reviews.Content: For the most part, I love this monitor.  It was easy to set up, and the picture quality is great.  My only complaint (and it's kind of a big one) is that the monitor doesn't run very long on  the battery.  If I forget to plug it in when we go to bed, it will shut off at some point in the night.  I can barely hear the baby from our room, so this is not a good thing.  A couple of times I've woken up at 5am to a screaming infant with no idea how long he'd been crying (luckily both times have been since he has started sleeping until 4-5 consistently).  That is a terrible feeling for a mother.  I know, I know - "How hard is it to remember to plug it in?"  I'm a first-time new mom.  I'm tired.  I shouldn't have to worry about this.  Oh and one more minor thing that I'm able to overlook but someone else might not be - the VOX feature doesn't work if you have a white noise machine in baby's room.  This may contribute to the crappy battery life in our house, because the monitor is on all night and never guess into battery-saving mode.  Since the VOX doesn't work, the screen stays liit all night, and it's pretty bright.  But that doesn't bother us too much.

Reviews.Title: GREAT VALUE!
Reviews.Author: tisaac
Reviews.Content: With so many video monitors on the market, my husband and I had a very difficult time deciding on one, even after doing extensive research for months.  Finally, around Christmas (and now that our son was a year old and we wanted to 'spy' on him a bit more) we decided to 'bite the bullet' and just buy this monitor.  Priced at $99, it was hard to pass up, and we figured we could return it if it didn't work out.Well, this monitor has turned out to be perfect for us!  After all the research we did, it turns out all we need out of a monitor is the ability to see and listen to our son - nothing too complex or fancy-schmancy!  This monitor performs well in both regards, and has held up perfectly for the three months we've owned it (even though it's been thrown to the ground numerous times by our energetic little guy)!It's a great value!  Certainly not worth paying over twice as much for many of the Summer monitors that aren't nearly as well rated.

Reviews.Title: Best for the money.
Reviews.Author: D. Elston "Supersport"
Reviews.Content: Save your money folks, don't waste it on features you don't need (zoom, pan etc.).  After convincingly wife to try this camera on the deal that we could save in upwards of 300$ (based on what she was looking at) but return it of needed, I couldn't be happier with a semi-simple solution.The camera features nightvision, an auto mute feature when no sounds are detected for a short period, and a screen auto off feature that will save your battery,but turn the screen on if sounds are detected.This is a hidden gem among baby monitors as it is in the price to feature sweet spot. It gives you advanced features without playing on your worst fears to convince you that you need some breathing sensor mat to help you little one survive SIDS.Look no further new parents, this is the one. Get it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Lauren R. Meyer
Reviews.Content: I had originally bought one of the AngelCare SIDS monitors but returned it quickly because my 3 month old tends to move quite a lot in her sleep.  By the first hour she ends up sideways and a foot higher in her crib.  So we decided a camera would be better and I could have some peace of mind.  This is the best camera for the money I've seen!  It's simple yet effective.  The picture is remarkably clean and clear and there is no interefereance at all!  I love it!  I feel so much better knowing i can watch my little one anytime while she sleeps and can even watch her breathing it's that clear!  The monitor is easy to mount and the lens can be maipulated to almost any angle.  The monitor has multiple channels so you can also buy multiple cameras and have them mounted or use them in othe rooms.  Excellent investment!

Reviews.Title: Bright!
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: Really like this monitor but it is really bright at night. We have to lay it face down on the nightstand and have to pick it up to see the video. We still really like it but wish it dimmed more!

Reviews.Title: loud hum!
Reviews.Author: unimpressed
Reviews.Content: I ordered this monitor because of the good price and the good reviews (and maybe the pretty blue color) :) When it came, I immediately noticed how cheap the device felt. In the picture, it looks like it will power swivel (like my Summer monitor), but it's a manual swivel. That's no good for viewing the whole room when you're trying not to disturb the baby! But the worst part was this hum that the handset makes if the volume is turned down. Since I keep my handset next to my bed, that would be incredibly annoying. Oh and you can't click the video off. It has to go off on its own. I sent the monitor back and will likely order another Summer Infant monitor. They don't have any of these issues.

Reviews.Title: We expect another quality of the product. Only work two weeks, now the camera is Wasted.
Reviews.Author: Giancarlo Vignolo
Reviews.Content: The product is made of a material very weak. The camera is not good and off constantly.Only worked two weeks and miscarriage.I don't recommend the purchase of this product is very bad.

Reviews.Title: Beware-interferes with wireless internet
Reviews.Author: Specialk
Reviews.Content: At first we were happy with this product. We bought it to watch my elderly grandmother, so we were not concerned with report that some parent had, that they could not see whether their baby was breathing. It suits our needs and price was right.Then we noticed that when ever the monitor is turned on, we could not watch Neflix. It is on the same frequency as our wireless internet, so we can’t use the internet while the baby monitor is on. Also replacement batteries are not available at this time.

Reviews.Title: OK Monitor for the price- bad night vision quality
Reviews.Author: Mm
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor to replace a baby monitor (Summer) we have from 4 years ago (The old one we have is discontinued so I couldn't add another camera.)The picture quality at night is not good at all (way less than our old monitor). I am returning it to amazon.

Reviews.Title: Nice product for the cost!
Reviews.Author: El Dude "Andy"
Reviews.Content: I was satisfied to ordered this product because it's easy to set up and put into use.  Works as advertized and I like that.

Reviews.Title: Use it every day
Reviews.Author: KIM DARGEL
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter as a present.  They use it constantly.  Great as you can see the baby even in the dark....  Glad I bought it!

Reviews.Title: SECURE, simple, cheap, and effective
Reviews.Author: CISSP
Reviews.Content: Battery does run low, so just buy the extra power adapter for your living room/kitchen/common area.  None of that flaky auto-disabling audio of more expensive models, and the most important aspect is that the paired units are SECURE -- no strangers watching your babies!

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Katrina Johnson
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent a lot of time trying to find a baby monitor because they were so expensive.  After reading the positive reviews on Amazon, we decided to go with this one because of the price.  I have been extremely satisfied with it and I am glad that I we went with this one!

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Karla
Reviews.Content: After researching all the different video monitors available, I purchased this one based on the amount of reviews. It is great value for the $$$. The picture is good for both day and night.  The only reason I did not give 5-stars is that the plastic does have cheap feeling, but like other reviews it still does the job for half the price.

Reviews.Title: great product! gives us piece of mind with our epileptic 4 year old.
Reviews.Author: emma's daddy
Reviews.Content: This thing was so easy to set up (took maybe 5 minutes)! Works great, looks good, and is light weight. The screen is a good size. The color is very good I can see everything clearly.  I can't say enough about how much my wife and I love this product! It is a must have for all parents! I don't know how we have managed without it before. We feel so much better knowing we have eyes on our 4 year old who was recently diagnosed with epilepsy in every room. Oh and we did get the add on camara that was super easy to set up and works like a charm! The night visison by the way isn't that weird black and white or green and black night vision that is so creepy the camera actually has led lights that help you to see, but it's crazy it doesn't "light up" and wake up your child or anything. Just trust me you want this product it is cheaper than a lot of others, but it is all you need and more! We really do love it!

Reviews.Title: wHY FLY?
Reviews.Author: kSQUARE
Reviews.Content: no fly on the WIFI... unless you know networking and can change your ip and mac address.. if you don't then no internet for you!!! while monitoring a sleeping baby.. facepalm... no bueno.

Reviews.Title: don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: joVAteach
Reviews.Content: We purchased this to have a second video monitor since our first has been discontinued and we can't purchase an additional camera for it.  What a waste of money.  The handheld monitor stopped working correctly after a month of minor use (once a day for an hour or so in the evening).  The camera stopped working after two months and now it's just collecting dust on our dresser.I'd recommend spending a little more for a higher quality product.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: BeckyG
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor. This thing works great! I really love the options it has. After 10 seconds if the baby is not making any noise then the sound shuts off so you don't have this static sound that gets annoying w/ any baby monitor. After no motion for 2 minutes the monitor shuts off and saves battery live. I love that you can plug it in and save the battery live also.I've only had it not work once, I heard the baby cry and for whatever reason the monitor did not go off. If I ever have any problems with it then I power it down and turn it back on and issues are resolved. Really love the quality for the price. The video image is great, really love the infra red video so I can see the baby in the dark. The casing does seem plasticy and kind of cheap but it doesn't really matter to me. it is cute and works great.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Love this set, it has a very clear daytime and night vision picture. A little bit of fuzz sound, but none of the horrible feedback, clicks, & screeches we got with our other set. We can actually sleep with this one! I know some people love the voice-activated power-saving feature to cut out background noise, but I found it to be not as sound-sensitive as I felt comfortable with (he was making small coughing noises & it didn't activate) and like that you can turn it off & have noise 24-7 (see the included instructions). You can also turn on/off the power-saving voice-activated video feature, and turn on/off/auto the night vision (we have it on auto & it works great). We also have night lights in the room & hallway & night vision still works great. You can also control the brightness. Camera swivels in multiple directions. Love that you can pair the monitor with other cameras, which we may do eventually since he takes naps in his swing sometimes, just wish the extra cameras weren't so expensive. Sound is a little more "tinny" than our last monitor, but you can still hear baby just fine. Volume is loud enough, but you do have to have it right next to you. Wish it went louder. Screen size is just big enough. Battery seems to last long enough, although I just keep it plugged in at my bedside at night.Pros:- Great, clear picture day & night- Can toggle all features on, off, or auto- Easy wall-mount & adjustable camera- Good battery life- Monitor is light-weight, making it easier to carry around- Very user-friendly (just read the instructions)Cons:- Voice-activation not very sensitive (we keep it off)- Volume could be louder

Reviews.Title: Piece of mind
Reviews.Author: Ellen
Reviews.Content: I love having a video monitor!  The cons of this particular model are (1) camera doesn't turn 360 degrees- so wall placement might be an issue for some.  We had to mount it at an angle to view in the crib; (2) no zoom- would be a nice feature to have; (3) only one monitor; and (4) battery life is short. I seem to have to charge it often.  With all that said, I couldn't live without a video monitor.  I am a FTM and I like being able to check on baby without going into the nusery and disturbing her if nothing is wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great for Feral Cats Too!
Reviews.Author: CTreader1980
Reviews.Content: We have a baby on the way.  We also have a dog and 4 cats, one of which is feral.  All the cats are indoor only... even the feral one!  It's awesome to actually know what she does when we are not upstairs where she lives!  Long story short, it works great and the price is good.  The volume is weak, but it's hard to expect better video for the price.

Reviews.Title: Does not alternate between cameras!
Reviews.Author: ATN2012
Reviews.Content: While this monitor may have clear picture and sound- and support up to four cameras at once- it DOES NOT automatically alternate between cameras!!! This is an issue with more than one child being monitored overnight. You have to manually switch between cameras!!

Reviews.Title: Don't do it!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Had this monitor two days, started fading to black when using.  Charge light going on and off. I tapped on monitor, would work for a few minutes then the screeen would slowly go dark.  Returned to amazon. Thank you amazon for no hastle.  Get the motorola, it is worth the extra money. Not even in the same league. Picture, sound and overall quality and just looking at both night and day difference.

Reviews.Title: Inaudible
Reviews.Author: Rylee
Reviews.Content: If you want a video camera that is more like a CCTV then this is it. Volume is terribly weak. Your kid has to shout before you hear anything.

Reviews.Title: It is not the best monitor I had but it is the best value
Reviews.Author: member
Reviews.Content: It is a good value monitor and does basic things that I need. It is average quality but I am happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: To quiet
Reviews.Author: David D Yim
Reviews.Content: If you have the receiver in the kitchen or anywhere else where theres some noise the baby crying is almost inaudible.

Reviews.Title: Not fancy, but REALLY good
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor. It doesn't have all the fancy bells and whistles, but it is a great monitor. I love that you can turn on Auto mute and you don't get all the insignificant noises. No problems and easy to set up

Reviews.Title: I was hesitant due to the price
Reviews.Author: michael omelianoff
Reviews.Content: Completly excedeed my expectations.  I was concerned that the price drop from $200 to $95 was due to being a bad product.  I don't have a single complaint.  Has made life much easier.  I highly recomend.

Reviews.Title: Sad not to love this unit
Reviews.Author: Texas 11
Reviews.Content: I am sad not to write a glowing review for this monitor. Concept is great....lower price point. Costumer service is great. It just would never work with our wireless system in our house. My husband is very computer literate......changed settings, router channels. Read a huge response e-mail from costumer service, no dice. We had to turn off the monitor to use our laptops or stream anything. So if it is compatible with your home, great! Bought the Samsung, w/o the moveable camera model and it works perfect, no interference.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: IArrambide
Reviews.Content: Did not work properly.  Tried several times to adjust the settings but was never able to get a clear picture as it stated.

Reviews.Title: Just what we wanted
Reviews.Author: JazzHoover
Reviews.Content: Yes, it does what it's supposed to,  spy on your baby so you can sleep. And you can see baby at night. Perfect.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Flavio Luz
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is perfect for the price. The only con is not having a two way audio system. Anyway it works and has a good range.

Reviews.Title: Great when it's working
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: There are things I like and things I dislike about this monitor.I suppose the battery saving feature is good. But I don't like that I can't just wake at night and glance at my baby and see/hear him breathing, moving, or whatever. It is voice activated and there's a slight delay before it kicks on. So if he wakes up happy and just plays in his crib, I don't get to see that like I did with our old monitor (that fell and broke). I would have to know he was quietly playing and click it on. It does click on a split second after he cries or makes noise, but you don't always know what kicked it on. A cough is often too short to hear the cough, you just see the monitor went on. And then it beeps when it goes back off. So if the baby is going back to sleep in the middle of the night and you are falling asleep quickly with the quiet, you get woken up a couple minutes later with a beep when it turns back off. There's supposed to be a way to override that and make it stay on, but that feature doesn't work on my monitor.I like how small the monitor is so I can easily carry it around. I love that the battery recharges when it is plugged in. I like that the picture is in color during the day. I LOVE how clear the picture is and the sound. There is no loud buzzing to put up with just to hear when there's a cry.When we first bought this monitor we had no problems with it. I could take it everywhere in the house and it worked. Then we moved. For some reason, this house has lots of interference. It's not the monitor's fault. It's the house. We have the same problem with wireless internet. However, because of this problem, there are many places in the house where the monitor doesn't work.Also, if the electricity flashes off for a moment, the camera in the child's room shuts off. Then you get nothing until you turn it back on. My son sleeps lightly so I do NOT go in there. I keep an old audio monitor on all the time so I can switch to that when I need to. That old thing buzzes loudly and makes me unhappy that my video monitor turned off.So overall I think it's great. I just wish there was a way to make it stay on at both ends.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Chul Lee "3588"
Reviews.Content: i bought this itemI like this. This is Very good price & Very Good QualityMy wife also like this.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor set.
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: It works as it is described. Great image quality (including night vision). Great signal range, no bumping/interuptions. Lightweight. Well assembled. Ok sound (a little bit more volume would be a nice improvement).

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended!
Reviews.Author: Franter
Reviews.Content: I've tried this at my friend's home who just had her first baby 3 months ago and this unit was very easy to use. I have no regrets getting this. It doesn't cost a fortune. It delivers well in range, sound, and video. I was worried about messing up our wifi signal so I ran a few speed tests on my iphone to test the connection speed and it doesn't interfere at all.I highly recommend this monitor for parents who are $$ cautious.

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: just some guy
Reviews.Content: The screen is ok, not great.  We dont use the battery so i cant comment on that.  It is good for the price

Reviews.Title: Very nice product, and great value for the price.
Reviews.Author: HOOKS
Reviews.Content: The camera resolution is actually very good. I was surprised at how crisp the image was. Also, the range was a very important part of this item. I was concerned that it wouldn't work from my son's upstairs bedroom to our downstairs bedroom. There is no issue there either. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great selling price for a very good baby monitor!
Reviews.Author: Andrea Mancuso "Ondrey"
Reviews.Content: I'm a person that shops for the best product for value, and seemed the best as far as I could see from the reviews. It's priced just below $100 and for the money, you get a static free digital monitor that has good video and sound. It hasn't had any faults since October last year when we bought it. We have 2 cameras paired to our main unit and it gives me a peace of mind at night when I sleep. I would buy from Infant Optics again if we have another baby!

Reviews.Title: Disrupts wireless signal - don't buy!
Reviews.Author: S. Brown "s. brown"
Reviews.Content: Yes, this is a cheap monitor, but I don't have a problem with either the video or sound quality.  Night vision works fine.  My two issues are:1. There's no battery indicator to let you know how much battery life you've got left.  It just dies when it's out of battery.  Annoying and really stupid, actually.  Really ruins the portability of the monitor.2.  It operates on the same frequency as our wireless router and therefore disrupts our wireless signal.  My husband googled the problem and found a few different solutions (so try that if you're having this problem) - now, if we have the monitor on and are trying to use one of our devices (laptop, iPad, Roku box) we're mostly ok, but streaming video is still sort of spotty, and we have to keep turning the monitor off and on.  Before my husband googled, the signal would just go in and out, making it impossible to do anything online.Don't buy this monitor if you'd like to walk around with it or if you have any wireless devices in your house.  Spend some extra money.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Philip Thompson
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for our daughter and her husband for their first baby.  They really like it.  It works well.

Reviews.Title: Remember to take the cap off
Reviews.Author: Aaron Daniels
Reviews.Content: This is such a great camera. It doesn't pivot up and down, but it's easy to set up wherever you need it. I was having trouble figuring out why the night vision wasn't coming on, why I couldn't see my baby. Lol then I saw that it had a cap on it. The night vision works great. Definitely worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Poor image quality
Reviews.Author: Phil Johnson
Reviews.Content: We purchased this item after reading great reviews for it on Amazon. I hate to say it though, we have not been very happy with it. First the image quality is very poor, especially when it is dark. We were replacing a defective Summer monitor, but after using this one, we wish we would have purchased another Summer.My advice, spend a little more and get a better monitor!

Reviews.Title: amazing camera, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Craig Kirsner "www.OutstandingEBooks.com"
Reviews.Content: this camera works perfectly. I highly recommend it. The quality is great, and the screen is perfect. I really enjoy it.Craig

Reviews.Title: Affordable and just what we needed.
Reviews.Author: Busy Filmmaker
Reviews.Content: There's only one issue I really have with this and that is that it allegedly won't interfere with Wi-Fi. I found that to be mostly accurate.First the good and then the bad:The good is that this product is affordable at roughly $100, video and audio monitoring. We have a decent sized home and definitely needed a monitor to be able to keep an ear on our newborn even with him in an adjoining room. The added video capability -- while not absolutely necessary and somewhat of a novelty in my opinion -- is nice because it also allows you to see whether it was just a cough or whether your child is coughing and now awake. Are they hungry or do they just want their pacifier back.The night vision is alright and rendered in black and white.Now for the 'bad.'Does it interfere with Wi-Fi. yes and no.It won't completely eliminate wireless connectivity in your home. But in our home at least it did prevent us from streaming Netflix consistently and with high quality video through the AppleTV in our living room if the monitor was on.But, most of the time we're so tired after we have him in the crib anyway that we're not in the mood to stay up and do any instant streaming anyway.

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Gigaparents
Reviews.Content: I was patient enough to wait for my summer infant baby monitor to break down before buying a digital one. After hours of research I decided to give this infant optics one a shot, although I never heard of this brand name. I only buy products that are highly ranked on the category list, and this one was ranked number 1. After using this for 2 months, all I can say that this is really great! It's a rather basic monitor but it fits our bill. The image is very clear and the audio does not have static. The best thing still is that it is only $100. Rather than getting the addon camera to view our other 5 yr old boy, we are planning getting a seperate monitor so we can have 2 monitors viewing both screens at once, just as some reviewers suggested. Hope it will work out fine too.

Reviews.Title: Good unit!
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: We have 2 kids and we can't really call them 'babies' anymore, but we still would appreciate a monitor of this sort to keep an eye on them. We have an air purifier in our younger boy's room and we were worried that it might create a problem with the noise detection saving mode. We got it and we were very pleased it still went into shut off mode when it needed too.The range is excellent - the video still streams smoothly even when we take the monitor down to our basement.We also really like the interface of the unit - there is no complex menus to scroll through just to turn the volume down (like today's touch screen smartphones): the extra buttons on the side does that directly.Just like other reviewers, this is a bargain at this price. You won't be able to get a decent video monitor at a better price.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for with this video monitor...
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Calderon "phoenixbeth"
Reviews.Content: I think I’ll just break down my three-star review as a list of pros and cons.Pros:-The picture quality is decent, probably just what you'd expect from a night vision camera.-The microphone is sensitive enough to pick up most sounds from baby.-Set up is relatively easy.-The range of this monitor seems pretty consistent, and I don’t seem to lose the signal easily.Cons:-The volume doesn’t go high enough, so I have to supplement the sound with the crappy Sony (non-video) monitors I was hoping to replace with this.-The plastic outer casing seems to feel a bit flimsy, and the stand (which doubles as a belt clip) doesn’t click into place very effectively.-The monitor seems to interfere with our wireless network.-The battery life on the monitor isn’t very long. If you’re able to leave the unit plugged in, then you’re golden. But if you want to just use the battery, you really only have 30 to 60 minutes of battery life. So, again, I’m stuck using the audio-only Sony monitors to supplement the use of this video monitor.All-in-all, I think you get what you pay for with this monitor. This is the cheapest video monitor you can buy on Amazon, and it works well enough for what I paid. If I’d wanted a higher quality monitor, I suppose I would have paid more for another.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Aquelier
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful product and I'm satisfied for what it is. This is just a $100 monitor and I think you must set your expectations to this level. It does what it is advertised to do. Unfortunately it also lacks the remote moving camera which we hoped for, but could not justify double the money. Other than that, it's a good camera in all aspects.

Reviews.Title: If you are pairing more than one camera...
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: We loved our first Infant Optics video monitor so much that we decided to get a second one for our second child. The problem is the monitor only "wakes" on the last camera that was selected. I thought it would be engineered smart enough to detect which camera was producing noise above 60db and turn on with that camera selected. (By the way, if your kids sleep with any kind of white noise or fan, you may want to make sure it isn't louder than 60db or your monitor will never shut off. There are plenty of iPhone apps to help you measure decibels.)

Reviews.Title: Video function died, still a great buy (really!)
Reviews.Author: Professor C ""amazon user""
Reviews.Content: Overall I'd buy this again in a heartbeat even AFTER the video function suddenly died after 8 months of use. It's a fantastic buy for under $100. Simple to use with just three different settings. Not fragile since it survived a toddler in the house who insisted on using it as well. And the range is excellent as we've seen in our three level split home. We now use the voice/sound monitor part of it and randomly we'll see a picture from time to time. We still like this product. Sounds crazy but true!

Reviews.Title: Awesome monitor
Reviews.Author: Richard Stratton
Reviews.Content: This monitor for babies is a necessity - not a luxury! It gives a clear picture in realtime of what happens while you are away. It works well in night vision mode too. For $100 this is really worth it. We didn't feel that we needed to spend $200 on a better monitor with HD image and more features. This really is enough.

Reviews.Title: Skip it
Reviews.Author: Julie Lemay
Reviews.Content: If you buy it, make sure you take it out of the box immediately and use it for a few days (pre-baby) to make sure it works.  The company will only take it back for 30 days (and time flies once the baby arrives).I bought this a week before the baby was born, when I opened it 2 weeks later I realized all the problems that it had.  I used it for 5 days when the display started flipping and freezing.The frozen picture is really a problem because you think you are watching baby nap, but you only see the frozen picture.  Its scary to think you are watching baby sleep safely, only to find that baby has wiggled to a new place in the crib.  This has potential to be quite dangerous!I called the customer service/ tech support number and was hung up on repeatedly.  I left 3 messages over 3 weeks time and never got a return call.  I finally emailed and they said it was too late to return it for a full refund.  I got a partial refund (minus the cost for me to ship the unit back) and bought a different monitor.The audio is the only thing that worked consistently, $100 is a lot to spend for an audio only monitor.

Reviews.Title: Used for 2 months and it's broken
Reviews.Author: Brigham
Reviews.Content: I bought this back in August but didn't need to really use it until my daughter moved into her room in December.  Last week the sound gave out and slowly the monitor has been getting worse too.  I bought this because it was a stripped down version of all the other ones on the market.  It feels cheap and it looks cheap and it is..... I am going to try their customer service to see if they are helpful in replacing/refunding my money.  There is a year warrenty on it.  Let's see what that really covers.  I'll update this review if the service is at least helpful.UPDATE: never heard from anyone. Wasn't able to get it replaced or a refund.  Bought a Motorola one form Babies R Us and I'm so happy with it.  It was like $200 but worth the extra $$.  It stays charged (which this one NEVER DID) and it had great sound quality (but without hearing everything).  I am so sorry I bought this infant optics first...lesson learned... don't go for cheap on this.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: occasionalreader
Reviews.Content: One our second one because I broke the first and couldn't live without it. Down side is if it falls, it breaks. We've glued antenna on multiple times and my son got a hold of the camera part and bent it too far, the plastic snapped. It works great with awesome sound and picture... just not durable enough to be a toy or within kids reach.

Reviews.Title: Does the job...very simply
Reviews.Author: Josh m
Reviews.Content: This is the cheapest video monitor on the market, and if what you want is a basic video feed of your kid- that's what you get. It is a bit grainy, but you can certainly see. I have had to buy two replacement power adapters over the past year because they fray ($8.00 on amazon). No zoom, no two way talking, no color, but for 100 bucks you have a complete video unit.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, in use for over a year
Reviews.Author: R in AZ
Reviews.Content: We have used this monitor for over a year now and will be purchasing an additional monitor for the second baby. This monitor works great. Comes on automatically when there is noise and works great in the dark. Easy to setup and take with you.

Reviews.Title: This is all you need!
Reviews.Author: Justin Colgan
Reviews.Content: We started with a sound only Sony but had way too much static! I picked this up as it was a great deal and the reviews were fab! I'd have paid the 300 bucks for it if it wasn't on sale as it is magic! No static and good range! We tend to plug the receiver in most of the time and not rely on the battery unless in short check ups.  Word of warning though.... Your baby will look like something from Zombieland on the night vision camera but this is just because it works so well! This is the only monitor you'll ever need!

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR-5 2.4 GHz Digital Video Baby Monitor with Nightvision
Reviews.Author: lililani
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best purchases I've made.  The range is very good and the nightvision reception is excellent.  My granddaughter sleeps upstairs and the camera is downstairs in the kitchen, a good distance from crib.  Sound is excellent, can hear her cry clearly and picture is clear.  Would highly recommend this product if you are looking for a baby monitor.  Very glad I did.

Reviews.Title: Great Affordable Video Monitor
Reviews.Author: Teazb
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor for after looking at video monitors at our local department stores.  We couldn't be happoer with it.  The video quality is great. The VOX activation works great and is very sensitive - so no need to worry about not being alerted.  Battery life seems good also. We use the battery all day and plug it in at night.  We have not had any issues with battery life.  The stand makes positioning the camera pretty easy. The only downside we see is that the power cord could be a little longer.  Great buy!*****UPDATE 7/5/13*****After 7 or 8  months of use, we began to see a decline in the battery life. Our son takes two 1.5 hr(+/-) naps during the daytime and the monitor handles both of these naps.  But when we lay him down at night, the battery usually dies within the first hour or so.  It's not a huge deal at this point and probably would not keep us from buying this again.  We have used it every day for 9 months so we feel that we have gotten pretty good service out of it.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: msscynt
Reviews.Content: This monitor works well with distance.  I am able to move around while baby is sleeping peacefully.  I think it is a good deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Baby Shower Gift!
Reviews.Author: Colt Davis
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor for my sister who recently had a boy. She has told me it works awesome for them. Why spend hundreds more for the same thing!?

Reviews.Title: USE BEFORE REVIEWING!
Reviews.Author: Susan R.
Reviews.Content: We have had this monitor for about four months.  After some initial problems, we got it working ok.  But now, after using it for just a short while, it is starting to have multiple problems.  Since it is supposed to have a one year warranty, I contacted the company and their solution is that we pay to ship back the item to them and they claim that once they receive it, they will give me a credit on Amazon to re-purchase the item.  Having recently watched some friends of friends lose a baby to SIDS, being without a monitor is not an option.  Additionally, since the problems with the monitor are at no fault of my own, I am not inclined to waste my very little free time to package this up, mail it, be without it, all at my own expense (on the company's promise that they'll give me a credit on Amazon once they receive it back).  This is very, very poor customer service.  They should ship me a new monitor plus a mailing label to return the faulty item.PROS: 1) it is not expensive compared to other video monitors; 2) the video feature (including the night-vision), works fairly well; and 3) compared to our audio monitor that we discarded due to terrible sound interference, this monitor is fairly quiet and doesn't seem to get much interference.CONS: 1) the VOX feature (video-activation), stopped working; 2) the auto-mute function stopped working; 3) the battery life is TERRIBLE and does not last through the night (one great feature of our audio monitor), so the monitor has to be plugged in all night; 4) the monitor makes no noise when the battery dies so you can be unaware that the battery died and the monitor has turned off; 5) you cannot purchase an extra monitor in order to keep one upstairs and one downstairs if you live in a two-story house; 6) the camera has several lights on it so it can be bright and distracting for some babies.Basically, this is a one star item that gets a one star boost due to its price.  I suppose that I got what I paid for...

Reviews.Title: Keeps baby awake
Reviews.Author: Timothy Hammond
Reviews.Content: The night vision lights are in a circle around the camera. I have to hang around her room or in the hallway until shes fully asleep before I turn on the video monitor or else she'll lay in her bed staring at the red lights for 20 minutes.  And yeah, it's hard to figure out if the baby is asleep without a video monitor.  Would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Momof2
Reviews.Content: I rarely write reviews (I just don't have much time on my hands these days), but felt very compelled to respond here because this product is junk.  The video part works just fine, hence the 2 stars.  But, the sound on this is almost non-existance!!  I'm going to hook up my regular non-video monitor just so that I can hear my baby!!  Also, I had a similarly priced video monitor (from another manufacturer) when my son was a baby, and it had a zoom & pan feature.  I really miss those features and wish I would have stuck with that same brand.

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor at good price
Reviews.Author: Laurie Ousley
Reviews.Content: I bought this product to monitor my 8 month old baby during her sleep. It is our priority that we keep her under our 'eyes' at all times and we wanted an inexpensive solution that wouldn't hurt our wallet too bad - as any parent would know a child burns cash very quickly. I'm very happy with this baby monitor. At the highest volume setting we can hear her moving under the blankets. The VOX mode has a 1 second delay and we prefer it off. During the day, the video provides a nice clean screen with vivid colors, but once it gets dark the night vision turns on and it goes into black and white. The monitor does not interfere with our wifi connection on our phones, tablets or computers. It's worth every penny. I'm also glad to find that even with a budget monitor the customer service has been very helpful when we had trouble with setting it up.

Reviews.Title: No zoom
Reviews.Author: Great Wall
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.ProIt worksConyou can not see baby face clearly.Poor audio monitor (compares to Vtech)Frame looks cheap quality. ( compares to Motorola ) I used Motorola before, it was broken when it dropped from night stand to hardwood floor once. ( My iphone dropped couple of times, still working).  For Motorola , i can remotely zoom to see his eyes open or close,  remotely turn camera angle, and some more features eg temperature. Infant optics can not do.  I d rather pay more for Motorola .

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Fatima Anwar ALJowder
Reviews.Content: I really like this product it almost two months now since I bought it I was afraid when I read the negative comment but I didn't face any problem with it

Reviews.Title: excelente producto
Reviews.Author: jonathan gonzalez
Reviews.Content: es producto esta en optimas condiciones y muy practico y seguro lo recomiendo al  100% le recomiendo este producto a cualquier persona que tenga un bb o este esperando uno

Reviews.Title: Fritzy and unreliable.....sadly....we love it otherwise
Reviews.Author: Angela Ginsburg "chefangela"
Reviews.Content: We LOVED this monitor for 6 months while it worked... It does all the basics just as well as the $300.00 monitors and was perfect for our small home.  After about 4 months, it started turning off randomly, loosing the signal, video, sound or all three.  If there is one thing you want to be reliable, it's your monitor.  Obviously some of them are made well than others since hundreds of folks are doing fine with theirs.  I am tempted just to buy another one, but I am not gonna risk it.  The only complaint we had about it while it was working was that the screen is INSANELY bright in the night.  We just covered it with a little wash cloth, no big deal but you'd think they would have caught that one in the testing phase....  This is one of the bummers of buying on Amazon - the return window was only 6 weeks long so now we just gotta buy a new one.

Reviews.Title: Back to basic
Reviews.Author: Lazy Larry
Reviews.Content: After a ton of research I had to get this because of the #1 best selling ranking and the good reviews. For what we use it for and what we paid for this machine, this is great. It doesn't have 2 way talk, temperature sensor, pan and tilt... and this list goes on, BUT this is a basic monitor with the reliability we needed since July 2012. The only thing I do not like about it is the color - and it doesn't come in anything else but blue. If you want something for your baby girl (like we do), you have no choice but the blue. We also bought 2 chargers for the handheld unit set and it works well with 2 extra docking stations that I've setup in the living room and kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as our other monitor
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: An okay monitor, but does have static at all times. Also plastic is cheap. We have a Mobi for our other child and it is ten times better, with no static and better materials.  The picture on this is fine in day and night. It's easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: 2Laura2
Reviews.Content: I choose to buy this monitor out of the many that are out there based on the value of what you pay for. We do not earn alot so every dollar counts. This monitor fits our bill perfectly. It has everything we need from a monitor and gives us the peace of mind while we sleep. I will be convincing my husband to save up for our additional camera set for our upcoming baby!

Reviews.Title: Camara
Reviews.Author: Luis Guillermo Myerston G.
Reviews.Content: Esta marca Infant Optics, ofrece calidad a muy bajo costo.El modelo es bonito, y la calidad del video en tiempo real es asombroso.Lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Great product! It's like you're there
Reviews.Author: Manuel Jara
Reviews.Content: We've been using this product for over 2 weeks now. It's fantastic, You can "look" at your baby and listen to him/her. The night vision camera has a very good quality images.Can't complain at all

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Kori
Reviews.Content: This monitor works great! Its the best bang for the buck. The night vision is very clear and sound is great. I ordered a 2nd one for our vacation home. 2 monitors for less $$ than one of the competitors!

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Andi P.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this based on Amazon reviews and the great price. I am a grandmother who wants to be able to enjoy the parents of these little ones in the evenings and still keep an eye on the boy who is in a 'big boy bed' upstairs. I was amazed to see the clarity of the picture in the pitch dark.  Easy set up and directions. If I had not read that some people forgot to take the sticker off the lens, I would have done the same thing....the sticker is black and does not show up well, It is UNDER the 'Remove' sticker. I put it high in the room where he never saw it and the range of motion of the camera made it easy to point towards him. I plan to use it mostly at our summer cottage so parents can go to the dock and watch their sleeping ones and not have to stay inside. I can't imagine that the much higher priced ones could work better.

Reviews.Title: Should cost $25
Reviews.Author: Stephen S
Reviews.Content: Not a fan of this monitor at all. We have a Summer video monitor for our 1st child and decided to save some money for our second child. This was a waste of $100. It's virtually impossible to hear anything unless the child is making noise - if it's on the "Vox" setting, meaning it goes into a hibernation mode after 5 minutes, it shuts down unless it picks up a noise of 65decibals or more. What we were looking for is something where we can hear our baby and periodically peek in on them. This device serves more as an alarm, if your child makes a loud noise then the system turns on and you can hear and see them. Kind of defeats the purpose of a video monitor.If you turn it off the Vox mode, the screen is lit up and does not turn off. In that setting I still can't hear anything, even if my wife goes into the room and whispers. The lit up screen stinks if you're trying to sleep. I've got flashlights that aren't as bright.I wasn't expecting anything huge with this purchase, as I was shopping on price. I've got to think spending the extra 75 bucks is worth it. I would definitely steer clear of this if your child is under 1 year old, as it takes SMS serious noise and serious movement to see it on the monitor and hear any noise.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!!
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: We are really happy with this product, excellent for the price and very useful. Now baby care is more comfortable and secure!!

Reviews.Title: Simply awesome!!
Reviews.Author: millana
Reviews.Content: We love love this product! In fact we already bought 2! I had a problem on the charger on both unit but when I emailed infant optics regarding the issue, they immediately acted on it and replaced my charger.

Reviews.Title: great with fixing it
Reviews.Author: laura
Reviews.Content: So, the thing that is awesome about the product is that if anything breaks they send you replacement piece free of charge.  No questions asked--and in a timely fashion.  Great reception and picture.  No static!

Reviews.Title: pretty good for the money
Reviews.Author: skysmom
Reviews.Content: The product is priced well below competitors. It may not have all the bells and whistles. For a basic baby cam, it does the job. The battery contacts may come in and out so that the unit may appear to stop working without being plugged in. A quick inquiry to Amazon for assistance pointed me to the manuf., Infant Optics, who quickly responded. And resolved the issue. The battery needs to be removed and slid back into place, rather than being pushed back in or snapped back into place. The contacts are sensitive like that. Now I can travel with it around the house without constantly dragging around a plug and cord. No extra static that disrupts my sleep. Screen is ok for clarity but it's enough for me to know whether my toddler has left the bed or remains asleep. Good buy!Follow up review 9 mos later. Monitor still works very well. Whenever there was an issue, the company is extremely responsive and helpful. I would buy this product again - esp for the price and basic function. I would also recommend this product to friends.Another great thing about this product is the customer service offered by the company. They are prompt with questions about technical issues and always courteous and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Broadcast to Laptop or Internet?
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Just received this and it seems great.Does anyone know of anyway to hack or modify this to be able to view the stream on a laptop?  Or even via the internet?

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL! A lifesaver.
Reviews.Author: Cara Anderson
Reviews.Content: Great price, works wonderfully. A must-have for new parents. It's surprisingly durable, easy to use, and does exactly what it's supposed to.

Reviews.Title: wonderful...EXCEPT
Reviews.Author: soctrees
Reviews.Content: Love everything about this monitor, the image is clear, the sound is great, and it has great range. There is one major flaw however, which caused a lot of turmoil one night. When the battery dies, there its no sound, the system simply turns off. Therefore, when I forgot to plug it in one night, my baby suffered as i did not hear him when he cried. I do not feel this is a reason not to purchase the monitor, but i do believe it is something any parent who purchases this monitor should think about.

Reviews.Title: Don't Waste Your Time
Reviews.Author: JH
Reviews.Content: Pretty decent reviews when I ordered the monitor.  The camera display is good...but after 30 minutes, the screen and audio stopped working.  Definitely didn't give us the peace of mind we were looking for when purchasing the monitor.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Nana
Reviews.Content: This product reach my expetations. This cost-benefits avaluation is very good. A good image, sound and wireless signal. It is not a tv, but do his job. I didn't have problem with the vox function.

Reviews.Title: very clear night vision
Reviews.Author: Alexisss
Reviews.Content: This thing sees everything within 8 feet in complete darkness. although the video is not in HD, it gives a good enough picture to see all the small details like baby breathing, if her eyes are open or closed

Reviews.Title: Buy 2 seperate ones if you plan on the add-on camera unit
Reviews.Author: Roddy Junior
Reviews.Content: We got 2 of these monitors and worth the money. We were planning on getting the additional add-on camera unit but worked out it was just another 20 dollars to buy two seperate sets so that we can continuously view both screens at the same time without switching back and forth. Work it out yourself and you'll understand what I mean!They do not interfere with each other even when placed in the same room (both the cameras and the monitors).

Reviews.Title: The DXR5 monitor
Reviews.Author: Vallas Danielle
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a simple monitor that didn't have too many features so that it would come at a lower price. This was it! I'm glad to find at this price, it still has VOX power saving and also automute mode. The night vision turns on and off by itself and the video and audio is good what a $100 monitor. It would have been perfect for us if it came in a different color.

Reviews.Title: Kinda get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: Brian Thomer
Reviews.Content: The fact that this product is "only" $100 should say something, not that that's cheap, but whatever.The sound quality is awful, even at the highest volume, it's not that loud, and it sounds muffled.  It's a good thing we're not heavy sleepers.  Also, the battery life on the parent unit is HORRIBLE!  The battery, even when VOX mode is turned on (battery saving mode), doesn't last more than just a few hours unplugged.  When the battery is about to die, it doesn't make a sound, it just turns off.  Also, if you bump into the lens, it moves very easily, so you'll have to readjust to get the same view you had prior to bumping into it.The pro to this is that the video quality is pretty good, and it flips between day mode and night vision on its own, but that's about it (which is the only reason we gave it 3 stars).

Reviews.Title: Most Amazing Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Kristin Orozco
Reviews.Content: First of all, this is an excellent monitor for the price. I really couldn't ask it to perform any better. The thing that completely sold me was how I was treated by their customer service dept. The monitor had fallen off the crib (our fault) and it broke in half. I called the company looking for a way to possibly get it repaired. An answering service took down my name, phone number, and e-mail address. Within hours I had an e-mail informing me to go ahead and send the monitor back and they would replace it for FREE! They would even ship it out before receiving the broken one with just a photo of the return shipping label/box. So for just the cost of return shipping, they gave me a brand new monitor even though it was our fault that it broke in the first place. You don't see many companies like that anymore. This time we are going to be more careful and mount the monitor with screws. You can't go wrong with this baby monitor!

Reviews.Title: Planning on a double setup
Reviews.Author: Mary R'well
Reviews.Content: I've used this for 2 weeks now and I was recommended by a friend who has 2 of these! I decided to try one out first just to make sure it works at my home without having range issues or internet interference.It has worked well so far and I'm going to buy one more so I can have 2 sets side by side, just like my friend's house!

Reviews.Title: Great video
Reviews.Author: Daddy Kev
Reviews.Content: Best one to choose if you are running on a budget. It's affordable yet provides really smooth frame rates without any lag. Picture quality is just as good as a $200 monitor.The viewing angle is not very wide so I have to position the camera quite far away from the crib. Yet the night vision still picks up everything very clearly.

Reviews.Title: Love this product!
Reviews.Author: Holylotus
Reviews.Content: Bought this product a week and i absolutely love it.1. The price is unbeatable for the quality.2. the simplicity of this product is what makes it worth buying.3. The setup is very simple.4. The night time camera works so nicely. The clarity is extremely good, the monitor  can be left on the whole night. It shuts off automatically when no noise is detected. switches on when even during the slightest baby noise.5. the clarity is good enough.6.the audio works perfectly as well.overall a simple yet functional product for great price!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome, just missing some basic features.
Reviews.Author: William C Phillips
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome monitor. It has awesome range and battery life. It runs at the 2.4ghz the same as my last monitor, however there doesn't seem to be any issues with it interfering with my wife. There is no two way speakers system which I should have noticed reading the product description, not a big deal but worth knowing before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without this now
Reviews.Author: Anol
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful little monitor to have if you want to always keep an eye on your little one! We've had this since christmas and it's been very helpful to us. It saves me worry about my baby girl who is not sleeping right next to me. We always wished for an IP camera but this works perfectly and it doesn't hinder me from using my cell. The construction quality is not exactly great but it works and that's all I care!

Reviews.Title: no problems so far
Reviews.Author: Timcon "Timmy"
Reviews.Content: We've had this monitor for 9 months and haven't had any problems with it. I wasn't expecting a $100 monitor to be too reliable. It has gone through many falls and abuses but it hasn't given up. Audio could be better but for what we use it for, it does the job well enough.

Reviews.Title: Good and Affordable
Reviews.Author: Jason Mahn
Reviews.Content: Being a first time father, I am very careful in choosing any products for my baby. I researched every video monitor out there and figured out this was the best from the reviews and also the #1 best selling in the amazon baby monitor category. It's got incredible video quality and range and the interface is straightforward & simple, making it easy for my wife to use. A sweet monitor at a great price.

Reviews.Title: No very happy
Reviews.Author: SLC twins
Reviews.Content: I thought I was getting a huge deal on this monitor when I bought it.  Marked down from $299 to $99.  Little did I know that I like my old ghetto black and white Summer Infant baby monitor way better!  Here are my problems:  1.  It loses signal all the time.  I can't have it close to my tv or it buzzes at me  2.  It says it's color, but i rarely see vibrant color on the screen.  You also have to look at the screen from a certain angle, or it just looks black  3.  The battery doesn't seem to last long at all so I'm always having to leave it plugged in  4.  The monitor is  TINY  5.  The cord from the camera is so short.  My other one reaches clear up to the ceiling and still has room to pull it along the ceiling and then down to a plug.  The warnings on this product say that you should keep it out of reach from your child but you would have to use an extension cord to do this.  I have mine about 3/4 up the wall with a plug directly below it.  It doesn't even show me the whole crib.  5.  It doesn't have the red lights on the monitor that light up when the baby cries, if you want to have the noise shut offThe Pro?  Voice cancellation.  Oh yeah, and it's more compact than my old one, but the screen is still TOO smallFor now, I'll stick to my old one.  This might be worth under $100 but you are not getting a deal.  I would never pay $299 for this thing!

Reviews.Title: Decent baby monitor
Reviews.Author: CrowelCait
Reviews.Content: We have owned 2 summer infant monitors. One was analog, and the other was digital but both didn't have reception when we moved the monitor upstairs.This one has picks up signal on all floors and has better picture quality.It's a good monitor.

Reviews.Title: Not a good choice
Reviews.Author: A.J.
Reviews.Content: I've been using this baby monitor for about a year now and have not been happy with my purchase. I was trying to get a decent monitor at an afforable price. After trial and error I've learned that it's worth spending more money in order to get a quality monitor. I don't like the way the Infant Optics monitor screen contantly cuts off, due to inactivity or a low battery warning. It seems like I am always charging the monitor and the battery life is extremely short. The range is not great either. If there is no sound or movement in the room the screen cuts off, which is annoying in my opinion... It has a bit of a delay so it won't come back on right away. I am in the process of returning this item now.

Reviews.Title: Very reliable so far
Reviews.Author: Russell
Reviews.Content: We bought this in March 2012 and it has been working well ever since. Although it doesn't look like it's built from the strongest plastic parts but it has proved to be very reliable and sturdy. I'm very happy I made this purchase and I think this is a monitor that is worth more than $100.

Reviews.Title: interferes with wireless router; no 2 way mic
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: could be a good product, but it interferes with wireless route so no internet once baby is asleep ... that sucks.also, there is no 2 way mic and speaker providing ability to speak to child from other room.

Reviews.Title: Fits our bill
Reviews.Author: DRITRAN
Reviews.Content: This monitor came in quickly in 2 days and we love it.The VOX and automute is quite a hassle so we keep them turned off.The night vision and range is exceptional compared the baby monitors I've owned. I'm also impressed by the video smoothness on this unit.Good buy overall.

Reviews.Title: Pretty pleased!
Reviews.Author: cb
Reviews.Content: I wanted a video monitor but I didn't want to spend a ton of money so I picked this one.I am very happy with the monitor!Pro:I haven't had any issues with signal in our 3,500 sq ft house. It has a powersave option that will turn off if nothing is happening or you can keep the video on and the volume will turn off if nothing is happening.Con:Not the best quality image, but I personally dont need to see my baby in HD to know he's awake so it doesnt bother me! I also wish there was an easier way to hook it to the crib, but with a little creativity that's not an issue

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Jody Arora
Reviews.Content: This monitor is very basic and simple but it works as advertised. For $100 this is good value and I can finally enjoy sleeping peaceful at night. Best thing about this monitor is the night vision - it shows everything visible within 5 feet of the camera!We are also very glad to report we did not have any problems or interference with of internet signals in our house.

Reviews.Title: Awesome video monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: NYC New Mama
Reviews.Content: I'd used a Summer while nannying, but decided when expecting our first child that I couldn't pass up this deal. I've not been disappointed. This is a fabulous video monitor for everyday use. The video quality is good, the battery life is good, and the settings include auto volume functions that are great for nighttime. Best of all you can literally open it, plug it in, and start using it - it's a snap. The only thing keeping this review from five stars is that sometimes the signal blips in our 800-sq-ft NYC apartment. It's only for a second or two, but it does wake us up on occasion. That's a very minor issue definitely outweighed by the many positives.

Reviews.Title: Good Output Quality
Reviews.Author: NG
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor for my daughter who has two young sons (16 & 2 mos).  The instruction booklet was easy reading and the monitor/camera were very simple to charge and set up.  The imaging (day/night) and sound are clear.  No interference or static has been noted. The monitor stand is a little flimsy as is the plastic casing on both (monitor/camera) but the quality output is acceptable for the pricing.  The camera does not pan in, but it comes with a stand or screws for wall mounting.  As compared to other overly expensive monitors that are presently out on the market, this one works very well.

Reviews.Title: babies
Reviews.Author: alaska
Reviews.Content: I sent this as a gift and the parents simply love it. It arrived as new and unlike the others I've bought in the past, they can see the babies as well as hear them.

Reviews.Title: good range, good video
Reviews.Author: Muao9
Reviews.Content: this monitor is a good baby monitor, but it isn't the best. It lacks the features that more expensive models offer such as two way talk, remote panning, thermometer... but given it is one of the most affordable monitor in the digital 2.4GHZ category, it gives us what we want. We live in a 2000ft house and we haven't found a spot that doesn't have signal.

Reviews.Title: so - so
Reviews.Author: Shack
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.  I bought this for our second child  (in a second room).  I already have a Summer $200+ video monitor which was great for about a year then it started getting sooo much interference that we can't have the volume turned up or it will wake us.  The Infant Optics is much lighter than other monitors (and feels kinda cheapish) ... the resolution on the monitor is fair at best and sound is very tinney sounding.  I might need to look in the instructions again; because ours stays on all night (motion and volume activated???).  for $100 it ain't that bad.

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: Grapeseed
Reviews.Content: This is a great product! Although it doesn't look very durable, it has been with us since Jan 2012 until now and it hasn't had any problems whatsoever. I was deciding between this monitor VS the motorola with pan/tilt but couldn't justify to pay more than double the money just to get that feature... I have no regrets because this monitor is capable of viewing the whole crib by placing 4 feet away.

Reviews.Title: Best gift received!
Reviews.Author: R. Wall
Reviews.Content: I received this as our christmas present 3 weeks ago and we love it! We've had 2 video monitors before and we were always left with dissapointment. Now that we finally got something that WORKS properly we are very happy. Despite the lack of a signal strength indicator, this monitor does not drop signal. The system is very straight forward. You don't even need to read the manual to learn how to use this. It's got a few buttons and its self explanatory. The audio is not the best - falling just shy in quality to our summer infant video monitor that we had (and broke).This is a very solid piece of equipment for parents out there, and if you want something basic and easy to use, this is a great item to get.

Reviews.Title: Everything we wanted in a video monitor
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: This monitor comes at a great price and gives us what we wanted from a baby monitor. We wanted one of these sweet cameras so we can watch our 6-month old girl sleep in her crib. I tried to setup a foscam IP camera but it was too much for my wife to handle. So we turned to the conventional video monitors and ended up buying this based on good reviews and #1 sales ranking.This is really good. It's got great night vision even when the room is completely dark. The sound is sensitive enough to pick up her turning around under the blanket. To achieve this we had to put the camera relatively close to the crib while keeping it out of reach from her for safety concerns.It's a very simple system and it doesn't have too many functions. It comes with an automute and a auto-turn off mode when it's quiet for certain period of time, but I don't like it therefore I keep everything in its rawest form.Overall this is a great purchase and I would recommend this to you if you want an affordable system that is simple and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: E. Harm
Reviews.Content: This lasted 10 months before it completely crapped out. It worked well before then and i really liked the auto shut-off feature. But...it means nothing if the thing doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup, Easy to use, Great for its price!
Reviews.Author: Zen
