Reviews.Content: We bought this after doing some research; we wanted something simple, something that works and not difficult to install. This fits the bill! After it arrives, we didn't need to read the instructions and was able to set it up quite easily.Since installing it, it frees us up to be around our baby without much worry; we can see & hear him clearly. No regret buying this.

Reviews.Title: great monitor
Reviews.Author: twinmommy123
Reviews.Content: I recommend this affordable video monitor to anyone! It has great video quality and it is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Greee
Reviews.Content: I love how easy and simple this monitor is to use. Had a try at internet IP cameras (that works on my android) but the setup and operations was far beyond my technical ability.This monitor has only the basic features that you will need in a video monitor. It has good visual and sound quality. If you do not want to spend alot of money on a monitor but still want something that does the job, this one is for you.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Nate Willrett
Reviews.Content: Purchased item due to strong reviews and good price. Worked good for 1 year, then monitor images became very grainy and impossible to see our child. It then stopped holding a charge. Called infant optics, and because we purchased over 12 months ago, they don't cover anything, not even a new power cord. A company that does not stand behind their product, is a company I will not stand behind and ever buy from again.

Reviews.Title: Best monitor for price
Reviews.Author: Matt Cheresnowsky "Matty"
Reviews.Content: This monitor is the best when it comes to value. For a hundred bucks you get a full color digital monitor that has good video and range that also has night vision.I won't repeat what it does from the description, but all I can say it does all that it advertises.i can even a steady picture and sound in our rooftop, backyard and at our front gate. This monitor really is something!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Aleixo
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product:- Easy working,- Infrared,- Good images,- Good sound.Negative: Only the battery isn't good.

Reviews.Title: generally ok
Reviews.Author: Stella Aguilar
Reviews.Content: was expecting more range because we just stay in the other room and the signal gets lost. was expecting more quality for the price though.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't last
Reviews.Author: D.G.
Reviews.Content: I don't mind the cheap plastic feel, and the functionality was what I was looking for. I initially liked the light weight and the maneuverable camera. Great unit... for a couple months. That's when it all fell apart. The screen would randomly shut on and off. The battery would not hold a charge, requiring the unit to be plugged in at all times. Then the ability for the monitor to get a signal from the camera deteriorated to the point that a loud beeping with the words "warning: no signal coverage" would occur throughout the night, even though our bedroom is right next to our daughter's.After a full week of having this monitor function mostly as an alarm clock randomly going off in the middle of the night, we were so fed up we just threw it out, 3 months into owning it. $100 down the drain. Motorola, here we come.

Reviews.Title: Nearly perfect!
Reviews.Author: happy baker
Reviews.Content: I must say I really love this monitor but it does have one flaw. This monitor does not have two way talk.The audio and video is great and I never lost reception (unless I switch off the camera unit).The price is unbelievable for a nice digital video monitor with night vision- not much more than a top-of-the-line audio monitor.Would give it 5 stars if they came up with the same monitor with two way talk.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Eddie Broman
Reviews.Content: Got this as a gift and we use this to replace our vtech sound monitor. It's such a luxury to have video now! We can see in the dark as well... we are very impressed.The audio is not as loud as our vtech but the range is much better. It sometimes drops signal when we bring it down to our basement that is shielded by a thick concrete flooring. In the house the signal is perfect.The batteries don't last all that long so we are planning to get 2 more power cords so we can charge it in our kitchen and living room too.Dispite all this, this is an excellent monitor and works well for what we need it for.

Reviews.Title: Seems good at first, but BREAKS QUICKLY
Reviews.Author: mattaca
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor in April and by September we were having problems and had to get a new one from Infant Optics. Customer service was quick to honor the warranty, but we were without a monitor for about 10 days while we waited for the new one to arrive. It is now January and the new monitor will not hold a charge or stay on, even when plugged in. Time for another exchange! I have ZERO confidence that the third one they send us will last much longer. My only hope is that it will go OUT before April so we can get a fourth monitor to squeeze a few extra months out of our purchase.Don't fall for the $300 retail price figure. This was always meant to be a $100 baby monitor, and it works like one. Spend the extra $50-100 and get a monitor that will last you more than four months!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Courtney Young "cyoung"
Reviews.Content: Loved this product!  Haven't used it as much yet since the baby isn't in his nursery full time yet, but when I have used it, it's been wonderful!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Justin Hapka
Reviews.Content: So far from what I've tested of this...it works great. No interference with wireless that I've noted.  My baby will be born in two weeks so I will be able to really test it then.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Audio Quality
Reviews.Author: DClark12
Reviews.Content: I bought this product based on the affordable price and the glowing reviews.  However, very few people mentioned audio quality, and that is what makes this product a terrible purchase!  I just received this product today, and I am already returning it.  The audio quality is worse than that of a pair of $30 kid's walkie-talkies.  All sounds are distorted and tinny, including crying, speaking, and even music.  The metallic quality is very high pitched and reminds me of nails on a chalkboard.  The audio also has a ton of white noise and static.  Video quality is about that of a web cam, but was decent enough for the price.  It does not have a zoom feature and the quality is not high enough to display small details, especially on night vision. However, audio monitors have been around for a couple decades now; this technology is not new.  To include such a poor quality speaker and/or microphone must be where this company makes up for the price of the video technology included.Overall,Pros:-Affordable price-Easy to set-up, took 5 minutesCons:-Terrible sound quality-Low video qualities - definitely will not be able to see small details with the night vision, like did your kid just hiccup or throw up all over themselves?I would definitely not recommend this product.***UPDATE***I did contact Infant Optics about the terrible speaker.  My email was returned with 24 hours, which was very nice.  They offered to replace the set for me, at no cost, which was also very nice.  However, if the new set had the same audio problems, I still wanted to be able to return it to Amazon.  I couldn't guarantee they would send me the same packaging, styling, etc. as what Amazon sells.  So I just returned it to Amazon, rather than risk it.  I still think their product is not up to the five star rating, but I will give customer service 5 stars though. I will be purchasing a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Best one so far
Reviews.Author: marlene
Reviews.Content: We have had 2 video monitors these few years and our mischievous sons managed to destroy them. We received this one as our christmas gift from their grandparents and this has been excellent so far.Video quality is amazing and the range is very good compared to our other monitors.It lacks a temperature display for we got a seperate remote thermometer. Other than that, this monitor meets all our requirements.

Reviews.Title: Good Monitor
Reviews.Author: Johnash
Reviews.Content: We got this one used for our first baby monitor. It works great. Love the night vision. Sometimes the background behind the baby can be fuzzy or mild flashing but mostly can see the baby great. It is sensitive to any "noise" or fuss the baby makes. I'm a nervous new parent -- I wish I could actually hear the baby breathe, but I can't. I can see the baby's chest going up and down as she breathes so that's good. Works well, especially impressed since we bought it used.

Reviews.Title: Interesting Design with some good and some poor elements - cannot complain much for the price though.
Reviews.Author: ASR
Reviews.Content: It works but in our apartment with cement walls, range is not that great.The good I like how the camera position is easily adjustable, it was relatively easy to setup.Cons - interferes with my WiFi and more importantly, things like VOX (voice activated monitor) have a funny interface by pressing combinations of buttons rather than being menu driven.I think it's a decent value for the money.

Reviews.Title: We just loev this camera . Totally worth the money
Reviews.Author: ARCHU
Reviews.Content: Even in the dark , video quality is good. Wish the volume is little better.  Should have took this monitor long time ago.

Reviews.Title: great product and price!
Reviews.Author: jamie
Reviews.Content: I was nervous about the quality of this monitor BC of the price, but I've had it for 1 year now and it works great. No complaints. Love that it its voice activated, and the night vision is so clear.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jacquie
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews I took the plunge and bought this monitor.  It was so easy to set up and has great  sound and picture quality.  I highly recommend this and the price is very reasonable too.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Nora
Reviews.Content: This purchase was a great buy. For only $100 we got a very reliable monitor that gives us clear picture, good battery life and excellent night vision. The power saving function is too complicated so we never use it. If you have it plugged into the charger you won't need to use this since it only saves your battery when not plugged in. Overall, this monitor is worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Happy with this choice
Reviews.Author: Prem1979
Reviews.Content: Both of us are very happy with getting this baby monitor. We have two kids so we wanted something quite affordable needing the extra camera unit that costs quite a bit compared to the starter set. I shopped on for good deals on the internet but this seemed to be the best for value afterall, even without any coupon codes. The range is superb on this monitor, working all the way past our frontgate and still picking up reception when both cameras are placed up on the 2nd floor. I'm also very pleased with video quality of this monitor. Although it feels a bit flimsy, our son has thrown it with all his force on our marble flooring and it still works perfectly fine!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful monitor!
Reviews.Author: DiQ
Reviews.Content: This is the best baby monitor we've had so far! We can finally get signal all around the home without any black spots. This is perfect for us. I love how light the monitor is compared to our older generation black/white baby monitor that's big, bulky and heavy.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Agent Orion
Reviews.Content: Can't say that its been used too much at this point, but we've set it up and did plenty of testing.  Feels lightweight yet regid.  We have it mounted on the wall above the crib and can perfectly see the whole crib both day and night.  The audio works well too!I love tech gear and was thinking of just getting a good ip camera and networking it so i can access day/night in or out of house... but having a stand-alone unit is easier for family/friends/sitters to use.

Reviews.Title: great monitor
Reviews.Author: karenqd
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister  in law who is deaf,  My brother says it's great, it even works great in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Works well for one camera, doesn't work for monitoring multiple rooms
Reviews.Author: Aaron  Lee
Reviews.Content: If you only need this for one camera, it works well and a great value.  I bought it because it is expandable to add additional cameras.  It was not clear however that you have to manually toggle between the cameras.  So if you're goal is monitoring multiple rooms simultaniously, this will not work.

Reviews.Title: Smooth video finally
Reviews.Author: Razz Shops
Reviews.Content: The video on the monitor is excellent. I had a summer infant I bought from target and the video was very slow and choppy. This is smooth and very fluid. Night vision is much better on this camera too. All of this for half of the price for what I paid for my summer infant. This is a well done product!

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price.
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: Overall, this video monitor is great! It's easy to use and works well for us. The picture is pretty clear and the night vision works great.The only downfall is that it totally takes down my 2.4 GHz wireless internet. Luckily, most of my devices support 5 GHz. But for the devices that only work on the 2.4 GHz frequency, they're down while the monitor is on.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic monitor
Reviews.Author: Himotales
Reviews.Content: I got this as our baby boy's xmas present and we love this monitor. I would really call it a xmas present for us rather than our son because it lets us get on with our own daily work without needing to worry about him napping/sleeping upstairs.It's very easy to use and we have never experienced any problems with it.The video resolution is good, and sound is clear.I wish that it had the remote control feature where I could look around but this gets the job done and I'm happy with our unit.

Reviews.Title: baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use baby monitor.  The screen is big enough to view our little one.  We can adjust the sound and the brightness of the picture.  If you wish you can set it so that it will turn off automatically if your child is quiet and not moving around.  I personally keep my monitor on while our child is in his bed.

Reviews.Title: Nice baby monitor
Reviews.Author: ViTimin
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this baby monitor if you want something that doesn't interfere with your home wifi and good video quality. It works wonderfully and helps first time parents so much. We are planning on getting an additional camera to pair this up to transform this into a 2 camera system.

Reviews.Title: Please don't trust this unit!
Reviews.Author: RGillund
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit with high hopes.  I did a lot of looking and research and thought this was a reasonable choice.  Since I have had the unit it has gone through three power supplies.  The company will send out a new supply but they are located in California while I am on the East coast, so it takes a few days to get somebody from the company to talk to you, then a couple of days for them to ship the item, then a week or so traveling through the mail.  So for almost two weeks you are stuck without the unit and not able to use it!  This has happened three times now.  I thought I was being smart and actually purchased a back up power supply for the next time.  Well the next time happened last night, so I plugged in my back up supply and it doesn't work.  So now I'm thinking maybe this time it's the unit itself that has stopped working.  Unless I got a bad power supply when I ordered the back up.  I guess I should have checked it out and not assumed anything.  So now I'm waiting for them to call me back and start this entire process over again but in the meantime I don't have a working monitor for my daughter.  I would look at another company.  I know as soon as I can afford to buy another one I will be moving on to one of the other ones.

Reviews.Title: defective
Reviews.Author: jamaica girl
Reviews.Content: defective?? monitor worked when plugged in but as soon as it was off charger to use for other parts of the house it wouldnt work at all and you cant manually move camera from monitor when you are out of the room or if toddler gets moving around room or moves positions in bed.you have to have camera and image exactly where you want it first!  :( dissapointed

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: Diane Dee Dee
Reviews.Content: This product exceeded our expectations from a $100 video monitor. It has excellent range and video/audio quality. We are very happy that we saved on our wallet while getting something of good quality. I would not hesitate to buy another for friends or family who needs something like this.

Reviews.Title: Great option for the price
Reviews.Author: PuddlethePoodle
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor meets all the basic needs of new parents who want to give the baby quiet time to sleep without interruptions but also want to maintain knowledge of what's going on without having to enter the room. The camera does need to be hooked up to an power source so that limits where you can place the camera but the night and day vision quality is good. Although the view monitor is small, it does its job and isn't too bulky to be carried around on your hip. It is on the lighter side which instantly makes you feel like the quality isn't that great, but it does its job.If you're looking for some guidance on what you should buy for your baby registry (vs. what you can live without), visit AllMomsArePerfect.com and look under "preparing for baby." It's got tons of down to earth advice for those that like to be prepared when baby comes but don't want to do all the research on every single baby product.

Reviews.Title: Video looked great under any light conditions, but sound just not loud enough
Reviews.Author: Matthew J. Rainey
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately returning this monitor as the sound (at the loudest setting) is just not loud enough to hear breathing/subtle movements that may indicate an issue for child with special needs.

Reviews.Title: Happy again!
Reviews.Author: Cat
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: 10/31/13:  I forgot to come back and update- shortly after exchanging emails with the company in May I received a new receiver at no charge and have been very happy with the product ever since!EDIT again 5/15/13:I have now received a courteous reply from the company by email with instructions on how to exchange the unit.  I'll update again when the exchange is completed.EDIT as of 5/15/13:We were happy with this monitor and would recommend it until the receiver fell from a high surface and the antenna snapped off.  I called customer service to find out if it could be repaired or if I could get a replacement (I was willing to buy one) more than two weeks ago- no response to date.  Have emailed and written on their FaceBook page, too.  I'll update if I get a response, but if and until then- be wary of buying from a company with zero customer service...For what we paid, we're pretty happy with it.  We have two cameras set up- one in each kid's room.  Set up was easy.  The picture quality isn't fantastic, but it serves it's purpose.  My only real gripe is that the battery life is pretty short.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera to use
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: For the most part, this is the very user friend monitor that helps us 24-7. We never owned a baby monitor before and my father-in-law gave this to us as a gift. It only takes minutes to get familiar with the system and this is a big plus for a housewife like me. The night vision gives a very clear picture at night without lighting up the room. The batteries last a few hours only so we keep it plugged into the power charger as much as we can and it works just fine like that. I usually have it sitting within reaching distance from me and have it set on VOX so when our baby cries I know instantly. Overall this is a wonderful baby monitor and we really like it.

Reviews.Title: Had to return it
Reviews.Author: Meredith Graham
Reviews.Content: My husband researched for a long time to get the right monitor. When we got it we were so excited but we were let down. The vision was okay but the sound was horrible. There was a gravelly noise the whole time and even with the volume all the way up you couldn't hear. We returned it right away.

Reviews.Title: My wife sleeps better now
Reviews.Author: PuntaCana Mike
Reviews.Content: Read mixed reviews on this product, but can say that it works well without any surprises. Video quality is good enough and the night vision works as well. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great Video, No Sound Though
Reviews.Author: MilitaryMommy4
Reviews.Content: We received this monitor yesterday and hooked it up right away. It was very easy. The picture on it is great. However, we are still not able to get any sound to work on it. We have read the book a hundred times, watched you tube videos...still nothing. I called customer service and was told someone would get back with me soon, still haven't heard back. I have no clue how to make the sound work!! I have tried everything. If the sound did work I would give it 5+ stars. It is so frustrating because to return it is a hassle and I love the video part of it. I guess I will just have to purchase a separate one for sound.

Reviews.Title: dead
Reviews.Author: woodster
Reviews.Content: we really liked it while it worked...but now it doesn't - only 6 months after purchase, and 3 months out of warranty.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor for not alot of money
Reviews.Author: Gordon Wolf
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a good monitor for not alot of money, this is the one. We have only used it for 4 days and we love it already. It's the first digital baby monitor that does not interfere with our wifi and the only monitor that provide a visible night vision of our crib that is placed 6 feet away. We are not so fond of the the automute feature so we have it switched off. Eveyrthing works as expected and we are planning on getting a add on camera sold here on amazon once we move to our new home.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Mary Jane Soria
Reviews.Content: I love this baby monitor, very clear picture and I love the baby blue casing since I have a boy!  For the money, its a GREAT monitor and you will be very satisfied!  Great deal!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product
Reviews.Author: Ron and Eve
Reviews.Content: It's like having night vision goggles on.  Really neat!  This is a must have.  Sound is great and it has volume control too!

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: T.T.Q.
Reviews.Content: I bought this infant optics video monitor to replace our old Angelcare audio monitor. It decided finally to give up after 4 years of service. We just had our 3rd child and we wanted a 3 camera system that wouldn't cost too much money. This monitor works very well with 3 cameras hooked up. There is no split screen viewing but only manually cycling through the cameras one by one. There's no static, no internet interference, and provides an crystal clear image day and night. This video monitor is great for what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: great monitor
Reviews.Author: J. Gottlieb
Reviews.Content: Everything about this monitor is excellent - battery life on monitor - camera swivel, auto-mute function, video quality, night vision, really happy with this one

Reviews.Title: Works very well, but battery for monitor unit is a crap
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Martínez
Reviews.Content: The good:Monitor works well, it has a glossy plastic finish, range operation is about 30mt with walls inside, camera can be fixed or change position, vox option turns to stanby mode the reception unit for save energy and turns on again when is noisy, night vision works perfectly.The bad:Battery for the reception unit is very very poor, it charges for about 5 hours and works for about 15 minutes. a total crap, reception unit must be plugged to wall everytime

Reviews.Title: Faulty receiver charge
Reviews.Author: Jared Lish
Reviews.Content: I've used the monitor almost daily for two months now. Just this week the power supply on the receiver stopped working. If you jiggle it around for ten seconds or so, you can sometimes get the charge light to come on. But once its on it will go off without moving the cord or the receiver. A receiver that can't hold electric power but rather only batteries is costly and more maintenance. Aside from the receiver having charging issues, the monitor works great. The picture is clear both with daylight and without.

Reviews.Title: Wish we got it earlier
Reviews.Author: Sunshine
Reviews.Content: We really like this monitor. It lacks the bells and whistles (as other reviewers said too) but it provides the basic needs of a parent to visually too see your child when you can't be there. The VOX mode works well - it turns on when my son cries so we can pamper him back to sleep while saving energy. Great price and great product. I just wished I got this earlier!

Reviews.Title: Good Deal for the money
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: The monitor works ok for the money I paid for it. The night vision mode has a terrible picture. We set it about 10 ft from our son's bed on a book shelf, from that distance the picture looks like abstract art. Unless you can set the camera within 5 ft of the bed, I wouldnt recommend it.  The wireless monitor does have good range and works all around our 3/4 acre property

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: ladyJen
Reviews.Content: Love it! I didn't have too high of an expectation when this product costs nearly half of what is out there. It performs very well and I'm glad I made this faithful leap!

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Douglas Dayan
Reviews.Content: Everyone in the family loves this monitor. Although we can't pair additional monitors with one single camera (so that both my wife and I can see our baby), it has been very useful. It got great reception around our appartment and doesn't interfere with our internet network (unlike our old one where I can never connect my apple TV to our wifi). It's a great buy for value.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Army boy
Reviews.Content: works great, for a great price too. the night vision is awesome, well worth the money to buy this product.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working
Reviews.Author: Hannahstayner
Reviews.Content: I was pretty happy with the monitor for about 3 months when it suddenly stopped working in the middle of the night. My baby is downstairs from me so I heavily rely on a monitor to hear her wake up. This was NOT a good choice. I'm bummed that I can't return it anymore without paying shipping and only getting partial money back. Not worth the hassle and money loss.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Baby Monitor!
Reviews.Author: Andres
Reviews.Content: I received the baby monitor with a good package. My babe does not born yet, but I tried and the baby monitor has a very good signal and good resolution. I am happy with my purchase so far. Thank you!I hope that later, it could run very good, if I have any trouble after, I will write other comments, but I think that not It will be necessary.

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: Isadora
Reviews.Content: This monitor works very well. We've had it for a few weeks, so far no complaints. The battery lasts about one evening, so you  need to charge it during the day or while you are using it.

Reviews.Title: Stupid simple
Reviews.Author: M. Pawelek
Reviews.Content: After 7 months of use no complains whatsoever, good audio and video, video breakes off at about 100 feet with several walls between camera and receiver

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love this monitor.
Reviews.Author: Tracy Gaunce
Reviews.Content: I will never go back to a regular monitor again.  This one is amazing, you can see and hear your baby whenever you want.  Definitely worth the money for it.

Reviews.Title: Review of purchase
Reviews.Author: Michael Dodson
Reviews.Content: The infant optics is a great help with us watching our grandbaby.  We can do other things and keep an eye on her at the same time without having to peek in on her every 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: YP
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, serves its purpose. Value for money. Just as shown in pic. Highly recommend to mothers. Can buy

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Zulo W
Reviews.Content: Both my wife and I love this monitor. It has excellent video quality and serves as a peace of mind when we are sleeping. We bought an extra camera for the playroom so we don't have to move the camera around during the day. My son knocked this off the table a few times and it is still working fine. Other than the antenna can not be drawn in like the motorola, this is a very good and reliable monitor for not too much $

Reviews.Title: Love the range
Reviews.Author: Bhanu
Reviews.Content: This is the best video monitor we've have come across. The first one that we had from summer infant had terrible video quality, then we moved onto a levana that didn't have the range to cover our house. Now with the infant optics we haven't found anything we don't like about it.It's full digital so there's no static or interference. It works with our wifi that shares the same bandwidth. Although this monitor lacks an indicator to show the signal strength, it never lost signal.If you want a monitor that is affordable and reliable, this is a good option.

Reviews.Title: Buy it ! works great
Reviews.Author: Richard D. Critchlow "lifelight"
Reviews.Content: We thought this product might be cheap for the price, but is to our surprise has been a very good invetment without having to spent upwards to $300 on others.

Reviews.Title: Lights are too bright for a baby monitor, disrupts wifi.  Don't waste your money.
Reviews.Author: Brooke
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace my two year old son's Motorola monitor when it conked out.  His original Summer monitor is being used for his little brother. There are two really bright lights on this monitor, the night vision and the power light, that made this monitor unusable for us.  Even when I tried to hide the power cord it was simply too bright and bothered my son. As I wrote in the beginning this is the third baby monitor I have owned so I know the lights on this one are excessively bright.  I just thought others should know.**Update-After using duct tape to cover the lights, and making the monitor audio only, we put it in my son's room.  Around the same time we started having sporadic Wifi issues.  It was maddening since everything was OK with our provider and our connection.  Long story short, after several months of this, my husband figured out it was the monitor with a 2400mz frequency.  Could this monitor get any more useless?  Please don't waste your money on this one**

Reviews.Title: Good all round
Reviews.Author: Rayleter
Reviews.Content: Frame rate is high giving it a smooth video flowrange is excellent - works everywhere at homeno wifi interferencenight vision is good (although only in black and white once in this mode)handset light and portablelow price makes this a great choice if you want to have a few additional cameras - which will end up at the same price as getting a better brand with only 1 cam

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: T. Porter
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is great! After doing my research, I was worried that the volume wasn't going to be loud enough for us. It turned out to be just fine. The monitor unit is very light and small and I couldn't expect the speaker volume to be any louder than my iphone. This unit has great visual videos, very smooth video picture. I can hear and see my 6 month old baby move around and mumble in her crib - I now can not imagine living without this unit ever!

Reviews.Title: view
Reviews.Author: GOOD
Reviews.Content: Signal range distance very little. So i don't like it. Pls. know this is very expensive and it not worth it.

Reviews.Title: bueno
Reviews.Author: Jesus Abreu
Reviews.Content: excelente producto lo recomiendo excelente vendedor a tiempo y con calidad el producto 100 % original desde venezuela lo garantizo

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: For the price I paid for this monitor I am WOWED at what I received, This is one of the best purchases I made. Great quality. No static. I couldnt as for more.

Reviews.Title: baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Rob P
Reviews.Content: I got this baby monitor after weighing out all the goods and bads versus the price. The Infant Optics had alot of good reviews, yet alot of negative ones. I was very worried that it would 'beep' as the reviews say, but I do not have this problem. They must have fixed this problem already. The video at night is very clear just as described  - I could even see the cat moving behind the crib 10+ feet away!Recommended for those needing a humble monitor for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Best thing to buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Server Ed
Reviews.Content: As the #1 selling monitor, you would expect this to be outstanding. It's actually not a top of the line monitor, but really only a basic monitor. It's reliable and performs up to a good standard. I'll give it 5 stars and thumbs up for what it is at a great value.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews on this monitor I decided to give it a try since it was such a good price.  I was very pleased with it for the first week.  Although the display was in black and white (even though it advertises that it will be in color) the picture was clear and I could see my baby very well.  A week after using it however, the red lights that create the night mode stopped working.  I now can't see anything in the display portion of the monitor.  The audio still works but I bought this for the video feature, not the audio.

Reviews.Title: Great, but does go "offline" too often for my tastes
Reviews.Author: Barbara Fryman
Reviews.Content: Maybe because we don't use it all the time, but when I turn it on after not using it for a while the reciever is no longer set to the monitor. I do think the picture and sound quality are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Ms S G Codling
Reviews.Content: Pros - Easy to set up and use. Clear image.Cons - Interferes with our wireless internet connection. Battery on hand held unit needs to charge a lot.Overall, very happy with this product. It does what it needs to and is less expensive than some other models.

Reviews.Title: Infant optics monitor
Reviews.Author: K.mom
Reviews.Content: I just got this monitor after being very disappointed in one that my husband bought. It had terrible range and the video quality was appalling. I looks at all the monitors that had a good deal and I found that this was the best choice between price and quality. It was also ranked #1 in the baby monitor section and I trust it must have impressed enough people to get this position. After getting it setup which only took 2 minutes, I was very happy to see the range was 10x better and the video was very solid and smooth. I would recommend this monitor to parents who want a monitor at good value.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Amity Lane
Reviews.Content: It's a great video monitor. I would recommend it, and actually have already. The only downfall is that it random has white noise moments when my son is fast asleep and there is no sound around for the monitor to make noise for. It has only lost signal once, and that was on a night of a storm.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Mark v James
Reviews.Content: This monitor works great, we have had no problems with it.  It works well in the dark and in the light.  Highly recommended for the price

Reviews.Title: Great value baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Byung
Reviews.Content: No interference with any of our 2.4ghz devices at home (sound system, cell phone, internet...) and it has great reception. I love how the auto mute silences out the audio and shuts the volume off. The product is built with quite thin plastic leaving it looking cheap, but my 9mo. old baby has abused it a few times throwing it onto granite tiles and it is still working perfectly other than the scratches it has now.A nice reliable monitor that is nearly half the price of what is out there.

Reviews.Title: Battery life
Reviews.Author: Carrie Gustafson
Reviews.Content: Battery life is not very good, I have to plug it in to the charger every few hours; other than that it is good.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Iqbal
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 mo. old baby.It's great to be able to see and hear her at all times.I love how smooth the video is and the night vision capability of this unit. It's very mobile to move around the house and it doesn't interfere with out internet network.I would highly recommend this monitor if you want a nice reliable monitor.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Berniee
Reviews.Content: We used to have a video monitor with too many functions and ended up returning it. We're glad this is really easy to use. The slightest noise turns the monitor back on, which is good for me cause this is our first time letting our baby sleep in her room. It really gives me a piece of mind. It's made of plastic, but not so cheap like everyone says. Nice color too. The one drawback is that when the monitor goes on standby, you have to turn the unit off then on again. I guess it's fine, but I wish it was a simple push-of-a-button. If you just want a simple monitor with good audio and video without all the fancy hupla, this is the one!

Reviews.Title: Good, basic video monitot
Reviews.Author: Mystic Badger
Reviews.Content: Good, cheap video monitor. Not great, but it does the job. And for $100, I'm happy. Definitely not worth the $299 original price listed. Video quality is nice, good night vision. The sound is a little annoying. If no sound is detected, the audio shuts off. It does not beep or anything like some other reviewers said, but it goes from no audio to audio even when no noise is detected from the baby. So it goes from dead quiet to making a white noise like sound. I would rather have constant white noise than the back and forth bc it wakes me up. But this may not bother some. There is a very cheap little stand on the back of the monitor, which makes the product feel cheaper than it is. Overall it was a good buy and we are happy with it.

Reviews.Title: It's just a very basic monitor for now days. Not as great as the review shows.
Reviews.Author: Lee "Lee"
Reviews.Content: I got this last week. I guess because I did not do much research. I only read the reviews and thought what can be wrong when so many ppl said good about it.Well I think it's a very very basic video monitor. For a lower price, you can buy a Vtech baby monitor that has so much more features. With this monitor, maybe it would be a good price couple years ago, but now is Dec 2012 I don't think this price is consider good now days.There is no 2 way talk. No screen saver or sleep mode. So the monitor was on the whole night.And of coure the battery does not last a whole night if the screen is on, so you have to plug it into the outlet, so you don't miss your baby's cry.Over all. It's a OK monitor. Not as great as the review says.

Reviews.Title: good for money
Reviews.Author: Amy Burk
Reviews.Content: a simple monitor with good visuals, good audio, far range and a OK battery life. the camera part can be clamped onto a little plastic stand to look down from a higher point. it doesn't have the temperature control but i have a remote thermometer in her room and it works for me. for the price this unit is worth it.

Reviews.Title: All I'll need for now
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: This monitor has good functionality and performance. I was looking at audio monitors at first but after seeing not much of a price difference, I decided to step up to a video monitor. This has no static or interference, and is very user friendly. It comes with a cute little handstrap to cling the screen unit on your wrist. I am very glad I bought thisThis is the only baby monitor I'll ever need if it stays working this way!

Reviews.Title: No audio!
Reviews.Author: S
Reviews.Content: Oh my gosh this monitor has terrible audio! The audio fades in and out, and then is mostly out! Not what you want with a monitor! The video is OK, not great and you do have to physically move the camera into position, so if your little one is moving that could be an issue. Obviously we returned this and ordered a Summer monitor that we have had better (previous) luck with. Amazon as always was great with returns:)

Reviews.Title: We returned because it was interrupting our wireless router signal
Reviews.Author: Molly
Reviews.Content: We have an older Summer Infant monitor and we really loved it, but recently the night vision stopped working on it and it's kind of annoying.  So, I read a bunch of reviews for this one and decided to replace the Summer Infant.  I wasn't really impressed.  The sound was very tinny and the unit felt so lightweight, bordering on cheaply made.  Then we realized the frequency hopping was interfering with our wireless router signal.  We couldn't use our iPad, laptop or phones around it and stay connected to the internet.  It was very annoying.  We finally decided the working night vision wasn't worth the hassle of it and worth another $99 so we returned it.

Reviews.Title: Great price and quality
Reviews.Author: B.B. n Dad
Reviews.Content: This monitor does exactly as advertised and I have no complaints. It's priced just right for what it is - a color digital monitor that has great range and ergonomically designed. The handheld unit is light and portable, making it very easy to carry in your pocket. You can only adjust the brightness, volume VOX, automute, and IR night vision. Bottom it is a very simple monitor and does take more than a few minutes to learn. This is what I wanted and I'm glad I bought this.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy!
Reviews.Author: Veronica Lamp
Reviews.Content: This product broke after 2 weeks! We do not recommend anyone to purchase this even if it seems like its the only thing in your price range.

Reviews.Title: good monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: Kate Berlin
Reviews.Content: We purchased this monitor and one extra camera for our two kids' rooms. It's great for the price. The picture is a bit blurry but we can tell when the children are moving or awake.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Uncle Leslie
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a video monitor to replace our old summer infant video monitor that doesn't support multi camera viewing. We have 3 kids now and we really want to keep an eye on all of them, primarily our 1 year old little boy. We use this mostly at night when we sleep having our monitor screen downstairs and the camera upstairs where they sleep. We really like how good the night vision is on this unit. We got everything around $260 and I don't think we can get anything better at this price range.The volume falls a bit on the short side but we found that you can help boost the volume by placing this on a metal tray (we found one from our kitchen) and force the sound to be amplified by this home-made apparatus... it works and you can give it a try!

Reviews.Title: A+
Reviews.Author: Lily
Reviews.Content: I never had the faith to try a brand that I've never used or heard of before. However, the infant optics monitor was ranked top seller in the monitor category and I always like to stick with top sellers. Having owned an analog video monitor before I was hoping that a digital monitor would be alot more stable. After receiving this I am thrilled how far technology has progressed in the baby monitor world. Not only it's only 1/3 the price, the video, audio, range, size... everything is a step ahead. This is very convenient to use and I highly recommend this monitor.After several attempts of trying to be money conscious and buying cheaper brands/versions, I finally caved and bou

Reviews.Title: Thumbs up
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: This has been a life saver for my light sleeper! I wouldn't say high quality but definitely gets the job done.  The night vision is great. Would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Good enough for this price
Reviews.Author: J. Park "Rafael"
Reviews.Content: Not very clear the video image at the night time without the light but it's understandable and the sound is OK.Generally we don't have any problem and we like it.

Reviews.Title: In love with my baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Vic
Reviews.Content: I only had this for a week but I already fell in love with it. This is the best baby monitor for value and everything works perfectly. There's no gimmick to this, just straight up video monitor that works as you would want. The night vision is amazing, it doesn't interfere with our internet, and it's got a cute design. The plastic may feel cheap but I appreciate that it makes the whole unit very light. I would say it is not much heavier than my new iphone 5. This is a worthwhile buy and it surely deserves it's #1 best selling monitor rank.

Reviews.Title: Works great for busy moms
Reviews.Author: C.c.
Reviews.Content: This monitor has worked wonderfully for us. It has no static or interference and has an excellent range. The video is very clear and smooth. For $100 on a digital baby monitor, I was expecting much less. We are highly impressed with the performance of this little device.

Reviews.Title: Great product but battery life sucks.
Reviews.Author: Vince Rock
Reviews.Content: This is 10 million times better than just a sound monitor and the night vision is great. It also doesn't kick in every time the baby makes a little peep but it does when needed. The only thing is the battery life is awful. Buy a separate battery or an extension cord because you'll need it.

Reviews.Title: Wiped out my Verizon MiFi Internet Connection
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I have internet at my house through a Verizon MiFi device. This monitor completely wipes out the wifi signal even though it states specifically that it's interference free.  When I put the monitor in another room, it didn't wipe it out but significantly interfered with the internet to a point where my 4G LTE speed went from normally 12mbps to somewhere around 56kbps.  Not good.  Aside from that, this particular unit was defective, which is bound to happen on occasion, so I wasn't too upset about that.  The sound would intermittently go out.

Reviews.Title: Truly awesome
Reviews.Author: chikachikawowwow
Reviews.Content: I had this in my shopping cart forever since I thought it was a great deal.  Then I saw a returned item at a discounted price.  Bought it & it was like new.  It was simple to setup, maybe too simple with having to change the channel to view other cameras. We had fun turning out the lights and seeing our black eyes since it has night vision.  Voices were clear, and it has a little mount so you can put it in a corner or on the wall. Very nice & can't wait to add a 2nd camera.  Out of stock at the moment

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Yana.Li
Reviews.Content: This is our first video baby monitor. We had an audio monitor before and it is nowhere near compared to this. The audio is better, the range is better... and now you get full video! I was hestitant on getting something that runs on the 2.4ghz because my friend told me her summer infant monitor interfered with their wifi, but this unit does not interfere at all. The download speeds are unaffected and wifi range is the same as before.I don't regret trying this budget-priced monitor.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: Very Please with this product!Great night vision, Great range, Great picture quality.Audio is fine but perhaps not sensitive enough. quite often we will hear BB before unit transmit audio.Also 1 power cord failed after 3 months but the company provided Great customer service and we received a new cord within a week of making contact with them via there web page.Over all very satisfied and what a great price!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Julie Mann
Reviews.Content: This monitor works great!  We did have a problem with the adaptor not working after about 6 months, which may have been our fault.  I emailed and got a replacement right away, no questions asked, by a very friendly customer service representative!  I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Rebecca A Wenrich
Reviews.Content: When my daughter was an infant, we felt we did not need a video monitor - the audio monitor was enough for us.Fast-forward to age 2 and a half when our daughter decided that during naptimes, she would use the contents of her diaper to make artwork on the walls, the carpet, the furniture...We mounted this monitor on the wall and can see almost every inch of her room. We have been very pleased with it, both during the day and at night. My husband thinks the night vision is way cool. :) The only time we've had any trouble is when we've lost power, we just have to pair the monitor and the camera again, and then everything is fine. We haven't had any trouble with interference from appliances or Wi-Fi devices.We're very pleased with the product and it gives us peace of mind to be able to see what she's doing in her room while we're not with her. It has already helped me to stop one "painting" session before it got started. *whew*

Reviews.Title: Great price for video but....
Reviews.Author: K. Velez
Reviews.Content: ...this product is terrible.After our Summer monitor broke down after 2 years, I purchased the Infant Optics b/c of it's comparatively good price and somewhat decent reviews. I wasn't looking for too many features - just something simple we can use to check-in on our daughter at night when she occasionally cried.But 3 significant issues immediately came up that made this product a "must return".1. The Auto Mute mode did not work. We had constant audio even when there was complete silence in our nursery. The speaker is supposed to go into sleep mode after 10 secs. It never did.2. Same with the VOX mode. Our video never turned off after 10 secs. Even more annoying, we had to turn the video off to keep it from illuminating our bedroom but had to turn it back on when we heard our daughter whimpering.3. Perhaps the most annoying thing was the terrible hum. Even at the lowest volume, the speaker put out this hum that was almost as loud as the electric fan in our bedroom.It took me all of two nights to decide to return this monitor. Don't be fooled by the price, and don't waste your time.

Reviews.Title: A
Reviews.Author: Bill Nottingham
Reviews.Content: I got the item quickly and it was exactly as described. It's always great getting what was advertised at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Extremely smooth frame rate
Reviews.Author: Potox
Reviews.Content: I have a foscam internet camera that I used for home security and tried to hook an extra camera up for our new family little family member. It seemed great at start but it always had to reconnect everytime I had to use my iphone which made it a real pain. I bought this as a backup camera while i needed my phone but eventually ended up using this most of the time since it was so easy to use without any tedious connection process. This monitor offers extremely smooth frame rate (30 frames per second), nearly double our foscam connection. The resolution is average but having instant playback without any lag a blessing.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Pramit P. Parikh
Reviews.Content: pros-works greatVOX mode to save battery. i charge it every night.IR mode for night timecons-no mechanism to mount camera on crib. need to put it on wall or on a console.no way to move camera position/tilt remotely.In short, it gets the job done. for under $100 I give this one 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Best for value
Reviews.Author: Keith Stuesse "K.S."
Reviews.Content: This is the best video baby monitor we got so far. We tried several brands like graco summer but nothing lived up to my wife's expectations. This gives us everything (but nothing more as a basic monitor setup). The only thing I would complain about is the multi-camera option doesn't give a split screen display.Everything else is perfect!

Reviews.Title: Broke after 3 months
Reviews.Author: John List Jr
Reviews.Content: This monitor is not worth the money. This is our first child and we were very concerned with getting a quality monitor. The night vision has glaring red lights our infant stared at while in her crib. Plus, the image was not super clear. The quality of the item is cheap, as it rattles, the materials are loose and flimsy. Although it claims a specific range, we were always well within this range, yet we would lose connection bc we were "out of range". I am highly disappointed. Plus, there is no option for a return after 1 month. This item had positive reviews for the most part. I should have listened to the low ratings.

Reviews.Title: We LOVE this!
Reviews.Author: arash
Reviews.Content: I wish I got this monitor sooner since we were going to spend the money anyway. We had a summer infant which always dropped signal and it was such an annoying monitor to use. I saw this going on for a good deal so I gave this monitor a try. It wasn't rated the best, but as top selling baby monitor on amazon it had to be good. So far we LOVE this monitor. It has never had any signal issues and never slowed our home internet.- light monitor makes it very comfortable to put in your pocket- night vision is excellent- video quality and resolution, frame rate - all excellent- good battery duration when VOX is turned on- white noise mute function works nicely if you don't like the hissing noise when it's completely quiet- really good price for a fully digital monitor- volume can be louder from the monitor unit- does not have battery indicatorOverall, this is a great monitor for the great value but you will need to get an extra adapter if you are planning to position this in different places around your house.

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: Diego Caicedo
Reviews.Content: Excellent product its ok the time off shiping and your pice. The product is acording the photo. Thanks for all

Reviews.Title: Keeps shutting off
Reviews.Author: Ronda Jyoti Litwin, RYT-500
Reviews.Content: I think the battery might just suck.  Maybe we didn't charge it right the first time but it only works when its plugged in.  I had an old summerinfant monitor with a huge screen and black and white photo but it wasn't portable.  We switched to this after our dog made the monitor fall and picture fuzzy.  I prefer the larger screen and the portability sucks when it keeps turning off. Kinda useless.

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Charlz
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed it. It full filled my expectations and I am very happy with it and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: Met my expectation, I use it to monitor my elderly parents during the night & so far it's worked well.  Good value for money compared to others I looked at.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: Damuri
Reviews.Content: Its not as well made as our last one.Its range is not as good as our last one.BUTIts about half the price of our last monitor and it has a sleep mode.If I had to do buy another one tomorrow, I'd pick this one over the summer infant one I bought from baby's r us.

Reviews.Title: wonderful monitor
Reviews.Author: Alicia Fletcher
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful baby monitor for a good price... it's was much better than what we expected from a 100 dollar monitor. I am due to deliver in 3 months and I've been testing this product out and it's got everything I wanted. It's a little bit hard to find a place to keep the camera in place, but you can do this by putting something heavy on the back of the wiring so it secures in one spot.I will feel much more secure putting my baby into another room while I sleep.

Reviews.Title: It's ok, but small and crappy sound
Reviews.Author: S. Daugherty "training26.2"
Reviews.Content: I knew we weren't getting the lastest version of the CIA spy shop daily deal, but at least it could look like it was put together with more sophistication than an highschool freshman class mechanical science project.  Small screen, terrible picture quality. You know it's bad when the night vision quality looks better than the day time picture quality.  Sound quality is worse than squelch on a military radio.  Wireless distance was a bonus - did reach very well, and outside.  We just weren't quite sure what we were seeing or hearing when the unit began to spout off....

Reviews.Title: very good!
Reviews.Author: lu
Reviews.Content: it has good signal , it has good audio , it is durable and it's not  very expensive.  I have used it and it gave me good results.

Reviews.Title: Simple With a Few Kinks
Reviews.Author: OrangeCrush
Reviews.Content: This is a good little monitor. I always thought that video monitors were ridiculously expensive and unnecessary (before I had a baby). Then I began to realize the awesomeness of being able to see what's going on in the room without actually showing your face - something only a video monitor can provide. So I wanted one but don't have lots of cash to be throwing at an expensive monitor so I got this based on the positive reviews.It works great - we bought the open box one cheaper and it was brand new. That said, there are a few quirks.1. It does mess with our wifi some, as other have said. On our iPad it seems to be ok but on our laptop the wireless pretty much won't work when the monitor is on. It's not that big of a deal for us because we mostly use it for nighttime when we are also asleep. For naps I just flip it on once in awhile to check if I need to use the wifi while he sleeps.2. The VOX (standby) mode is a great option but the monitor is super sensitive so if you use a lot of white noise (we do) it won't ever go on standby. If it does go on standby it will flip back on if a noisy car goes down the street (that's how sensitive it is.3. The caveat to #2 (it staying on all the time) is that the lowest brightness setting is still super bright so, if it doesn't go on standby it's really bright in a dark room. You can turn off the infrared and leave the audio on to fix this but it's a hassle plus defeats the point of having a video monitor. I just put it face down on the dresser, it's still bright but not too bright.4. The loudest setting (9) is not very loud and it doesn't have a discernable "speaker," the noise just kind of comes from within the parent unit. I have not really had a problem with this because I (like most moms) am very sensitive to the noise of him waking so I still hear it. But don't expect a loud audio setting because there is none.5. a minor thing, but still, if the unit is getting ready to die (which it will in less than 3 hours off the charger)it just blinks a green light. There is no noise or anything - our audio monitor beeped loudly a few times to let us know that it was about to die - not this one. Also, it only takes about 30 seconds of it blinking to completely die so you better be paying attention and I don't recommend leaving on all night if it's not hooked up to the charger because you'll likely wake up to a dead monitor and a screaming baby.6. Just a funny thing: it marginally addictive. My husband can't stop watching it. Last night it died about an hour before we went to sleep and my he couldn't stand that it wasn't on. Be warned.7. The video isn't high def or anything. So, it's a little blurry, but everything is still very discernable. It also doesn't have a very wide angle so we, for example, have it about 3 ft above the crib on the wall but can't get the 6" or so on each end of the crib in the shot. We didn't want to take it farther up because we wanted the picture to still be clear.All that seems like it's bad but I love this monitor, truly. I would purchase it again and again, but I think it's important for potential buyers to know some of these things, because it might not be for you depending on your situation or what kind of parent you are.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: F. Costa
Reviews.Content: Grat product. Excellent video quality and almost zero noise. It is a great product given the price. We use it on a daily basis.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Wilhelm M. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: Has all the features you'll want to use.  Obviously has video and audio, works well in the dark, angles well, no range issues, even has encryption for the signal.  Overall good value for the price.I'm writing this review while my kid is sleeping upstairs. hey look at that, still sleeping. AWESOME!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Debra L. Wigbels
Reviews.Content: I had a Summer Infant camera given to me as a shower gift. Nice camera, (although twice as much $ as this one.) The picture quality of the Infant Optics is way better! I can see my daughter very clearly. It has a nice wide screen also. I love the fact that if I use it cordless, the screen doesn't sleep like my Summer Infant monitor. I had to keep pressing the button to see the video, which was annoying. I kind of miss the "talk" button on my old one, but oh well. The quality of the plastic seems a little cheap, but overall I'm exremely pleased with this product. The price can't be beat for such a great picture!

Reviews.Title: Great Product on Sale!
Reviews.Author: R. Nichols
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of online research trying to find the right video monitor. I didn't want to spend a ton of money, but I didn't want something that felt "cheap" (always the desire, right?).  Amazon had this product on sale for less than $100, so I decided to give it a try.  Most non-video monitors were more expensive than that!  I might have preferred a monitor where I could watch from my smartphone away from home or talk to my daughter through it, but at this price, I couldn't pass it up.  I have been using it for about a week now.  I love it!  I mounted the camera on the wall opposite from my daughter's crib so I could see the whole crib.  The video quality is great in the light and really good in the dark.  I have blackout curtains in that room, so it is really pitch black at night.  I can see her very well, and her eyes glow if they're open.  The only thing I wish is that the camera could pan a little wider with the option to zoom in if needed, but it's just perfect for what I need.

Reviews.Title: I can finally sleep !
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Hanson
Reviews.Content: Product is a great monitor at excellent value. We have a full set with another extra camera paired to the monitor and it all costed us less than 180 bucks with free 2 day shipping. It works wonderfully for our tolder and our new born baby. Everything works as advertised and haven't had any trouble or problems with it for 3 weeks of ownership. I recommend it !

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: NCohetero
Reviews.Content: Everything I was hoping for and needed at the fraction of the cost. Yes it may seem flimsy because its covering is plastic but it's actually pretty durable. The picture is clear and the sound quality is great. Also the night vision is such a relief in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Nice baby monitor
Reviews.Author: L.Schuess "MEStudent"
Reviews.Content: The unit works well and provides good monitoring capabilities. The night vision works well, and the VOX turns on when baby is making noise.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Jinder
Reviews.Content: This monitor gives a sense of security and peace of mind having the visual representation of another room. We have 2 kids and we don't really need this, but I was convinced enough by my brother to get one when prices of these video monitors dropped so much since the last 4 years. Now, most monitors are 2.4ghz digital and have alot more to offer than what was available back in 2008 (when we had our first child). Hearing the word 2.4ghz led me to think immediately about the wifi signal, and thankfully this unit does not have any problems with our network at all. I like the VOX mode where it shuts off itself when there's no sound detected. We are planning to get an add-on camera once it is back in stock.

Reviews.Title: Good, but interference
Reviews.Author: Shannon G
Reviews.Content: I liked the camera, easy set-up, etc.  But I started having issues with my wireless internet system and once I disconnected the monitor... it worked fine.  I switched systems to a different monitoring and have had no issues what-so-ever.

Reviews.Title: Amazin stuff
Reviews.Author: Blisssyy
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing for the relatively low price I paid. It's got excellent range coverage, no interference and great night vision. The video and audio quality is nothing stunning but enough for the purpose to monitor a baby.Thought between a internet camera for our ipad VS one of these conventional monitors, and we chose this because we can't take the time delay and the comlicated setups for internet cam.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: Amy S
Reviews.Content: I loaned my Angel Care monitor to my sister in law, soI purchased this one to still have something without spending too much.This is a good monitor, no issues so far with sound quality, the picture isgreat, but the battery life is a little short when the parent unit isn't pluggedin.

Reviews.Title: Two months and epic failure
Reviews.Author: Mom&Dad
Reviews.Content: We have had this product for two months now and it no longer works.  A couple of days ago the audio stopped working.  Then tonight we put our kid to bed and went to check on him via monitor... and it won't turn on.  And before the critics take over; yes we plugged it in, yes it was fully charged, yes the product was paired with the camera before it broke.  Pick a hypothetical and we probably tried it (within reason).The customer service is kind of a pain.  You call the help line and they take a message and you have to wait up to a couple of business days for a response.  So if you need to call on a Friday (as is our case), you won't be contacted earlier than Monday.Do a little research before buying this unit.  Better yet... pick something else.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Viktoriya
Reviews.Content: Love that it is rechargeble. Signal is very strong, so far had no problems with it. Working gtreat, I am caring it everywhere in the house, while baby is sleeping.

Reviews.Title: simply setup, easy to use
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: Pros:it's pretty much 1 sec setup (no need to pair or anything)it's quite easy to usevery light, easy to carry around and monitor babycons:battery runs out quite fastsometimes (not often though), it sent error msg like out of range but actually I didn't move it.there's a funny sound in the adapter when I charge it

Reviews.Title: i have been looking for a good baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Emily Smart
Reviews.Content: this is a wonderful baby monitor. you can see your child in color and you can see when they are waking up.

Reviews.Title: This was an awesome product for awhile....
Reviews.Author: FDG2001 "Garrett"
Reviews.Content: 6 months in & it shuts off randomly. I can start it again but my son is severely disabled, on a feeding tube, has seizures in bed and could aspirate...I need to be able to see him or hear him at all times. I recommended this product to so many and now am embarrassed. I am fearful now using it and wasn't when I bought it.

Reviews.Title: It works great
Reviews.Author: NewYork Fable
Reviews.Content: I did so much research I got sick of reading reviews and decided to go ahead with the best seller in the baby monitor category. I am absolutely amazed by how well this performs for the price. It's a gorgeous monitor. It has everything we wanted (but nothing more!). It's basic and simple, great for my wife to use. The night time visuals are excellent on this camera and I can see everything in the picture while it's dark in the baby's room. It comes with a mounting stand if you want to view from a higher point but we figured we just hang it up on our wall with two screws. It's expandable to 4 cameras but I do not plan on getting more add on units, but I have considered getting a whole new seperate set just like some people have done. Still with 2 monitor kits it only $200. If you are looking for something simple with digital connection and good range, this is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: Range is limited
Reviews.Author: Craig
Reviews.Content: It is not 160 feet--unless that is ideal conditions without walls.  But in our house, with walls, the range is more like 50 feet, so I have to hang it on a hook outside the kitchen door because if I bring it in the kitchen, the signal cuts out.  Works fine otherwise.

Reviews.Title: VERY USEFUL
Reviews.Author: wangjiejian
Reviews.Content: EASY TO USE AND HANDLE,even my mum.The screen is also very clear.When the baby sleep ,I can do my things freely.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor for the money
Reviews.Author: Pfin8
Reviews.Content: Video is a bit grainy but you can see what you need to see. Volume works well. We have a two story house and reception is good. I wish the remote part of the monitor had a stand on it.

Reviews.Title: can't believe it's only $99
Reviews.Author: David Fulton
Reviews.Content: This thing is fantastic.  We've used it now for about 6 months and have had no problems. Really good night images and the daylight (color) images are really clear.  I would have expected to have paid $200 for this.

Reviews.Title: Good for money
Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product after looking at several products. The reviews I read all mentioned cheap plastic feel... Yes, it has that, but for the money who cares. It's fairly compact. The camera has a good picture for day/ night. It has clear sound. I would purchase this again. I don't know the longevity of the product as I've only had for a few weeks but it serves its purpose . The only drawback is that the camera doesn't have a pan/ zoom, but again, for the money... I can deal.

Reviews.Title: sound isn't very loud but I love it
Reviews.Author: cali girl
Reviews.Content: I love being able to see my baby so i don't have to wake her up by opening doors to check on her. The sound isn't as loud as my non video monitor but it is still worth being able to see the baby.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for those who want a basic monitor
Reviews.Author: BostonMama
Reviews.Content: This monitor was exactly what we wanted for our first child. We didn't need all the bells and whistles, like lullaby playing options and an intercom (frankly, I feel like an intercom might scare a kid...). This is a basic model, but the picture is very clear and so far we've had no issues at all with its use. I'd recommend this to anyone looking for an easy to use, but quality baby monitor.

Reviews.Author: D. Morrison
Reviews.Content: Priced well, some nice features, but limited by the range. The other one we have goes about three times as far, it also was about three times as much. For an apartment or small home, this should be fine.

Reviews.Title: Great for video, not as great for sound.
Reviews.Author: T. L. Dzubak "mlledzubak"
Reviews.Content: For video and as a night vision camera, this is a great product. I love it and the price $99 is right on the money! However, for sound, I don't like it as much (but I guess sound isn't as important if you can see what is going on). I have sony monitors for sounds only (no video) and the quality is amazing. This one doesn't run sound the whole time, only when the baby cries and it has a slight delay in the pick up of sound. For example if my kid yells "mommy" I only hear "ommy." Plus, I sort of like to have background noise running the whole time (maybe I'm just used to it). Anyway, the video is great. If you want video, this is the product for you!

Reviews.Title: Great product for price!
Reviews.Author: L.P.
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for something basic that does the job well, then this is the monitor for you. Priced well, great picture, simple set up and it's a space saver.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Twenty One "Happy daddy"
Reviews.Content: This is a great baby monitor given that it is only a hundred bucks. The product quality isn't at all great but it has all the features you need really as a baby monitor. It's a simple operating system with a nice 2.4 inch screen that is like old school VGA standard. The night vision is automatic and only displays in black and white. The audio is mono meaning there are no 'left-right' noise. It can be hooked up to 3 more additional cameras at a reaonsable price of around 80 bucks each. For me I am very pleased with what I got and I would not hsetitate to get another one for a relative or friend for xmas.

Reviews.Title: Excellent experience with customer support
Reviews.Author: Elena M. Harder "Nectar822"
Reviews.Content: I emailed the company before bed, that the infrared stopped working and all I saw was black when I used it in a dark room.  By 6 am the next Sunday morning, I got a response. Apparently, I pressed two buttons which turned infrared off. I was told how to change back and it has been working perfectly ever since.  Been using this product for couple months now.  Not five stars because in the beginning of usage, screen would go black every so often which was frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable price for a good monitor
Reviews.Author: HELEN
Reviews.Content: Positivies: lighweight, easy to set up, great night view and day view, reasonable price, volume controlNegatives: materials does feel cheap but it's working great for 4 months, battery life is short ( i bought an extra battery to solve this problem), the signal does interfere if i'm using my ipod right next to the monitor.So far so good. I would buy this again because of the price.

Reviews.Title: Watches over parents too!
Reviews.Author: Leo G.
Reviews.Content: I shipped this to my sister who cares for my elderly mom. My sister frequently checked in on my mother to see if she was ok after surgery and this monitor has been a Godsend. Even in no-light conditions my sister can easily see mom sleeping comfortably and the microphone can pick up the sound of my mom's breathing. Great product, non intrusive and very good reception from across the house even upstairs/downstairs.

Reviews.Title: Great product!  Excellent customer service!
Reviews.Author: Gwendolyn Meehan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor in preparation for our second child back in March 2012.  For our first child, we had a "Summer Infant" monitor, and we hated it.  The monitor was big and bulky and we had to replace it three times for technical difficulties.  We decided to try something new the second time around, so we chose the Infant Optics monitor, and we couldn't be happier.  It's affordable, lightweight, easy to transport.  I love the sound barrier, where you only hear sound if it's of a certain level.  Recently, the wire on the charger frayed, so we couldn't charge the monitor.  I contacted the company, and just like it says on their website, they responded within 24 hours.  All I had to do was email them the problem, and they sent me a new charger.  I had it within 3 days of sending the email.  Great service, great outcome to our problem.  I would recommend this product to any new parent.

Reviews.Title: best customer service ever
Reviews.Author: love this product
Reviews.Content: The quality of the equipment is great and it does exactly what they say it will. The best thing about this product is the unbelievably good customer service. A company that truly has a great product with a great price and great service is impossible to beat. I am so glad that I went with infant optics and you will be to.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: iEspresso
Reviews.Content: My  main concern when I purchased this was the annoying "beep" that other people reported when the unit was transitioning in and out of VOX mode. Well, they've obviously read the reviews here and remedied that major complaint because I've never once heard the thing beep when transitioning to or from VOX mode. With that issue resolved, I have found this unit to be pretty much exactly what I was hoping for in a baby monitor. Great, clear picture, excellent sound, and pretty decent infrared lighting at night.

Reviews.Title: Get this if you are price sensitive
Reviews.Author: D. Diane
Reviews.Content: This monitor is a must have if you are a first time parent. It gives the reassurance knowing your baby is fine when you are sleeping or doing chores around the house. This is worth every penny and this is the best DIGITAL video monitor I could find. Yes, you may find a better higher quality monitor but this is really all you need. The only thing more I would like is a thermometer showing the temperature so I got a cheap remote temp sensor (from amazon again) and still at 120 bucks in total, this customized deal is better than the rest!

Reviews.Title: Great product, great customer service
Reviews.Author: sunshine
Reviews.Content: I had this baby monitor for probably 6 months now. It worked fine for a while but slowly the camera lens started to blur the video, which I didn't notice until one day it got completely blurry. So, I emailed the company about the problem and I got a reply within a day that they would replace it. So I sent out the old camera and emailed the receipt of the package and they immediately shipped out a new camera. After the camera came, I noticed that this is showing a crisp clear image. So I'm assuming that I got a defective piece in the first place. And this unit is working great so far and the customer service was very satisfactory. I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Decent monitor for $100
Reviews.Author: Emz
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor for the money. We can see our baby breathe at night and make every little twitch and movement. The night vision is excellent on this monitor. The audio is loud enough if we keep our music volume down in our room. I keep it in the mid-range while we sleep. Although it would be nice to hear everything while we sleep, I turn the auto-mute ON so it cancels the static noise and any minor noise our baby makes. We don't want to be woken up for something minor.We have the camera unit on the 2nd floor and the it can still pick up the signal with the monitor unit in the garage which is 2 floors below with solid concrete in between the two devices. As suggested by the manual, we tilt the antenna to a horizontal position to get more vertical range. There is no interference with our wifi network  at all.Overall I'm very pleased for a $100 monitor to perform to this level of standard.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price
Reviews.Author: Rachael
