Reviews.Content: My son has had major medical issues, so we've always had home health nursing taking care of him at night in the past.  Recently he got his trach removed, so we're moving towards less nursing and taking over more of the monitoring at night.  I wanted a video monitor to help ease us into the transition of our son sleeping alone in his room without a nurse.  I assumed I would just get a Summer brand monitor, but then I read the reviews on the Infant Optics and decided for the price it was definitely worth a shot.I'm very impressed with the monitor for the price.  The picture is quite clear, during day or night.  We always keep a small lamp on at night and the light does not interfere with the night-vision camera.  I like the power saving feature (VOX) that you can set for it to turn off after 3 minutes of it not picking up any sound.  I have just a slight problem with this though, as it seems like the microphone is not sensitive enough to pick up small sounds enough to activate the camera again.  If I have this feature on, when I put our son down to sleep, he's not making a ton of noise, so the camera deactivates repeatedly (after 3 minute intervals) before he's fallen asleep.  I just deactivate the VOX feature until he falls asleep.  And anytime I wake up, I just have to push the volume button once and I can check on him.  His cry is definitely loud enough to activate the camera, just not the quiet sounds of him moving around in the bed.I love the convenience of the monitor.  It tends to not get the greatest signal all the time, so the video feed can be jumpy, thus the four stars.  It would also be nice to have the camera pan, but I knew that it didn't do this when I bought it, and bought it anyways because of the price.  It would just be a nice feature to have.I would highly recommend this monitor to anyone on a budget (and what parent isn't?).  I'm looking forward to getting another camera for our second child when he's born in May.

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitor
Reviews.Author: M. H.
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent monitor if you are shopping for a good deal. I find some people were expecting this to be the best monitor in terms of technology and thrills, and were eventually disappointed. Just keep in mind that this is budget monitor and for those who want the most out of their money- nice light and portable design to carry in your pockets- video: clear and smooth. resolution is not HD but more or less like the quality you get from a skype or facetime call- audio: sensitivity and clarity is good. I wished that the volume could be louder- range: excellent- battery life: 4hour without VOX, 8 with VOX on... for us we tend to keep it plugged in most of the time so battery isn't an issue for us.- price - really good value... this price puts it into an audio monitor price range!

Reviews.Title: Defect on Night vision
Reviews.Author: Francisco
Reviews.Content: I bought this item last september 2012, and after 3 weeks of using it, the Night Vision was broken, so from now on I cannot see my baby on the darkness, so I wasted my money!

Reviews.Title: bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: kbear
Reviews.Content: Just got this monitor because it had all the features I wanted for 3 month old girl and it was a great deal.It works great so far and I would recommend it for anyone with a baby.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for first time parents
Reviews.Author: MomPreat
Reviews.Content: We just had our first child and this is a really helpful device to keep at home. There's no interference to our internet signals and it provides a very nice pictures on the screen without no delay. I like how everything is nice and simple and very intuitive.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: Musa
Reviews.Content: Although I was skeptical buying this baby monitor for the relatively low price, I am so glad I made this decision to choose this. Just like any other monitors that are nearly double the price, the signal connection is flawless, good quality in video and audio, great night vison... the only thing that you loose out on are twoway talk function, a smaller screen, and some useless gimmicks that we don't need in a baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Child Monitoring and Keep an eye on handicapped father
Reviews.Author: matthew giles
Reviews.Content: I bought this and shipped it home. I'm in the military and am not home but my mother said that it works great and the night vision works really well. The big problem they have is it won't transmit to certain sections of the house such as the garage or the back porch. Other than that she said it's great.

Reviews.Title: Love this product
Reviews.Author: L. Swiss
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent monitor that provides basic functionality for an affordable price. The 2.4 inch screen is sufficient for day and night vision. You don't need a big screen unless you want to impress your friends. We had some trouble at first setting up the VOX but customer service were very helpful walking us through the setup procedure. The sound is loud BUT clarity is so-so... only to a standard similar to an iphone trying to play music. There is no lag on this monitor and that is very important. IP cameras or internet cams have a 5-10 second lag and that is unacceptable for baby safety purposes. For the price, you are getting alot of out this... and for me THIS is perfect.

Reviews.Title: All I wanted
Reviews.Author: DogPro
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor worked as expected. The monitor unit creates a loud feedback noise if you put the camera too close to it and it can really scare your baby. As long as it's in another room it's fine. I really like the night vision and the video quality. I wouldn't hestitate to get another set for my sister who is soon to have her second child.

Reviews.Title: best value deal
Reviews.Author: gurhan
Reviews.Content: Our baby is still on the way, so we didn't start using it on the job:), but I tested it and it is working very well. The best value deal!

Reviews.Title: battery life is terrible
Reviews.Author: K Long "K Long"
Reviews.Content: I wish I had spent more and got one with a better battery life.  The handheld monitor can't go 12 hours without being charged.  I have a baby in addition to the toddler and occaisionally I have to stay up all night with the baby.  I don't have a charger up stairs and down stairs so on the nights I'm downstairs the battery always runs out after about 6 - 8 hours.

Reviews.Title: No problem in big house
Reviews.Author: Andreas Lende
Reviews.Content: We have a 4000sq ft house and this monitor does not lose signal anywhere at all. The quality of the image is good and the audio is loud and clear. I must have misread the description but the camera can not be powered with batteries so it must be plugged to a charger. Night vision is excellent (I can see the whole crib lit up at 15ft) and it doesn't create any light to achieve this.I don't like how the antenna is not retractable so when I put it in my pocket the antenna sticks out. I would wish to complain more but for $100, I think this is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: hppygrry
Reviews.Content: Pro: price affordable, comes with image, different signalsCons: power runs out quick, the image flashes at times, buzzing noise

Reviews.Title: Best Value, Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Candace Swartz
Reviews.Content: Pros: PRICE, Voice Activated, Large picture Display.Cons: Short Battery Life, No auto scan between camerasThe video monitor I used for my first child went out right before my second child was born, so I decided to look for a replacement that was expandable for more cameras. I had a system that was going to cost about $270 in my cart for weeks, but could not bring myself to pull the trigger. I finally found this option, and based on the reviews, and with Amazon's return policy in the back of my mind, decided to give it a try.I would make the same decision again and again! It is sufficient for what I need, and the price cannot be beat! Automatic scanning between the cameras would be ideal, but is not worth the $100 difference to me. I love that it is voice activated! I am a light sleeper, so our previous monitor presented the challenge of having the volume loud enough that I could hear the kid's noise, but not loud enough that the white noise would keep me awake. This one I have turned up to the highest setting, but the volume only turns on if there is noise to be heard.I wish the battery would last longer, but that might not be an issue to most. Our bedroom where we keep the charger is on the 3rd floor, kids are on the 2nd, and main living area is on the 1st, so it's not simple to run it to the charger when it needs it. (I can explain that better in a lot more words if need be!)In conclusion, give it a try before you spend $100 more on a brand name!

Reviews.Title: Second time's charm
Reviews.Author: Michael G
Reviews.Content: We ordered this camera months ago and something was wrong with the charging. I discussed with customer service and was given a brand new monitor set. This current one is perfect and keeps us awake when needed. Take the monitor anywere in the house to keep an eye on the little one. Great range and a great product, we like it a lot!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor!
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Really love this baby monitor! I'm a diligent shopper so I only search for the best products for money around the web. I ended up getting this and I have no regret. I don't think I can ever live without this!Shipping was fast and price was very attractive on amazon. This monitor can up for 4 cameras and this is the cheapest option if you are looking to expand to more cameras. Everything works great on this but just doesn't have the extra features that other more expensive big-brand monitors have.If you are watching your wallet, this is the best deal for a video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Not pleased after 2 months
Reviews.Author: Kasper
Reviews.Content: This would be a great product except that it only charges sometimes...other times the video won't turn on and the volumn cuts in and out. It is only color during the day when there is plenty of light. Not happy with the product!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Laurie J Kelley Strope
Reviews.Content: i use this product to keep an eye on my Mother, she had a stroke and we brought her home to get better. Love the night vision.

Reviews.Title: Camera-with extra monitor
Reviews.Author: Jodi Hays
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit back several months ago and have been extremely pleased with it for the price we paid.  I chose this monitor over others because it was so affordable to add the extra camera unit to it. The cameras are extremely easy to sync to the parent unit.  My only complaint about having the extra camera is that in order to hear what is going on in the 2nd room, the monitor has to be set for that particular room.  This isn't a huge deal because my oldest child typically does not get up in the middle of the night, but if he did I wouldn't be able to hear him.  Recently I dropped the monitor unit on the floor and it broke.  I contacted genesis filly expecting to purchase a new monitor, but they replaced it for me free of charge.  Their customer service is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Joe D
Reviews.Content: An awesome monitor. Cordless/wireless range is excellent. The video resolution is not the best but the frame flow is very fast so it doesn't clip/lag. The stand on the back of the handset unit doesn't look very durable so I handle it with care. So far since March this year, this monitor has been the most useful gift for our family.

Reviews.Title: It is fine when the video works
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: This device ha a bad habit of the video feed not working. Sound will be coming in just fine but no video. Not exactly what you want happening at 2AM.

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: Potsos
Reviews.Content: It works! just remember you will need to keep moving the camera to each room and plug it in or buy extra monitors if you want to switch rooms, If I were going to buy again I would buy a wireless camera. If you need it for one room it works just fine!  it's made out of plastic which almost looks like a toy but so far I have not had a bit of trouble with it, and the night vision works perfect!

Reviews.Title: Infant monitor
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor for the price. You have the option of adding 3 more cameras with the unit. It has great color and night vision. I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Mommy Mich
Reviews.Content: We bought this based on the #1 sales rank and good reviews. This is fantastic, you can keep full-reception even at 300ft between walls without interference. A nice tool to check on the baby during day and night.

Reviews.Title: Best for $$
Reviews.Author: midwestHD
Reviews.Content: Had a motorola 3.5inch until it broke. Was outside warranty period and had to get a new one. I did not want to spend several hundred dollars on a baby monitor again when it spends most of it's time around kids... and without a proper casing for the handheld monitor device, it breaks more easily than you think.The screen is this is smaller but I do not feel a bigger screen is worth nearly half the money. The signal is the same (if not better) than the motorola. Some of the features are gone, such as thermometer, two way talk, music that plays on the transmitting unit (aweful music I must say!), but for the same money I could get a set with more cameras setup around the house. Just like the motorola, no static or internet interference.We have had this infant optics monitor for 3 months now and my 3 year old abused this monitor unit with all his mighty strength (he loves throwing things around), but it still works just fine (other than some scratches and dents on the outside).

Reviews.Title: Had issues with battery, in the middle of being resolved
Reviews.Author: ypfeif
Reviews.Content: The monitor at first worked fine and I was happy. One night I woke up with my daughter SCREAMING from down the hall and the monitor screen was black. I realized that the handheld unit was running off the battery even when plugged in. In order for it to last me all day, I periodically unplug it and plug it right back in to charge the battery. I got this monitor 6 weeks ago so I'm passed the 'hassle-free return' date even though I only started using the monitor 2 weeks ago. I emailed the customer service but haven't received a reply in a few days. I called the phone number and the machine says the office is closed even during the hours it says it's open. Hopefully someone will email me back soon. If so, I will update the review.Update: Customer service did get back to me after my second email saying they have never had this problem before. They offered a possible solution but since it didn't work, they'll swap my monitor. Problem is, I'll probably be responsible for shipping it out to California and I won't have a monitor while the unit is on its way to me :(

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: jen
Reviews.Content: Been using this for about 4 months now and had no problems so far. Owned an old summer infant (back in 2007) and a vtech audio-only monitor I got from toys-r-us and this monitor is a big step up. The functions are very basic so there are no pan/tilt function or two way talk, but it has all the bare neccessities that we need such as reliable signal, good video and audio, and compatibility with our wifi and cordless phones. I highly recommend this for parents who are looking for something basic at a good value.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: crediria "Ray"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I are very please with this monitor after 2 months of owning this. We use it all the time and it's proved itself durable enough to handle a few drops from table height.It's a pretty basic monitor with not too many features and functions, and this is perfect for my wife. She is anti-technology and she wants something nice and easy to use. This monitor is straight forward to use, has a large display, great nightvision, and flawless connection around the perimeter of our home. We didn't have any problems with the internet using this device although it uses 2.4ghz transmission.Needless to say, we love the price with free shipping!

Reviews.Title: Works and reliable
Reviews.Author: Eric A.W.
Reviews.Content: works excellent and well priced. Picture is very clear in all settings. It's great how we can even set up our 2nd camera in the basement and still receive reception. Most of all, this unit doesn't interfere with our belkin router like our summer infant did.Best monitor for in this price range!

Reviews.Title: simply good
Reviews.Author: Marky
Reviews.Content: for the money I paid, I'm really satisfied... it has a decent-sized screen with smooth video, good connection, no inteference... I asked my wife what she wanted and her criteria was simple- she wanted something that was simple and basic and could watch over our baby. this was it!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor and great customer service
Reviews.Author: JennB
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical about this monitor due to the price but was pleasantly surprised when it arrived. It does feel a little cheap but the picture quality is great. several months after using the monitor I was having trouble with the battery charging. I quickly contacted customer service by email and their response time was great. they sent me a detailed email to trouble shoot the problem and when I isolated the problem to the charger they sent me a new one in the mail no questions asked. They could have easily charged me for a new charger which they sell on amazon. I was pleasantly surprised about their great customer service and would definitely recommend this monitor to others.

Reviews.Title: Really useful
Reviews.Author: Mecca Allen
Reviews.Content: I love my video monitor, I can watch the baby everywhere in the house. If I want to save some battery, I switch the VOX mode on and have the monitor unit switch on when she makes any noise. I still check on her incase the monitor doesn't turn on when she needs to, but I think I'm worry too much. It's nice to see her breathing (her tummy goes up and down) in the dark and I don't need to keep the lights at dim to see her with the great nice vision this monitor has. The only thing that I would complain about it doesn't come with a dock to charge the monitor. It would be such much nicer if I could just slide it into a dock rather than to plug the cord in everytime I want to charge it.Overall a very reliable and simple monitor that is made for moms. Hasn't failed me since the day I got it!

Reviews.Title: Only survived 2 months
Reviews.Author: T-bird "T-bird"
Reviews.Content: It was a decent monitor for the price when it worked, but my unit didn't last even 2 months... outside Amazon's return window :( The manufacturer has a 1 year limited warranty but stupid me threw out the box, only keeping the manual and receipt.  I couldn't return it because the manufacturer will only allow returns in original packaging.  The cons were deal breakers for me so I won't be buying a replacement from this company.Pros-----Monitor comes with a rechargeable battery with decent battery life when charged-Clear signal and sound-Good range-Nice angle adjustment on the cameraCons-----Bad connection of charger to monitor.  The unit often wouldn't have power or charge.-Bad wiring in camera.  It would turn off and on as I adjusted the angle of the camera or even just moved it.-Sound trigger on camera does not seem to work well... my baby would clearly be crying on the monitor, but the sound wouldn't register or would intermittently go in and out.-Do you really have to require original packaging for return?

Reviews.Title: Good monitor, worth the price
Reviews.Author: Cecile S.
Reviews.Content: Good monitor with clear audio and video and works even at long range.The automute function silences the white noise if you don't like it. The quality is not the best but the price makes up for everything. I would rather get 2 sets of these monitors and keep an eye on 2 rooms rather than another brand for just one set.

Reviews.Title: Excellent video monitor
Reviews.Author: Shannon Lu
Reviews.Content: This video monitor lets us sleep without worrying so much! It's great to be able to see my child when we sleep in different rooms. We considered IP cameras but they seemed for too complicated and would burn out our battery on the iphones too quickly. We choose this based on the good reviews and good price, backed-up by #1 bestseller in the baby monitor category. Although IP cams have a good price too (since they just needed a camera unit, avoiding the extra production cost for another monitor unit with a screen) but we wanted something that we can watch 24-7

Reviews.Title: Interferes with wifi
Reviews.Author: AJG
Reviews.Content: I bought this so I could watch my grandson without going in his room over and over.  It does function well but the description says it will not interfere with other wirelss devices.  Well I hate to say it but that is just not true.  My home wifi doesn't work well when the transmitter is on.  We have to turn it off when we want to use our wifi...If you can get over this little problem then it works great.  I am on the hunt for a replacement model....

Reviews.Title: GREAT MONITOR!
Reviews.Author: Hul Le' Hul
Reviews.Content: Used this baby monitor for 2 weeks already and we really love it.Video: excellent. Not HD, but still gives a very clear and smooth video on a average sized screenaudio: very clear but not as loud as I thought at max volume. Auto mute functions useful if you don't want the static buzzrange: excellent. Haven't had any connection issues so farinterference: None!Setup: just plug the two units in and it's set.Battery life: around 3-4 hours, and will last a night long if you have it in VOX.quality: don't expect it to be the best. average. Dropped it off the bedside once and it still works normal however.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: I am a new mother and my worries exceed my height but with the infant optics video monitor i can at least get some peaceful sleep! I absolutely LOVE this monitor and have had no issues what so ever with it. It allows me to get a full nights sleep to where i do not have to worry, i know the VOX will wake me if my baby wakes up or starts to fuss in his sleep. Therefore , baby and i both sleep better in our own beds with our own space.I read many reviews on multiple products before i decided on a monitor and i'm so very glad i chose this one and not a very expensive one.  This monitor has everything you could possibly need: very clear view ( day and night ) clear audio when you need it, does cut out backround noise until the child makes noise ( love it) and no interference with other objectsHowever the only thing that i do no like is that sometimes a loud noise in other parts of the house activates the VOX but that is very minor.If your looking to pass this up due to other reviews or talk about "Cheap, plastic like feel" ( does feel like plastic but is good quality i think people have cheap confused with lightweight. I am rough on objects, drop them all the time. and my is still one piece working just as well as the day i took it out of the box) DON'T! this is a steal! and i believe you would love it as much as i do!

Reviews.Title: Excellent baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Aristoula Goff
Reviews.Content: We got this infant optics monitor when my daughter was 18 months old. Before I had a monitor, I was always worried about him consequently making trips in the middle of my sleep just to make sure that she is alright. After using this monitor it gives me such a better feeling knowing that I can check up on her even when the room is totally dark.I regret waiting so long before I upgraded to a video monitor!

Reviews.Title: Great price for a great monitor!
Reviews.Author: Amber D Melena
Reviews.Content: This monitor doesn't have all the bells and whistles but it has exactly what I need. A bright, clear screen and good night vision. The hand held part keeps signal anywhere in my house and has good battery life. At night I just leave it on and plugged in on my nightstand. I also like that it filters out back ground noise (like a music box) but picks sound back up when a new noise (like your baby crying) starts up. The only downside for me is that when it's close to my head and everything is quiet at night I can hear a high pitch noise coming from it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: jjezz
Reviews.Content: Got this product at our door in 2 days after ordering and after using it for a few minutes I already fell in love with this! The handheld monitor is very light and fits into my pocket. It's really easy to use and there are not complicated functions. Works with our wifi as promised.

Reviews.Title: Great while it last
Reviews.Author: Andre
Reviews.Content: I was really happy with the monitor, it was great for the price until it broke two days after the return window ended...Thanks to the amazing customer service I got a replacement

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Little penny
Reviews.Content: It's completely quiet, can see at night, no interference with my other 2.4ghz devices and has good video and audio quality. The VOX function is too sensitive for us so we never use it. We've tried taking this to our shed in the garden and it still didn't lose connection. A good monitor for what it's worth.

Reviews.Title: Great Inexpensive Monitor
Reviews.Author: LeslieB
Reviews.Content: We've had this since Feb of 2012. It stopped charging recently and I dealt directly with the company and they were able to resolve the issue and is working great again! We have our 1 yr old upstairs and it's great for us to keep tabs on her. It's clear and works well. It doesn't have the longest battery life, but we just keep it charged regularly.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Anita Q
Reviews.Content: Since this is our first time getting a video baby monitor, we made our choice very carefully. We bought this based on the good ranking and reviews at a fair price. I was told by a friend of mine that these things are 'must-have' items if you just had a baby. I agree with her! I am extremely pleased with this product. I'm glad to say that it didn't affect our internet nor did it have a noisy beeping problem.We plan on getting another camera to link it to our current monitor.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: mommagurl13
Reviews.Content: We were not even thinking about getting a video monitor for our second baby after having just a simple audio monitor with our first because of the price of all of them.  But then we found this one.  It got pretty good reviews... and was only a little bit more money than any decent audio monitors.  We have been using it for a couple weeks now and are not that impressed. It is nice to be able to see our almost 2 year old while she is sleeping (or not sleeping) in her crib.  It has decent night vision set up so we can still see her in the dark. However, the parent unit does not keep a charge for long at all! We keep it charged for all of the day except for her nap, which is maybe up to 3 hours.  It doesn't even usually last that whole time. The other complaint we have is that it interferes with our internet connection randomly.  My hubby started complaining about that part a week or so ago and I thought he was crazy until it started happening to me over the last couple of days.  Overall, I probably wouldn't buy it again, but will keep it because it's too much of a pain to send it back at this point.Update: 12/28/12This is definitely not worth the money I paid, and I am already wishing I spent a little more money in the first place to get a nicer monitor.  The antenna's cheap plastic has broken off and now the monitor is useless.  It doesn't have any signal.  I have ordered a much nicer Motorola monitor to replace this. I would definitely NOT recommend buying this, but do plenty of research and spend the extra money!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for us
Reviews.Author: SLEN
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly! It's well built, no setup time and very easy to use. We were deciding between an IP cam VS a traditional video monitor. IP cameras were great if you have an ipad or an iphone, but the complex setup and the long downtime starting up the app and getting the picture did not impress us. This works instantaneously the moment you switch it on, and it doesn't hog up the screen when you need to use your phone for something else. We keep this running constantly throughout the day when we are next to our 6 month old girl.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Hammer Master
Reviews.Content: Great monitor! Nice big screen, nice colors and image resolution, clear audio... it's got all the basics that we wanted. Haven't had any problems so far.A big step up from our summer infant slim & secure monitor that my 2 year old broke already!

Reviews.Title: 1 year review - Not so handy after all... disappointed
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Consbruck
Reviews.Content: First off, let me say that I can't live without this video monitor! It has been one of the best baby items we purchased! I would have given it 5 stars except for the fact that it runs on the same frequency as our wireless internet so using a laptop or using WiFi on your phone is difficult-impossible unless you turn the monitor off. That is the only complaint I have about the device.It has little to no white noise in the background which is nice while you are sleeping. It can be quite bright, but I put a pillow between its light and me and that does the trick for me. The customer care is excellent. We have emailed them twice and received a response very quickly. They are eager to help you and make sure their product is great, even after months of having it.We have had this monitor for 8 months now and continue to love it. I would suggest keeping the camera unit plugged in at all times to keep you from having to constantly plug it in if it dies. Also while you are sleeping, the handheld will die after a few hours if it is not continuously charging.I always recommend this baby monitor to all of our friends because we love it. (except for the frequency hiccup.)***1 Year Later (+ a few months)***Today, our monitor died completely. Previously we had to have the cord replaced and the battery replaced by warranty and had great customer service. Now however, the warranty is gone and the monitor won't turn on. It says it is charging, but no buttons work on it. I am very disappointed that this no longer works because we really thought it was a great value! Now to go out and buy a new one on the fly... hopefully we can research it and find a better one than this.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: MMN
Reviews.Content: We bought this in preparation for our second child. With our first we received the summers infant video monitor as a gift and really liked that one but were looking for something a bit more affordable. So far this has been great. The range is great, the sound is very minimal (we use a sound machine in our sons room and you can barely hear it over the monitor).  The only thing that I do not like is that you can't turn of the video but keep the sound on - which we use on the other monitor while sleeping but that can be easily solved by just flipping the monitor over on your nightstand. So far this product has been great. Very happy, especially considering the price.

Reviews.Title: Very Unstable
Reviews.Author: Samsung Galaxy Tab Retractable cable
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product due to the average good reviews. In one month, I had to take the battery out for 10 minutes and reset it 4 times.If you have wifi devices uncompatible with the 5GHZ - or N network, it's a nightmare that you have to deal with.

Reviews.Title: As expected!
Reviews.Author: Randolph
Reviews.Content: Does everything as described here. Very good video and sound clarity and range. Great reception without any wifi signal problems in my 3000feet home. It comes with a little stand up mount for the camera and we use it so we can look down from our tall cabinet. Looking from a higher position prevents the night vision from being blocked from by the bars of the crib.

Reviews.Title: Not too bad for price
Reviews.Author: Emily R. Hoover
Reviews.Content: For the price this monitor is pretty good.  The video is decent and the power saving setting is nice.  My only complaint is that there is no alarm or anything to indicate the battery is going to die.  Our old monitors would beep loudly right before the battery died to tell us to plug it in.  This does not do anything and just shuts off.  There have been a few times that we have not even noticed it turned off until we realized we didn't see the green light on anymore.  Other than that no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Video monitor
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Pesendorfer "SPR"
Reviews.Content: This is my second monitor. I have a summer infant and the handset unit is very heavy to bring around. I now use it to keep an eye at the front door. Surprisingly both units do not interfere with each other so I keep them both running in the house.Likes:- light handset unit- great night vision- no internet interference- no static noise- simple operations- excellent video and audio quality and frame rateDislikes:- only 4 hour battery life with VOX turned off- no two way communicationsThis was on my wish list and it's still my favorite gift so far!

Reviews.Title: Great, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Molly's Mom
Reviews.Content: After accidentally frying our $300 video monitor while on vacation in Europe, we got this replacement. It is totally functional and gives a clear picture. My favorite is that the sound goes silent when there is just ambient noise and then comes on, even hours later, when my baby cries. Since we use a white noise maker, this feature is really great. It feels a little flimsy but absolutely does a good job.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: B-Camp
Reviews.Content: This camera system works great for our needs.  The price point is outstanding for such a great monitoring system...couldn't be happier with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Digital age monitor
Reviews.Author: Preston
Reviews.Content: We upgraded from our 7 year old analog video monitor to this. Digital is the way to go! Zero static and much better range than before. We still use the old monitor for my older son who's 5 years old now and having the dxr5 sit next to this is a pure humiliation with a much clearer video and sound! The night vision is fantastic. The only problem is that we have an air purifier in the room so it can never go into auto-mute mode unless we turn the purifier off.I great monitor that I would recommened.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: M. Thompson
Reviews.Content: We were traveling and our current video monitor broke. We bought this sort of under the gun not expecting much for the price. But it turned out to be a great monitor -- esp for the price. Great visibility, super easy to use. My only comments: 1) wish it had a clock on it and 2) wish it had a warning signal when battery was low. It just shuts off so it you're not paying attention - you might not realize its turned off (which could result in a great nights sleep!).

Reviews.Title: Pretty amazing!
Reviews.Author: Li li ma ma
Reviews.Content: this reasonably priced baby monitor would probably work for most families that want something that doesn't cost a fortune. If you are a high roller, this isn't the monitor for you. it's very basic and raw, and it's pretty much what you really need especially if this first video baby monitor. I bought this based on it was #1 seller at the time (and it still is as I see) and I think most people buy this because of the value, and it's great if that is your primary concern. The light from the screen can't be turned off all the way so we have it facing slightly away from us while we sleep. would be great if this can be fixed on their next model.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful gift
Reviews.Author: Freedoll
Reviews.Content: Got this gift for our 3rd child and we really enjoyed this product. We had this on our wish list and I'm so glad my sister in law got this. It would have been great if we could set the sensitivity gain for the automute but other than that, this is the perfect gift for us. We are planning to get 2 more camera units so we can place one in every room.

Reviews.Title: Great choice for baby monitor!
Reviews.Author: SanDiegoMan
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased that we selected a monitor with video.  It definitely helps to see the baby when you hear a sound rather than having to go into the room to determine if the sound might indicate something of significance.  This is a great buy for the money.  I was very  impressed with the quality of the video even in the dark when the infrared is functioning.  No regrets.  We would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Pure Crap
Reviews.Author: Liam Harrington
Reviews.Content: Horrible quality.  The clarity is similar to that seen in Paranormal Activity movies....grainy, black & white and fuzzy.  Pay more and get a better monitor.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Jennie Spahn
Reviews.Content: I think this is must-have if you do not sleep with your baby! We keep this running throughout the night and watch over our little one while she is asleep. Although it would be better if we had another monitor so we can see the other side of the crib when she rolls over and we can't see her face. For what we have and the price we paid, this is an absolute treat. The monitor unit is quite sturdy after it working perefectly from a few drops off the table from 3 feet onto a wooden floor. The only complaint I have is that the batteries don't last more than 4 hours without power saving mode (we hate the power saving feature!) so we are planning to order another power cord to keep around the house.

Reviews.Title: Did not meet our needs
Reviews.Author: Patrick Murzyn
Reviews.Content: We purchased this monitor for our toddler in preparation for transition out of a crib.  The camera was placed on a dresser approximately six feet across the room, level with the crib.  As such, we were monitoring our child through the slats of the crib.As many reviews have noted, the unit itself is fairly basic and consistent with the "value" label.  We did not have any issues with how the unit functioned; however, the image and sound quality did not provide the detail we were looking for.From a video perspective, the infrared capability was diminished either by distance or viewing obstructed through the crib slats.  Those mounting the camera to look down into a crib and/or from a closer distance may have better results.From an audio perspective, again distance may have proven a factor; however, we do also have a basic, audio-only monitor placed at the same distance which provided superior results.  Audio was unintelligible, and we also experienced a failure of the noise-activated/Vox mode when we were awakened by a screaming child but dormant monitor.  One other note: using this monitor created an audible hum in the audio-only monitor that operates on the same frequency.  We could not, for instance, use this monitor in one child's room while using the audio-only monitor in a second child's room.Overall, this monitor did not operate inconsistent with it's "value" promise.  But its performance for our specific use dictated that we return it for another solution.

Reviews.Title: Best monitor I've owned
Reviews.Author: Dequeal
Reviews.Content: If you are watching your wallet and want to get the most out of your money, this is the one to get. I'm very satisfied with this monitor. Gives me more time to cook and clean the home without worrying about my baby napping upstairs. Makes audio monitors that I've owned look like outdated technology! I still keep it as backup however just incase this video monitor dies.Wonderful device for parents!

Reviews.Title: Awesome baby mon
Reviews.Author: Celia
Reviews.Content: The DXR5 is a really basic and simple monitor for nearly half the price of what's out there. This was what we wanted so we didn't have unrealistic expectations for a $99 monitor (with free shipping!). The video reception and everything was perfect around the house and it didn't interfere with our internet. The voltage is works worldwide so I'll be taking this to our vacation to Asia next month while we stay at my sister's. Great monitor so far!

Reviews.Title: Only lasted a month
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: This monitor was great while it worked.  Unfortunately 18 days after the return window expired it stopped working. It may just be worth the extra 100.00 to buy a better product.  If you don't mind taking a chance on this monitor for 100.00 then this is the item!!!

Reviews.Title: Moniter is aweful
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I ended up getting rid of it because for one the sound wouldnt work #2 battery stopped charging after a week of use and again sound never worked and 3 and this one is my fault threw the box out so I couldnt return it. steer clear of this one its far and byond not worth it

Reviews.Title: Love this system!
Reviews.Author: The Flory
Reviews.Content: After my Summer Infant video monitor died, I was in search for a replacement but didn't want to go over our budget. We wanted a system with 3 cameras. This infant optics monitor was one of the best options for value (from what we saw from reviews) considering we had to get 2 extra addon cams.I've very satisfied with this monitor considering I've only used this for 2 weeks. Everything is very intuitive and easy to use. We only needed to refer to the manual to pair up the 2 extra cams, other than that, all the buttons and functions are self explanatory. The plastic looks doesn't look very sturdy but it also makes the handheld unit extremely light weight, nearly the weight of the new iphone 5 I would say. I sometimes had interference problems with my internet when using the summer infant but with this, I haven't had any problems yet!So far we love this and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Does it's job
Reviews.Author: Sara Hazuka "Vegas Momma"
Reviews.Content: We had to return (on warranty) a different/more expensive video monitor (Summer Infant) we originally purchased when our daughter was born. It wouldn't charge & would randomly turn off. Anyway, I like this one in comparison. The only thing that bothers me is that the hand held part isn't heavy enough & it's charging cord has a weight on it so it doesn't stay put on my night stand. Also, like others said, the volume doesn't get as loud, but it's still loud enough to wake me. The sound is "tinny" but that's ok too. I like it's features.

Reviews.Title: Baby Video Monitor
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: Gave this as a present to my son, for the new grandson.  They love it.  They also have a one year old.  The video screen is very clear and the night vision works great!!!! They said "they now get to see what their children are really doing" LOL

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics
Reviews.Author: Ron Quarrie
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor arrived only 2 days after I ordered and it was nicely packaged and presented.It's a very simple monitor so we had it wired up and set up within 5 minutes from opening the box.We wished we read more carefully before we bought it (I just went straight for the best seller in baby monitor category from the amazon ranking) but the camera unit doesn't have battery portability - only the handheld monitor unit does.Otherwise everything is exceptional. It's simple to use, BASIC enough for my wife to use, clear image and sound, good range, no wifi problems... just everything that we wanted. The night vision was also very good so that we can see our baby's tummy go up and down while he breathes at night in the dark.This is a great monitor if you are looking for something nice and simple for a good price.

Reviews.Title: good monitor...bad interference
Reviews.Author: jcg
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor with two cameras for our two kids. While the monitor works fine, our wireless internet does not. Drove us crazy trying to figure out why all of the sudden the wireless was choppy ... working fine sometimes and not at all others. The cameras and the handheld viewer really disturb the signal. It is a pain to always have to unplug and turn of all components to use the internet. We previously had the summer infant monitor with one camera and had no problems at all. We had to upgrade because we needed two cameras, wish we had known of this problem would have spent more for a different set.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Mommy Jane
Reviews.Content: Fantastic product. Very good video and audio performance. Compared to my summer infant, the video is much more smooth on this (no lag). Everything is in real-time playback. I have 2 camera units, one to monitor my baby and one to monitor my 70 yr old mom. Although you can only see one camera at a time, for the money spent, I'm very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Could've been a good monitor if it worked for us
Reviews.Author: Liss
Reviews.Content: I ordered this monitor after seeing the affordable price (when comparing to other video baby monitors), but unfortunately I had to send it back after realizing that there was an interference in the connection.  When I read the instruction manual, it said certain wireless routers can interfere with the operation of the product, and one of the ways to resolve it was to turn the monitor on after disconnecting the router, and then turning it back on.  I don't know about you, but I don't want to constantly turn of the internet's wireless router anytime I need to operate the baby monitor.I ended up returning the product and purchasing the Motorola baby monitor.  It's double the price but I am so much happier with it as it has other functions that this product didn't offer, and I feel it is worth the extra cost.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor if you don't need wifi
Reviews.Author: A. Hadidian "Ara"
Reviews.Content: This monitor is pretty great with a huge caveat.If you have a wifi network it kills it!I have to turn the base unit off to get any type of wifi to work.I bought a $150 Cisco router with dual bands.But the 5ghz spectrum has lousy range.So I love and hate this monitor.It's pretty tough since we have dropped it many times on hard tile. Interior screen is now kinked to the side but still working.  once you read the directions the VOX works but pushing two opposite side buttons to go through the modes is not intuitive. You need to hold onto the instructiion booklet.But I can't wait to pass this on to the next parents who don't use iPhones, iPads, and laptops using wifi.Which is essentially nobody. Maybe an Amish family?H

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Vance
Reviews.Content: Owned this for nearly half a year now and our whole family has been very pleased with this monitor. Even our 6 year old son knows how to use this! He abused it pretty badly and I'm glad that it's still working fine with a few scratches and dents...We love how we can see our 5 month old breathes while he sleeps. This really is a necessity for all parents who can't sleep at night and worry too much about their kids. You can literally watch your baby sleep throughout the night.

Reviews.Title: Good enough
Reviews.Author: Victor Lutin
Reviews.Content: I think this product it's nice, but I don't like one thing:When the monitor is near to battery empty, the green light blinks like 5 times and then, shutting down. I think that will be better to have another kind of battery low indicator, that not works like this, because I just have like 4 seconds before the monitor shutting down.All other specs are great, specially the night vision :), the Wifi doesn't cause problems with my home access point.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: Tennille Northcutt
Reviews.Content: excellent video baby monitor, it works and looks great and has better reception than my wifi signal around the house. love the clear video picture day and night. price is unbeatable!

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Omintal
Reviews.Content: I really love this monitor! It's very simple and easy to use, and nothing fancy, but it does all I need it to do. Night vision is awesome, you can see every little detail in total darkness. No static and no interference with internet signals in our house. This is an excellent buy!

Reviews.Title: Works well for price
Reviews.Author: IC
Reviews.Content: Picks up voice really well and no interference with my router.  So far so good.  Has the basic functions you need, image and sound pick-up.  No bells and whistles... i.e. intercom, temperature, etc.  It works very well for us.The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the camera does not point down, just up.  We had to velcro the camera on a microphone stand so we can point the camera down on the crib.  Besides that, everything else is working well so far.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Su1980
Reviews.Content: This monitor has been doing exactly what it suppose to do. It's not the most advanced system, but for the price I think this is the best deal out there. The price is good, video and audio is very clear, and we don't have any wifi issues. We had to walk into our neighbors house for it to drop the signal... which I am not intended to do on a regular basis! Operating it is very simple, and no complicated menus and modes that I need to learn (I keep all the mute and hibernation mode off and it works just as I hope it would)

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Beck123
Reviews.Content: I really like this product, it's easy to set up and it's lightweight and clear view of screen.  It also never gets interference or other problems I had with my old video monitor by Summer.  I can hear everything perfectly and they even have neat settings that save power by shutting down when it doesn't dectect movement or sound (if u choose to do so-it also lets you leave it on full time).  I love this especially bc then when my son is sleeping soundly my room can be completely dark which helps me and my husband sleep more comfortably-and the screen pops right back up if it detects any noise etc.  Excellent all around.  I would give it five stars if the screen was larger, but that's about it.

Reviews.Title: Nice baby monitor
Reviews.Author: CJ-Twink
Reviews.Content: My wife just recently got laid off so we had a tight budget on everything we bought, including things for our baby. We realized that this was the best monitor for value and we didn't have to fork out a fortune to get a video monitor when it's only $99 for a set. Overall, this monitor is surely amazing. I know that audio monitors only cost a fraction of a video monitor, but we were really big on watching our son while he sleeps.Pros:- obviously the price- big clear screen for video- basic functions so it doesn't confuse my wife- excellent night vision- no interference as we know that some 2.4ghz monitors have had problems with routers etc.- nice small hand held unit to carry aroundCons:- the viewing angle isn't very wide - we had to put our camera on the shelf so we got the whole crib in the viewing frame- battery - will not last a whole night- VOX power saving mode - it shuts off only when no sound is made for a few minutes, and if you have a fan in the room (like how we do) it will never go into power saving. Basically we must have our charger connected throughout the night.

Reviews.Title: Ok for video. Terrible for sound.
Reviews.Author: J. Shore
Reviews.Content: We opted for this product over some of the more expensive camera-baby monitors out there. I want to love it but it has one major flaw that kinda matters a lot... it's terrible at picking up sound. Sure you can wake up in the middle of the night and look at your precious gem of a baby sleeping like an angel, but you better sleep within earshot of your crying baby because you'll never hear it through the monitor. It's a big flaw considering monitoring your baby's well being is it's sole purpose.It also doesn't tilt down. We wanted it to sit on the changing table and point down into the crib. However, it's not designed to tilt down. I don't get why that't not a function. You can't put anything in cribs nowadays and I don't want to drill into the wall or the side of our overpriced crib so what are we supposed to do?The plus is that the video quality is great in good light and in the dark. It also gets decent battery life.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Ah83
Reviews.Content: This product is great! I can watch my baby very clearly at night. The camera was easy to set up and the monitor picks up sound well. Good purchase!

Reviews.Title: Cheap!!!
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: Since day one of having this monitor it would constantly lose signal. I have only used it inside and where it cuts out the most is when I'm in my living room which is directly below my daughters room so it's not like I'm far away from the camera. I have to turn the power off and back on again for it to work again. Then it didn't help that it was dropped once and the antenna broke off. I haven't even had this monitor for 4 months and now the video has stopped working and the sound is cutting out constantly. Complete garbage. I'll be contacting the manufacturer in the morning.

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: Jes383
Reviews.Content: We're so glad we bought this moniter. Although it doesn't have all the perks the ones that cost 3 times what this one does it does the job. I can see my infant so clearly I can see his chest move up and down.It doesn't give us a warning when the battery's low it just shuts off. You can only hear and see one monitor at a time.

Reviews.Title: Cam
Reviews.Author: DW
Reviews.Content: Met expectations and review I read. Happy with the purchase. The cam is good quality, portable and plugs can handle 110 to 240v great for traveling.

Reviews.Title: very good device
Reviews.Author: mauri
Reviews.Content: It's just as i read in other reviews. The materials are no so good, but works perfect. Any problem at all.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Williamsmom
Reviews.Content: By far a very good product! Great for the price and it works really well! You really don't have to spend hundreds on monitor, this one really does the job!! Peace of mind:) works great:) good price:) bottom line:)

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Pete Pete
Reviews.Content: We looked around for a baby monitor after our first child. We were deciding between the Infant Optics and the Summer Infant, and after going through the reviews for hours (and sticking with the most popular monitor with highest ranking on amazon), we decided to buy this one. We are very impressed with what we received. The audio and video is better than the ones I've seen from friends and family, and most importantly there is no internet interference which I was most afraid of - we can NOT live without internet! Everything works as expected and it still works like a charm after dropping it several times (don't be fooled by its fragile-looking plastic material). Parents are reluctant to get a video monitor because it costs a fortune. Not this one! Overall, great monitor at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Cannot beat this video monitor for the price! Wish the sound was better though...
Reviews.Author: M. Smith
Reviews.Content: We got this monitor a few weeks back when we finally decided to crib train. We had been cosleeping before, but it was time.Mainly, we got this monitor because our son will often make fussing noises in his sleep, or will fuss for a minute or so without actually waking. This meant that with our sound only monitor (NTM-910YLW - Sony Baby Call Nursery Monitor) we had several false alarms throughout the night, and sometimes even woke him up as we went to his room, when he would have just gone to sleep by himself had we not entered his room. With this unit we can monitor our son and see if we genuinely need to go into his room or if he is fine.I have only TWO complaints about this product:- The sound doesn't get loud enough. I'm a fairly heavy sleeper now that we aren't cosleeping anymore. I have had to use this monitor in conjunction with our Sony baby monitor because the sound is clearer on that unit and the volume can be turned up a lot louder.- The battery does not last long. If we use this monitor at night it has to be plugged in or else it will die at some point in the night. It is good unplugged for our son's naptime in the day, which is normally 2-3 hours long. After that, if we try and turn it on later at bedtime without plugging it in, it dies and shuts off within a few minutes.I want to say, the VOX setting no longer makes beeping noises. I saw some reviews complaining of that, and others saying that it did not have that particular feature. I can confirm that. Both the sound AND the infared have an auto setting, and its easy to adjust those settings.Other than that, no complaints. it was extremely easy to set up, The video is clear and there is very little delay in the video monitor, the signal works well for us (we have a 2 story home), and the infared vision is the bomb diggity. I was hesitant to spend so much on a baby monitor (we bought the above mentioned monitor for less than $20), but I have no regrets and I hope this lasts long enough to use on the next kid we have.

Reviews.Title: satisfactorio
Reviews.Author: adrian
Reviews.Content: Llego a tiempo son novedades. La unica observacion es que la bateria dura menos de 24 horas.De ahi cuple con las espectativas

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: mama2nancy
Reviews.Content: I have this with 2 extra monitors and we have every single of our rooms covered under our surveillence. The camera does not know how to move left and right, but for the money we paid, it is impossible to get a digital monitor system with 3 cameras. The handset unit worked in every corner of our house and the video clarity is amazing no matter under daylight or complete darkness (you need to set the IR auto or ON for it to work, which we didn't know until we read through the manual). We've also played around with our friend's monitor but it was touchscreen and he said adjusting the volume was a pain (going through the menu and selecting the settings). This one has direct buttons to adjust the volume up and down. In summary, this is a great basic monitor for the value.

Reviews.Title: Annoying
Reviews.Author: Melly "Viper"
Reviews.Content: Great little monitor but it interferes with our belkin router.  We've decided to keep it though and just turn it off and use our regular monitor as a back up when we are on the internet.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price
Reviews.Author: theskeptic "theskeptic"
Reviews.Content: Wow, I'm pretty amazed at what you can get for 100 bucks.  This thing works great, picture quality is great, night vision is great, build quality is fine, nice design.  What more could you ask for?  Ooops, gotta go... baby is waking up.

Reviews.Title: Affordable, functional, but poorly built
Reviews.Author: Jtru
Reviews.Content: I've owned this monitor for about 6 months now, and it has worked great until now.  Besides not having a battery level indicator (which was annoying, considering you don't know how long you can trust it off the charger), it did everything it said it would and was priced well.Having said that, the connector on the charger has since since frayed and completely disconnected.  I found another adapter laying around my house with similar voltage levels and it worked for a few days, but now the sound doesn't work.  I have since contacted the manufacturer for some sort of reimbursement.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: MJ
Reviews.Content: No static noise at all, will detect movement!! Great design and functionality, I love the colored screen as wellAwesome product that you won't regret buying!!

Reviews.Title: THE BEST for the money!
Reviews.Author: R. M. Johnson "McKay"
Reviews.Content: 1. Has never dropped the signal.2. I can do yardwork outside while she naps.3. We were at a neighbor's house for a party and she needed to go down for the night. We put her down at our house and took the monitor next door. PERFECT picture and sound.4. BEST PART: I get to look at her every night before I go to sleep :)(Oh, also, travels GREAT!! We take it everywhere and it works in ANY house)

Reviews.Title: Was a little scared at first...
Reviews.Author: Kacey
Reviews.Content: OK so this is my 1st review but i thought i would write one because this is actually a GREAT product! I was a little scared at first because i had read alot of the reviews and it was good and bad. so heres my storyGot the product didnt read any directions and kept getting out of signal range (i was only like 20 feet away) so i started to get kinda mad... well then i read the directions and saw i needed to pair the two devices and YAY IT WORKED!**MY DAUGHTER HAS HER 1ST COLD**so i was really scared because the 1st night (left the manual at my parents house) the sound kept shutting off (which is a setting) and wouldnt go back on unless there was a loud noise... so i wrote their customer service at like 10pm central time and just used two monitors that night. By the time i woke up the next morning (6:00am) i had a response and they told me how to change the settings so that wouldnt happen!!! so now that the settings are perfect for me where it doesnt shut off and the sound always is on its AWESOME!!!OH!! and I forgot to mention that before my boyfriend mounted the camera to the wall i duct taped it... and it fell down... but guess what... ITS STILL WORKING!!!! :) (knock on wood it stays that way its been a few days tho so i am feeling safe!)Over all i love this thing the ONLY thing i would complain about is the fact that its REALLY addicting and makes it hard to fall a sleep at night(at least for now) because its SOOOOOOOO funny watching what your LO does and how they toss and turn and sleep (mine is butt up in the air so its especially funny) the picture is good quality it is very basic but does what it says its gonna do and thats all i really care about. their customer service was VERY helpful and VERY nice and that is REALLY REAQLLY hard to find these days so i loved that!!!!Honestly, when your baby gets old enough to walk or stand up or anything the video monitor is AWESOME and this one is a STEAL!! i am VERY happy i have bought this product and have already recommended it to a few of my friends (which BTW i am VERY VERY VERY picky and think 99% of the stuff they try to tell new parents they need is complete BS) but this is awesome for the worried mother!!! :)

Reviews.Title: Great product for the buck!
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: Great picture, sound and presentation. Battery life not as good but not a big issue.Easy to carry around with no problem of interference.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: AMBS
Reviews.Content: So far this product has worked well with no issues. Extremely easy set up, with clear directions. No interference with my wifi. Night vision is something that I didn't initially think I would care about, but now can't live without. I initially just purchased the monitor with camera, but have been so pleased with the unit that went on to purchase another monitor/camera set with two additional cameras. So now have one monitor with two cameras for upstairs and downstairs. I think these are great baby monitors, toddler monitors and yes...even pet monitors. Also, had a missing piece in one of my packages and contacted the manufacturer who very promptly responded and is sending out the missing piece. Much appreciated as it saved me the hassle of having to return to Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, only battery a bit weak
Reviews.Author: Z. Tang
Reviews.Content: After fully charged the battery lasts only about 3 hours with VOS on (otherwise less than 2 hrs), so you have to charge the battery fairly often and this makes the monitor half-wireless... Other than this problem, I'm overall happy with the product, good day and night vision, sensitive sound detection, reasonable range, and all these at a very competitive price!

Reviews.Title: This is all you need!
Reviews.Author: Angela Craddock
Reviews.Content: Seriously, this is all you need! Don't spend all your money for a high-dollar monitor that does the same thing. The Infant Optics monitor is awesome! We have used it for 9 months now and have never had a problem. We did experience an issue with the power cord but I sent customer service an email and they sent me a replacement the next day! I was so happy with the service we received.Remember... the key is the placement of the camera (this is true for any monitor). You may have to get creative depending on your space. We used 3M strips to mount it on the wall to get the best view of our baby. Works like a charm!

Reviews.Title: Exceptional customer service
Reviews.Author: Garret E. Akerson
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor for the price. It does exactly what you want it to!  I did have problems with the unit's durability, but customer service replaced my unit twice so far with absolutely no problem, so I still give it 5 stars! The first time the receivers antenna broke, and the second time the charger stopped connecting. They responded to my emails within hours (even on the weekend) and mailed me replacement parts free of charge. Great company!

Reviews.Title: Bom beneficio/custo, silenciosa, mas nao tem video stand by!
Reviews.Author: Bandeira
Reviews.Content: Entrega o q promete. Pontos positivos: Preco e No silencio nao tem chiado algum, pois corta o audio na ausencia de som. Ponto negativo: nao e possivel desligar o video e ficar so com o audio. Video fica "aceso" o tempo todo. Pra dormir tenho que virar com a tela pra baixo. Boa compra um abraço

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Scott Miller
Reviews.Content: This monitor is very basic and simple, and this is what my wife requested. It's doesn't have the pan function, no two talking, no zoom... this is a bare video monitor. It's nearly half the price of what is out there and we rather have a few extra camera units rather than these rather useless features.We initially had some internet interference (our download speed slowed to 1/3) which wasn't a surprise learning that this was running on the 2.4ghz range, and customer service told us to upgrade our router (we got a airport extreme eventually). Now the internet is fine, our our download speed is much faster than before... i didn't know that a better router was so important!

Reviews.Title: Slide the battery in properly for it to work!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Hovis "Graceful Cat"
Reviews.Content: This isn't the best best baby monitor out there, but we wanted something best for value and this is definitely what we wanted.- clear audio and video - I can still see my baby breathing at night with night vision- no problems with our 2.4hz phone and internet- Voice power saving very useful as long as you keep the monitor plugged to a charger- Full reception around the house- Very small hand held unit, especially when compared to our Summer Infant monitor we bought 2 years ago- volume button is on the side - we don't have to go through any menus to select the volume- VERY WELL PRICED!important tip: the battery only works if you slide it down from the left... if you snap it down vertically it will NOT work... leaving you to suspect that the battery is dead. Luckily customer service taught us this little tip!

Reviews.Title: Excellent baby monitor
Reviews.Author: W.Edward
Reviews.Content: I was given the duty to find a good reliable monitor by my wife and decided on this. Much of the decision was based on this monitor being the #1 seller in the baby monitor category and things usually go well with best sellers - and it surely did! I showed this to my friends who came over and they didn't believe I only spent $100 all together with shipping. Would have been even better if it the UPS driver actually TRIED pressing the door bell a couple more times before leaving us a note that they thought no one was home!

Reviews.Title: Good price...but don't expect to work long.
Reviews.Author: Justin B.
Reviews.Content: Loved the price on this product and its advertised features. However, after three weeks of using the camera and monitor, problems have occurred and I wish I would have paid $20 more for a different monitor/camera or brand. After just three weeks of use, the monitor handset will not hold a charge unless it is continuously plugged into a wall electrical socket.  Therefore, there is no mobility when using the monitor handset. Additionally, the night vision on the camera will no longer work and will only work if there is a significant amount of light in the babies room. Therefore, the only options that remain are to let the baby sleep with the lights on (which isn't happening) or just use the monitor at night and listen for sound. With this being the case I could have purchased a way cheaper monitor that just transmits sounds and not video. Don't waste your money!

Reviews.Title: 4 month review
Reviews.Author: Krilil
Reviews.Content: Had this monitor for about 4 months now. Working fine since first opened from the box. We just received our additional camera unit and paired it within 5 minutes. Everything about this video system is very good except it doesn't offer two way talking back. There is no video system that can be under $180 (with shipping) for a 2 camera combo. Overall we are very happy customers.

Reviews.Title: Nearly perfect!
Reviews.Author: ANg-us
Reviews.Content: Overall, we really like this monitor. For the money you pay for, this gives you 99% of what you really need. If you have limitless budget, this wouldn't impress you. It's a basic monitor that has been reliable for nearly a year now. Everything is very good, big screen, good range, excellent video and audio, power saving based on noise level in the room where the camera is placed... but the battery life wouldn't last us a whole night. We need it plugged in while we sleep but if there was a bigger battery capacity option (i don't mind paying extra... but atleast give me this option!) I would rate this 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor with some hesitation, mostly concerned with you get what you pay for, but I was dead wrong. I have been using it for 5 months and no issues what so ever. The picture is clear and has good night vision. Great range, we can be out in our backyard while the baby naps. It's a great deal for those who don't want to spend $300 on other monitors, trust me you can use the $200 for other baby items lol

Reviews.Title: Good monitor for the price.
Reviews.Author: Natalie Chenault "Natalie Chenault"
Reviews.Content: We've been watching out little girl on this monitor while she sleeps for about three months now. It's not the fanciest model out there but all I really want from my monitor is to hear her if she cries, to look in and see if she is awake or asleep, and to see enough detail to reassure myself that she is safe. This does the trick! The camera is small (we mounted it to the wall over her crib using Velcro tape so we can move it around the house if we want) and the monitor is light and easy to carry around. It has a good range-- I can walk into our back and front yards while still keeping an eye on her. The night vision is surprisingly good. I like that the red lights on the camera are pretty subtle, so she doesn't spend hours staring at them in the dark.The one thing I don't like is the battery life. Unplugged, I can maybe get an hour of viewing time before I have to recharge. Maybe I have a bad battery?

Reviews.Title: Waste
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: The monitor only let's you look at one child at a time. The vox feature barely works. I'm always getting an out of range screen when I'm literally in the next room. Display very choppy.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service!!!!
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: The customer service is amazing. My son threw our monitor in the dogs water bowl!! After telling Infant Optics the truth about what happened because I was interested in finding a replacement (that I was planning on paying for)...they said it didn't matter what happened since I had owned it less than 1 yr (11mo to be exact). They very quickly gave me a $100 Amazon gift card to buy an entire replacement system. As far as the monitor itself, we still like it...although the battery life isn't so great when it's not plugged in but that s not a huge deal for our family. Would definitely recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made. Waste of the money that could have been put towards a NICE cam.
Reviews.Author: CTC
Reviews.Content: I was very happy to find a video monitor at a good price, until a few days after owning this one. You may think it's a good product for the price but you would be wrong. Within the first week the charger stopped working so we had to buy another (which wasn't easy to find, and wasn't cheap). Then within the next couple weeks the monitor stopped working completely unless plugged in. In the following months it started to act more and more like a piece of crap, keep in mind it hasn't even had the chance to get damaged since it is always sitting in one spot plugged in. The range is terrible and didn't get signal after like 30ft or so.  Now even from the next room the signal goes in and out, it shuts itself off and lags. I really wish I would have put my money towards a NICE video monitor instead of wasting it and being stuck with this!

Reviews.Title: Simple and priced right
Reviews.Author: Brz1975 "Smart Dad"
Reviews.Content: I did alot of research on nearly all the top brands of baby monitors. We ended up buying this for the good reviews it had and the more attractive price for a 3 camera-system.With our 11 month year old and a 3 mischievous boy we really needed eyes all around our home.This is a very simple monitor so if you are looking for a top end monitor this isn't for you. It's got the basic stuff: power saving mode night vision, video + audio, static and inteference-free connection... but that's about it.The cameras are not portable too (they must be plugged into a power cable). BUT having said all that we didn't need any of that so this was a good choice especially for the money.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointment
Reviews.Author: booboo "booboo"
Reviews.Content: Cheap cheap cheap!!! Very narrow range, I cannot see the full picture of my baby's crib.I need to constantly move camera in order to see my baby in her room. The most annoying thing is when monitor just turns off without any warning when the battery dies. It's really cheaply made and not even worth $100. Returning it back and getting something else instead.

Reviews.Title: Really impressive
Reviews.Author: Addalittle
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor set!! With two kids we can not run around the home checking up on them so this is really useful. It surprises me how well this works during the day and night. We are planning to get one for my brother so he could watch over our 80 yr old father shares the same appartment. I think this will turn out very useful for them too!

Reviews.Title: Flimsy and unreliable
Reviews.Author: Kate Meyers
Reviews.Content: I bought this in January. I was unimpressed from the start with how the monitor felt it would fall apart in my hands. By June the monitor wouldn't hold a charge any longer  which makes the whole thing useless. I would return it but there is a 30 day return policy. WASTE OF MONEY!!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Jeff Pasamonte
Reviews.Content: We bought this and got it a day early with Amazon Prime. Put both of the two cameras on the upper floor and we use the monitor all around the house. I'm very happy that the signal is strong all around the house. We had some problems with connnecting the second monitor but customer service helped us through and got it setup quickly. It's amazing how all this came under $180 with shipping and now we are able to see both our children while they sleep. Battery life is a bit on the short side so we keep it plugged in when we can. The only problem is we have to move the power cord around so we plan to get another adapter which I see is now being sold by itself.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Q
Reviews.Content: The camera stopped working within 24 hours of installation.  Prior to that, the camera had issues turning on and off.  I was happy with it while it was working, obviously you need much longer shelf life than 24 hours.  I hope it was an isolated instance of a defective product I received, it would have been a good product for its price.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price
Reviews.Author: Mr Winner
Reviews.Content: After using audio monitors for many years, this one is a big step up. It's great that I don't have to hunt for a good spot to avoid static and interference. Other than the minimum brightness still makes my room lit up (I need to sleep in near complete darkness) I have no complaints on this monitor. Great price on amazon too!

Reviews.Title: I can see my baby everwhere
Reviews.Author: APPLE2011
Reviews.Content: It works great have been using for about 5 months!! Doesnot interfere with anything, the signal is great even in the basement or outside on the patio. I love this little gadget. It helps that I CAN SEE my son all the time. I wouldnot clip it on your clothes though, it might fall, although mine still worked well after it fell down the stairs. I love it!!

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: M. Brown
Reviews.Content: Zero stars! It's like a cheap plastic toy and the picture quality is terrible. It's not worth $10 never mind the $100 I paid! Returning it ASAP!

Reviews.Title: Excellent baby monitor
Reviews.Author: SadeJade22
Reviews.Content: Great monitor! We were deciding between this or the motorola and decided to try first for the better offer that was on amazon. My friend had a monitor but the range was a joke so we specifically looked for a 2.4 digital monitor. The range on this is amazing, it works all around the house without any video intereference. It's nice to have a peace of mind if you live in a 2 story house.

Reviews.Title: Finally - a 2.4Ghz monitor that doesn't interfere with my home wifi
Reviews.Author: Suburban Shopper 88 "audio session"
Reviews.Content: As the title implies, I'm glad we use this one - have to trash or ebay the old summer infant version that would wreck our wifi everytime we used it.

Reviews.Title: Battery life is too short
Reviews.Author: Bin Yu
Reviews.Content: The product looks OK, but the battery life is less than 1 hour, you have to keep charging, so it is NOT portable.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds Expectation
Reviews.Author: Vivek
Reviews.Content: With the price and quality, its definitely a must buy. Very satisfied. Would definitely recommend it to anyone who can take good care of their equipment.

Reviews.Title: Just a good product for the money
Reviews.Author: Double T
