Reviews.Content: We bought a Summer Infant video monitor for our grandson, as a gift to our daughter.  Our grandson visits us a few times a month, occasionally overnight, so we decided to look around for a baby monitor to remotely watch him when he naps for sleeps overnight.  We picked this mainly for the price thinking the usage is going to be light anyway.  You will not be able to find any dedicated video baby monitor with infra-red capability any cheaper than this.I may not be shown as a verified purchaser for this because we bought this under my wife's account instead of mine.To our surprise, in many ways this unit works better than others costing much higher.  The image is clear (of course, do not expect it to be as good a picture as a TV picture.)  The audio is clear and loud without static.  Both video and audio can be adjusted up and down.  The infra-red produced a bright, albeit black and white, image even the room was very dark.The nicest feature of this monitor is the rechargeable battery for the monitor.  It is so convenient to carry it around where-ever you go without hunting for outlets.  The battery lasts about 2-3 hours (I did not time it accurately) after a full charge.We did not use the automatic voice activation that much, but it did work when we tried it.The only complaint, if you can call it that, I have is the interference of the 2.4GHz radio with the digital signal transmitted in a 2.4GHz band wireless network from a cable TV tuner to the computer.  However, I believe strongly all 2.4GHz baby monitors would have that problem.  We did have problem with the Summer Infant monitor we bought for our daughter.  Normal internet traffic still will go through, but it does seem to slow down with summer infant but no discernible effect with Infant Optics. I am sure the interference still exists for internet but not severe enough to cause failure of the message resending scheme. However, I was forced to switch over to 5GHz band for the sake of playing the TV signal.We have been using this monitor for several months now, without any problem and are totally happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!!!
Reviews.Author: jbuwolda
Reviews.Content: For the price of other video monitors this is a great deal! It does not have zoom or lense positioning from the monitor and the battery does not last a long time maybe 3-4 hours but we love it and it gets the job done!

Reviews.Title: Love this and Great Price
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: My husband and I wanted something good quality but not super expensive. This is awesome. We love it, It has night vision, goes on with motion and the signal is pretty far. We are very happy with this and reccomend to anyone looking for a good low cost monitor.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Tony Bartlow
Reviews.Content: Recently had to return the camera unit due to the night vision not working. Great customer service. Emailed customer service, they emailed me back with the address to return. Shipped the replacement once I confirmed I mailed the defective unit out.I have used this item for about 10 months. The only complaint is that when the monitor unit goes to sleep for inactivity the unit beeps one time.  The beep is annoying when I am sleeping. The monitor does come back on when the camera unit detects activity.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!
Reviews.Author: Deans mama
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor when we moved our one year old son into his own room. His room is right across the hall but I wasn't comfortable with the voice only system we were using for naps ect. For the price, its a great monitor. We didnt need all the bells and whistles of the more expensive monitors so for us it works great.  Clear picture and none of that annoying clicking and buzzing of the voice only systems. A few cons are that its very quiet even on the highest setting, but ive come to realize the monitor doesn't have to be ear shatteringly loud to wake me! I also noticed the cheap feel of the plastic; my son actually knocked it to the floor and the plastic piece covering the antenna broke off. Nothing a little super glue couldnt fix! All and all I would say this monitor is well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great basic monitor!
Reviews.Author: Little Omega
Reviews.Content: This is a great basic monitor. We were at our friends house warming and saw their video monitor which triggered us to upgrade from our summer infant audio monitor. This was a well-reviewed monitor, well ranked amongst the baby monitors and was priced very reasonably. The video and sound quality is excellent and the range is twice as good as our old audio monitor.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Virginia Beach girl
Reviews.Content: I love my baby monitor. I love that you can buy 4 extra cameras if needed. The night vision is awesome and it picks up the tiniest sound. The distance I can go with the monitor is great. I can go outside with the monitor in hand and still keep an eye out on the baby. The only down side to this monitor is that the battery does not last very long so make sure you keep it plugged in during the night if you want it to be on all night. It may last 4 hours tops. I'm glad I didn't choose the more higher priced baby monitors, this is just fine.

Reviews.Title: Best video monitor
Reviews.Author: Mommyof3
Reviews.Content: After going through 2 summer infant monitor this monitor has by far the best range and video quality. Very easy to use system that hasn't had any problems the last 4 months. The VOX is a bit sensitive so we had to move the camera further away from the air purifier that we use in the room to keep it from reactivating all the time. Otherwise this is the best monitor for value.

Reviews.Title: great product! great value!
Reviews.Author: Bridgett Glasgow
Reviews.Content: This is a really good monitor. It has a clear picture even in a dark room. The materials are less than desirable but for the price, I can't complain. We use it to monitor our 2yr old who has a condition that causes seizures while he sleeps. I am able to watch his breathing and facial movements closely. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Good product, horrible customer service!
Reviews.Author: Michell Eggers
Reviews.Content: I have called customer service twice because the power cord is not charging my receiver and no one has returned my call! First of all, you can't call and talk to someone who can help you. They just take your name, number, and email and say you'll receive a call or email back in 12 hrs. Well now its been over 24 hrs and I still haven't heard anything. If they send me a new cord for free, I still definitely recommend the product. It has worked great for the 4 months I've had it until the cord stopped working.

Reviews.Title: Well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Lil' Onion
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor for what you pay for! I've tried a few audio and older geneneration video monitors but I have been left very disappointed by either static, interference, video quality or range issues.Wasn't expecting much from a monitor under $100 but given it's rated as #1 amongst the monitor category I gave this a try. Got it within 2 days after ordering on amazon. played around with it, tested the range, and tested all the environments I'll be using it under (night,noisy,quiet,next to my router/ etc.) and no problems at all.The only problem that you can't adjust the sensitivity of the VOX and automute. It's preset at a certain sound level and can't be changed. Otherwise, you can get anything better than this for $100!

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied
Reviews.Author: Southern Belle
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this monitor based on the reviews but I am not satisfied.  I have been using this monitor for about a month now and it has several issues.  The stand by feature quit working about 3 weeks in, so now it stays on all the time which is a problem because it doesnt stay charged in the first place.  In addition now it doesnt want to charge even when its plugged in, the red light will come on for a few seconds and go off.  Doesnt really help me in the night when my baby is in his room and the monitor is off because its not charging when I think it is.  I bought this a few months before he was born so I was unaware of the issues and now its to late to return.

Reviews.Title: nothing fancy, but very good!
Reviews.Author: miss1180
Reviews.Content: We just adopted our son at 21 months old, and received this monitor as a gift. We had it on our Amazon wish list. We knew we didn't need one of the super expensive video monitors, because our son is already 21 months old and we wouldn't be using it for too long. BUT we still wanted a way to keep an eye on him in his room (especially at the busy toddler stage!).  This monitor really is a great alternative to the more expensive ones. Its nothing fancy, but it does what its supposed to do and gives you a decent quality picture of whats going on in the room. The sound quality is fine, too. We've only been using it for about 3 weeks, so i don't know about long-term use... but it seems like it would hold up. AsI said, its nothing fancy- but it does the job if you're just looking for a basic way to keep an eye on your child in their room.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for new parents!
Reviews.Author: Genelle Lovett
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a gift for my good friend's baby shower.  It is a great price being only $100 when it is originally $300 and most video monitors are at least $200 and are not that great.  You are able to order an extra camera too if needed for about $75 which is a better price than most that are about $100 for the extra camera.

Reviews.Title: 3 camera on 1 monitor setup
Reviews.Author: Cookingmum
Reviews.Content: We purchased this baby monitor as we were due for our 2nd baby. We wanted a system that could have 3 cameras so we could have one in each of their rooms and also in the playroom. When it got here, we were slightly disappointed that it lacked the 2 way talk feature (we should have thoroughly did our research rather than going for the best selling monitor) but everything else was more than what we expected. The video is good (although resolution is not HD-like), sound was clear, and range was excellent. It didn't interfere with our wifi like our previous monitor did. You switch through the cameras by pressing the P button but only one camera can be viewed at a time. The automute feature is defaulted to ON (which I hate... it cuts the sound in/out for static noise cancelling) but that can be turned off. It's nice to have all the rooms monitored through this screen while I can cook, wash, and clean the house. We have all our monitor placed on a higher location (with the camera stand included) so they stay out of reach of the camera. The price with 2 additional cameras put us just over $250 and that's a good deal ($250 would usually only get 1 single camera with a higher-end motorola or summer) We are excited to put this through full use once our baby arrives!

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Junie
Reviews.Content: With so many monitors available now it was very hard for us to choose which one to get. It was a bit like shopping for a TV... the better the specs are, the more expensive it was. amd we weren't prepared to spend a fortune. This one had what we wanted and was reasonably priced. We've had this for 3 months now and we've have no problems whatsoever. A nice monitor set that we've recommended to a few of our fellow friends.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: nana
Reviews.Content: It is a great product!! is very light weigh, color is cute, price is great, portable, i really like it!!

Reviews.Title: Didn't work out for us
Reviews.Author: DShoff83
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor when we started having our 2 month old take naps in the crib.Pros:It's cheap!  You can't find many video monitors for under $100.Video quality is good.  Granted, it's my only video monitor, so I don't have much to compare it to, but it seems pretty good.Easy setupCons:Interferes with household Wifi.  This can be very annoying if you want to be using a laptop, ipad, ect. while the monitor is on.Sound quality is awful!  Even on the highest setting it's hard to hear the baby.  It was fine for naps, but I was concerned it wouldn't be loud enough to wake us up at night.Neither the VOX standby mode nor the "white noise eliminator module" worked due to the white noise we use.  We have a simple box fan set on 'medium' in our daughter's room.  This was apparently too loud for the monitor.The display is bright!  Even on the dimmest setting, this would light up my room at night making it difficult for me to sleep.In the end, we ended up buying a cheap audio only monitor to use at night.  I still keep this monitor handy, and will occasionally turn it on during the night to take a peak at her, but for the most part, it stays off.I'm giving it 2 stars because I think it would work out better for someone if they don't use white noise in the baby's room.

Reviews.Title: nice video monitor
Reviews.Author: YuLily
Reviews.Content: This video monitor does as advertised. Running on digital frequencies, there's zero static or interference that you usually see from older monitor. It's nice to see and hear him everywhere in the house now. A rather simple monitor but works as expected. Good for the $$

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This Camera works very well.  It is small light and compact and has a screen just as large as my previous summer device that was twice as big and twice as heavy.  Honestly for this price, I am not sure what else you can get that is better.  Most of the Summer ones are good are 200 Plus and they also seem to only work for about a year and half.Highlights:Very little staticVery compactLight weightThe auto off function when there is no noise is very nice.  And works as describedPretty basic and straight forwardMonitor is compatible with several camerasI get no interference from this unit where as I did get some with the Summer unitBefore I give the lows many of these are nit picking.  And things you can get if you spend an extra 100 dollars-Probably not as shock proof as the bigger heavier Summer units (but if you are vigilant and don't let your kids get a hold of the monitor then you are fine)-Camera cord is too short (less than half of that of my summer one that broke).  So unless you put it directly above the outlet you may need an extension cord-The Camera attaches to the wall with 2 screws instead of one which is a hassle for leveling and an extra hole in the wall to repair-The Camera requires base attachment (which is included) for downward viewing from a high shelf if you are not attaching it to the wall.  We have shelf that ours sits on.  I am sure this is necessary because the base isn't heavy enough to lean that far forward on its own without flipping over.  It works, it is just an extra item to keep track of.-Cannot dim the screen without auto feature.-The volume isn't an amplified as other modelsWrap:I am very happy with this purchase.  If you have an unlimted budget, heck buy the other ones.  If you are on a budget buy this one.  It works great, it has a few advanced features and it is a great deal.  I only gave it a 4 because of some of the minor flaws.  And that is probably just me being too picky.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Ellib1
Reviews.Content: As my mother taught me, if you go with the best seller, you can't go wrong. She was right! we bought this monitor based on the reviews and #1 rank, and our end verdict is that this is an incredible baby monitor for below $100 + shipping included. Used it for several months and have no problems with at all. Would be fantastic if they came up with a new generation model with internet capability.

Reviews.Title: Just didn't work for us
Reviews.Author: Danielle Warren
Reviews.Content: So many great reviews I was really expecting to love this monitor... however I just didn't.  My son is a roller- he never stayed in frame.  I tried putting this camera all over his room; on the wall, a table facing his crib, attached to the crib, nothing worked!  Turned out everytime he rolled and shook the crib a bit the camera would tilt down.  Thus rendering it useless.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: j.cunanan
Reviews.Content: what a relief! I love this camera & I'll likely be ordering an additional camera too. The picture is great & no sound issues ~ It works just like I needed it to, gives me peace of mind and has made putting our daughter in her own room much easier. There have been a couple times she has cried & needed us to go adjust her position instead of assuming the crying was just fussiness. It's great being able to see her & now, I can actually get things done around the house while she sleeps without worrying about waking her up. VERY happy!

Reviews.Title: For my 80 year old father
Reviews.Author: Dianna
Reviews.Content: A very useful device to keep my eyes on my 80 yr old father who is mobility challanged. This monitor not only works for babies, but is a great tool for the elderly! He's a bit frustrated on the lack of privacy... but I convinced him that his safety was our primary concern and he can cover the camera lens anytime he wants. He doesn't like it, but I love it!

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent monitor. has everything we wanted at a great price. We selected this based on this monitor was the best selling monitor at the time we bought it (and yet it still is as I can see!)- Excellent range. Haven't had any connection issues. We had a digital summer monitor (3 years ago) before and the range on this is far superior.- automute - I really like this feature and have it on all the time. It silences the audio so it doesn't create a fizzing noise when it's quiet at night and turns back on when my son makes a noise.- very easy to use. Even my 10 year old has got the hang of using this thing!- Good screen size. Once again, much better than our old monitor (twice the screensize) making it easier to see closer details in the camera screen.- used it for half a year and no problems so far!!

Reviews.Title: Love this video monitor!
Reviews.Author: Lady Leticia
Reviews.Content: I'm very careful when selecting products for my 2 year old son and I've done my due diligence before settling on this monitor. I wanted to be able to see and hear at all times when we are both at home (but when I'm not in the same room as her) and obviously audio monitors wouldn't do. However, I didn't want to spend a fortune for a monitor. This DXR5 is priced within my budget and seemed to have good user reviews although some negative experiences reported by some users but that is common with all other monitors. After using this monitor for 2 months, I can say this monitor is really good and performs as advertised. The video clarity is amazing. The night vision lets me see the whole room in complete darkness. It lacks two way communication and pan/tilt on the camera but for $99 I can not expect anything more. I highly recommend this product for parents who are looking for a good deal.

Reviews.Title: seems to good to be true and it is
Reviews.Author: S. Snyder "Stev"
Reviews.Content: Got this unit to replace a 3 year old summer infant camera that seems to be overheating.  This camera works fine, nightvision too works as expected.  The light and small feel of the receiver display seems cheap, but again does the job to show good video.  The problem here is the audio.  It is flat out horrible.  The camera is 5-6 feet from my child, yet you can only hear audio when she is being very loud.  And when anything does come out of the receiver's speaker, it is virtually impossible to make out.  Terrible speaker?  Terrible microphone on the camera?  Either way, if you need/want to hear as well as see, skip this one.  The price (i got it for under $100 here on amazon) seems to good to be true, and if you want audio, it is too good to be true.  Wish I skipped on this one, but was scrambling for a replacement.  The summer infant camera and monitor/display I have has very, very good audio (you can hear people outside with the windows closed through the speaker of the monitor).  There are power saving options for turning off audio when there is silence and for turning off the display after a certain amount of time (i think.  don't have the unit in front of me now).  These are easy enough to turn off so that audio and video remain constant, but again the audio is useless.  I would not recommend this as a baby monitor as you will have to constantly look at the display since the audio stinks.  Also, as stated elsewhere here, I did have trouble with WiFi when this monitor is working.  Gotta have the monitor at least 10 feet away from a laptop/iPad in order to connect to WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Help
Reviews.Author: Aline
Reviews.Content: Hello to everyone!!!! It is more a question than a review.... Does everyone know if I can buy an extra monitor???? I just need one camera and two monitors..... Tks for the help

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: smiles
Reviews.Content: wonderful for the price.  can see baby in dark room, just fine.  Having a video monitor is so much nicer then regular baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Didn't ever work correctly
Reviews.Author: Cathy R.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this video monitor after our Summer Infant died. This one had decent reviews on Amazon and was priced well. It was easy to set up, but the sound never worked. I turned on the camera and the monitor, and no sound came out. I turned the unit back off, and then on again, and the sound came back on, but about 30 seconds later, it stopped working. I don't know if I got a defective one, but I'm returning it.Also, the picture quality is not great. The Motorola and the Levana ERA both have better video quality than this camera. Disappointing.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: mrgatorade18
Reviews.Content: well this was a great purchase. went through very fast and had it set up before my son was born. easy set up quick shipping no complaints very satisfied. now just have to get my son to stay in his crib lol

Reviews.Title: Bought 3 sets already, great product
Reviews.Author: Jennie Bieberstein
Reviews.Content: I just received our third set of infant optics monitor. I've bought 2 sets for my grandkids and now another as a gift for our good friend who is expecting to have his first child in 2 months. For the two sets that we've had, this baby monitor has worked really well and we've never had any range and interference issues. Works as advertised and it comes at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: yacine
Reviews.Content: I've used this for over 3 weeks now and it has been fantastic. The picture is very clear and I really like how light the unit so I can slide it into my pocket when a travel around my house. The video is completely digital so I never had any static or interference problems which I've seen with other monitors when it is moved far away. The battery on the screen unit doesn't last very long so I bought 2 extra adapters on amazon and have them as power points in my bedroom, kitchen and my daughters bedroom. This has been a great setup as long as you plug it in!

Reviews.Title: Works up to 20 Feet
Reviews.Author: Y K
Reviews.Content: This product only works if your within 20 feet otherwise it will go out of range every 30 seconds, I would really recommend spending the extra 60 dollars and getting one that has better range. The sound is pretty clear but low and the view is pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Dlip
Reviews.Content: There are far too many baby monitors to choose so I went for a safe option - get the #1 best selling one and it shouldn't be any surprises.I was right. This camera is really amazing. We also bought another additional camera to monitor the entrance of our house. Night vision works great, the video is crystal clear, great price, quick shipping, has an automute function to kill the sound...in general I'm very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Keep looking
Reviews.Author: Walker's Dad
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product based on the reviews.  Sadly, I am disappointed with the quality of this product.  It has a very limited range some days. We have a small 2 bedroom house and it can't make it across our home. The sound quality and volume is poor, I have it turned all the way up and can barely hear it.  When it crackles I have to assume it is our baby crying. Also when it loses the signal it makes a series of loud beeps, good thing we are not using this product at night while trying to sleep, I will likely replace it prior to that stage.  I wish I spent a bit more on a better product.

Reviews.Title: The DXR5
Reviews.Author: Val S.
Reviews.Content: I did ALOT of research for baby monitors before deciding on the infant optics. I've owned 2 summer infants monitors (one audio, one video) before this. I am very impressed with this monitor! The video quality is excellent - there is NO delay AT ALL in the video. I had a 2 second delay on my previous summer video monitor so I would hear my baby cry upstairs before my monitor plays the crying noise from the speakers (as a result, I was always 2 seconds late!). I've owned this DXR5 for more than half a year now and it has not let me down yet. At $100, this budget monitor surpases my expectations of a $200 monitor.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: GRRL
Reviews.Content: I will admit that I was skeptical to buy this monitor since it was so cheap compared to others on the market, but it has really delivered!  It is true that the unit feels flimzy & is made of thin plastic, but it does the job.  The picture & sound are clear.  I put mine up on a shelf overlooking my toddler's bed.  Works great!My only complaint is that the camera base doesn't seem to have anything to mount it to the wall, so if you don't have a shelf or other furniture to sit it up high, you won't be able to get a bird's eye view.

Reviews.Title: Bad product.
Reviews.Author: fs42
Reviews.Content: Battery didn't even last longer than 10 minutes. I charge it as the directions said but when I unplug it it die about 10 minutes after. Also one of the charger was already broken as soon as we open the box. I sent it back after I keep trying to make it work for about 2 weeks, I would say. DON'T BUY IT. Sorry for the business that made these monitor. I know they still make money, but they would make more if they really care about customers and really knows what they're doing before put it out on the market.

Reviews.Title: Unit quit after 2 days
Reviews.Author: Thanks
Reviews.Content: I probably just got a bad unit; however the monitor unit quit working after 2 days. It would not charge and the lights wouldn't even come back on when it was plugged in. I sent the unit back. Better luck next time. I liked the price and the quality of the unit for the 2 days it was working. That is why I went ahead and gave it 3 stars. If it would have kept working, I would have likely given it 4 or 5.

Reviews.Title: Excelente baby call
Reviews.Author: Hernan
Reviews.Content: Es el mejor Baby Call que tuve. La señan de video y audio es excelente y tiene un largo alcance con lo que permite monitorear lo que ocurre con el bebé a la distancia sin tener que salir corriendo ante cada ruidio. La imagen es muy buena. Además, permite sumarle hasta cuatro cámaras con lo que uno podría monitorear a más de un bebé o no tener que andar moviendo todo el dispositivo cada vez que uno cambia al bebé de lugar. Es muy recomendable

Reviews.Title: Great but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Bessie
Reviews.Content: I just received it yesterday. It has all the features on this price. VOX/Automute/IR. It really suprised me. And you can also choose to turn these features on or off. I didn't encounter a beep problem that many previous reviewers mantioned. However, I have to be honest to point out that, first, the sound is bad and low. Second, the battery goes fast, can not stand for a whole night even for it's first time.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: robbyn
Reviews.Content: Received the product and so far I love it!  You cannot beat the price of this monitor for the purpose it serves!  I have seen a lot of complaints about how light and cheap the camera and base unit are, but in fact that is the best part!  It is light enough (not cheap) that I was able to mount the camera unit in the perfect spot right next to the crib with double sided tape for the perfect view of our new baby without having to punch holes in the walls to mount!  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Simple video system
Reviews.Author: Kyrstal
Reviews.Content: This has been a solid video monitor for our son. It's very simple to use and took barely anytime to get used to. The range is good and absolutely no interference with our wifi/internet. We gave away our audio monitor to my grand parents as walkie talkies so that didn't go to waste. I would highly recommend this monitor if you are looking for something decent with a budget.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Anto
Reviews.Content: Been a fan of summer infant but our previous video monitor finally gave up last month and we replaced it with this infant optics monitor for the good price and #1 rank. We are very happy with it. The range is even better than the summer, but it falls short on the features - no two way communication, music etc. It still has night vision which is really important for us. We are happy to lose out on these feature for a monitor that is half the price.A great buy so far.

Reviews.Title: poor volume...eventually quit...trying to return
Reviews.Author: chris simmons
Reviews.Content: small and cheap, good video with clear reception.  volume was pretty low even when turned all the way up.  now volume does not work at all.  seller i bought this from had a pretty short return window so i am left with manuracturers warranty.  wish me luck.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Kimi
Reviews.Content: i bought  one for myself,then i suggested my friend buy a new one,so no doubt it is wonderful and useful for parents.

Reviews.Title: Full Refund from Amazon - Thank You!
Reviews.Author: Bay Area Mom
Reviews.Content: I ordered this a little over a month ago; it worked for a month and then the video died (screen was suddenly too dark to see, followed by just no signal being received at all, which happened at 4am and the beep woke me up). I contacted the company to see if there was something I could do, thinking maybe a light in the infrared camera needed to be replaced or something. Their response was that they were aware of the problem and that maybe 1 in 5000 units had this issue, and all they could do was give me credit to buy a new one on Amazon. I didn't want another one - while this worked as described until it broke, as other reviewers have noted, it makes a horrible beep when the signal dies or when it goes into sleep mode, loud enough to wake me up (and sleep is very precious to me!). So I contacted Amazon and they have now processed a full refund on my return, and I was able to ship it back for free. I love Amazon!!! We've got another monitor that's older (no longer made) that we're using until we find a better one.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Titus Isabeau
Reviews.Content: We had this for a weeks already and overall, we are very happy with it! It's got incredible night vision and picture clarity. The monitor screen unit is small and light, and it fits into my pocket in my pants and shorts. It very straight forward to use and I got it all set up without looking at the users' manual. This video monitor really became a necessity for us and we can not imagine living without this. The price makes it such a worthwhile buy for any parents.

Reviews.Title: Sound is unbearable
Reviews.Author: Loo Who from Whoville
Reviews.Content: I got this because of all the glowing reviews.  Looked good, especially since it is selling for about $100, a lot cheaper than other video monitors that are well reviewed.  When I got it, I was disappointed in the night vision quality, and I couldn't believe how bad the sound was.  Even when there was silence (or just quiet ambient room noise), the monitor emitted an awful high-pitched whine that made it absoloutely unbearable.  I ended up returning it and getting a motorola one instead.  Yes, it's more expensive, but the audio quality is good and the video is better too.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: We purchased this item because the pure audio monitor was no longer enough. This device has an excellent range, with clear picture and sound. Works great in the dark. Device doesn't look impressive, but looks are sometimes deceptive!

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: E
Reviews.Content: This monitor has great picture (in color, too, which I didn't know until it was on in the light).  I can see my baby very clearly.  The battery goes quickly; recharge it often.  I'm clutsy and the monitor has survived many drops on hardwood floor.  The screen came off, but didn't break and went back on.  The antennae broke off at the base, but I was able to super glue it back on.  Overall, I really like it and a good price for it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: BrittneyM
Reviews.Content: We really like our monitor so far.  The screen quality isn't the best and the battery life is a bit on the poor side, but all in all this is a great value and solid monitor system.  I would definitely recommend this to a friend on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: NRMDMA
Reviews.Content: This monitor is absolutely everything that we were wanting and is perfect for what we needed it for!  And it is the perfect price!

Reviews.Title: Great for overseas
Reviews.Author: :) "Tina"
Reviews.Content: It's duel voltage and runs on 2.4Ghz so it can be used overseas as well as in the states. I'm in Germany and that is the reason why I purchased this item, the plus side is it also works well and for 100$ well worth it.

Reviews.Title: at this price it cant be beat. can double as a scrambler.
Reviews.Author: M. Brown
Reviews.Content: This product is good for the price, however it blocks a strong wifi signal  from my router  down to nothing. Its almost like a portable jammer.

Reviews.Title: Good baby monitor
Reviews.Author: 2Eve2
Reviews.Content: I love this video monitor. Both audio and video monitor supersedes the quality of our previous summer infant monitor and the price is nearly half on what we spent. The VOX poewr saving helps prevent quick drainage of the battery (which doesn't last that long).Everything is just as we wanted except that it's missing a time display/clock!

Reviews.Title: 3 camera set up
Reviews.Author: Erin Herrmann "DeliLady"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this infant optics monitor as a replacement to our philips avent monitor which doesn't turn on anymore. The biggest advantage with this new monitor is that this one can be expanded to 4 cameras, and I have a system of 3 cameras now. It works really good! Still, the VOX doesn't work for all 3 cameras but only for the active camera. Otherwise, the night vision works really well which is what we use it primarily for. For the money, you can't get a better baby monitor system than this!

Reviews.Title: Good while it worked
Reviews.Author: Kmstl
Reviews.Content: The monitor worked well for 6 months, but then it lost the ability to recharge.  We tried replacing the charging cord, but the problem appears to be with the actual monitor.  Would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Vree2002
Reviews.Content: Love the price for this monitor! I bought this for my 3rd child and wish I would have had it for my first 2 kids. I didn't have this until by baby was almost 13 months old. I wanted one that I could see what she was doing because she is a mechivious little girl. It's so nice to see what she is up to in her crib or if she is crying but laying down then I know she is going to go back to sleep. I love looking at the monitor and being able to see my little one sleeping so cute.

Reviews.Title: A month and the night vision stopped working
Reviews.Author: aja buckley
Reviews.Content: this was a great little product so I thought. It worked fine with night vision for about a month (less) and then the red lights around the camera stopped working so I couldn't see the baby unless the lights in the room were on. Too bad!

Reviews.Title: Great baby monitor for our home
Reviews.Author: Tammmz
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. At $100, it's not the best monitor but it serves our purpose well. We needed a monitor with good range since I do alot of gardening work in our backyard. This monitor works without any issues.

Reviews.Title: Great baby monitor
Reviews.Author: J. Soukup
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with my purchase of this baby monitor.  I did research for several months trying to determine the best monitor vs. the best value.  For the price I paid and the quality of the equipment I don't think you could find a better monitor.  The screen on the handheld unit is nice and the audio is clear.  I can walk to the farthest corner of my basement and get great reception.  I haven't had any interference problems with other wireless devices.  The monitor is black and white which isn't an issue for me but some people may like to go with color but it wasn't worth the extra $100+ in my opinion.  I'd like to purchase an extra camera but at $79 it's a little bit pricey.  I'm going to run with one camera for now and may add another in the future if I get tired of moving the one from room to room.  Great product and I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as expected
Reviews.Author: JMAMAP
Reviews.Content: This product arrived with clear instructions and an incredibly easy setup as promised. No "extras" -so if you need those settings, look elsewhere- but functions exactly as promised with clear picture and sound. Great product and value.

Reviews.Title: Baby moniter
Reviews.Author: motherof7
Reviews.Content: My son purchased this and loved the ease of use and how good the quality was.  I went ahead and got one for my daughter's baby shower becuase he was so impressed! Bingo!  She loves it too.  This is a great product for the reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor for the $
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: This monitor has been great.  The only thing I don't like is that the screen stays on and you can't turn it off and just leave the voice part on.  The charge has been very good and I'm very happy with that.  I would recommend this especially for the money.

Reviews.Title: This monitor is crap
Reviews.Author: Philly Mom "Philly Mom"
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor to use in our son's room, we were looking for something good, but also something that wouldn't break the bank.  After reading so many positive reviews I was so excited to get this product home.  Initially I thought it was going to be good, but then we started noticing things about it that we didn't like.1. Cheap and flimsy plastic- so cheap in fact that the camera seems like it will tip over with the lightest touch2. The Camera won't tilt up and down, only side to side, this sucked because we had a hard time getting the right angle3. The electrical cords are very short, very inconvenient because the battery life on the unit is short, so I needed to keep it plugged in all night, which is fine except the closest outlet caused the cord to stretch, and was easy to trip over. The cords couldn't be more than 3-4 feet long.4. Battery life on the monitor is short, you will constantly be charging this thing.5. Lastly, I found the constant on and off of the volume to be so irritatingSo yes, it was easy to set up, and cheap, but it is crap.  We returned it and bought a Motorola one, which is far superior to this one.  We actually got it at BJ's Wholesale Club, and only paid $130 for it, its like $180 on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: I would give it 0 stars, if that was an option
Reviews.Author: Numberonereviewer
Reviews.Content: This is not just a terrible baby monitor, but possibly the worst electronics product I have ever owned. Obviously, one expects reliability when it come to products that relate to your baby's health and safety. This piece of junk is unreliable and flimzy. Here's the summary:- The handheld unit loses signal/connection with the camera, irrespective of distance; this happens all the time. What's worse, every time that happens, the thing makes the most obnoxious noise. In other words, imagine a Chinese water torture.- The handheld hold charrge for about 3 hrs. Not really a great future.- The whole thing stopped working 6 months after I got it.- In sum, DON'T BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitor for value
Reviews.Author: Tony T
Reviews.Content: We purchased this color video monitor after our last name brand baby monitor crapped out.  We researched several monitors and decided on this one based upon the reviews and price.  Very good monitor. Only complaint that we have about this monitor is even when the brightness level is turned down to zero, it is still pretty bright to have next to the bedside table. Excellent range, color/night display, and holds charge pretty well when not plugged into the ac adapter.  Other reviews complain about interference with the wireless devices, but we have not experienced this issue with our 5.0GHz phone, 2.4GHz wireless router, or cell phones.  Thinking of purchasing a second camera for our second daughter's room.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great baby camera
Reviews.Author: A. Aguirre
Reviews.Content: This unit has been working great for me so far.  I used to have the summer baby camera but that went kaput so researched and got this camera.A few people commented about there being a beeping sound when in VOX mode. I haven't had any problem with that, the only beeping I've ever heard from it was when the unit is out of range or not recieving signal.The reason I gave this a 4 and not a 5 is that there should be some type of option to have audio only and turn off the video feed.  This unit's retail price is supposed to be $300 (on sale though) so it should have many more bells and whistles in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service!
Reviews.Author: Mommy Pam
Reviews.Content: Our monitor unit fell from our kitchen counter and the antenna broke off. We emailed infant optics and they got back in 3 hours with an email saying they were willing to replace the whole unit. I was so worried about this company (which I never heard of before) ignoring my email. Most companies run away with your money!I'm so glad they were so responsive and helpful. 5 stars just for that!

Reviews.Title: $99 monitor
Reviews.Author: Jane3
Reviews.Content: I just received the DXR5 yesterday and already I really like it. It's not perfect (say there's no 2 way voice communication) but for what I paid for it is very good. The display is a good size making the overall weight and size of the handheld monitor easy to carry around. The belt clip isn't designed thoughtfully with a weak connection hinge but it still works. No interference and no static noise. After reading some reviews, I was expecting a 'beeping' problem with the unit but never had any of that even with VOX on. I'm glad this company fixed this glitch.I would definitely recommend this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor!
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: We saw that this was the best selling monitor so we gave it a try. Extremely easy to setup and use. The video and audio is great for a small screen. We are considering getting an add-on camera and I'm glad the price of the extra monitor is as affordable as this.

Reviews.Title: Too pixelated
Reviews.Author: Suzanne M. Coker
Reviews.Content: When first trying this monitor during daylight hours it seemed fine.  But as the day went on, we noticed the screen was really pixelated.  And in the evening, or with lights turned off, the pixelation was distracting.  The audio was fine, no issues there, but the point for us was to be able to clearly see our baby day or night.  We wouldn't be able to do this using this device.  Item was returned.

Reviews.Title: best monitor on market
Reviews.Author: Cin
Reviews.Content: i did aot of research before purchasing this baby monitor, and carefully chose this one because of the price, and it had more positive reviews than any other one i have seen. And i must say, this product is AMAZING. i have been using it for two months, and love absolutely everything about it. Color picture in day time, black and white at night. The night vision works extremely well, and the sound is so good it will even pick up a car driving by. Wall mountable or tabletop use, camera comes with a stand and can be tilted however you want it. Absolutely worth every single penny. Sound is as clear as picture as well, and there's no static at all.

Reviews.Title: Amazing video
Reviews.Author: Bjcar
Reviews.Content: This is our first video monitor. For our first child we owned a Summer audio monitor and already that was great. Upgrading to a digital video monitor was a show stopper for us. We were hesitant on spending the money but we agreed $100 was a good investment for our third child. Having the ability to see your child everywhere at home is a real treat.

Reviews.Title: Poor battery life
Reviews.Author: dupita
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor mainly because of the price. I really didn't need the extra frills some of the others had like lullabies or the talk back feature. When we got it and set it up, it worked great and still does--the only problem is the battery life on the monitor. The first night of use I was only able to use it for 2-3 hours before it died. I have since recharged it again and only use it to see if I hear any noise coming from the room but then turn it off to save its battery life. I feel it kind of defeats the purpose of having a monitor if you have to turn it off but since I want to keep an eye on my 2 y/o, it's not that big of a deal. Had this been for my newborn, I probably would've gotten something different.*Updated 11/10/12-My kid got their hands on the monitor and dropped it. Screen has tilted (still works) but the image is just off if that makes sense. And she was also able to rip the little plastic covering off the antennae. Really? I should've saved my money and bought something more lasting.

Reviews.Title: Love this baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Willis Bishop "B to D"
Reviews.Content: I choose this monitor based that it was the #1 best selling monitor on amazon and I'm very happy with the system. It's got 2 parts - one camera and one handheld set with a screen. You can add up to 4 cameras but you can not pair 2 handheld sets to one camera.It's got a very simple user interface so my wife has no trouble using this.Good picture and clear sound.Range - works all around our house.Didn't have any interference issues.

Reviews.Title: Great simple monitor
Reviews.Author: Kirty Mama
Reviews.Content: Was deciding between a iOS monitor VS a traditional monitor and ended with with this for attractive price. I was worried that it would have range problems compared to a iOS (IP) type monitor system, but it doesn't. It connects everywhere in my house and causes no interference issues with my internet. I love how it works well at night time too without any lighting. A great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Took a risk on it, and it broke right away.
Reviews.Author: Creighton Yost
Reviews.Content: The wife and I thought we'd try this out and save a few bucks, but we regret it. It's a semi cheap device, but that's not a big deal but it should have been a clue. We took it on a road trip to use in a hotel to keep an eye on the kid in the bedroom, and only had the monitor for 2 weeks, just using it once as soon as we got it to check it out and see if it worked. It did work right out of the box, but the next time we plugged it in, the LED light didn't work so all we were able to monitor was the darkness. Not what it's for. Then it started working on and off, sometimes it'd fix itself, sometimes not. Basically it's cheap and if you don't mind a risk of getting something that'll break quickly it's a good deal. If you want it to work and not worry, spend a little more and get the Motorola. We're returning this and getting the one we thought was too expensive, but now is a good price for quality.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: K. Ariola
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a quality video monitor (good sound, good night/day vision,portable & reliable)for not alot of money and it seems that's what I got with this product. The video is crisp in the day or night (see picture). The sound quality is good. The first night I used it, the monitor lost contact with the camera in the middle of the night (dunno why...) but it beeps twice really loud to wake you and alert you to reconnect them (All I did was turn off the monitor & turn it back on). The handheld monitor is portable (takes a camera battery which is included) or it can be plugged in for use at nighttime. I like the extra features like after a minute or two, the sound will cut off through the monitor if there is no sound detected in the room (to eliminate white noise through the monitor) but once there is a whimper then it will turn back on. There is also a feature like that with the video feed as well. The only cons I could think of so far would be that the handset & the camera seem kinda flimsy & lightweight (so in case you were thinking about dropping either one, DON'T! Lol!) Also, once the camera is set stable where you want it, it doesn't have too good of a horizontal range back and forth. I was deciding between the more expensive motorola video monitor and this one and I would say I made the right choice....so far! I'll let you know if it goes on the fritz on me, I've used it for 3 days now. Got 4 instead of 5 stars because of that night it cut off for seemingly no reason, hope it doesn't happen again...

Reviews.Title: Simple and to the point
Reviews.Author: zubee's girl
Reviews.Content: It does what it claims without extra bells and whistles.2  things would have earned it an extra 1/2 a star:Battery on the parent unit should give more warning before shutting off.It should have a stand for the parent unit.

Reviews.Title: Very smooth video
Reviews.Author: WanReef
Reviews.Content: My wife and I love this monitor. The video is excellent and far from what we expected from one of the cheapest monitors out there. The frame rate is very fast giving it a smooth fluid video playback. The battery isn't as good as I hoped so we keep it on our adapter dock most of the time.No problems with wifi. We upgraded our router recently so I wasn't expecting any problems anyway.If you are looking for a monitor on a tight budget and DO NOT want sound-only monitors, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Great video monitor for a very reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: JennStew07
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this monitor for the 2nd time because I dropped and broke the receiver from the 1st one. Truth be told I dropped it more than once and it held up fine until the 4th drop which hit the hardwood floor directly on its face so the receiver is pretty sturdy.  For the price you can't beat the video clarity and lack of static.  My only 2 complaints are: a) I wish you could buy just the receiver like you can buy just a camera component separately but you can't so I had to buy a whole new complete set. The good thing is it accepts up to 4 cameras so now I have 2 cameras to use, one mounted above the crib on the wall and another to move freely around the house; and, b) the battery for my 2nd receiver seems to not last as long as the battery from the 1st but again, I now have 2 batteries. For these 2 reasons I gave it a 4 star instead of 5 star but otherwise it's a fantastic product!

Reviews.Title: Very glad we purchased this monitor!
Reviews.Author: T Bray
Reviews.Content: We had an analog monitor that cost twice as much as this one, was black & white and twice the size.  This monitor is color, doesn't keep us awake all night flickering, turns on when baby is moving around or waking up and gives us great peace of mind.  When the monitor comes on it makes this little clicking noise that automatically wakes one of us up right away.  It also has excellent range as we have taken it outside while mowing and talking to neighbors. Extremely happy with our purchase!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: CeeCee
Reviews.Content: I purchased this baby monitor when my grandson came for a visit.  My daughter and I were very pleased with the quality of the picture and the monitor's overall performance.  I highly reccomend this product.

Reviews.Title: this monitor has helped my sleep!
Reviews.Author: kat "Aevan"
Reviews.Content: My daughter is a very noisy sleeper, and this has helped my sleep significantly over the last monitor which would light up red anytime she made a tiny bit of noise. I love the VOX option that saves power when she's not making any noise, and the white noise cancellation. I did not have to mount it and it works perfectly - great view of my little one. I love this monitor! My girl is 16 months - dunno how well this works with littler babies.about 6 months after I bought this, lines started showing up on the monitor. I contacted the company and every subsequent replacement they've sent me has been incredibly blurry, and the sound doesn't work as well. I'm not sure what they've done to them, but I don't think I'd buy this again!

Reviews.Title: We love it!
Reviews.Author: Marguerite Paulk
Reviews.Content: This monitor has held up for several months now and we love it.  It was very easy to set up and we use it everyday.  My 20 month old son even plays with it and constantly pushes the buttons, and so far it has held up.I don't know if I'd say this thing is interference free like the description states, but it is close.  I have noticed that sometimes when it is placed near my computer or cell phone, either the monitor picture glitches or the other device's internet connection slows to a crawl.  This doesn't happen all the time though, so it is really not a problem.The Vox feature is wonderful because I am a light sleeper.  The old audio-only monitor we had would make noise all night.  The Vox feature is pretty sensitive though.  My son's room faces the street and every time a car passes the house, the monitor comes on.Definitely worth the price!  The above issues are the only reason this doesn't get 5 stars.  I wish I could give it 4.5.

Reviews.Title: This monitor WORKS
Reviews.Author: alisa "Signed"
Reviews.Content: This is a cheaper monitor option, but it is solid. Good screen, nice reception, sound and motion detection activated!!! huge perk. It does get hot when plugged in too long, so unplug it and turn it off, and the charge doesn't stay full for long - but other than that it's a good option.

Reviews.Title: Very very good
Reviews.Author: minimama
Reviews.Content: I've had no problems with this working with our wifi, whilst I see that some users have problems with interference. I've read from the manual that a relatively newer router of your wifi will work with this product. (We got our Dlink from best buy just 3 months ago)The audio is to the soft side we can still hear our baby clearly with the music in our room off.I'm going to buy a additional addon camera now for our upcoming second child!

Reviews.Title: disapointed
Reviews.Author: Begum
Reviews.Content: The VOX doesn't work.... and when in the charger the remote monitor makes a white noise, it stops as soon as you unplug.

Reviews.Title: Works great, but did initially disrupt WIFI
Reviews.Author: Aldous Blake
Reviews.Content: We have used this baby monitor one night and are really happy with the quality of the image, sound, etc. However, the next morning, when it was nap time, we wanted to use our WIFI and discovered that it wouldn't connect.The insert in the instruction booklet said that that could happen, so we followed the troubleshooting suggestions, updated our modem/router firmware and now they both work together! SWEET!We have another Motorola brand monitor for use in Europe and the monitor charge on the Motorola is a joke compared to the long-lasting life of Infant Optics. The picture on the Infant Optics is also MUCH clearer.This monitor is a great value!UPDATE: I have been using the monitor for several weeks now, and I still think it's great value for the money. However, you do need to pay attention that the monitor is not low on power (if you don't leave it plugged into the wall charger), as it will just switch off without a sound. I haven't used the VOX feature yet, so I noticed immediately that the screen was black and therefore the whole thing was off, but if you were using the VOX option, you could falsely assume that your baby was just not making any noise...beware!

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: Supergrand
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this monitor and the price! Can't ask for more to get a nice 2.4ghz monitor that is under $100 with shipping as well. It's nice to be able to see what our little baby is doing without entering and exiting the room which might wake her up. The night vision is excellent. Wished that it had a battery indicator, but other than that, this is a perfect monitor that helps us get on with our own stuff while knowing she is safe.

Reviews.Title: Love this monitor
Reviews.Author: dlh
Reviews.Content: We have been using this monitor for 3 months now with our now 6 month old. It has been great for us to see him in his room. The price can't be beat- I had low expectations given how affordable it was compared to other monitors but it has held up perfectly. I have accidentally dropped it numerous times and it has never had any problems. We can take it outside our house and it still works, great, reliable monitor.

Reviews.Title: Finally a monitor that lived up to our needs and expectation
Reviews.Author: FlSurferGrl016
Reviews.Content: After purchasing three different video monitors, and all breaking shortly after purchase, this monitor was a breath of fresh air. With our son, we used an audio monitor, but wanted a video monitor this time around as our master bedroom is on the first floor and our daughter's room is on the second floor. This monitor works great and after 3 months of use, we have had no issues! We have even taken it with us on a couple trips and never had an issue. It is extremely durable! The video is very clear and the aux mode is fantastic (and allows us to actually get some sleep too). I love that the video camera can be placed on the wall and is easy to adjust to show the entire crib. Additionally, my husband has a bad case of butterfingers once in awhile and we have a 3 year old who loves to watch his sister on the monitor and the monitor has withstood all they could throw at it. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because there is no audio notification when the battery is dying, only a small red flashing light indication, which does not good when we are sleeping. This has only been an issue once as we usually try and leave it plugged in the charger at night, and during the day the battery life is great - somewhere around 4-6 hours I think. The distance we get is pretty good for the most part too - I can wear the monitor and get reception while I am mowing the grass or work all around the house (2400 sq ft). Overall, I would say don't waste your time (or money) and order this monitor from the start.

Reviews.Title: Sound cuts out
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Tiffany"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product because of all of the positive reviews and great price; however I had to return it because like a couple of other reviewers said, the sound cut in and out even when not in the voice activated power saving mode.  The video quality was okay...not the greatest, but manageable.

Reviews.Title: Excellent! So happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: onemohrnow
Reviews.Content: Loving this product. I did a lot of research on baby monitors and I am very impressed with the video and sound quality. I didn't know video monitors like this existed until a few months ago when my friend showed me her Summer Infant BestView. I think they are very comparable and I didn't read once in all of the Infant Optics reviews that the video screen broke like the Summer model did.What is extremely reassuring to me is that I am the only person who can view my baby. I couldn't find a better price. I wish I would have bought one months ago!!! The plastic that other people complain about is fine, I don't know what the problem is because what's really important is the video and sound quality, which is great.  I plan to get another camera when we have a second child, it is very easy how to figure out how to link four camera views.

Reviews.Title: like it like it like it
Reviews.Author: Jujubean
Reviews.Content: I've had this monitor for a year and a half and it works great! This is my first and only video monitor but I see no reason to buy anything different. It is a great price compared to other baby monitors and I love all the functions. Also I see no need for voice interaction and I honestly think it would freak out my daughter. If you want to be able to see and hear your baby this is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Kali raina "rainakali"
Reviews.Content: I don't understand why people keep talking about "cheap plastic".  Its not a product to be eaten or something, nor is it a decorative item for the showcase.  It does what it is meant to do - and it does it very well.  It is alo very lightweight  - probably because of the "cheap plastic" :) I can't understand why people pay so much more for this.  I highly recommend it. 1 minor issue - I wish the handheld monitor had a stand so that it could be kept propped up.  Overall, very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great value for daytime use, not so good with night vision
Reviews.Author: Pro-gun
Reviews.Content: Daytime image is very clear and works well.  When using the IR function, you need to hold the monitor at an angle (not straight-on) so you can see the image and even then, it is not too clear.  Good overall value but I thought it would be better in the night vision mode too.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: This product is very good. It does what says... I am glad, cheap and useful. I bought two. My friend liked too. The image is goo and the reach is about 20 meters.

Reviews.Title: Good price for what you get
Reviews.Author: Bob Wilson
Reviews.Content: This infant optics monitor is the best one we had so far. There's no static or interference and the range is excellent. It lacks some feature that higher end models have, but for the price this is more than what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: vrw
Reviews.Content: After buying and returning a few other high-end monitors (Samsung, Motorola)... I decided to try this one.  Skeptical at the beginning but the reviews convinced to give it a try.  For the price, this monitor is amazing!  The best feature is the night vision, so clear and crisp.  And bonus: this monitor has the VOX activation.

Reviews.Title: nice monitor, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Stacie
Reviews.Content: UPDATE Sept 2012:  After using this item, I noticed a few things that you may want to know about...1. The baby has to make quite a bit of noise (like a cry) for the monitor to light up.  If the baby is just moving around it or making noises it will not turn on automatically.  I don't like that because then I'm fumbling in the dark trying to find the button.  I do like that you can connect up to 4 cameras to 1 device.  It is ok device.  I paid $99 for it. I felt I got my money's worth comparing to other video monitors that are in the $250+ range.I haven't used this on a regular basis yet as I am not due til July 2012, but from what I have seen I am very happy with this monitor.  I had bought a much more expensive video monitor for my daughter, but it broke and so I had to buy another.  This new monitor is very clear and works very well.  It does look a little cheap on the outside, but the quality of video is there and works very well from what i have seen so far. I paid $99 for this monitor on AMazon.  So, for the price, great deal.

Reviews.Title: Addicted to It
Reviews.Author: Tiana Smith
Reviews.Content: I've only had this baby monitor for a day or so and already I love it. We bought this because I had the bad habit of checking on my son too early (I wanted to make sure he actually fell asleep, but whenever he saw me, he'd think it was time to stand up and play - or, I'd hear him cry and I'd walk in to give him his binky, even though he'd have just grabbed it himself and didn't need me, which again, would make him think it was time to get up when he saw me).We had tried an audio monitor before, but didn't really need it. I could hear my son throughout our really small apartment, and it didn't stop me from walking in on him too early because he'd often be quiet for several minutes before actually falling asleep. For moms like me who like to check on their babies, this monitor is perfect. I can see the entire crib, and I can click it on or off whenever I'd like to take a peek. The view isn't as crystal clear as the photo would have you believe, unless you can get a really close-up on your baby, which I can't do because my little one crawls around too much and doesn't stay in one place. But the image is clear enough that I can see when my son is asleep/awake/has his binky/doesn't have his binky/etc. Sometimes my signal blinks like it's too far out of range, which has me worried a little bit for when we move into our bigger house in a couple weeks. I'll be sure to update my review if the range is affected.***Update***We've now owned this monitor for about ... four months or so? Anyway, it still works great. The range is completely fine even for our new larger home. In fact, it might seem weird, but our monitor actually works better in our house (probably because there's more open space?) than it did in our small apartment. Go figure.One problem we've had with it is that the antenna casing isn't too strong. The monitor fell from our bedside table (about two feet high) onto carpet, and the antenna casing broke off. Because the antenna inside the casing is just a metal-ish wire, the monitor still works just fine. But we've now had to glue the casing back on twice. So, I'd recommend putting the monitor somewhere where it won't likely fall.Another problem I've had with it is that the battery life doesn't last too much longer than ... oh, about two and a half hours. This is actually quite a long time, but when we put our son down for the night at 7:30, and then we leave the monitor with a babysitter, I'd like to know that the monitor is going to last the entire time we're gone. So I usually just leave her the cord as well so she can plug it in if need be.Other than those really small complaints though, I really love this product. It works so well for the price and has all the features I need.

Reviews.Title: Very impressive for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Weinert "sweinert"
Reviews.Content: VOX mode and auto mute, when used correctly, make this a very impressive product for the price. The monitor can be completely dark and silent until it detects the slightest noise. Then it jumps on and will wake you up if you have the volume high enough. Perfect for overnight use. We have a WiFi network with multiple devices using it as well as a 2.4Ghz cordless phone system and we have ZERO interference. Crystal clear sound and video feed 100% of the time. Hard to believe you get the range, video quality, and features reserved for the super $$$ models for only $99. Have only owned this a short period of time and rarely write reviews (pos or neg) - this deserves it though.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this purchase
Reviews.Author: Blue Cat
Reviews.Content: We've been using this just a few weeks. We love it. Initially I thought the screen would be too small to see anything, but I was wrong! The IR night vision is awesome too!I do wish it came with a second monitor, I know it can be purchased separately, but for now 1 works. We do need to get velcro to be able to place the camera in a more optimal location.. it's currently in the corner of the bassinet.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor for the money
Reviews.Author: Rama
Reviews.Content: Just got this monitor for my 11 month old son and I never thought of getting a video monitor until my mother insisted me in getting one! Looked around walmart and shopping malls and they were much more expensive than the deals here online. I haven't seen this brand before but with the reviews I thought I'd give it a try. For half the price I was expecting to pay, this is excellent. Falls short on the features but it's got night vision (which I HAD to get) and a good range so it fits my list. It was very easy to set up and install. I know some reviews complain about a beeping noise, but I got the newest version (as it claims opening the box) and there's the new automute function and the beeping thing was resolved.Great buy for the money!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Hyun W Pak
Reviews.Content: We were hesitant to make this purchase at first, but after reading all of the reviews, we decided to click buy and "see" for ourselves.We were pleasantly surprised.Everything good that's said about this product in the other reviews are true.Works as expected and much cheaper than comparable models from different "name brand" companies.If you need a video monitor for your baby's room, get this one, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor + Reasonable Price = LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: nenakim
Reviews.Content: Having a video monitor has changed our life! With baby #1 I definately went in too early, but now we can take our time and see if our son will self-soothe. This camera has a great price, clear monitor, & nice features (night vision, monitor clip/stand, & option to add other cameras). Only complaint: the plastic makes it feel really cheap (perhaps that is why it is more reasonably priced than others) & the battery life is short (but no big deal to plug it in on our night stand).

Reviews.Title: Great price for what you get
Reviews.Author: AimEE
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product for the price given. I know that video monitors now can go all the way up to $300 and they ought to worth 5 stars, but a small company exist for people like me who can't afford a $300 monitor. It's a basic system but it gives me all I need already. It was easy to set up and the camera and monitor was paired already meaning I do not need to set it up. One thing worth mentioning is the video quality - it is really good day and night. The pixels are very clear and it gives me a clear picture to see what exactly my 8 month old daughter is doing. Unlike the old analog audio monitors I've had, this unit doesn't have static or range problems around my modest house. I would highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kennda
Reviews.Content: If you have a budget of $100 for your baby monitor, and you don't want to get a audio monitor, this one is it. It's simple to use, doesn't have too many features, and works like a gem. Got an additional camera and adding it to my existing system was a walk in the park.The VOX can be annoying so if you want it constantly on (plug it into a power socket!) you can switch off the VOX.The build quality can be improved but as long as it works and doesn't break, I'm happy with what I have.

Reviews.Title: Seems to do what it says
Reviews.Author: Theresa Dlugopolsky
Reviews.Content: Overall it seems like a pretty good monitor. I kinda test drove it but I'm still waiting on the baby to arrive so I've only used it 2 times, one to play with it and the other when I set it up in the nursery.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: AnnaLee "RocknRoll mom"
Reviews.Content: I previously owned a audio monitor, and I paid nearly just as much as getting this infant optics video monitor. I'm glad I can finally afford one now, and the prices online are so cheap now. All I can say is once you get spoilt by one of these thing, it is impossible going back to audio only monitors!Everything is selfexplanatory....other than referring back to the manual to turn the automute and power saving mode off to keep both the audio and video on at all times.For the price, this is an excellent product. Might not be the best one out there consider the specifications are pretty bland, but if you are looking for one that is under $100, this one is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Awesome monitor
Reviews.Author: happymama
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor after reading the reviews for all the different baby monitors that is out there. It's not the best one out there, but for the price, I was happy to get what it offers. I've owned this for a month now and I really love it! At first I thought the screens size would be too small, but when I use it, I can see everything I want to see. The night vision works fantastic. There's no pan or tilt function that I would actually like to have so I can pan left and right around the room, but for the price I think this is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: erin
Reviews.Content: Haven't used it for the baby yet, but it works perfectly.  The picture is very clear.  I'm happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: OK monitor but a few major flaws
Reviews.Author: Mom282
Reviews.Content: I am in search of a video monitor with two cameras since I have an almost 2 year old and another baby on the way. I tried out this monitor based on the good reviews and low price (I purchased the monitor for $99 and the extra camera for $59). There are two major flaws that I found, which is why I returned it. First, the volume is too low. Even at the highest setting, I had trouble hearing my son. After two days of not being able to hear him well, I decided that this monitor would not work well with an infant. Second, there is no "video off" button as my previous video monitor had. Even though there is a voice activation setting that I used at night, after two nights of being woken up by the bright light of the monitor for the slightest noise, I missed the "video off" button of my old monitor.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality, Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Donald P. Appleman "donniebeez od"
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor as a gift for my wife for Christmas.  Over the last four months it has helped us sleep well at night knowing that we can see our young child in his bed.  The quality of the camera and the monitor are fantastic.  We mostly see our child in the 'night vision' mode and it works great.  You can see every detail and facial expression.  The reception on the monitor is phenomenal, outside, upstairs or across the house, we always can see our child.  Highly recommend for the smart parent.  It's also expandable, so when we have more kids, we'll be able to keep track of them all!

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Ebarry
Reviews.Content: I bought this product after a recommendation from a friend. I have had problems with the VOX mode working correctly. The screen goes black, which it should, but then does not go back on when my child wakes like it should. I have not had the annoying beeping sound some have mentioned. I would return it if I could but I threw away the package.

Reviews.Title: Excellent video monitor
Reviews.Author: Sports Family
Reviews.Content: The Infant Optics 2.4 ghz Digital Baby Monitor is an excellent value. Before purchase I was concerned that the video would be too small but it's fine.  We have the camera set up high above the baby's crib but we can see and hear her clearly. The screen is so clear in the dark that I can see if her eyes are open or not. The range is strong enough that we can take the monitor outside and still have a perfect picture. I called customer service with a technical question. I received a call back in less than an hour from a very professional tech. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: affordable and easy to use
Reviews.Author: IA
Reviews.Content: great product. very easy to use and easy to install. it is not "high-tech" by any means, but that is probably why the price is reasonable. i would definitely recommend if u don't need anything fancy, but just need a video monitor that is reliable.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind
Reviews.Author: ppoppo
Reviews.Content: I had voice only monitor for my first baby and I was looking for video monitor after my second baby born. I didn't want to pay fortune for another monitor and this is perfect.Perfect price for peace of your mind.

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer support
Reviews.Author: Lorraine
Reviews.Content: Emailed the company about some issues regarding the VOX and they got back to me within 2 hours with a call and detailed explaination of how the VOX works. I'm glad these online purchases are getting more and more reliable!The product is good if you understand how the VOX off. It comes with factory preselected as ON, and if it is ON, it will shut the video and audio off after 3 minutes if the noise is below 65 decibels.Everything elese is straight forward as a walk in the park.This monitor is great for non-techy moms like me!

Reviews.Title: Nice and easy
Reviews.Author: I. Grotte
Reviews.Content: Used mine for a week now and it's better than I expected. Looks and feels like a toy but the hardware is fanstastic. It's got an automute function, a power saving function, a nice big clear screen (nothing like a retina display however!), easy to use functionality, and great range. I'm very surprised that a monitor for $100 with free shipping can be this good. This monitor is good for parents who do not want to go through the hassle with complicated setups.I'm about to buy another additional camera for this and hopefully it'll be just as easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: VERY USEFUL!! LOW VOLUME :(
Reviews.Author: DollyC.
Reviews.Content: Hi, my husband bought me this monitor and we received it 3 days ago, so far, so good... here are the pros and cons..Pros+Pretty nice quality video+Night vision excellent+Easy to use, light weight+Charger so you can keep it on the amount of time you wish or need.Cons-Bad volume, sounds very low (even having it in the highest level), if you are somewhere in your house with a little noise you can't hardly listen to the baby, so you better keep an eye on the video very often. (I'm thinking to turn on our old Sony baby monitor just to hear my baby and then watch the video...that would be an option)-Video is nice as I wrote above but colors are only shown if there's a lot of light in an object, my baby looks like an alien with bright eyes even at 1 p.m. in a very sunny day, half is black and white  and the rest in "colors" very softOverall is a good product, reasonable price, I gave it 4 stars, No regrets, good choice!  :)

Reviews.Title: Nice but battery died a quick death.
Reviews.Author: Sunnybrook
Reviews.Content: The camera worked fine. Monitor pic was good. Easy to set up. Wish the monitor could be set to stay on if I want it to.
