But what I'm not happy with is that after 3 days of use the batter will not recharge. Can't find a replacement battery. Unfortunately the 3 days of use were spread out over 6 weeks so can't return item. Infant Optics 2.4ghz Digital Video Baby Monitor. 2.4" display rechargeable portable monitor. IR night vision. FHSS 100% privacy encryption. Voice activated power saving mode.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Tj Whyer "Roaster"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Infant Optics monitor and love it. The video is very good and I get reception all around the house. It's quite a simple monitor so it's great for my wife to use without confusing her too much like what our IP cam.I recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: all very good with one complaint!
Reviews.Author: Alicia A.
Reviews.Content: I really like this monitor! I looked around for a while on amazon for a video monitor, and I had to compare all the specifications VS prices VS reviews and I'm happy that I ended up with this choice. It's not a top of the line video monitor, but it does the job well enough for a good price. It doesn't have any interference (although it runs on 2.4ghz), and the screen size is a decent size. I have it placed on a table across the crib and it views my child clearly so I can see if he is sleeping or awake or trying to get my attention. He also learnt that I can hear him even when I'm 2 rooms away from him with the door closed!I'm slightly reserved on the VOX mode. There is room for improvement  - such as having a feature where I can set the sentivity of the VOX. I just can't imagine how I can have this turning ON in the middle of the night just because a truck drives pass! The only solution is to keep the VOX off and have it turned on the whole night.

Reviews.Title: Looks good, works bad
Reviews.Author: J. White
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a good working (i mean actually one that does what it states) baby monitor as it is necessary for me with my children staying with their grandparents whom live in a 4 story home, and are not used to watching children.  I was thiking this one would be good with the range that it states, but once I set it up, i was not able to get one of the cameras to work even with a range of 50 feet!  This was with drywalls and not concrete walls.  I would not recommend this to anyone that needs a range of more than 25 feet, as it is give or take.  The other camera worked ok up to a range of 100 feet, but the other as i stated before was not reliable at all.It comes in a very nice looking package, and functions easy enough, but quality is sub-par.I ended up getting the Motorola baby monitors which function exactly as stated without any exaggeration, although it does cost twice as much.I would say you get what you pay for, but i would expect to have a range of at least 300 feet spending 100$ on a product!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful baby monitor
Reviews.Author: ChubbyLuv
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on the page and I couldn't believe a $100 can be so good, so I had to try it out.  It's really good for the value, tho it's not the best monitor in terms of what it has to offer, but with a 2 camera set up this is exactly what I was looking for.The video and audio quality is as expected. I love how the there is an automute function that can be turned on and off to cut the static noise when there's no activity.I'll try it out a few more weeks to test the reliability and update this review then.

Reviews.Title: Been reliable for 3 months and rolling
Reviews.Author: Soruk SD
Reviews.Content: The only thing I asked when I bought this monitor at this price was that it will stay working and not breakdown on me like the 2 older video monitors I've had (both summer infant). I'm glad this unit hasn't failed me for the 3 months of ownership. I do agree on most reviews saying that the quality isn't the best, but the functions and features are work well and it's well designed in that respect. I think the cheaper pricing reasons why this monitor is cheaper than the other options (of the same specs) in the market.It expands up to 4 cameras, I only have 2, and it's quite easy to pair up. I just don't like how companies rip you off for pricing the addon cameras 60% of the full kits' cost.

Reviews.Title: I like it so far
Reviews.Author: Crakker
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this baby monitor and very satisfied with the speed of shipping with amazon. This monitor is one of the cheaper monitors but we were happy to try it out knowing the fact amazon has a 30 day return policy. Everything works better than expected when I only paid $100 for a video monitor - the night vision is good, picture is clear, and audio is good. I didn't experience any internet interference problems but I am aware that 2.4ghz monitors can interfere with routers. A well spent $100!

Reviews.Title: this staff is perfect for me
Reviews.Author: hanghang
Reviews.Content: this is the best staff I have ever seen for baby monitor for this price and it is really very helpful for me and my wife

Reviews.Title: Solid Option at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Erin E Doll
Reviews.Content: Update: 1/25/2013 - So after many nights of interrupted sleep we replaced this monitor.  I wanted to like it, I really did.  However, as my previous review below mentions, you can't turn off the video without turning off the audio. You can set both up to "sleep" and only wake when there is noise.  This is the only option if unless you can sleep through the bright glowing display. Unfortunately, everything wakes up the monitor (except, strangely enough, my daughter talking...which would be the point). Planes flying over, the dog walking around in the hallway (we have hardwood floors) etc all wake it.  Then not only does the audio activate, which would be okay, but the very bright video as well. My husband finally flat out insisted we get rid of  it and we bit the bullet and bought the Summer Infant Touch Video Monitor and LOVE IT.Original Review:I was looking for a reasonably priced option to replace my older video baby monitor that had begun to buzz with static. Based on the reviews I decided to take a chance on this one.I have used this for 3 days so far and am very happy with it.  The video is clear and the audio is free of static. The battery life seems good.My only complaint with the unit is the video display is quite bright even on the lowest setting and there is no way to turn it off and leave just the audio active. My previous monitor had a button that turned video on and off independently of the audio, which I liked.The voice activated power save mode shuts off both video and audio when it senses no audio for 3 minutes.  I have been using this mode since the video is too bright to leave enabled while I am trying to sleep. So far it seems to be working well.  However, it does turn on both video and audio when it activates. I have also noticed that the 65db threshold is possibly a bit too high (meaning it should be a bit more sensitive).  I have a 2 year old and primarily use this to make sure she isn't out of bed playing in her room when she is supposed to be sleeping but if you had a small infant you might want the unit to activate when the child is making noise at a volume lower than 65db.So overall I find this to be a solid unit.  If there were only a way to turn off the video at night while leaving the audio enabled it would be PERFECT!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It does feel kind of cheap. But it has survived many falls from the dresser and table and still works. I like that the camera has a stand, but can also be wall mounted. Haven't had any problems with it. Every now and then the screen gets weird for a second, but only if my phone is to close and I'm recieving an email or text.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: vikipops
Reviews.Content: We decided to try a brand that we've never heard of before and this monitor didn't disappoint us at all. Our Summer Infant video monitor died on us last month, but it did serve us for a good 2 years since our first child. The infant Optics monitor was one of the cheaper options but we didn't need the hightech gizmos that came with more money. We bought 2 additional cameras on amazon and they paired up without any problems. You can't view it all at the same time (it's just a 2.4 inch screen), and you have to flip through all 4 channels before it goes back to cam 1 (it's not smart enough to skip cam 4, which was empty anyway).I didn't have any wifi problems that some users reported here. (I have an apple time capsule that I bought last year)

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics Video Monitor
Reviews.Author: R. Godfrey
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor for the price!  We mounted the camera on the wall, facing down into the crib, and the picture quality is very good, even in night vision mode. VOX is a great way to save the battery charge and I have not had the problem with beeping that others experienced. The units feel cheap, but they work fine and seem, over all, to be well-made. I'm really glad we picked this one over some of the more expensive systems. We've been using it for about two months now, every night, with no problems. The battery could stand to hold a charge longer, but I just keep it plugged in by my bed, and grab it up when I'm on the couch or somewhere else in the house.14-Month Update:  We still use this monitor daily and I consider it one of the top 3 purchases we made when baby came along.  It is a great peace of mind to be able to turn it on and see him, rather than going in his room and possibly disturbing him.  It helped a lot during sleep training when he would cry a little and I could see that he was fine, just learning how to fall asleep.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Monitor System!
Reviews.Author: ROBERT S. BALDO
Reviews.Content: This monitor and company are fantastic! The monitor and camera work wonderful and are very easy to use. Night vision is excellent! This is actually used to watch a disabled child with medical needs when he is resting. I would recommend it to everyone. Also, I had a question about a feature and Calvin at Tech Support really helped me out and fast. I like a great product but having great tech support is an added bonus! If you are thinking about geting this, go ahead and buy it! You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Never knew what I was missing!
Reviews.Author: Jessie R. Root
Reviews.Content: I had only been using an older audio monitor for the first two months of my daughter's life.  We have a small house so it was fine.  Once it started to burn out we decided to invest in a video monitor since we go camping in the fall/winter and it would be a necessity at that point.  I did quite a bit of research and my choices came down to this one or the Lorex.  I decided on this one based on other reviews and a personal referral from a friend.  This is only our second night using it but I am in love!  The image is amazing & the VOX picks up my daughters light coos when she is stirring.  Some people have mentioned a beep when the VOX activates but I haven't heard it.  One of the biggest attractions for me is the fact that it claims to have an 800' range outdoors.  So far in our small 1100 s/f house there seems to be no trouble; we'll see how the outdoor range is this fall when we are camping.  :)For the money I really think this is a great investment, especially since you can add multiple cameras.  I was a little disappointed in the material upon opening the package, but I am totally over that, it is lightweight and so easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor so far
Reviews.Author: aott
Reviews.Content: After reading numerous reviews (Amazon & many others) I decided to purchase this unit. I am more than satisfied with the all around quality! No problems with WiFi interference, vox works great, have not experienced any of the problems that are stated in lower reviews. I would recommend this product, hands down. Have been using unit for almost 3 months.After over 1 year of use the original review still stands. Battery life in monitor is getting lower, but, expected since it Never gets turned off! A+++++ product

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: ladynuca
Reviews.Content: We just got the monitor and set it up today. It was easy to figure out how to connect everything, and it worked right away. The resolution is pretty good and I can easily see what's going on in the crib. The night vision is excellent. We haven't had any problems with interference with our wireless network. For around $100, I think it's a great deal. I know there are fancier monitors out there, but I don't need any of the additional functions that come with them. Very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: so far very good!!
Reviews.Author: lima
Reviews.Content: So far I love this video monitor,was easy to setup and works great.I can see my baby at night perfect,the voice activated is precise.If a could change anything on this device I will put a bigger screen,but for the price this one works very good.I read for months reviews about baby monitor,my goal was purchase something good on a budget,and finally I made my purchase thru amazon and so far I am glad I did.

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitor
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: Purchased this monitor with 1x addon camera unit for our new born baby girl. I have nothing to complain about this other than the sound is soft, but we figured out it works better by moving it closer to the crib. Our 2.4ghz dlink router we bought 6 months ago has no issue with this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Works great w/ one MAJOR problem!
Reviews.Author: K. Lee
Reviews.Content: This product in isolation works really great.  Fast and easy to begin using and works very well with add on cameras.  HOWEVER, it totally interrupts your wireless network (if you have one) or wireless internet connections!!!  BE WARNED!  These cameras work well but will knock out all of your wireless internet connections.  My husband is a Network Admin and was stunned that this was in fact the case, but after 3 days of testing we decided to return the cameras even though they worked well -- we cannot live without the internet!  ...lol

Reviews.Title: Fabulous range
Reviews.Author: Steve Greco "Geiko"
Reviews.Content: We still have a few months till our baby arrives but I wanted to test this out to see the capability of this product. I'm very impressed with the range! I took it all the way to my basement and left the camera on the 2nd floor and the signal was still there.The image is very clear and I like the design. Some critics may argue it's toy-ish but I think having a cute baby monitor is unique.It comes with a cradle that you can mount the camera onto that looks downwards. It's really just a piece of plastic but I think it'll be better if there incorporated some sort of mechanism that will tilt the camera downwards without toppling over. Now I've just got to look for a place to store it (without forgetting where I put it) since I won't be using it.Since it'll play a big part in our lives I think this monitor will be worthwhile buy.

Reviews.Title: Very good monitor
Reviews.Author: Lilonemeg
Reviews.Content: My husband has been wanting a video monitor for over a year to watch our son and now with a new baby on the way, we decided to get this monitor. I am very happy with it. We have only a Graco audio monitor to compare it to, so as far as other video monitors go, I do not know about their features or performance.  Setup was easy and the picture is good.  The only reason I gave it four stars is because the voice activated power saving mode is a nice feature, but baby has to make noises at 65 dB or louder to trigger it back on.  For us, baby's cries escalate and by the time they are over 65dB, he is mad!  I keep our old Graco on as well, so that we hear him better.  Both monitors operate in the same room, at the same time with no interference for us.  We will probably purchase a second add-on camera for new baby soon.

Reviews.Title: Works great, minor wifi issues.
Reviews.Author: T. C. Hedger "High Definition Eater"
Reviews.Content: For the price I paid $100, you get a very decent package for a small price.  Setup is easy.  Placement was easy and the quality is outstanding for such a low price.  Good frame rate, good detail on the focused area and the sound is also clear.  I  do not hear the beeps that other people have reported when it goes into power save mode, so perhaps they manufacturer updated the software code.I did have to change the broadcast channel of my wifi router as when this device channel hops it sometimes jams the signal for my iPhone 4S.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Erika Minka
Reviews.Content: This an amazing monitor at a good price. I needed a monitor for my son and I've had quite a few audio monitors but they performed below my expectations with poor reception and poorly designed user interface. I wanted to invest into a video monitor but didn't want to spend too much and end up regretting again.I tried this out and it works like a magic. It works well in low-light conditions, and audio is very clean with good sensitivity. It's easy to use and is very straight forward. The VOX mode can be complicated so I don't use it. Keeping it plugged into the power cord keeps it running long term but you lack the portability but thats okay because I only use it when I sleep.I only had this for a few weeks so it is too early to rate its reliability. I just hope it will continue to run without any problems!

Reviews.Title: VERY clear picture!!
Reviews.Author: Caresse
Reviews.Content: If your on the fence about wether or not to buy this monitor, just go for it! I was worried that it would be poor quality based on how much cheaper it is than other comparable monitors...boy was I wrong!  Glad I took a chance on this one!  It has a super clear picture, no static sound, goes far, no interference.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: An economical monitor
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: We were deciding between the samsung and this, and went to give this a try since it's got a better offer on amazonthe battery lasts shorter than expected. I was hoping for it to last a whole day, but it dies in around half day without VOX onVideo is great. The wireless range is good.The sound cuts in and out because of the auto-mute function that they describe. It's not the best, since it filters out the quiet noises (like my baby shuffling in his blanket) and you only get audio back when he makes a louder noise.Had some problems with pairing it at first but their customer service was AWESOME in helping us out.

Reviews.Title: Just what we wanted!
Reviews.Author: lauraannxoxo
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for the price. It does the basic features of a video monitor which is what we wanted, we didn't want to pay extra for features we wouldn't use (two-way communication, take pictures). It's super easy to set-up, a clear picture and compact. Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: A real bargain for a digital monitor
Reviews.Author: Ger Ald
Reviews.Content: This is the third video baby monitor we have. We've been through enough monitors to know exactly what we want in them. This is the first one that is digital and it's great that there is absolutely no static in the video and the sound. We also bought 2 additional cameras which have worked out very well. You can view the 3 screens at the same time, so we constantly have to cycle through the channels. We were hoping that there would be a monitor with split sreen but we couldn't find one.The battery life is so so, around a full night when on the VOX standby mode, and 3 hours when on contantly.The price makes it a real bargain and I love the fact that a video monitor is now actually comfortably affordable now. Our old monitors used to cost a ridiculous $300, and they weren't digital!

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
Reviews.Author: USAFwife_Cjsmommy
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor for my two boys. (2 months and 3 Years.) They are awesome! I love the night vision. We bought an extra camera and put one in each of the boys rooms. Flipping from camera to camera is easy and the picture is clear. The range works great and The cameras are secure so no one can see your baby but you!

Reviews.Title: Great product! Great Price!
Reviews.Author: DAGO80
Reviews.Content: Good purchase overall, great image in night vision mode, range is good at least for my house, no interference or bad quality image at any time, sleep mode or voice activation is good since it saves a lot of battery, portable monitor has light weight, and sound is very clear. I definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Works great...
Reviews.Author: Jody
Reviews.Content: We use this for our nursery in the downstairs portion of our duplex loft.  It works great, crisp clear view with a long lasting charge. Inexpensive and saves us a trim downstairs to check in on the little one. So great we will be adding a second camera which can be operated by the same remote for his little brother when he moves into the room in a few months.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: OGG
Reviews.Content: Really good product at a really good price: perfect combination!I have been using it for a week or so. So far it works great.Clear image, very good sound quality and sensitivity.I TOTALLY RECOMMEND IT.

Reviews.Title: DXR5 monitor
Reviews.Author: Santhi Singh
Reviews.Content: I love this product. I had a summer infant before and it was twice the price. This one is similar, just upgraded with better video and a more compact handheld monitor. It's simple and easy, I just needed the instructions to figure how to switch the VOX off or otherwise I didn't need the instructions at all.I didn't have the beeping problem when it goes into VOX) which I was concerned about after reeding some of the reviews..... I'm glad they fixed this foolish glitch!

Reviews.Title: Great video quality
Reviews.Author: mdtkdchick
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best infant video camera units that I have seen for the price and ease of use. The setup takes less than a couple of minutes and the video quality is outstanding. The infrared quality in darkness is great. A must have for those first time parents that constantly worry.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Mandy
Reviews.Content: I received the Infant Optics Video Baby Monitor as a gift after asking for it on a wish list.  I asked for it because of its favorable reviews and great price point.  I am thrilled with the product, and have used it repeatedly since receiving it.  The image is very clear, and I have no problem getting a signal in our condo.  We have had a small problem with remote devices operating on other people's frequencies as we live in such close proximity to others.  There is no problem at all with signal interference with this product.  One thing buyers should note is that the camera comes with a lens cap that must be removed in order to see the image.  This is easily overlooked by sleep deprived new parents!Thank you, Infant Optics, for making an affordable option for a Video Baby Monitor.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic monitor
Reviews.Author: Diane Swentzel "chic mom"
Reviews.Content: This monitor is super easy to use. With the price that I got this with, I can not be happier with this purchase. The picture is extremely clear both day and night and the sound is loud and sensitive. It falls short on the finishing quality which justifies why it's going at this price.I was worried at first that my unit was defective because the sound kept dropping off until I read the manual and realized this was to mute the static noise when it's dead quiet. It's quite intuitive because my home sound system does that too.This monitor is great buy for any parents out there who don't sleep with their child in the same room.

Reviews.Title: Nice and simple
Reviews.Author: Deemaria
Reviews.Content: A great monitor for the price! We got as a recommendation from my brother who had his first child 1/2 year ago. The video quality is great and there were no compatibility issues with our existing wifi at home. We keep the camera right next to her crib and I'm glad the night vision doesn't have a glowing light in her face while she is sleeping. It can be quite confusing on how to operate the voice power saving feature but otherwise it's very simple and easy to use unlike security IP cameras we considered to take advantage of our iphones.

Reviews.Title: Best for value
Reviews.Author: Eoi
Reviews.Content: It's really hard to find the right baby monitor since there are so many of them in the market.For me, it was about the value.I find this infant optics monitor a bargain, although it is not the best one.It's got the basic features, but that's what I need. For the more money, you can get the motorola that has pan tilt and zoom, music, two-way commm, etc but I don't need that. I'm with my baby most of the time but I need the monitor while I'm cooking and that's it.Everything works as advertised and I'm very happy with this unit.

Reviews.Title: Infant monitor
Reviews.Author: Holly Nordness
Reviews.Content: I got these monitors for 2 of my best friends who are getting ready to have a baby.  They arrived in a timely fashion and shipping was free.  They are new, in great condition and am looking forward to giving them to my girls.  Very affordable.

Reviews.Title: Good product for that price..
Reviews.Author: Julio Cesar R. Caracciolo
Reviews.Content: I have received this item last week and the first thing that I did was to tested....It works fine....even the night vision was very clear....the only drawback was the quality of the plastic, it feels cheap, one has to be extra careful not to drop it due to the fragility of the item...but overall it is a good buying....

Reviews.Title: Awesome value!
Reviews.Author: Lindseylu
Reviews.Content: This video monitor works awesome and you can't beat the price.  I was a little worried about buying it at first because of the price but it works the same if not better than the brands priced twice as much.  I love the option to add on 3 more cameras too.  You can't go wrong with buying this video monitor.  I am impressed with it and so happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: After reading many of the reviews on this monitor we decided to go ahead and go for it since it had received so many positive reviews. The first thing we noticed is the plastic feel that many folks had commented about. That is very true. It almost feels like a toy, not very sturdy feeling. The monitor works just fine but almost immediately the antenna on the camera broke with out us dropping it or damagining it at all. Im considering returning it and going for one of the first models we had thought about buying. Overall not very pleased.

Reviews.Title: No WiFi Issues, excellent product! No Complaints!!
Reviews.Author: homesweethome57
Reviews.Content: @ $139.99, I think I overpaid. I use this as a surveillance camera for my office and it is PERFECT. NO WiFi issues as others have said. Microphone great, picture quality great. Overall, 5 STARS no questions asked.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect, but our wireless internet connection stopped working when camera was on
Reviews.Author: evangak
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera - just a bit worried about impact on baby's brain development due to the strong camera signal - imagine that our wireless internet connection does not work when the camera is on

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: J. Malechowski
Reviews.Content: Works great, even the night vision is impressive. For the price you cant go wrong. The only issue i have is if the power flickers, the camera turns off and I have to get something to stand on to turn it back on since its mounted on the wall. But no biggie. Id buy another if I needed 2.

Reviews.Title: Best Monitor I've used out of 3 Monitors
Reviews.Author: LB "LB"
Reviews.Content: I bought this out of frustration from using the Sony BabyCall monitor that was suggested in the book "Baby Bargains".  The Sony monitor made constant noise in one form or another, waking me up through the night.I saw this monitor and for a video monitor, the price was the cheapest I had seen.  Night one I kept checking to make sure that it worked because it made NO noise, no static, no skipping/loud noise like my Sony, the video was as clear as could be.  It was fantastic!  We've had it a week now and love it.  I only wish that it came with 2 of the portable monitor pieces in the $99 order.  With an 2 story house, one up and one down would be easier than moving it here and there.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: liesl's_daddy
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were new to the video monitor scene, and were essentially relying on reviews to lead us in the right direction.  This monitor seemed like a great deal, so we got it.  It is better than we'd anticipated.  We have had none of the "internet interference" problems that other people have.  The picture quality is great, whether using infrared or visible light.  The camera is easy to mount, set up, and use.  The mobile unit is very compact and easy to carry around.  Often, after we put our daughter down, my wife and I will sit and watch her on the little tv.While I'm sure the more expensive models may have more bells and whistles (like remote camera control and music and the ability to talk to your baby), I can't imagine a better deal than this one.  My advice:  BUY IT NOW!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: MountainHome
Reviews.Content: I received two monitors at my baby showers, and neither had the video feature. So, I returned those and got this one, and I'm so happy I did! I've had no issues with feedback or interference, and the picture is clear in both day and night mode. The casing is plastic, but I'm ok with that because it's easy to clean. The only thing I would change is that the parent unit charge doesn't last very long and it needs to be plugged in pretty often to make sure it doesn't die. There is no warning signal that the battery is going to die, either - it just dies so you have to be paying attention to make sure it's not just in VOX mode (voice activated - the monitor goes to sleep when all is quiet and wakes back up when there is noise in the room). Overall, I'm very happy with it and would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Incredibly satisfied with this video monitor! Such peace of mind.
Reviews.Author: New Mom
Reviews.Content: This monitor is exactly what we needed! It's simple and works like a dream. The camera has multiple ways of getting the right angle. You can mount it on the wall, or the provided mount stand, or as a standalone. We have had no problems with reception, interference, or delay. The sound quality is excellent--the VOX feature works great. I haven't been bothered by any beep noise when it turns back on when baby cries or wakes up. I haven't even noticed. I just know that when my baby wakes up and needs me, I know right away, I can see very clearly what he needs on the screen, and I can react exactly how I need to. This monitor is a game changer!!! I'm so glad I didn't waste my money on a Summer Infant product. Infant Optics, a no-frills, no-marketing brand, is the best!  So happy.

Reviews.Title: DXR5 Infant Optics
Reviews.Author: Red Rose
Reviews.Content: This is my first time owning a baby monitor and I love it! It made a huge difference to my life. For the $99, I can't see why any parent can avoid investing into one of these systems. I bought this based on the reviews I've read and I concur with most of the user sentiment towards this product. This monitor is very simple to use and it doesn't require any set up. I have friends who have a IP camera system set up but that takes such more configuring in terms of software setup. I don't have any negative comments to make about this product. Some people get confused about the power saving feature and the audio shutoff feature, it's actually two independent systems. I called the manufacturer and this is what they said - the power saving mode puts it in standby mode if there is no noise made for like 3 minutes. Both the screen and audio turns back on once noise is detected. The audio shutoff feature cuts out the noise ONLY when there's no sound for like 2 minutes and it reactivates when noise is detected again.It's confusing and they should have made it clearer in the instructions manual, but hope this review helps those lost souls!

Reviews.Title: Why didn't we buy this sooner?!
Reviews.Author: David Beveridge
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have found this video monitor to be one of the best things we've bought in awhile.  We've always used monitors, but being able to see and hear our children while they are sleeping is great. Sure beats trying to sneak into their room to check on them without waking them up.  The video quality is very good and the NV works well also. The screen on the receiver is big enough to see everything clearly, but it wouldn't hurt to be a little bigger.

Reviews.Title: works good but bad antenna
Reviews.Author: Terri
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present to my God Daughter's parents. The product works well but the antenna broke off the second day. This saddens me and them. There is no way to fix it and I don't know who to contact about it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing range
Reviews.Author: Midnight blue
Reviews.Content: I had an 900mhz baby monitor that I bought some 4 years ago and I had enough of the static and interference it gave off. I decided to try out a 2.4ghz which claimed to overcome these problems. The infant optics monitor was a big step forward, with full reception all around my 1500ft house and outside in the yard. I've also tested in my neighbor's house and unless I'm in their garage (not sure if it is to do with the thick walls), the signal doesn't kick out. Very impressed!

Reviews.Title: Great Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Rachel Faulkner
Reviews.Content: The video quality of the monitor is very clear.  The night vision works great.  The camera & monitor are very easy to use.  The only thing I do not like about this monitor is that it shoots me a really bright flash right before powering down into "sleep mode" when no noise is sensed in the baby's room.  I don't like it because I'm a light sleeper & it wakes me up briefly when powering down.  While I haven't tried it yet, the directions say you can set the monitor to not shut down automatically when no noise is sensed...if you want the monitor on all the time.  Also, it does come with power cords for the camera and the monitor, so I don't see the rechargable battery being an issue at all.  You can set the brightness of the screen & the sound level, which is great.  I have had no issues with interference or signal strength at all.

Reviews.Title: Excellent baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Phillip Jenkins
Reviews.Content: We were on the hunt for 'the' monitor after our old one died last month. We looked all around town including the obvious babies r us and walmart etc. but realized they were much more expensive than the deals online. We didn't want to spend too much money since we were not planning on another child. We finally decided to settle with this and it was worth more than we paid. The picture quality is excellent and it has all the features we needed. I know there are super groovy featured baby monitors with movable cameras, tempertaure sensors... but we were not after that. We just needed a digital monitor that is secure and doesn't have static, and is user friendly enough to keep me away from complaining every time I use it.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: BonnieB
Reviews.Content: The night vision works great and the video is good too. I love that it turns on and off. I read people saying it turns on for everything and i didnt find that to be true. this is a great product for the price

Reviews.Title: Over all pleased
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very good product for the price. Camera works well in night mode. Sound picks up well. I've never had another video baby monitor but I would recommend this one to others. The only thing we noticed was the monitor's battery life is rather short, about 4 hours, but we don't mind because it stays plugged in most of the time.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor!
Reviews.Author: 2boysmama808
Reviews.Content: This a great little monitor, especially for the price. We bought it to replace a summer infant monitor that crapped out after my little one dropped it in the toilet. It's supereasy to set up and I like the VOX option - seems to work well so far with the screen image appearing with any noise that comes from my son. The blue is cute - some people said it looks cheap but I like it. It looks cute in the room, and the monitor is really light and portable. Great buy so far!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: F. Velez
Reviews.Content: This product is not as expensive as other products of its kind but it works very well. And it is very user friendly. I highly recommend this product to those who want a simple, basic video monitor under $100.00

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: Aili K. Miller
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with this product! I ordered this so that I could see my baby girl while she is sleeping in my bed, we co-sleep and I am usually not ready to go to bed when she does, so naturally leaving her alone on our bed was a concern. I set this up in less than 5 minutes. The picture with night vision is super clear and the sound sensitivity is great. I love that the monitor hand held is rechargeable; I hate buying batteries.The price was well worth it and the quality is more than what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Internet Wireless Access
Reviews.Author: Luis Valencia
Reviews.Content: Is a NICE product, my wife is happy and me too.Only need a Internet Wireless Accesorie and more time to battery duration.

Reviews.Title: Good baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Mega John
Reviews.Content: This monitor is terrific. It works as described and doesn't give me any hassles like my audio monitor did. I got it work within 5 minutes after opening the box. The picture quality and night time clarity is excellent. The infrared lights give a dim red glow but it doesn't bother my baby. The way it works is self explainatory and you'll work it work by yourself without even referring to the manual unless you plan to get the add on cameras. The audio isn't as good as I hoped but it is sensitive enough to hear when my baby shuffles inside his bed. I love the price on that I got here amazon and I'm glad I didn't have to pay for any shipping with Prime!

Reviews.Title: Best overall performance and price
Reviews.Author: Chanel Hampson
Reviews.Content: This is the best baby monitor system I've ever owned in terms of overall performance in range, video/audio quality, and price. This is one of the best purhcases I've made and I've recommended this to my friends who plan on having one. I agree with other reviews that this monitor lacks the solid feel but I'm very happy with it because it does all I need it to do. The packaging also makes it looks like a great gift item too for newborns. Good job Infant Optics!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Savvy Girl
Reviews.Content: We are now on our second video monitor. We used to own a summer infant video monitor that has a huge black and white screen and I'm so happy that technology has improven and the the prices have drastically reduced. We LOVE this monitor when we place it side by side with our 5 year old monitor! I thought that the old one was excellent, since you can see exactly what your kids are up to at any time and anywhere around the house, but this is so much lighter and portable so I strap it on my belt while I move around. The video is clear and range is good all anywhere in my house. The battery life is also good, but I only keep it running on batteries for a short while then I keep it plugged in when I'm in the kitchen or in my room. I love this baby monitor!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Awakened
Reviews.Content: We have owned this nearly a month now. It's really simple, no setup, no software, no nothing. I like the idea of this instead of the IP cam that we were considering. Video in daytime and nighttime works extremely well. The mic is sensitive and the volume is loud enough to hear when we don't have to TV too loud. The screen size isn't as large as I hoped but I can still clearly see all the facial features of my daughter. I'm glad we didn't have any interference issue knowing that it shares the same frequency band as our cordless phones, wireless interenet, and also our xbox remote. We plan on getting 2 extra add on cameras so we can see our dogs too.

Reviews.Title: glad I can keep this one
Reviews.Author: Mommy-socks
Reviews.Content: after going through 2 low cost video monitors and returning them, i'm so glad i can keep this one. This one is by far the best in interference and video quality. The audio quality is so-so. I like the camera stand where I can hang the camera on the top of the wardrobe so it looks down on my baby. Being so far away from the baby, i was worried that the infrared wouldn't work like our previous one, but there's no problem at all.

Reviews.Title: Perfect monitor for my family
Reviews.Author: Erika Nelson
Reviews.Content: Here's the summary: it's $99 and it's reliable. That's all I need. The sound and video has zero interference, and this is saying something because I live in a big house with a lot of potential interruptions. The battery is rechargeable by using the adapters that come with it. I bought an extra battery just incase I figured the duration wasn't enough, but now I regret because I never needed to use it yet. The sound is a little bit quiet, but that's what I expected from such a small monitor. Oh and it has night mode, but it's only in black and white!

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: JONAS
Reviews.Content: Is incredible  for the price, worth every penny. it come with litum battery with mede more cheap to use and had avery good camera resolution

Reviews.Title: Recommended budget monitor
Reviews.Author: Amma
Reviews.Content: It works as expected. The signal doesn't disconnect anywhere around the house - garage, frontyard, backyard. Color a bit distorted and sound a bit to the soft side. Nevertheless I would recommend this without a doubt at 99 dollars.

Reviews.Title: I recommend this product to any parent needing to "watch" their child when in another room.
Reviews.Author: Linh Huynh
Reviews.Content: Rececieved this product ahead of schedule, which is very good, since it was during the "Christmas" period, when delivering things are very busy.  This product works as advertized and I recommend it to any parent needing a product to view their child whenever they are not inside the same room.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR5
Reviews.Author: Kevin Goes
Reviews.Content: Adore this baby monitor! The quality of the screen, sound and audio is incredible for what I paid for and this video monitor gives you the ability to see what your little kiddy is up to without any static and interruption with my wireless. I have twins that are a riot and they are just starting to be able to crawl and climb around everywhere. This baby monitor manages to screen the vast majority of the room and so I don't have to worry about losing track of what they are up to unless they are hiding in some obscure corner! Aesthetically it's rather toyish for parents but it works just like a hardcore camera system. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Kyensi
Reviews.Content: I got one after looking around for a baby monitor for months and I must say I'm very impressed with this product. It's not the best quality in terms of construction, video and audio, but for the price, it gives you what I wanted. I do not need the best display, the best sound system, or the best craftmanship, but I all I need is a monitor to show me what is happening in my son's room! For the price of this product, this is the best thing I could get.

Reviews.Title: What a deal!
Reviews.Author: C. Bass "the ONE"
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is great! It's got good quality in the daytime and in the dark. It's very easy to operate and that is a MUST because I have high-tech-phobia!The only downside is stand that supports the display. It folds out from the unit and I think the stand can be better designed so it can be tilted at an angle more.Otherwise, great product!

Reviews.Title: Fantasic monitor
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Haas
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic afforadable monitor. The range is good, there is no static video like the previous monitor I owned, the picture and sound is excellent. The power saving mode can be difficult to understand so rather than guessing when it will switch off and switch back on depending on the sound level detected with the camera, I keep the power saving mode off.The screen isn't that big, but it is sufficient if you want to do simple monitoring to see what your children are doing. The battery lasts a good 3 hours but I usually keep it plugged in which is more preferable if you are planning to keep the monitor in 1 spot.I bought 2 extra cameras and it works well. You can only monitor 1 camera at a time and you switch through the cameras like switching channels on your TV. I have one each set up in the room, frontyard and the living room and it's works great like professional security system!

Reviews.Title: worthwhile upgrade
Reviews.Author: Scott Doussan
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is amazing. I have always used audio monitors simply due to the fact that video monitors were too expensive, but since the price difference isn't so big anymore I got a video monitor to try out. Upgrading to this, I really do not see why anyone would want to use an audio monitor. This monitor gives you so much more information with the visual cues. I really can't think of anything I can complain about this. I do not think I can ever live without this monitor!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor!!
Reviews.Author: zon-zon
Reviews.Content: This monitor is great all rounded. I bought mine on amazon here and I'm glad I got it just for $99 while it was on sale. I've been using this every night since the last week and it has helped me alot giving me better sleep. My baby is just 2 months old and things can get quite out of hand when both of us have work commitments. Luckily, I can work at home and I use this to monitor my baby while I'm working in the study room. I would surely buy from infant optics again!

Reviews.Title: Great product, better than the others I have tried!
Reviews.Author: John I. Gonzales
Reviews.Content: This device works well! Nice screen size, clear picture day and night and very easy to use. It is also very light weight so carrying it around the house is similar you carrying a cell phone. The range is great all around our home (single story, 1600 sqft). The lithium ion battery is a nice touch too. Recharge it and you are good to go.What could be better?1) Audio sounds very tinny/mechanical. The bottom line is this device does the job just fine but the audio is a bit weird sounding. I don't really care since this is not my surround sound/home theater device... but I just wanted to make the point that the audio "could be" better.This is a winner all the way, especially at the price point! For $99 this has helped us feel so much better about having our baby in another room out of sight.BTW, we use to have the "Summer Infant Day and Night" monitor system with a small 1.8" screen. That thing was a total waste of money compared to this. And that device costs a lot more than this one!I hope this review helps! If you have any specific questions just ask!

Reviews.Title: Great Video Monitor
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: What a great monitor for a great price. The picture is so much more clear than the models you find at the local baby store. The reception is great and the voice activation is a wonderful feature. Couldn't ask for more!

Reviews.Title: Great specs
Reviews.Author: Pablo Levinson
Reviews.Content: Great specs as a low cost baby monitor. It's got great sound quality and picks up the little noises too like my baby shuffling in his blanket. The video runs at a good refresh rate and the resolution is OK. The screen is a decent size - not too large to make it a burden to bring around. The camera does not have portable power so it can not be moved like the monitor unit. It's got a brightness controller and and a volume controller, but no sensitivity control.I got 1 additional camera when I bought it and if you've never used a modern video monitor before it can be tricky. I had some problems at first but I called Infant Optics directly and they were very helpful.This is a good monitor and for the price, the specs are unbeatable.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Laile "Football mom"
Reviews.Content: Can't say this is the best since I know it is falling short of the many features like two way comm., moving camera lens, lullabies etc. on current models from motorola and summer infant but this is the best for the value. This is a $100 baby monitor and all I can say it's worth the money and it's nice to be able to keep an constant eye and ear on my 1 y.o. son.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Walsh Cahill
Reviews.Content: Owned this for nearly 4 months now and I haven't had a problem with it yet. Went from sound monitor to this and it was well worth the upgrade! Everything was designed very thoughtful but a little design flaw is that the voice activation power saving mode is defaulted to be ON once you turn it on. So everytime I switch it off and turn it back on, the power saving mode is on standby and will switch off in 3 minutes unless I turn it off manually. The range is great, it even works when I'm in the garage and the camera is on the 2nd floor. It's not like those monitors which goes flaky and produces static noise when you are too far away - this thing either stays on perfect or cuts out like that when out of range. I know that the more expensive models has more features, have a larger screen, better sound quality, but if you are really using this to monitor your baby, this unit is enough. You don't need a full HD super bright + super large monitor with all those cool lights and sounds if you want one JUST to check on your child. I got this at 99 bucks and I absolutely recommend this at this price!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: TL Bardo
Reviews.Content: I was shopping for a sound monitor until I came across this being only $25 more expensive than the ones I was looking at. I got this at the sale price and I am incredibly happy that I made this choice instead of getting the sound monitor. This gave me more than what I needed.Since this is my first video baby monitor, I didn't know how much better this was compared to sound monitors until I really used it after the first night. I'm glad that the prices of the video monitors came down so much it became so affordable. A decent one was over $300 just a few years ago.The audio isn't as clear and as loud as my previous sony sound monitor, but together with the video, I get much more situation awareness of what's happening while I am downstairs. I don't have to run up and down anymore to make sure what I hear is really what is happening.The VOX mode works as it should do, my daughter cries and the VOX turns the unit back on notifying me that she's awake. When she's asleep, the unit goes to power saving mode too. I noticed that the sound switches completely off sometimes and this is nice because it kills out the white noise that is disturbs me while I work and that's why with my previous sony audio monitor I had to turn the volume down while she's asleep.I can finally have VERY good sleep now and this is the best buy of 2011 for my family!

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitoring system
Reviews.Author: Jocelyn Wood
Reviews.Content: I got this after my summer infant broke down 4 months ago. I've been using the infant optics one ever since. I got this one because of great reviews and I agree with most of the users. The price, video, audio, and simplicity makes it a great baby monitor. It doesn't have all the addon features like the music or lighting and all that but they aren't necessary. The size is perfect, any bigger will make it difficult to clip on your waist.I would prefer it if it came in more colors, but baby blue fits my daughter's room too.In summary, it is an excellent choice for the money. You don't really need to spend big bucks on these products. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Volume cuts in and out
Reviews.Author: Loving mama
Reviews.Content: I just got this as a gift and this is only my second day using it, but am already annoyed. Visually it seems pretty good, but the audio cuts in and out all the time. I am wondering if it's because there is no sound to be heard and it just shuts off? My son is very verbal, so I don't think this is the case, but I don't know. Hopefully it fixes itself or maybe I am missing something, because I really don't want to return it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product !!
Reviews.Author: Luis Inoa
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I wanted for my friends I'm very pleased with the product in General ... 1 one word "Flawless" !!

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEASED WITH THIS PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: D. Bloc "Under training"
Reviews.Content: I got this video monitor after researching all the monitors that are out there. As highly as the motorola is rated, I just did not have the money to spend over $150. I've seen the samsung video monitor in a baby store and played around with it, but I didn't like how the video was delayed for a few seconds before appearing on the screen. The frame rate is also very twitchy and it doesn't justify as a $200+ monitor.I like this infant optics monitor mainly for the price on amazon. This isn't the best monitor out there but I'm pleased with the performance for the price you pay. The video is excellent, and all the features works as advertised. The automute function is good if you want to keep your monitor on constantly while you sleep (with vox mode off). Some complain about this because they feel that the sound 'dies' after a while, but it helps cut out the noisy static noise when nothing is happening in my child's room. It's very user friendly and I'm just glad it works everytime I needed it to for the past few months. I'm planning to get another one for my sister's child for xmas.

Reviews.Title: Wow, great product!
Reviews.Author: Kwilliams77
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor because of the reviews. I still can't believe this monitor was only 99$. It's really great of this company to have such a fair price. If I was to improve one thing about it, I would have a stronger (not so cheap) plastic. But it works so well that it doesn't really matter. You just can't go throwing it around. But I am careful with my stuff. I shopped around for a long time for a decent monitor with a fair price. Most of them are reduculous in price and don't work as well as this one. I am in a 1000 sq ft condo and have no problems with range or interference. So I can't say how well it would work in a bigger home. But I ,so far, love this product! I am so glad I purchased it!Thank you Infant Optics!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good for Babies That Make a Lot of Noise When They Wake
Reviews.Author: uscliza "uscliza"
Reviews.Content: My daughter is 18 months old and our Sony BabyCall has gone haywire in our new house (buzzing at all hours of the night and just generally  not cooperating), so I wanted to get a new monitor.  I tried this one because the reviews were pretty good and, hey, for the price, why not try a video monitor?!  It works well, like everyone says, the video quality is good.  Only problem is the sensitivity.  In its "VOX" mode, it goes off after 3 minutes if there's no sound over 65 decibles, and it automatically clicks back on if this sound hits that level or above.  You cannot adjust the sensitivity of this.  You CAN turn "VOX" off, but then the video stays on the whole time and eats up a lot of the battery.  Plus, you don't really want that staring you in the face all night long.The problem with it for us is that my daughter wakes up from both naps and nighttime pretty quietly.  She'll just keep herself busy in her crib for up to 30 minutes or so before she starts giving us the, "Ok, where is everybody?" type noises.  Every morning, I'd turn the monitor on and there she'd be, wide awake and moving around for who knows how long because the monitor wouldn't turn on.  So, we've returned it and are about to try the Angelcare Basic Monitor.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed
Reviews.Author: Kev "Hot chilli"
Reviews.Content: I'm really happy with the purchase on this baby monitor, especially the sale price! Alot has changed since I last shopped for one and it seems all of the monitors are now 2.4ghz with video. I'm not a technical person but this sounds like the most stable and reliable solution to video and audio remote monitoring of your child. The picture is very clear and there is no delay or jerkiness like the ones I've tried out in babies r us. But, the picture doesn't have color when using night vision but I think this is the same with all the other monitors too. I can get confused where my daughter is with all the soft toys placed on the sides of the crib. There's no pan tilt or zoom function but that's OK because for the price I'm happy with just the standard static camera unit. The batteries lasted a whole night with VOX mode on, but I haven't tried it with VOX off yet because it works pretty well with it ON. The auto mute function is pretty cool because it cuts out the static noise when it's quiet in her room. This is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: P. Boatright
Reviews.Content: My littles ones are not here yet but I have already hooked up the camera's and they work great(I also bought an add on camera because we are having twins). They work great, can't beat it for the price. I paid $170 for my 2 camera's and monitor.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Dave Maggo
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing monitor with great a price tag. the night vision is good, video is good, audio is good... can't think of anything bad about it. Mind you, i've been using audio monitors all my life and at $20 more, this is a must-get item if you are looking to upgrade to video monitors. If i didn't like it i could have returned it especially on amazon where they are quite good on their customer service, but i'll be keeping it for sure!

Reviews.Title: good monitor for its price
Reviews.Author: Jessie
Reviews.Content: We had a Sony audio monitor for 4 months it was good but not enough. As new parents we still can't help going to baby's room to check all the time when there is no sound. This monitor is good relief. It does everything it supposed to. Most time the IR is on because we keep the room very dark for baby's nap. It works great. Of course it's not CD quality sound or DVD quality video but we don't really need them. We are very glad we got this product.

Reviews.Title: CA mom
Reviews.Author: CA mom
Reviews.Content: I found it a good value.  And I found it easy to install and use.  I don't like the noise upon turning it on.  And I don't like that it cuts off every three minutes.

Reviews.Title: The best for price
Reviews.Author: Remi T.
Reviews.Content: We received this monitor within 2 days of ordering on amazon. We've been using this since July now and we decided to two more camera units, one more with our new born and another two for our twins. It worked great and was extremely easy to set up-very basic. The video quality is very, very good. We were impressive by the quality of it even when it was in the dark. It has now been used for almost a year and we have very little problems with interference and we are loving the automatic voice activation power mode which means we don't have to recharge the monitor as much as our old ones. The only thing about this product it isn't have two way communication which would be good if you want to speak with you child, but for the price I'm happy for what it offers.

Reviews.Title: Digital is the way to go
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: I'm glad I changed to a digital baby monitor from a static prone 900mhz monitor.  This monitor is virtually silent and was definitely a bang for my buck. Had a lot of troubles with my old baby monitors as they crackled with increased distance. There's no lag at all with the video streaming and this monitor is great if you want to save some money yet get a monitor that performs well.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Shaun Streich
Reviews.Content: Originally we were looking an audio only monitor.  Once this system dropped to $99 it was a no brainer to go with the video.  Now we don't know what we would do without it!

Reviews.Title: A good investment
Reviews.Author: -Jia-
Reviews.Content: This monitor COULD look tacky in one person's eye but I like the light material making it easy to carry around my pocket without noticing its there. I dropped it pretty hard from the kitchen table last week and it's proved its durability well. I used a sound monitor for our first born but it just doesn't offer you one little bit of the security that you would have with a video monitor. This is definitely the best investment that we have made with baby gadgets so far, so cheap and works really well.

Reviews.Title: Nice and simple
Reviews.Author: Bhogans
Reviews.Content: I purchased a few baby monitors over the past 2 years and found that this one has been one of the best for the price. It is definitely one of the easiest to navigate around and the sound is extremely clear. Picture quality is very clear and so is the night vision, I can see things in the distance very well on the screen. Best monitor around if you want something affordable yet something that gives you all that you would need in a baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: the best quality for a good price
Reviews.Author: maria jesus
Reviews.Content: good night vision, almost no interference at all, the support of the camera a little bit uncomfortable but not relevant.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: JCK
Reviews.Content: We made this purchase for our first baby, who is due in about three & a half months. We wanted to get a video monitor for our own peace of mind, but didn't want to spend too much. This baby monitor was super easy to set up. We played around with it once it arrived to see how it worked, and so far, we have no complaints. The picture is very clear and there was no static or interference. Our house is 2000+ square feet and I was able to get a clear picture everywhere I went. I'm happy with my purchase so far, especially given what a great value this was!

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Bojanglesman
Reviews.Content: I was discouraged when the price went from $99 up to $298 all of a sudden a few months ago.  But now that it dropped back to $99, it is a really good deal.  I just received it yesterday.  Our first baby is due in a few months.Very light material as many have mentioned, but it's sturdy.  Easy to power up and set up.  Works well in day and night mode.  Smooth motion.  The sound is a little quiet, even on it's loudest setting, but I think it'll be plenty loud to wake us up if there is crying. It certainly won't blow your ears off though.  It does not interfere with my wireless internet router (I have a Linksys Wireless G).  There is a handout on how to handle this if it does though, very easy to understand.  I tested the range by walking outside and down my street.  I got to the other side of my neighbor's house (about 40-50 yards) before the signal went out.  So that's way more than enough for my needs.Overall, this is a really good video monitor a really good price.  Hard to beat that.  I do wish it had 2 way audio, but I don't really need it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Life saver. Saved my money too!
Reviews.Author: Stewart Reed
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is a life saver. Had to spend so much else on baby stuff like the crib, pram, bottles, toys, didn't want to spend a few hundred more on a digital video monitor! I can tell exactly when my baby is crying with this machine, there is no fuzziness and very little lag, everything on the screen is very easy to distinguish! Love how both the brightness and volume are adjustable so that I can turn all the settings lower when it is night time and I am trying to sleep, and turn it up when I am up doing chores. Everything is very plastic like but it is still strong, managed to step over it quite heavily the other day when it was lying on the floor and it didn't come close to cracking! I bought this when it was on sale at $99.99 on amazon and the deals here on amazon are just getting better and better.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely amazing!
Reviews.Author: Shatoon
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my god-son and the parents are very greatful! Sneaky as well because they thought that I had bought them a very expensive gift - but only 100 dollars so win-win situation because it is such a good product. I went over to their home last week and saw it in action. I'm glad to see that everything worked very well. It's got a very smooth streaming video, it also has got great range - I took it out into the backyard and it still worked. The audio is nice and clear. I don't like how big companies charge so much for useless add-ons. Yes the motorola and samsung baby monitors are great but I really can't justify to spend double the money for so little. So glad that this device has been chosen out of all the other complicated ones, definitely made my life easier.

Reviews.Title: A good baby monitor.... but only in blue?
Reviews.Author: Dibsy
Reviews.Content: A very durable product that is super easy to use.Good video and audio. Perfect reception. Wished they had another color than blue.Make sure you take the lense cap off because it doesn't say anywhere that there is a cap straight out of the box.Don't leave monitor on the edge of tables or anything because it is not very heavy and can be easily tipped over.Good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: I love this baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Mary Roberts
Reviews.Content: Bought this baby monitor before I had my son so we have been using it since he came home from the hospital. After reading the instruction manual, getting the signal to work etc it was smooth sailing from there, everything is so self explanatory with this monitor! Thought the plastic wouldn't be top quality because it looks like it can snap, but it is very strong in fact. The screen takes up about 1/3 of the monitor which is definitely enough for me. Unless you are prepared to spend another $100 on getting a unit with lullabies and temperature sensors... I'd say this baby monitor is best one in this economical price range.

Reviews.Title: Awesome surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: Samual Simon
Reviews.Content: I own a construction and mechanics company so I use this wireless monitor to keep an eye out on my workers, particularly when they are in the stock control room. It definitely does its job. The color and video quality is good, the actual imagery is very clear and crisp. The monitor works well for my purpose... it's got good range and it has all the feature I need. Don't expect audio quality to do that great if you use it outdoors, it picks up all the background noises. The finishing quality is subpar to the Samsung monitor we own at home for our newborn, but for $100 it is a worthwhile business investment.

Reviews.Title: Go for 2.4ghz and don't turn back
Reviews.Author: Sterilizer
Reviews.Content: This is a baby monitor that is extremely user friendly. It is absolutely static free being 2.4ghz which is a definite plus. I purchased two other video monitors and borrowed another one from my sister before this one and none of them were that satisfactory due to little minor glitches here and there. I've seen one where the frame rate is so slow it's like an 'undownloadable video'. The video on the infant optics is very smooth. This one has been number one on my list so far, because mainly I like the pocket size look and feel of it (it is so light) and the fact that the audio and visuals are so clear. I agree that this product is very basic, but I'd rather describe it as simple, and definitely what I paid for. Would be 100% perfect if the company could manage their inventory better so I can get the extra addon monitor NOW!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Allen Huscroft
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have reviewed many different types of monitors on the market before our first child was born. We decided to try this one out after reading reviews and having it recommended by a close friend. We have had no troubles with this product at all. The 2.4-inch display is more than sufficient in letting us know what is going on in the other room with our baby. Yes I agree that this product is slightly more pricey because of perhaps the infrared night vision add-ons and the fact that it is a video monitor, not just a voice one, however it is not like our son is constantly making noise so we often find comfort in simply seeing that he is awake and crawling around from the other room. This is a highly recommended investment.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR-5 baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: This is from experience once of the best baby monitors out in the market. I distinctly opted for video monitor as I have heard through family and friends that the cheaper models with voice really do not exceed the value that they are worth. This video monitor is great especially at night because with the adjustable brightness quality and infrared night vision, the monitor will not distract the baby from sleeping. After using the play back mode, I noticed that the quality is crisp and I could quite distinctly see the details of the bedroom, not just the baby. In terms of interference, none experienced so far! This is coming from somebody that has had a lot of frustration with cheap baby monitors full of static. There really is no point of buying a baby monitor that generates so much static that it wakes us up. I have bought so many cheap and disappointing baby monitors in the past that have added up in costs, you may as well invest a little more money for this baby monitor because it is the best that I have seen on the market so far.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This monitor is good for the money, comparables are around two hundred dollars. The sound is a little quiet and I seem to lose signal often not sure if I am doing something wrong (like not switching the antenna when changing floors?) or not. All and all not too much to complain about for 100.00.

Reviews.Title: Good video monitor and great customer service
Reviews.Author: Jason Williams
Reviews.Content: We must have gotten one of the last ones for the low price of $99.98, and I'm glad we snagged it because shortly after, the price shot up to $298.98, although another seller through Amazon has it for $179.95.This monitor has had very good reviews here, and it does what it's supposed to do as others have said. The picture quality is OK, but it's a bit wonky when you have the Auto Night Mode on which it is by default, as it sometimes tries to transition back and forth too much depending on how much light there is. Audio is loud enough, but tinny. The VOX mode conservers battery life by disabling the speaker when no noise is being made, and then having the monitor go into sleep mode when there is no noise for a few minutes. It then comes back on when there is some noise detected. Range is fine, as we can have the camera and the monitor at opposite ends of our house. I did not experience any interference with other devices. It is supposed to offer privacy encryption to prevent other people from picking up your signal and seeing your baby, but I had no way that I know of to prove or test that. As for build, it's made of very light plastic, which might feel a bit cheap as others have stated.The support seems very good when I had questions about the battery life. With VOX active which it is by default, the battery fully charged can last around 9 hours. With VOX off and the monitor always on, the battery fully charged lasts between 3-4 hours. It is recommended to keep the monitor plugged in with the AC adapter for prolonged monitoring, like using it overnight, so that it doesn't shut off on you from low charge.It's definitely a good deal at the $100 price point, but at the higher price points which it is now at, for it to be worth it, it would have to offer better audio and video, maybe a bigger screen, and be built of better material so that it doesn't have the "cheapy" feeling.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor for a great price
Reviews.Author: jettysmom
Reviews.Content: We only paid $99 for this monitor and it works great! We had originally purchased the MobiCam DXR and couldn't get reception from one side of our 2 bedroom condo to the other. At night it's a little grainy but all the cams we have seen are. We've had the logitech when watching our friends' son. Sound is great and it's really easy to install.

Reviews.Title: I love It ! Just what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Inbal Zohar
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor so much, It has a perfect screen size,just right,no static noise,clear picture,plus It has 'vox' activation mode It shuts off automatically when there's no noise(baby cry)for 3 minutes, and then turn right back on as soon as It detects noise.you can not beat this price either ! Comparing to the "Summer-Infant" 'bulky' monitor I used to have which can not even compare to this one.same price but this one Is wireless which makes a hugh difference and gives you the conveniency you're looking for. P.s: REMOVE THE LENS-COVER OUT OF THE CAMERA (a small black piece attached to the camera lens) I needed this a assistant when I didnt know what to do when I though I couldn't see a picture after the 'Pairing' process so I'm passing It forward to other customers who may have the same Issue.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: S. Shin "haedungmyung"
Reviews.Content: Just got this item today. Our Apt is 700sq. Works pretty good! Impressed. Yes, the itemlooks like a toy, Yes it doesn't have really cool functions. But it does what I need it to do. Check on my baby while I step away to th kitchen. The screen is the same size as a blackberry bold. I got it when the price was under $100.00 I'm not sure I would buy and keep something so simple at over $250 bucks. Baby hasn't cried as yet so I don't know if the sleep mode turns off. But it does go into sleep mode quit often that does annoy me and I don't have the option to turn it off. But for the price I feel good about the product.

Reviews.Title: Great video monitor for price!
Reviews.Author: bellabellabobella
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best video monitor you can get for under $100.  Yes, it is basic and does not have all the bells and whistles as other monitors that are almost twice and expensive or even more than that.  This monitor fits all of our needs as we were not looking for anything fancy.  What we were looking for in a monitor was to be able to see and hear our daughter clearly and be sure she is safe.  This does the job, and well!  It has a great picture in the dark, and we even have the monitor up on a shelf about 5-6 feet away, although it would be just as clear up to at least 10 feet away (we tested it).  It does not have a zoom or pan option, but we did not feel like paying more money for it.  The camera has a nice holder option or can be wall-mounted.  The red IR lights are not very bright and therefore does not bother our daughter.  We had an issue with some interference with our router, which according to the manufacturer was the first they heard of it.  They contacted their tech department immediately, and the problem was resolved quickly.  If this problems happens to you, just go into your router settings and change the channel.  Quick and easy fix!I would highly recommend this product for parents who do not want to spend a fortune and who are looking for a good quality, basic video monitor.  Also, customer service was excellent if any problems or questions arise.

Reviews.Title: Not best plastic quality, but best price
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Anderson
Reviews.Content: The quality of the plastic isn't as good as I hoped, but the performance and price really beats it all. Its is truly plug and play, it is very easy to setup an use. It does not interfere with our wireless internet and that is a big relief with most 2.4ghz monitors available. I love the small hand held screen unit rather than the old big screen monitors that you can't carry around. The battery lasts a good few hours before needs recharging. There's a little belt clip but it feels flimsy. I hope it will last! Overall a great product if you are looking for something affordable and performs well in video/audio quality BUT do not mind the lightweight plastic. If it breaks, I happily got my 1 year warranty.

Reviews.Title: exactly what i wanted
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Landess
Reviews.Content: this is exactly what i wanted.  nothing fancy, but everything needed ( sound, video, night vision) havn't got ot test hte battery- hope it doesn't dissapoint on the road!

Reviews.Title: Surprised how many people like this
Reviews.Author: Jewels77
Reviews.Content: I have a sony baby monitor and was looking to upgrade to a new monitor that would include video and hopefully have less static/feedback issues. We used this monitor for one night and will be sending it back. Here are the negatives: do not like the red lights that come on around the camera when it becomes activated by baby's motion. We have a 1.5 year old and these lights were a distraction for her and she kept staring at the camera...not what you want at 3am. It was also disturbing on our end to have the screen suddenly light up our entire room because the baby was moving. I'm not sure if that is the case with all video monitors, but if so I don't know how people manage to get a good night sleep with them. I also don't like how the unit beeps when going into sleep mode. It's loud and startling. Also, I don't care for the volume button. I wanted an option between 0 and 1. I couldn't make the unit quiet enough without making it mute. The sound quality on this monitor also leaves something to be desired. My sony unit has far superior sound quality to this. The picture quality was acceptable (not great, not terrible) and I at least didn't have the static issues I experience with the sony. However, there are far too many cons to even consider keeping this. I slept worse the one night we used it than I did when we have experienced lots of interference with our other unit.

Reviews.Title: Would have given 5 stars if sold as Wi-Fi blocker
Reviews.Author: S. Bigelow
Reviews.Content: This thing will absolutely destroy your 2.4GHz WiFi. I had to upgrade my home WiFi to 5GHz (which isn't affected by the monitor), but I still have a few 2.4GHz devices that require me to power down the monitor in order to use at all.
